title: Debility
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Some weak individuals only need rest, fresh air, sunshine, pure water, nutritious meals,
and freedom from worry.
• Some need to clean the toxins from their body. Those who do so, may feel weaker for a
few days, but afterwards will generally feel much better and stronger.
• Over-indulgence in sex is an excellent way to debilitate the body. Worry wears out the
life forces. The use of coffee, tea, tobacco, alcohol, and processed and junk foods are also
sources of trouble.
• Trust in God, obey the Ten Commandments, and live as healthfully as you can.
• A good program of better nutrition, more rest, less tension, and taking time to go
outdoors and work or walk 30-60 minutes at a time will do much to build the body. A cold
morning shower invigorates the body.
• As an aid in rebuilding the body after acute or chronic illnesses, the following herbal
formula is quite helpful. It combines nutritional benefits with herbal tonics:
Mix together 1 oz. parsley root, 1 oz. alfalfa; 1/2 oz. of each of the
following: dandelion root, comfrey root, yellow dock root, burdock root,
nettles leaves, and dulse. Place in an uncovered pot with a quart of water
and simmer for 20 minutes. Let it cool, then strain. Place the liquid back in
the pot and simmer uncovered for one hour or until it is reduced to one cup.
Stir in one cup of unsulphured blackstrap molasses and refrigerate. Take
one tablespoonful 3 times a day.
• A variant method would involve taking the powdered, mixed, dry herbs (not having gone
through the cooking stage), place them in #00 capsules, and take 2-4 caps with each meal.
HYDRO—Here are water treatments, explained in the author's Water Therapy Manual (see order sheet),
which will increase endurance: Tonic frictions, which include Wet Hand Rub, Cold Mitten Friction,
Cold Towel Rub, Wet Sheet Rub, Dripping Sheet Rub, Ice Rub, and Salt Glow (WTM, pp. 97-105). In
cases of severe exhaustion, bed rest for a time, proper diet, plus carefully graduated tonic cold
applications, especially Percussion Douche to spine (p. 228).
(Weak, Debilitated Conditions)
SYMPTOMS—A feeling of exhaustion all or much of the time.
CAUSES—This can be caused by a number of dietetic, physical, or hormonal problems, some of which
are mentioned below. See "Chronic Fatigue" for much more information.
contentSw:

title: Emotional Fatigue Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Learn to relax, as well as exercise out-of-doors. Do everything with an attitude of thankfulness toward
and trust in God, believing that He will work everything out for the best.
• Eat high fiber foods, fruits, vegetables, juices, sprouts, grains, nuts, seeds, and beans. Vitamins A, D,
C, and E are important. Take a multivitamin tablet twice a day. Make sure you are getting enough
calcium, magnesium and potassium.
SYMPTOMS—A variety of symptoms could be involved: continual tension and stress, anxiety,
depression, loss of interest, no zest for life, inability to cope with everyday problems, mental and
physical fatigue, loss of confidence, fear of failure, panic attacks, a sense of hopelessness, mood swings,
muscle spasms, sensitivity to noise, negative attitudes, and constant worrying.
CAUSES—Emotional stress depletes the nervous system, weakens emotional stability, and fatigues the
body. Such stress weakens the functions of the body organs (such as the stomach and liver). This in turn
results in malnourishment and a release of toxins into the system. Primary causes would include
constipation, autointoxication, nutritional deficiencies, a negative outlook on people and circumstances,
and negative input from other people.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Jifunze kupumzika, na pia mazoezi ya nje ya milango. Fanya kila kitu na mtazamo wa kushukuru
Na mwamini Mungu, akiamini kwamba atafanya kazi kila kitu bora.
• Kula vyakula vya nyuzi nyingi, matunda, mboga, juisi, mimea, nafaka, karanga, mbegu, na maharagwe. Vitamini A, D,
C, na E ni muhimu. Chukua kibao cha multivitamin mara mbili kwa siku. Hakikisha unapata kutosha
Kalsiamu, magnesiamu na potasiamu.
Dalili -Aina tofauti zinaweza kuhusika: mvutano wa kila wakati na mafadhaiko, wasiwasi,
Unyogovu, upotezaji wa riba, hakuna zest kwa maisha, kutoweza kukabiliana na shida za kila siku, kiakili na
Uchovu wa mwili, kupoteza ujasiri, hofu ya kutofaulu, mashambulio ya hofu, hali ya kutokuwa na tumaini, mabadiliko ya mhemko,
Spasms za misuli, usikivu wa kelele, mitazamo hasi, na wasiwasi wa kila wakati.
Sababu -Dhiki ya kihemko hupunguza mfumo wa neva, kudhoofisha utulivu wa kihemko, na kuzidisha
mwili. Dhiki kama hiyo inadhoofisha kazi za viungo vya mwili (kama tumbo na ini). Hii kwa zamu
husababisha utapiamlo na kutolewa kwa sumu kwenye mfumo. Sababu za msingi zingejumuisha
kuvimbiwa, autointoxication, upungufu wa lishe, mtazamo mbaya kwa watu na hali,
na pembejeo hasi kutoka kwa watu wengine.

title: Chronic Fatigue
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Obtain adequate rest, exercise, and a well-balanced diet.
• Deficiencies of vitamin B complex, C and D, or iron may cause fatigue. Also needed:
vitamins A, pantothenic acid, B12, folic acid, C, E, iron, calcium, magnesium.
Acidophilus is very helpful to improve digestion and the production of certain B vitamins
in the bowel.
• Exercise every day outdoors. Try to induce some perspiration. Also helpful are ice-cold
foot baths, daily morning bare-foot grass walks, alternative hot and cold showers, "salt
glow" skin rubs, and a dry friction rub with a skin brush.
• Helpful herbs include American ginseng, lavender, rosemary, sweet flag, pasque flower.
—Also see "Epstein Barr Virus," which is a different "chronic fatigue syndrome," although having the
same name.
SYMPTOMS—A continual feeling of exhaustion.
CAUSES—Fatigue is a symptom pointing to other problems; it is not a disease itself. Chronic fatigue is
generally caused by a high-fat and refined carbohydrate diet, along with emotional stress. Any of the
following only adds to the exhaustion: drugs, caffeine products, smoking, alcohol, poor eating habits.
Chronic fatigue can forewarn of an undetected problem such as anemia, hypoglycemia, diabetes,
allergies, malabsorption of nutrients, candidiasis, poor circulation, hypothyroidism, Epstein Barr virus
(EBV), mononucleosis, or cancer.
It can also be caused by weight loss, obesity, and, if characterized only by a lack of energy, boredom.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Pata kupumzika kwa kutosha, mazoezi, na lishe bora.
Upungufu wa vitamini B tata, C na D, au chuma inaweza kusababisha uchovu. Inahitajika pia:
Vitamini A, asidi ya pantothenic, B12, asidi ya folic, C, E, chuma, kalsiamu, magnesiamu.
Acidophilus inasaidia sana kuboresha digestion na utengenezaji wa vitamini fulani vya B
Katika matumbo.
• Zoezi kila siku nje. Jaribu kushawishi jasho. Inasaidia pia ni baridi-barafu
Bafu za miguu, kila siku nyasi za miguu zisizo na miguu, njia mbadala za moto na baridi, "Chumvi
Glow "Rubs za ngozi, na msuguano kavu wa msuguano na brashi ya ngozi.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na ginseng ya Amerika, lavender, rosemary, bendera tamu, maua ya pasque.
-Unaona "Virusi vya Epstein Barr," ambayo ni tofauti "ugonjwa wa uchovu sugu," ingawa una kuwa na
Jina sawa.
Dalili -hisia za daima za uchovu.
Sababu -Uvunjaji ni dalili inayoashiria shida zingine; Sio ugonjwa yenyewe. Uchovu sugu ni
Kwa ujumla husababishwa na lishe yenye mafuta mengi na iliyosafishwa, pamoja na mafadhaiko ya kihemko. Yoyote ya
Kufuatia huongeza tu kwa uchovu: dawa za kulevya, bidhaa za kafeini, sigara, pombe, tabia mbaya ya kula.
Uchovu sugu unaweza kuonya shida isiyoonekana kama anemia, hypoglycemia, ugonjwa wa sukari,

Inaweza pia kusababishwa na kupoteza uzito, fetma, na, ikiwa inaonyeshwa tu na ukosefu wa nishati, uchovu.

title: Epstein Barr Virus
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Antibiotics do not help since EBV is a virus. Recovery takes time, rest, and good
nutrition. Drink lots of water; at least 8 glasses a day. Regularity in bowel movements are
essential. Add fiber to the diet. Cleansing enemas should be used occasionally. Get plenty
of rest. Do not overexert yourself with heavy exercise.
• Remove from the diet all junk foods, processed foods, fried foods, stimulants (coffee,
tea, soft drinks, sugar), and white flour products (bread, spaghetti, etc.)
• It is said that 60 percent of those with EBV also have candida (see Candidiasis),
therefore it is best to eat some form of acidophilus. Eliminate sugar, alcohol, mushrooms
and all fungi, molds and yeast, fermented foods such as sauerkraut, soy sauce, dry roasted
nuts, potato chips, soda pop, bacon, pork, lunch meats, and all types of cheese.
• Eat some brand of "greens" tablets. Chlorophyll is vital to proper diet and healing. Make
green drinks from whizzed up greens and pineapple juice.
• Take no aspirin, since it may induce Reye's syndrome (especially in children).
• Helpful herbs include red clover to cleanse the blood, echinacea to help the glands, garlic
as an antibiotic, and saffron to help reduce pain.
—Also see "Lyme Disease," which has similar symptoms. Also see "Chronic Fatigue Syndrome."
(Chronic Fatigue Syndrome)
SYMPTOMS—Recurrent upper-respiratory tract infections, exhaustion, extreme fatigue, sore throat,
swollen lymph nodes, achy joints and muscles, memory loss, low-grade fevers, headaches, poor
concentration, night sweats, irritability, and deep depression. Because the symptoms resemble flu and
other viral symptoms, EBV is not always diagnosed correctly. In fact, it is frequently misdiagnosed as
hypochondria, depression, or psychosomatic illness.
CAUSES—Chronic fatigue syndrome is caused by the Epstein Barr virus (EBV). This condition has
become widespread in America. the CDC in Atlanta estimates that tens of thousands of people are
infected with it. Yet they are unaware of it since symptoms are frequently not prominent.
This virus is also the cause of infectious mononucleosis. When mononucleosis occurs, the person
becomes very ill for two to four weeks, or longer if the diet is not corrected. (See "Mononucleosis.")
EBV is a type of herpes virus, and is related to the viruses that cause genital herpes and shingles.
Keep in mind that chronic fatigue syndrome can also be caused by certain other factors: candida albicans
(yeast infection), anemia, chronic mercury poisoning from dental amalgam tooth fillings, hypoglycemia,
insomnia, and hypothyroidism. (All of the above problems are dealt with in articles in this book.)
Once EBV is contracted, it always remains in the body. Fortunately, most people develop antibodies to
it. The problem occurs when they become run-down and overworked—and then the dormant EBV
strikes. It is more likely to reveal its presence when other diseases are also present, such as arthritis,
lupus, multiple sclerosis, cancer, or AIDS.
EBV causes the body to overreact, resulting in a burn-out of the immune system.
Epstein Barr virus is very contagious, and can be transmitted by close contact, kissing, sharing food,
coughing, and through sex.
Blood tests for antibodies against candida albicans, EBV, HBLV and CMV are available for specific
diagnosis. Yet the fact remains that EBV symptoms are similar to those for many infections, anemia,
parasites, endocrine diseases, and AIDS.

• Dawa za dawa hazisaidii kwani EBV ni virusi. Kupona kunachukua muda, kupumzika, na nzuri
lishe. Kunywa maji mengi; Angalau glasi 8 kwa siku. Utaratibu katika harakati za matumbo ni
muhimu. Ongeza nyuzi kwenye lishe. Kusafisha enemas inapaswa kutumiwa mara kwa mara. Pata mengi
ya kupumzika. Usijishughulishe na mazoezi mazito.

• Kula chapa fulani ya vidonge vya "Greens". Chlorophyll ni muhimu kwa lishe sahihi na uponyaji. Tengeneza

Dalili zingine za virusi, EBV haitambuliwi kila wakati kwa usahihi. Kwa kweli, mara nyingi hutambuliwa vibaya kama

Sababu -Dalili ya uchovu wa Chronic husababishwa na virusi vya Epstein Barr (EBV). Hali hii ina
kuenea Amerika. CDC katika Atlanta inakadiria kuwa makumi ya maelfu ya watu ni
kuambukizwa nayo. Walakini hawajui kwani dalili mara nyingi sio maarufu.
Virusi hii pia ndio sababu ya mononucleosis ya kuambukiza. Wakati mononucleosis inatokea, mtu
Inakuwa mgonjwa sana kwa wiki mbili hadi nne, au zaidi ikiwa lishe haijarekebishwa. (Tazama "Mononucleosis.")
EBV ni aina ya virusi vya herpes, na inahusiana na virusi ambavyo husababisha herpes ya sehemu ya siri na shingles.
Kumbuka kwamba ugonjwa sugu wa uchovu pia unaweza kusababishwa na mambo mengine: candida albicans
(maambukizi ya chachu), anemia, sumu sugu ya zebaki kutoka kwa kujaza meno ya meno, hypoglycemia,
kukosa usingizi, na hypothyroidism. (Shida zote hapo juu zinashughulikiwa katika nakala kwenye kitabu hiki.)
Mara tu EBV inapowekwa mikataba, daima inabaki kwenye mwili. Kwa bahati nzuri, watu wengi huendeleza antibodies kwa
IT. Shida hufanyika wakati wanapokuwa chini na kufanya kazi kupita kiasi-na kisha EBV ya dormant
mgomo. Inawezekana kufunua uwepo wake wakati magonjwa mengine pia yapo, kama ugonjwa wa arthritis,
Lupus, sclerosis nyingi, saratani, au UKIMWI.
EBV husababisha mwili kupita kiasi, na kusababisha kuchomwa kwa mfumo wa kinga.
Virusi vya Epstein Barr vinaambukiza sana, na vinaweza kupitishwa kwa mawasiliano ya karibu, kumbusu, kugawana chakula,
kukohoa, na kupitia ngono.
Vipimo vya damu kwa antibodies dhidi ya albino za Candida, EBV, HBLV na CMV zinapatikana kwa maalum
utambuzi. Bado ukweli unabaki kuwa dalili za EBV ni sawa na zile za maambukizo mengi, anemia,
Vimelea, magonjwa ya endocrine, na UKIMWI.

title: Candidiasis
contentEn:
(Yeast Infection, Candida, Thrush, Chronic Fatigue
Syndrome)
SYMPTOMS—Symptoms include bad breath, constipation, chronic infections, depression, fatigue,
food cravings, gas, headaches, adrenal and thyroid problems, hiatal hernia, indigestion, insomnia, mental
confusion, discomforting odors, panic attacks, and menstrual problems.
CAUSES—This is an infection caused by candida albicans, a normally harmless yeast (saprophyte)
found in your intestines. Some of it is also regularly found in your mouth, throat, and genital tract. But
this organism goes wild when its competitors, the normal bacteria of the intestines, are killed by long
term use of antibiotics. This enables the candida to greatly increase in number.
Stress causes a reduced production of stomach acid, which lets candida enter the stomach—a place
where it normally is never found. As a result, less digested food enters the intestines, much to the liking
of the candida which feeds upon it.
This yeast-like substance proliferates so massively that it enters the blood stream and is carried to many
parts of the body, weakening the immune system and causing various problems.
In the oral cavity, candida is called thrush. White sores may develop on the tongue, gums, and inside the
cheeks.
In the vagina, it results in vaginitis. Large amounts of a white, cheesy discharge and intense itching
occur.
Other effects are food allergies, athlete's foot, ringworm, jock itch, and even diaper rash.
Candida is not transmitted sexually, but mothers may pass thrush on to their newborn children. The
baby's tongue will appear red and be covered with white spots (generally appearing 8-9 days after
delivery) that will appear like milk spots. On the buttocks, thrush may resemble diaper rash.
Because their vaginal environment is more conducive to the growth of yeast, diabetic women can
contract candida easier than diabetic men.
You may wish to request a blood test for antibodies against C. albicans. A skin test, similar to a TB tine
test, is also available. A positive result is clear-cut. Unfortunately, a negative one provides less certainty
that one does not have it. Candida is difficult to diagnose, since a culture cannot be used. This is because
this yeast is a normal constituent of everyone's intestines.
TREATMENT—Try to eliminate food allergies, hypoglycemia, any infections, and indigestion.
• Replant Lactobacillus acidophilus. This is the friendly intestinal bacteria which the
"wonder drugs" earlier killed off. Lactobacillus is a primary competitor of candida for
food in the intestine. Use a retention enema containing 4 oz. warm water and 10 billion
organisms (empty twenty 500,000 organism capsules into the water). Use 3 times weekly,
10 minutes each time.
• Helpful herbs include burdock, echinacea, ginger, golden seal, bee pollen, kelp, lobelia,
passion flower, pau d'arco, psyllium, slippery elm, ginkgo, and suma.
• Useful nutrients include vitamin B complex with extra biotin: 100 mg 3 times a day. /
B12 lozenges: place 2,000 mcg lozenge under tongue 3 times a day between meals. /
Essential fatty acids: Wheat germ oil, primrose oil, etc. / Garlic capsules: 2 caps 3 times a
day. / Multivitamin cap, 2-3 times a day. Take vitamin C up to bowel tolerance.
• Also helpful: vitamin A: 25,000 IU one to two times a day; B6: 100-250 mg one to two
times daily; vitamin E: 400-800 IU daily; biotin; aloe vera juice: 2 oz. four times per day.
• Do not use oral contraceptives while you have candida. Do not use sugary foods. Do not
use cheese, alcohol, chocolate, fermented food, gluten grains (wheat, oats, rye, and
barley). Do not use meat, pickles, raw mushrooms, vinegar, or any yeast products.
• Yeast thrives on sugars and carbohydrates. A vegetarian nondairy diet of protein,
unrefined grains, and vegetables is best. Onions and garlic are very helpful. Fresh, raw
garlic is the best. Avoid meat-based proteins, since these are associated with abnormal
bowel flora development. Avoid yeasted grain foods.
• Avoid antibiotics and steroids, because they destroy the competing bacteria and allow
candida to overgrow.
• Wear cotton underpants, rather than close-mesh synthetic or silk.
• An alternative to douching is the sitz (sitting) bath. Fill a shallow tub to the hip with
warm water, then add salt (enough to make the water taste salty, about 1/2 cup) to match
your body's natural saline state. Add 1/2 cup vinegar to help rebalance the vaginal pH to
4.5. Then sit in the water, knees apart, until it gets cool. The bath will do the cleansing.
Douching can be done with a similar mixture (4 teaspoons vinegar to 1 pint of water).
INFANT THRUSH—Four percent of infants have oral thrush. Keep rubber nipples clean, as well as all
objects going into baby's mouth. If bottle-feeding, boil nipples and bottles 20 minutes after thorough
washing (candida spores are heat resistant). Give plain water to cleanse the mouth after every feeding.
Inspect the mouth before each feeding, and begin treatment if thrush is seen. Swab infected areas with
saturated solution of baking soda 3-4 times a day. Garlic overpowers candida, so it may be swabbed on
the lesions several times a day.
—Also see "Vaginitis," "Chronic Fatigue Syndrome."

Dalili -Symptoms ni pamoja na pumzi mbaya, kuvimbiwa, maambukizo sugu, unyogovu, uchovu,

Sababu - hii ni maambukizi yanayosababishwa na albino za Candida, chachu isiyo na madhara (saprophyte)
kupatikana kwenye matumbo yako. Baadhi yake pia hupatikana mara kwa mara kinywani mwako, koo, na njia ya sehemu ya siri. Lakini
Kiumbe hiki huenda porini wakati washindani wake, bakteria wa kawaida wa matumbo, wanauawa kwa muda mrefu
Matumizi ya muda wa dawa za kukinga. Hii inawezesha candida kuongezeka sana kwa idadi.
Dhiki husababisha uzalishaji uliopunguzwa wa asidi ya tumbo, ambayo inaruhusu candida kuingia tumboni - mahali
ambapo kawaida haipatikani. Kama matokeo, chakula kidogo kilichochimbwa huingia kwenye matumbo, mengi kwa kupenda
ya Candida ambayo hulisha juu yake.
Dutu hii kama chachu inakua sana kiasi kwamba inaingia kwenye mkondo wa damu na huchukuliwa kwa wengi
Sehemu za mwili, kudhoofisha mfumo wa kinga na kusababisha shida mbali mbali.
Katika cavity ya mdomo, candida inaitwa thrush. Vidonda vyeupe vinaweza kuibuka kwenye ulimi, ufizi, na ndani ya
mashavu.
Katika uke, husababisha uke. Idadi kubwa ya kutokwa nyeupe, cheesy na kuwasha sana
kutokea.
Athari zingine ni mizio ya chakula, mguu wa mwanariadha, pete, itch ya jock, na hata upele wa diaper.
Candida hajapitishwa kijinsia, lakini akina mama wanaweza kupita kwa watoto wao wachanga.
Ulimi wa mtoto utaonekana nyekundu na kufunikwa na matangazo meupe (kwa ujumla huonekana siku 8-9 baada ya
utoaji) ambayo itaonekana kama matangazo ya maziwa. Kwenye matako, Thrush inaweza kufanana na upele wa diaper.
Kwa sababu mazingira yao ya uke yanafaa zaidi kwa ukuaji wa chachu, wanawake wa kisukari wanaweza
Mkataba wa Candida rahisi kuliko wanaume wa kisukari.
Unaweza kutaka kuomba mtihani wa damu kwa antibodies dhidi ya C. albicans. Mtihani wa ngozi, sawa na tine ya TB
Mtihani, unapatikana pia. Matokeo mazuri ni wazi. Kwa bahati mbaya, hasi hutoa hakika kidogo
Hiyo haina hiyo. Candida ni ngumu kugundua, kwani utamaduni hauwezi kutumiwa. Hii ni kwa sababu
Chachu hii ni eneo la kawaida la matumbo ya kila mtu.
Matibabu -jaribu kuondoa mzio wa chakula, hypoglycemia, maambukizo yoyote, na kumeza.
• Replant Lactobacillus acidophilus. Hii ndio bakteria ya matumbo ya kirafiki ambayo
"Dawa za Ajabu" mapema waliuawa. Lactobacillus ni mshindani wa msingi wa Candida kwa
Chakula ndani ya utumbo. Tumia enema ya kuhifadhi iliyo na oz 4. Maji ya joto na bilioni 10
Viumbe (tupu Vidonge vya viumbe ishirini 500,000 ndani ya maji). Tumia mara 3 kila wiki,
Dakika 10 kila wakati.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na burdock, echinacea, tangawizi, muhuri wa dhahabu, poleni ya nyuki, kelp, lobelia,
Maua ya Passion, Pau d'Arco, Psyllium, Slippery Elm, Ginkgo, na Suma.
• Lishe muhimu ni pamoja na vitamini B tata na biotin ya ziada: 100 mg mara 3 kwa siku. / / / / / / / / /.
B12 Lozenges: Weka 2,000 mcg lozenge chini ya ulimi mara 3 kwa siku kati ya milo. / / / / / / / / /.
Asidi muhimu za mafuta: mafuta ya vijidudu vya ngano, mafuta ya primrose, nk / vidonge vya vitunguu: 2 kofia mara 3 a
siku. / Kofia ya multivitamin, mara 2-3 kwa siku. Chukua vitamini C hadi uvumilivu wa matumbo.
• Inasaidia pia: Vitamini A: 25,000 IU mara moja hadi mbili kwa siku; B6: 100-250 mg moja hadi mbili
nyakati kila siku; Vitamini E: 400-800 IU kila siku; biotin; Juisi ya Aloe Vera: 2 oz. mara nne kwa siku.
• Usitumie uzazi wa mpango wa mdomo wakati una Candida. Usitumie vyakula vya sukari. Usifanye
Tumia jibini, pombe, chokoleti, chakula kilichochomwa, nafaka za gluten (ngano, shayiri, rye, na
shayiri). Usitumie nyama, kachumbari, uyoga mbichi, siki, au bidhaa yoyote ya chachu.
• Chachu inakua juu ya sukari na wanga. Lishe ya mboga mboga ya protini,
Nafaka ambazo hazijakamilika, na mboga ni bora. Vitunguu na vitunguu vinasaidia sana. Safi, mbichi
Vitunguu ndio bora zaidi. Epuka protini zinazotokana na nyama, kwani hizi zinahusishwa na isiyo ya kawaida
Maendeleo ya Flora ya Bowel. Epuka vyakula vya nafaka.
• Epuka dawa za kukinga na dawa, kwa sababu zinaharibu bakteria zinazoshindana na kuruhusu
Candida ya kuzidi.
• Vaa vipandikizi vya pamba, badala ya synthetic ya karibu-mesh au hariri.
• Njia mbadala ya kuzaa ni umwagaji wa Sitz (kukaa). Jaza kifua kirefu kwa kiboko na
Maji ya joto, kisha ongeza chumvi (ya kutosha kufanya ladha ya maji kuwa na chumvi, karibu 1/2 kikombe) ili kufanana
hali ya asili ya mwili wako. Ongeza siki ya kikombe 1/2 kusaidia kurekebisha pH ya uke kwa
4.5. Kisha kaa ndani ya maji, magoti kando, mpaka iwe baridi. Umwagaji utafanya utakaso.
Douching inaweza kufanywa na mchanganyiko kama huo (siki 4 ya vijiko kwa 1 pint ya maji).
Watoto wachanga - asilimia nne ya watoto wachanga wana thrush ya mdomo. Weka chuchu za mpira safi, na vile vile
Vitu vinaenda kinywani mwa mtoto. Ikiwa unalisha chupa, chemsha chuchu na chupa dakika 20 baada ya kamili
Kuosha (spores za Candida ni sugu ya joto). Toa maji wazi ili kusafisha mdomo baada ya kila kulisha.
Chunguza mdomo kabla ya kila kulisha, na anza matibabu ikiwa thrush itaonekana. Swab maeneo yaliyoambukizwa na
Suluhisho lililosafishwa la soda ya kuoka mara 3-4 kwa siku. Garlic inazidi candida, kwa hivyo inaweza kusongeshwa
Vidonda mara kadhaa kwa siku.

title: Jet Lag
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS—Fatigue, lethargy, irritability, inability to sleep, trouble concentrating and making
decisions, perhaps even diarrhea and a lack of appetite.
CAUSES—Jetting across several time zones produces a sudden violation of your body's inner clocks. If,
from America for example, you fly to Australia or Europe, you will experience jet lag—for you will
suddenly be thrust into meals and wakefulness in the middle of "your night," and awake when your body
tells you it is time for sleep.
DEALING WITH IT—Here are several suggestions, one or more of which may help:
• Get extra sleep beforehand. Drink plenty of fluids and be quiet and relaxed during the
flight. Fly by day, arrive at night—and then soak up some extra rest. Get out in the
sunshine the next day; this will help your body adapt. Obtain some exercise after arriving.
Some people try living by their home clock—but most cannot do that.
• Try to avoid important decisions during the adjustment days. The general rule is that it
will take one day of adjustment for each time zone crossed. So be prepared.
• When crossing only two or three time zones, it is known that going west is easier on the
body than going east. This is because it is easier to get more sleep on arriving, since you
experience more hours that particular day.
contentSw:
Dalili -uchungu, uchovu, kuwashwa, kutokuwa na uwezo wa kulala, shida ya kuzingatia na kutengeneza
maamuzi, labda hata kuhara na ukosefu wa hamu ya kula.
Sababu -Jetting katika maeneo kadhaa ya wakati hutoa ukiukaji wa ghafla wa saa za mwili wako. Ikiwa,
Kutoka Amerika kwa mfano, unaruka kwenda Australia au Ulaya, utapata uzoefu wa ndege - kwa utafanya hivyo
Ghafla kurushwa ndani ya milo na kuamka katikati ya "usiku wako," na macho wakati mwili wako
Inakuambia ni wakati wa kulala.
Kushughulika nayo - hapa kuna maoni kadhaa, moja au zaidi ambayo yanaweza kusaidia:
• Pata kulala zaidi mapema. Kunywa maji mengi na kuwa kimya na kupumzika wakati wa
ndege. Kuruka kwa mchana, fika usiku -na kisha loweka kupumzika zaidi. Toka nje
jua siku iliyofuata; Hii itasaidia mwili wako kuzoea. Pata mazoezi kadhaa baada ya kufika.
Watu wengine hujaribu kuishi kwa saa yao ya nyumbani - lakini wengi hawawezi kufanya hivyo.
• Jaribu kuzuia maamuzi muhimu wakati wa siku za marekebisho. Sheria ya jumla ni kwamba
Itachukua siku moja ya marekebisho kwa kila eneo la wakati kuvuka. Kwa hivyo uwe tayari.
• Wakati wa kuvuka maeneo mawili au matatu tu, inajulikana kuwa kwenda magharibi ni rahisi kwenye
mwili kuliko kwenda mashariki. Hii ni kwa sababu ni rahisi kupata usingizi zaidi wakati wa kufika, kwani wewe
uzoefu masaa zaidi siku hiyo.

title: Nausea
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Use the treatments suggested for motion sickness; especially the charcoal and ginger
root. It is said that powdered ginger root will definitely eliminate nausea. Do not forget the
final solution: Go ahead and vomit.
• Read the article on "Vomiting." It will provide very helpful information. It will also tell
what to do if you have been nauseated and vomiting for days.
SYMPTOMS—A sick feeling in the stomach, similar to motion sickness.
CAUSE—A variety of things can induce nausea, including nutritional deficiencies, food allergies,
pregnancy, and cancer.
A common cause of nausea is worms or constipation. See both topics.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Tumia matibabu yaliyopendekezwa kwa ugonjwa wa mwendo; Hasa mkaa na tangawizi
mzizi. Inasemekana kwamba mizizi ya tangawizi ya unga hakika itaondoa kichefuchefu. Usisahau
Suluhisho la mwisho: Nenda mbele na kutapika.
• Soma nakala juu ya "Kutapika." Itatoa habari inayosaidia sana. Pia itaambia
Nini cha kufanya ikiwa umekuwa ukicheleweshwa na kutapika kwa siku.
Dalili -hisia za mgonjwa ndani ya tumbo, sawa na ugonjwa wa mwendo.
Sababu - Vitu anuwai vinaweza kusababisha kichefuchefu, pamoja na upungufu wa lishe, mzio wa chakula,
ujauzito, na saratani.
Sababu ya kawaida ya kichefuchefu ni minyoo au kuvimbiwa. Tazama mada zote mbili.

title: Fainting
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Immediately check the pulse, heart beat and breathing. Often a dash of cold water in the
face helps. Loosen tight clothing, open windows and doors, and have others stand back so
the person can get more air. Use your fist to pound slightly on the back between the
shoulders to stimulate the heart. When able to drink, give him a little cold water.
• If you have it, place 8 drops of antispasmodic tincture on the back of the tongue. If you
know in advance that the person has these fainting problems, you may want to prepare the
tincture and keep it on hand. See "Antispasmodic Tincture".
• Sometimes artificial respiration or oxygen is needed. As soon as the person is conscious,
try to find the cause and deal with it.
• If a person has frequent fainting spells, give him an herb tea of mint, skullcap, catnip,
rue, mistletoe, rosemary, and small amounts of cayenne.
HYDRO—Here are hydrotherapy techniques, taken from the author's book Water Therapy Manual (see
order sheet), used on those who have collapsed: Alternate Hot and Cold Compress over the Spine; Cold
Friction; Hot Enema (110o F.); Alternate Compress over the Heart (p. 184); Hot Blanket Pack 15
minutes, followed by Cold Mitten Friction (p. 185).
Heat to neck; short cold application to chest and face. Alternate Compress to spine; percussion of the
chest with the hands dipped in cold water or with the end of a cold towel; vigorous centripetal friction;
rhythmical traction of the tongue (p. 209).
(Syncope)
SYMPTOMS—The person passes out and becomes unconscious.
CAUSES—Fainting points to some other problem, such as hysteria, epilepsy, insulin shock, heat
exhaustion, lack of oxygen, or anemia.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mara moja angalia mapigo, kupiga moyo na kupumua. Mara nyingi dashi ya maji baridi katika
Uso husaidia. Fungua nguo kali, fungua madirisha na milango, na uwache wengine wasimame nyuma ili hivyo
Mtu anaweza kupata hewa zaidi. Tumia ngumi yako kupiga kidogo nyuma kati ya
mabega ya kuchochea moyo. Unapoweza kunywa, mpe maji baridi kidogo.
• Ikiwa unayo, weka matone 8 ya tincture ya antispasmodic nyuma ya ulimi. Ikiwa wewe
kujua mapema kuwa mtu huyo ana shida hizi za kukata tamaa, unaweza kutaka kuandaa
Tincture na kuiweka mikononi. Tazama "Antispasmodic Tincture".
• Wakati mwingine kupumua bandia au oksijeni inahitajika. Mara tu mtu huyo anafahamu,
Jaribu kupata sababu na ushughulikie.
• Ikiwa mtu ana spelling mara kwa mara, mpe chai ya mimea ya mint, fuvu, catnip,
Rue, mistletoe, rosemary, na idadi ndogo ya cayenne.
Hydro - hapa kuna mbinu za hydrotherapy, zilizochukuliwa kutoka kwa mwongozo wa matibabu ya kitabu cha mwandishi (tazama
Karatasi ya kuagiza), inayotumika kwa wale ambao wameanguka: Njia mbadala ya moto na baridi juu ya mgongo; Baridi
Msuguano; Enema moto (110o F.); Compress mbadala juu ya moyo (uk. 184); Pakiti ya blanketi moto 15
Dakika, ikifuatiwa na msuguano wa baridi ya Mitten (uk. 185).
Joto kwa shingo; Maombi mafupi ya baridi kwa kifua na uso. Mbadala mbadala kwa mgongo; mtazamo wa
kifua na mikono iliyotiwa ndani ya maji baridi au mwisho wa kitambaa baridi; msuguano wenye nguvu wa kati;
Utapeli wa sauti ya ulimi (uk. 209).
(Syncope)
Dalili -Mtu hupita na kuwa hajui.
Sababu -Familia inaashiria shida nyingine, kama vile hysteria, kifafa, mshtuko wa insulini, joto
Kuchoka, ukosefu wa oksijeni, au upungufu wa damu.

title: Heat Exhaustion
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• First, get out of the sun, so the body temperature will not continue to rise and the body
will not lose more water and salt. If you remain in the sun, even though resting and
drinking fluids, your temperature will continue to rise! Do not return to the sun for many
hours!
• In the early stages, drink large amounts of mineral-rich vegetable and fruit juices to
replace water and electrolyte loss in perspiration. Water, by itself, does not replace
electrolytes. Potassium-rich vegetable broths are helpful.
PREVENTION—Plan ahead, so you will not come down with heat stroke later:
• Drink water. Drink diluted electrolyte drinks. Avoid salt tablets. They do the opposite of
what they are supposed to do. The increased salt in the stomach keeps fluids there longer.
• Do not use caffeine, alcohol, or tobacco. The first two accelerate dehydration, and the
smoking constricts blood vessels.
• Over several days' time, adapt yourself slowly to the sun. Do not overexert when out in
it. Avoid working in the mid-day. Wear a hat, and keep on a light-colored shirt.
• Pour water over your head and shirt, especially if the air is not humid. Keep drinking lots
of water.
—See "Heat Stroke," which is different.
SYMPTOMS—Thirst is generally the first symptom of heat exhaustion, followed by general malaise,
weakness, tiredness, a loss of appetite, headache, pallor, dizziness, and a general flulike feeling that may
include nausea and even vomiting. Sometimes the heart races and concentration becomes more difficult.
Heat exhaustion is less severe than heat stroke, and may occur over several days out in the sun.
Dehydration may eventually lead to blood volume loss, poor heat regulation, and shock.
CAUSE—Heat exhaustion is generally caused by water depletion (dehydration), and more rarely by a
lack of salt in the diet (salt depletion). When we sweat, we lose both water and salt (as well as potassium
and sodium).
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kwanza, toka kwenye jua, kwa hivyo joto la mwili halitaendelea kuongezeka na mwili
haitapoteza maji zaidi na chumvi. Ikiwa unabaki kwenye jua, ingawa unapumzika na
Kunywa maji, joto lako litaendelea kuongezeka! Usirudi jua kwa wengi
masaa!
• Katika hatua za mwanzo, kunywa kiasi kikubwa cha mboga zenye madini na juisi za matunda kwa
Badilisha upotezaji wa maji na elektroni katika jasho. Maji, peke yake, hayana nafasi
Electrolyte. Broths za mboga zenye utajiri wa potasiamu ni muhimu.
Kuzuia -Mpango mbele, kwa hivyo hautashuka na kiharusi cha joto baadaye:
• Kunywa maji. Kunywa vinywaji vya elektroni. Epuka vidonge vya chumvi. Wao hufanya kinyume cha
wanachotakiwa kufanya. Chumvi iliyoongezeka kwenye tumbo huweka maji huko muda mrefu zaidi.
• Usitumie kafeini, pombe, au tumbaku. Mbili za kwanza zinaharakisha upungufu wa maji mwilini, na
Uvutaji sigara husababisha mishipa ya damu.
• Zaidi ya wakati wa siku kadhaa, ubadilishe polepole hadi jua. Usichukue Overexert wakati wa nje
IT. Epuka kufanya kazi katikati ya siku. Vaa kofia, na uweke kwenye shati yenye rangi nyepesi.
• Mimina maji juu ya kichwa chako na shati, haswa ikiwa hewa sio unyevu. Endelea kunywa kura nyingi
ya maji.
-Tazama "kiharusi cha joto," ambacho ni tofauti.
Dalili - THirst kwa ujumla ni dalili ya kwanza ya uchovu wa joto, ikifuatiwa na malaise ya jumla,
udhaifu, uchovu, upotezaji wa hamu ya maumivu, maumivu ya kichwa, pallor, kizunguzungu, na hisia ya jumla kama ya fluli ambayo inaweza
Jumuisha kichefuchefu na hata kutapika. Wakati mwingine mbio za moyo na mkusanyiko huwa ngumu zaidi.
Kuchoka kwa joto ni chini ya kiharusi cha joto, na inaweza kutokea kwa siku kadhaa kwenye jua.
Upungufu wa maji mwilini unaweza kusababisha upotezaji wa kiasi cha damu, udhibiti duni wa joto, na mshtuko.
Kusababisha -Kuchoka kwa maji kwa ujumla husababishwa na kupungua kwa maji (upungufu wa maji mwilini), na mara chache na a
Ukosefu wa chumvi katika lishe (kupungua kwa chumvi). Wakati tunatokwa na jasho, tunapoteza maji na chumvi (pamoja na potasiamu
na sodiamu).

title: Motion Sickness
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• If at sea, lie down and close your eyes. If in a car seat, rest your head back on the
headrest, so it is somewhat faced upward. This relaxes the semi-circular canals.
• Charcoal tablets may help settle the stomach.
• Ginger capsules are highly recommended.
PREVENTION—
• Prevention is the best. Do not eat heavily processed meals, drink liquor, or eat junk food.
Some people do well eating a few whole-grain crackers before and during the trip. Avoid
smoke and food odors. Stay cool, and get fresh air!
• You may wish to take 5 charcoal tabs, one hour before the trip begins. Another method
is 2 ginger tablets every 3 hours, beginning one hour before the trip. Ginger helps prevent
motion sickness, by absorbing acids and thus preventing nausea.
• Some recommend additional magnesium (500 mg, one hour before trip) and vitamin B6
(100 mg one hour prior to trip) to relieve anticipated nausea.
• In order to settle the stomach before a trip, use the nervine herbs: hops, scullcap,
chamomile, and valarian root.
Here are more preventative suggestions:
• Travel at night. When it is dark, what you see conflicts less with what you sense, and the
air tends to be fresher.
• Avoid junk food, smoking, and alcohol. Keep a window open and stay near it, all the
while breathing that fresh air.
• Sit still and do not look around very much.
• Look straight ahead. If you are in the driver's seat, you will sense (and have) better
control of the movements taking place. Do not read while riding. Keep your eyes on
something stationary far ahead.
(Car Sickness, Sea Sickness)
SYMPTOMS—Nausea, excessive salivation, vomiting, cold sweat, queasy feeling, stomach churning.
Possible dizziness, sometimes fainting.
CAUSE—The semicircular canals in the inner ears detect your vertical position. When there is too
much jostling back and forth, movement which you do not have control over (as when riding in cars,
planes, or boats), your sensory system may become overloaded. Since the eyes also sense vertical
balance, when what you see does not seem to agree with what your labyrinthine receptors in the inner
ear sense, then mental confusion results. Nausea occurs when the brain does not know what to tell the
body to do. This weakens the stomach.
The experts say that nausea at such a time also indicates that your liver is not doing well.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ikiwa baharini, lala chini na funga macho yako. Ikiwa katika kiti cha gari, pumzika kichwa chako kwenye
Headrest, kwa hivyo inakabiliwa zaidi juu. Hii inapumzika mifereji ya nusu-mviringo.
• Vidonge vya mkaa vinaweza kusaidia kumaliza tumbo.
• Vidonge vya tangawizi vinapendekezwa sana.
Kinga-
• Kuzuia ni bora zaidi. Usila chakula kilichosindika sana, kunywa pombe, au kula chakula kisicho na chakula.
Watu wengine hufanya vizuri kula viboreshaji vichache vya nafaka kabla na wakati wa safari. Epuka
Moshi na harufu ya chakula. Kaa baridi, na upate hewa safi!
• Unaweza kutamani kuchukua tabo 5 za mkaa, saa moja kabla ya safari kuanza. Njia nyingine
ni vidonge 2 vya tangawizi kila masaa 3, kuanza saa moja kabla ya safari. Tangawizi husaidia kuzuia
Ugonjwa wa mwendo, kwa kunyonya asidi na hivyo kuzuia kichefuchefu.
• Wengine wanapendekeza magnesiamu ya ziada (500 mg, saa moja kabla ya safari) na vitamini B6
(100 mg saa moja kabla ya safari) ili kupunguza kichefuchefu kinachotarajiwa.
• Ili kumaliza tumbo kabla ya safari, tumia mimea ya mishipa: hops, scullcap,
Chamomile, na mzizi wa Valarian.
Hapa kuna maoni zaidi ya kuzuia:
• Kusafiri usiku. Wakati ni giza, kile unachoona migogoro kidogo na kile unachohisi, na
Hewa huelekea kuwa safi.
• Epuka chakula kisicho na uvutaji sigara, na pombe. Weka dirisha wazi na ukae karibu nayo, yote
wakati unapumua hewa safi.
• Kaa kimya na usiangalie sana.
• Angalia moja kwa moja mbele. Ikiwa uko kwenye kiti cha dereva, utahisi (na uwe na) bora
Udhibiti wa harakati zinazofanyika. Usisome wakati wa kupanda. Weka macho yako
Kitu cha stationary mbele.
(Ugonjwa wa Gari, Ugonjwa wa Bahari)
Dalili -Nausea, mshono mwingi, kutapika, jasho baridi, hisia za foleni, tumbo.
Kizunguzungu kinachowezekana, wakati mwingine kukata tamaa.
Kusababisha -Mifereji ya semicircular katika masikio ya ndani hugundua msimamo wako wa wima. Wakati kuna pia
Kujielekeza sana na kurudi, harakati ambazo hauna udhibiti (kama wakati wa kupanda kwenye magari,
Ndege, au boti), mfumo wako wa hisia unaweza kuwa mwingi. Kwa kuwa macho pia yanahisi wima
Mizani, wakati kile unachokiona haionekani kukubaliana na nini receptors zako za labyrinthine ndani ya ndani
hisia ya sikio, kisha machafuko ya akili husababisha. Kichefuchefu hufanyika wakati ubongo hajui nini cha kuambia
mwili kufanya. Hii inadhoofisha tumbo.
Wataalam wanasema kwamba kichefuchefu wakati huo pia inaonyesha kuwa ini yako haifanyi vizuri.

title: Catarrh
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS
• Runny nose, headaches, postnasal drip, sore throat, sinusitis, gastritis, glue ear syndrome, and
respiratory problems.
CAUSE—Catarrh is the excess mucus which occurs with many different nasal, throat, tracheal and
bronchial infections; for example, croup and whooping cough.

TREATMENT
• Although excess mucus is normal with some diseases, yet avoiding certain foods will
lessen the amount of mucus produced. Some foods are high mucus-forming. Overcooking
of food is part of the problem. Pasteurized milk, white flour, sugar foods, and meat should
be avoided if you want to cut down on mucus. Eat more fresh fruit and vegetables. If you
have cooked food at a meal, begin with raw food. This will help the digestive system
handle the increased load that cooked food places upon it.
• Indigestible food also forms higher levels of mucus in the body. Any specific allergen (a
food or substance toward which you are allergic) may cause catarrh. Orientals are
particularly sensitive to milk products (up to 85% of them lack the digestive enzyme
needed to handle milk sugar, which is lactase).
• Other irritants include fumes, smoke, foreign objects, chemicals, drugs, spicy foods, salt,
pepper, alcohol, and poor food combinations.
• Use steam to break up the catarrh (mucus) so you can sleep well. Eucalyptus oil also
helps. Be sure and drink enough water. As intake decreases, the mucus thickens and cuts
off breathing.
• During the illness, you may drink primarily of fluids (fruit juices) at times. But at those
times when you eat, emphasize a high fiber diet using raw food. When grains are eaten,
they should be whole grains, such as brown rice, millet, and buckwheat. You may wish to
take a psyllium seed and herbal mixture to clean out the digestive tract of mucus. Herbs
for this purpose could include burdock, aloe vera, ginger, alfalfa, cascara sagrada, kelp,
and slippery elm.
NUTRIENTS—Vitamins A, B, complex, C, and bioflavonoids are important. Also needed are calcium,
magnesium, and potassium.
Helpful herbs include chickweed, mullein, plantain, sorrel, white oak bark, bayberry bark, comfrey,
eucalyptus leaves, white pine needles, and oregano.
(Excess Mucus)
contentSw:
Dalili
• Pua ya kukimbia, maumivu ya kichwa, matone ya baada ya kuzaa, koo, sinusitis, gastritis, dalili ya sikio la gundi, na
shida za kupumua.
Sababu -catarrh ni kamasi iliyozidi ambayo hufanyika na pua nyingi tofauti, koo, tracheal na
maambukizo ya bronchi; Kwa mfano, kikohozi na kikohozi.

Matibabu
• Ingawa kamasi ya ziada ni kawaida na magonjwa kadhaa, lakini kuzuia vyakula fulani vitafanya
punguza kiwango cha kamasi zinazozalishwa. Vyakula vingine ni vya juu vya kamasi. Kupindukia
ya chakula ni sehemu ya shida. Maziwa yaliyowekwa, unga mweupe, vyakula vya sukari, na nyama inapaswa
Kuepukwa ikiwa unataka kupunguza kamasi. Kula matunda na mboga safi zaidi. Ikiwa wewe
Umepika chakula kwenye chakula, anza na chakula mbichi. Hii itasaidia mfumo wa utumbo
Shughulikia mzigo ulioongezeka ambao ulipika mahali pa chakula juu yake.
• Chakula kisichoweza pia hutengeneza viwango vya juu vya kamasi mwilini. Allergen yoyote maalum (a
Chakula au dutu ambayo wewe ni mzio) inaweza kusababisha catarrh. Mashariki ni
Hasa nyeti kwa bidhaa za maziwa (hadi 85% yao wanakosa enzyme ya utumbo
inahitajika kushughulikia sukari ya maziwa, ambayo ni lactase).
• Inakera zingine ni pamoja na mafusho, moshi, vitu vya kigeni, kemikali, dawa za kulevya, vyakula vya manukato, chumvi,
pilipili, pombe, na mchanganyiko duni wa chakula.
• Tumia mvuke kuvunja catarrh (kamasi) ili uweze kulala vizuri. Mafuta ya Eucalyptus pia
husaidia. Kuwa na uhakika na kunywa maji ya kutosha. Kadiri ulaji unavyopungua, kamasi inakua na kupunguzwa
Kupumua.
• Wakati wa ugonjwa, unaweza kunywa hasa ya maji (juisi za matunda) wakati mwingine. Lakini kwa wale
Nyakati unapokula, kusisitiza lishe kubwa ya nyuzi kwa kutumia chakula kibichi. Wakati nafaka zinaliwa,
Wanapaswa kuwa nafaka nzima, kama vile mchele wa kahawia, mtama, na buckwheat. Unaweza kutamani
Chukua mbegu ya psyllium na mchanganyiko wa mitishamba ili kusafisha njia ya utumbo ya kamasi. Mimea
Kwa kusudi hili linaweza kujumuisha Burdock, Aloe Vera, Tangawizi, Alfalfa, Cascara Sagrada, Kelp,
na slippery elm.
Virutubishi -Vitamini A, B, tata, C, na bioflavonoids ni muhimu. Inahitajika pia ni kalsiamu,
Magnesiamu, na potasiamu.
Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na kuku, Mullein, Plantain, Sorrel, White Oak Bark, Bayberry Bark, Comfrey,
Majani ya Eucalyptus, sindano nyeupe za pine, na oregano.
(Kamasi ya ziada)

title: Chills
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Do warm-ups with clothing covering the head and neck.
• It is very likely that something serious is developing. Immediately start on a cleansing
program. Go to bed, fast on fruit and vegetable juices, or lemon juice. Soak the feet in hot
water, get into a tub of hot water, or take a steam bath.
• Herbs include blue vervain, cayenne, chamomile, oregano, hyssop, skullcap, peppermint,
white willow, and catnip.
—Also see "Poor Circulation and Chills."
SYMPTOMS—Sweating, shaking, trembling and unable to feel warm even when bundled up with
blankets.
CAUSES—Chills often occur with flu and other virus infections.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Fanya joto-ups na mavazi kufunika kichwa na shingo.
• Inawezekana sana kwamba kitu kikubwa kinakua. Mara moja anza utakaso
mpango. Nenda kulala, haraka kwenye matunda na juisi za mboga, au maji ya limao. Loweka miguu kwa moto
Maji, ingia kwenye bomba la maji ya moto, au umwaga bafu ya mvuke.
• Mimea ni pamoja na Vervain ya Bluu, Cayenne, Chamomile, Oregano, Hyssop, Fuvu, Peppermint,
White Willow, na Catnip.
-Unaona "mzunguko duni na baridi."
Dalili -sweating, kutetemeka, kutetemeka na kukosa kuhisi joto hata wakati wa kutunza
blanketi.
Sababu -Chill mara nyingi hufanyika na mafua na maambukizo mengine ya virusi.

title: Viral Infections
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The various chemical drugs (including antibiotics) fight bacterial invasion. But they are
powerless against viral infections. Yet, in contrast, the body uses the same variety of
powerful defenses to resist and overcome both bacterial and viral crises! So help your
body win the battle. The Lord has placed strong defenses against sickness within each of
us. We can claim them more fully if we are living according to the laws of health.
• Vitamins C, A, and B6 are especially helpful. Also see the rather complete list of helpful
suggestions under Common Cold.
• Vitamin A is a powerful antioxidant and free radical eliminator. Vitamin B complex and
selenium (500-1,000 mcg/day) are other effective agents.
• Vitamin C (2,000-10,000 mg daily, in divided doses) works in the white blood cells to
produce a powerful antiviral task force.
• Zinc (50-100 mg daily) is also important in adding the body's own immune functions.
• Helpful herbs include echinacea and goldenseal, Garlic is another powerful helper.
PREVENTION—When the invaders are strong and many, and the body is in a weakened condition,
then trouble begins. Keep yourself in good health. Get enough rest, exercise in the open air, and
maintain a balanced, nourishing diet.
SYMPTOMS—fever, muscular aches, chills, and headaches.
CAUSES—Viruses can be especially serious. Viral infections include the common cold, measles,
influenza, tonsillitis, croup, infectious hepatitis, mononucleosis, asthma, and certain bladder infections.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Dawa tofauti za kemikali (pamoja na dawa za kukinga) zinapambana na uvamizi wa bakteria. Lakini wako
haina nguvu dhidi ya maambukizo ya virusi. Walakini, kwa kulinganisha, mwili hutumia aina sawa ya
Ulinzi wenye nguvu wa kupinga na kushinda shida za bakteria na virusi! Kwa hivyo usaidie yako
Mwili kushinda vita. Bwana ameweka kinga kali dhidi ya magonjwa ndani ya kila moja ya
sisi. Tunaweza kudai kabisa ikiwa tunaishi kulingana na sheria za afya.
• Vitamini C, A, na B6 zinasaidia sana. Pia angalia orodha kamili ya msaada
Mapendekezo chini ya homa ya kawaida.
• Vitamini A ni nguvu ya antioxidant na ya bure ya bure. Vitamini B tata na
Selenium (500-1,000 mcg/siku) ni mawakala wengine wenye ufanisi.
• Vitamini C (2,000-10,000 mg kila siku, katika kipimo kilichogawanywa) hufanya kazi katika seli nyeupe za damu hadi
toa nguvu ya kazi ya antiviral.
• Zinc (50-100 mg kila siku) ni muhimu pia katika kuongeza kazi za kinga ya mwili.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na echinacea na Goldenseal, vitunguu ni msaidizi mwingine mwenye nguvu.
Kuzuia - Wakati wavamizi wana nguvu na wengi, na mwili uko katika hali dhaifu,
kisha shida huanza. Jiweke katika afya njema. Pumzika vya kutosha, fanya mazoezi katika hewa wazi, na
Dumisha lishe bora, yenye lishe.
Dalili -za watu, maumivu ya misuli, baridi, na maumivu ya kichwa.
Sababu -VIRUSS zinaweza kuwa kubwa sana. Maambukizi ya virusi ni pamoja na homa ya kawaida, surua,
mafua, tonsillitis, croup, hepatitis ya kuambukiza, mononucleosis, pumu, na maambukizo fulani ya kibofu cha mkojo.

title: Inflammation
contentEn:
TREATMENT
The treatment is similar to that for the other conditions discussed in this section on Infections.
• Bromelin, taken on an empty stomach and with a small amount of magnesium and L-
cysteine, has anti-inflammatory activity. Calcium, kelp, and alfalfa are also important.
Primarily eat raw foods, and avoid all junk food.
• Charcoal poultices or clay packs are helpful.
• Drink a tea of hyssop, chickweed, vervain, mint, and sage. Read again the section on the
Common cold.
Place a compress of fenugreek or chamomile on the area.
—Also see "Common Cold."
SYMPTOMS—Swelling, heat, pain, tenderness, fever, discharges, edema, and/or allergies.
CAUSES—Inflammation can result from injury, strain, arthritis, bacterial infection, and cancer. A part
of the body is reacting to trauma or infection. Any organ or tissue can become inflamed. When internal,
it is often associated with bacteria.
Inflammation is a reaction of the body to defend and heal itself after something occurs (a bruise or
injury, etc.). Heat, redness and swelling are generally present. When severe, a fever may accompany it.
If not cared for promptly, infection could develop.
contentSw:
Matibabu
Matibabu ni sawa na ile kwa hali zingine zilizojadiliwa katika sehemu hii juu ya maambukizo.
• Bromelin, kuchukuliwa juu ya tumbo tupu na kwa kiwango kidogo cha magnesiamu na l-
Cysteine, ina shughuli za kuzuia uchochezi. Kalsiamu, kelp, na alfalfa pia ni muhimu.
Kimsingi kula vyakula mbichi, na epuka chakula chochote kisicho na chakula.
• Poultices za mkaa au pakiti za udongo ni muhimu.
• Kunywa chai ya hyssop, kuku, vervain, mint, na sage. Soma tena sehemu kwenye
Homa ya kawaida.
Weka compress ya fenugreek au chamomile kwenye eneo hilo.
-Unaona "Baridi ya kawaida."
Dalili -Kupanda, joto, maumivu, huruma, homa, kufutwa, edema, na/au mzio.
Sababu -Uambukizi unaweza kusababisha kuumia, shida, ugonjwa wa arthritis, maambukizi ya bakteria, na saratani. Sehemu
ya mwili inajibu kiwewe au maambukizo. Chombo chochote au tishu zinaweza kuchomwa moto. Wakati wa ndani,
Mara nyingi huhusishwa na bakteria.
Kuvimba ni majibu ya mwili kujitetea na kujiponya baada ya kitu kutokea (jeraha au
kuumia, nk). Joto, uwekundu na uvimbe kwa ujumla zipo. Wakati kali, homa inaweza kuandamana nayo.
Ikiwa haijatunzwa mara moja, maambukizi yanaweza kukuza.

title: Fever
contentEn:
CAUSES
Cholera occurs especially in hot, tropical climates. Filthy living conditions is generally the primary
factor. Bowel discharges from those with cholera must be boiled to kill the germs. When this is not
done, the disease spreads. Flies, cockroaches, ants and mice all carry the disease.
But one cannot get it if he only eats and drinks that which has been boiled. Water and milk must be
boiled. Vegetables and fruits must be washed, and then immersed in boiling water for a few seconds,
then peeled.

TREATMENT
• If the fever gets too high (above 102o F. in adults or 103o F. in children), immediately
immerse the body in tepid water to lower the temperature.
• Other suggestions would include: ice packs on the forehead, running cool water over the
wrists, cool baths and drinking certain herb teas, such as feverfew, cinchona bark, and/or
white willow. Others include meadow-sweet, sea buckthorn, European holly, and
mugwort. A poultice can be made from echinacea root to lower fever. Linden tea can
induce sweating to break a fever. Black elder tea is also good.
• Keep in mind that the fever is not the infection; the infection must be solved, as well as
the fever.
• Vitamin C and lemon juice are especially helpful. Other nutrients include vitamin A, B
complex, B1, D, calcium, potassium, and sodium.
• There is a loss of protein during a fever. Caloric needs are higher, and metabolism is
increased. Greater fluid intake is required. As fluid is lost, sodium and potassium are lost.
Drink plenty of distilled water; also fruit and vegetable juices. It is important that solid
food be avoided until the fever reduces.
• Nutrient-rich juices are especially helpful: beet juice, carrot juice, etc.
• For a feverish child, embed a grape or strawberry in a cube of frozen fruit juice, and let
him suck on it.
• Never give aspirin to children. It can trigger Reye's syndrome, a potentially fatal
neurological illness.
• He needs lots of oxygen. Make sure there is a current of air in the room; open the
window. Get smokers out of the house.
• Wet compresses help reduce temperature. Remove them and apply new ones as he heats
the old ones. Apply them to the forehead, wrists, and calves. Keep the rest of the body
covered.
• Cool tap water can be sponged on the skin to dissipate excess heat. Wring out a sponge
and wipe one section at a time, keeping the rest of the body covered. Because of rapid
evaporation, you will not need to dry him with a towel.
• Some people shiver when they have a fever. In such cases, immerse them in a tub of
warm water. This will also lower temperature. For babies, give room-temperature baths.
Sandwich them between wet towels, which are changed every 15 minutes.
• If very hot, remove more covers and clothes; if chilly, add them.
• When signs of fever are gone, be sure to prevent chilling.
• Putting too many clothes on a child can actually cause a fever.
REOCCURRENCE—If feverish flu-like symptoms keep reoccurring; in children this might indicate
diabetes, and in teenagers and adults Epstein Barr virus.
—Also see "Fever Diseases." Also see diseases listed under "Childhood Problems ("Chickenpox,"
"Diphtheria," Measles," "Mumps," "Scarlet Fever," etc.).
SYMPTOMS—A fever is an elevation of body temperature above normal. A fever is not a disease, but
a symptom that an infection or disease is present. Fevers are common in a wide variety of diseases, from
mild to severe.
Symptoms include headache, flushed face, body aches, nausea, little or no appetite, and sometimes
diarrhea or vomiting. Skin may be warm with some perspiration, or hot and dry. The elevated
temperature is an effort by the body to burn out infection, and the perspiration helps eliminate toxins.
Therefore a partial fever may be helpful to the body in fighting the infection. If the fever does not get too
high, let it run its course. Many enzymes, antibodies and white blood cell responses are better during
slightly elevated temperatures.
MORE ABOUT FEVERS—Normal is generally considered to be within a range of 97o to 99o F., but it
can vary among individuals. If it is 100o F. or above, it is a fever. One should not have undue concern
unless the body temperature rises above 102o F. in adults or 103o F. in children. Then call a doctor
immediately.
When body temperature is not more than 5o above normal, it does not completely interfere with body
functions. But levels above 105o F. are dangerous; at 106o F., convulsions are common; at 108o F.,
irreversible brain damage frequently results.
contentSw:
Sababu
Cholera hufanyika haswa katika hali ya hewa ya joto, ya kitropiki. Hali mbaya ya kuishi kwa ujumla ni ya msingi
sababu. Bowel hutoka kutoka kwa wale walio na kipindupindu lazima kuchemshwa kuua vijidudu. Wakati hii sio
Imefanywa, ugonjwa unaenea. Nzi, mende, mchwa na panya zote hubeba ugonjwa.
Lakini mtu hawezi kuipata ikiwa anakula tu na kunywa kile ambacho kimechemshwa. Maji na maziwa lazima iwe
kuchemshwa. Mboga na matunda lazima yaoshwe, na kisha kuzamishwa katika maji ya kuchemsha kwa sekunde chache,
kisha peeled.

Matibabu
• Ikiwa homa inakua juu sana (juu ya 102O F. kwa watu wazima au 103o F. kwa watoto), mara moja
Ingiza mwili katika maji tepid kupunguza joto.
• Mapendekezo mengine ni pamoja na: pakiti za barafu kwenye paji la uso, kukimbia maji baridi juu ya
mikono, bafu baridi na kunywa chai fulani ya mimea, kama vile feverfew, gome la sinchona, na/au
White Willow. Wengine ni pamoja na Meadow-tamu, Buckthorn ya Bahari, Holly ya Ulaya, na
mugwort. Poultice inaweza kufanywa kutoka kwa mizizi ya echinacea hadi homa ya chini. Chai ya Linden inaweza
kushawishi jasho kuvunja homa. Chai ya mzee mweusi pia ni nzuri.
Kumbuka kwamba homa sio maambukizi; Maambukizi lazima yatatuliwe, na vile vile
homa.
• Vitamini C na maji ya limao yanasaidia sana. Virutubishi vingine ni pamoja na vitamini A, b
ngumu, B1, D, kalsiamu, potasiamu, na sodiamu.
• Kuna upotezaji wa protini wakati wa homa. Mahitaji ya caloric ni ya juu, na kimetaboliki ni
kuongezeka. Ulaji mkubwa wa maji unahitajika. Kama maji yanapotea, sodiamu na potasiamu hupotea.
Kunywa maji mengi yaliyotiwa maji; Pia matunda na juisi za mboga. Ni muhimu hiyo thabiti
Chakula kiepukwe hadi homa ipunguze.
• Juisi zenye utajiri wa virutubishi zinasaidia sana: juisi ya beet, juisi ya karoti, nk.
• Kwa mtoto mwenye homa, pachika zabibu au sitirishi kwenye mchemraba wa juisi ya matunda waliohifadhiwa, na wacha
yeye ananyonya juu yake.
• Kamwe usiwape watoto. Inaweza kusababisha ugonjwa wa Reye, uwezekano wa kuua
ugonjwa wa neva.
• Anahitaji oksijeni nyingi. Hakikisha kuna hewa ya sasa ndani ya chumba; Fungua
Dirisha. Pata wavutaji sigara nje ya nyumba.
• Shina za mvua husaidia kupunguza joto. Ondoa na utumie mpya wakati yeye hukauka
Wazee. Tumia kwenye paji la uso, mikono, na ndama. Weka mwili wote
kufunikwa.
• Maji ya bomba baridi yanaweza kuwekwa kwenye ngozi ili kumaliza joto la ziada. Kutoa sifongo
na kuifuta sehemu moja kwa wakati, kuweka mwili wote kufunikwa. Kwa sababu ya haraka
Uvukizi, hautahitaji kumkausha kwa kitambaa.
• Watu wengine hutetemeka wakati wana homa. Katika hali kama hizi, waingize kwenye tub ya
maji ya joto. Hii pia itapunguza joto. Kwa watoto, toa bafu za joto la chumba.
Sandwich kati ya taulo mvua, ambazo hubadilishwa kila dakika 15.
• Ikiwa moto sana, ondoa vifuniko zaidi na nguo; Ikiwa ni chilly, ongeza.
• Wakati ishara za homa zimepita, hakikisha kuzuia kutuliza.
• Kuweka nguo nyingi juu ya mtoto kunaweza kusababisha homa.
Kujitokeza tena-ikiwa dalili za homa-kama mafua zinaendelea tena; Katika watoto hii inaweza kuonyesha
Ugonjwa wa kisukari, na kwa vijana na watu wazima Epstein Barr virusi.
-Unaona "magonjwa ya homa." Pia angalia magonjwa yaliyoorodheshwa chini ya "Shida za Utoto (" Kuku, "
"Diphtheria," surua, "" mumps, "" homa nyekundu, "nk).
Dalili -homa ni mwinuko wa joto la mwili juu ya kawaida. Homa sio ugonjwa, lakini
dalili kwamba maambukizi au ugonjwa upo. Fevers ni kawaida katika magonjwa anuwai, kutoka
laini hadi kali.
Dalili ni pamoja na maumivu ya kichwa, uso uliojaa, maumivu ya mwili, kichefuchefu, hamu kidogo au hakuna, na wakati mwingine
kuhara au kutapika. Ngozi inaweza kuwa joto na jasho fulani, au moto na kavu. Iliyoinuliwa
Joto ni juhudi na mwili kuchoma maambukizi, na jasho husaidia kuondoa sumu.
Kwa hivyo homa ya sehemu inaweza kuwa na msaada kwa mwili katika kupigania maambukizi. Ikiwa homa haipati pia
Juu, acha iendeshe mwendo wake. Enzymes nyingi, antibodies na majibu nyeupe ya seli ya damu ni bora wakati wa
Joto lililoinuliwa kidogo.
Zaidi juu ya fevers - kawaida kwa ujumla inachukuliwa kuwa ndani ya anuwai ya 97o hadi 99o F., lakini hiyo
inaweza kutofautiana kati ya watu binafsi. Ikiwa ni 100o F. au hapo juu, ni homa. Mtu haipaswi kuwa na wasiwasi usiofaa
Isipokuwa joto la mwili linaongezeka zaidi ya 102O F. kwa watu wazima au 103o F. kwa watoto. Kisha piga simu daktari
mara moja.
Wakati joto la mwili sio zaidi ya 5o juu ya kawaida, haiingiliani kabisa na mwili
kazi. Lakini viwango vilivyo juu ya 105o F. ni hatari; saa 106o F., mshtuko ni wa kawaida; saa 108o F.,
Uharibifu wa ubongo usiobadilika mara nyingi husababisha.

title: Malaria
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Call a physician.
• There are two primary ways to treat malaria:
• One way is by taking quinine. This is an extract of the bark of the cinchona tree. Quinine
will generally eliminate the malaria, but a mild to severe hearing loss may also result.
• The other way is to give hot and cold water treatments to the person. This takes work.
The result is equally good, but no hearing loss results.
• During the fever, give cold applications (cool wet sheet packs, sponge him off with cool
water, etc.). During the chills, give him hot applications (hot packs).
• Give goldenseal tea.
—See "Fevers" for additional suggestions.
SYMPTOMS—Chills occur for several hours, followed by drenching sweats every 1-3 days.
CAUSES—There are four types of parasites which are introduced into the bloodstream by the anopheles
mosquito. If the disease becomes chronic (recurrent), it results in general debility, anemia, and an
enlarged spleen.
Severe cases can be very debilitating. An especially deadly form is called blackwater fever. The skin
takes on a yellow tint and the urine becomes progressively darker in color. Few people survive three
attacks of blackwater fever.
This disease generally occurs only in tropical climates, but it can and does occur in the United States as
well.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Piga simu daktari.
• Kuna njia mbili za msingi za kutibu ugonjwa wa malaria:
Njia moja ni kuchukua quinine. Hii ni dondoo ya gome la mti wa sinchona. Quinine
Kwa ujumla itaondoa ugonjwa wa malaria, lakini upotezaji mkubwa wa kusikia unaweza pia kusababisha.
Njia nyingine ni kutoa matibabu ya maji moto na baridi kwa mtu huyo. Hii inachukua kazi.
Matokeo yake ni sawa, lakini hakuna matokeo ya upotezaji wa kusikia.
• Wakati wa homa, toa matumizi ya baridi (pakiti za karatasi za mvua baridi, umwagie mbali na baridi
maji, nk). Wakati wa baridi, mpe maombi ya moto (pakiti za moto).
• Toa chai ya dhahabu.
-Tazama "fevers" kwa maoni ya ziada.
Dalili-Chill hufanyika kwa masaa kadhaa, ikifuatiwa na kumwaga jasho kila siku 1-3.
Sababu -Kuna aina nne za vimelea ambavyo huletwa ndani ya damu na Anopheles
mbu. Ikiwa ugonjwa unakuwa sugu (wa kawaida), husababisha kudhoofika kwa jumla, anemia, na
wengu iliyokuzwa.
Kesi kali zinaweza kudhoofisha sana. Fomu mbaya sana huitwa homa ya maji nyeusi. Ngozi
Inachukua tint ya manjano na mkojo unakuwa mweusi kwa rangi. Watu wachache wanaishi watatu
Mashambulio ya homa ya maji nyeusi.
Ugonjwa huu kwa ujumla hufanyika tu katika hali ya hewa ya kitropiki, lakini inaweza na hufanyika Amerika kama
vizuri.

title: Typhoid Fever
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Call a physician.
• Put him to bed and give him air and moderate warmth, and lots of water to drink.
• Place him on a diet of fruit juices and vegetable broths. All patients with typhoid fever
must have raw garlic to eat.
• Give at least one hot bath every day. Have him remain in the tub as long as possible (30
minutes or longer). Put cold cloths on the head and throat if weak or faint. Finish with a
cold towel rub or spray.
• Give a daily high enema.
• Red clover tea and goldenseal tea are both good. Add 1 tsp. red clover blossoms to a cup
of boiling water. Steep, and drink 5-12 cups a day.
—Follow directions under "Fevers."
SYMPTOMS—Onset comes 1-4 weeks after the germs enter the body. First a tired feeling and general
weakness, then possibly a headache and nosebleed. The fever rises higher each day, until by the end of
the first week it be 104o F. The evening temperature is distinctly higher than in the morning. Appetite is
poor, the tongue is coated, and the teeth and lips have a brownish coat. There is either diarrhea or
constipation, and stools are offensive. The abdomen is distended.
CAUSES—Typhoid fever is an acute infectious disease caused by the typhoid bacillus.
Germs are taken into the body through food or drink that has been directly or indirectly contaminated by
bowel or kidney discharges from a typhoid fever patient.
If the body was kept clean and only pure food and water was consumed, there would by no typhoid.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Piga simu daktari.
• Mweke kitandani na kumpa hewa na joto la wastani, na maji mengi ya kunywa.
• Mweke kwenye lishe ya juisi za matunda na broths za mboga. Wagonjwa wote walio na homa ya typhoid
Lazima uwe na vitunguu mbichi kula.
• Toa angalau umwagaji mmoja moto kila siku. Acha abaki kwenye tub kwa muda mrefu iwezekanavyo (30
dakika au zaidi). Weka vitambaa baridi kichwani na koo ikiwa dhaifu au dhaifu. Maliza na a
taulo baridi kusugua au kunyunyizia.
• Toa enema ya juu ya kila siku.
• Chai nyekundu ya clover na chai ya dhahabu ni nzuri. Ongeza 1 tsp. Clover nyekundu hua kwa kikombe
ya maji yanayochemka. Mwinuko, na kunywa vikombe 5-12 kwa siku.
- Miongozo ya chini ya "fevers."
Dalili-Kuanza kunakuja wiki 1-4 baada ya vijidudu kuingia mwilini. Kwanza hisia ya uchovu na ya jumla
Udhaifu, basi labda maumivu ya kichwa na pua. Homa huongezeka juu kila siku, hadi mwisho wa
Wiki ya kwanza kuwa 104O F. Joto la jioni ni juu kabisa kuliko asubuhi. Tamaa ni
Maskini, ulimi umefungwa, na meno na midomo ina kanzu ya hudhurungi. Kuna kuhara au
Kuvimbiwa, na viti ni kukera. Tumbo limetengwa.
Sababu -homa ya typhoid ni ugonjwa wa kuambukiza wa papo hapo unaosababishwa na typhoid bacillus.
Vidudu huchukuliwa ndani ya mwili kupitia chakula au kinywaji ambacho kimechafuliwa moja kwa moja au moja kwa moja na
Bowel au figo hutoka kutoka kwa mgonjwa wa homa ya typhoid.
Ikiwa mwili ulikuwa safi na chakula safi tu na maji yalitumiwa, hakutakuwa na typhoid.

title: Weakened Autoimmune System
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Eat lots of fresh fruit and vegetables. Obtain adequate protein from vegetables, not from
meat. Eat broccoli, brussel sprouts, cabbage, onions, garlic, and similar worthwhile food.
Skip the junk food.
• High doses of vitamin A in the form of carrot juice (beta carotene) are especially helpful.
That, along with vitamin C, may be the most important vitamins for the immune system.
Essential fatty acids (fresh or newly purchased flaxseed oil is especially good); zinc at 50
mg, three times a day; selenium at 300-900 mcg per day, germanium at 50 mg/day.
• Vitamin B complex, especially B6, B12, folic acid, and pantothenic acid. Vitamin E:
400-800 units.
• Herbs include echinacea root, dandelion, red clover, and kelp.
SYMPTOMS—It is the immune system which fights infections, and it does this by triggering defenses
against invading bacteria. The antibodies and antitoxins of this system recognize these foreign bodies
and send white blood cells to attack them. With his immune system weakened, a person is less able to
withstand Epstein Barr virus, candidiasis, food allergies, arthritis, multiple sclerosis, cancer, etc.
Infections occur more easily. The person is more susceptible to colds, infections, and viruses.
CAUSES—Autoimmune disorders can result from conditions ranging from rheumatoid arthritis to
kidney disease. Unrelenting stress, chronic allergies, chronic infections can exhaust the immune system.
Medicinal drugs, such as cortisone, prednisone and chemotherapy cause immune depression! Beware of
them! Other causes of a weakened immune system are vaccinations and immunizations against common
childhood and epidemic diseases. The thymus gland seems to be the most affected by this weakening.
The thymus gland is especially important due to its production of T-helper cells.
Prolonged stress, or toxic exposure to chemicals or radiation can weaken the immune system. Severe
infections can both result and cause it. An example of this would be allergies (resulting from immune
malfunction) which follow a severe case of rheumatic fever, hepatitis, mononucleosis, or other acute
viral or bacterial disease. Lack of proper rest is yet another cause.
Yet another cause are nutritional deficiencies. Some natural healing specialists believe that any
infectious disease may be considered an immune deficiency problem.
The taking of aspirin has been linked to Reye's syndrome, asthma, low birth weight and birth defects.
Meat contains hormones, antibiotics, and bacteria which brings on disease. Alcohol, nicotine, and a high-
sugar diet weaken the immune system. Air pollution is yet another problem (move out of the city!)
Hypothyroidism can also result in immune deficiency. Marijuana, cocaine, and the morphine family are
other culprits. Mercury amalgam fillings are yet another incipient cause.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kula matunda na mboga nyingi. Pata protini ya kutosha kutoka kwa mboga, sio kutoka
nyama. Kula broccoli, Brussel Sprouts, kabichi, vitunguu, vitunguu, na chakula sawa.
Ruka chakula cha taka.
• Vipimo vya juu vya vitamini A katika mfumo wa juisi ya karoti (beta carotene) husaidia sana.
Hiyo, pamoja na vitamini C, inaweza kuwa vitamini muhimu zaidi kwa mfumo wa kinga.
Asidi muhimu ya mafuta (mafuta safi au mpya ya kununuliwa ni nzuri sana); zinki saa 50
MG, mara tatu kwa siku; Selenium saa 300-900 mcg kwa siku, germanium kwa 50 mg/siku.
• Vitamini B tata, haswa B6, B12, asidi ya folic, na asidi ya pantothenic. Vitamini E:
Vitengo 400-800.
• Mimea ni pamoja na mizizi ya echinacea, dandelion, clover nyekundu, na kelp.
Dalili -ni mfumo wa kinga ambao unapambana na maambukizo, na hufanya hivyo kwa kusababisha kinga
dhidi ya bakteria wanaovamia. Antibodies na antitoxins ya mfumo huu hutambua miili hii ya kigeni
na tuma seli nyeupe za damu kuwashambulia. Na mfumo wake wa kinga umedhoofika, mtu hana uwezo wa
Kuhimili virusi vya Epstein Barr, candidiasis, mzio wa chakula, ugonjwa wa arthritis, ugonjwa wa saratani nyingi, saratani, nk.
Maambukizi hufanyika kwa urahisi zaidi. Mtu huyo anahusika zaidi na homa, maambukizo, na virusi.
Sababu -shida za autoimmune zinaweza kutokea kwa hali ya kuanzia ugonjwa wa arthritis ya rheumatoid hadi
Ugonjwa wa figo. Dhiki isiyo na mwisho, mzio sugu, maambukizo sugu yanaweza kumaliza mfumo wa kinga.
Dawa za dawa, kama vile cortisone, prednisone na chemotherapy husababisha unyogovu wa kinga! Jihadharini na
wao! Sababu zingine za mfumo dhaifu wa kinga ni chanjo na chanjo dhidi ya kawaida
Magonjwa ya utoto na janga. Gland ya thymus inaonekana kuwa iliyoathiriwa zaidi na kudhoofika hii.
Gland ya thymus ni muhimu sana kwa sababu ya uzalishaji wake wa seli za T-Helper.
Dhiki ya muda mrefu, au mfiduo wa sumu kwa kemikali au mionzi inaweza kudhoofisha mfumo wa kinga. MUHIMU
Maambukizi yanaweza kusababisha na kusababisha. Mfano wa hii itakuwa mzio (unaotokana na kinga
Utendaji mbaya) ambayo inafuata kesi kali ya homa ya rheumatic, hepatitis, mononucleosis, au nyingine kali
ugonjwa wa virusi au bakteria. Ukosefu wa kupumzika sahihi bado ni sababu nyingine.
Sababu nyingine ni upungufu wa lishe. Wataalam wengine wa uponyaji wa asili wanaamini kuwa yoyote
Ugonjwa wa kuambukiza unaweza kuzingatiwa kama shida ya upungufu wa kinga.
Kuchukua kwa aspirini kumehusishwa na ugonjwa wa Reye, pumu, uzito mdogo wa kuzaliwa na kasoro za kuzaliwa.
Nyama ina homoni, dawa za kukinga, na bakteria ambayo huleta magonjwa. Pombe, nikotini, na ya juu-

Hypothyroidism pia inaweza kusababisha upungufu wa kinga. Marijuana, cocaine, na familia ya morphine ni

title: Lupus
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS—It usually begins suddenly with fever, fatigue, arthritis and/or joint pain. Those with it
are frequently misdiagnosed as having rheumatoid arthritis. Ninety percent of lupus occurs in women in
their 30s. Other symptoms include a characteristic facial "butterfly" rash, severe hair loss, and papular
skin lesions. This rash forms over the nose and cheeks in something of a butterfly shape (which tends to
intensify because of sunlight).
The skin lesions are small, yellowish lumps. They leave scars when they disappear. ("Lupus" means
"wolf" in Latin; indicating the rough-skinned appearance it gives to the skin.)
Also generally present are kidney disease (in 50% of those with lupus) and low white blood cell count.
All this, in turn, produces inflammation of the joints and/or blood vessels, affecting many parts of the
body.
Sometimes the first appearance of the problem is an arthritic-like condition, with swelling and pain in
the joints and fingers. Severe cases can affect the brain and heart.
Sometimes the central nervous system is affected, and deep depression, amnesia, seizures, or psychosis
can result.
CAUSES—Lupus is an inflammatory disease of the connective tissue. It has been classified as an
autoimmune disease, since the body is attacking itself.
Ultraviolet rays in the sun can trigger the first attack. Stress, childbirth, fatigue, infection, chemicals, and
certain drugs can also bring it on.
TREATMENT—Dr. Max Gerson used a careful, very nourishing diet, including vegetable and fruit
juices and vitamin-mineral supplementation to eliminate lupus in his patients, but the dietary change had
to be total or no progress was made. All meat, gravy, fats, junk food, fried food, soft drinks, caffeine,
alcohol, etc. had to be eliminated from the diet. The diet had to be low in fat and salt (thus helping the
weakened kidneys).
• It is best to eliminate all unsaturated fats. Fats quickly become rancid and, in that form,
harm the connective tissue, and wear away the myelin sheath which covers the nerves.
• Avoid eating alfalfa sprouts, for they contain canavain which, in your body, replaces its
arginine.
• A vegetable juice fast would be very helpful.
• Do not take birth control pills; they can intensify the lupus.
• Up to 10% of the lupus cases originate by taking medicinal drugs (New England Journal
of Medicine). Pollutants, additives, chemicals, and certain foods can also bring it on.
When the cause is drugs, the kidneys or nervous system are generally not affected, the
lupus is a milder case, and it tends to stop when the drug is no longer taken.
• Parasites are associated with lupus. The parasites excrete droppings which interfere with
body functions. Until the blood stream is cleansed and the parasites removed, healing
cannot commence.
• Allergies can be another causative factor. Search them out and eliminate them. Here are
several to consider: beef, cow's milk, wheat, corn, ammonia, hair spray, formaldehyde,
perfume ethanol, pesticides.
• Those with Raynoud's disease should live carefully, for they are also prone to
contracting lupus. Those with lupus are often misdiagnosed as having syphilis. Lupus is
not AIDS. HIV destroys the body's immune system, but lupus is one's immune system
destroying his body.
• Obtain enough rest and exercise. Avoid all stress.
• Echinacea, yucca, red clover, pau d'arco, and goldenseal are helpful herbs.
contentSw:
Dalili -kawaida huanza ghafla na homa, uchovu, ugonjwa wa arthritis na/au maumivu ya pamoja. Wale walio na hiyo
mara nyingi hutambuliwa vibaya kama kuwa na ugonjwa wa arheumatoid arthritis. Asilimia tisini ya lupus hufanyika kwa wanawake ndani
30s yao. Dalili zingine ni pamoja na tabia ya usoni "kipepeo", upotezaji mkubwa wa nywele, na papular
vidonda vya ngozi. Rash huu huunda juu ya pua na mashavu katika kitu cha sura ya kipepeo (ambayo huelekea

Vidonda vya ngozi ni donge ndogo, za manjano. Wanaacha makovu wakati wanapotea. ("Lupus" inamaanisha
"Wolf" kwa Kilatini; kuonyesha muonekano mbaya wa ngozi hupeana kwa ngozi.)
Pia kwa ujumla ni ugonjwa wa figo (katika 50% ya wale walio na lupus) na hesabu ya seli nyeupe ya damu.
Yote hii, kwa upande wake, hutoa uchochezi wa viungo na/au mishipa ya damu, inayoathiri sehemu nyingi za
mwili.
Wakati mwingine muonekano wa kwanza wa shida ni hali kama ya arthritic, na uvimbe na maumivu ndani
viungo na vidole. Kesi kali zinaweza kuathiri ubongo na moyo.
Wakati mwingine mfumo mkuu wa neva huathiriwa, na unyogovu wa kina, amnesia, mshtuko, au psychosis
inaweza kusababisha.
Sababu -Lupus ni ugonjwa wa uchochezi wa tishu zinazojumuisha. Imeainishwa kama
Ugonjwa wa autoimmune, kwani mwili unashambulia yenyewe.
Mionzi ya Ultraviolet kwenye jua inaweza kusababisha shambulio la kwanza. Dhiki, kuzaa, uchovu, maambukizi, kemikali, na
Dawa zingine zinaweza pia kuleta.
Matibabu -DR. Max Gerson alitumia lishe makini, yenye lishe sana, pamoja na mboga na matunda
Juisi na nyongeza ya madini ya vitamini ili kuondoa lupus kwa wagonjwa wake, lakini mabadiliko ya lishe yalikuwa na
kuwa jumla au hakuna maendeleo yaliyofanywa. Nyama yote, changarawe, mafuta, chakula kisicho na chakula, chakula cha kukaanga, vinywaji laini, kafeini,
Pombe, nk ilibidi iondolewe kutoka kwa lishe. Lishe ilibidi iwe chini ya mafuta na chumvi (na hivyo kusaidia
figo dhaifu).
• Ni bora kuondoa mafuta yote yasiyosafishwa. Mafuta haraka huwa rancid na, kwa fomu hiyo,
Kuumiza tishu zinazojumuisha, na uondoe shehe ya myelin ambayo inashughulikia mishipa.
• Epuka kula mimea ya alfalfa, kwa kuwa zina Kanavain ambayo, katika mwili wako, inachukua nafasi yake
arginine.
• Juisi ya mboga haraka inaweza kusaidia sana.
• Usichukue vidonge vya kudhibiti uzazi; Wanaweza kuongeza lupus.
• Hadi 10% ya kesi za lupus zinatoka kwa kuchukua dawa za dawa (New England Journal
ya dawa). Uchafuzi, viongezeo, kemikali, na vyakula fulani pia vinaweza kuileta.
Wakati sababu ni dawa, figo au mfumo wa neva kwa ujumla haujaathiriwa,
Lupus ni kesi kali, na huelekea kuacha wakati dawa hiyo haijachukuliwa tena.
• Vimelea vinahusishwa na lupus. Vimelea vya vimelea ambavyo vinaingiliana
kazi za mwili. Mpaka mkondo wa damu umesafishwa na vimelea viondolewe, uponyaji
haiwezi kuanza.
• Mzio unaweza kuwa sababu nyingine ya sababu. Watafute na uwaondoe. Hapa kuna
kadhaa za kuzingatia: nyama ya ng'ombe, maziwa ya ng'ombe, ngano, mahindi, amonia, dawa ya nywele, formaldehyde,
ethanol ya manukato, dawa za wadudu.
• Wale walio na ugonjwa wa Raynoud wanapaswa kuishi kwa uangalifu, kwani pia wanakabiliwa na
kuambukizwa lupus. Wale walio na lupus mara nyingi hutambuliwa vibaya kama kuwa na syphilis. Lupus ni
sio misaada. VVU huharibu mfumo wa kinga ya mwili, lakini lupus ni kinga ya mtu
kuharibu mwili wake.
• Pata kupumzika na mazoezi ya kutosha. Epuka mafadhaiko yote.
• Echinacea, Yucca, Red Clover, Pau d'Arco, na Goldenseal ni mimea ya kusaidia.
