title: Shingles
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Massive doses of vitamins C (1,000 mg 3 times a day and 200 mg 5-6 times a day),
rutin, and B complex. In addition, take vitamin F, calcium, and lecithin. The amino acid,
lysine, can help inhibit the spread of the herpes virus. The diet must include raw fruits and
vegetables, brewer's yeast, brown rice, and whole grains. Be sure and eat enough protein.
• Some suggest leaving the blisters alone if they are not too bothersome. Other suggestions
include placing one or more of the following on them: calamine or other calcium
preparation on them. Calcium is always soothing to skin rash conditions. Apply vitamin E
oil from a capsule to the area.
• Put cold water on a cloth and place it over the area. The cooler it is, the better it feels.
Avoid anything that will make your blistered skin hotter.
• Put apple cider vinegar on it daily. Take hot baths 2-3 times a week. Take a starch bath
(one cup of cornstarch or colloidal oatmeal) into a hot tub. Colloidal oatmeal is powdered,
and is at the pharmacy. Do not slip in the tub!
• Clean out the bowels frequently. Light fruit and vegetable fasts will also help clean out,
and strengthen, the body. Wear only cotton clothing while the condition exists.
• Dab the infection with hydrogen peroxide to purify it. If pain exists after the blisters are
gone, put ice on the area.
• Avoid drafts. Allow sunlight on the area for short intervals. Gently wash the blisters
when bathing and avoid touching or scratching them.
• If the shingles appear on the forehead, tip of the nose, or near the eyes, contact an
ophthalmologist. Such cases can lead to blindness.
—Also see "Skin Disorders."
(Herpes Zoster)
SYMPTOMS—Sharp, burning pain along a nerve route somewhere in your body for 3-4 days. There
are angry red blisters at that pain site several days later. These are very painful and itchy. Later the
bumps blister, turn cloudy, and form scabs. It usually lasts 7-14 days from the time the blisters appear
before the scabs drop off. This is no ordinary rash; it is shingles, which is a viral infection of a nerve. It
most often occurs on the skin of the abdomen, under the ribs and above the navel. But it can appear
anywhere on the body. It most frequently occurs after the age of 50.
If shingles starts near an eye, beware! The cornea can become infected and blindness may result. You
would then do well to consult an eye specialist.
CAUSES—This staphylococcal infection consists of small round bacteria growing in clusters. The virus
in the chickenpox you had as a child never really left your body; and, when you are an adult, it comes
back in the form of shingles. The virus may lie dormant in the spinal cord and nerve ganglia for years
until triggered. It normally lives on the nostrils and skin of everybody.
What triggers the attack? It is known that poisonous substances in food, metals, drugs, and other toxic
substances can do it. For example, risk of shingles increases with the use of anti-cancer drugs. Anything
that weakens the immune system can bring on an attack of shingles. Once it occurs, the pain can
continue on for months or years. So it is better to prevent an attack.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Dozi kubwa ya vitamini C (1,000 mg mara 3 kwa siku na 200 mg mara 5-6 kwa siku),
Rutin, na B tata. Kwa kuongezea, chukua vitamini F, kalsiamu, na lecithin. Asidi ya amino,
Lysine, inaweza kusaidia kuzuia kuenea kwa virusi vya herpes. Lishe lazima iwe pamoja na matunda mabichi na
Mboga, chachu ya Brewer, mchele wa kahawia, na nafaka nzima. Kuwa na uhakika na kula protini ya kutosha.
• Wengine wanapendekeza kuacha malengelenge peke yao ikiwa sio shida sana. Mapendekezo mengine
Jumuisha kuweka moja au zaidi ya yafuatayo juu yao: Kalamini au kalsiamu nyingine
maandalizi juu yao. Kalsiamu daima ni laini kwa hali ya upele wa ngozi. Omba vitamini E.
mafuta kutoka kwa kofia hadi eneo hilo.
• Weka maji baridi kwenye kitambaa na uweke juu ya eneo hilo. Baridi ni, bora inahisi.
Epuka kitu chochote ambacho kitafanya ngozi yako kuwa na moto.
• Weka siki ya apple cider juu yake kila siku. Chukua bafu moto mara 2-3 kwa wiki. Chukua bafu ya wanga
(kikombe kimoja cha mahindi au oatmeal ya colloidal) ndani ya tub moto. Colloidal oatmeal ni unga,
na yuko kwenye maduka ya dawa. Usiingie kwenye tub!
• Safisha matumbo mara kwa mara. Matunda nyepesi na mboga pia itasaidia kusafisha,
na kuimarisha, mwili. Vaa nguo za pamba tu wakati hali iko.
• Shika maambukizi na peroksidi ya hidrojeni ili kuitakasa. Ikiwa maumivu yapo baada ya malengelenge
Imeenda, weka barafu kwenye eneo hilo.
• Epuka rasimu. Ruhusu jua kwenye eneo hilo kwa vipindi vifupi. Osha malengelenge kwa upole
Wakati wa kuoga na epuka kugusa au kuziba.
• Ikiwa shingles zinaonekana kwenye paji la uso, ncha ya pua, au karibu na macho, wasiliana na
Ophthalmologist. Kesi kama hizo zinaweza kusababisha upofu.
-Unaona "shida za ngozi."
(Herpes Zoster)
Dalili-Sharp, kuchoma maumivu kwenye njia ya ujasiri mahali fulani mwilini mwako kwa siku 3-4. Huko
ni malengelenge nyekundu ya hasira kwenye tovuti hiyo ya maumivu siku kadhaa baadaye. Hizi ni chungu sana na zenye kuwasha. Baadaye
Bumps malengelenge, kugeuza mawingu, na fomu scabs. Kawaida hudumu siku 7-14 kutoka wakati malengelenge yanaonekana
Kabla ya scabs kushuka. Hii sio upele wa kawaida; Ni shingles, ambayo ni maambukizi ya virusi ya ujasiri. IT
Mara nyingi hufanyika kwenye ngozi ya tumbo, chini ya mbavu na juu ya kitovu. Lakini inaweza kuonekana
mahali popote kwenye mwili. Mara nyingi hufanyika baada ya umri wa miaka 50.
Ikiwa shingles zinaanza karibu na jicho, jihadharini! Cornea inaweza kuambukizwa na upofu unaweza kusababisha. Wewe
Je! Ningefanya vizuri kushauriana na mtaalam wa macho.
Sababu - maambukizi haya ya Staphylococcal yana bakteria ndogo za pande zote zinazokua katika nguzo. Virusi
Katika kuku wa kuku uliyokuwa na mtoto hajawahi kuacha mwili wako; Na, wakati wewe ni mtu mzima, inakuja
Nyuma katika mfumo wa shingles. Virusi vinaweza kulala kwenye kamba ya mgongo na ganglia ya ujasiri kwa miaka
mpaka kusababishwa. Kawaida huishi kwenye pua na ngozi ya kila mtu.
Ni nini kinachosababisha shambulio? Inajulikana kuwa vitu vyenye sumu katika chakula, metali, dawa za kulevya, na sumu nyingine
vitu vinaweza kuifanya. Kwa mfano, hatari ya shingles huongezeka na utumiaji wa dawa za kupambana na saratani. Chochote
Hiyo inadhoofisha mfumo wa kinga inaweza kuleta shambulio la shingles. Mara tu ikitokea, maumivu yanaweza
endelea kwa miezi au miaka. Kwa hivyo ni bora kuzuia shambulio.

title: Keratosis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Take vitamin A supplementation. This should be 25,000 units per day, for children, or
30,000 units per day, for adults. However, keep in mind that vitamin A can be dangerous;
since it is an oil-soluble vitamin, it is normally stored quite well by the body. Many
experts recommend never taking over 50,000 units a day, and only for a limited period of
time.
• Increase zinc to 50 mg, three times a day, and essential fatty acids to 5 gm, three times a
day.
(Sharkskin)
SYMPTOMS—This is the rough "goose bump" skin you will find on your elbows, and also on the
backs of your arms, thighs, and buttocks. It feels like a sandpaper surface.
CAUSES—This is a sebaceous and keratinized build up of hard granular plugs in the openings of hair
follicles. Many physicians claim that this is a normal condition, but it is actually a deficiency of vitamin
A and zinc.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Chukua nyongeza ya vitamini A. Hii inapaswa kuwa vitengo 25,000 kwa siku, kwa watoto, au
Vitengo 30,000 kwa siku, kwa watu wazima. Walakini, kumbuka kuwa vitamini A inaweza kuwa hatari;
Kwa kuwa ni vitamini vyenye mumunyifu wa mafuta, kawaida huhifadhiwa vizuri na mwili. Nyingi
Wataalam wanapendekeza kamwe kuchukua vitengo zaidi ya 50,000 kwa siku, na kwa kipindi kidogo cha
wakati.
• Ongeza zinki hadi 50 mg, mara tatu kwa siku, na asidi muhimu ya mafuta hadi 5 gm, mara tatu a
siku.
(Sharkskin)
Dalili -hii ni ngozi mbaya ya "goose" utapata kwenye viwiko vyako, na pia kwenye
Migongo ya mikono yako, mapaja, na matako. Inajisikia kama uso wa sandpaper.
Sababu - hii ni sebaceous na keratinized kujenga plugs ngumu granular katika fursa za nywele
follicles. Waganga wengi wanadai kuwa hii ni hali ya kawaida, lakini kwa kweli ni upungufu wa vitamini
A na zinki.

title: Leukoderma
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• B complex supplementation, plus emphasis on two special B vitamins: Para-amino
benzoic acid (PABA, 100 mg four times a day) and pantothenic acid. PABA injections
may be needed. Also be sure and take hydrochloric acid if it is needed.
• Other helpful nutrients include vitamins A, B complex, B12, zinc, and copper.
(Vitiligo)
SYMPTOMS—This is a loss of skin color, especially in black or dark-skinned people. When occurring
in Europeans, it is less likely to be noticed. It is most commonly seen as white patches, surrounded by a
dark border.
CAUSES—The skin is no longer producing melanin, the dark coloring pigment. It most frequently
occurs to someone who has thyroid problems. Premature gray or white hair may also occur. All this
points to a deficiency of certain B complex vitamins.
When treatment is effective, small spots of pigment will appear in the white patches, and then gradually
fill in. But only a few experience a complete return to the original color.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• B Uongezaji tata wa B, pamoja na msisitizo juu ya vitamini viwili maalum vya B: para-amino
Asidi ya Benzoic (PABA, 100 mg mara nne kwa siku) na asidi ya pantothenic. Sindano za PABA
inaweza kuhitajika. Pia hakikisha na uchukue asidi ya hydrochloric ikiwa inahitajika.
• Lishe zingine zinazosaidia ni pamoja na vitamini A, B tata, B12, zinki, na shaba.
(Vitiligo)
Dalili-Hii ni upotezaji wa rangi ya ngozi, haswa kwa watu weusi au wenye ngozi nyeusi. Wakati wa kutokea
Katika Wazungu, kuna uwezekano mdogo wa kutambuliwa. Inaonekana kawaida kama viraka vyeupe, kuzungukwa na a
mpaka wa giza.
Sababu - ngozi haitoi tena melanin, rangi ya rangi ya giza. Mara nyingi zaidi
hufanyika kwa mtu ambaye ana shida ya tezi. Nywele za kijivu mapema au nyeupe zinaweza pia kutokea. Yote hii
inaonyesha upungufu wa vitamini vya B tata.
Wakati matibabu yanafaa, matangazo madogo ya rangi yataonekana kwenye viraka vyeupe, na kisha hatua kwa hatua
Jaza. Lakini ni wachache tu wanapata kurudi kamili kwa rangi ya asili.

title: Numb Extremities
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS—There is a "going to sleep" feeling in the toes, fingers, arms, or legs.
CAUSES AND TREATMENT—
• Aside from serious nerve diseases, this temporary condition usually results from
pinching off the nerve and blood supply to an extremity.
• Avoid tight clothing and strained positions.
• Be sure and get an adequate supply of the B complex vitamins, including B .
6
• A water treatment useful for numb, tingling feet would be a fomentation given to the
spine, along with hot or alternate sponging of the limbs. This is repeated 3 times each day.
contentSw:
Dalili -Kuna "kwenda kulala" hisia kwenye vidole, vidole, mikono, au miguu.
Sababu na matibabu--
• Mbali na magonjwa makubwa ya ujasiri, hali hii ya muda kawaida hutokana na
kung'oa ujasiri na usambazaji wa damu kwa ukamilifu.
• Epuka mavazi madhubuti na nafasi zilizo na shida.
• Hakikisha na upate usambazaji wa kutosha wa vitamini tata vya B, pamoja na b.
6
• Matibabu ya maji muhimu kwa miguu, miguu inayowaka inaweza kuwa fomentation iliyopewa
mgongo, pamoja na moto au mbadala wa miguu. Hii inarudiwa mara 3 kila siku.

title: Felon
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Call a physician and have the felon lanced. Deep lancing through very painful flesh must
be done, so it may be necessary for the patient to be anesthetized.
• An alternate remedy, used by the old timers on the frontier is as follows: Warm some
kerosene and immerse the affected part into it for at least 10-15 minutes at a time, 4-5
times a day. This will eliminate the felon.
• To relieve pain, put a piece of lemon on it. If on the end of a finger, cut a small hole in
the lemon and place it over the finger. If elsewhere, bandage on a thick slice. This may
solve the problem, if kerosene is not available.
(Whitlow)
SYMPTOMS—A swelling on an abscess of a thumb or finger (sometimes a toe), which includes
throbbing pain and extreme tenderness. It may, at first, seem to be an infection or inflammation of the
skin.
CAUSES—The germs causing the infection are usually carried under the skin by a deep pinprick, thorn,
sliver, or some other sharp object. The inflammation and pus are deep among the tendons, tendon
sheaths, or even next to the bone.
If the felon is not carefully, and thoroughly, lanced promptly, the tendons could slough or the bone be
damaged. This would result in a permanently crippled body part.
Moreover, if the pus is not drained, there is danger that the infection may travel to the hand and more
extensive crippling occur, or the infection may infect the blood, and blood poisoning will result. (See
Blood Poisoning.)
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Piga simu kwa daktari na uwe na kifedha. Kuweka kwa kina kupitia mwili wenye uchungu sana lazima
ifanyike, kwa hivyo inaweza kuwa muhimu kwa mgonjwa kushughulikiwa.
• Dawa mbadala, inayotumiwa na nyakati za zamani kwenye mpaka ni kama ifuatavyo: joto baadhi
mafuta na kuzamisha sehemu iliyoathiriwa ndani yake kwa angalau dakika 10-15 kwa wakati mmoja, 4-5
mara kwa siku. Hii itaondoa felon.
• Ili kupunguza maumivu, weka kipande cha limao juu yake. Ikiwa mwisho wa kidole, kata shimo ndogo ndani
limao na kuiweka juu ya kidole. Ikiwa mahali pengine, bandage kwenye kipande nene. Mei hii
Tatua shida, ikiwa mafuta hayapatikani.
(Whitlow)
Dalili -Uvimbe juu ya jipu la kidole au kidole (wakati mwingine kidole), ambacho ni pamoja na
maumivu ya kutuliza na huruma kubwa. Inaweza, mwanzoni, inaonekana kuwa maambukizi au kuvimba kwa
ngozi.
Sababu -vijidudu vinavyosababisha maambukizi kawaida hubeba chini ya ngozi na kinyongo kirefu, mwiba,
sliver, au kitu kingine mkali. Kuvimba na pus ni kirefu kati ya tendon, tendon
Sheaths, au hata karibu na mfupa.
Ikiwa felon sio kwa uangalifu, na kabisa, imewekwa mara moja, tendons zinaweza kushuka au mfupa kuwa
kuharibiwa. Hii itasababisha sehemu ya mwili wenye ulemavu wa kudumu.
Kwa kuongezea, ikiwa pus haijatolewa, kuna hatari kwamba maambukizi yanaweza kusafiri kwa mkono na zaidi
Uwezo mkubwa hufanyika, au maambukizi yanaweza kuambukiza damu, na sumu ya damu itatokea. (Tazama
Sumu ya damu.)

title: Erythromelalgia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Let the patient rest. Elevate the affected part. Place a cold compress on it, and change
this every 20-30 minutes. Apply graduated tonic frictions, such as the wet hand rub, the
cold mitten friction, or the cold towel rub. See the author's book, Water Therapy Manual
(see order sheet), for further information on how to apply these treatments.
SYMPTOMS—A skin neurosis, accompanied by burning and throbbing which comes and goes, and
affects any of the extremities, but especially the feet.
CAUSES—Although this is a nerve problem, it is listed here because it rather consistently affects the
extremities.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Acha mgonjwa apumzike. Kuinua sehemu iliyoathiriwa. Weka compress baridi juu yake, na ubadilishe
Hii kila dakika 20-30. Omba msuguano wa tonic uliohitimu, kama vile kusugua kwa mkono wa mvua, the
Mvutano wa baridi wa mitten, au kitambaa baridi cha kusugua. Tazama kitabu cha mwandishi, Mwongozo wa Tiba ya Maji
(Tazama Karatasi ya Agizo), kwa habari zaidi juu ya jinsi ya kutumia matibabu haya.
Dalili -neurosis ya ngozi, inayoambatana na kuchoma na kuchoma ambayo inakuja na huenda, na
huathiri miisho yoyote, lakini haswa miguu.
Sababu -ingawa hii ni shida ya ujasiri, imeorodheshwa hapa kwa sababu inaathiri mfululizo
miingiliano.

title: Gangrene
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Consult a physician. In addition to primary treatment for the condition causing the
gangrene, the following suggestions will help:
• Eat nourishing food, and drop all junk food.
• Stop eating all meat, tobacco, alcohol, and nearly all salt. Eat a high fiber vegetarian diet
with complex starches. It should be a low protein, low fat diet. Eat kelp, to strengthen the
thyroid. Drink carrot juice. Take 50,000 units of vitamin A daily.
• Take an enema and powdered psyllium seed in water daily, to assure good bowel
movements.
• If the skin is dry, lightly rub wheat germ or olive oil on it. When pus is oozing, dab
warm hydrogen peroxide on, and wipe off carefully.
• Try to keep walking or massage the area (usually the legs), to improve circulation.
• Apply cool leg baths or cool whole baths. Chaparral tea or apple cider vinegar can be
added to the water, to help disinfect it (1 tbsp. per quart). Also helpful are alternate hot
and cold foot baths or fomentation packs, to improve blood flow.
SYMPTOMS—The skin darkens, and either remains soft and moist or becomes dry and shrivels.
Eventually it sloughs off. Gas gangrene can occur in a wound where certain bacteria are present.
CAUSES—Death and decay of body tissue is caused when the blood supply is cut off or as a result of
certain bacterial infections.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Wasiliana na daktari. Mbali na matibabu ya msingi kwa hali inayosababisha
Gangrene, maoni yafuatayo yatasaidia:
• Kula chakula chenye lishe, na uache chakula chochote kisicho na chakula.
Acha kula nyama yote, tumbaku, pombe, na karibu chumvi yote. Kula lishe kubwa ya mboga ya nyuzi
na nyota ngumu. Inapaswa kuwa protini ya chini, lishe ya chini ya mafuta. Kula kelp, kuimarisha
tezi. Kunywa juisi ya karoti. Chukua vitengo 50,000 vya vitamini A kila siku.
• Chukua enema na mbegu ya poda ya Psyllium katika maji kila siku, ili kuhakikisha matumbo mazuri
harakati.
• Ikiwa ngozi ni kavu, kusugua vijidudu vya ngano au mafuta ya mizeituni juu yake. Wakati pus ni oozing, dab
Peroxide ya joto ya hidrojeni, na kuifuta kwa uangalifu.
• Jaribu kuendelea kutembea au kufyatua eneo (kawaida miguu), ili kuboresha mzunguko.
• Omba bafu za mguu baridi au bafu baridi. Chai ya chaparral au siki ya cider ya apple inaweza kuwa
Imeongezwa kwa maji, kusaidia kuiondoa (1 tbsp. kwa kila robo). Pia inasaidia ni mbadala moto
na bafu za miguu baridi au pakiti za fomentation, kuboresha mtiririko wa damu.
Dalili -ngozi hufanya giza, na inabaki laini na unyevu au inakuwa kavu na shrivels.
Mwishowe hupunguka. Gangrene ya gesi inaweza kutokea kwa jeraha ambapo bakteria fulani zipo.
Sababu -kuzidi na kuoza kwa tishu za mwili husababishwa wakati usambazaji wa damu umekatwa au kama matokeo ya
maambukizo fulani ya bakteria.

title: Raynaud'S Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Keep hands and feet warm. This is important. It might be well to select a warmer climate
in which to live. Always wear gloves in cold weather (mittens will keep you even
warmer). Wear shoes; do not walk without them when it is cooler. Wear extra warm socks
in the winter. Dress warmly at all times. Gloves, mittens, and shoes should be warm
before putting them on, since it is difficult for one with this problem to warm them. Wear
shoes which breathe, so you do not end up with damp, cold feet. Wear a warm hat in cold
weather.
• Avoid contact with cold objects, even for brief moments. While preparing meals, use
tepid, not cold, water.
• When an attack occurs, immerse the body part in warm (not hot) water, no warmer than
90o F. Why not warmer water? During an attack, without realizing it, one's skin can more
easily burn.
• Massaging the hands and fingers every evening helps reduce the severity of the attacks,
by stimulating blood circulation in that area.
• Stressful situations produce a spasm of the blood vessels. As much as possible, avoid
such situations. Keep calm, cheerful, and relaxed. Plan ahead and avoid scheduling
pressures. Trust in God and believe He will care for you. Vigorous outdoor exercise will
strengthen the entire body, and also relax it. Exercise tends to neutralize the attitude and
effects of stress.
• Avoid fatty and fried foods, all junk foods. At least 50% of your diet should be raw food.
Avoid food items which tend to bother you (allergenic foods). Avoid caffeine (caffeine,
tea, soft drinks, chocolate). Caffeine restricts blood flow. Use a fat-free, sugar-free diet.
Sugar increases blood viscosity as well as triglycerides. Avoid food seasonings.
• Do not take any tobacco product or use alcohol. Nicotine causes constriction of the
blood vessels and it produces plaque in them, both of which reduce blood flow. Do not be
even in the same room where someone is smoking.
• Medicinal drugs for Raynaud's do not seem to help. The side effects outweigh the
benefits (ergot, beta blocking drugs, cytotoxic agents, etc.). Do not take birth control pills.
• Avoid machinery which vibrates the hands. In one study, 50% of pneumatic drill
workers had Raynaud's, compared with 5.6% for the average population. Such equipment
includes chain saws, metal grinders, stone cutters, lathes, and manual typewriters.
• Drink enough water, but not soft drinks. Eat a high fiber diet which includes some
psyllium seed, to help clean the colon. Eat slow-cooked grains and a low protein diet.
• Take vitamin E (80-1,200 unites per day), unsaturated fatty acids alone (wheat germ oil,
etc.), tryptophan.
• Take calcium (2,000 mg daily) and magnesium (1,000 mg daily). Get enough iron in
your diet. (webmaster's Note: It is reported that Zinc is also very helpful in this condition.
see http://coldcure.com/html/zinc-angina.pdf )
• Sprinkle a small amount of cayenne on your food, to increase circulation. Other helpful
herbs include garlic, ginkgo, biloba extract, and pau d'arco.
• Sunbathing is also helpful, for it strengthens both the body and the blood.
• One physician (Donald McIntyre) suggests occasionally swinging the arms in circles, 80
twirls per minute, to throw blood into the hands. He says to do it as a pitcher does it:
swinging the arm up from the back and then hard downward in front. It has been found
that those with back problems can swing their arms entirely in front of the body with the
same beneficial effect on the hands (upward in the trunk and downward to the side).
—Also see "Buerger's Disease."
SYMPTOMS—The small arteries in the extremities constrict or tighten. The hands and feet are
extremely sensitive to the cold, and suddenly contract. Lack of oxygenated blood causes the fingers or
toes to become whitish or bluish in hue. As a result, the affected area may temporarily shrink in size!
Unless these attacks are reduced, ulcers may form, which further damage the tissue and produce chronic
infection under, and near, the fingernails and toenails.
The hands are the areas most often affected. But it can occur in the fingers and possibly toes, nose,
tongue, cheeks, ears, or chin. The blood spasm may initially blanch the area. Tingling, and then
swelling, may occur and become painful. The appearance may change to a bright red, as the blood
vessels again distend and fresh blood is sent back into the area.
The attacks usually do not last long. But, in those instances in which they do, gangrene can develop.
CAUSES—A cold attack is generally brought on by exposure to cold or emotional upset. The hands go
into the refrigerator for a moment, a difficult written exam must be taken, or a verbal conflict occurs.
Spasms of small arteries result.
The underlying cause may be less easy to identify. It might be high blood pressure, drugs, connective
tissue disease, inflammation of the arteries, or equipment vibrations which injure the blood vessels.
Some individuals have lived in a cold, improperly heated environment for too many months or years,
and the problem developed. Try to avoid resting or sleeping in ice cold places.
Food allergies, junk food, or a poor diet which is high in starches and low in greens, vitamins, and
minerals may cause it.
Apparently the cause is not a "thoracic inlet syndrome"; that is, squeezing of nerves or arteries issuing
from the thorax by muscles or bones.
Instead of Raynaud's, you might have Buerger's disease (a nerve disorder which gradually cuts off nerve
supply to the extremities). Buerger's disease is primarily caused by using tobacco products. (Buerger's is
a steady cutting off of nerve flow; whereas Raynaud's is an intermittent blood flow.)
Antihypertensives, ergot drugs, channel blockers, or alpha-and beta-adrenergic blockers can be the
cause.
There are two forms of this condition:
(1) Raynaud's phenomenon: This may be due to various bodily disorders. It occurs evenly
in both men and women, and usually begins after the age of 30. Symptoms in the
phenomenon may affect only one side of the body.
(2) Raynaud's disease: This is primary disease, and occurs mainly in women. The disease
generally begins in the teens or early twenties. But it can occur at any time in the life.
Attacks normally affect both sides of the body equally.
Frequency of the attacks are significant: They may be rare or occur as often as several times a day. Mild
occurrences only last a few minutes; severe ones may continue for hours. Between attacks the hands will
at first appear normal; later they may remain slightly bluish. Gradually the attacks will be more frequent
and last longer.
In later years, the hands will be slightly bluish all the time. The fingers become swollen. The skin turns
pale, discolored, shiny, taut, and smooth. The nails become clubbed and deformed. In advanced stages,
poor blood supply can weaken the fingers and damage the sense of touch. The sense of feel may
decrease and delicate movements become more difficult to perform. Infections and gangrene may occur
more frequently in the affected area.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Weka mikono na miguu joto. Hii ni muhimu. Inaweza kuwa vizuri kuchagua hali ya hewa ya joto
Ambayo kuishi. Daima kuvaa glavu katika hali ya hewa ya baridi (mittens itakuweka hata
joto). Vaa viatu; Usitembee bila wao wakati ni baridi. Vaa soksi za joto za ziada
Katika msimu wa baridi. Vaa kwa joto wakati wote. Kinga, mittens, na viatu vinapaswa kuwa joto
Kabla ya kuwaweka, kwani ni ngumu kwa mtu aliye na shida hii kuwasha moto. Vaa
Viatu ambavyo hupumua, kwa hivyo hauishii na unyevu, miguu baridi. Vaa kofia ya joto kwenye baridi
hali ya hewa.
• Epuka kuwasiliana na vitu baridi, hata kwa muda mfupi. Wakati wa kuandaa milo, tumia
Tepid, sio baridi, maji.
• Wakati shambulio linatokea, kuzamisha sehemu ya mwili katika maji ya joto (sio moto), hakuna joto kuliko
90o F. Kwa nini sio maji ya joto? Wakati wa shambulio, bila kugundua, ngozi ya mtu inaweza zaidi
kuchoma kwa urahisi.
• Kuweka mikono na vidole kila jioni husaidia kupunguza ukali wa mashambulio,
kwa kuchochea mzunguko wa damu katika eneo hilo.
• Hali zenye mkazo hutoa spasm ya mishipa ya damu. Kwa kadri iwezekanavyo, epuka
hali kama hizo. Weka utulivu, furaha, na kupumzika. Panga mapema na epuka kupanga
shinikizo. Mwamini Mungu na aamini atakujali. Mazoezi ya nje ya nguvu ya nje
Kuimarisha mwili wote, na pia upumzike. Mazoezi huelekea kupunguza mtazamo na
Athari za mafadhaiko.
• Epuka vyakula vyenye mafuta na kukaanga, vyakula vyote vya chakula. Angalau 50% ya lishe yako inapaswa kuwa chakula mbichi.
Epuka vitu vya chakula ambavyo huwa vinakusumbua (vyakula vya mzio). Epuka kafeini (kafeini,
Chai, vinywaji laini, chokoleti). Caffeine inazuia mtiririko wa damu. Tumia lishe isiyo na mafuta, isiyo na sukari.
Sukari huongeza mnato wa damu na triglycerides. Epuka msimu wa chakula.
• Usichukue bidhaa yoyote ya tumbaku au utumie pombe. Nikotini husababisha muundo wa
Mishipa ya damu na hutoa plaque ndani yao, zote mbili hupunguza mtiririko wa damu. Usiwe
Hata katika chumba kimoja ambapo mtu anavuta sigara.
• Dawa za dawa kwa Raynaud hazionekani kusaidia. Athari mbaya zinazidi
Faida (Ergot, Dawa za kuzuia beta, mawakala wa cytotoxic, nk). Usichukue vidonge vya kudhibiti uzazi.
• Epuka mashine ambazo hutetemesha mikono. Katika utafiti mmoja, 50% ya kuchimba kwa nyumatiki
Wafanyikazi walikuwa na Raynaud, ikilinganishwa na 5.6% kwa idadi ya watu wa kawaida. Vifaa vile
Ni pamoja na saw za mnyororo, grinders za chuma, vipandikizi vya jiwe, lathes, na typewriters za mwongozo.
• Kunywa maji ya kutosha, lakini sio vinywaji laini. Kula lishe ya juu ya nyuzi ambayo inajumuisha
Mbegu ya Psyllium, kusaidia kusafisha koloni. Kula nafaka zilizopikwa polepole na lishe ya chini ya protini.
• Chukua vitamini E (80-1,200 umoja kwa siku), asidi ya mafuta isiyo na mafuta peke yake (mafuta ya ngano,
nk), tryptophan.
• Chukua kalsiamu (2,000 mg kila siku) na magnesiamu (1,000 mg kila siku). Pata chuma cha kutosha ndani
lishe yako. (Ujumbe wa Webmaster: Imeripotiwa kuwa zinki pia inasaidia sana katika hali hii.
Tazama http://coldcure.com/html/zinc-angina.pdf)
• Nyunyiza kiwango kidogo cha cayenne kwenye chakula chako, ili kuongeza mzunguko. Nyingine inasaidia
Mimea ni pamoja na vitunguu, ginkgo, dondoo ya biloba, na pau d'Arco.
• Kuchomwa na jua pia kunasaidia, kwa kuwa huimarisha mwili na damu.
• Mganga mmoja (Donald McIntyre) anapendekeza mara kwa mara akiingiza mikono kwenye miduara, 80
twirls kwa dakika, kutupa damu mikononi. Anasema kuifanya kama mtungi hufanya hivyo:
Kufunga mkono juu kutoka nyuma na kisha ngumu kushuka mbele. Imepatikana
kwamba wale walio na shida za nyuma wanaweza kugeuza mikono yao mbele ya mwili na
Athari sawa ya mikono (juu zaidi kwenye shina na chini kwa upande).
-Unaona "Ugonjwa wa Buerger."
Dalili -mishipa ndogo katika miisho ya nguvu au kaza. Mikono na miguu ni
nyeti sana kwa baridi, na ghafla mkataba. Ukosefu wa damu iliyo na oksijeni husababisha vidole au
vidole vya kuwa weupe au hudhurungi katika hue. Kama matokeo, eneo lililoathiriwa linaweza kupungua kwa muda!
Isipokuwa mashambulio haya yamepunguzwa, vidonda vinaweza kuunda, ambayo huharibu zaidi tishu na kutoa sugu
Kuambukizwa chini, na karibu, vidole na vidole.
Mikono ndio maeneo yaliyoathiriwa mara nyingi. Lakini inaweza kutokea kwenye vidole na vidole vya vidole, pua,
Ulimi, mashavu, masikio, au kidevu. Spasm ya damu hapo awali inaweza blanch eneo hilo. Kutetemeka, na kisha
uvimbe, inaweza kutokea na kuwa chungu. Muonekano unaweza kubadilika kuwa nyekundu nyekundu, kama damu
Vyombo tena hutembea na damu safi hurudishwa katika eneo hilo.
Mashambulio kawaida hayadumu kwa muda mrefu. Lakini, katika visa zile ambazo hufanya, gangrene inaweza kukuza.
Sababu - shambulio baridi kwa ujumla huletwa na kufichua baridi au kihemko. Mikono huenda
Katika jokofu kwa muda mfupi, mtihani mgumu wa maandishi lazima uchukuliwe, au mzozo wa maneno hufanyika.
Spasms ya mishipa ndogo matokeo.
Sababu ya msingi inaweza kuwa rahisi kutambua. Inaweza kuwa shinikizo la damu, dawa za kulevya, kuunganishwa
Ugonjwa wa tishu, kuvimba kwa mishipa, au vibrations ya vifaa ambavyo hujeruhi mishipa ya damu.
Watu wengine wameishi katika mazingira baridi, yenye joto vibaya kwa miezi mingi au miaka,
na shida ilikua. Jaribu kuzuia kupumzika au kulala katika maeneo baridi ya barafu.
Mzio wa chakula, chakula kisicho na chakula, au lishe duni ambayo ni ya juu katika wanga na chini katika mboga, vitamini, na
madini yanaweza kusababisha.
Inavyoonekana sababu sio "syndrome ya kuingiza thoracic"; Hiyo ni, kufinya kwa mishipa au mishipa inayotoa
kutoka kwa thorax na misuli au mifupa.
Badala ya ya Raynaud, unaweza kuwa na ugonjwa wa Buerger (shida ya ujasiri ambayo polepole hukata ujasiri
usambazaji kwa miisho). Ugonjwa wa Buerger husababishwa na kutumia bidhaa za tumbaku. (Buerger ni
Kukata thabiti kwa mtiririko wa ujasiri; Wakati Raynaud ni mtiririko wa damu wa muda mfupi.)
Antihypertensives, dawa za ergot, vizuizi vya kituo, au blockers za alpha-na beta-adrenergic zinaweza kuwa
sababu.
Kuna aina mbili za hali hii:
(1) Jambo la Raynaud: Hii inaweza kuwa ni kwa sababu ya shida kadhaa za mwili. Inatokea sawasawa
katika wanaume na wanawake, na kawaida huanza baada ya umri wa miaka 30. Dalili katika
Phenomenon inaweza kuathiri upande mmoja tu wa mwili.
(2) Ugonjwa wa Raynaud: Hii ni ugonjwa wa msingi, na hufanyika kwa wanawake. Ugonjwa
Kwa ujumla huanza katika vijana au ishirini mapema. Lakini inaweza kutokea wakati wowote katika maisha.
Mashambulio kawaida huathiri pande zote za mwili kwa usawa.
Mara kwa mara ya shambulio ni muhimu: zinaweza kuwa nadra au kutokea mara nyingi kama mara kadhaa kwa siku. Laini
Matukio hudumu dakika chache tu; Wakuu wanaweza kuendelea kwa masaa. Kati ya mashambulio mikono yatafanya
Mara ya kwanza kuonekana kawaida; Baadaye wanaweza kubaki kidogo. Hatua kwa hatua mashambulio yatakuwa ya mara kwa mara zaidi
Na hudumu kwa muda mrefu.
Katika miaka ya baadaye, mikono itakuwa bluu kidogo wakati wote. Vidole vimevimba. Ngozi inageuka
rangi, iliyofutwa, shiny, taut, na laini. Misumari inakuwa ya kilabu na kuharibika. Katika hatua za hali ya juu,
Ugavi duni wa damu unaweza kudhoofisha vidole na kuharibu hali ya kugusa. Maana ya kuhisi inaweza
Kupungua na harakati dhaifu kuwa ngumu zaidi kufanya. Maambukizi na gangrene yanaweza kutokea
mara nyingi zaidi katika eneo lililoathiriwa.

title: Buerger'S Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Stop using nicotine in every form; it is killing you in more ways than one.
• Use the treatment outlined for Raynaud's disease. Walking is one of the best exercises
for increasing blood flow in the legs.
• Lie on the bed and elevate the legs for 1-2 minutes or until they blanch. Then sit on the
side of the bed and hold them down till they become pink. Do this 5 times each, 3 times a
day.
• Do not sit for long periods of time without getting up and walking. Sleep on a firm
mattress. Never cross the legs at the knees.
—Also see "Raynaud's Disease."
(Thromboangiitis Obliterans)
SYMPTOMS—Continual coldness of the extremity is frequently the first symptom. But numbness,
tingling, and aching may also be noticed. When lowered for long periods of time, the feet may turn blue.
The problem generally begins in the feet; but it can, and will, occur in the hands and eventually the
whole, body—if the cause is not stopped.
Jews develop this problem more frequently than anyone else, and 75 men have it for every one woman
who develops it. It most frequently begins at the ages of 20 to 45. There are alternate periods of
worsening and inactivity of the disease.
CAUSES—This is an inflammation of the blood vessel walls, accompanied by blood clots and
thickening of the blood vessel walls. Eventually they close entirely.
The primary cause is the use of tobacco products. Rarely does a non-nicotine user get it.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Acha kutumia nikotini katika kila fomu; Inakuua kwa njia zaidi ya moja.
• Tumia matibabu yaliyoainishwa kwa ugonjwa wa Raynaud. Kutembea ni moja ya mazoezi bora
Kwa kuongezeka kwa mtiririko wa damu kwenye miguu.
• Lala juu ya kitanda na kuinua miguu kwa dakika 1-2 au mpaka watakapo blanch. Kisha kaa kwenye
Upande wa kitanda na uwashike chini mpaka iwe pink. Fanya hii mara 5 kila moja, mara 3 a
siku.
• Usikae kwa muda mrefu bila kuamka na kutembea. Kulala kwenye kampuni
godoro. Kamwe usivuke miguu kwa magoti.
-Unaona "Ugonjwa wa Raynaud."
(Thromboangiitis obliterans)
Dalili -baridi ya kawaida ya mwisho ni dalili ya kwanza. Lakini ganzi,
Kuuma, na kuuma kunaweza pia kuzingatiwa. Wakati wa kushuka kwa muda mrefu, miguu inaweza kugeuka bluu.
Shida kwa ujumla huanza katika miguu; lakini inaweza, na mapenzi, kutokea mikononi na mwishowe
nzima, mwili -ikiwa sababu haijasimamishwa.
Wayahudi huendeleza shida hii mara nyingi zaidi kuliko mtu mwingine yeyote, na wanaume 75 wanayo kwa kila mwanamke mmoja
ambaye huendeleza. Mara nyingi huanza katika umri wa miaka 20 hadi 45. Kuna vipindi mbadala vya
kuzidisha na kutokuwa na shughuli ya ugonjwa.
Sababu - hii ni kuvimba kwa kuta za mishipa ya damu, ikifuatana na vijiti vya damu na
unene wa ukuta wa chombo cha damu. Mwishowe wanafunga kabisa.
Sababu ya msingi ni matumizi ya bidhaa za tumbaku. Mara chache mtumiaji asiye na nicotine anapata.

title: Nail Problems
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Supply the indicated deficiencies, listed above, which apply to you.
• Eat a high-protein diet, including Brewer's yeast, calcium, silica, and, if necessary,
hydrochloric acid.
• Water causes the nails to swell and they shrink when dry, resulting in loose, brittle nails.
• Avoid immersing the hands in detergent water.
• Never cut the cuticles. This damages the nail and invites infections. Do not push them
back.
• Brittle nails are common among teenagers, pregnant women, and those with food
allergies. The problem is malabsorption or nutritional deficiencies (unsaturated essential
fatty acids, amino acids, calcium, iron, or zinc).
• Hangnails are caused by an essential fatty acid deficiency. Put vitamin E oil or aloe vera
directly on it, to reduce further breaking and likelihood of infection. They are particularly
common among women who have their hands in water a lot or who bite their nails. Keep
nails clipped short. Rub vegetable oil into the hands occasionally.
• If you tend to pick at your nails, wear clothes with pockets; and, when you find yourself
starting to do it, put your hands in your pockets.
SYMPTOMS AND CAUSES—Your fingernails help reveal how well you are absorbing nutrients, and
whether you are getting enough. A deficiency of protein or other nutrients can affect the nails.
Surprisingly enough, finger and toe nails are composed almost entirely of protein. Here are some of the
symptoms, followed by the deficient nutrient:
Poor nail growth: zinc.
Dry, brittle nails: protein, vitamin A, calcium, iron.
Fragile and showing horizontal or vertical ridges: B vitamins.
Half moons absent: protein deficiency.
Thin, flat, and even moon-shaped (concave or spoon-shaped) nails: iron deficiency.
Pale nail beds: anemia.
Poor nail growth: zinc deficiency.
Excessive dryness, very rounded and curved nail ends, and darkened nails: vitamin B
12
deficiency.
Splitting nails: lack of hydrochloric acid, sulfur amino acid deficiency.
Washboard ridges: Iron, calcium, zinc deficiency.
Hangnails: Protein, folic acid, and vitamin C deficiencies.
White bands on the nails: protein deficiency.
White nails: liver disease, copper excess.
White spots: zinc deficiency, thyroid deficiency, and hydrochloric acid deficiency.
Fungus under nails: lack of lactobacillus in colon.
Bluish nails: chronic lung conditions (not enough oxygen).
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Toa upungufu ulioonyeshwa, ulioorodheshwa hapo juu, ambao unakuhusu.
• Kula lishe yenye protini nyingi, pamoja na chachu ya Brewer, kalsiamu, silika, na, ikiwa ni lazima,
asidi ya hydrochloric.
• Maji husababisha kucha kuvimba na hupungua wakati kavu, na kusababisha kucha, brittle kucha.
• Epuka kuzamisha mikono katika maji ya sabuni.
• Kamwe usikate cuticles. Hii inaharibu msumari na inakaribisha maambukizo. Usiwasukuma
nyuma.
• Misumari ya brittle ni ya kawaida kati ya vijana, wanawake wajawazito, na wale walio na chakula
mzio. Shida ni malabsorption au upungufu wa lishe (isiyo na maana
Asidi ya mafuta, asidi ya amino, kalsiamu, chuma, au zinki).
• Hango husababishwa na upungufu muhimu wa asidi ya mafuta. Weka mafuta ya vitamini E au aloe vera
Moja kwa moja juu yake, ili kupunguza kuvunja zaidi na uwezekano wa kuambukizwa. Wao ni haswa
Kawaida kati ya wanawake ambao wana mikono yao katika maji mengi au wanaouma kucha zao. Weka
Misumari ilifungwa fupi. Pindua mafuta ya mboga mikononi mara kwa mara.
• Ikiwa unapenda kuchagua kucha zako, vaa nguo na mifuko; Na, unapojikuta
Kuanza kuifanya, weka mikono yako kwenye mifuko yako.
Dalili na sababu -vidole vyako vinasaidia kufunua jinsi unavyochukua virutubishi, na
Ikiwa unapata vya kutosha. Upungufu wa protini au virutubishi vingine vinaweza kuathiri kucha.
Kwa kushangaza ya kutosha, kucha na vidole vya vidole vinaundwa karibu kabisa na protini. Hapa kuna baadhi ya
Dalili, ikifuatiwa na virutubishi duni:
Ukuaji duni wa msumari: Zinc.
Misumari kavu, brittle: protini, vitamini A, kalsiamu, chuma.
Dhaifu na kuonyesha usawa au wima matuta: vitamini B.
Nusu ya miezi haipo: Upungufu wa protini.
Nyembamba, gorofa, na hata misumari ya mwezi (concave au kijiko-umbo): upungufu wa madini.
Vitanda vya msumari wa rangi: anemia.
Ukuaji duni wa msumari: Upungufu wa zinki.
Kukauka kupita kiasi, miisho iliyo na mviringo sana na iliyopindika, na kucha zilizotiwa giza: Vitamini B
12
upungufu.
Kugawanya kucha: Ukosefu wa asidi ya hydrochloric, upungufu wa asidi ya amino ya sulfuri.
Matuta ya safisha: chuma, kalsiamu, upungufu wa zinki.
HangnAils: protini, asidi ya folic, na upungufu wa vitamini C.
Bendi nyeupe kwenye kucha: Upungufu wa protini.
Misumari nyeupe: ugonjwa wa ini, ziada ya shaba.
Matangazo meupe: Upungufu wa zinki, upungufu wa tezi, na upungufu wa asidi ya hydrochloric.
Kuvu chini ya kucha: Ukosefu wa Lactobacillus katika koloni.
Misumari ya Bluu: Hali ya mapafu sugu (haitoshi oksijeni).

title: Ingrown Nails
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Soak your foot in warm water, to soften the nail. Dry carefully and then insert a tiny
(tiny) wisp of sterile cotton under the burrowing edge of the nail. This will slightly lift the
nail, so it can grow past the tissue. Apply some peroxide as a safeguard against infection.
Change the cotton insert daily, until the nail has grown past the problem area.
• Do not cut a "v"-shaped wedge out of the center of your toenail! It only worsens the
problem. Nails grow from back to front, not from inward to outward, or vice-versa.
• If you accidentally cut or break a nail too short, carefully smooth the edges with an
emery board.
• Never cut nails with scissors; none are small enough to do the job right, and they often
leave a sharp edge.
SYMPTOMS—The nail (usually on the big toe) has pushed into the soft tissue alongside it. Soon it
results in sharp pain. Infection can result.
CAUSES—Wear large enough shoes! This is the underlying problem for many cases of ingrown nails!
If you cannot solve the problem otherwise, cut out the front of the shoe! Podiatrists know that people
who wear shoes which are large enough rarely have food problems.
Never cut your nails too short! Cut them straight across, but not rounded. The outside edge of the nail
should be parallel to the skin. Do not trim the nail deeper than the tip of the toe.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Loweka mguu wako katika maji ya joto, ili kulainisha msumari. Kavu kwa uangalifu na kisha ingiza vidogo
(Tiny) WISP ya pamba yenye kuzaa chini ya ukingo wa msumari. Hii itainua kidogo
Msumari, kwa hivyo inaweza kukua zamani za tishu. Omba peroksidi kama usalama dhidi ya maambukizo.
Badilisha kuingiza pamba kila siku, hadi msumari umepita eneo la shida.
• Usikate kabari ya "V"-iliyotiwa nje katikati ya toenail yako! Inazidisha tu
Tatizo. Misumari inakua kutoka nyuma kwenda mbele, sio kutoka ndani hadi nje, au kinyume chake.
• Ikiwa unakata kwa bahati mbaya au kuvunja msumari mfupi sana, laini laini kingo na
Bodi ya Emery.
• Kamwe usikate kucha na mkasi; hakuna mdogo wa kutosha kufanya kazi hiyo, na mara nyingi
Acha makali makali.
Dalili - msumari (kawaida kwenye toe kubwa) umesukuma ndani ya tishu laini kando yake. Hivi karibuni
husababisha maumivu makali. Maambukizi yanaweza kusababisha.
Sababu -kuvaa viatu vikubwa vya kutosha! Hili ndio shida ya msingi kwa visa vingi vya kucha!
Ikiwa huwezi kutatua shida vinginevyo, kata mbele ya kiatu! Podiatrists wanajua kuwa watu
ambao huvaa viatu ambavyo ni vya kutosha mara chache huwa na shida za chakula.
Kamwe usikate kucha zako fupi sana! Kata moja kwa moja, lakini sio mviringo. Makali ya nje ya msumari
inapaswa kufanana na ngozi. Usipunguze msumari zaidi kuliko ncha ya vidole.

title: Foot Problems
contentEn:
HYDRO—The following are summaries of discussions in the author's book, Water Therapy Manual (see
order sheet):
Numbness in feet: Give a hot Fomentation to the spine, accompanied by Hot or Alternate Sponging of
the limbs. Repeat this 3 times a day (p. 179).
Sweating feet: Apply a Revulsive Douche to the feet, with extremes in temperature as great as possible.
Give an Alternate hot and cold Foot Bath. During the night, apply a Heating Compress to the feet; and
give a Cold Mitten Friction to the feet in the morning, on arising (p. 243).
Weak, pronated feet: Put the feet and part of the legs in tubs for Contrast Baths. Begin with a
temperature of 110o F., and then after four minutes, change to tap water for 1 minute. Change back and
forth 4-6 times, and end with the hot water. During the treatment, the temperature of the hot water
should be gradually raised to 115o-120o F., and the tap water gradually lowered to the temperature of ice
water. Give the treatment twice a day (p. 115).
Infections in feet: Give the same treatment as for pronated feet, above (p. 114).
contentSw:
Hydro - Ifuatayo ni muhtasari wa majadiliano katika kitabu cha mwandishi, Mwongozo wa Tiba ya Maji (tazama
karatasi ya kuagiza):
Ganzi kwa miguu: toa moto wa moto kwa mgongo, ukifuatana na moto au mbadala wa sponging wa
miguu. Rudia hii mara 3 kwa siku (uk. 179).
Miguu ya Jasho: Tumia douche inayorudisha kwa miguu, na joto kali kwa joto iwezekanavyo.
Toa bafu mbadala ya moto na baridi. Wakati wa usiku, weka compress ya joto kwa miguu; na
Toa msuguano wa baridi kwa miguu asubuhi, juu ya kutokea (uk. 243).
Miguu dhaifu, iliyotamkwa: Weka miguu na sehemu ya miguu kwenye zilizopo kwa bafu tofauti. Anza na a
Joto la 110o F., na kisha baada ya dakika nne, badilisha kugonga maji kwa dakika 1. Badilisha nyuma na
mara 4-6, na kuishia na maji ya moto. Wakati wa matibabu, joto la maji ya moto
inapaswa kuinuliwa polepole hadi 115O-120O F., na maji ya bomba polepole huteremka kwa joto la barafu
maji. Toa matibabu mara mbili kwa siku (uk. 115).
Maambukizi kwa miguu: Toa matibabu sawa na kwa miguu iliyotamkwa, hapo juu (uk. 114).

title: Corns And Calluses
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Wear proper shoes! Never wear tight-fitting footwear!
• Do not use "corn plasters." These contain acids intended to eat away at the corns. But
they also eat into nearby normal flesh.
• Do not cut corns and calluses! This only makes the situation worse. This especially
applies to diabetics. As soon as a corn develops, apply oil to soften it.
• Soak your feet in very diluted chamomile tea. It will both soothe and soften the hard
skin. (The stain the tea makes on the feet will come off easily with soap and water.) Or
just soak the feet in comfortably hot water for several minutes. Then apply a hand cream
which contains 20% urea. This will help dissolve the hard skin. Do this daily.
• Another formula is to soak the area in a mixture of oil of wintergreen, witch hazel, and
black walnut tincture, daily. Use a pumice stone and emery board to trim down the corn or
callus.
• Yet another formula is to crush 5-6 aspirin tablets and mix into a paste, by adding a half
teaspoon each of water and lemon juice. Apply this to the hard-skin areas. Put the foot in a
plastic bag, wrap a warm towel around it, and sit for 10 minutes. Then unwrap the foot
and scrub the area with a pumice stone. The dead, hardened flesh should come loose and
flake off.
• Put a few drops of citric acid on the area. The next morning, use an emery board or a
pumice stone and rub off the dead skin.
• A variant method is to soak a piece of cotton in fresh lemon juice or pineapple. Bandage
the cotton over the area. It will dissolve it. But you must be persistent.
• Any sweet oil rubbed on the area several times a day, plus the use of the emery board or
pumice stone, will skim off the dead flesh.
• Try putting some lamb's wool between the toes, to separate them (after buying larger
shoes).
• You can purchase Stella's Stretch All (or another leather-stretching solution) from a shoe
store. Apply it to the shoes and then walk in them while wet. Repeat this frequently, and
the leather shoe will widen out.
• Women should never wear high-heel shoes. They ruin the feet, damage the spine, and
throw the pelvic organs out of place.
• Women should not wear pumps; these are shoes which cause the foot to slide forward,
jamming everything into the front. Instead, wear an oxford-style shoe, with laces. This
properly cradles the foot.
• Always buy shoes which breathe; leather is the best.
• An undersized shoe will damage the toes and cause corns, etc. An oversized shoe will
produce friction and break the skin. But, of the two, oversized shoes are the less harmful.
• Some calluses are useful, never painful, and should not be disturbed.
SYMPTOMS AND CAUSES—Pressure and rubbing causes calluses on the bottoms and sides of the
feet. They can also form on the hands, and even on the elbows and knees.
Corns form between toes and remain soft from foot perspiration. They occur from the rubbing of
adjacent digit bones.
Corns are more painful than calluses.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Vaa viatu sahihi! Kamwe usivae viatu vyenye kufaa!
• Usitumie "plasters za mahindi." Hizi zina asidi iliyokusudiwa kula kwenye mahindi. Lakini
Pia hula ndani ya mwili wa kawaida.
• Usikate mahindi na simu! Hii inafanya tu hali kuwa mbaya. Hii haswa
inatumika kwa wagonjwa wa kisukari. Mara tu mahindi yanapokua, tumia mafuta ili kuipunguza.
• Loweka miguu yako katika chai ya chamomile iliyoongezwa sana. Itakuwa laini na laini laini
ngozi. (Madoa ya chai hufanya kwa miguu itatoka kwa urahisi na sabuni na maji.) Au
Loweka tu miguu katika maji ya moto kwa dakika kadhaa. Kisha weka cream ya mkono
ambayo ina 20% urea. Hii itasaidia kufuta ngozi ngumu. Fanya hivi kila siku.
• Njia nyingine ni kuloweka eneo hilo katika mchanganyiko wa mafuta ya Wintergreen, Hazel ya Mchawi, na
Tincture nyeusi ya walnut, kila siku. Tumia jiwe la pumice na bodi ya emery kupunguza mahindi au
Callus.
• Njia nyingine ni kuponda vidonge vya aspirini 5-6 na uchanganye kwenye kuweka, kwa kuongeza nusu
Kijiko kila maji na maji ya limao. Omba hii kwa maeneo ya ngozi ngumu. Weka mguu katika a
Mfuko wa plastiki, funga kitambaa cha joto karibu nayo, na ukae kwa dakika 10. Kisha fungua mguu
Na chaka eneo hilo na jiwe la pumice. Mwili uliokufa, mgumu unapaswa kuwa huru na
Flake mbali.
• Weka matone machache ya asidi ya citric kwenye eneo hilo. Asubuhi iliyofuata, tumia bodi ya emery au a
Jiwe la pumice na kusugua ngozi iliyokufa.
Njia ya lahaja ni kuloweka kipande cha pamba kwenye maji safi ya limao au mananasi. Bandage
Pamba juu ya eneo hilo. Itaifuta. Lakini lazima uwe unaendelea.
• Mafuta yoyote matamu yaliyopigwa kwenye eneo hilo mara kadhaa kwa siku, pamoja na matumizi ya bodi ya emery au
Jiwe la Pumice, litaondoa mwili uliokufa.
• Jaribu kuweka pamba ya mwana -kondoo kati ya vidole, ili kuzitenganisha (baada ya kununua kubwa
viatu).
• Unaweza kununua kunyoosha kwa Stella (au suluhisho lingine la kunyoosha ngozi) kutoka kwa kiatu
duka. Omba kwa viatu na kisha tembea ndani wakati wa mvua. Rudia hii mara kwa mara, na
Kiatu cha ngozi kitaongezeka.
• Wanawake hawapaswi kamwe kuvaa viatu vya visigino vya juu. Wao huharibu miguu, huharibu mgongo, na
Tupa viungo vya pelvic nje ya mahali.
• Wanawake hawapaswi kuvaa pampu; Hizi ni viatu ambavyo husababisha mguu kusonga mbele,
Kuingiza kila kitu mbele. Badala yake, vaa kiatu cha mtindo wa Oxford, na taa. Hii
Vipimo vizuri mguu.
• Daima nunua viatu ambavyo hupumua; Ngozi ni bora zaidi.
• Kiatu kilicho chini ya ardhi kitaharibu vidole na kusababisha mahindi, nk
Tengeneza msuguano na uvunje ngozi. Lakini, kati ya hizo mbili, viatu vya kupindukia sio hatari.
• Baadhi ya simu ni muhimu, kamwe chungu, na haipaswi kusumbuliwa.
Dalili na sababu -shinikizo na kusugua husababisha simu kwenye chupa na pande za
Miguu. Wanaweza pia kuunda juu ya mikono, na hata kwenye viwiko na magoti.
Mahindi huunda kati ya vidole na hubaki laini kutoka kwa jasho la mguu. Zinatokea kutoka kwa kusugua
Mifupa ya karibu ya nambari.
Mahindi ni chungu zaidi kuliko simu.

title: Foot Aches
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Improve the diet, get enough protein, calcium, and B vitamins. Stop eating junk food. It
isn't worth taking the time to chew and swallow.
• Lose that excess weight. It is hard on your feet.
• Elevate your feet when you come home at night. Then soak them in a basin of warm
water, containing 1-2 tbsp. of Epsom salts. Rinse with clear, cool water.
• Sit on the edge of the bathtub and alternately run comfortably hot water over your feet,
and then cold water, ending with the cold. (If you have diabetes, be careful about extremes
in temperature.)
• Wrap some ice cubes in a wet washcloth and rub it over your feet and ankles for a few
minutes.
• During the day, lift one foot and give it a good shake. Then lift the other and do likewise.
Then relax and flex your toes up and down.
• When standing in one place, keep changing your stance; try to keep moving about. If
possible, stand on a carpet or a rubber mat. Ask the boss if you can buy a rubber mat and
lay it down on the floor in your work area.
• Remove your shoes, sit in a chair, and stretch your feet out. Then, below the ankle, move
each foot in ten circles. Point your toes down and then up.
• Gently roll your foot over a golf ball, tennis ball, or rolling pin for a couple minutes.
• Scatter a few pencils on the floor and pick them up with your toes.
• For a terrific foot massage, toss a handful of beans in a moccasin-style shoe, and walk
around the room on them.
• Always wear low shoes, and shoes which fasten firmly.
• In the evening, sit down and put on a pair of soft slippers.
SYMPTOMS—Tired, aching feet.
CAUSES—Inadequate diet and rest, and being on the feet all day long.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Boresha lishe, pata protini ya kutosha, kalsiamu, na vitamini vya B. Acha kula chakula cha taka. IT
haifai kuchukua wakati wa kutafuna na kumeza.
• Kupoteza uzito huo kupita kiasi. Ni ngumu kwa miguu yako.
• Kuinua miguu yako unaporudi nyumbani usiku. Kisha loweka kwenye bonde la joto
maji, yaliyo na 1-2 tbsp. ya chumvi za Epsom. Suuza na maji safi, baridi.
• Kaa kwenye ukingo wa bafu na uende kwa njia ya maji moto juu ya miguu yako,
Na kisha maji baridi, kuishia na baridi. (Ikiwa una ugonjwa wa sukari, kuwa mwangalifu juu ya kupita kiasi
katika joto.)
• Funga vijiko kadhaa vya barafu kwenye kitambaa cha kuosha na kusugua juu ya miguu yako na vifundoni kwa wachache
dakika.
• Wakati wa mchana, kuinua mguu mmoja na kuitikisa vizuri. Kisha kuinua nyingine na kufanya vivyo hivyo.
Kisha pumzika na ubadilishe vidole vyako juu na chini.
• Unaposimama katika sehemu moja, endelea kubadilisha msimamo wako; Jaribu kuendelea kusonga mbele. Ikiwa
inawezekana, simama kwenye carpet au mkeka wa mpira. Uliza bosi ikiwa unaweza kununua mkeka wa mpira na
Weka chini kwenye sakafu katika eneo lako la kazi.
• Ondoa viatu vyako, kaa kwenye kiti, na kunyoosha miguu yako nje. Halafu, chini ya kiwiko, hoja
kila mguu katika duru kumi. Eleza vidole vyako chini na kisha juu.
• Pindua mguu wako kwa upole juu ya mpira wa gofu, mpira wa tenisi, au pini ya kusonga kwa dakika kadhaa.
• Dawati penseli chache kwenye sakafu na uichukue na vidole vyako.
• Kwa massage ya mguu mkali, tupa maharagwe kadhaa kwenye kiatu cha mtindo wa moccasin, na kutembea
karibu na chumba juu yao.
• Daima kuvaa viatu vya chini, na viatu ambavyo hufunga kwa nguvu.
• Jioni, kaa chini na uweke jozi ya laini laini.
Dalili -zilizopigwa, miguu inayouma.
Sababu -lishe ya kutosha na kupumzika, na kuwa kwa miguu siku nzima.

title: Foot Odor
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Wash your feet frequently. Keep them clean. Scrub gently with a soft brush, including
between the toes. Dry them well when finished.
• Put cornstarch in your shoes to help keep them dry. (Never use talcum powder for
anything; it is cancer forming if it gets into the body.)
• Do not use antiperspirants, for they contain aluminum (a cause of Alzheimer's disease).
Spray deodorants are breathed into the lungs.
• Change your socks often, several times a day if necessary. This is one of the best things
you can do.
• Some find help in wearing two pairs of socks at a time. This increases elimination of
sweat.
• Buy leather shoes that breathe. This reduces the perspiration. Avoid rubber shoes; they
cause your feet to smell like rubber tires at the end of the day—yet the odor is not from
the feet! Even expensive rubber shoes, endorsed by the athletes, can do this.
• Soak your feet (15 minutes, twice a week) in ½ cup vinegar added to 1 quart of water.
• Soak them in alternate hot and cold water pans or pails. But if you are diabetic or have
impaired circulation, you had better not do this.
• Sprinkle some dry, crumbled sage leaves into your shoes, to control odor.
• Avoid stress; it increases sweating, which multiplies bacterial action.
• Avoid spicy, pungent foods, for their odor will be found in your feet later on.
SYMPTOMS—Feet that do not smell very nice.
CAUSES—Bacteria on the feet, cheap shoes, or eating meat.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Osha miguu yako mara kwa mara. Waweke safi. Piga upole na brashi laini, pamoja na
kati ya vidole. Kausha vizuri ukimaliza.
• Weka cornstarch kwenye viatu vyako ili kusaidia kuziweka kavu. (Kamwe usitumie poda ya talcum kwa
chochote; Ni saratani kutengeneza ikiwa inaingia mwilini.)
• Usitumie antiperspirants, kwa kuwa zina aluminium (sababu ya ugonjwa wa Alzheimer).
Dawa za dawa hupumua ndani ya mapafu.
• Badilisha soksi zako mara nyingi, mara kadhaa kwa siku ikiwa ni lazima. Hii ni moja ya mambo bora
unaweza kufanya.
• Wengine hupata msaada katika kuvaa jozi mbili za soksi kwa wakati mmoja. Hii huongeza kuondoa
jasho.
• Nunua viatu vya ngozi ambavyo vinapumua. Hii inapunguza jasho. Epuka viatu vya mpira; wao
kusababisha miguu yako harufu kama matairi ya mpira mwishoni mwa siku -lakini harufu sio kutoka
miguu! Hata viatu vya bei ghali, vilivyoidhinishwa na wanariadha, vinaweza kufanya hivyo.
• Loweka miguu yako (dakika 15, mara mbili kwa wiki) katika siki ya kikombe ½ iliyoongezwa kwa lita 1 ya maji.
• Loweka kwa njia mbadala za maji moto na baridi au pails. Lakini ikiwa una ugonjwa wa kisukari au unayo
Mzunguko ulioharibika, bora usifanye hivi.
• Nyunyiza majani kadhaa ya kavu, yaliyokauka ndani ya viatu vyako, kudhibiti harufu.
• Epuka mafadhaiko; Inaongeza jasho, ambayo huongeza hatua ya bakteria.
• Epuka vyakula vyenye viungo, vya kupendeza, kwa maana harufu yao itapatikana katika miguu yako baadaye.
Dalili -hujaa ambazo hazina harufu nzuri sana.
Sababu - bakteria kwa miguu, viatu vya bei rahisi, au kula nyama.

title: Flat Feet
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Try walking barefoot upstairs on your toes, and then back down the same way. Do this
10 minutes each day, for a month; and eat a nourishing, moderate diet. The muscles in
your feet may strengthen. By helping your flat feet, your eyesight may also improve.
• If you cannot solve your flat foot problem (perhaps because it occurred when you were a
child, and you did not discover it till later), learn to adapt your step to it. When you take a
step, land very slightly on the outer rear portion of the foot; then, as the foot moves back,
keep the weight slightly (very slightly) on the outer part of the foot. In this way, you will
make an artificial arch and your foot will not tire as quickly throughout the day. In
addition, try to do part of your everyday work while sitting down occasionally. This will
help rest the feet.
SYMPTOMS—The concave arch supporting the bottom of the feet is flattening out, resulting in more
exhaustion during the day when you are on your feet.
CAUSES—Inadequate circulation, impoverished diet, and junk food is often involved. Once this
problem develops it generally is not solved, especially since it often occurs in childhood when parents
are not aware of what is happening until it is too late.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Jaribu kutembea bila viatu kwenye ngazi ya vidole, kisha urudi nyuma kwa njia ile ile. Fanya hivi
Dakika 10 kila siku, kwa mwezi; na kula lishe yenye lishe, wastani. Misuli ndani
Miguu yako inaweza kuimarisha. Kwa kusaidia miguu yako ya gorofa, macho yako yanaweza pia kuboreka.
• Ikiwa huwezi kutatua shida yako ya mguu wa gorofa (labda kwa sababu ilitokea wakati ulikuwa
Mtoto, na haukugundua hadi baadaye), jifunze kurekebisha hatua yako kwake. Unapochukua
hatua, ardhi kidogo sana kwenye sehemu ya nyuma ya mguu; Halafu, wakati mguu unarudi nyuma,
Weka uzito kidogo (kidogo sana) kwenye sehemu ya nje ya mguu. Kwa njia hii, utafanya
Tengeneza arch bandia na mguu wako hautachoka haraka siku nzima. Katika
Kwa kuongezea, jaribu kufanya sehemu ya kazi yako ya kila siku wakati umekaa chini mara kwa mara. Hii mapenzi
Saidia kupumzika miguu.
Dalili - Arch ya concave inayounga mkono chini ya miguu inajifunga, na kusababisha zaidi
Kuchoka wakati wa mchana wakati uko kwenye miguu yako.
Sababu - mzunguko usiofaa, lishe duni, na chakula kisicho na chakula mara nyingi huhusika. Mara hii hii
Shida inakua kwa ujumla haijatatuliwa, haswa kwani mara nyingi hufanyika katika utoto wakati wazazi
hawajui kile kinachotokea hadi kuchelewa sana.

title: Athlete'S Foot
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Keep your feet dry. After bathing, dry carefully between the toes. Wear cotton socks,
and change them daily (or more often, if possible). Put your shoes in the window and let
the sunlight get into them somewhat. Cut raw garlic into tiny pieces and put some into
your shoes. Dust your feet with garlic powder. Garlic is better than antifungal drugs!
• Try to keep your feet cool and dry. You may be able to think of ways to do this. Try to
find shoes that will not make your feet sweat. Avoid rubber shoes, even the expensive
ones.
• Fungi hates sunlight. When in the acute stage, try to leave your feet uncovered. Put your
feet in the sunlight every so often.
• Do not walk barefoot around the house, so others will not become infected. Also, never
walk barefoot in public places (public showers, locker rooms, pool decks); wear shoes or
slippers.
• Apply natural antifungicides, such as pau d'arco and tea tree oil.
• Drink 3 cups of pau d'arco tea daily. Also put a strong mixture of it on your feet.
• Apply lemon juice 1-2 times a day to the area, and let it dry. Another method is to apply
a strong tea of crushed juniper berries. Mash garlic with some oil and apply to the area.
• Add 20 drops of tea tree oil to a small tub of water, and soak your feet in it for 15
minutes, 3 times a day. Dry well afterward, and place some undiluted tea tree oil on the
feet.
• Apply a baking soda paste to the area, and especially between the toes. Mix 1 tbsp.
baking soda with a little warm water, apply, then dry well, and dust feet with cornstarch
powder.
• Applying overly strong applications to athlete's foot can result in rashes breaking out on
hands and elsewhere. If you have unknowingly done this: Treat the feet more gently and,
as the foot infection clears, the sympathetic rashes will also.
• Bathe the feet daily in 50-50 vinegar and water. Dry well, then apply a vegetable oil to
the affected area.
• Soak your foot in a mixture of 2 tsp. of salt per pint of warm water, for 5-10 minutes; dry
well and repeat till the problem is solved.
• Eat a nourishing diet, and skip the processed and junk foods. Obtain vitamins A, B
complex, and C.
• In case there is pain, place cold compresses on the area.
• If the problem worsens, and pus or a fever develops, see a professional.
• To help keep your feet dry, change your socks 3-4 times a day. After washing them,
rinse the socks well, to get out the detergent (which the fungus likes).
• Put on clean socks before dressing; in this way you avoid infecting the groin area.
• Boil socks to kill the fungus.
• Do not use plastic or waterproof shoes. They create a warm, moist place for fungus to
breed. Never wear boots all day.
• Do not wear the same shoes 2 days in a row. This gives a pair of shoes 2 days to
thoroughly dry out.
• Spray Lysol on a cloth and wipe the inside of the shoe.
• Place the shoes in the sunlight, angled toward the sun. Ultraviolet light kills fungus.
• Useful herbs are blood root and goldenseal; use alone or together. Apply as a powder to
the area.
• Crush a green plant juice, such as chickweed, plantain, Swiss chard, etc., and apply the
juice to the area. Then walk about barefooted in the sun.
—Also see "Ringworm," which is a closely related fungal skin disease.
(Tinea Pedis)
SYMPTOMS—On the skin of the feet, especially between the toes, there are blisters or cracks, or both.
Also there is itching; burning; and, in extreme cases, pustules; and ulcers. As it develops, the blisters and/
or cracks soften, turn white, and tend to peel off in flakes. In severe cases, there may be pain. It is worse
in warmer weather.
CAUSES—Athlete's foot is caused by one or more of the parasitic fungi. Fungus infections are more
difficult to eliminate. Any condition which keeps the feet both warm and moist can lead to this problem.
By scratching the sores on the foot, the disease can be spread on the hands, under the nails, and to other
parts of the body.
The fungus, causing athlete's foot, spreads rapidly when beneficial bacteria are destroyed by antibiotics,
drugs, or radiation.
The organisms causing it are spread from contaminated floors surrounding pools, showers, and other
public places.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Weka miguu yako kavu. Baada ya kuoga, kavu kwa uangalifu kati ya vidole. Vaa soksi za pamba,
na ubadilishe kila siku (au mara nyingi, ikiwa inawezekana). Weka viatu vyako kwenye dirisha na wacha
Mwangaza wa jua huingia ndani yao kwa kiasi fulani. Kata vitunguu mbichi vipande vidogo na uweke ndani
Viatu vyako. Futa miguu yako na poda ya vitunguu. Vitunguu ni bora kuliko dawa za antifungal!
• Jaribu kuweka miguu yako iwe baridi na kavu. Unaweza kufikiria njia za kufanya hivyo. Jaribu
Pata viatu ambavyo havitafanya miguu yako jasho. Epuka viatu vya mpira, hata ghali
zile.
• Kuvu huchukia jua. Unapokuwa katika hatua ya papo hapo, jaribu kuacha miguu yako bila kufunuliwa. Weka yako
Miguu kwenye jua kila mara.
• Usitembee bila viatu kuzunguka nyumba, kwa hivyo wengine hawataambukizwa. Pia, kamwe
tembea bila viatu katika maeneo ya umma (maonyesho ya umma, vyumba vya kufuli, dawati la dimbwi); Vaa viatu au
Slippers.
• Omba antifungicides asili, kama vile Pau d'Arco na mafuta ya mti wa chai.
• Kunywa vikombe 3 vya chai ya Pau d'Arco kila siku. Pia weka mchanganyiko wake kwa miguu yako.
• Tumia maji ya limao mara 1-2 kwa siku kwa eneo hilo, na iache kavu. Njia nyingine ni kuomba
Chai kali ya matunda ya juniper. Mash vitunguu na mafuta na kuomba kwenye eneo hilo.
• Ongeza matone 20 ya mafuta ya mti wa chai kwenye bomba ndogo ya maji, na loweka miguu yako ndani yake kwa 15
Dakika, mara 3 kwa siku. Kavu vizuri baadaye, na weka mafuta ya mti wa chai usiotengwa kwenye
Miguu.
• Omba kuweka soda ya kuoka kwenye eneo hilo, na haswa kati ya vidole. Changanya 1 tbsp.
Kuoka soda na maji kidogo ya joto, tumia, kisha kavu vizuri, na miguu ya vumbi na mahindi
poda.
• Kuomba maombi yenye nguvu sana kwa mguu wa mwanariadha kunaweza kusababisha upele ukiibuka
Mikono na mahali pengine. Ikiwa umefanya hii bila kujua: kutibu miguu kwa upole zaidi na,
Kadiri maambukizo ya mguu yanavyosafisha, upele wa huruma pia.
• Oga miguu kila siku katika siki 50-50 na maji. Kavu vizuri, kisha weka mafuta ya mboga
eneo lililoathiriwa.
• Loweka mguu wako katika mchanganyiko wa 2 tsp. ya chumvi kwa kila pint ya maji ya joto, kwa dakika 5-10; kavu
vizuri na kurudia mpaka shida itatatuliwa.
• Kula lishe yenye lishe, na ruka vyakula vya kusindika na visivyo. Pata vitamini A, b
ngumu, na C.
• Ikiwa kuna maumivu, weka compresses baridi kwenye eneo hilo.
• Ikiwa shida inazidi, na pus au homa inakua, angalia mtaalamu.
• Kusaidia kuweka miguu yako kavu, badilisha soksi zako mara 3-4 kwa siku. Baada ya kuwaosha,
Suuza soksi vizuri, ili kupata sabuni (ambayo kuvu inapenda).
• Vaa soksi safi kabla ya kuvaa; Kwa njia hii unaepuka kuambukiza eneo la groin.
• Chemsha soksi kuua kuvu.
• Usitumie viatu vya plastiki au visivyo na maji. Wanaunda mahali pa joto na unyevu kwa kuvu
kuzaliana. Kamwe usivae buti siku nzima.
• Usivae viatu sawa siku 2 mfululizo. Hii inatoa jozi ya viatu siku 2 kwa
Kavu kabisa.
• Nyunyiza lysol kwenye kitambaa na uifuta ndani ya kiatu.
• Weka viatu kwenye mwangaza wa jua, uliowekwa kuelekea jua. Mwanga wa Ultraviolet unaua kuvu.
• Mimea muhimu ni mzizi wa damu na dhahabu; tumia peke yako au pamoja. Omba kama poda kwa
eneo.
• Ponda juisi ya mmea wa kijani, kama vile kuku, mmea, chard ya Uswizi, nk, na utumie
juisi kwa eneo hilo. Kisha tembea bila viatu kwenye jua.
-Unaona "pete," ambayo ni ugonjwa wa ngozi unaohusiana sana.
(Tinea pedis)
Dalili - kwenye ngozi ya miguu, haswa kati ya vidole, kuna malengelenge au nyufa, au zote mbili.
Pia kuna kuwasha; kuchoma; na, katika hali mbaya, pustules; na vidonda. Kama inavyoendelea, malengelenge na/
Au nyufa laini, kugeuka nyeupe, na huwa na peel kwenye flakes. Katika hali mbaya, kunaweza kuwa na maumivu. Ni mbaya zaidi
katika hali ya hewa ya joto.
Sababu - Mguu wa athlete husababishwa na kuvu moja au zaidi ya vimelea. Maambukizi ya kuvu ni zaidi
ngumu kuondoa. Hali yoyote ambayo huweka miguu joto na unyevu inaweza kusababisha shida hii.
Kwa kung'oa vidonda kwenye mguu, ugonjwa unaweza kusambazwa kwa mikono, chini ya kucha, na kwa zingine
sehemu za mwili.
Kuvu, na kusababisha mguu wa mwanariadha, huenea haraka wakati bakteria wenye faida huharibiwa na viuatilifu,
madawa ya kulevya, au mionzi.
Viumbe vinavyosababisha vimeenea kutoka sakafu zilizochafuliwa zinazozunguka mabwawa, mvua, na zingine
maeneo ya umma.

title: Dandruff
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Often there are severe B complex deficiencies, a lack of essential unsaturated fatty acids,
and zinc.
• Cut out excess fats, grease, and all fried foods from the diet. Stop the use of alcohol.
Check to see if you have food allergies (wheat, dairy products, citrus, or something else).
Avoid stress and poor elimination. Do not use strong, irritant shampoos or hair treatments.
Avoid chocolate, sugar, white flour, and seafood.
• To help control appearance, cleanse with a shampoo, designed to help control dandruff.
Wash the hair in vinegar, to remove all the loose scales.
• Be sure the diet includes flaxseed oil, vitamins E and A, PABA, Folic acid, B , and zinc.
6
If needed, take digestive enzymes. Also helpful are kelp, biotin, and lecithin. Eat 50-75%
raw food.
• A short fast is a good way to begin the program. Then begin eating only nutritious foods.
• Anti-microbial shampoos are often recommended, but there is no evidence that this germ-
killing factor lessens the dandruff.
• Get a detergent, such as Shaklee Basic H or Amway LOC (but not their corresponding
shampoos). Dilute (1 tbsp. to 1 cup water), and shampoo twice a week with it. This
frequently helps.
• Shampoos containing selenium sulfide can cause eye damage and hair loss.
• Plain water alone is also good.
• Pour warmed vinegar over the head, wrap in a towel, and wash off 30 minutes later.
• Do not put tar-based shampoos on your head if you have blonde hair; it will turn the hair
brown.
• A little sunlight is good for your scalp and hair.
• Keep calm and relaxed. It will help your hair.
SYMPTOMS—The greatest number of sebaceous (oil) glands are found on the face and scalp. Sebum,
the oily secretion, lubricates the hair and scalp in order to keep both soft and pliable. Excess sebum may
collect to form dandruff.
Dandruff is a covering of dead skin that prevents new hair from growing, because it cannot break
through the dead skin. A scaling or flaking of scalp cells results. It may or may not be accompanied by
itching.
CAUSES—A change in the surface cells of the scalp results in a scaling or flaking. This change is
especially keyed to nutritional deficiencies. It often occurs in those with oily skin who are prone to
develop superficial, acute, and chronic bacterial skin conditions.
There is generally excess secretion of oil by the sebaceous glands. It is this oil which binds the cells
together on the scalp. Nutritional deficiencies can cause these abnormal secretions.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mara nyingi kuna upungufu mkubwa wa B, ukosefu wa asidi muhimu ya mafuta isiyosababishwa,
na zinki.
• Kata mafuta ya ziada, grisi, na vyakula vyote vya kukaanga kutoka kwa lishe. Acha matumizi ya pombe.
Angalia kuona ikiwa una mzio wa chakula (ngano, bidhaa za maziwa, machungwa, au kitu kingine).
Epuka mafadhaiko na kuondoa vibaya. Usitumie shampoos kali, zenye kukasirisha au matibabu ya nywele.
Epuka chokoleti, sukari, unga mweupe, na dagaa.
• Kusaidia kudhibiti kuonekana, kusafisha na shampoo, iliyoundwa kusaidia kudhibiti dandruff.
Osha nywele kwenye siki, ili kuondoa mizani yote huru.
• Hakikisha lishe hiyo ni pamoja na mafuta ya kitani, vitamini E na A, PABA, asidi ya folic, B, na zinki.
6
Ikiwa inahitajika, chukua enzymes za kumengenya. Inasaidia pia ni kelp, biotin, na lecithin. Kula 50-75%
Chakula mbichi.
• Haraka fupi ni njia nzuri ya kuanza programu. Kisha anza kula vyakula vyenye lishe tu.
• Shampoos za anti-microbial mara nyingi hupendekezwa, lakini hakuna ushahidi kwamba kijidudu hiki-
Sababu ya mauaji hupunguza dandruff.
• Pata sabuni, kama vile Shaklee Basic H au Amway Loc (lakini sio sawa
shampoos). Dilute (1 tbsp. Hadi 1 kikombe cha maji), na shampoo mara mbili kwa wiki nayo. Hii
mara kwa mara husaidia.
• Shampoos zilizo na sulfidi ya seleniamu inaweza kusababisha uharibifu wa jicho na upotezaji wa nywele.
• Maji wazi peke yake pia ni nzuri.
• Mimina siki ya moto juu ya kichwa, funga kitambaa, na osha dakika 30 baadaye.
• Usiweke shampoos zenye msingi wa tar kichwani mwako ikiwa una nywele za blonde; itageuza nywele
kahawia.
• Mwangaza mdogo wa jua ni mzuri kwa ngozi yako na nywele.
• Tulia na utulivu. Itasaidia nywele zako.
Dalili -Idadi kubwa ya tezi za sebaceous (mafuta) hupatikana kwenye uso na ngozi. Sebum,
Usiri wa mafuta, husafisha nywele na ngozi ili kuweka laini na nzuri. Sebum ya ziada Mei
Kukusanya kuunda dandruff.
Dandruff ni kifuniko cha ngozi iliyokufa ambayo inazuia nywele mpya kukua, kwa sababu haiwezi kuvunja
kupitia ngozi iliyokufa. Kuongeza au kueneza kwa seli za ngozi. Inaweza au inaweza kuambatana na
kuwasha.
Sababu -mabadiliko katika seli za uso wa ngozi husababisha kuongeza au kueneza. Mabadiliko haya ni
haswa iliyowekwa kwa upungufu wa lishe. Mara nyingi hufanyika kwa wale walio na ngozi ya mafuta ambao wanakabiliwa na
Kuendeleza hali ya juu, ya papo hapo, na sugu ya ngozi ya bakteria.
Kwa ujumla kuna secretion ya ziada ya mafuta na tezi za sebaceous. Ni mafuta haya ambayo hufunga seli
pamoja kwenye ngozi. Upungufu wa lishe unaweza kusababisha siri hizi zisizo za kawaida.

title: Oily Hair
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Many of the nutritional suggestions in "Dandruff" should be considered (which see).
• Only use clear shampoos; they have less oils in them.
• Give yourself a double shampoo, with a rinse in between. After shampooing, feel your
hair; does it feel oily? This will help you know how well you are doing.
• Squeeze the juice of two lemons into a pint of water and use it as a finishing rinse. This
helps remove soap residues which tend to weigh down the hair. Or use an apple cider
vinegar rinse.
• Do not overbrush, for this carries additional oil from the roots into the hair.
SYMPTOMS—Excess amounts of oil in the hair. Redheads rarely have oily hair, blondes tend to have
it the most often.
CAUSES—The sebaceous glands produce too much oil, and there are nutritional aspects which need to
be corrected. There are as many as 140,000 oil glands on the scalp. Oil wicks into fine, straight hair the
easiest. Wiry hair tends to be the least oily.
Oil production tends to be increased by intense heat and humidity. Hormonal changes and stress can also
affect it.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mapendekezo mengi ya lishe katika "dandruff" yanapaswa kuzingatiwa (ambayo yanaona).
• Tumia shampoos wazi tu; Wana mafuta kidogo ndani yao.
• Jipe shampoo mara mbili, na suuza katikati. Baada ya shampooing, jisikie yako
nywele; Inajisikia mafuta? Hii itakusaidia kujua jinsi unavyofanya vizuri.
• Punguza juisi ya mandimu mawili ndani ya pint ya maji na utumie kama suuza kumaliza. Hii
Husaidia kuondoa mabaki ya sabuni ambayo huwa na uzito chini ya nywele. Au tumia cider ya apple
Suuza siki.
• Usizidi kupita kiasi, kwa sababu hii hubeba mafuta ya ziada kutoka kwa mizizi ndani ya nywele.
Dalili -Kuzidi kwa mafuta kwenye nywele. Redheads mara chache huwa na nywele zenye mafuta, blondes huwa nazo
Ni mara nyingi zaidi.
Sababu - tezi za sebaceous hutoa mafuta mengi, na kuna mambo ya lishe ambayo yanahitaji
kusahihishwa. Kuna tezi nyingi za mafuta kama 140,000 kwenye ngozi. Mafuta huingia ndani ya nywele laini, moja kwa moja
rahisi. Nywele za waya huelekea kuwa mafuta kidogo.
Uzalishaji wa mafuta huelekea kuongezeka kwa joto kali na unyevu. Mabadiliko ya homoni na mafadhaiko yanaweza pia
kuathiri.

title: Dry Hair
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Include enough unsaturated fatty acids in your diet (unheated vegetables oils, such as
wheat germ, flaxseed, sesame, corn, or soy oil). See suggestions under "Dry Skin."
• Do not use heat to arrange your hair. Both curling irons and electric curlers produce heat
that is too intense. Instead, women should use unheated plastic cylinder rollers.
• Dry hair tends to produce frayed ends. Snip them off about every 6 weeks or so.
• Avoid whipping winds; they also tend to fray your hair. Women do best not to swim
bareheaded; use a bathing cap. It will protect the hair. For additional protection, rub on a
little olive oil before putting on the cap.
• Shampoo with care, using only mild shampoos.
• Avoid washing the hair every night.
SYMPTOMS—Hair that is dry enough that it bothers you.
CAUSES—A dry garden needs water; dry hair does not need water, but it needs natural oils.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Jumuisha asidi ya mafuta ya kutosha katika lishe yako (mafuta ya mboga yasiyosafishwa, kama vile
Kijidudu cha ngano, kitanzi, ufuta, mahindi, au mafuta ya soya). Tazama maoni chini ya "ngozi kavu."
• Usitumie joto kupanga nywele zako. Irons zote mbili za curling na curlers za umeme hutoa joto
Hiyo ni kali sana. Badala yake, wanawake wanapaswa kutumia rollers za silinda za plastiki ambazo hazijafungwa.
• Nywele kavu huelekea kutoa ncha zilizovunjika. Waondoe karibu kila wiki 6 au zaidi.
• Epuka kupigwa upepo; Pia huwa wanapenda nywele zako. Wanawake hufanya vizuri sio kuogelea
Barehead; Tumia kofia ya kuoga. Italinda nywele. Kwa ulinzi wa ziada, kusugua a
Mafuta kidogo ya mizeituni kabla ya kuweka kwenye kofia.
• Shampoo kwa uangalifu, kwa kutumia shampoos kali tu.
• Epuka kuosha nywele kila usiku.
Dalili -her ambayo ni kavu ya kutosha kwamba inakusumbua.
Sababu -bustani kavu inahitaji maji; Nywele kavu haziitaji maji, lakini inahitaji mafuta ya asili.

title: Gray Hair
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• To restore natural color to gray hair, the following vitamins have been reported to be
successful for some people: PABA (para-aminobenzoic acid), pantothenic acid, folic acid,
along with brewer's yeast, and blackstrap molasses. Also take a good multi-vitamin/
mineral formula. Include some kelp or dulse in your diet.
SYMPTOMS—The hair is changing from its youthful color to a gray color.
CAUSES—A lack of three B complex vitamins is specific to this problem.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ili kurejesha rangi ya asili kwa nywele za kijivu, vitamini vifuatavyo vimeripotiwa kuwa
Kufanikiwa kwa watu wengine: PABA (asidi ya para-aminobenzoic), asidi ya pantothenic, asidi ya folic,
Pamoja na chachu ya Brewer, na molasses nyeusi. Pia chukua vitamini nzuri nyingi/
Mfumo wa madini. Jumuisha kelp au dulse katika lishe yako.
Dalili -Nywele zinabadilika kutoka rangi yake ya ujana hadi rangi ya kijivu.
Sababu - ukosefu wa vitamini tata tatu ni maalum kwa shida hii.
