title: Ingrown Hair
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The only practical solution is to pull it out with tweezers. Do not pull at just anything;
wait until you can actually see the hair. If necessary, place a warm compress on the area,
for a time, to help it be seen better. Then use tweezers or a sterilized needle, followed by a
dab of hydrogen peroxide on the area.
• People who find this too much of a problem might consider growing a beard. Once
established, that generally solves the problem. If beards are frowned on at your work, have
your physician write a note that it is a medical necessity for you to have one.
• Using an electric shaver is better than razors, because razors do not shave quite as close.
Razors also sharpen the hair end more, especially double track razors. If you do use a
razor, try not to shave as close.
• If your neck hairs are grown in different directions, train them to grow in only two
directions, by only shaving up and down, and not crossways.
• Women should shave their legs down, not up. Shaving upward is far more likely to cause
inward-growing hairs. This is because leg hairs grow downward.
SYMPTOMS—A hair, generally on the neck, grows down into the skin and causes irritation.
CAUSES—These tend to be caused by hairs which curl. Curly haired people are the most likely to have
this problem.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Suluhisho la vitendo tu ni kuiondoa na tweezers. Usivute kitu chochote tu;
Subiri hadi uweze kuona nywele. Ikiwa ni lazima, weka compress ya joto kwenye eneo hilo,
Kwa muda, kusaidia ionekane bora. Kisha tumia vijidudu au sindano iliyokatwa, ikifuatiwa na a
Dab ya peroksidi ya hidrojeni kwenye eneo hilo.
• Watu ambao hupata shida hii wanaweza kufikiria kukuza ndevu. Mara moja
Imara, ambayo kwa ujumla hutatua shida. Ikiwa ndevu zimekasirika kwenye kazi yako, kuwa
Daktari wako andika barua kuwa ni hitaji la matibabu kwako kuwa na moja.
• Kutumia shavu ya umeme ni bora kuliko wembe, kwa sababu wembe hazinyoa karibu kabisa.
Razors pia huongeza mwisho wa nywele zaidi, haswa mara mbili za kufuatilia. Ikiwa utatumia a
Razor, jaribu kunyoa karibu.
• Ikiwa nywele zako za shingo zimepandwa kwa mwelekeo tofauti, wafundishe kukua katika mbili tu
Maagizo, kwa kunyoa tu juu na chini, na sio njia kuu.
• Wanawake wanapaswa kunyoa miguu yao chini, sio juu. Kunyoa juu kuna uwezekano mkubwa wa kusababisha
Nywele zinazokua ndani. Hii ni kwa sababu nywele za mguu hukua chini.
Dalili -nywele, kwa ujumla kwenye shingo, hukua ndani ya ngozi na husababisha kuwasha.
Sababu - hizi huwa husababishwa na nywele ambazo zinazunguka. Watu wenye nywele zenye nywele nzuri ndio wanaoweza kuwa nao
Shida hii.

title: Farsightedness
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Maintain a nourishing diet which includes a vitamin/mineral supplement. Be sure you
are daily obtaining the entire B complex, especially B . Calcium is also important.
6
• Do not try to strain the eyes. If they seem tired or unable to focus properly, rest them
from time to time. Straining the eyes to see better only aggravates the problem.
— Also read "Eyestrain."
(Hyperopia)
SYMPTOMS—A person's distance vision is good, but his near vision is blurry.
CAUSES—The six muscles pulling on the eye do not function properly or the eyeball is abnormally
short. As a result, light rays focus behind the back wall of the eyeball, which is the retina.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kudumisha lishe yenye lishe ambayo ni pamoja na kuongeza vitamini/madini. Hakikisha wewe
Je! Kila siku hupata tata ya B, haswa b. Kalsiamu pia ni muhimu.
6
• Usijaribu kuvuta macho. Ikiwa wanaonekana wamechoka au hawawezi kuzingatia vizuri, wapumzishe
mara kwa mara. Kuweka macho kuona bora kunazidisha shida tu.
- pia soma "Eyestrain."
(Hyperopia)
Dalili - Maono ya umbali wa mtu ni nzuri, lakini maono yake ya karibu ni wazi.
Sababu - misuli sita inayovuta kwenye jicho haifanyi kazi vizuri au mpira wa macho ni wa kawaida
fupi. Kama matokeo, mionzi nyepesi inazingatia nyuma ya ukuta wa nyuma wa mpira wa macho, ambayo ni retina.

title: Amblyopia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Lack of vitamins B and B appears to be a primary cause. Smoke from cigarettes and
1 12
cigars is another significant cause. These problems need to be solved.
• B intermuscularly at a rate of 1,000 mcg/day for a total of 20,000 mcg generally solves
12
the problem, along with an adequate supply of vitamin D and calcium. But get the tobacco
out of the house and office.
— Also read "Eyestrain."
(Inability to focus eyes)
SYMPTOMS—This condition exists when the eyes do not seem to focus clearly on anything, near or
far. It can be serious enough to constitute a type of blindness.
CAUSES—Certain nutritional and environmental problems tend to be the causes.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ukosefu wa vitamini B na B unaonekana kuwa sababu ya msingi. Moshi kutoka kwa sigara na
1 12
Cigars ni sababu nyingine muhimu. Shida hizi zinahitaji kutatuliwa.
• B Intermuscularly kwa kiwango cha 1,000 mcg/siku kwa jumla ya 20,000 mcg kwa ujumla hutatua
12
Shida, pamoja na usambazaji wa kutosha wa vitamini D na kalsiamu. Lakini pata tumbaku
nje ya nyumba na ofisi.
- pia soma "Eyestrain."
(Kutokuwa na uwezo wa kuzingatia macho)
Dalili -hali hii ipo wakati macho haionekani kuzingatia wazi chochote, karibu au
mbali. Inaweza kuwa kubwa ya kutosha kuunda aina ya upofu.

title: Keratomalacia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Take vitamin A (25,000 units for children, and at least 50,000 units for adults) per day as
beta carotene. Increase the amount of zinc and protein consumption, and improve the
general nutrition. Take a vitamin/mineral supplement twice daily.
• Bitot's spots are caused by a vitamin A deficiency. Vitamin D and adequate protein are
also needed.
• Avoid eyestrain and smoke-filled rooms.
(Xerophthalmia)
SYMPTOMS—The cornea is the domed clear bulge on the front of the eye. It becomes hazy and dry,
and then ulcerated. The eyes feel extremely dry. Blinking increases, but does not seem to properly
moisten them. Conjunctivitis and night blindness occurs.
Fat-like spots (Bitot's spots) appear on the sclera (white of the eye). These are white, foamy, elevated,
and sharply outlined patches on the whites of the eyes.
CAUSES—This is a nutritional problem. If it is not solved, permanent blindness can result.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Chukua vitamini A (vitengo 25,000 kwa watoto, na angalau vitengo 50,000 kwa watu wazima) kwa siku kama
Beta Carotene. Ongeza kiwango cha matumizi ya zinki na protini, na uboresha
lishe ya jumla. Chukua nyongeza ya vitamini/madini mara mbili kila siku.
Matangazo ya Bitot husababishwa na upungufu wa vitamini A. Vitamini D na protini ya kutosha ni
Inahitajika pia.
• Epuka eyestrain na vyumba vilivyojaa moshi.
(Xerophthalmia)
Dalili -Cornea ni bulge wazi wazi mbele ya jicho. Inakuwa hazy na kavu,
na kisha ulcerated. Macho huhisi kavu sana. Blinking huongezeka, lakini haionekani vizuri
Wanyonyee. Conjunctivitis na upofu wa usiku hufanyika.
Matangazo kama mafuta (matangazo ya Bitot) yanaonekana kwenye sclera (nyeupe ya jicho). Hizi ni nyeupe, povu, zilizoinuliwa,
na viraka vilivyoainishwa vikali juu ya wazungu wa macho.
Sababu - hii ni shida ya lishe. Ikiwa haijatatuliwa, upofu wa kudumu unaweza kusababisha.

title: Night Blindness
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Get enough vitamin A (50,000 units daily) and 15-50 mg of zinc.
• Some people wear a stronger prescription of glasses when they must drive at night. Keep
the headlights and windshield clean. Do not wear sunglasses at dusk. Drive slower at
night. Better yet, only drive during the day.
SYMPTOMS—You do not see as clearly in the dark as do others. When you go out into the dark, your
eyes seem to adapt slowly to it.
CAUSES—This does not mean you are going blind. The primary problem is a lack of vitamin A, which
the body uses to make visual purple and to help you see in the dark.
The lack of vitamin A in the system can be caused by an inferior diet. But it may also be traced to one of
the following: The body has a fat malabsorption syndrome, and does not absorb oil-soluble vitamins
properly. A zinc deficiency will cause the liver to poorly convert carotene to vitamin A. Cystic fibrosis,
celiac disease, and various food allergies can produce intestinal changes which would affect fat-soluble
vitamin absorption.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Pata vitamini A (vitengo 50,000 kila siku) na 15-50 mg ya zinki.
• Watu wengine huvaa maagizo yenye nguvu ya glasi wakati lazima waendeshe usiku. Weka
Taa za kichwa na vifuniko vya vilima safi. Usivae miwani jioni. Kuendesha polepole saa
usiku. Bora zaidi, tu kuendesha tu wakati wa mchana.
Dalili -hauoni wazi gizani kama wengine. Unapoenda gizani, yako
Macho yanaonekana kuzoea polepole nayo.
Sababu - hii haimaanishi kuwa unaenda kipofu. Shida ya msingi ni ukosefu wa vitamini A, ambayo
Mwili hutumia kutengeneza zambarau ya kuona na kukusaidia kuona gizani.
Ukosefu wa vitamini A katika mfumo unaweza kusababishwa na lishe duni. Lakini pia inaweza kupatikana kwa moja ya
Ifuatayo: Mwili una dalili ya mafuta ya Malabsorption, na haitoi vitamini vyenye mumunyifu wa mafuta
vizuri. Upungufu wa zinki utasababisha ini kubadilisha vibaya carotene kuwa vitamini A. cystic fibrosis,
Ugonjwa wa celiac, na mzio anuwai wa chakula unaweza kuleta mabadiliko ya matumbo ambayo yangeathiri mumunyifu wa mafuta
Kunyonya kwa vitamini.

title: Cataracts
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Cataracts are the most common form of blindness in older people, and should not be
ignored when beginning to develop.
• Obtain adequate rest at night. Do not sit up watching television till late at night! You are
tiring your eyes and irradiating them with X rays at the same time.
• Maintain a good nutritious diet! Do not drink milk or eat cheese, ice cream, seafood, or
grease. Get enough vitamins E, C, B complex (B is very important!), selenium, zinc,
2
bioflavonoids, 1-glutamine, 1-arginine, 1-cysteine, and glutathione. If diabetes is
involved, add chromium supplementation. Avoid excess cholesterol, sorbitol (artificial
sweetener), unsaturated fatty acids, and mercury tooth fillings (amalgam).
• Higher blood sugar levels in diabetics and hypoglycemics causes the cells in the lense to
absorb large amounts of glucose. This is converted into sorbitol, an insoluble form of
sugar. This gradually crystallizes in the eye—forming a cataract.
• Take chaparral tea internally. Place a drop of honey in the corner of the eye at night.
This will help absorb the crystals.
SYMPTOMS—The lens of the eye becomes clouded, so that the eye is unable to properly focus on
objects. In advanced cases, the lens is becoming opaque, so that blindness is setting in. Only part of the
eye is generally cloudy or opaque, but this can gradually extend to the entire eye.
CAUSES—The most common cause is senility.
Congenital cataracts occur if the mother had rubella during the first three months of pregnancy, or if the
infant has galactosemia (inherited inability to digest galactose [a type of milk sugar, resulting from
lactose] properly). These cataracts generally do not get worse. Not using milk products at all can help
prevent this in adults.
Traumatic cataracts result from blows which rupture the anterior lens capsule, harmful chemicals,
intense infrared radiation, or X rays. Radiation causes free radical damage in the eyes. This causes the
lens to absorb aqueous humor. The lens becomes cloudy and must be removed, to restore eyesight.
People living closer to the South Pole (which has part of its ozone layer stripped away) are more likely
to develop cataracts.
Other causes include hypoparathyroidism, Down's syndrome, and atopic dermatitis. The longer one has
diabetes, the greater the risk of cataracts.
Hair dye has been shown to cause cataracts. Only 23% of those not dying their hair get cataracts;
whereas 89% of those who dye their hair develop them.
Complications of tumors, detached retina, iritis, glaucoma, and severe myopia can also bring it on.
Other studies reveal that people with stress, allergies, or who eat seafood (thus ingesting methylmercury)
are more likely to develop cataracts.
It is now known that a reduction in vitamin C or B in the diet can help produce cataracts. High blood
2
sugar levels and low calcium levels can also bring it on.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Cataracts ni aina ya kawaida ya upofu kwa wazee, na haipaswi kuwa
kupuuzwa wakati wa kuanza kukuza.
• Pata kupumzika kwa kutosha usiku. Usikae kutazama runinga hadi usiku sana! Wewe ni
Kuchochea macho yako na kuwasha kwa mionzi x wakati huo huo.
• Kudumisha lishe bora ya lishe! Usinywe maziwa au kula jibini, ice cream, dagaa, au
grisi. Pata vitamini vya kutosha E, C, B tata (B ni muhimu sana!), Seleniamu, zinki,
2
Bioflavonoids, 1-glutamine, 1-arginine, 1-cysteine, na glutathione. Ikiwa ugonjwa wa sukari ni
inayohusika, ongeza nyongeza ya chromium. Epuka cholesterol ya ziada, sorbitol (bandia
Utamu), asidi ya mafuta isiyo na mafuta, na kujaza jino la zebaki (amalgam).
• Viwango vya juu vya sukari ya damu katika ugonjwa wa kisukari na hypoglycemics husababisha seli kwenye lense kwenda
Inachukua kiasi kikubwa cha sukari. Hii inabadilishwa kuwa sorbitol, fomu isiyoweza
sukari. Hatua kwa hatua hulia kwa jicho -kutengeneza janga.
• Chukua chai ya chaparral ndani. Weka tone la asali kwenye kona ya jicho usiku.
Hii itasaidia kuchukua fuwele.
Dalili -lensi ya jicho inakuwa imejaa, ili jicho lishindwe kuzingatia vizuri
vitu. Katika hali ya juu, lensi inakuwa opaque, ili upofu uwe ndani. Sehemu tu ya
Jicho kwa ujumla ni mawingu au opaque, lakini hii inaweza kupanuka polepole kwa jicho lote.
Sababu - sababu ya kawaida ni senility.
Cataracts za kuzaliwa hufanyika ikiwa mama alikuwa na rubella wakati wa miezi mitatu ya kwanza ya ujauzito, au ikiwa
Mtoto ana galactosemia (kurithi kukosa uwezo wa kuchimba galactose [aina ya sukari ya maziwa, inayotokana na
lactose] vizuri). Cataracts hizi kwa ujumla hazizidi kuwa mbaya. Kutotumia bidhaa za maziwa kunaweza kusaidia
Zuia hii kwa watu wazima.
Maganda ya kiwewe hutokana na makofi ambayo hupasuka kidonge cha lensi za nje, kemikali zenye madhara,
Mionzi kubwa ya infrared, au mionzi ya x. Mionzi husababisha uharibifu wa bure machoni. Hii husababisha
Lens kuchukua ucheshi wa maji. Lens inakuwa mawingu na lazima iondolewe, ili kurejesha macho.
Watu wanaoishi karibu na Pole ya Kusini (ambayo ina sehemu ya safu yake ya ozoni iliyovutwa) wana uwezekano mkubwa
kukuza magonjwa ya paka.
Sababu zingine ni pamoja na hypoparathyroidism, ugonjwa wa Down, na dermatitis ya atopic. Mtu mrefu zaidi
ugonjwa wa sukari, hatari kubwa ya janga.
Uwezo wa nywele umeonyeshwa kusababisha magonjwa ya paka. 23% tu ya wale ambao hawakufa nywele zao wanapata magonjwa ya macho;
wakati 89% ya wale ambao nywele zao hutengeneza.
Shida za tumors, retina iliyofungiwa, iritis, glaucoma, na myopia kali pia inaweza kuileta.
Uchunguzi mwingine unaonyesha kuwa watu wenye mafadhaiko, mzio, au wanaokula dagaa (kwa hivyo kumeza methylmercury)
wana uwezekano mkubwa wa kukuza janga.
Inajulikana sasa kuwa kupunguzwa kwa vitamini C au B kwenye lishe kunaweza kusaidia kutoa magonjwa ya paka. Damu kubwa
2
Viwango vya sukari na viwango vya chini vya kalsiamu pia vinaweza kuileta.

title: Sty
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Do not delay solving this problem. If it does not quickly heal, it may need to be drained
by a professional. Do not squeeze the lump; this may result in spreading the infection
more widely. Sties can be dangerous, so do not be casual about them.
• Take adequate vitamin A; more so, if you have sties frequently. Go on a 5-day fruit fast,
plus carrot and celery juice. Keep the bowels clean with an enema every morning.
• Do not eat refined, fried, and processed foods; meats; unsaturated oils; salt; alcohol;
tobacco; dairy products; or white flour.
• Chopped and diced carrots or mashed potatoes (raw or cooked) can be made into a
poultice and applied over the area. They can be left on for an hour and repeated 3 times a
day.
• Hot compresses on the area are sometimes recommended; but keep in mind that it was a
very hot compress which blinded young Fanny Crosby.
• Partially hot compress, alternated with cold, will help draw the pus to a head and then
break it open.
• Drink 3 cups of goldenseal tea or eyebright to help clean the liver. Fennel or myrrh may
be substituted.
• In tenacious cases, antibiotics may be necessary.
SYMPTOMS—What appears to be a small pimple develops on the eyelid.
CAUSES—The oil gland has become infected, inflaming the tissues of the eyelid.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Usichelewe kutatua shida hii. Ikiwa haiponya haraka, inaweza kuhitaji kufutwa
na mtaalamu. Usichukue donge; Hii inaweza kusababisha kueneza maambukizi
zaidi. Milio inaweza kuwa hatari, kwa hivyo usiwe wa kawaida juu yao.
• Chukua vitamini A ya kutosha; Zaidi zaidi, ikiwa una milio mara kwa mara. Nenda kwenye matunda ya siku 5 haraka,
Pamoja na karoti na juisi ya celery. Weka matumbo safi na enema kila asubuhi.
• Usila vyakula vilivyosafishwa, kukaanga, na kusindika; nyama; mafuta yasiyosafishwa; chumvi; pombe;
Tumbaku; Bidhaa za maziwa; au unga mweupe.
• Karoti zilizokatwa na zilizokatwa au viazi zilizosokotwa (mbichi au zilizopikwa) zinaweza kufanywa kuwa
Poultice na kutumika juu ya eneo hilo. Wanaweza kuachwa kwa saa moja na kurudiwa mara 3 a
siku.
• Compresses moto kwenye eneo hilo wakati mwingine hupendekezwa; Lakini kumbuka kuwa ilikuwa
Compress moto sana ambayo ilipofusha kijana Fanny Crosby.
• Sehemu ya moto kidogo, iliyobadilishwa na baridi, itasaidia kuteka pus kwa kichwa na kisha
kuvunja wazi.
• Kunywa vikombe 3 vya chai ya dhahabu au macho ya macho ili kusaidia kusafisha ini. Fennel au manemane Mei
kubadilishwa.
• Katika visa vya kumi, dawa za kukinga zinaweza kuwa muhimu.
Dalili -Kile kinachoonekana kuwa pimple ndogo hua kwenye kope.
Sababu - tezi ya mafuta imeambukizwa, ikichochea tishu za kope.

title: Scotoma
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Increase the amount of vitamin A in the diet; and, of course, decidedly improve the
general diet. Throw out all junk and processed food. Obtain adequate rest at night.
SYMPTOMS—The person seems to see "spots" or a spot in front of the eyes.
CAUSES—An unnatural blind spot exists on the retina.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ongeza kiwango cha vitamini A katika lishe; Na, kwa kweli, kuboresha
lishe ya jumla. Tupa chakula chochote na kusindika chakula. Pata kupumzika kwa kutosha usiku.
Dalili -Mtu anaonekana kuona "matangazo" au mahali mbele ya macho.
Sababu - eneo lisilo la asili la kipofu lipo kwenye retina.

title: Photophobia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Take 50,000 units of vitamin A daily for a short time.
SYMPTOMS—Light hurts the eyes.
CAUSES—This may occur occasionally or gradually increase. The cause is a lack of vitamin A in the
diet.
contentSw:

• Chukua vitengo 50,000 vya vitamini A kila siku kwa muda mfupi.
Dalili -Mwangaza huumiza macho.
Sababu - hii inaweza kutokea mara kwa mara au polepole. Sababu ni ukosefu wa vitamini A katika
Lishe.

title: Chalazion
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Take vitamin A (at least 50,000 units per day, as beta carotene, for a number of days.
Also take zinc (50 mg, 3 times a day).
• Apply warm poultices of 3% boric acid on the closed lid. A boric acid ophthalmic
ointment may be obtained without prescription from the pharmacy.
SYMPTOMS—This appears to be a sty on the eyelid, but it is not. After several days, the swelling and
pain disappears, but a slow growing pea-sized nodule on the lid remains.
CAUSES—A chalazion is the result of plugged meibomian glands in the eyelid, and results from
nutritional deficiency.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Chukua vitamini A (angalau vitengo 50,000 kwa siku, kama beta carotene, kwa siku kadhaa.
Pia chukua zinki (50 mg, mara 3 kwa siku).
• Omba poultices za joto za asidi ya bori 3% kwenye kifuniko kilichofungwa. Ophthalmic ya asidi ya boric
Mafuta yanaweza kupatikana bila dawa kutoka kwa maduka ya dawa.
Dalili -Hii inaonekana kuwa laini kwenye kope, lakini sivyo. Baada ya siku kadhaa, uvimbe na
Ma maumivu hupotea, lakini kichwa cha polepole cha ukubwa wa pea kwenye kifuniko kinabaki.
Sababu -Chalazion ni matokeo ya tezi za meibomian zilizowekwa kwenye kope, na matokeo yake
Upungufu wa lishe.

title: Conjunctivitis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Apply warm poultices of 3% boric acid on the closed lid. A boric acid ophthalmic
ointment may be obtained without prescription from the pharmacy.
• Apply charcoal poultices overnight. Mix enough water in, to make a thick paste and
spread it over a piece of cloth that is larger than the inflamed area. Hold it in place with an
ace bandage and leave on overnight. Use only enough pressure to hold it in place—but not
so tight that pressure is placed on the eyeball. To avoid spreading the infection, carefully
dispose of the cloth in the morning; do not save and use it again.
• During the day, slurry charcoal water can be applied: Add ¼ tsp. salt and 1 tsp.
powdered charcoal to a cup of water, boil, let cool, and strain through several layers of
cloth.
• With a dropper, put 4-5 drops of the clear fluid on the affected eye every 2 hours.
• Wash hands carefully after each treatment.
• Do not place a patch on the eye, for it can cause bacterial infection and weaken the
eyelid (so it will later droop).
• Ice-cold compresses can be laid on the eye during the acute stage. For half an hour,
apply a wrung-out washcloth to the eye; change it every 2-3 minutes. Stop for 30-60
minutes, and then repeat for another 30 minutes.
• Hot and cold applications can be applied every 4 hours. But the water should never be
too hot (that is what blinded young Fanny Crosby). Apply a cloth wrung out of slightly
hot water for 2 minutes, then a cold cloth for 30 seconds. Do this for 15 minutes.
• Saline irrigations are also good. Add 2 level tsp. of salt to 1 quart water, to rinse
discharges out of the eyes.
PREVENTION—
• Avoid the problems noted under "Causes," above.
• When something gets in your eye; get it out. Grasping the eyelash and pulling the upper
lid over the lower lid, induces tears and helps wash out foreign bodies.
(Pinkeye)
SYMPTOMS—The membrane lining of the inner part of the eyelid becomes inflamed. The eyes may
appear swollen and bloodshot, and are often irritated and itchy. If there is pus, eyelids often stick
together after being closed for a period of time.
CAUSES—There may be a discharge from the eye. The origin may be viral if the discharge is thin and
watery. If it is white and stringy, the cause may be allergenic. If there is pus, it may be bacterial in
origin.
When caused by a virus, conjunctivitis is highly contagious. The cause is generally viral or bacterial
infection or physical or chemical injury.
Causes include injury to the eye, bacterial infection, allergens, dust, contact lens solutions, fumes,
smoke, chemicals, makeup, or other foreign substances in the eye. Be careful about swimming pool
water; it can cause eye and ear infections.
When caused by allergens, the infection may reoccur at a certain time each year. In young children "viral
conjunctivitis" can occur from spring till fall.
Viral conjunctivitis is often found among groups of school children. Conjunctivitis is the most common
form of eye infection in Western civilization.

Matibabu
• Omba poultices za joto za asidi ya bori 3% kwenye kifuniko kilichofungwa. Ophthalmic ya asidi ya boric
Mafuta yanaweza kupatikana bila dawa kutoka kwa maduka ya dawa.
• Omba poultices za mkaa mara moja. Changanya maji ya kutosha ndani, kutengeneza kuweka nene na
Kueneza juu ya kipande cha kitambaa ambacho ni kubwa kuliko eneo lililochomwa. Shika mahali na
Bandage ya Ace na kuondoka mara moja. Tumia shinikizo la kutosha tu kuishikilia mahali - lakini sio
Kwa hivyo shinikizo hilo limewekwa kwenye mpira wa macho. Ili kuzuia kueneza maambukizi, kwa uangalifu
Tupa kitambaa asubuhi; Usiokoe na utumie tena.
• Wakati wa mchana, maji ya mkaa ya kuteleza yanaweza kutumika: Ongeza ¼ tsp. Chumvi na 1 tsp.

• Na mteremko, weka matone 4-5 ya maji wazi kwenye jicho lililoathiriwa kila masaa 2.
• Osha mikono kwa uangalifu baada ya kila matibabu.
• Usiweke kiraka kwenye jicho, kwa maana inaweza kusababisha maambukizi ya bakteria na kudhoofisha
Eyelid (kwa hivyo baadaye itakuwa droop).
• Compresses za barafu-baridi zinaweza kuwekwa kwenye jicho wakati wa hatua ya papo hapo. Kwa nusu saa,
Omba kitambaa cha kuosha-nje kwa jicho; Badilisha kila dakika 2-3. Acha kwa 30-60
Dakika, na kisha kurudia kwa dakika nyingine 30.
• Maombi ya moto na baridi yanaweza kutumika kila masaa 4. Lakini maji hayapaswi kuwa kamwe
Moto sana (hiyo ndio iliyompofusha Fanny Crosby mchanga). Omba kitambaa kilichowekwa nje kidogo
Maji ya moto kwa dakika 2, kisha kitambaa baridi kwa sekunde 30. Fanya hii kwa dakika 15.
• Umwagiliaji wa saline pia ni nzuri. Ongeza kiwango cha 2 TSP. ya chumvi hadi maji 1 ya maji, suuza
hutoka nje ya macho.

• Epuka shida zilizoainishwa chini ya "sababu," hapo juu.
• Wakati kitu kinaingia kwenye jicho lako; toa nje. Kushika kope na kuvuta juu
Kifuniko juu ya kifuniko cha chini, huchochea machozi na husaidia kuosha miili ya kigeni.
(Pinkeye)
Dalili -Mchanganyiko wa membrane ya sehemu ya ndani ya kope huchomwa. Macho yanaweza
Kuonekana kuvimba na damu, na mara nyingi hukasirika na kuwasha. Ikiwa kuna pus, kope mara nyingi hushikamana
pamoja baada ya kufungwa kwa muda.
Sababu - kunaweza kuwa na kutokwa kutoka kwa jicho. Asili inaweza kuwa ya virusi ikiwa kutokwa ni nyembamba na
maji. Ikiwa ni nyeupe na kamba, sababu inaweza kuwa ya mzio. Ikiwa kuna pus, inaweza kuwa bakteria ndani
asili.
Wakati unasababishwa na virusi, conjunctivitis inaambukiza sana. Sababu kwa ujumla ni ya virusi au bakteria
kuambukizwa au kuumia kwa mwili au kemikali.
Sababu ni pamoja na kuumia kwa jicho, maambukizi ya bakteria, mzio, vumbi, suluhisho za lensi za mawasiliano, mafusho,
Moshi, kemikali, babies, au vitu vingine vya kigeni kwenye jicho. Kuwa mwangalifu juu ya bwawa la kuogelea
maji; Inaweza kusababisha maambukizo ya jicho na sikio.
Wakati unasababishwa na mzio, maambukizi yanaweza kurudi tena kwa wakati fulani kila mwaka. Katika watoto wadogo "virusi
conjunctivitis "inaweza kutokea kutoka kwa chemchemi hadi kuanguka.
Virusi conjunctivitis mara nyingi hupatikana kati ya vikundi vya watoto wa shule. Conjunctivitis ndio ya kawaida
aina ya maambukizi ya jicho katika ustaarabu wa Magharibi.

title: Glaucoma
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• There appears to be no evidence that restoration of vision, lost through glaucoma-caused
nerve degeneration, can be restored. But there are things which can be done to slow or
stop the advance of this problem.
• Dietetic problems are among the most common causes of glaucoma. This includes
overeating, eating the wrong foods, and not eating the right ones. Emphasize a raw,
vitamin C rich, diet.
• Food "allergies," eating foods which do not agree with the system, can be a frequent
cause of the disease. Do a pulse test and find out which foods may be causing you
problems. In addition, a tonometer can be purchased, which you can use to test your
eyeball pressure.
• The diet should include betaine HCl, vitamin C, a good vitamin/mineral supplement,
vitamin A, vitamin B , and nourishing, natural food—but not too much of it.
2
• Moderate, daily out-of-door, exercise helps reduce pressure.
• Warm fennel herb, alternated with chamomile and eyebright, is helpful. Apply as
eyewash in an eyecup or three drops to each eye, 3 times a day.
• If anxiety seems to be a cause, increase the B complex intake. Avoid stress, worry, fear,
and anger. Cultivate a tranquil, restful lifestyle. Great temperature changes (as found in
the north) are a source of stress.
• Higher blood sugar levels increase pressure.
• Avoid heavy lifting, pulling, etc. Avoid constipation, for straining at the stool increases
eye pressure (as does diarrhea). Maintain a slight, mild laxative effect. Avoid sitting or
standing still for long periods. Lying face down significantly increases pressure. Standing
on the hands astoundingly increases pressure.
• Increased blood pressure brings increased pressure within the eyeball. Keep your blood
pressure down!
• Do not use the eyes intensively for long periods of time (TV viewing or excessive
reading).
• Avoid coffee, tea, tobacco, alcohol, and all junk and processed foods. Smoking damages
eyes which have glaucoma. Tobacco in the system increases intraocular pressure. Avoid
spicy foods.
• Avoid excessive fluid intake (juice, water, milk, etc.) at any one time. Drink only small
amounts, and only an hour apart.
• Motion sickness medication patches increase eyeball pressure.
• Those with glaucoma do well to remain under the care of a professional. Every time the
pressure increases, a little more eyesight is permanently lost.
SYMPTOMS—Early symptoms include eye pain or discomfort mainly in the morning, blurred vision,
halos around light, inability to adjust to darker conditions, and peripheral (side) vision loss (resulting in
tunnel vision).
Higher than normal pressure within the eyeball (called intraocular pressure), it is more common in
blacks than whites, tends to run in families, is more common in women than men, and especially affects
people over 40.
CAUSES—Fluid is continually produced in the eyeball; and, just as continuously, it is draining out. The
balance is called intraocular pressure. Normal pressure is 15-20 millimeters of mercury, but glaucoma
levels may reach 40 or more. The increased pressure, unless it is relieved, will damage the optic nerve
and produce blindness. Glaucoma is the second leading cause of blindness. There are several types of
glaucoma.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Inaonekana hakuna ushahidi kwamba urejesho wa maono, uliopotea kupitia glaucoma iliyosababishwa
Upungufu wa ujasiri, unaweza kurejeshwa. Lakini kuna mambo ambayo yanaweza kufanywa polepole au
Acha mapema ya shida hii.
• Shida za lishe ni kati ya sababu za kawaida za glaucoma. Hii ni pamoja na
Kula kupita kiasi, kula vyakula vibaya, na sio kula wale sahihi. Sisitiza mbichi,
Vitamini C tajiri, lishe.
• Chakula "mzio," vyakula vya kula ambavyo havikubaliani na mfumo, vinaweza kuwa mara kwa mara
sababu ya ugonjwa. Fanya mtihani wa kunde na ujue ni vyakula gani vinaweza kukusababisha
shida. Kwa kuongezea, tonometer inaweza kununuliwa, ambayo unaweza kutumia kujaribu yako
shinikizo la mpira wa macho.
• Lishe inapaswa kujumuisha betaine HCl, vitamini C, vitamini nzuri/kuongeza madini,
Vitamini A, Vitamini B, na lishe, chakula cha asili - lakini sio sana.
2
• Wastani, kila siku nje ya mlango, mazoezi husaidia kupunguza shinikizo.
• Mimea ya joto ya joto, iliyobadilishwa na chamomile na eyebright, inasaidia. Omba kama
Macho ya macho au matone matatu kwa kila jicho, mara 3 kwa siku.
• Ikiwa wasiwasi unaonekana kuwa sababu, ongeza ulaji tata wa B. Epuka mafadhaiko, wasiwasi, hofu,
na hasira. Panda utulivu, maisha ya kupumzika. Mabadiliko makubwa ya joto (kama inavyopatikana
Kaskazini) ni chanzo cha mafadhaiko.
• Viwango vya juu vya sukari ya damu huongeza shinikizo.
• Epuka kuinua nzito, kuvuta, nk
shinikizo la jicho (kama vile kuhara). Kudumisha athari ndogo, laini ya laxative. Epuka kukaa au
Simama kwa muda mrefu. Uongo wa uso chini huongeza shinikizo. Amesimama
Kwenye mikono ya kushangaza huongeza shinikizo.
• Kuongezeka kwa shinikizo la damu huleta shinikizo kuongezeka ndani ya mpira wa macho. Weka damu yako
Shinikiza chini!
• Usitumie macho kwa muda mrefu (kutazama TV au kupita kiasi
kusoma).
• Epuka kahawa, chai, tumbaku, pombe, na vyakula vyote vya taka na kusindika. Uharibifu wa sigara
Macho ambayo yana glaucoma. Tumbaku katika mfumo huongeza shinikizo la intraocular. Epuka
vyakula vyenye viungo.
• Epuka ulaji mwingi wa maji (juisi, maji, maziwa, nk) wakati wowote. Kunywa ndogo tu
kiasi, na saa moja tu.
• Dawa za ugonjwa wa ugonjwa huongeza shinikizo la mpira wa macho.
Wale walio na glaucoma hufanya vizuri kubaki chini ya uangalizi wa mtaalamu. Kila wakati
shinikizo huongezeka, macho kidogo zaidi yamepotea kabisa.
Dalili -Dalili za kupendeza ni pamoja na maumivu ya macho au usumbufu haswa asubuhi, maono yaliyo wazi,
halos karibu na mwanga, kutoweza kuzoea hali nyeusi, na upotezaji wa maono ya pembeni (upande) (kusababisha
Maono ya handaki).
Juu kuliko shinikizo la kawaida ndani ya mpira wa macho (inayoitwa shinikizo la intraocular), ni kawaida zaidi katika
weusi kuliko wazungu, huelekea kukimbia katika familia, ni kawaida sana kwa wanawake kuliko wanaume, na huathiri haswa
watu zaidi ya 40.
Sababu -Fluid inazalishwa kila wakati kwenye mpira wa macho; Na, kama vile kuendelea, ni kutoka nje.
Mizani inaitwa shinikizo la ndani. Shinikiza ya kawaida ni milimita 15-20 za zebaki, lakini glaucoma
Viwango vinaweza kufikia 40 au zaidi. Shinikizo lililoongezeka, isipokuwa ikiwa limetulia, litaharibu ujasiri wa macho
na kutoa upofu. Glaucoma ndio sababu ya pili ya upofu. Kuna aina kadhaa za
glaucoma.

title: Anosmia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Take 30-60—generally 50 mg—of zinc, 3 times a day.
(Loss of sense of smell)
SYMPTOMS—One does not detect odors. This can occur either temporarily or regularly.
CAUSES—This occurs when one has a cold or rhinitis (nasal inflammation, resulting from colds or
allergy).
But when it is chronic, then it has one of several causes: a lack of zinc in the diet, an injury, a tumor, or a
stroke. Zinc will not help in those cases.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Chukua 30-60-jumla ya 50 mg-ya zinki, mara 3 kwa siku.
(Kupoteza hisia ya harufu)
Dalili -moja haigunduli harufu. Hii inaweza kutokea kwa muda au mara kwa mara.
Sababu -hii hufanyika wakati mtu ana baridi au rhinitis (kuvimba kwa pua, inayotokana na homa au
mzio).
Lakini wakati ni sugu, basi ina moja ya sababu kadhaa: ukosefu wa zinki katika lishe, jeraha, tumor, au a
kiharusi. Zinc haitasaidia katika kesi hizo.

title: Nasal Cuts And Infections
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS—Efforts to pick at the inside of the nose, to clean it out, will occasionally result in cuts
inside which sometimes become mildly infected for a time.
CAUSES AND TREATMENT—
• It is easy to get into a habit of picking at the nose, even when there is no reason to do so.
People sometimes feel driven to pick at the nose, imagining they will somehow make it
super clean.
• But unwashed fingers in the nose can result in cuts which infect for a day or two.
(Infection from contaminated hands is even more likely if you have a dog or cat in the
house.)
• The solution is simple enough: Routinely wash your nose out with water in the bathroom
every morning. This only takes a few seconds, but it will remove the sometimes sticky
mucous in there. The urge to afterward pick at the nose will be lessened.
• Teach yourself, whenever possible, to leave your nose alone.
contentSw:
Dalili -Inafanya kazi ya kuchagua ndani ya pua, kuisafisha, wakati mwingine itasababisha kupunguzwa
ndani ambayo wakati mwingine huambukizwa kwa upole kwa muda.
Sababu na matibabu--
• Ni rahisi kuingia katika tabia ya kuokota pua, hata wakati hakuna sababu ya kufanya hivyo.
Watu wakati mwingine huhisi kuendeshwa kuchukua pua, wakifikiria wataifanya kwa njia fulani
Safi safi.
• Lakini vidole visivyooshwa kwenye pua vinaweza kusababisha kupunguzwa ambayo huambukiza kwa siku moja au mbili.
(Maambukizi kutoka kwa mikono iliyochafuliwa ina uwezekano mkubwa ikiwa una mbwa au paka kwenye
nyumba.)
• Suluhisho ni rahisi kutosha: Osha pua yako mara kwa mara na maji bafuni
Kila asubuhi. Hii inachukua sekunde chache, lakini itaondoa wakati mwingine nata
mucous huko. Kuhimiza baadaye kuchukua pua kutapunguzwa.
• Jifunze, wakati wowote inapowezekana, kuacha pua yako peke yako.

title: Meniere'S Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• A general cleansing routine is often met with excellent results. This would include
fasting for 3-7 days on vegetable juices, which would be repeated every six weeks. In
between, a solid nutritious diet, composed of lots of vegetables, seaweed, seeds, nuts,
beans, etc., should be eaten.
• Vitamins A, B complex (including B , niacin, pantothenic acid), and especially vitamin
6
C. Calcium is also needed. A lack of manganese can cause deafness, dizziness, and ear
noises. A lack of magnesium can produce nerve twitching and sensitivity to noise.
• Drink enough water.
• Eliminate white flour products, white sugar, unsaturated fats, excess salt intake, caffeine,
nicotine, and alcohol. An oil free diet may improve circulation in the tiny capillaries.
Smoking induces constriction and spasm of the blood vessels. In one study, 9 out of 10
patients improved, when placed on a low-salt diet.
• In another study, allergies to milk, eggs, corn, wheat, and yeast sometimes caused
Meniere's. Eliminating them essentially terminated the problem. Stop using all of the
above foods; then gradually reintroduce one at a time, and see which might be bothering
you.
• Variations in glucose levels can prompt Meniere's. A New York study indicated that,
when insulin levels are normal, the patient seldom has tinnitus, vertigo, fullness in the ear,
or variable hearing loss.
• Gradually increase the amount of out-of-door exercise. Breath deeply as you do it. This
will help the circulation in the head.
• Use one bowl for hot water and one for cold, once or twice a day, and take a hot and cold
head bath. Immerse the head in the hot, for 30-60 seconds, and then plunge it into ice cold.
(If elderly, weakened, or with a heart condition, begin with less extreme temperatures.)
• Herbs which may help include cayenne, gotu kola, butcher's broom, ginkgo biloba, and
ginger.
• At the time of an attack, lying quietly on the affected side, with eyes turned in the
direction of the affected ear may help reduce the immediate crisis.
• If helping someone with this problem, let him move about at his own rate. Avoid jarring
him. When speaking to him, stand directly in front so he will not have to turn his head
(which can add to the vertigo).
—Also see "Vertigo," and "Tinnitus."
SYMPTOMS—A disease of the inner ear, characterized by recurring episodes of ringing in the ears
(tinnitus), loss of balance, and severe dizziness (vertigo). There is progressive deafness and a sensation
of fullness in the ears. Sudden movement during an attack can induce nausea and vomiting. Sometimes
there is an uncontrollable horizontal jerking of the eyeballs.
The condition may affect one or both ears. It generally occurs in adults (most often in women, 50-60
years old). The onset is sudden. It may last for hours or weeks, and then return soon again, after years. In
most instances, it is experienced only in one ear, and can result in complete deafness in that ear.
Vertigo is the sensation that the world is turning around you. Meniere's syndrome accounts for 10-15%
of all vertigo (and 5% of all dizziness).
(Also see "Vertigo.")
CAUSES—This often results from a metabolic problem, resulting from a disturbed carbohydrate
metabolism, such as is found in hypoglycemia.
Impaired blood flow to the brain may be a causative factor. Those experiencing Meniere's syndrome
often have a history of vasomotor rhinitis, ear trouble, and allergies.
Autopsies reveal an edema in the membranous labyrinth.
Other possible causes may include allergies, viruses, infections, and hormonal intolerances.
Symptoms exactly like Meniere's syndrome can be caused by a cholesteatoma. This is a tumor-like
growth in the middle ear, which gradually pushes on the central nervous system. Consulting with a
specialist might be of help in diagnosing the cause.
In some instances this is misdiagnosed; and it is actually salicylism, from excessive self-medication of
aspirin. That can also cause deafness, ringing in the ears, dizziness, headache, vomiting, confusion, and
hyperventilation in the later stages. If that is the cause, stop all taking of aspirin immediately.
Fluid retention in the semicircular canals might be putting pressure on the delicate nerves of the inner
ear.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Utaratibu wa utakaso wa jumla mara nyingi hufikiwa na matokeo bora. Hii itajumuisha
Kufunga kwa siku 3-7 kwenye juisi za mboga, ambazo zingerudiwa kila wiki sita. Katika
Kati, lishe bora ya lishe, inayojumuisha mboga nyingi, mwani, mbegu, karanga,
Maharagwe, nk, yanapaswa kuliwa.
• Vitamini A, B tata (pamoja na B, niacin, asidi ya pantothenic), na haswa vitamini
6
C. Kalsiamu pia inahitajika. Ukosefu wa manganese unaweza kusababisha viziwi, kizunguzungu, na sikio
kelele. Ukosefu wa magnesiamu inaweza kutoa mishipa ya ujasiri na usikivu kwa kelele.
• Kunywa maji ya kutosha.
• Ondoa bidhaa nyeupe za unga, sukari nyeupe, mafuta yasiyosafishwa, ulaji wa chumvi nyingi, kafeini,
nikotini, na pombe. Lishe ya bure ya mafuta inaweza kuboresha mzunguko katika capillaries ndogo.
Uvutaji sigara husababisha muundo na spasm ya mishipa ya damu. Katika utafiti mmoja, 9 kati ya 10
Wagonjwa waliboresha, wakati wamewekwa kwenye lishe ya chumvi kidogo.
• Katika utafiti mwingine, mzio wa maziwa, mayai, mahindi, ngano, na chachu wakati mwingine husababishwa
Meniere. Kuwaondoa kimsingi kumalizika shida. Acha kutumia yote
juu ya vyakula; Kisha hatua kwa hatua kuunda tena kwa wakati mmoja, na uone ambayo inaweza kuwa inasumbua
wewe.
• Tofauti katika viwango vya sukari zinaweza kuchochea meniere. Utafiti wa New York ulionyesha kuwa,
Wakati viwango vya insulini ni kawaida, mgonjwa huwa na tinnitus, vertigo, utimilifu katika sikio,
au upotezaji wa kusikia.
• Hatua kwa hatua kuongeza kiwango cha mazoezi ya nje ya mlango. Pumua kwa undani unapoifanya. Hii
itasaidia mzunguko katika kichwa.
• Tumia bakuli moja kwa maji ya moto na moja kwa baridi, mara moja au mbili kwa siku, na uchukue moto na baridi
Umwagaji wa kichwa. Ingiza kichwa kwenye moto, kwa sekunde 30-60, na kisha uingie kwenye baridi ya barafu.
(Ikiwa wazee, dhaifu, au kwa hali ya moyo, anza na joto kali.)
• Mimea ambayo inaweza kusaidia kujumuisha Cayenne, Gotu Kola, ufagio wa Mchinjaji, Ginkgo Biloba, na
Tangawizi.
• Wakati wa shambulio, amelala kimya kwa upande ulioathirika, na macho yamegeuka katika
Miongozo ya sikio iliyoathirika inaweza kusaidia kupunguza shida ya haraka.
• Ikiwa kumsaidia mtu aliye na shida hii, wacha aendelee kwa kiwango chake mwenyewe. Epuka kugongana
yeye. Wakati wa kuzungumza naye, simama moja kwa moja mbele ili asibidi kugeuza kichwa chake
(ambayo inaweza kuongeza kwenye vertigo).
-Unaona "Vertigo," na "Tinnitus."
Dalili -Ugonjwa wa sikio la ndani, linaloonyeshwa na sehemu za kurudia za masikioni
(tinnitus), upotezaji wa usawa, na kizunguzungu kali (vertigo). Kuna viziwi vinavyoendelea na hisia
ya utimilifu katika masikio. Harakati za ghafla wakati wa shambulio zinaweza kusababisha kichefuchefu na kutapika. Wakati mwingine
Kuna usawa usioweza kudhibitiwa wa macho.
Hali inaweza kuathiri masikio moja au yote mawili. Kwa ujumla hufanyika kwa watu wazima (mara nyingi katika wanawake, 50-60
umri wa miaka). Mwanzo ni ghafla. Inaweza kudumu kwa masaa au wiki, na kisha kurudi hivi karibuni tena, baada ya miaka. Katika
Matukio mengi, hupatikana katika sikio moja tu, na inaweza kusababisha viziwi kamili katika sikio hilo.
Vertigo ni hisia kwamba ulimwengu unakuzunguka. Akaunti ya ugonjwa wa Meniere kwa 10-15%
ya vertigo yote (na 5% ya kizunguzungu).
(Pia angalia "Vertigo.")
Sababu - hii mara nyingi hutokana na shida ya kimetaboliki, inayotokana na wanga uliovurugika
Metaboli, kama vile hupatikana katika hypoglycemia.
Mtiririko wa damu ulioharibika kwa ubongo inaweza kuwa sababu ya sababu. Wale wanaopata ugonjwa wa Meniere
Mara nyingi huwa na historia ya vasomotor rhinitis, shida ya sikio, na mzio.
Autopsies zinaonyesha edema katika maabara ya utando.
Sababu zingine zinazowezekana zinaweza kujumuisha mzio, virusi, maambukizo, na uvumilivu wa homoni.
Dalili haswa kama ugonjwa wa Meniere zinaweza kusababishwa na cholesteatoma. Hii ni tumor-kama
Ukuaji katika sikio la kati, ambalo polepole husukuma kwenye mfumo mkuu wa neva. Kushauriana na a
Mtaalam anaweza kuwa msaada katika kugundua sababu.
Katika visa vingine hii imetambuliwa vibaya; Na kwa kweli ni salicylism, kutoka kwa dawa ya kibinafsi ya
aspirini. Hiyo inaweza pia kusababisha viziwi, kupigia masikioni, kizunguzungu, maumivu ya kichwa, kutapika, machafuko, na
hyperventilation katika hatua za baadaye. Ikiwa hiyo ndio sababu, acha kuchukua yote ya aspirini mara moja.
Uhifadhi wa maji kwenye mifereji ya semicircular inaweza kuwa kuweka shinikizo kwenye mishipa dhaifu ya ndani
sikio.

title: Tinnitus
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Surgical success rates are very low. Beware of "tinnitus maskers." These products can
cause hearing loss.
• Do the pulse test to check on problem foods. Have a hair analysis made. Find the cause
and eliminate it. A 1981 medical study pointed to coffee, tea, tonic water, red wine, grain-
based spirits, chocolate, and cheese as the most common dietary causes of tinnitus.
• Mix 1 tsp. salt and 1 tsp. glycerin in 1 pint warm water. Several times a day, using a
nasal sprayer, spray each nostril until it begins draining into the back of the throat; also
spray the throat.
• Get a nourishing diet, and include trace minerals (Norwegian kelp or Nova Scotia dulse),
vitamin A, calcium, magnesium, and betaine HCl.
• A lack of manganese can cause deafness, dizziness, and ear noises. A lack of magnesium
can produce nerve twitching and sensitivity to noise.
• Changing and correcting the diet, reducing stress, and getting more exercise out-of-doors
has been helpful in dealing with tinnitus. Stress causes more adrenaline to be produced
which, in turn, constricts blood vessels and keeps waste products from being as quickly
eliminated.
• Remember that fatigue increases the problem. An important help is to go to bed and get
up on a regular, healthful, schedule.
• Avoid loud noises and noisy situations. Alcohol makes tinnitus worse. Caffeine is a
common cause. Marijuana and cocaine intensify the problem. Aspirin is a known cause of
tinnitus, also blood pressure and arthritis drugs. Also beware of steroids, anticonvulsive
medications, vasodilators, and anticholesterol drugs. Nicotine damages the hearing.
• Make sure the colon is working well. An enema will help with this.
• Worthwhile herbs would include bugleweed, garlic, gotu kola, cayenne, and prickly ash.
—Also see "Meniere's Disease."
SYMPTOMS—Sounds in the ear: ringing; whistling; roaring; hissing; chirping; buzzing; and whining
cricket sounds, when there is no outside physical source for these sounds. At first, they come and go; in
advanced stages, the sound is constant. No one else hears them.
There are reported instances in which others have heard the sounds from as much as 4 feet from the
person's ear. "Tinnitus," in Latin, means "to tinkle," or a "bell-like ring."
The frequency of tinnitus increases with age. The left ear seems to produce the sounds more often than
the right ear. About 75% of deaf people report tinnitus.
CAUSES—There are several possible causes, including an irritation of nerve endings in the ear by loud
noises. Chemicals and drugs can injure the internal ear. Prescription drugs can produce tinnitus or
hearing loss (beware of quinine and aspirin). Nicotine constricts blood vessels and may be the cause.
Other causes are lead; aluminum; mercury poisoning; impacted wax; hormonal problems; high blood
pressure; severe blows to the head; anemia; perforation of the tympanic membrane; fluid in the middle
ear; epilepsy; migraine; food allergy; Meniere's disease; hypothyroidism; multiple sclerosis; as well as
repeated and prolonged exposure to loud noises. Whatever the cause, stress sometimes adds to it.
Tinnitus is not a sign of a more serious problem or a precursor of any serious disease—unless it is
associated with Meniere's Disease (which see).
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Viwango vya mafanikio ya upasuaji ni chini sana. Jihadharini na "Tinnitus Maskers." Bidhaa hizi zinaweza
kusababisha upotezaji wa kusikia.
• Fanya mtihani wa mapigo ili kuangalia vyakula vya shida. Kuwa na uchambuzi wa nywele uliofanywa. Pata sababu
na kuiondoa. Utafiti wa matibabu wa 1981 ulionyesha kahawa, chai, maji ya tonic, divai nyekundu, nafaka-
Mizimu ya msingi, chokoleti, na jibini kama sababu za kawaida za lishe ya tinnitus.
• Changanya 1 tsp. Chumvi na 1 tsp. glycerin katika maji 1 ya joto. Mara kadhaa kwa siku, ukitumia a
Sprayer ya pua, nyunyiza kila pua hadi inapoanza kuzama nyuma ya koo; pia
Nyunyiza koo.
• Pata lishe yenye lishe, na ni pamoja na madini ya kuwafuata (Kelp ya Norway au Nova Scotia Dulse),
Vitamini A, Kalsiamu, Magnesiamu, na Betaine HCl.
• Ukosefu wa manganese unaweza kusababisha viziwi, kizunguzungu, na kelele za sikio. Ukosefu wa magnesiamu
Inaweza kuzalisha kupunguka kwa ujasiri na usikivu kwa kelele.
• Kubadilisha na kusahihisha lishe, kupunguza mafadhaiko, na kupata mazoezi zaidi nje ya milango
imekuwa msaada katika kushughulika na tinnitus. Dhiki husababisha adrenaline zaidi kuzalishwa
ambayo, kwa upande wake, inajumuisha mishipa ya damu na inazuia bidhaa taka kutoka kwa haraka
kuondolewa.
Kumbuka kuwa uchovu huongeza shida. Msaada muhimu ni kwenda kulala na kupata
juu kwa ratiba ya kawaida, yenye afya,.
• Epuka kelele kubwa na hali ya kelele. Pombe hufanya tinnitus kuwa mbaya zaidi. Caffeine ni
sababu ya kawaida. Marijuana na cocaine huongeza shida. Aspirin ni sababu inayojulikana ya
Tinnitus, pia shinikizo la damu na dawa za arthritis. Pia jihadharini na steroids, anticonvulsive
Dawa, vasodilators, na dawa za anticholesterol. Nikotini huharibu usikilizaji.
• Hakikisha koloni inafanya kazi vizuri. Enema itasaidia na hii.
• Mimea yenye thamani ingejumuisha Bugleweed, vitunguu, Gotu Kola, Cayenne, na Ash ya Prickly.
-Unaona "Ugonjwa wa Meniere."
Dalili -husikika kwenye sikio: kupigia; filimbi; kunguruma; hissing; chirping; buzzing; na kunung'unika
Kriketi inasikika, wakati hakuna chanzo cha nje cha mwili kwa sauti hizi. Mwanzoni, wanakuja na kwenda; katika
Hatua za hali ya juu, sauti ni ya mara kwa mara. Hakuna mtu mwingine anayesikia.
Kuna matukio yaliyoripotiwa ambayo wengine wamesikia sauti kutoka kwa miguu kama 4 kutoka
sikio la mtu. "Tinnitus," kwa Kilatini, inamaanisha "kunyoosha," au "pete ya kengele."
Frequency ya tinnitus huongezeka na umri. Sikio la kushoto linaonekana kutoa sauti mara nyingi zaidi kuliko
sikio la kulia. Karibu 75% ya watu viziwi wanaripoti tinnitus.
Sababu - kuna sababu kadhaa zinazowezekana, pamoja na kuwasha kwa miisho ya ujasiri kwenye sikio kwa sauti kubwa
kelele. Kemikali na dawa zinaweza kuumiza sikio la ndani. Dawa za kuagiza zinaweza kutoa tinnitus au
Upotezaji wa kusikia (Jihadharini na Quinine na Aspirini). Nikotini inaangazia mishipa ya damu na inaweza kuwa sababu.
Sababu zingine zinaongoza; aluminium; sumu ya zebaki; nta iliyoathiriwa; shida za homoni; damu kubwa
shinikizo; Pigo kali kwa kichwa; anemia; utakaso wa membrane ya tympanic; maji katikati
sikio; kifafa; migraine; Allergy ya Chakula; Ugonjwa wa Meniere; hypothyroidism; Multiple sclerosis; vile vile
kurudiwa na kufichuliwa kwa muda mrefu kwa kelele kubwa. Kwa sababu yoyote, mkazo wakati mwingine huongeza kwake.
Tinnitus sio ishara ya shida kubwa zaidi au mtangulizi wa ugonjwa wowote mbaya - isipokuwa
kuhusishwa na ugonjwa wa Meniere (ambao unaona).

title: Pharyngitis
contentEn:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., Formulas)
(1) ACUTE FORM —
DIETARY FACTORS—Rest in bed, keep room at a uniform temperature. Eat a spare diet, consisting
chiefly of fruits. Avoid meats of all sorts. Copious water drinking.
GENERAL CARE—Hot Blanket Pack; sweating Wet Sheet Pack; Steam Bath; Radiant Heat Bath; Hot
Full Bath, followed by Dry Pack or other sweating procedures once daily, followed by Cold Mitten
Friction, Cold Wet Sheet Rub, or Cold Douche. Fomentation to the throat 3 times daily; Cold Compress
between, changed every 15-30 minutes. Enema, if bowels are inactive. Hot gargle every few minutes if
throat is very sensitive. Ice Bag to throat if inflammation is intense. Inhalation of soothing vapors; use of
steam inhaler for 10-14 minutes, hourly or almost continuously. If the tonsil suppurates (it oozes pus), it
should be lanced. See your doctor.
(2) CHRONIC FORM —
CLERGYMAN'S SORE THROAT DIETARY AND LIFESTYLE—Aseptic dietary; out-of-door
life; open-air gymnastics; swimming.
GENERAL CARE—Fomentations to the throat at bedtime, followed by throat pack (Cold Compress)
during the night; hot gargle, 3 times a day. Radiant Heat Bath; sweating Wet Sheet Pack; Steam Bath or
other sweating bath, 3 times weekly, followed by suitable cold application. Daily Cold Bath on rising.
Moist Abdominal Bandage to be worn during the night. If necessary, remove tonsils and vegetations in
throat or postnasal region.
contentSw:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., formula)
(1) fomu ya papo hapo -
Sababu za lishe -kupumzika kitandani, weka nafasi kwa joto la sare. Kula lishe ya vipuri, iliyo na
Hasa ya matunda. Epuka nyama ya kila aina. Kunywa maji mengi.
Utunzaji wa jumla -Hifadhi blanketi; jasho la karatasi ya mvua; Umwagaji wa mvuke; Bafu ya joto ya radi; Moto
Umwagaji kamili, ukifuatiwa na pakiti kavu au taratibu zingine za jasho mara moja kila siku, ikifuatiwa na baridi kali
Friction, karatasi baridi ya mvua kusugua, au douche baridi. Fomentation kwa koo mara 3 kila siku; Compress baridi
Kati, ilibadilika kila dakika 15-30. Enema, ikiwa matumbo hayafanyi kazi. Moto moto kila dakika chache ikiwa
Koo ni nyeti sana. Mfuko wa barafu kwa koo ikiwa uchochezi ni mkubwa. Kuvuta pumzi ya mvuke ya kutuliza; matumizi ya
Mvuke inhaler kwa dakika 10-14, saa au karibu kila wakati. Ikiwa tonsil inachukua (inaongeza pus), ni
inapaswa kuwa na taa. Tazama daktari wako.
(2) fomu sugu -
Mchungaji wa koo la mchungaji na mtindo wa maisha -lishe; nje ya mlango
maisha; Gymnastics ya wazi-hewa; kuogelea.
Utunzaji wa Jumla -Kujitokeza kwa koo wakati wa kulala, ikifuatiwa na pakiti ya koo (compress baridi)
Wakati wa usiku; Moto moto, mara 3 kwa siku. Bafu ya joto ya radi; jasho la karatasi ya mvua; Umwagaji wa mvuke au
Umwagaji mwingine wa jasho, mara 3 kila wiki, ikifuatiwa na matumizi mazuri ya baridi. Umwagaji baridi wa kila siku juu ya kuongezeka.
Bandage ya tumbo yenye unyevu kuvikwa wakati wa usiku. Ikiwa ni lazima, ondoa tonsils na mimea ndani
koo au mkoa wa postnasal.

title: Snoring
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Sleep on your side; not on your back. One method which works fine is to sew a tennis
ball into the middle of the back of your pajamas. When you roll onto it in your sleep, you
will quickly roll off again—and there will be no snoring.
• Pillows tend to elevate your head and increase snoring.
• Put blocks under the front legs of your bed, and elevate the entire upper part of your
body. This will reduce snoring.
• Losing weight tends to lessen the snoring. The more overweight a person is, the more
likely he or she will snore.
• Alcoholic drinkers and smokers tend to snore more than other people. Sleeping pills also
increase it.
• Snoring can develop as a result of allergies, during or following hay fever time, or after
colds.
• Tell your spouse to shake you when you snore. That will wake you enough that you will
stop.
• Buy your spouse ear plugs to wear at night.
SYMPTOMS—Wheezing, sighing noises made through the mouth while a person is sleeping. It drives
everyone else to distraction, except the one making the noise. The tissue in the upper airway in the back
of the throat relaxes during sleep, and breathing in causes it to vibrate.
CAUSES—Snoring generally occurs while sleeping on the back. The mouth falls open and the singing
begins.
Men snore much more often (71% of men) than women (51% of women). Most snorers are middle-aged,
overweight men.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kulala upande wako; Sio mgongoni mwako. Njia moja ambayo inafanya kazi vizuri ni kushona tenisi
Mpira katikati ya nyuma ya pajamas yako. Unapoingia kwenye usingizi wako, wewe
Tutaondoka haraka tena - na hakutakuwa na snoring.
• Mito huwa na kuinua kichwa chako na kuongeza snoring.
• Weka vizuizi chini ya miguu ya mbele ya kitanda chako, na kuinua sehemu nzima ya juu ya yako
mwili. Hii itapunguza snoring.
• Kupoteza uzito huelekea kupunguza snoring. Mtu mzito zaidi, zaidi
Labda yeye atapiga.
• Wanywaji wa vileo na wavutaji sigara huwa wanapiga zaidi kuliko watu wengine. Vidonge vya kulala pia
ongeza.
• Kupunguza kunaweza kukuza kama matokeo ya mzio, wakati au kufuata wakati wa homa ya nyasi, au baada ya
homa.
• Mwambie mwenzi wako akutikisike wakati unapiga. Hiyo itakuamsha vya kutosha kwamba utafanya
Acha.
• Nunua plugs za sikio la mwenzi wako kuvaa usiku.
Dalili -kuzidi, na kuugua kelele zilizotengenezwa kupitia mdomo wakati mtu amelala. Inaendesha
Kila mtu mwingine kwa kuvuruga, isipokuwa yule anayefanya kelele. Tishu kwenye njia ya juu ya hewa nyuma
ya koo hupumzika wakati wa kulala, na kupumua kwa sababu husababisha kutetemeka.
Sababu -Snoring kwa ujumla hufanyika wakati wa kulala nyuma. Mdomo huanguka wazi na kuimba
huanza.
Wanaume hupiga mara nyingi zaidi (71% ya wanaume) kuliko wanawake (51% ya wanawake). Snorers nyingi ni za kati,
wanaume wazito.

title: Bruxism
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• You may find that the solution is simply to stop chewing during the day when you do not
need to. Do not chew gum. Do not chew bits of food after the meal is ended. When you
are not eating to swallow food, do not chew. This simple rule has totally eliminated the
bruxism problem for many people. It can do it for you also.
If you will carefully think about it, you will find that chewing, as a leisure time activity, is
not relaxing; it actually makes one nervous. Once you fix the habit of unnecessarily
chewing during the day, it can easily be repeated at night.
• Throughout the day, keep your mouth relaxed. Do not clamp your teeth together; do not
grind. If you control yourself during the day, you will soon automatically be doing it at
night also.
• Hypoglycemia can be a factor. When a person has low blood sugar, he is more likely to
clench and grind his teeth.
• Some people find it necessary to wear a splint while sleeping.
• Do not drink alcoholic beverages. They contribute to tooth grinding.
—See "Temporomandibular Joint Syndrome." If bruxism is not eliminated, it can lead to TMJ, and you
do not want that to happen!
(Teeth Grinding)
SYMPTOMS—Unconscious grinding of the teeth together, often while asleep.
CAUSES—Bruxism can wear down the teeth, loosen them, and even contribute to receding gums; so it
is a condition you want to stop.
The experts tell us it is caused by stress, anxiety, anger, sensitivity of the teeth to heat and cold, and
fluctuations in blood sugar levels.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Unaweza kugundua kuwa suluhisho ni kuacha kutafuna wakati wa mchana wakati haufanyi
haja ya. Usitafute gum. Usitafute chakula baada ya chakula kumalizika. Wakati wewe
sio kula kumeza chakula, usitafute. Sheria hii rahisi imeondoa kabisa
Shida ya Bruxism kwa watu wengi. Inaweza kukufanyia pia.
Ikiwa utafikiria kwa uangalifu juu yake, utapata kutafuna, kama shughuli ya wakati wa burudani, ni
sio kupumzika; Kwa kweli hufanya mtu kuwa na neva. Mara tu unaporekebisha tabia ya bila lazima
Kutafuna wakati wa mchana, inaweza kurudiwa kwa urahisi usiku.
• Siku nzima, weka mdomo wako tena. Usishike meno yako pamoja; usifanye
saga. Ikiwa unajidhibiti wakati wa mchana, hivi karibuni utakuwa unafanya moja kwa moja
usiku pia.
• Hypoglycemia inaweza kuwa sababu. Wakati mtu ana sukari ya chini ya damu, ana uwezekano mkubwa wa
cuse na kusaga meno yake.
• Watu wengine huona ni muhimu kuvaa splint wakati wa kulala.
• Usinywe vileo. Wanachangia kusaga jino.
-Tazama "ugonjwa wa pamoja wa temporomandibular." Ikiwa Bruxism haijaondolewa, inaweza kusababisha TMJ, na wewe
hawataki hiyo kutokea!
(Kusaga meno)
Dalili -Kusaga kwa meno pamoja, mara nyingi wakati wa kulala.
Sababu -Bruxism inaweza kuvaa meno, kuifungua, na hata kuchangia kupungua ufizi; Kwa hivyo
ni hali unayotaka kuacha.
Wataalam wanatuambia inasababishwa na mafadhaiko, wasiwasi, hasira, usikivu wa meno kwa joto na baridi, na
Kushuka kwa viwango vya sukari ya damu.

title: Calculus
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Brush with fresh strawberries. Place a strawberry on the toothbrush and brush as usual.
• Brush with charcoal powder.
• Clean your teeth after every meal.
• Polish them with baking soda. Many of the stains are acid in nature, and the soda
neutralizes and removes them.
• Rinse the food from your mouth after each meal.
• An electric toothbrush removes more plaque than regular brushing.
• Keep in mind that hard brushing can scratch your tooth enamel. The super-whitening
tooth abrasives take off even more. Be careful. You want white teeth, but you also want
teeth.
• Since we are on the subject of ruining your teeth, an excellent way to melt your teeth is
to drink cola drinks. They contain phosphoric acid, which has a double whammy effect on
your poor teeth! The acid melts your alkaline teeth; and the phosphorous immediately
locks into the calcium melted off, and carries it away. Place a tooth in Coca Cola, and it
will be gone in a short time.
(Tartar; Stained Teeth)
SYMPTOMS—The teeth are darker and more yellow than they should be.
CAUSES—The actual color of teeth is not white, but light yellow. But, as one ages, his teeth tend to
become somewhat darker and more yellow.
Coffee and cigarettes are a primary cause of tooth staining. Stop using them both and you will look
much prettier. You will feel better too.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Brashi na jordgubbar safi. Weka sitirishi kwenye mswaki na brashi kama kawaida.
• Brashi na poda ya mkaa.
• Safisha meno yako baada ya kila mlo.
• Wapepeli na soda ya kuoka. Madoa mengi ni asidi katika maumbile, na soda
haitoi na kuiondoa.
• Suuza chakula kutoka kinywani mwako baada ya kila mlo.
• Mswaki wa umeme huondoa jalada zaidi kuliko brashi ya kawaida.
• Kumbuka kwamba brashi ngumu inaweza kupiga enamel yako ya jino. Nyeupe-nyeupe
Abrasives ya jino huondoa zaidi. Kuwa mwangalifu. Unataka meno meupe, lakini pia unataka
meno.
• Kwa kuwa tuko kwenye mada ya kuharibu meno yako, njia bora ya kuyeyuka meno yako ni
kunywa vinywaji vya cola. Zina asidi ya fosforasi, ambayo ina athari ya mara mbili juu ya
meno yako duni! Asidi huyeyuka meno yako ya alkali; na phosphorous mara moja
Kufunga ndani ya kalsiamu kuyeyuka, na kuibeba. Weka jino katika coca cola, na hiyo
itakuwa imeenda kwa muda mfupi.
(Tartar; meno yaliyowekwa))
Dalili -Meno ni nyeusi na manjano zaidi kuliko inavyopaswa kuwa.
Sababu - rangi halisi ya meno sio nyeupe, lakini njano nyepesi. Lakini, kama umri mmoja, meno yake huwa
Kuwa mweusi na manjano zaidi.
Kofi na sigara ni sababu ya msingi ya madoa ya meno. Acha kuzitumia zote mbili na utaangalia
Mzuri zaidi. Utajisikia vizuri pia.

title: Gingivitis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Begin taking more calcium. Get more sunshine or take supplemental vitamin D. Building
the bones from within is the best way. If your teeth are having trouble, the other bones in
your body, although hidden, probably are also. You do not want a fractured hip later.
• Eat a nourishing diet. Include raw fruit and vegetables. They help exercise your teeth and
gums. They also help clean your teeth.
• Stop using nicotine and alcohol. They remove vitamins and minerals from your body.
• Fill an ear syringe (a rubber bulb with a long nose) with water and hose out your mouth.
Massage the gums at least once a day; better yet, massage after every meal when you
brush your teeth.
• Massage the gumline with a little baking soda on your finger, dipped in water.
• Brush the teeth carefully after each meal. Use a soft toothbrush and do it gently.
Otherwise you will make scratches on the enamel.
Alternate between two toothbrushes, so each one can dry out before it is used again.
• Soak the toothbrushes in hydrogen peroxide once a week. This kills bacteria buildup.
• Brush carefully at the gumline.
• An electric toothbrush is said to eliminate 98% of the plaque; whereas a regular
toothbrush is said to remove only 48%.
• Floss your teeth faithfully as needed.
(Receding Gums, Bleeding Gums)
SYMPTOMS—The gums swell and get red. Cleaning the teeth makes them bleed.
CAUSES—The gums pull away from the teeth. This is an early sign of periodontal disease (which see).
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Anza kuchukua kalsiamu zaidi. Pata jua zaidi au chukua jengo la ziada la vitamini D.
Mifupa kutoka ndani ndiyo njia bora. Ikiwa meno yako yana shida, mifupa mingine ndani
Mwili wako, ingawa umefichwa, labda pia ni. Hautaki kiboko kilichovunjika baadaye.
• Kula lishe yenye lishe. Jumuisha matunda na mboga mbichi. Wanasaidia kutumia meno yako na
ufizi. Pia husaidia kusafisha meno yako.
Acha kutumia nikotini na pombe. Wao huondoa vitamini na madini kutoka kwa mwili wako.
• Jaza sindano ya sikio (balbu ya mpira na pua ndefu) na maji na toa kinywa chako.
Massage ufizi angalau mara moja kwa siku; Bora zaidi, massage baada ya kila mlo wakati wewe
Brashi meno yako.
• Massage gumline na soda kidogo ya kuoka kwenye kidole chako, imewekwa ndani ya maji.
• Brashi meno kwa uangalifu baada ya kila mlo. Tumia mswaki laini na ufanye kwa upole.
Vinginevyo utafanya mikwaruzo kwenye enamel.
Mbadala kati ya mswaki mbili, kwa hivyo kila moja inaweza kukauka kabla ya kutumiwa tena.
• Loweka mswaki katika peroksidi ya hidrojeni mara moja kwa wiki. Hii inaua ujenzi wa bakteria.
• Brashi kwa uangalifu kwenye gumline.
• mswaki wa umeme unasemekana kuondoa 98% ya jalada; wakati wa kawaida
mswaki unasemekana kuondoa 48%tu.
• Bonyeza meno yako kwa uaminifu kama inahitajika.
(Kupunguza ufizi, ufizi wa kutokwa na damu)
Dalili -Ufizi hua na kuwa nyekundu. Kusafisha meno huwafanya watoke damu.
Sababu - ufizi huondoa kutoka kwa meno. Hii ni ishara ya mapema ya ugonjwa wa muda (ambao unaona).

title: Pyorrhea
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• It is known that inadequate nutrition, wrong foods, consumption of sugar, high
phosphorous foods, smoking, drugs, excessive alcohol, chronic illness, and hormonal
disorders make an individual more susceptible to periodontal disease. Smokers have twice
the risk of gum disease. Laboratory animals given high sugar diets revealed a decrease in
bone volume. These problems should, if possible, be corrected.
• Calcium, copper, and vitamins D and C are needed for good strong teeth. Folic acid,
niacin, bioflavonoids are also needed. As a rule, take care of the teeth, and the gums will
take care of themselves. Nourish the teeth with calcium and vitamin D.
• Emotional stress is known to decrease the body's ability to resist gum disease. Exercise
neutralizes stress and encourages healthy gums.
• Open a capsule of vitamin E and rub the oil on inflamed gums, to aid in healing.
• A powerful aid in stopping gum infection is to brush the teeth twice a day with powdered
charcoal.
• If gum inflammation is present, run very hot water over the toothbrush, to soften it up
before using it.
• Put goldenseal powder in the mouth to help eliminate the infection. But do not take
goldenseal internally for more than a week at a time. (Too much can harm lactobacillus in
the bowel.) Do not use it during pregnancy.
• Diabetes and certain blood disorders put a person at greater risk of developing
periodontal disease.
• Warm chamomile tea may be used as a soothing mouthwash after each brushing. Do not
add sugar or milk to the tea.
Note: Sores under the tongue can be an early sign of mouth cancer. But if you do not smoke or chew
tobacco, you are unlikely to ever have that problem.
—Also see "Gingivitis" for the other half of this periodontal problem.
(Periodontal Disease, Gum Disease)
SYMPTOMS—The gums become inflamed, extend to the ligaments and bones that hold the teeth in
place, and eventually the teeth loosen and fall out.
CAUSES—Periodontal means "located around a tooth," and refers to any problems in the gums or other
supporting structures of the teeth. It is also called pyorrhea, or gum disease. Gingivitis (which see) is
inflammation of the gums, an early stage of periodontal disease.
The explanation given by many medical-dental professionals for periodontal disease is that plaque
(sticky deposits of mucous, food particles, and bacteria) adheres to the teeth and gradually accumulates.
This plaque causes the gums to become infected and swollen. That infection (called gingivitis), leads to
pyorrhea (also called periodontitis) in which the bone underlying the teeth is eroded away by the
infection.
The other explanation is that much of what is known as pyorrhea is primarily caused by an inadequate
intake of calcium, copper, vitamins D and C; by the eating of processed, and junk, food; and by erosion
of acids, placed in the mouth. Smoking, stress, and wrong diet are other crucial factors.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Inajulikana kuwa lishe duni, vyakula vibaya, matumizi ya sukari, juu
Vyakula vya phosphorous, sigara, dawa za kulevya, pombe kupita kiasi, ugonjwa sugu, na homoni
Shida hufanya mtu kuwa mtu anayehusika zaidi na ugonjwa wa muda. Wavutaji sigara wana mara mbili
hatari ya ugonjwa wa fizi. Wanyama wa maabara waliopewa chakula cha sukari nyingi walifunua kupungua kwa
kiasi cha mfupa. Shida hizi zinapaswa, ikiwezekana, kusahihishwa.
• Kalsiamu, shaba, na vitamini D na C zinahitajika kwa meno mazuri yenye nguvu. Asidi ya folic,
niacin, bioflavonoids pia inahitajika. Kama sheria, utunzaji wa meno, na ufizi utafanya
Jitunze. Kulisha meno na kalsiamu na vitamini D.
• Dhiki ya kihemko inajulikana kupunguza uwezo wa mwili kupinga ugonjwa wa ufizi. Zoezi
hupunguza mafadhaiko na inahimiza ufizi wenye afya.
• Fungua kifungu cha vitamini E na kusugua mafuta kwenye ufizi uliochomwa, ili kusaidia katika uponyaji.
• Msaada wenye nguvu katika kuzuia maambukizi ya ufizi ni kunyoa meno mara mbili kwa siku na unga
mkaa.
• Ikiwa uchochezi wa fizi upo, endesha maji ya moto sana juu ya mswaki, ili kuipunguza
kabla ya kuitumia.
• Weka poda ya dhahabu kinywani ili kusaidia kuondoa maambukizi. Lakini usichukue
Goldenseal ndani kwa zaidi ya wiki kwa wakati mmoja. (Sana inaweza kumdhuru Lactobacillus ndani
Bowel.) Usitumie wakati wa ujauzito.
• Ugonjwa wa sukari na shida fulani za damu huweka mtu katika hatari kubwa ya kuendeleza
Ugonjwa wa mara kwa mara.
• Chai ya chamomile ya joto inaweza kutumika kama kinywa cha kutuliza baada ya kila brashi. Usifanye
Ongeza sukari au maziwa kwenye chai.
Kumbuka: vidonda chini ya ulimi inaweza kuwa ishara ya mapema ya saratani ya kinywa. Lakini ikiwa hautavuta sigara au kutafuna
Tumbaku, hauwezekani kuwa na shida hiyo.
-Unaona "gingivitis" kwa nusu nyingine ya shida hii ya muda.
(Ugonjwa wa Kipindi, Ugonjwa wa Gum)
Dalili -ufizi huchomwa, huenea kwa mishipa na mifupa ambayo inashikilia meno ndani
Mahali, na mwishowe meno hufunguliwa na kuanguka.
Sababu -za kawaida inamaanisha "iko karibu na jino," na inahusu shida zozote kwenye ufizi au zingine
miundo inayounga mkono ya meno. Pia huitwa pyorrhea, au ugonjwa wa fizi. Gingivitis (ambayo huona) ni
Kuvimba kwa ufizi, hatua ya mapema ya ugonjwa wa muda.
Maelezo yaliyotolewa na wataalamu wengi wa matibabu ya matibabu kwa ugonjwa wa muda ni kwamba jalada
(Amana za nata za mucous, chembe za chakula, na bakteria) hufuata meno na hujilimbikiza polepole.
Jalada hili husababisha ufizi kuambukizwa na kuvimba. Maambukizo hayo (inayoitwa gingivitis), husababisha
pyorrhea (pia huitwa periodontitis) ambayo mfupa ulio chini ya meno hutolewa mbali na
maambukizi.
Maelezo mengine ni kwamba mengi ya yale yanayojulikana kama pyorrhea husababishwa na kutosheleza
ulaji wa kalsiamu, shaba, vitamini D na C; kwa kula ya kusindika, na chakula, chakula; na kwa mmomomyoko
ya asidi, iliyowekwa kinywani. Uvutaji sigara, mafadhaiko, na lishe mbaya ni sababu zingine muhimu.

title: Denture Troubles
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS—Loose-fitting dentures; dentures which may hurt the gums when chewing; dentures
which cause difficulty in speaking properly.
CAUSES—Dentures are false teeth. The professional explanation for the problem is that the wearers do
not take proper care of them, and that the gums periodically change shape, etc.
There is another, less-known, reason: When the decision is made to extract teeth and fit an individual for
dentures, the teeth are pulled out and the molds prepared for the false teeth. The entire process is done as
quickly as possible, so teeth will appear to be in the mouth again as soon as possible. In addition, it is a
convenience to the dentist to take the molds the same day that the extractions were done.
But when the extractions are made, the gums understandably swell! A number of sizeable wounds have
been made in the mouth, and the gums are swollen and inflamed. That is not the time to take the molds.
Instead, the person should wait at least one week for the gums to heal and readjust into their normal post-
dental sizes and shapes. Then those molds should be made.
If your dentist tells you that you need all your teeth pulled out, discuss the matter with him and perhaps
check with another dentist or two. Very often only certain teeth need be removed and a bridge can be
installed, which locks onto the teeth which remain. This is far better than wearing dentures. Do all you
can to keep your teeth.
LIVING WITH DENTURES—
• Practice speaking. By yourself, read aloud from books and learn how to articulate
vowels, consonants, and various combinations.
• Temporary denture adhesives may be necessary when you are first getting used to your
new dentures. But you should not need to rely on adhesives all the time. The dentures
should fit properly. Do not let the dentist take molds too soon.
• When you can, take out the dentures so the gums can rest.
• Begin by eating soft foods, and gradually get used to chewing with dentures.
• After each meal, scrub the dentures with soap and lukewarm water. Wash your gums
gently with a soft toothbrush, to remove the plaque.
• Massage your gums every day. Place your index finger over the outside of the gums,
another finger over the inside portion, and rub back and forth.
• Rinse your mouth each day with warm water mixed with a tsp. of salt.
contentSw:
Dalili-meno yanayofaa kwako; meno ambayo yanaweza kuumiza ufizi wakati wa kutafuna; meno
ambayo husababisha ugumu wa kuongea vizuri.
Sababu -densi ni meno ya uwongo. Maelezo ya kitaalam kwa shida ni kwamba wavaaji hufanya
usitunze, na kwamba ufizi hubadilisha sura mara kwa mara, nk.
Kuna sababu nyingine, isiyojulikana, wakati uamuzi unafanywa ili kutoa meno na kutoshea mtu binafsi kwa
Meno, meno hutolewa nje na ukungu zilizoandaliwa kwa meno ya uwongo. Mchakato mzima unafanywa kama
Haraka iwezekanavyo, kwa hivyo meno yataonekana kuwa kinywani tena haraka iwezekanavyo. Kwa kuongeza, ni
Urahisi kwa daktari wa meno kuchukua ukungu siku ile ile ambayo viongezeo vilifanywa.
Lakini wakati viongezeo vinafanywa, ufizi unaeleweka! Majeraha kadhaa makubwa yana
imetengenezwa kinywani, na ufizi umevimba na umechomwa. Huo sio wakati wa kuchukua ukungu.
Badala yake, mtu huyo anapaswa kusubiri angalau wiki moja kwa ufizi kupona na kurekebisha katika chapisho lao la kawaida-
ukubwa wa meno na maumbo. Halafu ukungu hizo zinapaswa kufanywa.
Ikiwa daktari wako wa meno atakuambia kuwa unahitaji meno yako yote kutolewa, jadili suala hilo na yeye na labda
Angalia na daktari mwingine wa meno au mbili. Mara nyingi tu meno fulani yanahitaji kuondolewa na daraja linaweza kuwa
Imewekwa, ambayo hufunga kwenye meno ambayo yanabaki. Hii ni bora zaidi kuliko kuvaa meno. Fanya yote
inaweza kuweka meno yako.
Kuishi na meno-
• Fanya mazoezi ya kuongea. Na wewe mwenyewe, soma kwa sauti kutoka kwa vitabu na ujifunze jinsi ya kuelezea
vokali, konsonanti, na mchanganyiko mbali mbali.
• Adhesives ya meno ya muda inaweza kuwa muhimu wakati unazoea kwanza kwako
meno mapya. Lakini haupaswi kuhitaji kutegemea wambiso wakati wote. Meno
inapaswa kutoshea vizuri. Usiruhusu daktari wa meno achukue ukungu mapema sana.
• Wakati unaweza, chukua meno ili ufizi uweze kupumzika.
• Anza kwa kula vyakula laini, na polepole huzoea kutafuna na meno.
• Baada ya kila mlo, futa meno na sabuni na maji vuguvugu. Osha ufizi wako
Kwa upole na mswaki laini, kuondoa jalada.
• Massage ufizi wako kila siku. Weka kidole chako cha index nje ya ufizi,
Kidole kingine juu ya sehemu ya ndani, na kusugua na kurudi.
• Suuza mdomo wako kila siku na maji ya joto yaliyochanganywa na TSP. ya chumvi.

title: Saliva Problems
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS—Not enough saliva, causing a dry-mouth condition. Or too much saliva.
SOLUTIONS—
• Without proper saliva, you cannot absorb your food properly, for digestion begins in the
mouth. Always chew carbohydrate ("starchy") foods especially well. This includes such
things as bread and all grain products, potatoes, etc.
• The chewing gum habit is not good. It overworks your salivary glands when they should
be resting.
• If you have a dry mouth, take a little lemon juice or honey before the meal to stimulate
the flow of saliva. If you are not obtaining enough vitamin A, your saliva flow may be
inadequate.
• If you seem to have too much saliva, drink a tea of one of the following: white oak bark,
goldenseal root, or bayberry.
—Important: You may have Sjogren's Syndrome (which see).
contentSw:
Dalili-sio mshono wa kutosha, na kusababisha hali ya kinywa kavu. Au mshono mwingi.
Suluhisho-
• Bila mshono sahihi, huwezi kuchukua chakula chako vizuri, kwa kuwa digestion huanza kwenye
mdomo. Daima kutafuna vyakula vya wanga ("wanga") vizuri. Hii ni pamoja na vile
Vitu kama mkate na bidhaa zote za nafaka, viazi, nk.
• Tabia ya kutafuna sio nzuri. Inazidi tezi zako za mshono wakati zinapaswa
kupumzika.
• Ikiwa una mdomo kavu, chukua maji kidogo ya limao au asali kabla ya chakula ili kuchochea
mtiririko wa mshono. Ikiwa hautapata vitamini A ya kutosha, mtiririko wako wa mshono unaweza kuwa
haitoshi.
• Ikiwa unaonekana kuwa na mshono mwingi, kunywa chai ya moja ya yafuatayo: gome la mwaloni mweupe,
Mizizi ya Goldenseal, au Bayberry.
-Una muhimu: Unaweza kuwa na ugonjwa wa Sjogren (ambao unaona).
