title: Halitosis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Brush your teeth after each meal. Use dental floss.
• Brush the tongue carefully. It often has food particles and bacteria, and needs cleaning.
• Drink more water. Dehydration often causes bad breath, especially first thing in the
morning. Saliva does not flow during sleep, so no mouth cleaning occurs at night.
• Eat parsley. Other chlorophyll-containing foods are also good for your breath.
• Take charcoal by mouth. Let them dissolve slowly in the mouth.
• Go on a five-day raw food diet, during which 50% of what you eat is raw. This will help
clean out your system.
• Apples, carrots, celery, etc., are excellent for cleaning out your mouth at the close of a
meal. They remove odor-causing bacteria from the mouth.
• Outdoor exercise will bring more oxygen into the lungs and help clean out the system,
reducing bad breath.
• In the lives of many, gum disease is a major cause of bad breath. (See "Gingivitis and
Periodontal Disease.") Place goldenseal over the infected gums or mouth sores. Do this
for 3 days, to help heal the gums.
• Far less likely, mouth breathing may cause bad breath. Yet, for many, the advantages of
mouth breathing (obtaining more oxygen than otherwise could be done) outweighs the
possible disadvantages.
• Sinus infection produces a discharge with a bad odor. If you have sinus trouble, this may
be the cause of your bad breath.
• Do not eat spicy foods.
• Meat eating can produce bad breath, both because of the particles left in the mouth and
because of later indigestion.
• Cheese and fish both cause bad breath.
• Yes, there is garlic, but it is such a powerful germ killer that you may need to take it
anyway.
• Drinking coffee, beer, wine, or whiskey are excellent ways to have bad breath. Water is
the best liquid for your body.
• Use myrrh, rosemary, or peppermint to brush your teeth and rinse your mouth.
• Avoid foods that get stuck between the teeth too easily.
• Avoid foods that are too likely to cause tooth decay, such as meat, candies, and sticky
sweets.
• Instances have been reported of food allergies having caused bad breath. Search out the
foods you are allergic to, and avoid them. (See Allergies.)
• Avoid constipation.
• In cases of bad breath caused by stomach problems, thyme tea can be helpful.
• Boil your toothbrush each month or buy a new one. Bacteria grow on the toothbrush.
Rinse it with hydrogen peroxide occasionally during the month.
• Chew fennel or anise seeds after eating an odorous meal.
• Do not use commercial mouthwashes. They irritate the mouth more than they solve any
problems. All they have is alcohol, dye, and flavoring.
Bad breath may be a sign of an underlying health problem.
—See "Gingivitis and Periodontal Disease."
(Bad Breath)
SYMPTOMS—The breath has an unpleasant odor.
CAUSES—Touch the back of your hand with your tongue, and then smell it. This is a simple test which
may tell you something you need to know.
Not caring for your teeth properly, brushing them can be a primary cause. But tooth decay, indigestion,
improper diet, gum disease, constipation, inadequate digestion of proteins, infection in the nose or
throat, poorly functioning liver, stress, or heavy metal buildup can also be major problems.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Brashi meno yako baada ya kila mlo. Tumia floss ya meno.
• Brashi ulimi kwa uangalifu. Mara nyingi huwa na chembe za chakula na bakteria, na inahitaji kusafisha.
• Kunywa maji zaidi. Upungufu wa maji mwilini mara nyingi husababisha pumzi mbaya, haswa jambo la kwanza katika
Asubuhi. Saliva haina mtiririko wakati wa kulala, kwa hivyo hakuna kusafisha kinywa kinachotokea usiku.
• Kula parsley. Vyakula vingine vyenye chlorophyll pia ni nzuri kwa pumzi yako.
• Chukua mkaa kwa mdomo. Wacha wafute polepole kinywani.
• Nenda kwenye lishe ya chakula mbichi ya siku tano, wakati 50% ya kile unachokula ni mbichi. Hii itasaidia
Safisha mfumo wako.
• Maapulo, karoti, celery, nk, ni bora kwa kusafisha mdomo wako karibu na
chakula. Wao huondoa bakteria inayosababisha harufu kutoka kinywani.
• Zoezi la nje litaleta oksijeni zaidi ndani ya mapafu na kusaidia kusafisha mfumo,
kupunguza pumzi mbaya.
• Katika maisha ya wengi, ugonjwa wa fizi ni sababu kubwa ya pumzi mbaya. (Tazama "Gingivitis na
Ugonjwa wa mara kwa mara. ") Weka Goldenseal juu ya ufizi ulioambukizwa au vidonda vya mdomo. Fanya hivi
kwa siku 3, kusaidia kuponya ufizi.
• Uwezo mdogo sana, kupumua kwa mdomo kunaweza kusababisha pumzi mbaya. Walakini, kwa wengi, faida za
kupumua kwa mdomo (kupata oksijeni zaidi kuliko vinginevyo kunaweza kufanywa) kunazidisha
hasara zinazowezekana.
• Maambukizi ya Sinus hutoa kutokwa na harufu mbaya. Ikiwa una shida ya sinus, hii inaweza
Kuwa sababu ya pumzi yako mbaya.
• Usila vyakula vyenye viungo.
• Kula nyama kunaweza kutoa pumzi mbaya, zote kwa sababu ya chembe zilizoachwa kinywani na
Kwa sababu ya kumeza baadaye.
• Jibini na samaki wote husababisha pumzi mbaya.
• Ndio, kuna vitunguu, lakini ni muuaji mwenye nguvu sana kwamba unaweza kuhitaji kuichukua
hata hivyo.
• Kunywa kahawa, bia, divai, au whisky ni njia bora za kuwa na pumzi mbaya. Maji ni
kioevu bora kwa mwili wako.
• Tumia manemane, rosemary, au peppermint kunyoa meno yako na suuza mdomo wako.
• Epuka vyakula ambavyo hukwama kati ya meno kwa urahisi sana.
• Epuka vyakula ambavyo vinaweza kusababisha kuoza kwa meno, kama nyama, pipi, na nata
Pipi.
• Matukio yameripotiwa juu ya mzio wa chakula umesababisha pumzi mbaya. Tafuta
Vyakula ambavyo una mzio, na uepuke. (Tazama mzio.)
• Epuka kuvimbiwa.
• Katika hali ya pumzi mbaya inayosababishwa na shida za tumbo, chai ya thyme inaweza kusaidia.
• Chemsha mswaki wako kila mwezi au ununue mpya. Bakteria hukua kwenye mswaki.
Suuza na peroksidi ya hidrojeni mara kwa mara wakati wa mwezi.
• Chew fennel au mbegu za anise baada ya kula chakula cha harufu.
• Usitumie midomo ya kibiashara. Wao hukasirisha mdomo kuliko vile wanavyotatua yoyote
shida. Wote wanayo ni pombe, nguo, na ladha.
Pumzi mbaya inaweza kuwa ishara ya shida ya kiafya.
-Tazama "gingivitis na ugonjwa wa muda."
(Pumzi mbaya)
Dalili -pumzi ina harufu mbaya.
Sababu -angalia nyuma ya mkono wako na ulimi wako, na kisha uivute. Huu ni mtihani rahisi ambao
Inaweza kukuambia kitu unahitaji kujua.
Kutokujali meno yako vizuri, kuyanyonya inaweza kuwa sababu ya msingi. Lakini kuoza kwa meno, kumeza,
Lishe isiyofaa, ugonjwa wa ufizi, kuvimbiwa, digestion isiyo ya kutosha ya protini, maambukizi kwenye pua au
Throat, ini inayofanya kazi vibaya, mafadhaiko, au ujenzi mzito wa chuma pia inaweza kuwa shida kubwa.

title: Cheilosis
contentEn:
(Angular Stomatitis; Geographic Tongue)
SYMPTOMS—Cracks appear in the corners of the mouth and in the (nasolabial) corners of the nose.
On the top and sides of the tongue are irregular, denuded areas that appear very smooth. Geographic
tongue is not painful, and the sense of taste may, or may not, be affected.
CAUSES AND TREATMENT—This is a nutritional problem.
• The cracks are caused by a vitamin B (riboflavin) deficiency.
2
• The geographic tongue means you are not absorbing B , B , B , B , folic acid, or zinc
3 6 5 12
properly. The cause is frequently malabsorption from celiac disease-like changes in the
small intestine.
• Do a series of pulse tests (which see) to determine the foods you may be allergic to.
Avoid those allergens; take supplementary vitamins and minerals, especially B ; the entire
2
B complex; and zinc. Also take betaine HCL before each meal.
contentSw:
(Angular stomatitis; lugha ya kijiografia)
Dalili -Uwezo huonekana kwenye pembe za mdomo na kwenye pembe (za nasolabial) za pua.
Juu na pande za ulimi ni zisizo za kawaida, maeneo yaliyowekwa wazi ambayo yanaonekana kuwa laini sana. Kijiografia
Ulimi sio chungu, na hali ya ladha inaweza, au inaweza kuathiriwa.
Sababu na matibabu - hii ni shida ya lishe.
• Nyufa husababishwa na upungufu wa vitamini B (riboflavin).
2
• Ulimi wa kijiografia unamaanisha kuwa hauingii B, B, B, B, asidi ya folic, au zinki
3 6 5 12
vizuri. Sababu mara nyingi ni malabsorption kutoka kwa mabadiliko kama ugonjwa wa celiac katika
utumbo mdogo.
• Fanya mfululizo wa vipimo vya mapigo (ambayo huona) kuamua vyakula ambavyo unaweza kuwa mzio.
Epuka mzio huo; Chukua vitamini na madini ya ziada, haswa b; nzima
2
B tata; na zinki. Pia chukua betaine HCl kabla ya kila mlo.

title: Hiccup
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• A high blood carbon-dioxide level is known to stifle hiccups. A well-known procedure is
to breathe into a paper bag. Blow in and out exactly 10 times, and do it very hard until you
are red in the face. You must do it fast, and you must form a good seal around the bag so
no air gets in.
Hold your breath as long as you can, and then swallow when you think a hiccup is
coming. Do that 2-3 times. Then take a deep breath and begin again.
• Hold your breath in for as long as possible, then exhale and hold that as long as possible.
• Blow air out in a slow, steady stream.
• Hold your breath, while extending your head as far backward as you can.
• Swallow a teaspoonful of sugar, dry. It often stops the hiccups in minutes. The sugar in
the mouth probably sends different signals along the nerve routes, interfering with the
hiccups.
• Close your mouth, hold your nose and ears closed with your fingers and thumbs, and
swallow 3 times before you let go. This creates a slight vacuum and changes the rhythm of
the diaphragm enough to bring relief.
• Chew and swallow ice for 10-15 minutes.
• Stand behind the person as he sits on a chair. Grasp the neck gently with your fingers
and, with the thumbs, slowly massage down each side of the spinous process.
• Fill a glass of water, bend over forward, and drink the water upside down.
• Apply pressure with the flat of the hand, just below the breastbone.
• Take a deep breath and drink 10 swallows of water while not breathing.
• Put ice on the neck.
• Drink catnip tea.
• Place light fingertip pressure on each side of the neck, for about a minute.
• When you are eating, just be quiet and eat, and you are not likely to get hiccups.
• Take exactly 10 sips of water in rapid succession.
• A sneeze sometimes stops the hiccups.
• Have someone pull on your tongue.
• Lie on the left side for 10-15 minutes.
• Stand on your head.
• Swallow crushed ice.
• Deep breathing.
• Have someone massage your feet.
• Drink a half glassful of fresh orange juice.
• Take a hot bath for 15 minutes.
• Place an ice bag to the pit of the stomach.
• Bend at the waist, to touch the toes, and hold this position for about 60 seconds. This
method is useful for both adults and children.
• When children run around and play, sometimes one ends up with the hiccups. When that
happens, try tickling him while he holds his breath, and tell him to try real hard not to
laugh. He will forget about the hiccups.
• In case you have hiccups which will not stop, go on a 3 day complete fast.
(Hiccough)
SYMPTOMS—Hiccups that you want to have stopped.
CAUSES—Charles Osborne of Anthon, Iowa, started hiccuping in 1922 and hiccuped for the next 65
years. After 430 million hiccups, he passed away.
Almost all hiccups are one-sided; that is, only one side of the diaphragm contracts. Overeating or
excessive drinking is the most common cause. It causes the stomach to extend downward and press
against the diaphragm—which then starts its hiccuppy motions.
A hiccup is a repeated involuntary spasmodic contraction of the diaphragm, immediately followed by a
sudden closure of the glottis.
But that information does not help solve the problem. Here is advice that may. All of these methods
really work for some people. See what is best for you. (You will notice that these techniques are
frequently based on diverting attention, changing the ongoing physical hiccup pattern, and getting the
body to do something different for a few moments.)
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kiwango cha juu cha kaboni-dioksidi hujulikana kuzuia hiccups. Utaratibu unaojulikana ni
Kupumua ndani ya begi la karatasi. Piga ndani na nje mara 10, na ufanye kwa bidii sana mpaka wewe
ni nyekundu usoni. Lazima ufanye haraka, na lazima upange muhuri mzuri karibu na begi ili hivyo
Hakuna hewa inayoingia.
Shikilia pumzi yako kwa muda mrefu iwezekanavyo, na kisha kumeza wakati unafikiria hiccup ni
Kuja. Fanya hivyo mara 2-3. Kisha chukua pumzi nzito na uanze tena.
• Shika pumzi yako kwa muda mrefu iwezekanavyo, kisha exhale na ushikilie hiyo kwa muda mrefu iwezekanavyo.
• Piga hewa nje katika mkondo wa polepole, thabiti.
• Shika pumzi yako, wakati ukipanua kichwa chako nyuma kama unavyoweza.
• Kumeza kijiko cha sukari, kavu. Mara nyingi huzuia hiccups katika dakika. Sukari ndani
Kinywa labda hutuma ishara tofauti kwenye njia za ujasiri, kuingilia kati na
Hiccups.
• Funga mdomo wako, shikilia pua na masikio yako yaliyofungwa na vidole vyako na vidole, na
Swallow mara 3 kabla ya kuacha. Hii inaunda utupu kidogo na inabadilisha wimbo wa
diaphragm ya kutosha kuleta unafuu.
• Chew na kumeza barafu kwa dakika 10-15.
• Simama nyuma ya mtu wakati anakaa kwenye kiti. Shika shingo kwa upole na vidole vyako
Na, na viwiko, polepole chini kila upande wa mchakato wa spinous.
• Jaza glasi ya maji, piga mbele, na unywe maji chini.
• Omba shinikizo na gorofa ya mkono, chini ya mfupa wa kifua.
• Chukua pumzi ya kina na kunywa maji 10 ya maji wakati sio kupumua.
• Weka barafu kwenye shingo.
• Kunywa chai ya paka.
• Weka shinikizo la kidole nyepesi kila upande wa shingo, kwa dakika moja.
• Unapokula, tu kimya na kula, na hauwezi kupata hiccups.
• Chukua sips 10 haswa za maji mfululizo.
• Wakati mwingine kupiga chafya huzuia hiccups.
• Kuwa na mtu kuvuta ulimi wako.
• Uongo upande wa kushoto kwa dakika 10-15.
• Simama kichwani mwako.
• Kumeza barafu iliyokandamizwa.
• Kupumua kwa kina.
• Kuwa na mtu misanya miguu yako.
• Kunywa nusu ya glasi ya juisi safi ya machungwa.
• Chukua umwagaji moto kwa dakika 15.
• Weka begi la barafu kwenye shimo la tumbo.
• Piga kiuno, kugusa vidole, na ushikilie msimamo huu kwa sekunde 60. Hii
Njia ni muhimu kwa watu wazima na watoto.
• Wakati watoto wanazunguka na kucheza, wakati mwingine mtu huishia na hiccups. Wakati hiyo
hufanyika, jaribu kumtia wasiwasi wakati anashikilia pumzi yake, na kumwambia ajaribu sana
kucheka. Atasahau juu ya hiccups.
• Ikiwa utapata hiccups ambazo hazitasimama, nenda kwa siku 3 kamili haraka.
(Hiccough)
Dalili -hiccups ambazo unataka kuwa zimesimama.
Sababu -Charles Osborne wa Anthon, Iowa, alianza hiccuping mnamo 1922 na Hiccuped kwa 65 ijayo
miaka. Baada ya hiccups milioni 430, alikufa.
Karibu hiccups zote ni upande mmoja; Hiyo ni, upande mmoja tu wa mikataba ya diaphragm. Kuzidisha au
Kunywa kupita kiasi ndio sababu ya kawaida. Inasababisha tumbo kupanuka chini na bonyeza
dhidi ya diaphragm - ambayo huanza mwendo wake wa hiccuppy.
Hiccup ni contraction ya mara kwa mara ya spasmodic ya diaphragm, ikifuatiwa mara moja na a
kufungwa ghafla kwa glottis.
Lakini habari hiyo haisaidii kutatua shida. Hapa kuna ushauri ambao unaweza. Njia hizi zote
Kazi kweli kwa watu wengine. Tazama kilicho bora kwako. (Utagundua kuwa mbinu hizi ni
mara kwa mara kulingana na kugeuza umakini, kubadilisha muundo unaoendelea wa hiccup, na kupata
mwili kufanya kitu tofauti kwa muda mchache.)

title: Belching
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Make a habit of not gulping down air as you eat. Just thinking about being more careful
will help a lot.
• Chew with your mouth closed, and do not talk while you are eating.
• Do not eat foods which produce gas, such as beans, carbonated drinks, and beer.
• Do not drink out of cans, bottles, or through a straw.
• Avoid foods with high air content. This includes ice cream, beer, omelets, and whipped
cream.
—Also see "Bloating."
(Eructation)
SYMPTOMS—Burping up air from the stomach.
CAUSES—Belching is most frequently caused by bringing up air that was swallowed with the food and
drink taken in. This is called aerophagia.
We normally have about a cupful of air in our stomach all the time. Every day, we swallow air and make
some in our stomach (about 10 cupfuls in 24 hours). Because this is 9 cupfuls too many, we belch
occasionally.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Fanya tabia ya kutotuliza hewa wakati unakula. Kufikiria tu juu ya kuwa mwangalifu zaidi
itasaidia sana.
• Chew na mdomo wako umefungwa, na usizungumze wakati unakula.
• Usila vyakula ambavyo hutoa gesi, kama vile maharagwe, vinywaji vyenye kaboni, na bia.
• Usinywe nje ya makopo, chupa, au kupitia majani.
• Epuka vyakula vyenye hali ya hewa ya juu. Hii ni pamoja na ice cream, bia, omelets, na kuchapwa
cream.
-Unaona "Bloating."
(Ujenzi)
Dalili -Kuongeza hewa kutoka tumboni.
Sababu -Kuvunja husababishwa mara nyingi kwa kuleta hewa ambayo ilimezwa na chakula na
Kunywa kuchukuliwa. Hii inaitwa aerophagia.
Kawaida tunayo juu ya kikombe cha hewa ndani ya tumbo letu wakati wote. Kila siku, tunameza hewa na kutengeneza
Baadhi ya tumbo letu (karibu vikombe 10 kwa masaa 24). Kwa sababu hii ni vikombe 9 vingi sana, sisi hua
mara kwa mara.

title: Bloating
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• You may wish to take 1 oz of oral hydrogen peroxide (20 drops/oz) twice a day, along
with colloidal minerals, betaine HCl (hydrochloride), and pancreatic enzymes, 75-200 mg,
three times a day. Take this 15 minutes before mealtime.
• Instead of that, you can take lemon juice and water before each meal. In your stomach,
the lemon juice will act similarly to that of HCl.
• At the time of the bloating, this can be done: If the bloating is in the stomach, seat the
person upright, apply heat over the stomach. Have him sip hot water.
• If the bloating is in the intestines, have him lie down for a half hour before, and after,
meals. Give no fluids with meals, but hot water may be sipped afterward. If needed, give
an enema.
• Avoid gas-producing foods, such as beans, cabbage, other members of the cabbage
family, and whole wheat flour products.
• To reduce gas-causing sulfur compounds in beans (garbanzo, pinto, navy, etc.), use the
following cooking method: Place 1 cup of beans in 5 cups of water and bring to a boil.
Boil for one minute. Then drain the beans and add 5 cups of fresh water. Bring the water
to a boil and continue cooking the beans according to directions.
• Avoid lactose. Eating dairy foods can produce gas in the large bowels.
• It is possible to eat too much fiber at a time. This can induce some bloating.
• Take charcoal, to help reduce the gas. The charcoal will adsorb it and carry it off.
Activated charcoal is best.
• People who sigh often swallow air.
• Avoid tight belts and tight-fitting clothes. Those who do not wear belts and girdles have
less indigestion.
• Do not postpone bowel movements.
• Avoid drinking at water fountains. You can hardly drink at one without gulping down
air.
• A low-fat diet helps reduce carbon-dioxide production in the top (duodenal) area of the
small intestines.
• Artificial sweeteners produce gas.
• Drink enough water. A dry mouth encourages swallowing.
• Avoid repetitive belching, for you tend to swallow more air than you release.
• Both chewing gum and smoking increase the swallowing of air.
• Carbonated drinks (beer, champagne, soft drinks) and foods with whipped air cause
more food to be ingested.
• Avoid drinking with meals.
• To expel excess air, rock back and forth in the knee-chest position.
—Also see "Stomach Distension, Gaseous," "Belching," "Achlorhydria," "Dyspepsia," and "Colic in
Children."
(Flatulence; Gas)
SYMPTOMS—There is an excess of gas in the stomach. The stomach (or intestines) seems to be too
full.
CAUSES—Bloating is the accumulation of gas in the stomach, intestines, or bowels. Normally the
stomach is sterile because of the acid environment. But when it does not contain enough hydrochloric
acid ("Achlorhydria," which see), bacteria from the small intestine migrates up into the stomach.
Arriving there, it ferments the carbohydrates and sugars which are there. This produces gas or, what is
called, bloat.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Unaweza kutamani kuchukua oz 1 ya peroksidi ya hidrojeni ya mdomo (matone 20/oz) mara mbili kwa siku, pamoja
Na madini ya colloidal, betaine HCl (hydrochloride), na enzymes za kongosho, 75-200 mg,
mara tatu kwa siku. Chukua dakika hii 15 kabla ya wakati wa kula.
• Badala ya hiyo, unaweza kuchukua maji ya limao na maji kabla ya kila mlo. Katika tumbo lako,
Juisi ya limao itafanya sawa na ile ya HCl.
• Wakati wa kutokwa na damu, hii inaweza kufanywa: ikiwa bloating iko tumboni, kiti cha
mtu wima, tumia joto juu ya tumbo. Acha maji ya moto.
• Ikiwa bloating iko kwenye matumbo, umwombee chini kwa nusu saa kabla, na baada,
milo. Usitoe maji na milo, lakini maji ya moto yanaweza kunywa baadaye. Ikiwa inahitajika, toa
enema.
• Epuka vyakula vinavyotengeneza gesi, kama vile maharagwe, kabichi, washiriki wengine wa kabichi
familia, na bidhaa nzima ya unga wa ngano.
• Kupunguza misombo ya kiberiti inayosababisha gesi katika maharagwe (garbanzo, pinto, navy, nk), tumia
Kufuatia njia ya kupikia: Weka kikombe 1 cha maharagwe katika vikombe 5 vya maji na ulete chemsha.
Chemsha kwa dakika moja. Kisha futa maharagwe na ongeza vikombe 5 vya maji safi. Kuleta maji
kwa chemsha na endelea kupika maharagwe kulingana na maelekezo.
• Epuka lactose. Kula vyakula vya maziwa kunaweza kutoa gesi kwenye matumbo makubwa.
• Inawezekana kula nyuzi nyingi kwa wakati mmoja. Hii inaweza kusababisha kutokwa na damu.
• Chukua mkaa, kusaidia kupunguza gesi. Mkaa utayatangaza na kuibeba.
Mkaa ulioamilishwa ni bora.
• Watu ambao huugua mara nyingi humeza hewa.
• Epuka mikanda ngumu na nguo zinazofaa. Wale ambao hawavaa mikanda na vifungo wana
kumeza chini.
• Usiache harakati za matumbo.
• Epuka kunywa kwenye chemchemi za maji. Hauwezi kunywa kwa moja bila gulping chini
hewa.
• Lishe yenye mafuta ya chini husaidia kupunguza uzalishaji wa kaboni-dioksidi katika eneo la juu (duodenal) la
matumbo madogo.
• Utamu wa bandia hutoa gesi.
• Kunywa maji ya kutosha. Kinywa kavu inahimiza kumeza.
• Epuka kurudiwa kwa kurudia, kwa kuwa unameza hewa zaidi kuliko unavyotoa.
• Wote wa kutafuna na kuvuta sigara huongeza kumeza hewa.
• Vinywaji vyenye kaboni (bia, champagne, vinywaji vyenye laini) na vyakula vyenye sababu ya hewa
Chakula zaidi cha kumeza.
• Epuka kunywa na milo.
• Kufukuza hewa kupita kiasi, mwamba nyuma na mbele katika nafasi ya kifua cha goti.
-Unaona "Utunzaji wa tumbo, gaseous," "Belching," "Achlorhydria," "Dyspepsia," na "Colic katika
Watoto. "
(Flatulence; gesi)
Dalili -Kuna ziada ya gesi kwenye tumbo. Tumbo (au matumbo) linaonekana kuwa pia
kamili.
Sababu -Bloating ni mkusanyiko wa gesi kwenye tumbo, matumbo, au matumbo. Kawaida
Tumbo ni kuzaa kwa sababu ya mazingira ya asidi. Lakini wakati haina hydrochloric ya kutosha
asidi ("achlorhydria," ambayo huona), bakteria kutoka utumbo mdogo huhamia juu ya tumbo.
Kufika huko, husababisha wanga na sukari ambazo zipo. Hii hutoa gesi au, ni nini
inayoitwa, bloat.

title: Hiatal Hernia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• As soon as you sense heartburn coming on, drink 1-2 large glasses of water. This tends
to wash the acid back down into the stomach.
• Eat nourishing food, plus vitamin/mineral supplements. Several small meals are best.
Avoid overeating; it only intensifies the problem. Supper, if eaten at all, should be light
and 2-3 hours before bedtime. Food in the stomach, after you are in bed, is more likely to
flow back up into the windpipe. Stop eating supper entirely, and you are more likely to
have success in overcoming hiatal hernia.
• Include extra fiber; this helps soak up some of the acid.
• Avoid fried food and fats; they slow down the digestion process in the stomach. Do not
take tea, coffee, colas, alcohol, or tobacco. Avoid refined foods, including white-flour
products and sugar.
• Avoid coffee, chocolate, spicy foods, alcohol, tomatoes, mint foods, whole milk, and
possibly citrus juices.
• Avoid constipation by including fiber in the diet.
• Eat your meals on a regular schedule, and do not eat between meals. Eating between
meals causes the stomach to stop partway through, and start all over again—still with
everything from the previous meal in it.
• Even when not thirsty, drink a large glass of water every so often throughout the day.
• Avoid heavy lifting, and do not bend over more than you have to. Wait till 2 hours after
a meal before starting heavy exertion.
• Bend from the knees, not from the waist, to avoid upward pressure on the stomach.
• Daily outdoor exercise will strengthen the muscles.
• Avoid stress and stressful situations.
• Avoid tight clothing (corsets, girdles, belts, etc.)
• You may need to raise the head of the bed 4-8 inches to avoid reflux of food upward at
night.
—Also see "Hernia" and "Umbilical Hernia."
(Hiatus Hernia)
SYMPTOMS—Heartburn and belching. There may be difficulty in swallowing. Material from the
stomach may suddenly return into the throat or mouth, causing a burning sensation. It may feel as if
there is a lump in the throat, or that food is sticking at a point in the throat. Sometimes bloody mucous is
coughed up.
CAUSES—The stomach pushes, or herniates, upward through an opening in the diaphragm into the
chest cavity (the thorax). A weakness in the diaphragm as it leaves the esophagus may enlarge the
opening, where the esophagus (food pipe) enters the stomach. This enables the stomach to slide up
somewhat.
The weakness is often caused by increased pressure upward, from what is in or near the abdominal
cavity: obesity, pregnancy, tumors, heavy lifting, overeating, straining at the stool, or tight clothing.
It is said that nearly half the people over 40, in the U.S., have hiatal hernias. But most are unaware of it,
since these hernias are often quite small and are hardly noticed. They occur in women four times as
often as in men, perhaps due to tight clothing. They generally first occur after the age of 40.
The acid material that comes up into the windpipe, from the larger hernias, frequently causes ulceration
in the esophageal wall.
But ulcers can also occur in the duodenum, which is the top part of the small intestine, just below the
stomach.
People with this condition have a tendency to have overacid stomachs.
Between the esophagus and stomach is the esophageal sphincter. This is a circular valve which can open
and close. But its strength is damaged by drugs, tobacco (smoked or chewed), or certain foods. This
weakening allows food and acid to go back up into the windpipe.
Those certain foods include coffee and chocolate (because of the methylxanthines in them), spicy foods,
tomato, alcohol, peppermint, spearmint, and citrus juices. Tobacco and coffee are especially bad. Whole
milk can also be a problem. Weakening of the sphincter occurs within 30 minutes after drinking coffee.
One puff of a cigarette can lower sphincter pressure to zero; the result is called "smoker's heartburn."
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mara tu unapoona mapigo ya moyo yanakuja, kunywa glasi kubwa za maji 1-2. Hii inaelekea
Kuosha asidi nyuma ndani ya tumbo.
• Kula chakula chenye lishe, pamoja na virutubisho vya vitamini/madini. Milo kadhaa ndogo ni bora.
Epuka kula kupita kiasi; Inazidisha shida tu. Chakula cha jioni, ikiwa kinaliwa kabisa, kinapaswa kuwa nyepesi
na masaa 2-3 kabla ya kulala. Chakula tumboni, baada ya kulala kitandani, kina uwezekano mkubwa wa
Mtiririko nyuma kwenye bomba la upepo. Acha kula chakula cha jioni kabisa, na una uwezekano mkubwa wa
kuwa na mafanikio katika kushinda hernia ya hiatal.
• Jumuisha nyuzi za ziada; Hii husaidia kuloweka asidi.
• Epuka chakula cha kukaanga na mafuta; Wanapunguza mchakato wa digestion kwenye tumbo. Usifanye
Chukua chai, kahawa, colas, pombe, au tumbaku. Epuka vyakula vilivyosafishwa, pamoja na unga mweupe

-Unaona "hernia" na "hernia ya umbilical."
(Hiatus hernia)
Dalili -Heartburn na Belching. Kunaweza kuwa na ugumu wa kumeza. Nyenzo kutoka kwa
Tumbo linaweza kurudi ghafla kwenye koo au mdomo, na kusababisha hisia za kuchoma. Inaweza kuhisi kana kwamba
Kuna donge kwenye koo, au kwamba chakula kinashikamana na koo. Wakati mwingine mucous ya umwagaji damu ni
Imewekwa juu.
Sababu -tumbo husukuma, au herniates, juu kupitia ufunguzi katika diaphragm ndani ya
Cavity ya kifua (thorax). Udhaifu katika diaphragm kwani inaacha umio inaweza kupanua
Ufunguzi, ambapo esophagus (bomba la chakula) huingia tumboni. Hii inawezesha tumbo kuteleza
kiasi fulani.
Udhaifu mara nyingi husababishwa na shinikizo kubwa zaidi, kutoka kwa kile kilicho ndani au karibu na tumbo
Cavity: fetma, ujauzito, tumors, kuinua nzito, kupita kiasi, kunyoa kwenye kinyesi, au mavazi magumu.
Inasemekana kwamba karibu nusu ya watu zaidi ya 40, huko Merika, wana hiatal hernias. Lakini wengi hawajui,
Kwa kuwa hernias hizi mara nyingi ni ndogo sana na hazitambuliwi. Zinatokea kwa wanawake mara nne kama
Mara nyingi kama kwa wanaume, labda kwa sababu ya mavazi magumu. Kwa ujumla hufanyika kwanza baada ya umri wa miaka 40.
Nyenzo ya asidi ambayo huja kwenye bomba la upepo, kutoka hernias kubwa, mara nyingi husababisha vidonda
Katika ukuta wa esophageal.
Lakini vidonda pia vinaweza kutokea katika duodenum, ambayo ni sehemu ya juu ya utumbo mdogo, chini ya
tumbo.
Watu walio na hali hii wana tabia ya kuwa na tumbo kupita kiasi.
Kati ya esophagus na tumbo ni sphincter ya esophageal. Hii ni valve ya mviringo ambayo inaweza kufungua
na karibu. Lakini nguvu yake imeharibiwa na dawa za kulevya, tumbaku (kuvuta sigara au kutafuna), au vyakula fulani. Hii
Kudhoofisha inaruhusu chakula na asidi kurudi nyuma kwenye bomba la upepo.
Chakula hicho fulani ni pamoja na kahawa na chokoleti (kwa sababu ya methylxanthines ndani yao), vyakula vya manukato,
Nyanya, pombe, peppermint, spearmint, na juisi za machungwa. Tumbaku na kahawa ni mbaya sana. Nzima
Maziwa pia yanaweza kuwa shida. Kudhoofisha kwa sphincter hufanyika ndani ya dakika 30 baada ya kunywa kahawa.
Puff moja ya sigara inaweza kupunguza shinikizo la sphincter hadi sifuri; Matokeo yake yanaitwa "Moshi wa Moshi."

title: Vomiting
contentEn:
(Emesis)
SYMPTOMS—The person vomits.
CAUSES—The cause is often overeating, eating the wrong food, poor combinations, or excessive
alcohol consumption. But it can also be caused by food allergies, poisoning, food poisoning, or infection
(flu, Epstein-Barr syndrome, candida, etc.) If the vomitus (that which comes up) looks like "coffee
grounds," it includes large amounts of blood from a bleeding ulcer or stomach cancer. This is an
emergency, for extensive internal bleeding can result in death. Take him to the emergency room.
If it occurs in infants, accompanied by fever and the child is unresponsive, it could indicate meningitis.
Call a physician immediately. (See meningitis.)
But it might be that you need to induce vomiting, after someone eats a poisonous plant, rat poison, etc.
TO ASSIST VOMITING TO OCCUR—If you have eaten something poisonous or are having a
gallbladder attack, an emetic will help. Drink an emetic herb tea. Lobelia is probably the best. Make an
herb tea of lobelia or peach leaves, and take a teaspoonful every 15 minutes for 3-4 hours.
EMETIC HERBS—When giving lobelia tea, give the full dose all at once or you will not induce
vomiting. Add 1 oz lobelia to a quart of boiling water; let it steep for 5-10 minutes if you are in a hurry
(15-20 minutes is better). Then give a cup or two of the liquid (not hot), and let him vomit.
Other emetic herbs include bayberry bark, myrica, white willow, and ragwort.
In his book, Back to Eden (see order sheet), p. 260, Kloss gives a complicated formula for giving herbs
to help a person vomit. You might wish to refer to it.
TO STOP VOMITING—Give very small doses of lobelia; it will relax the person and the vomiting
will cease. Use a teaspoon of boiling water, steep, take a teaspoonful of this every 15 minutes, until
relief is obtained. A cup of hot peppermint or spearmint tea, taken after the stomach has been cleaned
out, will also help settle it. Catnip or sweet balm are also useful. A hot fomentation over the stomach, or
a hot water bottle with a moist towel under it, will help settle the stomach.
AFTER VOMITING—Do not eat for several hours, but carefully take fluids, as you are able.
You lose a lot of fluid when you vomit. Be sure and replace it. Drink water, do not become dehydrated.
Those fluids should be clear: water, weak tea, or fruit juices. Milk and heavy soups may be too much for
the stomach just then.
Drink small amounts of peppermint tea.
Vomiting also flushes out minerals. These need to be replaced with electrolyte drinks, clear soups, or
apple or cranberry juice. If only water, add a couple pinches of sugar and salt to it. After vomiting, it is
best to sip the fluids, then pause, then sip a little more; do not gulp them down. Do not drink cold fluids;
it is a shock to the weakened stomach. Do not drink carbonated products at this time.
When you are ready to eat, start back with a small carbohydrate meal, such as rice soup. Avoid fatty
substances, for they would remain in the tired stomach too long.

title: Dyspepsia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Do not eat when you are in a hurry or under stress. You should be able to relax when you
eat. Do not eat when you are upset or excessively tired. Do not drink liquids with your
meal, for this dilutes your stomach juices. Take time to chew your food thoroughly.
• Eat more live (raw) foods rather than primarily heavily cooked items. Fresh, raw foods
are rich in enzymes that help digest and assimilate the nutrients. But those enzymes are
destroyed when heated to more than 120o F. All processed foods have been heated above
120o F.
• Cut down on the meat or eliminate it entirely. It is very hard to digest, and frequently
carries bacteria and parasites.
• Be sure and include enough fiber in your meal. Otherwise you are more likely to have
constipation, with consequent absorption of toxins back into the system.
• Include trace minerals in the diet (in Norway kelp and Nova Scotia dulse), and obtain
adequate vitamin and mineral supplementation. If you are having a difficult time
absorbing your food, you need to maintain good supplementation all the more.
Swallowing air (by chewing with the mouth open or talking while chewing) can cause
indigestion.
• First thing in the morning, juice a lemon and and drink it in a cup of water. This will
help prepare your stomach for its daily duties.
• Ginger is good, to lessen digestive nausea.
• Catnip, chamomile, fennel, and peppermint are all helpful in reducing indigestion. Mint
tea calms the stomach.
• Papain, papaya (containing the digestive enzyme papain), and fresh pineapple
(containing another digestive enzyme, bromelin) are also very helpful.
• Calcium, magnesium, and vitamin D are needed.
• English bitters are very helpful. Take them before each meal.
• Helpful herbs include balm, bitter orange, celandine, hops, fennel, and yarrow.
• Alcohol; vinegar; caffeine; and spicy, refined, or greasy foods promotes indigestion.
• Food allergies, such as lactose intolerance, can cause it also, so locate them. (See
Allergies.) Avoid foods which tend to bother you. Take the pulse test in order to determine
yours. (See Pulse Test.)
• Do not eat too heavily of legumes, especially lentils, peanuts, and soybeans. They
contain a substance which slows down certain digestive enzymes.
• Avoid these food combinations: milk and sugar, fruits and vegetables, sugar and protein.
• Take an out-of-door walk after breakfast. If you can, do it where the air is fresh, not by a
highway.
• Keep in mind Kouchadoff's discovery. This Russian scientist experimented with cooked
food and found that, when it was eaten, the white blood cells increased rapidly in the
small intestine. As part of our immune system, they increase to fight hostile invaders. In
other words, when your white blood cell count goes up, a threatened infection or disease is
being prepared for.
• Eating raw foods protects the immune system, and does not cause an increase in white
blood cell count.
• Dr. Bircher-Benner, of Switzerland, discovered that eating raw food at a meal before
cooked food prevented the formation of white cells in the intestines. Therefore, he always
served raw salads before cooked foods.
—Now, for the other side of the coin:
• There is a theory which some accept and others reject. Consider this:
• A major cause of indigestion is eating salads and other light food at the beginning of the
meal, and waiting till partway through the meal to eat the protein foods. But protein foods
need lots of HCl for proper digestion; the other foods do not. So begin your meal with
your protein foods. You can eat salads with your protein food, but not before it.
• Which theory is correct? The truth may be in the middle: Those who have an abundance
of HCl tend to do better eating some protein at the beginning of the meal, and those who
do not have as much do better eating the raw foods, to begin with.
—Also see "Nervous Dyspepsia," "Bloating," "Achlorhydria," "Allergies," and "Pulse Test."
(Poor Digestion; Indigestion)
SYMPTOMS—Gas, a bloated feeling, rumbling noises, belching, possibly a burning feeling, and
vomiting.
CAUSES—The main causes are dietary habits and stress. Lack of hydrochloric acid (HCl) and enzymes
are other major causes. Lack of enzymes keep vitamins and minerals from being used properly.
Inadequate HCl means the protein food will not be digested correctly.
Other contributing factors include peptic ulcers. Intestinal obstruction can also lead to indigestion. If the
liver, pancreas, or gallbladder are not function properly, it is more difficult for the body to digest food.
A key factor can be hydrochloric acid production (see Achlorhydria).
If food does not digest properly, it tends to ferment in the intestines. This produces hydrogen and carbon-
dioxide gas, which causes bloating and pain. (See Bloating.)

Matibabu
• Usile wakati uko haraka au chini ya mafadhaiko. Unapaswa kupumzika wakati wewe
kula. Usile wakati umekasirika au umechoka sana. Usinywe vinywaji na yako
Chakula, kwa sababu hii inapunguza juisi zako za tumbo. Chukua muda wa kutafuna chakula chako vizuri.
• Kula vyakula zaidi (mbichi) badala ya vitu vilivyopikwa sana. Vyakula safi, mbichi
ni matajiri katika Enzymes ambazo husaidia kuchimba na kuongeza virutubishi. Lakini enzymes hizo ni
kuharibiwa wakati moto hadi zaidi ya 120o F. Vyakula vyote vilivyosindika vimewashwa hapo juu
120o F.
• Kata nyama au uiondoe kabisa. Ni ngumu sana kuchimba, na mara kwa mara
hubeba bakteria na vimelea.
• Hakikisha na ujumuishe nyuzi za kutosha katika chakula chako. Vinginevyo una uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa nayo
Kuvimbiwa, na kunyonya kwa sumu nyuma kwenye mfumo.
• Jumuisha madini ya kuwafuata katika lishe (huko Norway Kelp na Nova Scotia Dulse), na upate
Vitamini vya kutosha na nyongeza ya madini. Ikiwa unapata wakati mgumu
Kuchukua chakula chako, unahitaji kudumisha nyongeza nzuri zaidi.
Kumeza hewa (kwa kutafuna na mdomo wazi au kuongea wakati wa kutafuna) inaweza kusababisha
kumeza.
• Jambo la kwanza asubuhi, juisi limau na uinywe kwenye kikombe cha maji. Hii mapenzi
Saidia kuandaa tumbo lako kwa majukumu yake ya kila siku.
• Tangawizi ni nzuri, kupunguza kichefuchefu cha utumbo.
• Catnip, chamomile, fennel, na peppermint zote zinasaidia katika kupunguza kumeza. Mint
Chai hutuliza tumbo.
• Papain, papaya (iliyo na enzyme ya enzyme), na mananasi safi
(iliyo na enzyme nyingine ya utumbo, Bromelin) pia inasaidia sana.
• Kalsiamu, magnesiamu, na vitamini D inahitajika.
• Bitters za Kiingereza zinasaidia sana. Wachukue kabla ya kila mlo.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na balm, machungwa yenye uchungu, celandine, hops, fennel, na yarrow.
• pombe; siki; kafeini; na vyakula vyenye viungo, vilivyosafishwa, au vyenye grisi huendeleza kumeza.
• Mizio ya chakula, kama vile uvumilivu wa lactose, inaweza kusababisha pia, kwa hivyo kuwapata. (Tazama
Mzio.) Epuka vyakula ambavyo huwa vinakusumbua. Chukua mtihani wa mapigo ili kuamua
Wako. (Tazama mtihani wa mapigo.)
• Usila sana kunde, haswa lenti, karanga, na soya. Wao
vyenye dutu ambayo hupunguza Enzymes fulani za utumbo.
• Epuka mchanganyiko huu wa chakula: maziwa na sukari, matunda na mboga, sukari na protini.
• Chukua matembezi ya nje ya mlango baada ya kiamsha kinywa. Ikiwa unaweza, fanya mahali ambapo hewa ni safi, sio na a
barabara kuu.
• Kumbuka ugunduzi wa Kouchadoff. Mwanasayansi huyu wa Urusi alijaribu kupikwa
chakula na kugundua kuwa, wakati ililiwa, seli nyeupe za damu ziliongezeka haraka katika
utumbo mdogo. Kama sehemu ya mfumo wetu wa kinga, wanaongezeka kupigana na wavamizi wa maadui. Katika
Maneno mengine, wakati hesabu yako ya seli nyeupe ya damu inapoongezeka, maambukizi au ugonjwa unaotishiwa ni
kuwa tayari kwa.
• Kula vyakula mbichi hulinda mfumo wa kinga, na haisababishi kuongezeka kwa nyeupe
Hesabu ya seli ya damu.
• Dk Bircher-Benner, wa Uswizi, aligundua kuwa kula chakula kibichi kwenye chakula hapo awali
Chakula kilichopikwa kilizuia malezi ya seli nyeupe kwenye matumbo. Kwa hivyo, yeye daima
Kutumikia saladi mbichi kabla ya vyakula vya kupikwa.
-Sasa, kwa upande mwingine wa sarafu:
• Kuna nadharia ambayo wengine wanakubali na wengine wanakataa. Fikiria hii:
• Sababu kubwa ya kumeza ni kula saladi na chakula kingine nyepesi mwanzoni mwa
Chakula, na kungojea hadi sehemu ya chakula kula chakula cha protini. Lakini vyakula vya protini
Unahitaji HCl nyingi kwa digestion sahihi; Vyakula vingine havifanyi. Kwa hivyo anza chakula chako na
vyakula vyako vya protini. Unaweza kula saladi na chakula chako cha protini, lakini sio kabla yake.
• Nadharia ipi ni sahihi? Ukweli unaweza kuwa katikati: wale ambao wana wingi
ya HCl huwa hufanya vizuri kula protini mwanzoni mwa chakula, na wale ambao
Usiwe na vitu bora kula vyakula mbichi, kuanza.
-Unaona "dyspepsia ya neva," "Bloating," "Achlorhydria," "mzio," na "mtihani wa kunde."
(Digestion duni; kumeza)
Dalili -Gas, hisia ya damu, kelele za kunguruma, kupiga, labda hisia ya kuchoma, na
kutapika.
Sababu - Sababu kuu ni tabia ya lishe na mafadhaiko. Ukosefu wa asidi ya hydrochloric (HCl) na Enzymes
ni sababu zingine kuu. Ukosefu wa Enzymes huweka vitamini na madini kutokana na kutumiwa vizuri.
HCl haitoshi inamaanisha kuwa chakula cha protini hakitachimbwa kwa usahihi.
Sababu zingine zinazochangia ni pamoja na vidonda vya peptic. Vizuizi vya ndani pia vinaweza kusababisha kumeza. Ikiwa
Ini, kongosho, au gallbladder haifanyi kazi vizuri, ni ngumu zaidi kwa mwili kuchimba chakula.
Jambo muhimu linaweza kuwa uzalishaji wa asidi ya hydrochloric (angalia Achlorhydria).
Ikiwa chakula hakijachimba vizuri, huelekea kwenye matumbo. Hii hutoa haidrojeni na kaboni-
Gesi ya dioksidi, ambayo husababisha kutokwa na maumivu na maumivu. (Tazama Bloating.)

title: Nervous Dyspepsia
contentEn:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., Formulas)
IRRITATION OF SOLAR PLEXUS AND ABDOMINAL SYMPATHETIC
NERVE—Fomentation twice a day; during interval between, apply Heating Compress, changing every
4 hours, except during sleep. Abdominal Compress during the night, dry bandage during the day, and
abdominal supporter when enteroptosis exists.
GENERAL WEAKNESS—Graduated Cold Baths, twice daily; Cool or Cold percussion Douche to
spine.
HEARTBURN—Dry aseptic dietary; gastric Fomentation, followed by Heating Compress.
ERUCTATIONS AND REGURGITATIONS OF FOOD—Fomentation over the stomach, twice
daily; continuous Heating Compress during the interval between, but without impervious covering,
renewing every 4 hours.
SPINAL IRRITATION—Fomentation in the evening followed by a Heating Compress over the spine,
to be worn during the night; Hot Abdominal Pack.
COLD EXTREMITIES—Revulsive Douche, running Cold Foot Bath, Leg Pack, massage
HEADACHE—Hot and Cold Compress to the head; Alternate Sponging to the spine; Cool Compress,
if congestion is present; and massage to the head and neck.
ANOREXIA—Ice Bag over stomach, half an hour before eating; Cold Douche over spine; cold-air
bath; out-of-door life; small Cold Enema before breakfast, retained.
ABDOMINAL WEIGHT AND TENDERNESS—Abdominal supporter; Hot fan Douche to the
abdomen; Hot Foot Bath; Revulsive Sitz Bath; Fomentation twice daily, followed by Heating Compress.
EXCESSIVE PERISTALSIS—Hot and Cold Compress to Abdomen; Fomentation over abdomen,
twice daily, followed by Hot Abdominal Pack, protected by plastic covering.
ASTHMA—Nervous or reflex asthma is commonly associated with dilated or prolapsed stomach and
irritable lumbar sympathetic ganglia. The most important palliative measures are the Hot and Cold
Trunk Pack; Fomentation over the abdomen, twice daily, followed by Heating Compress, to be worn
during the interval between; Hot Enema; Hot Full Bath; general set of Tonic Friction treatments;
Revulsive Douche to legs.
GENERAL METHOD—The general method consists in improving the nerve tone, allaying general
nervous irritability, lessening gastric irritation, and improving the general nutrition by the appropriate
measures, as indicated above.
—Also see "Dyspepsia."

title: Achlorhydria
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Take lemon juice, diluted with water (or totally undiluted) at the beginning of each meal.
• Take English bitters (gentiana lutea) before each meal. These are bitter herbs which have
helped people's digestion for hundreds of years, in Europe and America.
• Take betaine HCl supplementation (75-250 mg) 15 minutes before each meal.
• Do not take antacids; they neutralize stomach acids and make the problem worse. In
addition, many of them contain aluminum and other harmful ingredients. One of these is
calcium carbonate, which will cause the stomach to produce even more HCl than before.
Magnesium compounds lead to diarrhea, and sodium bicarbonate can result in gas and
bloating.
—Also see "Hydrochloric Acid Problems."
(Insufficient stomach acid)
SYMPTOMS—Burping, belching, and bloating.
CAUSES—The stomach begins losing its ability to produce hydrochloric acid (HCl) at the age of 35. Of
people over the age of 50, 75% do not produce HCl. Yet, without it, they cannot properly digest protein
foods.
When the stomach does not have enough HCl, intestinal bacteria and yeast (candida albicans) are able to
enter it and ferment high carbohydrate foods (juice, fruit, breads, etc.).
Continued low HCl production results in B , calcium, and protein deficiencies. New food allergies can
12
begin, because large fragments of food pass through the gastro-intestinal tract undigested.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Chukua juisi ya limao, iliyoongezwa na maji (au haujakamilika kabisa) mwanzoni mwa kila mlo.
• Chukua bitters za Kiingereza (Mantiana Lutea) kabla ya kila mlo. Hizi ni mimea yenye uchungu ambayo ina
ilisaidia digestion ya watu kwa mamia ya miaka, huko Uropa na Amerika.
• Chukua nyongeza ya Betaine HCl (75-250 mg) dakika 15 kabla ya kila mlo.
• Usichukue antacids; Wao hupunguza asidi ya tumbo na hufanya shida kuwa mbaya zaidi. Katika
Kwa kuongezea, wengi wao wana alumini na viungo vingine vyenye madhara. Moja ya haya ni
Kalsiamu kaboni, ambayo itasababisha tumbo kutoa HCl zaidi kuliko hapo awali.
Misombo ya magnesiamu husababisha kuhara, na bicarbonate ya sodiamu inaweza kusababisha gesi na
Bloating.
-Unaona "shida za asidi ya hydrochloric."
(Asidi ya tumbo haitoshi)
Dalili -kuburudisha, kupiga, na kutokwa na damu.
Sababu -Tumbo huanza kupoteza uwezo wake wa kutengeneza asidi ya hydrochloric (HCl) katika umri wa miaka 35. Ya ya
Watu zaidi ya umri wa miaka 50, 75% hawatoi HCl. Walakini, bila hiyo, hawawezi kuchimba protini vizuri
vyakula.
Wakati tumbo halina HCl ya kutosha, bakteria ya matumbo na chachu (candida albicans) wana uwezo wa
Ingiza na Ferment vyakula vya juu vya wanga (juisi, matunda, mikate, nk).
Kuendelea uzalishaji wa chini wa HCl katika B, kalsiamu, na upungufu wa protini. Mzio mpya wa chakula unaweza
12
Anza, kwa sababu vipande vikubwa vya chakula hupitia njia ya gastro-matumbo haijafungwa.

title: Hydrochloric Acid Problems
contentEn:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., Formulas)
HYDROCHLORIC ACID, EXCESS —
DIETARY CONSIDERATIONS—Avoid irritating food sustenances—mustard, pepper, spices,
condiments of all sorts, all kinds of flesh foods, excess of proteins, hot foods, mushes, farinaceous and
sweet desserts, and frequent meals.
INCREASE GENERAL VITAL RESISTANCE—Graduated Tonic Frictions, twice daily.
COMBAT IRRITATION OF GASTRIC GLANDS, OR HYPERSECRETION—Revulsive
Compress twice daily, an hour before meals; continuous Heating Compress without plastic covering
during the interval between. Avoid Cold Douche over stomach and spine opposite the stomach, and also
Prolonged Cold Baths. Hot Douche or Fomentation over stomach and spine opposite the stomach, 3-4
times daily. Hot immersion Bath, at l050 F., for 15 minutes or Radiant Heat Bath for 10 minutes, half an
hour before dinner. Follow by Cold Mitten Friction. Sip half a glass of hot water, a half hour before
eating.
COMBAT TOXEMIA—Sweating procedures, Radiant Heat Bath, Sweating Wet Sheet Pack, Steam
Bath, Prolonged Neutral Bath. Follow hot baths by short cold applications, such as a Wet Sheet Rub,
Cold Towel Rub, Cold Shower, Spray Douche; Water drinking; Enema daily for a week or two, at 700
F., and injecting a second portion to be retained.
FLATULENCE OF STOMACH AND BOWELS—Cold Compress over abdomen, changed every 4
hours; Cold Enema, following Fomentation for 15 minutes, twice a day.
PAINFUL DIGESTION—Hot Fomentation an hour after eating, for 15 minutes, followed by Heating
Compress to be worn until next meal.
GASTRIC IRRITATION WITH VOMITING AFTER EATING—Hot and Cold Compress over
stomach or hot and cold Trunk Pack applied half an hour before eating, and continued for 2 hours.
CONTRAINDICATIONS—Avoid Cold Douche over stomach, Cold Shower, and prolonged cold
baths of all kinds.
HYDROCHLORIC ACID, INADEQUATE —
INCREASE GENERAL VITAL RESISTANCE—Graduated tonic hydrotherapy treatment (Tonic
Frictions), twice daily; out-of-door life; swimming.
INCREASE ACTIVITY OF GASTRIC GLANDS—Cold fan Douche over Stomach, Cold percussion
Douche to Dorsal spine, general Cold Douche or other cold procedure, Hot Abdominal Pack. Drink a
third of a glass of cold water, half an hour before eating.
INCREASE MOTILITY—Cold Gastric Douche, 3 hours after meals; small Cold Enema, retained, 3-4
hours after eating; and abdominal massage.
INDIGESTION, BILIOUSNESS—Hydrochloric acid being absent, flesh foods must be withheld.
Aseptic diet; avoid fried foods, rich gravies and animal fats, which lessen the secretion of HCl
(hydrochloric acid). Also avoid cane sugar and concentrated sweets. Apply hot applications over the
stomach, a hour after eating.
LOSS OF APPETITE—Ice Bag over the stomach, half an hour before each meal; Cold Mitten Friction
before breakfast, repeat before dinner if necessary; small Cold Enema or Cold Colonic before breakfast.
—Also see "Achlorhydria."

title: Pancreatitis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• With only supportive care, the acute symptoms will fade. But some will continue to have
chronic symptoms arising so often, for months or years. This is called chronic relapsing
pancreatitis.
• It is wise to do everything possible to avoid the chronic condition or, if it is has begun,
try to clear it up as much as possible.
• Fast and take only water until the acute symptoms subside. Food in the stomach triggers
the pancreas to start working, and this you do not want just now.
• Give slippery elm enemas. Cut the slippery elm bark into very small pieces, and put a
large handful in 4 quarts of water. Simmer for 1-15 minutes, stirring frequently. Then let it
set, covered for 30 minutes. Strain and use it warm. Drink it and use in enemas.
• Place a heaping teaspoonful of lobelia in a cup of boiling water and let it steep for a half
hour; then add a tablespoon of this lobelia tea to each cup of slippery elm tea, and drink.
Also drink a cup a hour before each meal and before retiring. This will both relax and
cleanse the digestive tract.
• After coming off the fast because the acute phase is over, eat a low calorie, low fat diet.
In chronic pancreatitis, that organ often no longer produces lipase normally. Without it,
fats cannot be properly handled by the body. So eat a low fat diet for the rest of your life.
• Go on a low sugar diet. A heavy diet of refined carbohydrates can cause pancreatitis.
• Say good-bye to all alcoholic beverages, and also to caffeine.
• Avoid overeating. This also overworks the pancreas.
• There are no medications which can solve this problem. Indeed, it was medications
which may have led to it; continuing to take them may only intensify the disease.
• Even though total pancreatactomy may be recommended, avoid surgery. It will probably
only worsen the condition.
• In case of a very serious acute crisis, give frequent hot steam pack fomentations to the
abdomen. Give charcoal internally, and apply it as a poultice over the affected area. Place
the person on a strict program of what he eats and drinks.
SYMPTOMS—Acute cases: A sudden attack of severe burning or stabbing pain in the upper abdomen,
possibly accompanied by nausea and vomiting. The pain may spread to the back and is made worse by
moving. Food, alcohol, and vomiting may worsen the pain.
Chronic cases: The pain is milder and pain attacks do not come on suddenly. There is excessive gas,
muscle aches, and fever. Permanent damage to the pancreas can occur, because the constant
inflammation can produce fibrosis in that organ. The chronic state results in irreversible changes in the
gallbladder.
Other symptoms of pancreatitis include abdominal swelling and distension, hypertension, sweating, and
abnormal fatty stools.
Diabetes, digestive problems, and cancer can also result, as well as hearing, respiratory, and kidney
failure.
CAUSES—Pancreatitis is inflammation of the pancreas. Normal cells are replaced with scar tissue and
calcium deposits. It frequently produces mild diabetes.
The most frequent causes of pancreatitis are drinking alcohol, viral infection, and diseases of the bile
ducts or gallbladder. A diet rich in fats and meat lays a solid foundation for pancreatitis to occur. Other
causes include surgical procedures, diagnostic procedures, and a considerable variety of prescribed
medications. Oral contraceptives, steroids, estrogen, and ACTH can also do it.
To this list should be added abdominal injury, obesity, poor nutrition, and electric shock.
Certain diseases can also induce it: hepatitis, mumps, and possibly anorexia nervosa.
The pancreas produces two important hormones: insulin and glucagon; both of which regulate blood
sugar levels and aid digestion. As a result, pancreatitis can produce glucose intolerance and diabetes.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kwa utunzaji wa kuunga mkono tu, dalili za papo hapo zitaisha. Lakini wengine wataendelea kuwa na
Dalili sugu zinazotokea mara nyingi, kwa miezi au miaka. Hii inaitwa kurudi nyuma
Pancreatitis.

Jaribu kuifuta iwezekanavyo.
• Haraka na chukua maji tu hadi dalili za papo hapo zitakapopungua. Chakula kwenye tumbo husababisha
kongosho kuanza kufanya kazi, na hii hautaki sasa hivi.

wachache wachache katika maji 4 ya maji. Simmer kwa dakika 1-15, kuchochea mara kwa mara. Basi wacha
Weka, kufunikwa kwa dakika 30. Shika na utumie joto. Kunywa na utumie katika enemas.
• Weka kijiko cha juu cha lobelia kwenye kikombe cha maji ya kuchemsha na uiruhusu iwe mwinuko kwa nusu
saa; Kisha ongeza kijiko cha chai hii ya Lobelia kwa kila kikombe cha chai ya elm inayoteleza, na kunywa.
Pia kunywa kikombe saa moja kabla ya kila mlo na kabla ya kustaafu. Hii itapumzika na
Safisha njia ya utumbo.
• Baada ya kutoka kwa haraka kwa sababu sehemu ya papo hapo imekwisha, kula kalori ya chini, lishe ya chini ya mafuta.
Katika kongosho sugu, chombo hicho mara nyingi haitoi tena lipase kawaida. Bila hiyo,
Mafuta hayawezi kushughulikiwa vizuri na mwili. Kwa hivyo kula lishe ya chini ya mafuta kwa maisha yako yote.
• Nenda kwenye lishe ya sukari ya chini. Lishe nzito ya wanga iliyosafishwa inaweza kusababisha kongosho.
• Sema kwaheri kwa vinywaji vyote, na pia kwa kafeini.
• Epuka kupita kiasi. Hii pia inazidi kongosho.
• Hakuna dawa ambazo zinaweza kutatua shida hii. Hakika, ilikuwa dawa
ambayo inaweza kuwa imesababisha; Kuendelea kuwachukua kunaweza kuongeza ugonjwa tu.
• Ingawa jumla ya kongosho inaweza kupendekezwa, epuka upasuaji. Labda
inazidisha hali hiyo tu.
• Katika kesi ya shida mbaya sana, toa mara kwa mara moto wa mvuke moto kwa fomentations kwa
tumbo. Toa mkaa ndani, na uitumie kama kuku juu ya eneo lililoathiriwa. Mahali
Mtu kwenye mpango madhubuti wa kile anakula na kunywa.
Dalili -Kesi za Papo: Shambulio la ghafla la maumivu makali au kuchoma maumivu ndani ya tumbo la juu,
ikiwezekana ikifuatana na kichefuchefu na kutapika. Maumivu yanaweza kuenea nyuma na hufanywa kuwa mbaya zaidi na
Kusonga. Chakula, pombe, na kutapika kunaweza kuzidisha maumivu.
Kesi sugu: maumivu ni mabaya na mashambulio ya maumivu hayakuja ghafla. Kuna gesi nyingi,
Maumivu ya misuli, na homa. Uharibifu wa kudumu kwa kongosho unaweza kutokea, kwa sababu mara kwa mara
Kuvimba kunaweza kutoa fibrosis katika chombo hicho. Hali sugu husababisha mabadiliko yasiyoweza kubadilika katika
Gallbladder.
Dalili zingine za kongosho ni pamoja na uvimbe wa tumbo na shida, shinikizo la damu, jasho, na
Viti vya mafuta yasiyokuwa ya kawaida.
Ugonjwa wa kisukari, shida za kumengenya, na saratani pia zinaweza kusababisha, na vile vile kusikia, kupumua, na figo
Kushindwa.
Sababu -Pancreatitis ni kuvimba kwa kongosho. Seli za kawaida hubadilishwa na tishu nyembamba na
amana za kalsiamu. Mara nyingi hutoa ugonjwa wa sukari kali.
Sababu za mara kwa mara za kongosho ni kunywa pombe, maambukizi ya virusi, na magonjwa ya bile
ducts au gallbladder. Lishe iliyo na mafuta na nyama huweka msingi mzuri wa kongosho kutokea. Nyingine
Sababu ni pamoja na taratibu za upasuaji, taratibu za utambuzi, na anuwai kubwa ya kuamriwa
Dawa. Mpango wa uzazi wa mdomo, steroids, estrogeni, na ACTH pia zinaweza kuifanya.
Kwa orodha hii inapaswa kuongezwa kuumia kwa tumbo, ugonjwa wa kunona sana, lishe duni, na mshtuko wa umeme.
Magonjwa fulani yanaweza pia kushawishi: hepatitis, mumps, na labda anorexia nervosa.
Pancreas hutoa homoni mbili muhimu: insulini na glucagon; zote mbili zinasimamia damu
Viwango vya sukari na digestion ya misaada. Kama matokeo, kongosho inaweza kutoa uvumilivu wa sukari na ugonjwa wa sukari.

title: Infectious Jaundice
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Give him bed rest, keep his bowels open, using daily enemas if necessary.
• If he can take food, give him a liquid diet. Plenty of water is also needed.
• Carefully dispose of all his discharges, so as not to contaminate anything.
• Do everything possible to exterminate rats.
• Avoid swimming in, or contact with, water that may be contaminated with animal waste.
(Weil's Disease, Leptospirosis, Spirochetal Jaundice)
SYMPTOMS—Sudden fever, chills, anemia, jaundice, sometimes abdominal pains, and occasionally
aseptic meningitis.
Within a few hours, fever, extreme thirst, and severe aching of the limbs develop. Blood vessels in the
eyeballs markedly enlarged. Jaundice appears in about half the cases. In locations where the disease is
common, mortality is about 10-20%.
This disease can easily be diagnosed as something else. It is important to determine the true nature of the
infection early.
CAUSES—This is an infectious disease caused by the leptospira icterohaemorrhagiae, a spirochete
bacteria. Rats, dogs, and various wild animals carry it. People are infected when urine-contaminated
water (generally from rats) penetrates cuts on their fingers or during butchering and skinning of infected
animals. The rats are not harmed by the disease.
Leptospire is a parasite which travels to the liver and greatly multiplies there, but can also be found in
the blood (in the early stages) and in the urine (later). Blood tests or urine cultures are necessary for
diagnosis.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mpe kupumzika kitanda, weka matumbo yake wazi, ukitumia enemas ya kila siku ikiwa ni lazima.
• Ikiwa anaweza kuchukua chakula, mpe chakula cha kioevu. Maji mengi pia yanahitajika.
• Tupa kwa uangalifu utaftaji wake wote, ili usichafue chochote.
• Fanya kila linalowezekana kumaliza panya.
• Epuka kuogelea, au kuwasiliana na, maji ambayo yanaweza kuchafuliwa na taka za wanyama.
(Ugonjwa wa Weil, Leptospirosis, Spirochetal Jaundice)
Dalili -homa iliyoonekana, baridi, anemia, jaundice, wakati mwingine maumivu ya tumbo, na mara kwa mara
Meningitis ya aseptic.
Ndani ya masaa machache, homa, kiu kali, na kuuma kali kwa miguu hua. Mishipa ya damu katika
Macho yaliongezeka sana. Jaundice inaonekana karibu nusu ya kesi. Katika maeneo ambayo ugonjwa uko
Kawaida, vifo ni karibu 10-20%.
Ugonjwa huu unaweza kugunduliwa kwa urahisi kama kitu kingine. Ni muhimu kuamua asili ya kweli ya
maambukizi mapema.
Sababu - hii ni ugonjwa wa kuambukiza unaosababishwa na leptospira icterohaemorrhagiae, spirochete
bakteria. Panya, mbwa, na wanyama wa porini hubeba. Watu wameambukizwa wakati mkojo unachafuliwa
Maji (kwa ujumla kutoka kwa panya) hupenya kupunguzwa kwenye vidole vyao au wakati wa kuchomwa na ngozi ya kuambukizwa
wanyama. Panya hazijeruhiwa na ugonjwa.
Leptospire ni vimelea ambavyo husafiri kwa ini na kuzidisha sana huko, lakini pia inaweza kupatikana katika
damu (katika hatua za mwanzo) na kwenye mkojo (baadaye). Uchunguzi wa damu au tamaduni za mkojo ni muhimu kwa
utambuzi.

title: Dumping Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Take English bitters, along with folic acid, pectin, and eat as carefully as you can. Take
full vitamin/mineral supplementation.
• Lie down for half an hour after each meal.
SYMPTOMS—The food entering the stomach is suddenly dumped into the small intestine instead of
remaining in the stomach, to be initially digested.
CAUSES—The dumping syndrome is a common side effect of stomach surgery. It can continue for
quite some time.
Because proteins are not properly digested, the small intestine becomes very acid—when it requires an
alkaline environment to function properly. Anemia and osteoporosis are frequent secondary results of
the dumping syndrome.
The solution is to not let them operate on your stomach.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Chukua bitters za Kiingereza, pamoja na asidi ya folic, pectin, na kula kwa uangalifu iwezekanavyo. Chukua
Viongezeo kamili vya vitamini/madini.
• Lala chini kwa nusu saa baada ya kila mlo.
Dalili -Chakula kinachoingia tumboni hutupwa ghafla ndani ya utumbo mdogo badala ya
Inabaki kwenye tumbo, ili kuchimbwa hapo awali.
Sababu -Dalili ya utupaji ni athari ya kawaida ya upasuaji wa tumbo. Inaweza kuendelea kwa
muda kabisa.
Kwa sababu protini hazijachimbwa vizuri, utumbo mdogo huwa asidi sana - wakati inahitaji
mazingira ya alkali kufanya kazi vizuri. Anemia na osteoporosis ni matokeo ya mara kwa mara ya sekondari ya
Dalili ya utupaji.
Suluhisho sio kuwaruhusu wafanye kazi kwenye tumbo lako.

title: Turista
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• American travelers are often given Entero-Vioform tablets, which they are instructed to
take several times a day. But those medications are forbidden in Japan and Sweden,
because they can cause severe nerve and eye damage.
• Instead, take betaine hydrochloride (betaine HCl) tablets with you when you travel, and
swallow two tablets after each meal. The hydrochloric acid will kill bacteria in the
stomach and help prevent infection.
• Straight lemon or lime juice, taken on an empty stomach, also has an sterilizing effect.
• To make the situation even better, eat some raw garlic with your meals.
• In cases of non-bacterial diarrhea, 3 tbsp. of raw, unprocessed wheat bran daily, taken in
fruit juice, has been found to give relief.
Here are more ideas for preventing turista from happening to you:
• Drink acidic drinks, such as fruit juice or whatever else you can get overseas. If you
cannot do better, drink carbonated beverages sealed in bottles or cans.
• Try to make sure the dishes and eating utensils have been cleaned in purified water, and,
hopefully, rinsed in very hot water.
• Avoid uncooked vegetables. This includes salads, fruits you cannot peel, ice cubes, and
anything that unpurified water is in.
• Boil water for 3-5 minutes to purify it. Iodine liquid or tablets purifies it also.
There is danger, when traveling overseas (or even if you remain at home) that the diarrhea may indicate
something more serious:
• Abdominal bloating, vomiting, and pain can point to colitis, appendicitis, or an intestinal
obstruction.
• Black or red stools can indicate bleeding or a parasitic infection.
• White or pale stools can signify disease of the liver.
• If fever occurs with the diarrhea, then a serious infection may be involved.
• Amoebic dysentery is a serious problem in Mexico, Central America, and a number of
other places. If you contract it, garlic, goldenseal, colchicum, peppermint, and ginger have
been used successfully against it. When in doubt, burn a wooden box, gather the charcoal
together and swallow it in water.
Here are other homemade ways to eliminate diarrhea:
• Take dried blueberries with you. They tend to constipate and thus eliminate the diarrhea.
Blackberry root is equally good. Make it into a tea and drink it.
• Plantain is strongly astringent, so is white oak bark.
• Cook down apple peels and drink it. The pectin in it helps eliminate diarrhea.
• Tannic acid is in acorns and oak bark. It is a powerful astringent, and will stop the
muscular contractions of the intestines.
• Not only charcoal, but clay is also useful in stopping diarrhea. Many commercial
antidiarrheal preparations contain clay.
—Also see "Diarrhea and Dysentery."
SYMPTOMS—Diarrhea when traveling in foreign countries, otherwise you may not feel sick.
CAUSES—Hygienic conditions and bacterial flora are different in other countries. The nationals are
used to it; but, arriving in that strange land, it can be too much for you.
One problem is foreign versions of the escherichia coli bacteria. Foreign versions produce a toxin that
prevents your intestines from absorbing the water you ingest in food and drink. The result is diarrhea.
Salmonella and shigella bacteria can also produce turista, and a smaller number of cases are caused by
rotavirus or the giardia parasite.
Up to 50% of turista cases are unexplained, but suspicion is pointed to fatigue, changes in diet, jet lag,
and altitude sickness.
Seasoned travelers say that there is a 50% chance you will get diarrhea if you visit overseas, even if you
take the recommended precautions. But here they are anyway:
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Wasafiri wa Amerika mara nyingi hupewa vidonge vya entero-vioform, ambavyo wameamriwa
Chukua mara kadhaa kwa siku. Lakini dawa hizo ni marufuku huko Japan na Uswidi,
Kwa sababu zinaweza kusababisha ujasiri mkubwa na uharibifu wa jicho.
• Badala yake, chukua vidonge vya betaine hydrochloride (betaine HCl) wakati unasafiri, na
Panda vidonge viwili baada ya kila mlo. Asidi ya hydrochloric itaua bakteria katika
tumbo na kusaidia kuzuia maambukizi.
• Limau moja kwa moja au juisi ya chokaa, iliyochukuliwa kwenye tumbo tupu, pia ina athari ya sterilizing.
• Ili kufanya hali kuwa bora zaidi, kula vitunguu mbichi na milo yako.
• Katika kesi ya kuhara isiyo ya bakteria, 3 tbsp. ya Branch ya ngano mbichi, isiyo na faida kila siku, iliyochukuliwa
Juisi ya matunda, imepatikana kutoa unafuu.
Hapa kuna maoni zaidi ya kuzuia Turista kutokea kwako:
• Kunywa vinywaji vya asidi, kama vile juisi ya matunda au kitu kingine chochote unachoweza kupata nje ya nchi. Ikiwa wewe
Haiwezi kufanya vizuri zaidi, kunywa vinywaji vyenye kaboni vilivyotiwa muhuri katika chupa au makopo.
• Jaribu kuhakikisha kuwa vyombo na vyombo vya kula vimesafishwa katika maji yaliyotakaswa, na,
Natumaini, iliyotiwa maji ya moto sana.
• Epuka mboga ambazo hazijapikwa. Hii ni pamoja na saladi, matunda ambayo huwezi peel, cubes za barafu, na
Chochote ambacho maji yasiyosafishwa yamo ndani.
• Chemsha maji kwa dakika 3-5 ili kuitakasa. Kioevu cha iodini au vidonge hutakasa pia.
Kuna hatari, wakati wa kusafiri nje ya nchi (au hata ikiwa unabaki nyumbani) kwamba kuhara inaweza kuonyesha
kitu kibaya zaidi:
• Blog ya tumbo, kutapika, na maumivu yanaweza kuashiria colitis, appendicitis, au matumbo
kizuizi.
• Viti nyeusi au nyekundu vinaweza kuonyesha kutokwa na damu au maambukizi ya vimelea.
• Viti vyeupe au vya rangi nyeupe vinaweza kuashiria ugonjwa wa ini.
• Ikiwa homa itatokea na kuhara, basi maambukizo makubwa yanaweza kuhusika.
• Dysentery ya amoebic ni shida kubwa huko Mexico, Amerika ya Kati, na idadi ya
maeneo mengine. Ikiwa unaipata, vitunguu, dhahabu, colchicum, peppermint, na tangawizi wanayo
imetumika kwa mafanikio dhidi yake. Unapokuwa na shaka, kuchoma sanduku la mbao, kukusanya mkaa
pamoja na kumeza kwa maji.
Hapa kuna njia zingine za nyumbani za kuondoa kuhara:
• Chukua Blueberries kavu na wewe. Wao huwa na kuvinjari na hivyo kuondoa kuhara.
Mizizi ya Blackberry ni sawa sawa. Fanya iwe chai na uinywe.
• Plantain ina nguvu sana, ndivyo pia gome nyeupe ya mwaloni.
• Pika peels za apple na unywe. Pectin ndani yake husaidia kuondoa kuhara.
• Asidi ya tannic iko kwenye acorn na gome la mwaloni. Ni nguvu ya nguvu, na itasimamisha
misuli ya misuli ya matumbo.
• Sio mkaa tu, lakini udongo pia ni muhimu katika kuzuia kuhara. Biashara nyingi
Maandalizi ya antidiarrheal yana udongo.
-Unaona "Kuhara na Dysentery."
Dalili -Diarrhea wakati wa kusafiri katika nchi za nje, vinginevyo unaweza kuhisi mgonjwa.
Sababu - hali ya mseto na mimea ya bakteria ni tofauti katika nchi zingine. Raia ni
kutumika kwake; Lakini, kufika katika ardhi hiyo ya kushangaza, inaweza kuwa nyingi kwako.
Shida moja ni matoleo ya kigeni ya bakteria ya Escherichia coli. Matoleo ya kigeni hutoa sumu ambayo
Inazuia matumbo yako kutoka kwa kuchukua maji unayoingiza kwenye chakula na kunywa. Matokeo yake ni kuhara.
Bakteria ya Salmonella na Shigella pia inaweza kutoa Turista, na idadi ndogo ya kesi husababishwa na
Rotavirus au vimelea vya Giardia.
Hadi 50% ya kesi za Turista hazieleweki, lakini tuhuma zinaelekezwa kwa uchovu, mabadiliko katika lishe, ndege ya ndege,
na ugonjwa wa urefu.
Wasafiri wenye uzoefu wanasema kuwa kuna nafasi 50% utapata kuhara ikiwa utatembelea nje ya nchi, hata ikiwa wewe
Chukua tahadhari zilizopendekezwa. Lakini hapa wako anyway:

title: Colitis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• High-fiber foods are very important, also drinking lots of water.
• To begin with, do not eat raw greens, carrots, or peanuts. Eat cooked or steamed green
leafy vegetables, cooked white potatoes, multigrain bread, and well-cooked oat bran,
brown rice, millet, sweet potatoes, bananas, cooked carrots, squash, and avocados.
• Drink fresh, raw cabbage, carrot, celery and parsley juices, to help heal the colitis.
• Do not eat fruit on an empty stomach, but at the end of the meal, until the colitis is gone.
• Avoid milk products, for they irritate the colon. Wheat products may do it also.
• Poorly digested roughage can be the problem. Chew your food well. Your intestines
need fiber, but not chunks of food.
• Undigested cereals and carbohydrates are another cause. Take digestive enzymes and
smaller, more frequent, meals.
• Use the pulse test, to ascertain whether allergic foods are being eaten. (See "Pulse Test.")
• When no open peptic or intestinal ulcers are present, take 2-3 tablets of betaine
hydrochloride (betaine HCl) after each meal with a glass of water. This will help the
stomach digest proteins and carbohydrates.
• Slippery elm is very soothing and healing to the bowel. Mix one tsp. of powdered
slippery elm with one pint of boiling water, blend well, add something for flavoring, and
drink slowly.
• Alfalfa, garlic, and papaya are also useful.
• Helpful herbs include aloe vera, myrrh, and pau d'arco.
—Also see "Crohn's Disease" for additional information on ulcerative colitis. See "Irritable Bowel
Syndrome" for more on colitis.
(Ulcerative Colitis)
SYMPTOMS—Bloody diarrhea, bloody mucous, gas, pain, bloating, incomplete elimination of the
bowels, weakness, weight loss, indigestion, headaches, and sometimes hard stools. Diverticula are often
produced.
CAUSES—Colitis is a disease of the large intestine. Ulcerative colitis is a more severe variation of it.
The symptoms and treatment of both are about the same.
Colitis is a chronic infection of the lower bowel. The mucous membrane wall becomes irritated as a
result of fecal matter which has accumulated, because of constipation. In other words, the person did not
have regular bowel movements, and so the bowel wall became infected as a result.
Over-the-counter laxatives, cooking in aluminum utensils, overeating of refined carbohydrates, too
much sugar in the diet, and food allergies are other causes.
Constipation causes the person to strain. This produces diverticula (see "Diverticulitis"), small pockets
which fill with waste matter and toxins.
Low-fiber diets, wrong food combinations, and poor bowel habits—all work together to cause trouble.
Toxic bacteria multiplies quickly when retained in the lower bowel too long.
Nervous tension and emotional stress intensifies the problem.
Antibiotics change the intestinal flora, and that can also produce colitis.
It is important that you try to find the underlying cause of the colitis, otherwise it will be difficult to
eliminate it.
More rarely, the intestinal wall weakens, balloons out, and could possibly rupture. This is called toxic
magacolon.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Vyakula vyenye nyuzi nyingi ni muhimu sana, pia kunywa maji mengi.
• Kuanza, usila mboga mbichi, karoti, au karanga. Kula kijani au kijani kibichi
Mboga yenye majani, viazi nyeupe zilizopikwa, mkate wa multigrain, na matawi yaliyopikwa vizuri,
Mchele wa kahawia, mtama, viazi vitamu, ndizi, karoti zilizopikwa, boga, na avocados.
• Kunywa kabichi safi, mbichi, karoti, celery na juisi za parsley, kusaidia kuponya colitis.
• Usila matunda kwenye tumbo tupu, lakini mwisho wa chakula, mpaka colitis itakapopita.
• Epuka bidhaa za maziwa, kwa kuwa hukasirisha koloni. Bidhaa za ngano zinaweza kuifanya pia.
• Roughage iliyochimbwa vibaya inaweza kuwa shida. Kutafuna chakula chako vizuri. Matumbo yako
Unahitaji nyuzi, lakini sio chunks za chakula.
• Nafaka zisizo na wanga na wanga ni sababu nyingine. Chukua Enzymes za utumbo na
ndogo, mara kwa mara zaidi, milo.
• Tumia mtihani wa kunde, ili kuhakikisha ikiwa vyakula vya mzio vinaliwa. (Tazama "Mtihani wa Pulse.")
• Wakati hakuna vidonda vya wazi vya peptic au matumbo vipo, chukua vidonge 2-3 vya betaine
Hydrochloride (Betaine HCl) baada ya kila mlo na glasi ya maji. Hii itasaidia
protini za kuchimba tumbo na wanga.
• Elm ya kuteleza ni ya kupendeza sana na inapona kwa matumbo. Changanya tsp moja. ya unga
Slippery Elm na pint moja ya maji moto, unganisha vizuri, ongeza kitu kwa ladha, na
kunywa polepole.
• Alfalfa, vitunguu, na papaya pia ni muhimu.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na Aloe Vera, Myrrh, na Pau d'Arco.
-Unaona "Ugonjwa wa Crohn" kwa habari zaidi juu ya ulcerative colitis. Tazama "Bowel isiyokasirika
Dalili "kwa zaidi juu ya colitis.
(Ulcerative colitis)
Dalili -Kuhara kwa damu, umwagaji damu mucous, gesi, maumivu, kutokwa na damu, kuondoa kamili ya
Matumbo, udhaifu, kupoteza uzito, kumeza, maumivu ya kichwa, na wakati mwingine viti ngumu. Diverticula mara nyingi
zinazozalishwa.
Sababu -Colitis ni ugonjwa wa utumbo mkubwa. Ulcerative colitis ni tofauti kali zaidi yake.
Dalili na matibabu ya wote ni sawa.
Colitis ni maambukizi sugu ya matumbo ya chini. Ukuta wa membrane ya mucous inakasirika kama a
Matokeo ya jambo la fecal ambalo limekusanya, kwa sababu ya kuvimbiwa. Kwa maneno mengine, mtu huyo hakufanya
Kuwa na harakati za mara kwa mara za matumbo, na kwa hivyo ukuta wa matumbo ukaambukizwa kama matokeo.
Laxatives ya kukabiliana na, kupika katika vyombo vya aluminium, kupita kiasi kwa wanga iliyosafishwa, pia
Sukari nyingi katika lishe, na mzio wa chakula ni sababu zingine.
Kuvimbiwa husababisha mtu kusumbua. Hii inazalisha diverticula (tazama "diverticulitis"), mifuko midogo
ambayo hujaza na taka na sumu.
Lishe ya chini ya nyuzi, mchanganyiko mbaya wa chakula, na tabia duni ya matumbo-yote hufanya kazi pamoja kusababisha shida.
Bakteria yenye sumu huzidisha haraka wakati huhifadhiwa kwenye matumbo ya chini sana.
Mvutano wa neva na mkazo wa kihemko huongeza shida.
Dawa za kukinga hubadilisha mimea ya matumbo, na ambayo inaweza pia kutoa colitis.
Ni muhimu kujaribu kupata sababu ya msingi ya colitis, vinginevyo itakuwa ngumu
kuiondoa.
Mara chache, ukuta wa matumbo hudhoofisha, baluni nje, na zinaweza kupasuka. Hii inaitwa sumu
Magacolon.
