title: Crohn'S Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• A fat-free diet helps. It is known that those with Crohn's disease cannot absorb fats well
and do not tolerate high-fat diets.
• Do not use spices, such as mustard, vinegar, pepper, and horseradish.
• Drink plenty of liquids, such as distilled water and fresh juices.
• Cabbage juice contains vitamin U, the anti-ulcer vitamin, which is good for the walls of
the GI tract.
• Of course, eat no junk food, tobacco, caffeine, alcohol, and useless things which only
harm you.
• Eliminate all food additives. Do not use sugar or sugar foods. One study revealed that
patients contracting Crohn's disease had previously been eating more sugar than the
average population. Eat high-fiber, unrefined carbohydrates (whole grains). However,
gradually increase the fiber content, all the while chewing well, so as not to irritate the GI
tract. If you cannot chew well, then blend the food.
• Individuals who contracted Crohn's disease were found to have eaten few raw fruits and
vegetables prior to developing the condition.
• Mainly eat nonacidic fresh or cooked vegetables, such as broccoli, cabbage, carrots,
celery, kale, garlic, and Brussels sprouts. Never fry anything.
• Avoid overeating, in order to reduce the inflammation of the GI wall.
• Gluten tends to make the problem worse. So avoid gluten-containing grains (which are
wheat, oats, rye, barley, and buckwheat). Remarkable results can be obtained, but the
gluten-free diet must be strictly adhered to; not even tiny amounts in the diet may be
permitted.
• Lactose intolerance is frequent. Avoid all milk products.
• Eliminate all possible food allergies and other allergies. Crohn's patients tend to have
allergic conditions, such as hay fever and eczema.
• Regularly obtain sunshine and fresh air.
• Avoid stress, anxiety, and worry. Keep calm and relaxed. Avoid even exciting,
competitive games.
• Charcoal will help control the diarrhea. Take 4-6 tablets, 2-3 times a day between meals.
If the charcoal irritates the colon, stir the charcoal into water, let the charcoal settle to the
bottom, and only drink the apparently clear top part.
• Make sure the bowels move daily.
• Surgary, antidiarrheal drugs, and corticosteroids should be avoided. They worsen the
condition rather than improving it. A full 50% of those who undergo surgery report a
rapid increase in symptoms afterward.
• Helpful herbs are black walnut, burdock, goldenseal, pau d'arco, psyllium, saffron, aloe
vera, fenugreek, slippery elm, and white oak bark.
—Also see "Ulcerative Colitis."
(Regional Enteritis; Ulcerative Colitis)
SYMPTOMS—Loss of energy, appetite, and weight. Chronic diarrhea, fever, chronic rectal bleeding,
malabsorption, pain in the entire abdomen, excess fat in the stool (resulting in pale, bulky stools that
float). Malnutrition results.
CAUSES—Crohn's disease is also known as regional enteritis. Ulcerative colitis is a different disorder,
but similar enough in symptoms and treatment that we will list them together.
The difference is that ulcerative colitis only involves the first two layers of the intestinal wall (the
mucosa and submucosa); whereas Crohn's disease also affects the next two layers (the connective tissue
and the wall muscles).
Crohn's disease is a chronic ulceration of one or more sections of the digestive tract. Three special facts
are (1) the ulceration reaches into all layers of the gastro-intestinal (GI) wall, (2) the entire GI tract can
be involved, from mouth to the anus, and (3) this is usually a long-lasting condition.
As the inflamed portions heal, scar tissue remains, which keeps narrowing the channel.
Many puzzles still surround this condition. The origin is not clearly understood, and certain racial groups
contract it more than others (Jews have it more than anyone else).
But certain facts stand out:
Food food allergies may help it start, and identifying and avoiding them helps reduce it.
A lack of vitamins C and E in the diet aggravates the problem.
People in Europe and North America have it far more than those living elsewhere in the world.
Jews in America have it much more than Jews in Israel. Caucasians have it less often than Jews, but
more often than other races.
Therefore it is likely that the modern, Western, diet is a significant factor. Eating simple, nourishing
food is an important aspect of dealing with this problem.
Rarely does the disease strike once and go away. Most of the time it recurs for years. When this
happens, the ongoing scarring keeps reducing bowel functions.
If ignored, eventually Crohn's disease can lead to cancer.
No definite cure is known, but certain things tend to alleviate the problem.
It is believed that Crohn's disease is an autoimmune problem; that is, the GI tract has become so toxic
from years of mistreatment, that the immune system becomes confused and begins attacking the part of
the body housing the toxic food.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Lishe isiyo na mafuta husaidia. Inajulikana kuwa wale walio na ugonjwa wa Crohn hawawezi kunyonya mafuta vizuri
na usivumilie lishe yenye mafuta mengi.
• Usitumie viungo, kama haradali, siki, pilipili, na farasi.
• Kunywa vinywaji vingi, kama vile maji yaliyotiwa maji na juisi safi.
• Juisi ya kabichi ina vitamini U, vitamini vya kupambana na ulcer, ambayo ni nzuri kwa kuta za
Njia ya GI.
• Kwa kweli, kula chakula kisicho na chakula, tumbaku, kafeini, pombe, na vitu visivyo na maana ambavyo tu
kukudhuru.
• Ondoa viongezeo vyote vya chakula. Usitumie vyakula vya sukari au sukari. Utafiti mmoja ulifunua kuwa
Wagonjwa wanaopata ugonjwa wa Crohn hapo awali walikuwa wakila sukari zaidi kuliko
Wastani wa idadi ya watu. Kula nyuzi zenye nyuzi nyingi, zisizo wazi (nafaka nzima). Hata hivyo,
hatua kwa hatua ongeza yaliyomo kwenye nyuzi, wakati wote kutafuna vizuri, ili usikasishe GI
trakti. Ikiwa huwezi kutafuna vizuri, basi unganisha chakula.
• Watu ambao walipata ugonjwa wa Crohn walipatikana wamekula matunda machache na
mboga kabla ya kukuza hali hiyo.
• Kula mboga safi au iliyopikwa, kama vile broccoli, kabichi, karoti,
Celery, kale, vitunguu, na Brussels hutoka. Kamwe kamwe kaanga chochote.
• Epuka kupita kiasi, ili kupunguza uchochezi wa ukuta wa GI.
• Gluten huelekea kufanya shida kuwa mbaya. Kwa hivyo epuka nafaka zenye gluteni (ambazo ni
Ngano, shayiri, rye, shayiri, na buckwheat). Matokeo ya kushangaza yanaweza kupatikana, lakini
Lishe isiyo na gluteni lazima izingatiwe kabisa; Hata kiasi kidogo katika lishe kinaweza kuwa
inaruhusiwa.
• Uvumilivu wa lactose ni mara kwa mara. Epuka bidhaa zote za maziwa.
• Ondoa mzio wote wa chakula na mzio mwingine. Wagonjwa wa Crohn huwa na
Hali ya mzio, kama vile homa ya nyasi na eczema.
• Mara kwa mara kupata jua na hewa safi.
• Epuka mafadhaiko, wasiwasi, na wasiwasi. Tulia na utulivu. Epuka hata ya kufurahisha,
Michezo ya ushindani.
• Mkaa utasaidia kudhibiti kuhara. Chukua vidonge 4-6, mara 2-3 kwa siku kati ya milo.
Ikiwa mkaa unamkasirisha koloni, koroga mkaa ndani ya maji, wacha mkaa ukamilike kwa
Chini, na kunywa tu sehemu ya wazi ya wazi.
• Hakikisha matumbo yanahamia kila siku.
• Dawa za upasuaji, dawa za antidiarrheal, na corticosteroids zinapaswa kuepukwa. Wanazidisha
hali badala ya kuiboresha. 50% kamili ya wale ambao wanafanya upasuaji wanaripoti a
Kuongezeka kwa haraka kwa dalili baadaye.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni walnut nyeusi, Burdock, Goldenseal, Pau d'Arco, Psyllium, Saffron, Aloe
Vera, fenugreek, elm ya kuteleza, na gome nyeupe ya mwaloni.
-Unaona "Ulcerative colitis."
(Mkoa wa Ertitis; Ulcerative Colitis)
Dalili -upungufu wa nishati, hamu ya kula, na uzito. Kuhara sugu, homa, kutokwa na damu sugu,
Malabsorption, maumivu katika tumbo lote, mafuta kupita kiasi ndani ya kinyesi (kusababisha viti vyenye rangi nyingi ambayo
kuelea). Matokeo ya utapiamlo.
Sababu - Ugonjwa wa Crohn pia hujulikana kama ugonjwa wa mkoa. Colitis ya ulcerative ni shida tofauti,
Lakini sawa katika dalili na matibabu ambayo tutayaorodhesha pamoja.
Tofauti ni kwamba colitis ya ulcerative inajumuisha tu tabaka mbili za kwanza za ukuta wa matumbo (The
mucosa na submucosa); Wakati ugonjwa wa Crohn pia unaathiri tabaka mbili zijazo (tishu zinazojumuisha
na misuli ya ukuta).
Ugonjwa wa Crohn ni vidonda sugu vya sehemu moja au zaidi ya njia ya utumbo. Ukweli tatu maalum
ni (1) vidonda hufikia katika tabaka zote za ukuta wa gastro-ndani (GI), (2) njia nzima ya GI inaweza
kuhusika, kutoka kwa mdomo hadi anus, na (3) kawaida hii ni hali ya kudumu.
Kama sehemu zilizochomwa zinaponya, tishu za kovu zinabaki, ambazo zinaendelea kupungua kituo.
Puzzles nyingi bado zinazunguka hali hii. Asili haieleweki wazi, na vikundi fulani vya rangi
Mkataba zaidi kuliko wengine (Wayahudi wana zaidi kuliko mtu mwingine yeyote).
Lakini ukweli fulani unaonekana:
Mzio wa chakula unaweza kusaidia kuanza, na kubaini na kuziepuka husaidia kuipunguza.
Ukosefu wa vitamini C na E katika lishe huongeza shida.
Watu huko Uropa na Amerika ya Kaskazini wanayo zaidi kuliko wale wanaoishi mahali pengine ulimwenguni.
Wayahudi huko Amerika wanayo zaidi ya Wayahudi katika Israeli. Caucasians wanayo mara nyingi kuliko Wayahudi, lakini
mara nyingi zaidi kuliko jamii zingine.
Kwa hivyo kuna uwezekano kwamba lishe ya kisasa, ya Magharibi, ni jambo muhimu. Kula rahisi, lishe
Chakula ni sehemu muhimu ya kushughulikia shida hii.
Mara chache ugonjwa huo hupiga mara moja na kwenda mbali. Wakati mwingi hurudi kwa miaka. Wakati hii
Inatokea, uchungu unaoendelea huweka kazi za matumbo.
Ikiwa imepuuzwa, mwishowe ugonjwa wa Crohn unaweza kusababisha saratani.
Hakuna tiba dhahiri inayojulikana, lakini mambo kadhaa huwa hupunguza shida.
Inaaminika kuwa ugonjwa wa Crohn ni shida ya autoimmune; Hiyo ni, njia ya GI imekuwa sumu
kutoka miaka ya kutendewa vibaya, kwamba mfumo wa kinga unachanganyikiwa na kuanza kushambulia sehemu ya
Mwili unakaa chakula cha sumu.

title: Diverticulitis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• In order to avoid the formation of those little pouches, always avoid constipation.
This is done by including enough roughage in your diet (fresh fruit and vegetables, bran,
and other sources of fiber), and by drinking enough water, etc. (See "Constipation" for
more information.) Psyllium seed and flaxseed also help soften the stools.
• Have a bowel movement when you sense you ought to. Do not wait.
• Obtain adequate exercise, especially out-of-doors.
• Prunes, pureed fruit juices, and herb teas are very helpful.
• Carrot, beet, celery, and green juices are excellent. Of the fruit juices, papaya, apple,
pineapple, and lemon are outstanding for your purposes.
• Chew nuts, seeds, and popcorn well, so they will be less likely to enter the diverticula.
• Eat smaller meals.
• Rats placed on high-fat diets, for 90 weeks, all developed colon diverticula.
• Avoid caffeine products. They all tend to irritate the colon.
• Do not eat a lot of sugar.
• Smoking and stress make the symptoms worse.
• Girdles, belts, and tight bands around the waist tend to increase abdominal pressure on
the colon.
• Helpful herbs include slippery elm, peppermint, chamomile, and aloe vera.
DURING AN ATTACK—As soon as an attack begins, give yourself a cleansing enema (2 quarts of
water and the juice of a fresh lemon). Take 4 charcoal tablets with a large glass of water.
In case of pain or spasm in the colon, apply a heating pad over the abdomen.
During the acute phase of an attack, it may be best to eat a low-fiber diet for a short time. Then return to
the high-fiber regime.
If the attack is severe, temporarily blend your food. Drink carrot, cabbage, and green juices.
To relieve pain, massage the abdomen on the left side. Stand up and stretch.
Try to have bowel movements on schedule. Take fiber first thing in the morning, and down a quart of
water before breakfast.
Check your stools daily. If they are black, this means blood is present; take a sample to a physician.
SYMPTOMS—No symptoms until they become infected or inflamed, resulting in chills, fever, and
pain. The pain may be localized in the left lower quadrant of the abdomen and may be constant.
Sometimes there is a brief period of diarrhea.
CAUSES—Diverticula are small pouch-like sacs on the inside of the large bowel, generally in the
descending colon. When a person is constipated, he tends to push too hard. The air pressure exerted by
this muscular squeeze on the bowel muscles can force small pockets to form in the walls of the lower
colon.
Once they form, diverticula never go away. Of themselves, they provide no symptoms. The problem is
that fecal matter can collect in them and eventually attract bacteria. This results in infection or
inflammation, which produces the fever, chills, and pain.
Diverticulosis is when you have diverticula. It is basically symptomless. Diverticulitis is when they are
inflamed or infected; then the unfortunate symptoms reveal themselves.
This is another disease caused by "civilized" refined and junk foods. It is practically unknown in Third
World nations, and was almost totally unknown before our century.
More than half of those over 60 in America have this problem.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ili kuzuia malezi ya mifuko hiyo midogo, kila wakati epuka kuvimbiwa.
Hii inafanywa kwa kujumuisha ghadhabu ya kutosha katika lishe yako (matunda na mboga safi, matawi,
na vyanzo vingine vya nyuzi), na kwa kunywa maji ya kutosha, nk (tazama "kuvimbiwa" kwa
Habari zaidi.) Mbegu ya Psyllium na Flaxseed pia husaidia kupunguza viti.
• Kuwa na harakati ya matumbo wakati unahisi unapaswa. Usisubiri.
• Pata mazoezi ya kutosha, haswa nje ya milango.
• Prunes, juisi za matunda zilizosafishwa, na chai ya mimea husaidia sana.
• Karoti, beet, celery, na juisi za kijani ni bora. Ya juisi za matunda, papaya, apple,
Mananasi, na ndimu ni bora kwa madhumuni yako.
• Chew karanga, mbegu, na popcorn vizuri, kwa hivyo watakuwa chini ya uwezekano wa kuingia kwenye diverticula.
• Kula milo ndogo.
• Panya zilizowekwa kwenye lishe yenye mafuta mengi, kwa wiki 90, wote waliokua wa koloni.
• Epuka bidhaa za kafeini. Wote huwa wanakasirisha koloni.
• Usila sukari nyingi.
• Uvutaji sigara na mafadhaiko hufanya dalili kuwa mbaya.
• Mifupa, mikanda, na bendi ngumu karibu na kiuno huwa zinaongeza shinikizo la tumbo
koloni.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na Elm ya Slippery, Peppermint, Chamomile, na Aloe Vera.
Wakati wa shambulio - mara tu shambulio linapoanza, jipe ​​enema ya utakaso (lita mbili za
maji na juisi ya limao safi). Chukua vidonge 4 vya mkaa na glasi kubwa ya maji.
Katika kesi ya maumivu au spasm kwenye koloni, tumia pedi ya joto juu ya tumbo.
Wakati wa awamu ya papo hapo ya shambulio, inaweza kuwa bora kula chakula cha chini kwa muda mfupi. Kisha rudi kwa
serikali ya juu-nyuzi.
Ikiwa shambulio ni kali, unganisha chakula chako kwa muda. Kunywa karoti, kabichi, na juisi za kijani.
Ili kupunguza maumivu, mazao ya tumbo upande wa kushoto. Simama na kunyoosha.
Jaribu kuwa na harakati za matumbo kwenye ratiba. Chukua kitu cha kwanza cha nyuzi asubuhi, na chini ya lita moja ya
maji kabla ya kiamsha kinywa.
Angalia viti vyako kila siku. Ikiwa ni nyeusi, hii inamaanisha damu iko; Chukua sampuli kwa daktari.
Dalili -hakuna dalili hadi zinaambukizwa au kuchomwa moto, na kusababisha baridi, homa, na
maumivu. Ma maumivu yanaweza kuwekwa ndani ya sehemu ya chini ya tumbo na inaweza kuwa ya mara kwa mara.
Wakati mwingine kuna kipindi kifupi cha kuhara.
Sababu-Diverticula ni sehemu ndogo kama zamu ndani ya matumbo makubwa, kwa ujumla katika
Kushuka koloni. Wakati mtu amevimbiwa, yeye huelekea kushinikiza sana. Shinikizo la hewa lililotolewa na
Misuli hii ya misuli kwenye misuli ya matumbo inaweza kulazimisha mifuko midogo kuunda kwenye kuta za chini
koloni.
Mara tu wanapounda, diverticula kamwe haondoki. Wao wenyewe, hawapeana dalili. Shida ni
Jambo hilo la fecal linaweza kukusanya ndani yao na mwishowe kuvutia bakteria. Hii husababisha maambukizi au
Kuvimba, ambayo hutoa homa, baridi, na maumivu.
Diverticulosis ni wakati una diverticula. Kimsingi haina dalili. Diverticulitis ni wakati wao ni
kuharibiwa au kuambukizwa; Halafu dalili za bahati mbaya zinajifunua.
Hii ni ugonjwa mwingine unaosababishwa na "kistaarabu" kilichosafishwa na vyakula visivyofaa. Haijulikani kwa tatu
Mataifa ya ulimwengu, na karibu haijulikani kabisa kabla ya karne yetu.
Zaidi ya nusu ya wale zaidi ya 60 huko Amerika wana shida hii.

title: Rectal Fissures
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Avoid constipation. Be sure and include enough fiber in the diet and drink enough water
each day. The two, combined, will produce soft stools. Eat more fruits and vegetables, and
drink 6-8 glasses of water daily.
• Do not scratch the area. Wipe yourself gently.
• Avoid diarrhea. An ongoing case of it can soften rectal tissue, so it is more likely to tear.
• Sit on something soft. A special pillow can be purchased in the drugstore.
• Fairly hot water on the area will relax and sooth it.
• If needed, place corn starch on the area after each bath, to keep it dry. Do not use talcum
powder for this—or anything else. It can cause cancer. Talcum powder is rock dust.
• These swellings may be opened with a blade or by soaking it in hot sitz baths of 3%
boric acid. A poultice of echinacea may be applied directly to the abscess, to disinfect and
help bring it to a pointed shape, so it can be opened. Flush the opened abscess with 3%
hydrogen peroxide, to clean it out and disinfect the wound.
(Rectal Abscesses)
SYMPTOMS—After passing a larger-diameter bowel movement, there is burning, stinging, and
possible bleeding on the rectum. Painful red swelling at, or near, the anal opening.
CAUSES—Hemorrhoids are swollen veins in the anus and rectum area. Fissures are ulcers or breaks in
the skin which just happen to occur in the same area.
The margins where skin meets the mucous membrane can have small tears. This occurs sometimes at the
corners of the mouth. Fissures on the rectum are somewhat similar.
A common cause is the passing of a large, hard stool.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Epuka kuvimbiwa. Hakikisha na ni pamoja na nyuzi za kutosha katika lishe na kunywa maji ya kutosha
kila siku. Wawili, pamoja, watatoa viti laini. Kula matunda na mboga zaidi, na
Kunywa glasi 6-8 za maji kila siku.
• Usichukue eneo hilo. Futa mwenyewe kwa upole.
• Epuka kuhara. Kesi inayoendelea inaweza kulainisha tishu za rectal, kwa hivyo kuna uwezekano mkubwa wa kubomoa.
• Kaa kwenye kitu laini. Mto maalum unaweza kununuliwa katika duka la dawa.
• Maji ya moto kwenye eneo hilo yatapumzika na kuituliza.
• Ikiwa inahitajika, weka wanga wa mahindi kwenye eneo hilo baada ya kila bafu, ili iwe kavu. Usitumie talcum
poda kwa hii - au kitu kingine chochote. Inaweza kusababisha saratani. Poda ya Talcum ni vumbi la mwamba.
• Uvimbe huu unaweza kufunguliwa na blade au kwa kuiweka kwenye bafu za moto za 3%
Asidi ya Boric. Poultice ya echinacea inaweza kutumika moja kwa moja kwenye jipu, disinfect na
Saidia kuileta kwa sura iliyoelekezwa, kwa hivyo inaweza kufunguliwa. Futa jipu lililofunguliwa na 3%
Hydrogen peroksidi, ili kuisafisha na disinfect jeraha.
(Abscesses ya Rectal)
Dalili-Baada ya kupitisha harakati kubwa ya matumbo ya kipenyo, kuna kuchoma, kuuma, na
Kutokwa na damu kwenye rectum. Uvimbe nyekundu wenye uchungu, au karibu, ufunguzi wa anal.
Sababu -hemorrhoids ni mishipa iliyovimba katika eneo la anus na rectum. Fissures ni vidonda au huvunja
Ngozi ambayo hufanyika tu katika eneo moja.
Maandamano ambayo ngozi hukutana na membrane ya mucous inaweza kuwa na machozi madogo. Hii hufanyika wakati mwingine
pembe za mdomo. Fissures kwenye rectum ni sawa.
Sababu ya kawaida ni kupita kwa kinyesi kikubwa, ngumu.

title: Rectal Itching
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Take pulse tests to determine food allergies. (See "Pulse Test.")
• Several foods have been found to cause allergies, leading to itching: beer, wine, hard
liquor, coffee, milk, cola drinks, tea, citrus, chocolate, tomatoes, popcorn, nuts, and spicy
food.
• Avoid gas-forming foods.
• Take vitamin A and flaxseed oil orally.
• Avoid stressful situations. High-strung individuals tend to have this problem more than
others. Their nerves are on edge.
• Use wet tissue to clean the area after a bowel movement, but do not leave the area wet.
• Eliminating moisture from the area is a key factor. Moisture, leakage, and fecal soiling
are frequently primary causes.
• Do not use anesthetic medications with "caine" in the name. They produce strong
allergic reactions, making the condition worse. They also tend to keep moisture on the
area.
• Avoid using soap in the area, for soap is highly alkaline.
• After a bowel movement, it will help to wash the area with a syringe of water. Dry
thoroughly afterward.
• Take a hot sitz bath daily. After the bath, apply lemon juice to the area with a piece of
cotton. Or rub wheat germ oil on all affected parts after washing and drying well.
• A warm (not hot) tea bag of goldenseal may be applied to the area for up to a half hour,
to relieve itching.
• Avoid tight clothing of any type in the abdominal area.
• Avoid drugs; many irritate the colon, leading to pruritus.
—Also see pinworms under "Worms."
(Pruritis Ani, Anus Itch)
SYMPTOMS—Itching around the anus.
CAUSES—Causes include infection, parasites, poor hygiene, diabetes, estrogen deficiency, or liver
disease. Skin diseases, such as psoriasis, seborrheic dermatitis, and eczema can also cause it. Another
possible cause is contact dermatitis, due to perfumed or dyed toilet tissue, deodorants, soap, or
underclothing. Food allergies are thought to be another cause.
Rectal itching is a symptom of a problem rather than a disease. Resolving the basic problem is essential
to eliminating the itching.
Pinworms are frequently the cause in children, but rarely in adults. (See pinworms in "Worms.")
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Chukua vipimo vya kunde ili kuamua mzio wa chakula. (Tazama "Mtihani wa Pulse.")
• Vyakula kadhaa vimepatikana kusababisha mzio, na kusababisha kuwasha: bia, divai, ngumu
pombe, kahawa, maziwa, vinywaji vya cola, chai, machungwa, chokoleti, nyanya, popcorn, karanga, na viungo
chakula.
• Epuka vyakula vinavyounda gesi.
• Chukua mafuta ya vitamini A na mafuta ya kitani kwa mdomo.
• Epuka hali zenye mkazo. Watu wenye kiwango cha juu huwa na shida hii zaidi ya
wengine. Mishipa yao iko kwenye makali.
• Tumia tishu za mvua kusafisha eneo baada ya harakati ya matumbo, lakini usiachie eneo hilo kuwa mvua.
• Kuondoa unyevu kutoka kwa eneo hilo ni jambo muhimu. Unyevu, uvujaji, na unene wa fecal
mara nyingi ni sababu za msingi.
• Usitumie dawa za anesthetic na "Caine" kwa jina. Wanazalisha nguvu
Athari za mzio, na kufanya hali kuwa mbaya zaidi. Pia huwa na kuweka unyevu kwenye
eneo.
• Epuka kutumia sabuni katika eneo hilo, kwa sabuni ni alkali sana.
• Baada ya harakati ya matumbo, itasaidia kuosha eneo hilo na sindano ya maji. Kavu
Baadaye baadaye.
• Chukua bafu ya moto ya sitz kila siku. Baada ya kuoga, tumia maji ya limao kwenye eneo hilo na kipande cha
Pamba. Au kusugua mafuta ya ngano kwenye sehemu zote zilizoathiriwa baada ya kuosha na kukausha vizuri.
• Mfuko wa chai wa joto (sio moto) unaweza kutumika kwa eneo hilo hadi nusu saa,
Ili kupunguza kuwasha.
• Epuka mavazi madhubuti ya aina yoyote katika eneo la tumbo.
• Epuka dawa za kulevya; Wengi hukasirisha koloni, na kusababisha pruritus.
-Unaona minyoo chini ya "minyoo."
(Pruritis ani, anus itch)
Dalili -Kuzunguka Anus.
Sababu -CAUSS ni pamoja na maambukizo, vimelea, usafi duni, ugonjwa wa sukari, upungufu wa estrogeni, au ini
ugonjwa. Magonjwa ya ngozi, kama vile psoriasis, dermatitis ya seborrheic, na eczema pia inaweza kusababisha. Mwingine
Sababu inayowezekana ni ugonjwa wa ngozi, kwa sababu ya tishu za choo zilizo na manukato, deodorants, sabuni, au
Kuweka chini. Mzio wa chakula hufikiriwa kuwa sababu nyingine.
Kuwasha kwa rectal ni ishara ya shida badala ya ugonjwa. Kutatua shida ya msingi ni muhimu
kuondoa kuwasha.
Vipuli mara nyingi ndio sababu kwa watoto, lakini mara chache kwa watu wazima. (Tazama minyoo katika "minyoo.")

title: Anorexia Nervosa
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Pray with the person and help her find peace in God. We must accept ourselves,
physically, as we are, and go on from there.
• Perk up the appetite. Give betaine hydrochloride and pancreatic enzymes.
• Give herbs which help stimulate the appetite: sweet flag, calamus, yellow gentian,
buckbean, or marsh trefoil. Give herbs before meals.
• A good nutritional program, along with vitamin/mineral supplementation, is vitally
needed. The delicate problem is getting the individual to eat enough food, so that normal
balances can be regained.
—Also see "Bulimia."
SYMPTOMS—Thin people who try to keep losing more weight.
CAUSES—Both Anorexia nervosa and bulimia are obsessive eating disorders, but they are not the
same.
Anorexia describes people who, although thin and often weak, are certain that they need to lose more
weight. They fear food and weight gain, and will hardly eat.
Bulimia describes people who try to eat less, then go on eating binges because they feel starved. Each
one is concluded by purging (induced vomiting) in order to bring up the food eaten. (See "Bulimia.")
Believing they are overweight, fearful of gaining more, these individuals rather consistently try to keep
themselves starved. They tend to have low self-esteem, and often are depressed. Certain that they look
terrible, and sure that eating still less might solve the problem, these folk have a thinking pattern which
is difficult to change.
In some cases, drug and/or alcohol abuse is also involved.
Lack of proper nutrition tends to intensify the feelings and attitudes.
Almost all anorexics are women, typically between the ages of 12 to 18.
The word, "anorexia," means "appetite loss," and technically could apply to anyone who has an ongoing
disinclination to eat food. This can be caused by stress, malnutrition, shock, or injury. But, today, the
term is generally applied only to those who have anorexia nervosa. This article only applies to this latter
definition.
Some consider anorexia nervosa to be a psychiatric illness. Others believe that reaction to a strong,
underlying collection of allergenic foods is the problem. The often repeated phrase, "I always feel better
when I don't eat, and feel bad when I do," can apply to both viewpoints.
About a third of those with this problem prematurely die from starvation, infections, heart disorders, or
suicide.
The underlying cause must be dealt with. Love and understanding is needed. Help from someone outside
the family may be needed. However, there is danger in consulting professional counselors or
psychologists, since they have been trained in hypnotic procedures; a growing number of instances are
occurring where so-called "repressed memories" are implanted in the counselee. —And that only adds to
the problems!
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Omba na mtu huyo na umsaidie kupata amani katika Mungu. Lazima tujikubali,
Kimwili, kama sisi, na kuendelea kutoka hapo.
• PEKEE MAHUSIANO. Toa betaine hydrochloride na enzymes za kongosho.
• Toa mimea ambayo husaidia kuchochea hamu ya kula: bendera tamu, kalamu, manjano ya manjano,
Buckbean, au Marsh Trefoil. Toa mimea kabla ya milo.
• Programu nzuri ya lishe, pamoja na kuongeza vitamini/madini, ni kwa nguvu sana
inahitajika. Shida dhaifu ni kupata mtu huyo kula chakula cha kutosha, ili kawaida
Mizani inaweza kupatikana tena.
-Unaona "Bulimia."
Dalili - watu huu ambao hujaribu kuendelea kupoteza uzito zaidi.
Sababu -zote mbili anorexia nervosa na bulimia ni shida za kula, lakini sio
Sawa.
Anorexia anafafanua watu ambao, ingawa nyembamba na mara nyingi dhaifu, wana hakika kuwa wanahitaji kupoteza zaidi
uzani. Wanaogopa chakula na kupata uzito, na hawatakula.
Bulimia anafafanua watu ambao hujaribu kula kidogo, kisha endelea kula binge kwa sababu wanahisi kuwa na njaa. Kila moja
Moja inahitimishwa kwa kusafisha (iliyochochewa kutapika) ili kuleta chakula kinacholiwa. (Tazama "Bulimia.")
Kuamini wao ni wazito, wanaogopa kupata zaidi, watu hawa badala yake hujaribu kutunza
yenyewe na njaa. Wao huwa na kujistahi, na mara nyingi hufadhaika. Hakika kwamba wanaonekana
Kutisha, na hakika kuwa kula bado kunaweza kutatua shida, watu hawa wana muundo wa kufikiria ambao
ni ngumu kubadilika.
Katika hali nyingine, unywaji wa dawa za kulevya na/au pombe pia huhusika.
Ukosefu wa lishe sahihi huelekea kuongeza hisia na mitazamo.
Karibu anorexics yote ni wanawake, kawaida kati ya umri wa miaka 12 hadi 18.
Neno, "anorexia," linamaanisha "hasara ya hamu," na kitaalam inaweza kutumika kwa mtu yeyote ambaye anaendelea
Kujitenga kula chakula. Hii inaweza kusababishwa na mafadhaiko, utapiamlo, mshtuko, au kuumia. Lakini, leo,
Muda kwa ujumla hutumika tu kwa wale ambao wana anorexia nervosa. Nakala hii inatumika tu kwa mwisho huu
Ufafanuzi.
Wengine huchukulia anorexia nervosa kama ugonjwa wa magonjwa ya akili. Wengine wanaamini majibu hayo kwa nguvu,
Mkusanyiko wa msingi wa vyakula vya mzio ndio shida. Maneno yanayorudiwa mara kwa mara, "Mimi huhisi bora kila wakati
Wakati mimi si kula, na kuhisi vibaya ninapofanya hivyo, "inaweza kutumika kwa maoni yote mawili.
Karibu theluthi moja ya wale walio na shida hii hufa mapema kutokana na njaa, maambukizo, shida za moyo, au
kujiua.
Sababu ya msingi lazima ishughulikiwe. Upendo na uelewa unahitajika. Msaada kutoka kwa mtu wa nje
Familia inaweza kuhitajika. Walakini, kuna hatari katika kushauriana na washauri wa kitaalam au
wanasaikolojia, kwa kuwa wamepata mafunzo katika taratibu za hypnotic; Idadi inayokua ya matukio ni
Kutokea ambapo kinachojulikana kama "kumbukumbu zilizokandamizwa" huingizwa katika ushauri. - na hiyo inaongeza tu
Shida!

title: Bulimia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Follow the suggestions for anorexia (which see).
• Do not eat any sugar or sugary foods. Avoid all junk food and white flour products. A
simple, nourishing diet is urgently needed in order to restore the needed balance in life.
• The person should expect to experience temporary anxiety, depression, insomnia, and
possible irritation, as he attempts to break with the old way of life. But the rewards are
outstanding and well- worth the effort.
• CCK (cholecystokinin-pancreozymin) is a hormone, found in the small intestine and
brain which signals a satisfied feeling and that it is time to stop eating. When a person gets
into a pattern of overeating, that hormone is not properly produced. So the person only
feels satisfied after heavily overeating a meal.
• The only solution is to rigorously eat just so much, even though it does not seem like
enough. Eventually, the hormone will start being produced again in the proper amount at
the proper time.
—Also see "Anorexia nervosa."
SYMPTOMS—The people appear normal, and the symptoms occur in secret.
CAUSES—Bulimia describes people who try to eat less to keep their weight down; then, every so often,
they go on a eating binge. This is followed by purging (induced vomiting) or the taking of laxatives, so
the food will be eliminated without being properly digested. (Also see "Anorexia nervosa.")
Bulimia can result in serious physical problems, including hypoglycemia, internal bleeding, ulcers,
erratic heartbeat, kidney damage, menstrual cessation, low pulse rate and blood pressure, and glandular
damage.
Some bulimiacs overdo on exercise, in order to better manage weight and somehow improve an already
unbalanced situation.
Professions requiring a beautiful appearance are where we are most likely to find bulimiacs (models,
actors, dancers, ballet dancers). By her own admission, Princess Diane is a bulimiac. Thinness is equated
with beauty by many people.
Oddly enough, while anorexics tend to be overly thin, bulimiacs are generally just right; not too heavy or
too thin.
But their way of life may produce hair loss, yellow skin, premature wrinkles, muscle fatigue, dizziness,
and extreme weakness.
The primary physical signs are those which are caused by sessions of induced vomiting: swollen salivary
glands, constant sore throat, hiatal hernia, esophageal inflammation, erosion of the enamel of the back
teeth, swollen glands in the face and neck, and broken blood vessels in the face.
If laxative abuse is done, then rectal bleeding, bowel damage, and chronic diarrhea may result.
Excessive laxative use removes an excess of potassium and sodium, leading to muscle spasms,
dehydration, and eventual cardiac arrest.
Bulimiacs tend to have low levels of serotonin, which can lead to increased cravings for simple
carbohydrates (sugars). Yet it is likely that the binges produced those chronically low levels.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Fuata maoni ya anorexia (ambayo huona).
• Usila sukari yoyote au vyakula vya sukari. Epuka chakula chote cha chakula na bidhaa nyeupe za unga. A
Lishe rahisi, yenye lishe inahitajika haraka ili kurejesha usawa unaohitajika katika maisha.
• Mtu anapaswa kutarajia kupata wasiwasi wa muda, unyogovu, kukosa usingizi, na
Inawezekana kuwasha, wakati anajaribu kuvunja njia ya zamani ya maisha. Lakini thawabu ni
bora na yenye thamani ya juhudi.
• CCK (cholecystokinin-pancreozymin) ni homoni, inayopatikana ndani ya utumbo mdogo na
Ubongo ambao unaashiria hisia ya kuridhika na kwamba ni wakati wa kuacha kula. Wakati mtu anapata
Katika muundo wa kupita kiasi, homoni hiyo haizalishwa vizuri. Kwa hivyo mtu tu
Anahisi kuridhika baada ya kula chakula kupita kiasi.
• Suluhisho la pekee ni kula kwa ukali sana, ingawa haionekani kama
Inatosha. Mwishowe, homoni itaanza kuzalishwa tena kwa kiwango sahihi kwa
wakati unaofaa.
-Unaona "anorexia nervosa."
Dalili -Watu huonekana kuwa wa kawaida, na dalili hufanyika kwa siri.
Sababu -Bulimia inaelezea watu ambao hujaribu kula kidogo kuweka uzito wao chini; Halafu, kila mara,
Wanaendelea kula chakula. Hii inafuatwa na kusafisha (kutapika kwa kutapika) au kuchukua kwa laxatives, kwa hivyo
Chakula kitaondolewa bila kuchimbwa vizuri. (Pia tazama "Anorexia Nervosa.")
Bulimia inaweza kusababisha shida kubwa za mwili, pamoja na hypoglycemia, kutokwa na damu ndani, vidonda,
Mapigo ya moyo, uharibifu wa figo, kukomesha hedhi, kiwango cha chini cha kunde na shinikizo la damu, na glandular
Uharibifu.
Baadhi ya bulimiacs huzidi mazoezi, ili kusimamia vyema uzito na kwa namna fulani kuboresha tayari
hali isiyo na usawa.
Utaalam unaohitaji muonekano mzuri ni mahali tunapowezekana kupata bulimiacs (mifano,
Watendaji, wachezaji, wachezaji wa ballet). Kwa kukiri kwake mwenyewe, Princess Diane ni bulimiac. Nyembamba ni sawa
na uzuri na watu wengi.
Oddly kutosha, wakati anorexics huwa nyembamba kupita kiasi, bulimiacs kwa ujumla ni sawa; sio nzito sana au
nyembamba sana.
Lakini njia yao ya maisha inaweza kutoa upotezaji wa nywele, ngozi ya manjano, kasoro za mapema, uchovu wa misuli, kizunguzungu,
na udhaifu mkubwa.
Ishara za msingi za mwili ni zile ambazo husababishwa na vikao vya kutapika: mshono wa kuvimba
Tezi, koo la mara kwa mara, hernia ya hiatal, uchochezi wa esophageal, mmomonyoko wa enamel ya nyuma
Meno, tezi zilizovimba usoni na shingo, na mishipa ya damu iliyovunjika usoni.
Ikiwa unyanyasaji wa laxative umefanywa, basi kutokwa damu kwa rectal, uharibifu wa matumbo, na kuhara sugu kunaweza kusababisha.
Matumizi ya laxative kupita kiasi huondoa ziada ya potasiamu na sodiamu, na kusababisha spasms za misuli,
Upungufu wa maji mwilini, na kukamatwa kwa moyo na moyo.
Bulimiacs huwa na viwango vya chini vya serotonin, ambayo inaweza kusababisha hamu ya kuongezeka kwa rahisi
wanga (sukari). Bado kuna uwezekano kwamba binge zilitoa viwango vya chini vya sugu.

title: Celiac Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• You will want to avoid the gluten foods, which are wheat, oats, rye, and barley.
• The follow grains do not have gluten: corn, millet, and rice. Soybeans, quince, and
amaranth are also okay. Buckwheat is okay for some celiacs, but not for others.
• All grains fed to babies (and adults too) should be cooked for 2-3 hours, if the
preparation is done by boiling at 212o F.
• Do not eat products containing cow's milk. Breast-feed the child, to avoid using cow's
milk.
• Do not overeat sugar or white-flour products.
• Eat a nourishing diet, including fresh fruit and vegetables, and vegetable juices. Fiber is
important in the diet of celiacs.
• Allisatin, found in garlic, is said to help treat celiac disease.
• Ripe bananas are tolerated well, and help control the diarrhea.
• Avoid processed, fried, and junk food. Do not eat sugary foods, chocolate, and processed
foods.
• Read the labels, and watch for "hidden" gluten or cow's milk ingredients in bottles and
packages. Some of these are malt, modified food starch, some soy sauces, garin vinegars,
binders, fillers, excipients, and "natural flavorings." Almost all commercial breads, bread
mixes, crackers, etc., contain gluten. It is often found in commercially prepared puddings,
candies, cookies, cakes, ice cream, salad dressings, luncheon meats, frankfurters, canned
chili, macaroni, noodles, spaghetti, bread stuffings, and anything thickened with flour
(soups, vegetables, bottled meat sauces, gravies, flavoring syrups, sauces, cocoa mixes.
• Only eat homemade desserts.
• Frozen, fresh, or canned vegetable and vegetable juices are all right.
• Breads and cereals made from rice, millet, soybean, corn, or potato starch are okay.
• Do not eat meat.
• Avoid tobacco, tea, coffee, and alcohol.
• Helpful herbs include aloe vera, burdock, pau d'arco, psyllium, saffron, slippery elm, and
alfalfa.
—Also see "Lactose Intolerance." Both have some similar symptoms and problems. Also see "Crohn's
Disease."
(Celiac Sprue, Gluten Intolerance)
SYMPTOMS—Diarrhea, weight loss, and nutritional deficiencies such as anemia. Other symptoms
include frequently pale and/or light-yellow, foul-smelling stools that float; fatigue; depression;
abdominal swelling; muscle cramps; wasting; and bone and/or joint pain. Diarrhea is the most
commonly observed symptom.
Infants and children may show vomiting; stunted growth; intense burning sensation of the skin; and a
red, itchy skin rash. Ulcers may develop in the mouth. The child may look anemic and undernourished.
Babies may lose weight or gain it more slowly, and do not seem to be thriving well. The disease can
begin in the first few months of life.
CAUSES—Celiac disease affects the small intestine. There are abnormalities in the intestinal lining, due
to a permanent intolerance to gluten. Gluten is in wheat, rye, barley, and oats. (Corn, rice, millet,
soybeans, quinoa, and amaranth do not contain gluten. There seems to be a little uncertainty about
buckwheat.) The protein, gliaden, is thought to be the toxic part of the gluten. It interacts with the lining
of the intestines, causing the tiny absorptive fingers which jut from it (the villi) to flatten and atrophy.
As a result, nutrients are not absorbed (including vitamins A, D, and K) and the disease symptoms
appear.
Unfortunately, many physicians and the food industries recommend that grains be introduced into the
diet of the infant when they are less than a year old. This can prompt celiac disease to first appear then
or even decades later.
This is important! Tell every expectant mother not to feed her child grains until it is at least a year old.
Removing gluten from the diet of a celiac produces a marked change; whether an infant, child, or adult,
the person starts feeling better again. But he must not return to gluten foods.
Some infants do not tolerate cow's milk protein, and react to it with celiac symptoms, even before gluten
is given to them. So remove that also from them.
Celiac disease is often misdiagnosed as spastic colon, irritable bowel syndrome, or something else which
affects the intestines.
Yet, if left untreated, celiac disease can be quite serious. It can lead to pancreatic disease, infertility,
miscarriages, internal hemorrhaging, bone disease, gynecological disorders, nervous system damage,
intestinal lymphoma, and many more. For example, anemia is common, due to poor absorption of folic
acid, iron, and vitamins B and K.
12
Scarring of the intestinal lining can progress so far that, by the age of 45 to 50, 90% of the intestine can
be damaged, resulting in a significant reduction (as much as 70%) of the absorptive surfaces.
But there is evidence that partial repair to those walls can be made within several months, if you
permanently part company with the offending foods.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Utataka kuzuia vyakula vya gluten, ambavyo ni ngano, shayiri, rye, na shayiri.
• Nafaka zinazofuata hazina gluten: mahindi, mtama, na mchele. Soybeans, quince, na
Amaranth pia ni sawa. Buckwheat ni sawa kwa celiacs, lakini sio kwa wengine.
• Nafaka zote zinazolishwa kwa watoto (na watu wazima pia) zinapaswa kupikwa kwa masaa 2-3, ikiwa
Maandalizi hufanywa kwa kuchemsha saa 212o F.
• Usila bidhaa zilizo na maziwa ya ng'ombe. Kumnyonyesha mtoto, kuzuia kutumia ng'ombe
maziwa.
• Usichukue sukari au bidhaa-nyeupe.
• Kula lishe yenye lishe, pamoja na matunda na mboga safi, na juisi za mboga. Nyuzi ni
muhimu katika lishe ya celiacs.
• Allisatin, inayopatikana katika vitunguu, inasemekana kusaidia kutibu ugonjwa wa celiac.
• Ndizi zilizoiva zinavumiliwa vizuri, na husaidia kudhibiti kuhara.
• Epuka kusindika, kukaanga, na chakula kisicho na chakula. Usila vyakula vyenye sukari, chokoleti, na kusindika
vyakula.
• Soma lebo, na uangalie viungo vya "siri" au viungo vya maziwa kwenye chupa na
vifurushi. Baadhi ya hizi ni malt, wanga wa chakula uliobadilishwa, sosi za soya, mini ya garin,
Vifungashio, vichungi, viboreshaji, na "ladha asili." Karibu mikate yote ya kibiashara, mkate
Mchanganyiko, viboreshaji, nk, vyenye gluten. Mara nyingi hupatikana katika puddings zilizoandaliwa kibiashara,
pipi, kuki, keki, ice cream, mavazi ya saladi, nyama ya chakula cha mchana, viboreshaji, makopo
pilipili, macaroni, noodles, spaghetti, vitu vya mkate, na kitu chochote kilichotiwa na unga
(Supu, mboga mboga, michuzi ya nyama ya chupa, changarawe, syrups za ladha, michuzi, mchanganyiko wa kakao.
• Kula tu dessert za nyumbani.
• Vijana waliohifadhiwa, safi, au mboga za makopo na juisi za mboga ziko sawa.
• Mikate na nafaka zilizotengenezwa kutoka kwa mchele, mtama, soya, mahindi, au wanga wa viazi ni sawa.
• Usila nyama.
• Epuka tumbaku, chai, kahawa, na pombe.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na Aloe Vera, Burdock, Pau d'Arco, Psyllium, Saffron, Elm ya Slippery, na
alfalfa.
-Unaona "Uvumilivu wa lactose." Wote wana dalili na shida zinazofanana. Pia angalia "Crohn's
Ugonjwa. "
(Celiac Sprue, Uvumilivu wa Gluten)
Dalili -diarrhea, kupunguza uzito, na upungufu wa lishe kama vile anemia. Dalili zingine
Jumuisha mara kwa mara na/au nyepesi-njano, viti vyenye harufu mbaya ambavyo huelea; uchovu; Unyogovu;
uvimbe wa tumbo; misuli ya misuli; kupoteza; na mfupa na/au maumivu ya pamoja. Kuhara ndio zaidi
Dalili inayoonekana kawaida.
Watoto wachanga na watoto wanaweza kuonyesha kutapika; ukuaji wa nguvu; hisia kali za ngozi; na a
Nyekundu, upele wa ngozi. Vidonda vinaweza kukuza kinywani. Mtoto anaweza kuonekana kuwa na shida na lishe.
Watoto wanaweza kupoteza uzito au kuipata polepole zaidi, na haionekani kuwa inakua vizuri. Ugonjwa unaweza
Anza katika miezi michache ya kwanza ya maisha.
Sababu -Ugonjwa wa seli huathiri utumbo mdogo. Kuna ukiukwaji katika bitana ya matumbo, kwa sababu
kwa uvumilivu wa kudumu kwa gluten. Gluten iko katika ngano, rye, shayiri, na shayiri. (Mahindi, mchele, mtama,
Soya, quinoa, na amaranth hazina gluten. Inaonekana kuna kutokuwa na uhakika kidogo juu
Buckwheat.) Protini, Gliaden, inadhaniwa kuwa sehemu yenye sumu ya gluten. Inaingiliana na bitana
ya matumbo, na kusababisha vidole vidogo vya kunyonya ambavyo hutoka kutoka kwake (villi) kung'aa na atrophy.
Kama matokeo, virutubishi haviingii (pamoja na vitamini A, D, na K) na dalili za ugonjwa
kuonekana.
Kwa bahati mbaya, waganga wengi na viwanda vya chakula vinapendekeza kwamba nafaka ziingizwe kwenye
Lishe ya mtoto mchanga wakati ni chini ya mwaka mmoja. Hii inaweza kuhamasisha ugonjwa wa celiac kuonekana kwanza wakati huo
au hata miongo kadhaa baadaye.
Hii ni muhimu! Mwambie kila mama anayetarajia asilisha nafaka za mtoto wake hadi awe na umri wa miaka angalau.
Kuondoa gluten kutoka kwa lishe ya celiac hutoa mabadiliko ya alama; ikiwa mtoto mchanga, mtoto, au mtu mzima,
Mtu huanza kujisikia vizuri tena. Lakini lazima asirudi kwenye vyakula vya gluten.
Watoto wengine hawavumilii protini ya maziwa ya ng'ombe, na huitikia na dalili za celiac, hata kabla ya gluten
hupewa. Kwa hivyo ondoa hiyo pia kutoka kwao.
Ugonjwa wa celiac mara nyingi hutambuliwa vibaya kama koloni ya spastic, ugonjwa wa matumbo usio na hasira, au kitu kingine ambacho
huathiri matumbo.
Walakini, ikiwa imeachwa bila kutibiwa, ugonjwa wa celiac unaweza kuwa mbaya kabisa. Inaweza kusababisha ugonjwa wa kongosho, utasa,
Miscarriages, kutokwa na damu ndani, ugonjwa wa mfupa, shida za ugonjwa wa uzazi, uharibifu wa mfumo wa neva,
Lymphoma ya ndani, na mengi zaidi. Kwa mfano, anemia ni ya kawaida, kwa sababu ya kunyonya vibaya kwa folic
Asidi, chuma, na vitamini B na K.
12
Kukosoa kwa bitana ya matumbo kunaweza kuendelea hadi sasa kwamba, kwa umri wa miaka 45 hadi 50, 90% ya utumbo unaweza
kuharibiwa, na kusababisha kupunguzwa kubwa (kama 70%) ya nyuso za kunyonya.
Lakini kuna ushahidi kwamba ukarabati wa sehemu kwa ukuta huo unaweza kufanywa ndani ya miezi kadhaa, ikiwa wewe
Sehemu ya kudumu ya kampuni na vyakula vya kukosea.

title: Lactose Intolerance
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Avoid all milk and dairy products. This includes ice cream.
• Beware of products which contain small amounts of added milk ingredients, such as
"milk solids." Lactose is added to many processed foods, including cookies, pancake
mixes, breads, canned and powdered soups, flavored coffees, powdered drink mixes, and
processed meats.
• Since you cannot drink milk, eat foods which are rich in calcium. This includes broccoli,
dried figs, apricots, blackstrap molasses, and other vegetable greens.
• Do not eat spinach or rhubarb, for they contain a chemical which blocks absorption of
calcium.
• Take supplemental calcium gluconate (or calcium lactate) powder. This is an excellent
source of nutritional calcium.
• Many pharmaceutical drugs contain lactose as a filler.
• Do not eat any solid food during a lactose attack of diarrhea. Just drink lots of good
water and replace lost minerals.
• Acidophilus milk would not help the person with lactose intolerance, for the acidophilus
works to improve conditions in the colon, and the problems with lactose occur in the small
intestine.
—Also see "Celiac Disease." Both have some similar symptoms and problems.
SYMPTOMS—Diarrhea, gas, and abdominal cramps. Symptoms generally begin 30 minutes to 2 hours
after eating dairy products.
In infants, symptoms include foamy diarrhea with diaper rash, slow weight gain and development, as
well as vomiting.
CAUSES—Lactose intolerance is inability to digest milk sugar. The intestinal wall is not able to make
the digestive enzyme, lactase, which is needed to split lactose into glucose and galactose. When the
lactose is not split, it remains undigested in the intestinal tract; retains fluid; and ferments in the colon,
producing gas, diarrhea, and abdominal cramping.
Although it can cause digestive disruption and discomfort, lactose intolerance will not produce
dangerous results, and can be easily controlled through careful diet.
Oddly enough, hardly any adults in the world can digest milk sugar after the age of 20. The exceptions
are most Caucasians of northern European origin.
The following infections can result in lactose intolerance: irritable bowel syndrome, regional enteritis,
and ulcerative colitis.
Although less common, in infants and children it can occur after a severe attack of gastroenteritis, which
injures the intestinal wall.
If you are pregnant and there is lactose intolerance in your family, plan to breast-feed your child or give
him a non-dairy formula (such as soy milk). But, if you do, give him added calcium gluconate powder,
since soy milk does not contain enough calcium.
Lactose intolerance is different than milk allergy. A person with lactose intolerance cannot digest milk
sugar; one with milk allergy can digest milk, but his immune system is antagonistic to one or more of its
components.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Epuka maziwa yote na bidhaa za maziwa. Hii ni pamoja na ice cream.
• Jihadharini na bidhaa ambazo zina kiasi kidogo cha viungo vya maziwa vilivyoongezwa, kama vile
"Maziwa ya maziwa." Lactose inaongezwa kwa vyakula vingi vya kusindika, pamoja na kuki, pancake
Mchanganyiko, mikate, supu za makopo na zenye unga, kahawa iliyoangaziwa, mchanganyiko wa kinywaji cha unga, na
nyama iliyosindika.
• Kwa kuwa huwezi kunywa maziwa, kula vyakula vyenye kalsiamu. Hii ni pamoja na broccoli,
Matini kavu, apricots, molasses nyeusi, na mboga zingine za mboga.
• Usile mchicha au rhubarb, kwa kuwa zina kemikali ambayo inazuia kunyonya kwa
Kalsiamu.
• Chukua poda ya ziada ya kalsiamu (au kalsiamu lactate). Hii ni bora
Chanzo cha kalsiamu ya lishe.
• Dawa nyingi za dawa zina lactose kama filler.
• Usila chakula chochote ngumu wakati wa shambulio la lactose ya kuhara. Kunywa tu mema mengi
maji na ubadilishe madini yaliyopotea.
• Maziwa ya acidophilus hayangemsaidia mtu aliye na uvumilivu wa lactose, kwa acidophilus
inafanya kazi kuboresha hali katika koloni, na shida na lactose hufanyika katika ndogo
utumbo.
-Unaona "Ugonjwa wa Celiac." Wote wana dalili na shida zinazofanana.
Dalili -diarrhea, gesi, na tumbo la tumbo. Dalili kwa ujumla huanza dakika 30 hadi masaa 2
Baada ya kula bidhaa za maziwa.
Katika watoto wachanga, dalili ni pamoja na kuhara kwa povu na upele wa diaper, kupata uzito polepole na maendeleo, kama
Pamoja na kutapika.
Sababu -Uvumilivu wa Lactose ni kutokuwa na uwezo wa kuchimba sukari ya maziwa. Ukuta wa matumbo hauwezi kutengeneza
Enzyme ya utumbo, lactase, ambayo inahitajika kugawa lactose ndani ya sukari na galactose. Wakati
Lactose haijagawanyika, bado haijafungwa kwenye njia ya matumbo; huhifadhi maji; na Ferments kwenye koloni,
Kuzalisha gesi, kuhara, na kupunguka kwa tumbo.
Ingawa inaweza kusababisha usumbufu wa utumbo na usumbufu, uvumilivu wa lactose hautazaa
Matokeo hatari, na yanaweza kudhibitiwa kwa urahisi kupitia lishe makini.
Oddly ya kutosha, sio watu wazima wowote ulimwenguni wanaweza kuchimba sukari ya maziwa baada ya umri wa miaka 20. Isipokuwa
ni watu wengi wa Caucasians wa asili ya kaskazini mwa Ulaya.
Maambukizi yafuatayo yanaweza kusababisha uvumilivu wa lactose: Dalili ya Bowel isiyowezekana, Ertitis ya Mkoa,
na colitis ya ulcerative.
Ingawa ni ya kawaida, kwa watoto wachanga na watoto inaweza kutokea baada ya shambulio kali la gastroenteritis, ambayo
Huumiza ukuta wa matumbo.
Ikiwa una mjamzito na kuna uvumilivu wa lactose katika familia yako, panga kunyonyesha mtoto wako au kumpa
yeye formula isiyo ya maziwa (kama vile maziwa ya soya). Lakini, ikiwa utafanya, mpe poda ya gluconate ya kalsiamu,
Kwa kuwa maziwa ya soya haina kalsiamu ya kutosha.
Uvumilivu wa lactose ni tofauti kuliko mzio wa maziwa. Mtu aliye na uvumilivu wa lactose hawezi kuchimba maziwa
sukari; Mtu aliye na mzio wa maziwa anaweza kuchimba maziwa, lakini mfumo wake wa kinga ni wa kupingana na moja au zaidi yake
vifaa.

title: Wilson'S Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• A lifetime must be spent avoiding things which have copper and taking substances
which remove it from the body.
• Check your drinking water, to make sure it has no copper. If it has more than 1 part per
million of copper, drink bottled water.
• Make sure your vitamin/mineral supplements do not include copper.
• Onions and garlic contain sulfur, which helps rid the body of copper. But do not take
flowers of sulfur (the chemical sulfur); they will give you boils.
• Eliminate from the diet those foods which are high in copper. This includes chocolate,
molasses, nuts, organ meats, shellfish, broccoli, mushrooms, avocados, legumes, oats, egg
yolks, soybeans, raisins, and whole grains.
• Maintain a high intake of vitamin C and zinc, since copper in the body tends to destroy
both.
• Avoid exposure to metal.
SYMPTOMS—The fissure sign is a pigmented ring (the Kayser-Fleischer ring) at the outer margin of
the cornea of the eye.
Later symptoms include bloody vomit; drooling; an enlarged spleen; jaundice; difficulty in speaking,
swallowing, and/or walking; loss of coordination; progressive fatigue, weakness, intellectual
impairment; personality changes; bizarre behavior; spasms, tremors, rigidity of the muscles; fluid
accumulation; swelling in the abdomen; and weight loss.
Although the disease begins at birth, symptoms generally do not appear until the age of six or more often
in the teens or later.
CAUSES—Wilson's disease is rare and inherited. The body is not able to metabolize the trace mineral
copper, although it is still absorbed by the small intestine into the blood stream.
The result is an excess of copper in the various organs (liver, kidneys, brain, and corneas of the eyes). If
not cared for, Wilson's disease will result in serious damage to the liver and brain, and, ultimately, death.
Early detection and treatment can minimize the damage. If you have a family history of this disease,
have diagnostic tests made of you and your children. Early detection is important. The following is a
treatment for one with this disease; it should not be used by those who do not have Wilson's disease:
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Maisha yote lazima yatumike kuzuia vitu ambavyo vina shaba na kuchukua vitu
ambayo huondoa kutoka kwa mwili.
• Angalia maji yako ya kunywa, ili kuhakikisha kuwa haina shaba. Ikiwa ina zaidi ya sehemu 1 kwa
Milioni ya shaba, kunywa maji ya chupa.
• Hakikisha virutubisho vyako vya vitamini/madini hazijumuishi shaba.
• Vitunguu na vitunguu vyenye kiberiti, ambayo husaidia kuondoa mwili wa shaba. Lakini usichukue
maua ya kiberiti (kiberiti cha kemikali); Watakupa majipu.
• Kuondoa kutoka kwa lishe vyakula ambavyo ni vya juu katika shaba. Hii ni pamoja na chokoleti,
molasses, karanga, nyama ya viungo, ganda, broccoli, uyoga, avocados, kunde, shayiri, yai, yai
Viini, soya, zabibu, na nafaka nzima.
• Kudumisha ulaji mkubwa wa vitamini C na zinki, kwani shaba katika mwili huelekea kuharibu
zote mbili.
• Epuka mfiduo wa chuma.
Dalili-Ishara ya Fissure ni pete iliyotiwa rangi (pete ya Kayser-Fleischer) pembezoni mwa nje ya
cornea ya jicho.
Dalili za baadaye ni pamoja na kutapika kwa umwagaji damu; drooling; wengu iliyokuzwa; Jaundice; ugumu wa kuongea,
kumeza, na/au kutembea; kupoteza uratibu; Uchovu unaoendelea, udhaifu, akili
udhaifu; mabadiliko ya utu; tabia ya ajabu; spasms, kutetemeka, ugumu wa misuli; maji
mkusanyiko; uvimbe ndani ya tumbo; na kupoteza uzito.
Ingawa ugonjwa huanza wakati wa kuzaa, dalili kwa ujumla hazionekani hadi umri wa miaka sita au zaidi mara nyingi
katika vijana au baadaye.
Sababu -Ugonjwa wa Wilson ni nadra na urithi. Mwili hauwezi kutengenezea madini ya kuwafuata
Copper, ingawa bado inachukuliwa na utumbo mdogo kwenye mkondo wa damu.
Matokeo yake ni ziada ya shaba katika viungo anuwai (ini, figo, ubongo, na corneas ya macho). Ikiwa
Haikutunzwa, ugonjwa wa Wilson utasababisha uharibifu mkubwa kwa ini na ubongo, na, mwishowe, kifo.
Ugunduzi wa mapema na matibabu zinaweza kupunguza uharibifu. Ikiwa una historia ya familia ya ugonjwa huu,

title: Emaciation
contentEn:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., Formulas)
BASIC FACTORS—Rest in bed, fattening diet that will build tissue and blood. This should include
dairy products, well-cooked cereals, malted or predigested cereals, a graduated program of tonic
treatments (the Tonic Frictions). Fomentation over the stomach twice daily, followed by Hot Abdominal
Pack.
GASTRIC ULCER—Withhold food by mouth; rectal feeding; Fomentation over stomach twice daily;
well-protected Heating Compress during the interval between. Graduated Tonic Frictions.
CHRONIC GASTRITIS—Rest in bed; abdominal Fomentations 2-3 times daily; Protected Heating
Compress during intervals.
INTESTINAL CATARRH—Enema at 950 F. after each bowel movement. During the interval
between, apply a Heating Compress at 600 F., changing it every 30 minutes.
HYPOPEPSIA—Graduated tonic treatment (Tonic Frictions), Ice Bag over stomach half an hour before
each meal.
CONTRAINDICATIONS—Avoid prolonged Hot Baths and Cold Full Baths.
GENERAL METHOD—The general plan of treatment must be such as to secure increased income of
tissue-building material with a diminished outflow, hence the diet must be very simple, easily
assimilable, and taken in as large a quantity as possible. Exercise must be diminished or, in grave cases,
suspended altogether. Moderate exercise may be allowed, if necessary, to maintain the appetite. Special
attention must be given to increase of the appetite and improvement of digestion by suitable
hydrotherapy applications. Cold applications must be very short and intense, so as to produce strong
nervous impressions upon the nerve centers without removing animal heat, to any considerable degree,
or increasing oxidation.

title: Pica
contentEn:
(craves dirt)
SYMPTOMS—The child keeps eating dirt.
CAUSES—Children eat dirt because they crave minerals which they are not obtaining enough of in the
foods served them. Sometimes they eat paint chips from the walls. But paint often contains lead or
cadmium, both of which are quite toxic. Lead can produce brain damage. (See "Lead Poisoning.")
TREATMENT—Supplement the child's diet with extra vitamins and minerals.
• Include Nova Scotia dulse or Norwegian kelp in his diet. This will supply trace minerals.
If you live near the ocean, add a little ocean water to help salt the food. Do pulse tests to
determine if a celiac type of disease exists (see "Pulse Test," and "Celiac Disease").
• Do a hair analysis test, to determine which minerals are needed.

(anatamani uchafu)

title: Malabsorption Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The great need is to cleanse the body, and then rebuild it with a good, healthy program.
• A good nourishing diet, as discussed elsewhere in this book; rest; exercise out-of-doors;
fresh air; sunlight; freedom from worry and tension—all these are needed.
• Oregon grape and gentian are healing and improve digestion. Chamomile calms the
nervous stomach. Peppermint and parsley are also healing.
• Make sure the bowels are kept open and working properly. This reduces toxins in the
intestinal tract and digestive organs.
• Locate specific causes and problems and apply solutions, as given elsewhere in this
book.
SYMPTOMS—Anemia, diarrhea, and weight loss are frequent. Sometimes there is weight gain instead
of weight loss.
Other symptoms may include dry skin, fatigue, abdominal bloating, gas, constipation, diarrhea, PMS,
thinning hair, tendency to bruise easily, depression, or inability to concentrate. There may also be vision
problems (especially night vision; and bulky, pale, and fatty stools (known as steatorrhea).
CAUSES—This appears to be a wastebasket category. Whenever nutrients, in general, cannot be
properly absorbed by the gastro-intestinal (GI) tract, the problem is dubbed "malabsorption syndrome."
Possible causes include an impoverished diet, primarily junk food. The body may not be producing
enough digestive enzymes. Vitamin B complex may not be in the diet or is not being absorbed properly.
Diseases of the gallbladder, liver and bile ducts, or pancreas may exist. There may be food allergies.
Other causes include damaged intestinal walls, caused by irritable bowel syndrome; lactose intolerance;
Crohn's disease; diverticulitis; celiac disease; colitis; parasitic infestation; excessive consumption of
antacids, alcohol, or laxatives. Chronic constipation or diarrhea can have a similar result.
Radiation therapy, sugary foods that shorten the intestinal tract, or digitalis treatment can reduce the
absorptive area of the intestines. An overgrowth of candida in the digestive tract or obstructions in the
lymphatic system can have a similar effect.
Too rapid intestinal transit time causes nutrients to pass out of the body as waste.
AIDS and cancer can produce many of these symptoms.
There are a number of other possible causes, including a variety of drug medications.
Premature aging can be caused by a decline in secretions of stomach acid and digestive enzymes.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Hitaji kubwa ni kusafisha mwili, na kisha kuijenga tena na mpango mzuri, wenye afya.
• lishe bora ya lishe, kama inavyojadiliwa mahali pengine kwenye kitabu hiki; pumzika; Zoezi nje ya milango;
hewa safi; mwangaza wa jua; Uhuru kutoka kwa wasiwasi na mvutano - haya yote yanahitajika.
• Zabibu ya Oregon na Mataifa ni uponyaji na kuboresha digestion. Chamomile hutuliza
tumbo la neva. Peppermint na parsley pia ni uponyaji.
• Hakikisha matumbo yanawekwa wazi na yanafanya kazi vizuri. Hii inapunguza sumu katika
Njia ya matumbo na viungo vya utumbo.
• Tafuta sababu maalum na shida na utumie suluhisho, kama inavyopewa mahali pengine katika hii
kitabu.
Dalili -UNEMIA, kuhara, na kupunguza uzito ni mara kwa mara. Wakati mwingine kuna faida ya uzito badala yake
ya kupunguza uzito.
Dalili zingine zinaweza kujumuisha ngozi kavu, uchovu, damu ya tumbo, gesi, kuvimbiwa, kuhara, PMS,
Kupunguza nywele, tabia ya kuumiza kwa urahisi, unyogovu, au kutoweza kujilimbikizia. Kunaweza pia kuwa na maono
Shida (haswa maono ya usiku; na viti vyenye rangi nyingi, na mafuta (inayojulikana kama steatorrhea).
Sababu - hii inaonekana kama jamii ya taka. Wakati wowote virutubishi, kwa ujumla, haziwezi kuwa
Kuchukuliwa vizuri na njia ya gastro-matumbo (GI), shida inaitwa "ugonjwa wa malabsorption."
Sababu zinazowezekana ni pamoja na lishe duni, kimsingi chakula kisicho na chakula. Mwili unaweza kuwa hauzali
Enzymes za kutosha za utumbo. Vitamini B tata inaweza kuwa sio katika lishe au haiingii vizuri.
Magonjwa ya gallbladder, ini na ducts bile, au kongosho zinaweza kuwapo. Kunaweza kuwa na mzio wa chakula.
Sababu zingine ni pamoja na kuta zilizoharibiwa za matumbo, zinazosababishwa na ugonjwa wa matumbo usio na hasira; uvumilivu wa lactose;
Ugonjwa wa Crohn; diverticulitis; ugonjwa wa celiac; Colitis; udhalilishaji wa vimelea; matumizi ya kupita kiasi ya
Antacids, pombe, au laxatives. Kuvimbiwa sugu au kuhara inaweza kuwa na matokeo sawa.
Tiba ya mionzi, vyakula vyenye sukari ambavyo vinafupisha njia ya matumbo, au matibabu ya digitalis yanaweza kupunguza
eneo la kunyonya la matumbo. Kuongezeka kwa candida katika njia ya utumbo au vizuizi katika
Mfumo wa lymphatic unaweza kuwa na athari sawa.
Wakati wa haraka sana wa usafirishaji wa matumbo husababisha virutubishi kupita nje ya mwili kama taka.
UKIMWI na saratani zinaweza kutoa dalili hizi nyingi.
Kuna sababu zingine kadhaa zinazowezekana, pamoja na dawa tofauti za dawa.
Kuzeeka mapema kunaweza kusababishwa na kupungua kwa asidi ya asidi ya tumbo na enzymes za utumbo.

title: Beriberi
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Eat brown rice, raw fruits and vegetables, seeds, nuts, legumes, and whole grains.
• Take vitamin/mineral supplements.
• Do not drink liquids with your meals, for this washes away water-soluble vitamins.
(B Vitamin Deficiency)
SYMPTOMS—In children: mental confusion, muscle wasting, impaired growth, convulsions, nausea,
vomiting, stomach and intestinal problems, diarrhea, and constipation.
In adults: weight loss, diarrhea, edema, fatigue.
CAUSES—Beriberi is a nutritional disease, caused by a deficiency of thiamine (vitamin B ), but also all
1
the other B complex vitamins, as well.
Beriberi is not common in the West. In the East, where many subsist primarily on polished (hulled) rice,
it is endemic. The rice bran contains the vitamins, and the polished kernel only contains starch and
protein.
In America, beriberi occurs as a result of alcoholism, hypothyroidism, pregnancy, infections, or stress.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kula mchele wa kahawia, matunda mabichi na mboga, mbegu, karanga, kunde, na nafaka nzima.
• Chukua virutubisho vya vitamini/madini.
• Usinywe vinywaji na milo yako, kwa sababu hii huondoa vitamini vyenye mumunyifu wa maji.
(B Upungufu wa Vitamini)
Dalili -kwa watoto: machafuko ya akili, kupoteza misuli, ukuaji wa kuharibika, kutetemeka, kichefuchefu,
kutapika, tumbo na shida za matumbo, kuhara, na kuvimbiwa.
Katika watu wazima: Kupunguza uzito, kuhara, edema, uchovu.
Sababu -Beriberi ni ugonjwa wa lishe, unaosababishwa na upungufu wa thiamine (vitamini B), lakini pia yote
1
Vitamini vingine vya B tata, vile vile.
Beriberi sio kawaida katika Magharibi. Mashariki, ambapo wengi hukaa kwenye mchele uliochafuliwa (uliochomwa),
ni ugonjwa. Matawi ya mchele yana vitamini, na kernel iliyotiwa poli tu ina wanga na
protini.
Huko Amerika, Beriberi hufanyika kama matokeo ya ulevi, hypothyroidism, ujauzito, maambukizo, au mafadhaiko.

title: Pellagra
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Eat plenty of foods high in the B vitamins and take nutritional supplements.
• Worthwhile foods would include potatoes, legumes, broccoli, collards, bananas, figs,
nuts, seeds, peanut butter, tomatoes, prunes, and whole grain breads and cereals.
(B Vitamin Deficiency)
SYMPTOMS—Depression, anxiety, dizziness, headaches, diarrhea, loss of appetite, red tongue that is
sore and inflamed, weakness, weight loss, dementia, and itchy skin on the hands and neck.
It is sometimes diagnosed as mental illness.
CAUSES—Pellagra is a deficiency disease, caused by a severe lack of several vitamins. It is rare in the
United States at this time; but, when it does occur, it is caused by diseases which heavily deplete those
vitamins.
The primary vitamins involved are niacin (vitamin B ) and, secondarily, thiamine (B ) and riboflavin
3 1
(B ). Also needed is folic acid and vitamin B .
2 12
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kula vyakula vingi vya juu katika vitamini vya B na uchukue virutubisho vya lishe.
• Vyakula vyenye thamani vingejumuisha viazi, kunde, broccoli, collards, ndizi, tini,
Karanga, mbegu, siagi ya karanga, nyanya, prunes, na mikate yote ya nafaka na nafaka.
(B Upungufu wa Vitamini)
Dalili -Kukandamiza, wasiwasi, kizunguzungu, maumivu ya kichwa, kuhara, kupoteza hamu ya kula, lugha nyekundu ambayo ni
Vidonda na moto, udhaifu, kupoteza uzito, shida ya akili, na ngozi ya kuwasha mikononi na shingo.
Wakati mwingine hugunduliwa kama ugonjwa wa akili.
Sababu -Pellagra ni ugonjwa wa upungufu, unaosababishwa na ukosefu mkubwa wa vitamini kadhaa. Ni nadra katika
Merika kwa wakati huu; lakini, wakati inafanyika, husababishwa na magonjwa ambayo hukamilisha sana hizo
Vitamini.
Vitamini vya msingi vinavyohusika ni niacin (vitamini B) na, pili, thiamine (B) na riboflavin
3 1
(B). Inahitajika pia ni asidi ya folic na vitamini B.

title: Scurvy
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Scurvy responds, in as little as 2-3 days, to a daily intake of 100-200 mg of vitamin C.
• Fresh fruits and green leafy vegetables are also full of vitamin C.
• In order to promote blood and bone repair, from damage caused by scurvy, a well-
balanced diet, high in protein and iron, is also needed.
• Supply bioflavonoids (vitamin P), which work closely with vitamin C. These will be
found in vitamin C-rich foods.
(Vitamin C Deficiency)
SYMPTOMS—Swelling and bleeding of the gums, tenderness of joints and muscles, poor healing of
wounds, and increased susceptibility to bruising and infection. Rough, dry, discolored skin. Scurvy may
occur concurrently with gingivitis (which see).
An infant with scurvy is comfortable only when lying on his back with his knees partially bent and his
thighs turned outward. His bones are less capable of retaining calcium and phosphorous, causing them to
become weak and eventually brittle.
CAUSES—Scurvy is a malnutrition disease, caused by a diet that is deficient in vitamin C.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Scurvy anajibu, kwa siku kama 2-3, kwa ulaji wa kila siku wa 100-200 mg ya vitamini C.
Matunda safi na mboga za majani zenye majani pia zimejaa vitamini C.
• Ili kukuza ukarabati wa damu na mfupa, kutoka kwa uharibifu unaosababishwa na scurvy, kisima-
Lishe yenye usawa, juu ya protini na chuma, pia inahitajika.
• Ugavi bioflavonoids (vitamini P), ambayo inafanya kazi kwa karibu na vitamini C. hizi zitakuwa
Inapatikana katika vyakula vyenye vitamini C.
(Upungufu wa Vitamini C)
Dalili -Kupanda na kutokwa na damu kwa ufizi, huruma ya viungo na misuli, uponyaji duni wa
majeraha, na kuongezeka kwa uwezekano wa kuumiza na kuambukizwa. Ngozi mbaya, kavu, iliyofutwa. Scurvy Mei
kutokea wakati huo huo na gingivitis (ambayo huona).
Mtoto aliye na Scurvy yuko vizuri tu wakati amelala mgongoni mwake na magoti yake yameinama na yake
mapaja yakageuka nje. Mifupa yake haina uwezo wa kubakiza kalsiamu na fosforasi, na kuwafanya
kuwa dhaifu na mwishowe brittle.
Sababu -Scurvy ni ugonjwa wa utapiamlo, unaosababishwa na lishe ambayo haina upungufu wa vitamini C.

title: Kwashiorkor
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Add protein to the diet. In underdeveloped countries, a skim milk formula is usually first
given, because the child's fat-absorption ability has been damaged.
• Other foods are gradually added, until he can handle a balanced diet.
• Correct all vitamin/mineral deficiencies which may exist.
(Protein Starvation)
SYMPTOMS—Retarded growth, changes in skin and hair, diarrhea, loss of appetite, edema, and
nervous irritability.
CAUSES—Kwashiorkor (kwash-uh-OR'-kor) is a serious nutritional disease. Adequate carbohydrates
are provided, but not enough protein.
This condition generally occurs in children between the ages of one and five, who have been weaned
from milk to a diet primarily of starches and sugars.
Low blood protein levels cannot hold water in the blood vessels so it goes into the cells, producing a
distended, bloated belly and edema.
There are 22 amino acids which children need, and 20 which adults need. Complete protein meals
should be the objective.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ongeza protini kwenye lishe. Katika nchi zilizoendelea, formula ya maziwa ya skim kawaida ni ya kwanza
Kwa sababu, kwa sababu uwezo wa kunyonya mafuta ya mtoto umeharibiwa.
Chakula kingine huongezwa polepole, hadi aweze kushughulikia lishe bora.
• Sahihisha upungufu wote wa vitamini/madini ambayo inaweza kuwapo.
(Njaa ya protini)
Dalili -ukuaji wa nyuma, mabadiliko katika ngozi na nywele, kuhara, kupoteza hamu ya kula, edema, na
kuwashwa kwa neva.
Sababu-Kwashiorkor (Kwash-Uh-or'-Kor) ni ugonjwa mbaya wa lishe. Wanga wa kutosha
hutolewa, lakini sio protini ya kutosha.
Hali hii kwa ujumla hufanyika kwa watoto kati ya umri wa mmoja na watano, ambao wamelishwa
Kutoka kwa maziwa hadi lishe hasa ya wanga na sukari.
Viwango vya chini vya protini ya damu haziwezi kushikilia maji kwenye mishipa ya damu kwa hivyo huenda ndani ya seli, na kutengeneza
Kutengwa, Blow Bloated Belly na Edema.
Kuna asidi 22 ya amino ambayo watoto wanahitaji, na 20 ambayo watu wazima wanahitaji. Milo kamili ya protini
inapaswa kuwa lengo.

title: Underweight
contentEn:
TREATMENT
Your body is having a hard time meeting the challenges of life, and needs help. The recommendations
are simple enough:
• Eat a nourishing diet, such as is outlined repeatedly in this book. For some people, it
should include more calories and protein than should normally be eaten. But for many
who are habitually underweight, the solution is to continue eating moderate-sized meals,
but eating only nourishing food (no junk or processed food). Adequate and complete
proteins are essential.
• Be sure and correct vitamin and mineral deficiencies.
• You may need to take digestive enzymes and/or supplemental hydrochloric acid (betaine
HCl).
• Obtain moderate out-of-door exercise each day. This will help your system digest the
food.
• Obtain adequate rest at night, and try to lie down and rest 15, 30, or 60 minutes before
each meal. This is important, and will strengthen your body for the challenge of coping
successfully with another meal.
• Avoid stress of various kinds.
• Eat in relaxed surroundings. Do not eat when you are nervous or upset.
• Try to maintain regularity in all your habits and activities.
• For infants, mashed bananas are more easily digested than some other foods.
• There may be a food allergy, such as wheat, cow's milk, etc. (see Pulse Test).
• It is vital that you not consume fried food, junk food, drink, and processed food. Avoid
caffeine, tobacco, and alcohol. If you are able to do so, do not take medicinal drugs.
• Last but not least: If you are normally thin, but feel good, ignore the comments of others
who say you need to gain weight. Some of them wish they could be thinner.
(Thinness)
SYMPTOMS—The person weighs 10% less than an average person of his height and weight.
Symptoms, when underweight, is a problem to be addressed. These symptoms include hunger, dizziness,
fatigue, weakness, sensitivity to cold, and loss of ambition.
CAUSES—Underweight is a problem for some, but not for others. Actually, as one ages, underweight
can be an advantage in a number of ways. If you are in good health, although underweight, there may be
no need for concern to gain weight. Underweight people live longer and are in less danger from heart
disease.
But underweight may be associated with health problems; it should especially be a cause for concern if
unintended, sudden weight loss has occurred.
Try, if possible, to ascertain the cause of the weight loss or inability to gain weight. Here is a list of
several possible causes:
Unplanned-for weight loss can be caused by an inability by the gastro-intestinal tract to digest and
absorb food properly, resulting from ulcerative colitis, diverticulitis, etc.
It can be caused by intestinal parasites or liver and pancreas problems.
It can be caused by digestive enzyme deficiency, allergy, or food sensitivity.
It can be caused by endocrine imbalances, such as diabetes, hyperthyroidism, or (sometimes)
hypothyroidism. If you are both underweight and feel cold all the time, you may be hypothyroid (which
see). Problems in the thyroid, pancreas, or adrenal glands can make weight gain impossible.
Hypoglycemics and diabetics have an especially hard time maintaining proper weight.
It can be caused by a chronic illness, surgery, stress, or emotional trauma (such as the death of a loved
one).
It can be caused by surgery, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, medicinal or street drugs, or AIDS.
In addition, there may be an eating disorder: The person eats too little (anorexia) or, in some cases, eats
too much.
Zinc deficiency can reduce appetite, and so can some wasting diseases, such as cancer.
The consistency of the bowel movement and a check for undigested foods can be a valuable diagnostic
aid.
The experts tell us that, for adults, weight should not be gained at the rate of more than a pound a week.
In infants and children, the cause may be not enough food; in old people, it may result from disinterest in
eating or poverty.
You should especially be concerned about an infant or small child who suddenly seems to stop gaining
weight normally. This may be caused by celiac disease (which see) or something else.
contentSw:
Matibabu
Mwili wako unapata wakati mgumu kukutana na changamoto za maisha, na unahitaji msaada. Mapendekezo
ni rahisi vya kutosha:
• Kula lishe yenye lishe, kama ilivyoainishwa mara kwa mara katika kitabu hiki. Kwa watu wengine, ni
Inapaswa kujumuisha kalori zaidi na protini kuliko kawaida inapaswa kuliwa. Lakini kwa wengi
Ambao ni chini ya uzito, suluhisho ni kuendelea kula milo ya ukubwa wa wastani,
lakini kula chakula chenye lishe tu (hakuna chakula au chakula kilichosindika). Ya kutosha na kamili
Protini ni muhimu.
• Hakikisha na upungufu wa vitamini na madini.
• Unaweza kuhitaji kuchukua enzymes za kumengenya na/au asidi ya ziada ya hydrochloric (betaine
Hcl).
• Pata mazoezi ya wastani ya nje ya mlango kila siku. Hii itasaidia mfumo wako kuchimba
chakula.
• Pata kupumzika kwa kutosha usiku, na jaribu kulala chini na kupumzika 15, 30, au dakika 60 kabla
kila mlo. Hii ni muhimu, na itaimarisha mwili wako kwa changamoto ya kukabiliana
kwa mafanikio na chakula kingine.
• Epuka mafadhaiko ya aina anuwai.
• Kula katika mazingira ya kupumzika. Usile wakati una wasiwasi au umekasirika.
• Jaribu kudumisha utaratibu katika tabia na shughuli zako zote.
• Kwa watoto wachanga, ndizi zilizosokotwa huchimbwa kwa urahisi kuliko vyakula vingine.
• Kunaweza kuwa na mzio wa chakula, kama vile ngano, maziwa ya ng'ombe, nk (tazama mtihani wa mapigo).
• Ni muhimu kwamba usitumie chakula cha kukaanga, chakula kisicho na chakula, vinywaji, na chakula cha kusindika. Epuka
Caffeine, tumbaku, na pombe. Ikiwa unaweza kufanya hivyo, usichukue dawa za dawa.
• Mwisho lakini sio uchache: ikiwa kawaida ni nyembamba, lakini jisikie vizuri, puuza maoni ya wengine
ambao wanasema unahitaji kupata uzito. Baadhi yao wanatamani wangekuwa nyembamba.
(Nyembamba)
Dalili -Mtu ana uzito wa 10% chini ya mtu wa wastani wa urefu na uzito wake.
Dalili, wakati mzito, ni shida kushughulikiwa. Dalili hizi ni pamoja na njaa, kizunguzungu,
Uchovu, udhaifu, unyeti wa baridi, na upotezaji wa tamaa.
Sababu - chini ya uzani ni shida kwa wengine, lakini sio kwa wengine. Kwa kweli, kama umri mmoja, uzani
inaweza kuwa faida kwa njia kadhaa. Ikiwa una afya njema, ingawa ni uzani, kunaweza kuwa na
Hakuna haja ya wasiwasi kupata uzito. Watu wenye uzani wanaishi muda mrefu na wako katika hatari kidogo kutoka moyoni
ugonjwa.
Lakini uzani unaweza kuhusishwa na shida za kiafya; Inapaswa kuwa sababu ya wasiwasi ikiwa
Kupunguza uzito, kupoteza uzito ghafla kumetokea.
Jaribu, ikiwezekana, ili kujua sababu ya kupoteza uzito au kutoweza kupata uzito. Hapa kuna orodha ya
Sababu kadhaa zinazowezekana:
Kupoteza uzito kwa uzito kunaweza kusababishwa na kutokuwa na uwezo wa njia ya utumbo wa gastro kuchimba na kuchimba na
Inachukua chakula vizuri, inayotokana na colitis ya ulcerative, diverticulitis, nk.
Inaweza kusababishwa na vimelea vya matumbo au shida ya ini na kongosho.
Inaweza kusababishwa na upungufu wa enzyme ya utumbo, mzio, au unyeti wa chakula.
Inaweza kusababishwa na usawa wa endocrine, kama vile ugonjwa wa sukari, hyperthyroidism, au (wakati mwingine)
Hypothyroidism. Ikiwa nyinyi wawili mna uzito na unahisi baridi wakati wote, unaweza kuwa hypothyroid (ambayo
tazama). Shida katika tezi, kongosho, au tezi za adrenal zinaweza kufanya uzito kuwa haiwezekani.
Hypoglycemics na wagonjwa wa kisukari wana wakati mgumu sana kudumisha uzito sahihi.
Inaweza kusababishwa na ugonjwa sugu, upasuaji, mafadhaiko, au kiwewe cha kihemko (kama vile kifo cha mpendwa
moja).
Inaweza kusababishwa na upasuaji, chemotherapy, tiba ya mionzi, dawa za dawa au barabarani, au misaada.
Kwa kuongezea, kunaweza kuwa na shida ya kula: mtu hula kidogo sana (anorexia) au, katika hali nyingine, anakula
Sana.
Upungufu wa zinki unaweza kupunguza hamu ya kula, na ndivyo inaweza kupoteza magonjwa, kama saratani.
Utangamano wa harakati za matumbo na hundi ya vyakula visivyosababishwa inaweza kuwa utambuzi muhimu
misaada.
Wataalam wanatuambia kuwa, kwa watu wazima, uzito haupaswi kupatikana kwa kiwango cha zaidi ya pauni kwa wiki.
Katika watoto wachanga na watoto, sababu inaweza kuwa chakula cha kutosha; Katika wazee, inaweza kusababisha kutokujali
kula au umaskini.
Unapaswa kuwa na wasiwasi sana juu ya mtoto mchanga au mtoto mdogo ambaye ghafla anaonekana kuacha kupata
Uzito kawaida. Hii inaweza kusababishwa na ugonjwa wa celiac (ambao unaona) au kitu kingine.
