title: Multiple Sclerosis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Give attention to solving as many of the above possible problems as possible.
• Eat a nourishing diet with supplemental vitamins and minerals. Fruit and vegetable
juices are important.
• Avoid meat, milk, eggs, dairy products, and caffeine.
• Avoid sugar, excess fat, white-flour, rancid oils, fried foods; all of which are able to
destroy nerve cells.
• The mercury fillings in your teeth may be a factor. The levels of mercury in people with
MS are seven times higher than those in other people. Get rid of your mercury fillings, if
you have any symptoms of MS.
• Massage and regular exercise are helpful. Keep mentally active.
• Avoid stress and anxiety; they can bring on attacks.
• Short fasts are helpful.
• Hyperbaric oxygen therapy has been used successfully in some other countries (outside
the U.S.).
• Helpful herbs include ginkgo, suma, gotu kola, kelp, hop, chamomile, skullcap, and
valerian.
SYMPTOMS—Earlier stages: occasional dizziness, mood swings or depression, numbness in the
fingers and feet, weakness in the hands and feet, loss of balance, nausea and vomiting, muscular
stiffness, tremors, slurred speech, and difficult breathing. Later stages: difficulty in walking, a staggering
gait. Later still: spastic movements, paralysis, extreme fatigue, and bowel and bladder incontinence.
Symptoms flare up, and then nearly disappear for a time. Yet the problem keeps worsening, over a
matter of weeks, but sometimes slowly over decades.
CAUSES—Multiple sclerosis (MS) is a progressive, degenerative disorder of the central nervous
system. The nerves are covered with a coating called myelin. MS destroys this covering, leaving scar
tissue (called plaques) in its place. Eventually the nerves themselves become sclerotic (hardened) and
stop functioning.
Possible causes include an autoimmune attacking by the white blood cells of the myelin sheaths;
malnutrition or poor diet; stress; possible food allergies (dairy products or gluten); metal poisoning
(lead, mercury, etc.); chemicals (industrial chemicals, pesticides, etc.); toxins from bacteria and fungi in
the body; and vaccinations.
Diet appears to be a primary factor: heavy consumption of meat, sugar, refined grains, and rancid oils.
Overwork, emotional stress, fatigue, pregnancy, acute respiratory infections, chemical poisoning, and
poor diet are known to precede the onset.
MS usually begins between 25 and 40, and twice as often in women as men.
There is no known cure, but suggestions, below, will help retard (and possible halt) the progress of the
disorder.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Uangalie kutatua shida nyingi zilizo hapo juu iwezekanavyo.
• Kula lishe yenye lishe na vitamini na madini ya ziada. Matunda na mboga
juisi ni muhimu.
Epuka nyama, maziwa, mayai, bidhaa za maziwa, na kafeini.
• Epuka sukari, mafuta kupita kiasi, mafuta-nyeupe, mafuta ya mafuta, vyakula vya kukaanga; yote ambayo yana uwezo wa
kuharibu seli za ujasiri.
• Kujaza kwa zebaki kwenye meno yako kunaweza kuwa sababu. Viwango vya zebaki kwa watu walio na
MS ni mara saba ya juu kuliko ile ya watu wengine. Ondoa kujazwa kwako kwa zebaki, ikiwa
Una dalili zozote za MS.
• Massage na mazoezi ya mara kwa mara yanasaidia. Endelea kufanya kazi kiakili.
• Epuka mafadhaiko na wasiwasi; Wanaweza kuleta mashambulio.
• Sikukuu fupi zinasaidia.
• Tiba ya oksijeni ya hyperbaric imetumika kwa mafanikio katika nchi zingine (nje
Merika).
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na Ginkgo, Suma, Gotu Kola, Kelp, Hop, Chamomile, Fuvu, na
Valerian.
Dalili -Hatua za Maombezi: Kizunguzungu cha mara kwa mara, mabadiliko ya mhemko au unyogovu, ganzi katika
vidole na miguu, udhaifu katika mikono na miguu, kupoteza usawa, kichefuchefu na kutapika, misuli
Ugumu, kutetemeka, hotuba dhaifu, na kupumua ngumu. Hatua za baadaye: Ugumu wa kutembea, kushangaza
gait. Baadaye bado: harakati za spastic, kupooza, uchovu mwingi, na matumbo na kutokukosea kwa kibofu cha mkojo.
Dalili zinaibuka, na kisha karibu kutoweka kwa muda. Bado shida inaendelea kuwa mbaya, zaidi ya a
Jambo la wiki, lakini wakati mwingine polepole zaidi ya miongo.
Sababu -Multiple Sclerosis (MS) ni shida inayoendelea, inayoharibika ya neva kuu
mfumo. Mishipa imefunikwa na mipako inayoitwa Myelin. MS huharibu kifuniko hiki, na kuacha Scar
tishu (inayoitwa bandia) mahali pake. Mwishowe mishipa yenyewe inakuwa sclerotic (ngumu) na
Acha kufanya kazi.
Sababu zinazowezekana ni pamoja na kushambulia autoimmune na seli nyeupe za damu za sheaths za myelin;
utapiamlo au lishe duni; mkazo; mizio inayowezekana ya chakula (bidhaa za maziwa au gluten); sumu ya chuma
(lead, zebaki, nk); kemikali (kemikali za viwandani, dawa za wadudu, nk); Sumu kutoka kwa bakteria na kuvu ndani
mwili; na chanjo.
Lishe inaonekana kuwa sababu ya msingi: matumizi mazito ya nyama, sukari, nafaka zilizosafishwa, na mafuta ya rancid.
Kufanya kazi kupita kiasi, mkazo wa kihemko, uchovu, ujauzito, maambukizo ya kupumua kwa papo hapo, sumu ya kemikali, na
Lishe duni inajulikana kutangulia mwanzo.
MS kawaida huanza kati ya 25 na 40, na mara mbili mara kwa mara kwa wanawake kama wanaume.
Hakuna tiba inayojulikana, lakini maoni, hapa chini, yatasaidia kurudisha (na kusimamishwa) maendeleo ya
machafuko.

title: Muscular Dystrophy
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Vitamin E and selenium should be given orally, intramuscularly, and intravenously at the
very outset of the disorder, in order to arrest it. Vitamin E: intramuscularly at 80 mg per
day; orally, at 800-1,200 daily. Selenium: orally, intravenously, and, intramuscularly at 50-
1,000 mcg per day, based on weight.
• Essential fatty acids are needed (5 gm daily). Also choline or soy lecithin, at 10-20 gm
per day.
• Avoid food allergens and excessive fats; no more than 20% of daily calories should be in
fat.
• Avoid exercise for one month during initial treatment period, to avoid undue injury to
already weakened muscles.
—Also see "Birth Defects."
SYMPTOMS—Weakness of the muscles, scoliosis (curvature of the spine), enlargement of certain
muscle groups (calves, trapezius, etc.) to compensate for loss of major muscle groups. The muscles
gradually shrivel and weaken. The muscles in the trunk are especially affected. All muscles eventually
become involved.
CAUSES—Muscular dystrophy (MD) produces a weakening and wasting of muscle tissue which is not
noticed (because of replacement of muscle tissue with fat and fibrous scar tissue) until there is
substantial damage.
Animals given a vitamin E deficient diet develop muscular dystrophy. It is believed that MD could be
wiped out if vitamin E was given to all expectant mothers and bottle-fed babies. Mother's milk has six
times as much vitamin E as cow's milk, and almost twice as much selenium.
There may a hereditary factor, but diet is still the crucial issue.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Vitamini E na seleniamu inapaswa kupewa kwa mdomo, intramuscularly, na intravenously kwa
Mwanzo sana wa machafuko, ili kuishikilia. Vitamini E: intramuscularly saa 80 mg kwa
siku; Kwa mdomo, saa 800-1,200 kila siku. Selenium: kwa mdomo, kwa ndani, na, kwa kawaida kwa 50-
1,000 mcg kwa siku, kulingana na uzito.
• Asidi muhimu za mafuta zinahitajika (5 gm kila siku). Pia choline au soya lecithin, saa 10-20 gm
kwa siku.
• Epuka mzio wa chakula na mafuta mengi; Hakuna zaidi ya 20% ya kalori za kila siku zinazopaswa kuwa ndani
mafuta.
• Epuka mazoezi kwa mwezi mmoja wakati wa matibabu ya awali, ili kuepuka kuumia vibaya kwa
Tayari misuli dhaifu.
-Unaona "kasoro za kuzaliwa."
Dalili -umilele wa misuli, scoliosis (curvature ya mgongo), ukuzaji wa fulani
Vikundi vya misuli (ndama, trapezius, nk) kulipia fidia kwa upotezaji wa vikundi vikubwa vya misuli. Misuli
Hatua kwa hatua hupunguza na kudhoofisha. Misuli kwenye shina huathiriwa sana. Misuli yote mwishowe
kuhusika.
Sababu -Dystrophy ya Muscular (MD) hutoa kudhoofisha na kupoteza kwa tishu za misuli ambayo sio
niligunduliwa (kwa sababu ya uingizwaji wa tishu za misuli na mafuta na tishu za nyuzi za nyuzi) mpaka iwepo
uharibifu mkubwa.
Wanyama waliopewa lishe ya vitamini E huendeleza ugonjwa wa misuli. Inaaminika kuwa MD inaweza kuwa
Kufutwa ikiwa vitamini E ilipewa mama wote wanaotarajia na watoto waliolishwa chupa. Maziwa ya mama yana sita
nyakati za vitamini E kama maziwa ya ng'ombe, na karibu seleniamu mara mbili.
Kunaweza kuwa sababu ya urithi, lakini lishe bado ni suala muhimu.

title: Myasthenia Gravis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Clean out the colon, by means of colonics or high enemas. Go on a fruit/vegetable juice
fast for several days.
• Begin eating a nourishing diet, not overeating, and always including an abundant amount
of roughage (to aid in preventing constipation). Drink enough fluids.
• A deficiency in vitamin A can produce muscular and spinal cord degeneration. Also
important for the nerves and muscles are vitamins B (all), C, and E. Calcium, magnesium,
potassium, silicon, manganese, and zinc are also important for muscles and nerves.
• Lecithin is very important for good nerves, as well as chlorophyll.
• Good foods include buckwheat, millet, rye, and red potato peeling broth.
• Avoid the solanaceous crops, for they contain solanine, which interferes with the
neurotransmitter, acetylcholine. These foods include tomatoes, white potatoes, green and
red peppers, egg plants, and tobacco.
• Avoid the glue foods, such as white flour and dairy products. Stay away from fried
foods, meat, all animal fats, cheese, and eggs.
• Do not overwork. Learn to relax; learn to work at a more moderate pace, and stop more
frequently to rest.
• Walk a little outdoors, and gradually build up. But do not overdo. A little walking is
good; too much of any exercise might not be.
• Helpful herbs include slippery elm, comfrey, oatstraw, and the nervine herbs: skullcap,
hop, chamomile, valerian, dong quai, wood betony, and small amounts of lobelia.
SYMPTOMS—Muscular weakness, fatigue, emotional stress, and droopy eyelids. Difficulty in
breathing, swallowing, and speaking.
The onset is gradual, and the symptoms are worse in the evening. The person complains of difficulty in
chewing, swallowing, and talking.
CAUSES—Myasthenia gravis is a disease characterized by great muscular weakness (without atrophy)
and progressive fatigability. The name means "muscle weakness."
Adolescents and young adults, especially women, are the most likely to have this problem. But it
sometimes occurs in newborn infants and adults over 40. In the latter case, a tumor in the thymus is
involved. It rarely occurs past 50.
The muscles of the face and neck are primarily involved, but those in the trunk and extremities may also
be involved.
Some cases are mild; others are rapidly fatal. When the respiratory system is involved, death is much
more likely to result from this disease. Progress of the disorder is variable, and prolonged remission may
occur.
It is thought to be an autoimmune disease that causes malfunctioning of the enzyme, acetylcholine,
which is responsible for inducing muscles to contract. (It is conjectured that there may also be an excess
of cholinesterase at the myoneural junction in which the nerve impulses fail to induce normal muscle
contractions, but this is less likely.)
There is a failure in transmission of nerve impulses at the neuromuscular junction. Either the
acetylcholine release is not adequate or the muscle response to the acetylcholine is not sufficient. An
autoimmune factor may be involved (i.e., there are so many toxins in the body, that the system interferes
with normal functions.)
Autointoxication may thus be a primary cause. Toxins accumulate in the bloodstream from chemicals,
chronic constipation, etc. Either they destroy the muscular system or they trigger other body systems to
do so.
Chronic constipation can cause the cecum to press against the ileocecal valve, releasing poisons of the
colon back into the small intestine. This is a dangerous situation, since toxins in the small intestine are
absorbed into the blood far more quickly than when they are in the colon.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Safisha koloni, kwa njia ya koloni au enemas kubwa. Nenda kwenye juisi ya matunda/mboga
Haraka kwa siku kadhaa.
• Anza kula lishe yenye lishe, sio ya kula kupita kiasi, na kila wakati ikiwa ni pamoja na kiasi kikubwa
ya mbaya (kusaidia katika kuzuia kuvimbiwa). Kunywa maji ya kutosha.
• Upungufu katika vitamini A unaweza kutoa kuzorota kwa misuli na mgongo. Pia
Muhimu kwa mishipa na misuli ni vitamini B (yote), C, na E. kalsiamu, magnesiamu,
Potasiamu, silicon, manganese, na zinki pia ni muhimu kwa misuli na mishipa.
• Lecithin ni muhimu sana kwa mishipa nzuri, na chlorophyll.
• Chakula kizuri ni pamoja na Buckwheat, mtama, rye, na mchuzi wa viazi nyekundu.
• Epuka mazao ya solanaceous, kwa kuwa yana solanine, ambayo inaingiliana na
Neurotransmitter, acetylcholine. Vyakula hivi ni pamoja na nyanya, viazi nyeupe, kijani na
Pilipili nyekundu, mimea ya yai, na tumbaku.
• Epuka vyakula vya gundi, kama vile unga mweupe na bidhaa za maziwa. Kaa mbali na kukaanga
vyakula, nyama, mafuta yote ya wanyama, jibini, na mayai.
• Usifanye kazi zaidi. Jifunze kupumzika; Jifunze kufanya kazi kwa kasi ya wastani, na acha zaidi
mara kwa mara kupumzika.
• Tembea nje kidogo, na hatua kwa hatua ujenge. Lakini usichukue kupita kiasi. Kutembea kidogo ni
nzuri; Zoezi lolote la zoezi lolote linaweza kuwa sio.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na Elm Slippery, Comfrey, Oatsstraw, na Mimea ya Mishipa: Fuvu,
Hop, Chamomile, Valerian, Dong Quai, Betony ya Wood, na kiasi kidogo cha Lobelia.
Dalili -udhaifu wa kawaida, uchovu, mafadhaiko ya kihemko, na kope za droopy. Ugumu katika
Kupumua, kumeza, na kuongea.
Mwanzo ni polepole, na dalili ni mbaya zaidi jioni. Mtu analalamika juu ya ugumu katika
Kutafuna, kumeza, na kuongea.
Sababu -Myasthenia gravis ni ugonjwa unaoonyeshwa na udhaifu mkubwa wa misuli (bila atrophy)
na ubaya unaoendelea. Jina linamaanisha "udhaifu wa misuli."
Vijana na watu wazima vijana, haswa wanawake, ndio uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa na shida hii. Lakini
wakati mwingine hufanyika kwa watoto wachanga na watu wazima zaidi ya 40. Katika kesi ya mwisho, tumor kwenye thymus ni
inayohusika. Mara chache hufanyika zamani 50.
Misuli ya uso na shingo inahusika sana, lakini zile zilizo kwenye shina na miisho zinaweza pia
kuhusika.
Kesi zingine ni laini; Wengine wanaua haraka. Wakati mfumo wa kupumua unahusika, kifo ni nyingi
uwezekano mkubwa wa kutokea kwa ugonjwa huu. Maendeleo ya shida hiyo ni tofauti, na ondoleo la muda mrefu linaweza
kutokea.
Inafikiriwa kuwa ugonjwa wa autoimmune ambao husababisha kutofanya kazi kwa enzyme, acetylcholine,
ambayo inawajibika kwa kushawishi misuli kuambukizwa. (Imewekwa kwamba kunaweza pia kuwa na ziada
ya cholinesterase kwenye makutano ya myoneural ambayo msukumo wa ujasiri unashindwa kushawishi misuli ya kawaida
contractions, lakini hii ina uwezekano mdogo.)
Kuna kutofaulu katika maambukizi ya msukumo wa ujasiri kwenye makutano ya neuromuscular. Ama
Kutolewa kwa acetylcholine haitoshi au majibu ya misuli kwa acetylcholine haitoshi. An
Autoimmune sababu inaweza kuhusika (i.e., kuna sumu nyingi mwilini, kwamba mfumo unaingilia kati
na kazi za kawaida.)
AutointOxication inaweza kuwa sababu ya msingi. Sumu hujilimbikiza kwenye damu kutoka kwa kemikali,
kuvimbiwa sugu, nk ama huharibu mfumo wa misuli au husababisha mifumo mingine ya mwili
Fanya hivyo.
Kuvimbiwa sugu kunaweza kusababisha cecum kushinikiza dhidi ya valve ya ileocecal, ikitoa sumu ya
koloni nyuma ndani ya utumbo mdogo. Hii ni hali hatari, kwani sumu kwenye utumbo mdogo ni
kufyonzwa ndani ya damu haraka sana kuliko wakati wako kwenye koloni.

title: Parkinson'S Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• It is very important that the person afflicted with Parkinson's disease keep active.
Muscles which are not used atrophy more quickly. The person's own determination and
faithfulness in an exercise program will forestall the progress of the disease better than
almost anything else. Every exercise keeps the muscles more useful. Use a wide variety of
simple exercises! Buy a book on weight lifting; but, of course, use much smaller weights.
Swing the arms forcefully when walking. Exercises involving joint movements (including
the neck) are very important.
• Keep the feet a distance apart, when walking, and take short steps, when turning.
• Typing, writing, working with clay, etc., helps the fingers.
• Breathe deeply in and out.
• Take frequent rest periods.
• Read aloud, to keep the mouth muscles in good condition.
• Any act difficult to perform should be done daily.
• A nutritious diet, adequate rest, exercise in the open air, enough fluids, and sunlight help
slow the effects of Parkinson's disease.
• Octocosanol is found in wheat germ oil. It helps the neuron membranes.
• Eat foods and take supplements containing antioxidants. The most important of these is
vitamin E (3,200 IU daily!) and vitamin C (3,000 mg daily!). This can slow the
progression of Parkinson's disease by 2-3 years! Theoretically, a person who takes
significant dosage levels will never contract Parkinson's disease in the first place. It
appears that free-radical damage may be a major cause of damage of dopamine-producing
brain cells.
• Iron supplementation seems to help in some cases. The production of tyrosine, an
enzyme involved in dopa production (the precursor of dopamine), is stimulated by iron
supplementation in the diet.
• Here are some additional helps and dosages of worthwhile natural substances:
octocosanol (300 mcg, three times a day), Neuro-Gen leucine (10 gm/day), l-methionine
(5 gm/day), essential fatty acids (1tbsp., twice a day), ltyrosine (100 mg/day), dl-
phenoalanine (100 mg, three times a day), B (200 mg, three times a day), B (100 mg,
1 6
three times a day), betaine HCl (75-200 mg three times a day before meals).
• Overweight is a problem; take the extra weight off.
• Ingestion of aluminum is a factor in Alzheimer's disease, and it may also be involved in
Parkinson's disease. Do not use aluminum cookware or use deodorants containing it (alum
is aluminum). Also avoid lead. Some people with Parkinson's disease have high levels of
lead in their brains.
• L-dopa (L-dihydroxyphenylalanine), in form of the drug brand, Levodopa, is a synthetic
dopamine which is given to patients, to supply the missing dopamine. Intriguingly
enough, actual dopamine (from animal sources) cannot be given, because there is a blood-
brain barrier rejecting it. So levodopa is given, which is accepted (through conversion to
dopamine in the basal ganglion).
• But two facts should be noted: (1) Vitamin B reverses the effects of levodopa, so efforts
6
must be made to eliminate B from the diet. (Eat in moderation bananas, oatmeal, peanuts,
6
whole grains, potatoes, meat, and fish and only eat protein foods in the evening.) (2)
Levodopa usually produces side effects, such as nausea, vomiting, insomnia, mental
confusion, and agitation, as well as liver and kidney damage.
• L-dopa and carbidopa can aggravate and speed up the progress of Parkinson's disease in
many cases, and is said to have little beneficial effect in over half the cases.
(Shaking Palsy, Paralysis agitans,
Parkinsonianism)
SYMPTOMS—Initially: mild to moderate tremor of the hand or hands while at rest, a feeling of being
slow and heavy, tendency to tire more easily, muscular stiffness, loss of skill in the fingers and thumb
(writing, buttoning and unbuttoning, playing the piano, etc.)
Later: depression, loss of appetite, muscular rigidity, permanent rigid stoop, shuffling gait, drooling,
tremors, fixed facial expression, and impaired speech. Ability to maintain balance may be affected.
The body gradually becomes rigid as limbs stiffen. Dementia may occur.
Principle signs are tremor at rest, muscle rigidity, and slow or retarded movement. Tremors and
slowness generally begin in one limb, then progress to the other limb on the same side; later still to the
other side. Usually the hands are affected before the feet.
CAUSES—Parkinson's disease is a gradual degeneration of the nervous system. The nerve cells in the
basal ganglion of the brain are gradually destroyed.
Parkinson's disease is one of the most common debilitating diseases in the United States. But actual
disability usually does not occur for 10-15 years after onset of symptoms.
Although the underlying cause is not known, symptoms appear when there is a lack of dopamine in the
brain. Dopamine is made by the body, and carries messages from one nerve cell to another. Normally,
another neurotransmitter, acetylcholine, is made, to keep dopamine in balance. When there is not enough
acetylcholine, myasthenia gravis occurs; when there is not enough dopamine, the result is Parkinson's
disease.
In Parkinson's, the problem generally is destruction of the cells which make dopamine. But sometimes
the cause is blockage of the dopamine receptors in the brain.
One possible cause of this disorder is that too many toxins have been released in the body for the blood
to filter out through the liver. An excess of chemicals, drugs, toxins in meat eating, etc., are thought to
be involved. It is known that one of the chemicals in heroine directly destroys the key brain cells
preventing Parkinson's. A chronic poor diet, over many years, is also considered to be a significant
factor.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ni muhimu sana kwamba mtu anayesumbuliwa na ugonjwa wa Parkinson aendelee kufanya kazi.
Misuli ambayo haitumiwi atrophy haraka zaidi. Uamuzi wa mtu mwenyewe na
Uaminifu katika mpango wa mazoezi utasababisha maendeleo ya ugonjwa bora kuliko
Karibu kitu kingine chochote. Kila zoezi huweka misuli kuwa muhimu zaidi. Tumia anuwai ya
Mazoezi rahisi! Nunua kitabu juu ya kuinua uzito; Lakini, kwa kweli, tumia uzani mdogo sana.
Swing mikono kwa nguvu wakati wa kutembea. Mazoezi yanayojumuisha harakati za pamoja (pamoja na
shingo) ni muhimu sana.
• Weka miguu umbali kando, wakati wa kutembea, na uchukue hatua fupi, wakati unageuka.
• Kuandika, kuandika, kufanya kazi na udongo, nk, husaidia vidole.
• Pumua kwa undani ndani na nje.
• Chukua vipindi vya kupumzika mara kwa mara.
• Soma kwa sauti, kuweka misuli ya mdomo katika hali nzuri.
• Kitendo chochote ngumu kufanya kinapaswa kufanywa kila siku.
• Lishe yenye lishe, kupumzika kwa kutosha, mazoezi katika hewa wazi, maji ya kutosha, na msaada wa jua
Punguza athari za ugonjwa wa Parkinson.
• Octocosanol hupatikana katika mafuta ya vijidudu vya ngano. Inasaidia utando wa neuron.
• Kula vyakula na kuchukua virutubisho vyenye antioxidants. Muhimu zaidi ya haya ni
Vitamini E (3,200 IU kila siku!) Na vitamini C (3,000 mg kila siku!). Hii inaweza kupunguza
Kuendelea kwa ugonjwa wa Parkinson na miaka 2-3! Kinadharia, mtu anayechukua
Viwango muhimu vya kipimo havitawahi kupata ugonjwa wa Parkinson kwanza. IT
Inaonekana kuwa uharibifu wa bure-mkali unaweza kuwa sababu kubwa ya uharibifu wa dopamine-kutengeneza
seli za ubongo.
• Uongezaji wa chuma unaonekana kusaidia katika hali zingine. Uzalishaji wa tyrosine, An
Enzyme inayohusika katika uzalishaji wa DOPA (mtangulizi wa dopamine), inachochewa na chuma
kuongeza katika lishe.
• Hapa kuna msaada wa ziada na kipimo cha vitu vya asili vyenye thamani:
octocosanol (300 mcg, mara tatu kwa siku), neuro-gen leucine (10 gm/siku), l-methionine
(5 gm/siku), asidi muhimu ya mafuta (1tbsp., Mara mbili kwa siku), ltyrosine (100 mg/siku), dl-
phenoalanine (100 mg, mara tatu kwa siku), b (200 mg, mara tatu kwa siku), b (100 mg,
1 6
Mara tatu kwa siku), Betaine HCl (75-200 mg mara tatu kwa siku kabla ya milo).
• Uzito ni shida; Ondoa uzito wa ziada.
• Kumeza kwa alumini ni sababu ya ugonjwa wa Alzheimer's, na inaweza pia kuhusika katika
Ugonjwa wa Parkinson. Usitumie cookware ya aluminium au utumie deodorants iliyo na (alum
ni aluminium). Pia epuka risasi. Watu wengine wenye ugonjwa wa Parkinson wana viwango vya juu vya
Kuongoza katika akili zao.
• L-dopa (L-dihydroxyphenylalanine), katika mfumo wa chapa ya dawa, levodopa, ni syntetisk
Dopamine ambayo hupewa wagonjwa, kusambaza dopamine iliyokosekana. Ya kushangaza
ya kutosha, dopamine halisi (kutoka vyanzo vya wanyama) haiwezi kutolewa, kwa sababu kuna damu-
Kizuizi cha ubongo kinakataa. Kwa hivyo levodopa hupewa, ambayo inakubaliwa (kupitia ubadilishaji hadi
dopamine katika genge la basal).
• Lakini ukweli mbili unapaswa kuzingatiwa: (1) Vitamini B inabadilisha athari za levodopa, kwa hivyo juhudi
6
Lazima ifanyike kuondoa B kutoka kwa lishe. (Kula kwa ndizi za wastani, oatmeal, karanga,
6
Nafaka nzima, viazi, nyama, na samaki na hula tu vyakula vya protini jioni.) (2)
Levodopa kawaida hutoa athari mbaya, kama kichefuchefu, kutapika, kukosa usingizi, akili
Machafuko, na kuzeeka, pamoja na uharibifu wa ini na figo.
• L-dopa na carbidopa zinaweza kuzidisha na kuharakisha maendeleo ya ugonjwa wa Parkinson katika
Kesi nyingi, na inasemekana ina athari kidogo katika zaidi ya nusu ya kesi.
(Kutikisa ugonjwa wa kupooza, Agitans ya kupooza,
Parkinsonianism)
Dalili -za kawaida: laini na mtetemeko wa wastani wa mkono au mikono wakati wa kupumzika, hisia ya kuwa
polepole na nzito, tabia ya kuchoka kwa urahisi zaidi, ugumu wa misuli, kupoteza ustadi katika vidole na kidole
(Kuandika, Kuweka kifungo na Unbuttoning, kucheza piano, nk)
Baadaye: Unyogovu, Kupoteza hamu ya kula, ugumu wa misuli, kuinama kwa ukali, kutikisa gait, drooling,
Kutetemeka, sura ya usoni, na hotuba iliyoharibika. Uwezo wa kudumisha usawa unaweza kuathiriwa.
Mwili polepole huwa mgumu kama miguu ngumu. Dementia inaweza kutokea.
Ishara za kanuni ni kutetemeka wakati wa kupumzika, ugumu wa misuli, na harakati za polepole au zilizopunguka. Kutetemeka na
Uwezo kwa ujumla huanza kwa kiungo kimoja, kisha unaendelea kwa kiungo kingine upande huo; baadaye bado kwa
upande mwingine. Kawaida mikono huathiriwa kabla ya miguu.
Sababu -Ugonjwa wa Parkinson ni kuzorota kwa taratibu kwa mfumo wa neva. Seli za ujasiri katika
Kikundi cha msingi cha ubongo huharibiwa polepole.
Ugonjwa wa Parkinson ni moja wapo ya magonjwa ya kawaida yanayodhoofisha huko Merika. Lakini halisi
Ulemavu kawaida haufanyi kwa miaka 10-15 baada ya mwanzo wa dalili.
Ingawa sababu ya msingi haijulikani, dalili zinaonekana wakati kuna ukosefu wa dopamine katika
ubongo. Dopamine hufanywa na mwili, na hubeba ujumbe kutoka kwa kiini kimoja cha ujasiri hadi mwingine. Kawaida,
Neurotransmitter nyingine, acetylcholine, imetengenezwa, kuweka dopamine katika usawa. Wakati haitoshi
Acetylcholine, myasthenia gravis hufanyika; Wakati hakuna dopamine ya kutosha, matokeo yake ni ya Parkinson
ugonjwa.
Katika Parkinson, shida kwa ujumla ni uharibifu wa seli ambazo hufanya dopamine. Lakini wakati mwingine
Sababu ni blockage ya receptors za dopamine kwenye ubongo.
Sababu moja inayowezekana ya shida hii ni kwamba sumu nyingi zimetolewa mwilini kwa damu
kuchuja nje kupitia ini. Kuzidi kwa kemikali, dawa za kulevya, sumu katika kula nyama, nk, hufikiriwa
kuhusika. Inajulikana kuwa moja ya kemikali katika heroine moja kwa moja huharibu seli muhimu za ubongo
Kuzuia Parkinson. Lishe duni sugu, kwa miaka mingi, pia inachukuliwa kuwa muhimu
sababu.

title: Polio
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• In the late 1940s, Benjamin Sandler, M.D., was interviewed on the radio in the spring,
just before the summer polio season. He declared that, if sugar foods and especially Cokes
and soft drinks were avoided, polio would not be contracted. This went into the
newspapers and the East Coast area covered by the announcement had very little polio
that summer. Later, Sandler wrote a book detailing his concept.
Sugar injures the nerves; calcium is needed by the nerves; highly acid substances remove
calcium; phosphorous locks with calcium and carries it off, making it unavailable. Coca
Cola-type drinks combine all these special qualities! The liquid in Coke is more acid than
vinegar, yet is not noticed because of the very high sugar content. Coke is phosphoric
acid. So the sugar and acid eat away the calcium, and the phosphorus immediately locks
into it. A tooth, dropped in a glass of Coke, will melt away in a matter of hours.
• Another factor is being cold. People drink Cokes and other soft drinks at swimming
pools, then jump and in and vigorously swim in the cold water. So many people contract
polio at swimming pools in the summer that it is suspected that there must be something
in the pool water. But the problem is the soft drinks, not contaminated pool water.
• The body is adapted to the intense heat of mid-summer; but poor diet plus soft drinks
weaken it, then the cold plunge intensifies the effects.
• Because it was so dangerous to the health, Coca Cola was banned from interstate
commerce by the original Food and Drug Administration early in the 20th century. That is
why, to this day, Cokes and Pepsi's are made in local bottling plants. The syrup is shipped
interstate, and then, with water, is poured into bottles.
• Franklin D. Roosevelt was very athletic. He fought a forest fire near his home, ate some
junk food, and jumped in an ice-cold river to cool off. He then came down with polio.
• Another factor is keeping the body warm.
• As soon as a person comes down with polio, he is placed in bed and observed. —But,
what should be done is to place him immediately in a warm, full bathtub or, better, give
him the "Kenny packs."
• Nurse Kenny (called Sister Kenny, because nurses in Australia are called "sister")
applied hot packs to the patients (on parts, or all, of their bodies), and eliminated polio
with few or no after effects. But this water therapy method was not permitted in America.
It was too effective.
Other factors:
• During the infectious stage, keep the diet high in protein and potassium, to replace that
which is lost because of tissue destruction.
• Fluid, caloric, and sodium intake should also be increased because of the fever.
Additional B vitamins are also needed, along with vitamins A and C.
• Give antispasmodic tincture (which see). Give doses (according to age) of 8-15 drops in
1/4th glass of hot water.
• Helpful herbs include prickly ash berries, wild cherry bark, valerian root, skullcap,
goldenseal, black cohosh, red clover, catnip, and yellow dock.
• Dr. Salk, himself (developer of injectable polio vaccine), warned against the serious
dangers in taking oral polio vaccine! Beware of oral polio vaccine! In the latter part of the
20th century, oral polio vaccine has produced more cases of polio than any other agency.
• In addition, there is extreme danger in handling the bowel movement of an infant who
has received the oral polio vaccine! You can get crippling polio from doing so.
• Medical history reveals that people who were vegetarians, did not eat junk foods, or
drink soft drinks, but lived a clean life—and avoided polio vaccines; and those recently
receiving them—have rarely contracted polio.
(Poliomyelitis, Infantile Paralysis)
SYMPTOMS—Fever, nausea, diarrhea, headache, and irritability.
Incubation is generally 2-7 days, and onset is often abrupt. There may be digestive disturbance, plus a
slight elevation of temperature, usually for not more than 3 days. Then paralysis may, or may not,
develop.
Bend the person's neck forward. If it aches, polio may be coming on.
CAUSES—Poliomyelitis means "gray marrow," and is inflammation of the gray matter of the spinal
cord. The condition is not confined to infancy, nor is paralysis always involved. Polio is a virus infection
of the spinal cord which destroys the nerves controlling muscular movement, often resulting in paralysis
of certain muscles.
The first of two stages of polio is the infectious stage, when the virus is active. The second is the
noninfectious stage, when recovery may occur.
Paralysis may be confined to a small part of the body or much, or nearly all, of it. But muscle atrophy
may also occur. Death usually only occurs in bulbar and respiratory cases. Aside from
bronchopneumonia, other complications are relatively few.
Epidemics, when they occur, usually reach their peak during the warmest months (July and August).
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1940, Benjamin Sandler, M.D., alihojiwa kwenye redio katika chemchemi,
Kabla tu ya msimu wa polio ya majira ya joto. Alitangaza kwamba, ikiwa vyakula vya sukari na haswa
Na vinywaji vyenye laini vilizuiliwa, polio isingekuwa na mkataba. Hii iliingia
Magazeti na eneo la Pwani ya Mashariki lililofunikwa na tangazo lilikuwa na polio kidogo sana
msimu huo wa joto. Baadaye, Sandler aliandika kitabu kinachoelezea wazo lake.
Sukari hujeruhi mishipa; Kalsiamu inahitajika na mishipa; Vitu vya asidi nyingi huondoa
kalsiamu; Kufuli kwa phosphorous na kalsiamu na kuibeba, na kuifanya haipatikani. Coca
Vinywaji vya aina ya Cola vinachanganya sifa hizi zote maalum! Kioevu katika coke ni asidi zaidi kuliko
Viniga, bado haijatambuliwa kwa sababu ya sukari kubwa sana. Coke ni fosforasi
asidi. Kwa hivyo sukari na asidi hula kalsiamu, na fosforasi hufungia mara moja
ndani yake. Jino, lililowekwa kwenye glasi ya coke, litayeyuka katika muda wa masaa.
• Jambo lingine ni kuwa baridi. Watu hunywa vinywaji na vinywaji vingine laini wakati wa kuogelea
Mabwawa, kisha kuruka na ndani na kuogelea kwa nguvu kwenye maji baridi. Watu wengi huambukizwa
polio kwenye mabwawa ya kuogelea katika msimu wa joto kwamba inashukiwa kuwa lazima kuwe na kitu
katika maji ya bwawa. Lakini shida ni vinywaji laini, sio maji yaliyochafuliwa.
• Mwili hubadilishwa na joto kali la katikati ya majira ya joto; Lakini lishe duni pamoja na vinywaji laini
Kuidhoofisha, basi kushuka kwa baridi kunazidisha athari.
• Kwa sababu ilikuwa hatari sana kwa afya, Coca Cola alipigwa marufuku kutoka kwa kati
Biashara na Utawala wa Chakula na Dawa asili mapema karne ya 20. Hiyo ni
Kwa nini, hadi leo, Coke na Pepsi zinafanywa katika mimea ya chupa za mitaa. Syrup husafirishwa
Interstate, na kisha, na maji, hutiwa ndani ya chupa.
• Franklin D. Roosevelt alikuwa mwanariadha sana. Alipigania moto wa msitu karibu na nyumba yake, alikula
Chakula cha junk, na akaruka kwenye mto baridi-baridi ili baridi. Kisha akashuka na polio.
• Jambo lingine ni kuweka mwili joto.
• Mara tu mtu anaposhuka na polio, amewekwa kitandani na kuzingatiwa. -Lakini,
Kinachopaswa kufanywa ni kumweka mara moja kwenye bafu ya joto, kamili au, bora, toa
Yeye "Kenny Packs."
• Muuguzi Kenny (anayeitwa Dada Kenny, kwa sababu wauguzi huko Australia wanaitwa "dada")
Kutumika pakiti za moto kwa wagonjwa (kwa sehemu, au yote, ya miili yao), na kuondoa polio
na athari chache au hapana. Lakini njia hii ya tiba ya maji haikuruhusiwa Amerika.
Ilikuwa na ufanisi sana.
Sababu zingine:
• Wakati wa hatua ya kuambukiza, weka lishe juu katika protini na potasiamu, kuchukua nafasi hiyo
ambayo imepotea kwa sababu ya uharibifu wa tishu.
• Ulaji wa maji, caloric, na sodiamu pia unapaswa kuongezeka kwa sababu ya homa.
Vitamini vya ziada vya B pia vinahitajika, pamoja na vitamini A na C.
• Toa tincture ya antispasmodic (ambayo tazama). Toa kipimo (kulingana na umri) wa matone 8-15 ndani
1/4 glasi ya maji ya moto.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na matunda ya majivu ya majivu, gome la porini, mizizi ya valerian, fuvu,
Goldenseal, cohosh nyeusi, clover nyekundu, catnip, na kizimbani cha manjano.
• Dk Salk, mwenyewe (msanidi programu wa chanjo ya polio), alionya dhidi ya mzito
hatari katika kuchukua chanjo ya polio ya mdomo! Jihadharini na chanjo ya polio ya mdomo! Katika sehemu ya mwisho ya
Karne ya 20, chanjo ya polio ya mdomo imezalisha kesi nyingi za polio kuliko wakala mwingine wowote.
• Kwa kuongezea, kuna hatari kubwa katika kushughulikia harakati za matumbo ya mtoto mchanga ambaye
amepokea chanjo ya polio ya mdomo! Unaweza kupata polio kali kutoka kwa kufanya hivyo.
• Historia ya matibabu inaonyesha kuwa watu ambao walikuwa mboga mboga, hawakula vyakula vya bure, au
kunywa vinywaji laini, lakini aliishi maisha safi -na kuzuia chanjo za polio; na hizo hivi karibuni
Kupokea yao - mara chache haikuwa na makubaliano ya polio.
(Poliomyelitis, kupooza kwa watoto wachanga)
Dalili -Fever, kichefuchefu, kuhara, maumivu ya kichwa, na kuwashwa.
Incubation kwa ujumla ni siku 2-7, na mwanzo mara nyingi huwa ghafla. Kunaweza kuwa na usumbufu wa utumbo, pamoja na a
Mwinuko mdogo wa joto, kawaida kwa sio zaidi ya siku 3. Basi kupooza kunaweza, au sio,
Kuendeleza.
Piga shingo ya mtu mbele. Ikiwa inauma, polio inaweza kuwa inakuja.
Sababu -poliomyelitis inamaanisha "marongo ya kijivu," na ni uchochezi wa jambo la kijivu la mgongo
kamba. Hali hiyo haijafungwa kwa mchanga, wala kupooza kunahusika kila wakati. Polio ni maambukizi ya virusi
ya kamba ya mgongo ambayo huharibu mishipa inayodhibiti harakati za misuli, mara nyingi husababisha kupooza
ya misuli fulani.
Ya kwanza ya hatua mbili za polio ni hatua ya kuambukiza, wakati virusi ni kazi. Ya pili ni
Hatua isiyo ya kujiona, wakati ahueni inaweza kutokea.
Kupooza kunaweza kufungwa kwa sehemu ndogo ya mwili au mengi, au karibu yote, yake. Lakini atrophy ya misuli
inaweza pia kutokea. Kifo kawaida hufanyika tu katika balbar na kesi za kupumua. Mbali na
Bronchopneumonia, shida zingine ni chache.
Epidemics, wakati zinatokea, kawaida hufikia kilele chao wakati wa miezi ya joto (Julai na Agosti).

title: Post-Polio Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• A cleansing diet, followed by a rebuilding, nourishing diet. Avoid all the junk foods.
• Eat foods high in fiber and vitamin/mineral supplementation. Calcium, magnesium,
potassium, and silicon are important. Selenium and zinc, along with vitamins A, C, D, and
E are antioxidants. The B complex is important for strengthening the nerves.
• A regular exercise program.
—Also see "Polio" and "Nerves Strengthening."
SYMPTOMS—Difficulty in swallowing, which could produce a risk of choking. A progressive muscle
weakness.
CAUSES—More than 125,000 Americans have post-polio syndrome.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Lishe ya utakaso, ikifuatiwa na ujenzi wa lishe, lishe. Epuka vyakula vyote vya taka.
• Kula vyakula vyenye nyuzi na kuongeza vitamini/madini. Kalsiamu, magnesiamu,
Potasiamu, na silicon ni muhimu. Seleniamu na zinki, pamoja na vitamini A, C, D, na
E ni antioxidants. Ugumu wa B ni muhimu kwa kuimarisha mishipa.
• Programu ya mazoezi ya kawaida.
-Unaona "Polio" na "Mishipa inaimarisha."
Dalili -Upungufu katika kumeza, ambayo inaweza kutoa hatari ya kuvuta. Misuli inayoendelea
udhaifu.
Sababu-zaidi ya Wamarekani 125,000 wana ugonjwa wa baada ya polio.

title: Kuru
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS—Ataxia (balance problems) and decreased coordination progressing to paralysis,
dementia, slurring of speech, and visual disturbances.
CAUSE AND PREVENTION—Kuru is a slow, progressive, fatal viral infection of the central nervous
system. The incubation period may be 30 or more years, but death usually occurs within months of the
onset of symptoms.
There are only two classes of people who contract kuru: (1) cannibals, particularly in the central New
Guinea highlands and (2) those who submit to transplant surgery.
Research reveals that brain tissue from infected people produces the disease when inoculated into
primates in the laboratory.
So the solution is to not eat people, either through cannibalism or by having transplant surgery. (A
second problem to transplant surgery is that most persons must thereafter remain on immuno-
suppressants the rest of their life. Doing so renders them as vulnerable to disease as a person with
AIDS.)
contentSw:
Dalili -Ataxia (shida za usawa) na kupungua kwa uratibu unaoendelea kwa kupooza,
Dementia, kushuka kwa hotuba, na usumbufu wa kuona.
Sababu na kuzuia - Kuru ni maambukizi ya virusi polepole, yanayoendelea, na mabaya ya neva kuu
mfumo. Kipindi cha incubation kinaweza kuwa miaka 30 au zaidi, lakini kifo kawaida hufanyika ndani ya miezi ya
mwanzo wa dalili.
Kuna madarasa mawili tu ya watu ambao huandamana Kuru: (1) bangi, haswa katikati mpya
Nyanda za juu za Guinea na (2) wale ambao wanawasilisha upasuaji wa kupandikiza.
Utafiti unaonyesha kuwa tishu za ubongo kutoka kwa watu walioambukizwa huzaa ugonjwa wakati wa kuingizwa ndani
Primates katika maabara.
Kwa hivyo suluhisho sio kula watu, ama kupitia cannibalism au kwa kupandikiza upasuaji. (A
Shida ya pili kupandikiza upasuaji ni kwamba watu wengi lazima baadaye wabaki kwenye immuno-
kukandamiza maisha yao yote. Kufanya hivyo kunawafanya wawe katika hatari ya magonjwa kama mtu aliye na
UKIMWI.)

title: Memory Problems
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Eat a nourishing, balanced, diet and skip all the junk, processed, and fried food. Good
food is needed to nourish the brain.
• Nutritional deficiencies, especially of the B complex and amino acids, add to memory
loss. Obtain your proteins from brewer's yeast, brown rice, millet, nuts, soy, and whole
grains rather than from meat sources.
• Maintain an even amount of blood sugar. This is best done by eating complex
carbohydrates at mealtime, and no food between meals.
• Avoid greasy and high-cholesterol foods; both interfere with passage of food through the
blood to the brain.
• Avoid free radicals in the diet; these can greatly damage brain memory.
• Avoid refined sugars; these reduce brain power.
• For some people, dairy and wheat products cause memory reduction. Try cutting them
out for a month and see if there is improvement.
• Drink enough water, get enough rest at night. Exercise regularly.
• Stop using liquor, drugs, caffeine, and tobacco. Alcohol does an excellent job of
destroying the brain.
• Ginkgo biloba increases blood flow to the brain. Other helpful herbs include ginseng,
anise, and blue cohosh.
—Also see "Memory, Improvement."
(Forgetfulness)
SYMPTOMS—You find you are forgetting too many things.
CAUSES—People fear memory problems, because it might indicate the onset of Alzheimer's disease
(which see). Alzheimer's generally begins gradually in the mid-40s, and is fairly common among many
older people; so folk have reason to be concerned.
But two facts stand out: Some memory loss does not have to mean Alzheimer's; it is possible to keep the
mind in good shape, even into advanced age.
Alcoholism, aging, candidiasis, stress, allergies, thyroid problems, hypoglycemia, diabetes, and poor
circulation are factors in memory loss. Others are cited below.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kula lishe, usawa, lishe na ruka chakula chochote, kusindika, na kukaanga. Nzuri
Chakula kinahitajika kulisha ubongo.
• Upungufu wa lishe, haswa ya asidi ya B na asidi ya amino, ongeza kwenye kumbukumbu
hasara. Pata protini zako kutoka kwa chachu ya Brewer, mchele wa kahawia, mtama, karanga, soya, na mzima
nafaka badala ya kutoka kwa vyanzo vya nyama.
• Kudumisha kiasi cha sukari ya damu. Hii ni bora kufanywa na kula ngumu
wanga wakati wa kula, na hakuna chakula kati ya milo.
• Epuka vyakula vyenye mafuta na cholesterol; Wote huingiliana na kupita kwa chakula kupitia
damu kwa ubongo.
• Epuka radicals za bure katika lishe; Hizi zinaweza kuharibu sana kumbukumbu ya ubongo.
• Epuka sukari iliyosafishwa; Hizi hupunguza nguvu ya ubongo.
• Kwa watu wengine, bidhaa za maziwa na ngano husababisha kupunguzwa kwa kumbukumbu. Jaribu kuwakata
nje kwa mwezi na uone ikiwa kuna uboreshaji.
• Kunywa maji ya kutosha, pumzika usiku wa kutosha. Zoezi mara kwa mara.
Acha kutumia pombe, dawa za kulevya, kafeini, na tumbaku. Pombe hufanya kazi nzuri ya
kuharibu ubongo.
• Ginkgo biloba huongeza mtiririko wa damu kwa ubongo. Mimea mingine inayosaidia ni pamoja na ginseng,
anise, na bluu cohosh.
-Unaona "Kumbukumbu, Uboreshaji."
(Usahaulifu)
Dalili -Unapata unasahau vitu vingi.
Sababu - Watu wanaogopa shida za kumbukumbu, kwa sababu inaweza kuonyesha mwanzo wa ugonjwa wa Alzheimer's
(ambayo huona). Alzheimer kwa ujumla huanza polepole katikati ya miaka ya 40, na ni kawaida kati ya wengi
wazee; Kwa hivyo watu wana sababu ya kuwa na wasiwasi.
Lakini ukweli mbili unasimama: Upotezaji wa kumbukumbu haimaanishi Alzheimer's; inawezekana kuweka
Akili katika sura nzuri, hata katika uzee.
Ulevi, kuzeeka, candidiasis, mafadhaiko, mzio, shida za tezi, hypoglycemia, ugonjwa wa sukari, na masikini
Mzunguko ni sababu katika upotezaji wa kumbukumbu. Wengine wametajwa hapa chini.

title: Korsakoff'S Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Three times a day, take vitamin B (100 mg), lecithin (2,500 mg), chromium/vanadium
1
(50-200 mcg), selenium (200-1,000 mcg), and betaine HCl.
• Obtain adequate rest, exercise, water, and fresh air.
• Do pulse tests (which see), to determine allergies. Avoid sugar and alcohol.
• Memory loss can also be caused by senile dementia, Korsakoff's syndrome, Alzheimer's
disease, allergies (all of which see), or alcoholism.
(Recent Memory Loss; False Alzheimer's
Disease)
SYMPTOMS—Inability to keep new events or facts in the memory, although earlier data already in the
memory is still there.
CAUSES—This is a type of "amnesia" which can result from chronic alcoholism, a blow to the head, or
vitamin B deficiency.
1
Because of embarrassment, people with this problem tend to make up stories and invent "facts," to
satisfy others.
A blow to the head generally brings recovery, but the problem is less likely to be reversed, if alcoholism
or B deficiency is the cause.
1
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mara tatu kwa siku, chukua vitamini B (100 mg), lecithin (2,500 mg), chromium/vanadium
1
(50-200 mcg), Selenium (200-1,000 mcg), na Betaine HCl.
• Pata kupumzika kwa kutosha, mazoezi, maji, na hewa safi.
• Fanya vipimo vya kunde (ambavyo vinaona), kuamua mzio. Epuka sukari na pombe.
• Kupoteza kumbukumbu pia kunaweza kusababishwa na shida ya akili, ugonjwa wa Korsakoff, Alzheimer's
ugonjwa, mzio (wote ambao huona), au ulevi.
(Upotezaji wa kumbukumbu ya hivi karibuni; Uongo Alzheimer's
Ugonjwa)
Dalili -uwezekano wa kuweka matukio mpya au ukweli katika kumbukumbu, ingawa data ya mapema tayari iko kwenye
Kumbukumbu bado iko.
Sababu - hii ni aina ya "amnesia" ambayo inaweza kusababisha ulevi sugu, pigo kwa kichwa, au
Upungufu wa Vitamini B.
1
Kwa sababu ya aibu, watu walio na shida hii huwa wanaunda hadithi na hugundua "ukweli,"
kukidhi wengine.
Pigo kwa kichwa kwa ujumla huleta ahueni, lakini shida ina uwezekano mdogo wa kubadilishwa, ikiwa ulevi
au upungufu wa B ndio sababu.
1

title: Alzheimer'S Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The above data is full of suggestions for treatment and prevention.
• If a person is developing Alzheimer's, he should be told, so he can prepare for the future
and settle his affairs.
SYMPTOMS—Disoriented perceptions of space and time, inability to concentrate or communicate, and
memory loss.
This produces depression, agitation, withdrawal, insomnia, irritability, memory loss, personality
changes, severe mood swings, and senility.
An intriguing early warning sign has been discovered at the San Diego Medical Center: As much as 2
years before mental decline, those with Alzheimer's begin to lose their sense of smell. The rate at which
the ability to distinguish strong odors diminishes is an indicator of how rapidly an individual will lose
mental functioning. (But smokers have already lost part of this sense, so the diagnostic test does not
work as well when applied to them.)
CAUSES—Alzheimer's disease is a progressive mental deterioration. Memory and thought processes
are weakened and disoriented.
Nerve fibers, leading into, and out of, the hippocampus in the brain become tangled and short circuited.
As a result, information is no longer carried to, and from, the brain. New memories cannot be gained,
and old memories cannot be retrieved.
In addition, plaques of a certain protein (beta-amyloid) build up in the brain, damaging nerve cells.
One form of Alzheimer's occurs between 36 and 45, and is quite rapid. The more gradual form develops
in those who are 65 or 70.
Simple forgetfulness is not Alzheimer's. If you do not remember your wife's name, that is forgetfulness;
if you forget you have a wife, that is dementia (of which Alzheimer's is a form).
There are other disorders which produce similar symptoms: Arteriosclerosis (hardening of the arteries),
which slowly reduces blood flow to the brain; a series of minor strokes; hypothyroidism; advanced
syphilis.
Many elderly people are taking 8 or 10 medicinal drugs. This drugging will surely affect the brain. You
can see the effects in nursing homes across the continent. Add to this a devitalized diet of fried,
processed, and junk food.
Other causes include heavy metals in the body. One in particular stands out: When you hear the words,
"Alzheimer's disease," think of it as "aluminum disease," for this is what it often is.
Autopsies on persons who died with Alzheimer's reveal accumulations of up to 4 times the normal
amount of aluminum in the nerve cells of the brain. Significantly, especially high concentrations are in,
and around, the hippocampus.
(See "Aluminum Poisoning" for much more information.)
But those with Alzheimer's also have high levels of mercury in their brain. Beware of amalgam dental
fillings. Mercury from the fillings gradually passes into the body and, over a period of time, accumulates
in the brain.
Obtaining an adequate supply of minerals in the diet helps keep heavy metals from accumulating in the
body.
Women with Alzheimer's have lower estrogen levels than normal.
Free radicals are another factor. Avoid foods which contain them.
Those with Alzheimer's have low levels of vitamin B and zinc in their bodies. All the B complex
12
vitamins are important.
Vitamins A and E, important antioxidant vitamins, are also important.
Levels of choline and ethanolamine are lower in those with Alzheimer's.
Undergo a trial of intensive nutritional therapy, especially B injections. This may ward off the
12
developing problem.
Those with Alzheimer's tend to have a strong craving for sweets. But such a craving is frequently an
indication of a food hunger for vitamins and minerals.
Some people with Down's syndrome (which see) live to be in their 30s or 40s; they usually develop
Alzheimer's.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Takwimu zilizo hapo juu zimejaa maoni ya matibabu na kuzuia.
• Ikiwa mtu anaendeleza Alzheimer's, anapaswa kuambiwa, ili aweze kujiandaa kwa siku zijazo
na atulie mambo yake.
Dalili -maoni yaliyopingana ya nafasi na wakati, kutokuwa na uwezo wa kuzingatia au kuwasiliana, na
Kupoteza kumbukumbu.
Hii hutoa unyogovu, msukumo, kujiondoa, kukosa usingizi, kuwashwa, upotezaji wa kumbukumbu, utu
Mabadiliko, mabadiliko makubwa ya mhemko, na senility.
Ishara ya tahadhari ya mapema imegunduliwa katika Kituo cha Matibabu cha San Diego: kama vile 2
Miaka kabla ya kupungua kwa akili, wale walio na Alzheimer's huanza kupoteza hisia zao za harufu. Kiwango ambacho
Uwezo wa kutofautisha harufu kali hupungua ni kiashiria cha jinsi mtu atapoteza haraka haraka
Utendaji wa akili. (Lakini wavutaji sigara tayari wamepoteza sehemu ya akili hii, kwa hivyo mtihani wa utambuzi haufanyi
fanya kazi pia wakati unatumika kwao.)
Sababu - Ugonjwa wa Alzheimer ni kuzorota kwa akili. Kumbukumbu na michakato ya mawazo
ni dhaifu na kufadhaika.
Nyuzi za neva, zinazoongoza ndani, na nje ya, hippocampus kwenye ubongo hupigwa na kuzungukwa kwa muda mfupi.
Kama matokeo, habari haijachukuliwa tena, na kutoka, ubongo. Kumbukumbu mpya haziwezi kupatikana,
na kumbukumbu za zamani haziwezi kupatikana tena.
Kwa kuongezea, alama za protini fulani (beta-amyloid) huunda katika ubongo, na kuharibu seli za ujasiri.
Njia moja ya Alzheimer's hufanyika kati ya 36 na 45, na ni haraka sana. Fomu ya taratibu zaidi inakua
kwa wale ambao ni 65 au 70.
Kusahau rahisi sio Alzheimer's. Ikiwa haukumbuki jina la mke wako, hiyo ni usahaulifu;
Ikiwa utasahau kuwa una mke, hiyo ni shida ya akili (ambayo Alzheimer ni fomu).
Kuna shida zingine ambazo hutoa dalili zinazofanana: arteriosclerosis (ugumu wa mishipa),
ambayo polepole hupunguza mtiririko wa damu kwa ubongo; Mfululizo wa viboko vidogo; hypothyroidism; Advanced
Syphilis.
Wazee wengi wanachukua dawa za dawa 8 au 10. Dawa hii ya dawa hakika itaathiri ubongo. Wewe
unaweza kuona athari katika nyumba za uuguzi kote bara. Ongeza kwa hii lishe iliyoandaliwa ya kukaanga,
kusindika, na chakula kisicho na chakula.
Sababu zingine ni pamoja na metali nzito mwilini. Moja haswa inasimama: unaposikia maneno,
"Ugonjwa wa Alzheimer," fikiria kama "ugonjwa wa alumini," kwa hii ndio mara nyingi.
Autopsies kwa watu waliokufa na mkusanyiko wa Alzheimer wa hadi mara 4 kawaida
Kiasi cha alumini katika seli za ujasiri wa ubongo. Kwa maana, haswa viwango vya juu viko,
Na karibu, hippocampus.
(Tazama "sumu ya alumini" kwa habari zaidi.)
Lakini wale walio na Alzheimer pia wana viwango vya juu vya zebaki katika ubongo wao. Jihadharini na meno ya Amalgam
kujaza. Zebaki kutoka kwa kujaza polepole hupita ndani ya mwili na, kwa muda mrefu, hujilimbikiza
Katika ubongo.
Kupata usambazaji wa kutosha wa madini katika lishe husaidia kuzuia metali nzito kutoka kwa kujilimbikiza katika
mwili.
Wanawake walio na Alzheimer wana viwango vya chini vya estrogeni kuliko kawaida.
Radicals za bure ni sababu nyingine. Epuka vyakula vyenye.
Wale walio na Alzheimer wana viwango vya chini vya vitamini B na zinki kwenye miili yao. Ugumu wote wa B.
12
Vitamini ni muhimu.
Vitamini A na E, vitamini muhimu vya antioxidant, pia ni muhimu.
Viwango vya choline na ethanolamine ni chini kwa wale walio na Alzheimer's.
Kupitia jaribio la tiba kubwa ya lishe, haswa sindano za B. Hii inaweza kuzuia
12
Kuendeleza shida.
Wale walio na Alzheimer huwa na hamu kubwa ya pipi. Lakini tamaa kama hiyo mara nyingi ni
Dalili ya njaa ya chakula kwa vitamini na madini.
Watu wengine wenye ugonjwa wa Down (ambao huona) wanaishi kuwa katika miaka yao 30 au 40; Kawaida huendeleza
Alzheimer's.

title: Senility
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Reduce vitamin D intake to a maximum of 400 units a day, for it works with cholesterol
to cause blood vessel problems. Vitamin D is angiotoxic; that is, toxic to blood vessels.
• Choline and lecithin are both important. Also take vitamin C to bowel tolerance, as well
as vitamin E. The B complex vitamins are important for the nervous system and brain.
• A New England hospital successfully treated senility by giving niacin and a high-
potency vitamin supplement. This opened up the narrowed blood vessels. Niacin has a
vasodilatory effect on the body. That is why, when taken, it temporarily causes the face to
flush.
• Stop using alcohol, tobacco, and nicotine.
• Eat lightly of nutritious food. Mainly eat raw or slowly cooked foods. Raw seeds and
nuts help the brain, but eat in moderation. Millet and buckwheat are good.
• Ginkgo, an herb, may help prevent further deterioration of mental capacities.
• Daily exercising, to the point of breathlessness, is vital to good circulation. But do not
overdo! Only go up to the point of breathlessness, not beyond. Too much can lead to a
heart attack.
• Heavy metals must be avoided. Never use aluminum cookware, or other aluminum
products. Do not use canned goods any more than necessary.
—Also see "Organic Brain Syndrome" and "Aging."
(Senile Dementia; Cerebrovascular Disease)
SYMPTOMS—Memory loss in the older years, an inability to reason properly which interferes with the
home, employment, depression.
CAUSES—Also called Dementia, this occurs in old age, yet is not widespread. Most older people do
not have this problem. Many people in advanced age are quite clear in their thought processes.
(But there are actually two types of dementia: Primary dementia comes on gradually, without apparent
cause. Secondary dementia comes on suddenly from brain injury, operation, drugs, or diabetic coma; is
usually reversible. Senility and Alzheimer's are examples of primary dementia.)
Common causes of senility include poor blood circulation to, and in, the brain, cerebral arteriosclerosis,
heavy metal toxicity, prolonged nutritional deficiency, prolonged use of medicinal drugs, and lack of
exercise and fresh air.
Calcification and fatty cholesterol deposits in the middle cerebral artery reduces the main blood supply
to the brain, resulting in a poor oxygen supply to the brain. This produces a loss of memory and typical
"senile" changes.
The experts tell us that, over a matter of years, wearing uncomfortable collars and neckties tend to cause
eddies in the carotid arteries, contributing to the deposition of cholesterol.
Many of those diagnosed as senile are actually suffering from the effects of medicinal drugs. Avoid
drugs throughout your life, if you want a happy old age. But hearing, thyroid, liver, or kidney problems
can also produce apparent memory loss. There is the possibility of brain tumors, as well as stroke, and
various problems with the nervous system.
A combination of nutritional deficiencies is often the underlying cause.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Punguza ulaji wa vitamini D hadi kiwango cha juu cha vitengo 400 kwa siku, kwa kuwa inafanya kazi na cholesterol
kusababisha shida za mishipa ya damu. Vitamini D ni angiotoxic; Hiyo ni, sumu kwa mishipa ya damu.
• Choline na lecithin zote ni muhimu. Pia chukua vitamini C kwa uvumilivu wa matumbo, vile vile
Kama vitamini E. Vitamini tata ya B ni muhimu kwa mfumo wa neva na ubongo.
• Hospitali ya New England ilifanikiwa kutibu ustadi kwa kutoa niacin na ya juu-
Potency vitamini kuongeza. Hii ilifungua mishipa ya damu nyembamba. Niacin ina
athari ya vasodilatory kwa mwili. Ndio maana, inapochukuliwa, husababisha uso kwa muda
Flush.
Acha kutumia pombe, tumbaku, na nikotini.
• Kula chakula kidogo cha lishe. Hasa kula vyakula mbichi au kupikwa polepole. Mbegu mbichi na
Karanga husaidia ubongo, lakini kula kwa wastani. Millet na Buckwheat ni nzuri.
• Ginkgo, mimea, inaweza kusaidia kuzuia kuzorota zaidi kwa uwezo wa akili.
• Kufanya mazoezi ya kila siku, hadi kufikia kupumua, ni muhimu kwa mzunguko mzuri. Lakini usifanye
overdo! Nenda tu hadi kufikia hatua ya kupumua, sio zaidi. Sana inaweza kusababisha a
mshtuko wa moyo.
• Metali nzito lazima ziepukwe. Kamwe usitumie cookware ya aluminium, au alumini nyingine
Bidhaa. Usitumie bidhaa za makopo zaidi ya lazima.
-Unaona "Dalili za Ubongo wa Kikaboni" na "Kuzeeka."
(Senile Dementia; Ugonjwa wa Cerebrovascular)
Dalili -upotezaji wa kumbukumbu katika miaka ya zamani, kutokuwa na uwezo wa kufikiria vizuri ambayo inaingiliana na
nyumbani, ajira, unyogovu.
Sababu -pia huitwa shida ya akili, hii hufanyika katika uzee, lakini haijaenea. Watu wengi wazee hufanya
usiwe na shida hii. Watu wengi katika uzee ni wazi kabisa katika michakato yao ya mawazo.
(Lakini kwa kweli kuna aina mbili za shida ya akili: shida ya akili inakuja polepole, bila dhahiri
sababu. Dementia ya sekondari inakuja ghafla kutoka kwa jeraha la ubongo, operesheni, dawa za kulevya, au ugonjwa wa kisukari; ni
kawaida hubadilika. Uwezo na Alzheimer ni mifano ya shida ya akili.)
Sababu za kawaida za kuzidisha ni pamoja na mzunguko duni wa damu, na ndani, ubongo, ugonjwa wa ubongo, ugonjwa wa ubongo,
Ukali mzito wa chuma, upungufu wa muda mrefu wa lishe, matumizi ya muda mrefu ya dawa za dawa, na ukosefu wa
mazoezi na hewa safi.
Uhesabuji na amana za cholesterol ya mafuta katika artery ya katikati ya ubongo hupunguza usambazaji kuu wa damu
Kwa ubongo, kusababisha usambazaji duni wa oksijeni kwa ubongo. Hii hutoa upotezaji wa kumbukumbu na kawaida
Mabadiliko ya "Senile".
Wataalam wanatuambia kuwa, kwa miaka mingi, wamevaa collar zisizofurahi na shingo huwa zinasababisha
Eddies katika mishipa ya carotid, inachangia uwekaji wa cholesterol.
Wengi wa wale wanaotambuliwa kama senile wanaugua athari za dawa za dawa. Epuka
Dawa za kulevya katika maisha yako yote, ikiwa unataka uzee wenye furaha. Lakini kusikia, tezi, ini, au shida za figo
Inaweza pia kutoa upotezaji wa kumbukumbu dhahiri. Kuna uwezekano wa uvimbe wa ubongo, na vile vile kiharusi, na
Shida anuwai na mfumo wa neva.
Mchanganyiko wa upungufu wa lishe mara nyingi ndio sababu ya msingi.

title: Organic Brain Disorder
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Eat a nutritious, balanced, diet.
• Niacin, B , B , and folic acid are needed; also chromium and zinc. Essential fatty acids
1 12
are also needed. Vitamin E repairs brain damage. Manganese improves memory. The
brain also needs calcium and magnesium. Lecithin helps clean plaques from the arteries.
• Include enough fiber in the diet. A congested colon weakens the blood supply to the
brain.
• Avoid overcooking and too much cooked foods.
• Avoid alcohol, lead poisoning, mercury poisoning (found in dental amalgam).
• Do a pulse test, to determine if food allergens are part of the problem.
• Do a six-hour glucose tolerance test, to see if diabetes or hypoglycemia is involved.
• Hydrochloric acid (Betaine HCl) supplementation may be needed to increase food
absorption.
• Herbs which help include capsicum, burdock, echinacea, garlic, ginkgo, psyllium, and
gotu kola.
(Chronic Brain Syndrome)
SYMPTOMS—Errors in judgment, lack of reasoning ability, short-term memory loss, disorientation,
poor intellectual function, neglect of personal hygiene.
Severe symptoms include hallucinations, incoherent speech, agitation, and restlessness.
CAUSES—Malnutrition can induce the symptoms of organic brain syndrome. Chemicals and other
toxins can influence it also, as well as food allergens.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kula lishe, yenye usawa, lishe.
• Niacin, B, B, na asidi ya folic inahitajika; pia chromium na zinki. Asidi muhimu ya mafuta
1 12
pia zinahitajika. Vitamini E inarekebisha uharibifu wa ubongo. Manganese inaboresha kumbukumbu.
Ubongo pia unahitaji kalsiamu na magnesiamu. Lecithin husaidia kusafisha bandia kutoka kwa mishipa.
• Jumuisha nyuzi za kutosha katika lishe. Koloni iliyokusanywa inadhoofisha usambazaji wa damu kwa
ubongo.
Epuka vyakula vya kupikia na vyakula vingi vilivyopikwa.
• Epuka pombe, sumu ya risasi, sumu ya zebaki (inayopatikana katika amalgam ya meno).
• Fanya mtihani wa kunde, kuamua ikiwa mzio wa chakula ni sehemu ya shida.
• Fanya mtihani wa uvumilivu wa sukari ya masaa sita, ili kuona ikiwa ugonjwa wa sukari au hypoglycemia unahusika.
• kuongeza asidi ya hydrochloric (betaine HCl) inaweza kuhitajika kuongeza chakula
kunyonya.
• Mimea ambayo husaidia ni pamoja na capicum, burdock, echinacea, vitunguu, ginkgo, psyllium, na
Gotu Kola.
(Dalili ya ubongo sugu)
Dalili-makosa katika uamuzi, ukosefu wa uwezo wa hoja, upotezaji wa kumbukumbu ya muda mfupi, kufadhaika,
Kazi duni ya kielimu, kupuuza usafi wa kibinafsi.
Dalili kali ni pamoja na kudharau, hotuba isiyowezekana, kuzeeka, na kutokuwa na utulivu.
Sababu -Malnutrition inaweza kusababisha dalili za ugonjwa wa ubongo wa kikaboni. Kemikali na zingine
Sumu inaweza kushawishi pia, na vile vile allergener ya chakula.

title: Hyperactivity
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Change whatever items, cited above, you are able.
• Provide the child with a nourishing diet, as discussed elsewhere in this book. This is
important.
• Locate and eliminate food allergies. See "Allergies" and "Pulse Test."
• Avoid all foods containing salicylates.
• Foods that irritate the stomach or inflame the nerves must be removed from the child's
diet. Avoid all refined sugar, fried, and junk foods from the diet. This includes soft drinks.
Eliminate artificial flavorings, colorings, and preservatives. Do not attempt to only change
the diet partway. Nourishing food, and only nourishing food, must become a way of life. It
will help all in the home. It will be easier for the child to accept the new regime if the
mother (and hopefully, father) does also.
• The parent must learn to control the situation, by training the child to obedience and self-
control. This is vital. Teaching the child to obey you causes him to learn to control
himself. This enables him to organize, and better manage, his mental discipline and his
entire life.
• Regularity in rising, eating, bedtime, and other daily schedules is important.
—Also see "Dyslexia."
(Hyperkinesis)
SYMPTOMS—Cannot sit still, short attention span, impulsive acts before one thinks, runs rather than
walks, forgets easily, moody, temper tantrums, irritated and indifferent when disciplined, determined to
get his own way.
Sleep disturbances, clumsiness, head-knocking, bothers other children, speech and hearing disorders,
extreme distractibility, absent-mindedness, unable to follow a series of instructions.
Not all symptoms are found in any one child. The symptoms are not limited to children, but are also
found in some adults.
Keep in mind that most children display some hyperactive symptoms at times.
CAUSES—Hyperactivity is now called "attention deficit disorder" or, sometimes, "attention deficit
hyperactivity disorder" (ADHD). Primarily occurring in children, it produces a variety of learning and
behavior problems.
Some of the causes include:
Allergies to milk, wheat, chocolate, yeast, food additives, oranges, and antibiotics.
Lead poisoning can be a significant factor.
Eating too much sugar or sugar foods, smoking during pregnancy, oxygen deprivation at birth, prenatal
trauma.
Artificial food additives, preservatives and foods containing salicylates, other food additives.
Low-protein diet.
Emotional problems and inadequate, inconsistent, or ineffective discipline in the home. Hyperactive
children often control the situation in the home more than the parents. Because parents are too yielding,
children find they can scream their way to dominance, and become uncontrollable.
When spoiled children enter school, they sometimes try to use overactivity to control their new
environment.
Hyperactive children often have learning disabilities.
Certain types of fluorescent lights are overstimulating.
Overstimulation from television, competitive games, violent TV programs and, nutritional deficiencies
are major factors.
Mothers who smoke are more likely to give birth to brain-damaged or hyperactive children.
Children from broken homes are more likely to have this problem.
A strong link has been established between learning disabilities and juvenile crime. Try to solve the
problems early.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Badilisha vitu vyovyote, vilivyotajwa hapo juu, unaweza.
• Mpe mtoto lishe yenye lishe, kama inavyojadiliwa mahali pengine kwenye kitabu hiki. Hii ni
muhimu.
• Tafuta na uondoe mzio wa chakula. Tazama "mzio" na "mtihani wa mapigo."
• Epuka vyakula vyote vyenye salicylates.
• Vyakula ambavyo vinakasirisha tumbo au kuzidisha mishipa lazima iondolewe kutoka kwa mtoto
Lishe. Epuka sukari yote iliyosafishwa, kukaanga, na vyakula visivyo na chakula kutoka kwa lishe. Hii ni pamoja na vinywaji laini.
Ondoa ladha bandia, rangi, na vihifadhi. Usijaribu kubadilika tu
Sehemu ya Lishe. Chakula cha kulisha, na chakula cha lishe tu, lazima iwe njia ya maisha. IT
itasaidia wote nyumbani. Itakuwa rahisi kwa mtoto kukubali serikali mpya ikiwa
Mama (na kwa matumaini, baba) pia.
• Mzazi lazima ajifunze kudhibiti hali hiyo, kwa kumfundisha mtoto utii na mwenyewe
Udhibiti. Hii ni muhimu. Kumfundisha mtoto kukutii husababisha yeye kujifunza kudhibiti
mwenyewe. Hii inamwezesha kupanga, na kusimamia vyema, nidhamu yake ya akili na yake
maisha yote.
• Utaratibu katika kuongezeka, kula, kulala, na ratiba zingine za kila siku ni muhimu.
-Unaona "Dyslexia."
(Hyperkinesis)
Dalili -haziwezi kukaa kimya, muda mfupi wa umakini, vitendo vya msukumo kabla ya mtu kufikiria, huendesha badala ya
hutembea, husahau kwa urahisi, mnyoya, hasira za hasira, zilizokasirika na zisizojali wakati nidhamu, imedhamiria
Pata njia yake mwenyewe.
Matatizo ya kulala, uchungu, kubisha kichwa, kusumbua watoto wengine, shida na shida za kusikia,
Usumbufu mkubwa, nia ya kutokuwepo, haiwezi kufuata safu ya maagizo.
Sio dalili zote zinazopatikana katika mtoto yeyote. Dalili sio mdogo kwa watoto, lakini pia ni
hupatikana katika watu wazima wengine.
Kumbuka kwamba watoto wengi huonyesha dalili kadhaa za hyperactive wakati mwingine.
Sababu -hyperactivity sasa inaitwa "shida ya upungufu wa umakini" au, wakati mwingine, "nakisi ya umakini
shida ya hyperactivity "(ADHD). Inatokea kwa watoto, hutoa aina ya kujifunza na
shida za tabia.
Sababu zingine ni pamoja na:
Mzio kwa maziwa, ngano, chokoleti, chachu, viongezeo vya chakula, machungwa, na dawa za kukinga.
Sumu ya risasi inaweza kuwa sababu muhimu.
Kula sukari nyingi au vyakula vya sukari, sigara wakati wa ujauzito, kunyimwa oksijeni wakati wa kuzaa, ujauzito
kiwewe.
Viongezeo vya chakula bandia, vihifadhi na vyakula vyenye salicylates, nyongeza zingine za chakula.
Lishe ya protini ya chini.
Shida za kihemko na nidhamu ya kutosha, haiendani, au isiyofaa nyumbani. Hyperactive
Watoto mara nyingi hudhibiti hali hiyo nyumbani zaidi kuliko wazazi. Kwa sababu wazazi wanajitolea sana,
Watoto wanaona wanaweza kupiga kelele njia yao ya kutawala, na kuwa wasiodhibitiwa.
Wakati watoto walioharibiwa wanaingia shuleni, wakati mwingine hujaribu kutumia shughuli za kudhibiti kudhibiti mpya
mazingira.
Watoto wa Hyperactive mara nyingi huwa na ulemavu wa kujifunza.
Aina fulani za taa za fluorescent zinazidi.
Kuzidi kutoka kwa runinga, michezo ya ushindani, programu za Runinga za dhuluma na, upungufu wa lishe
ni sababu kuu.
Akina mama ambao wanavuta moshi wana uwezekano mkubwa wa kuzaa watoto walioharibiwa na ubongo au hyperactive.
Watoto kutoka nyumba zilizovunjika wana uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa na shida hii.
Kiunga kikali kimeanzishwa kati ya ulemavu wa kujifunza na uhalifu wa vijana. Jaribu kutatua
Shida mapema.

title: Dyslexia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Food allergies should be located and eliminated. Food sensitivities can produce learning
disabilities, which may appear to have organic origin.
• Beware of sugar, wheat, milk products, possibly certain other grains, and meat. In one or
more (often several) of these may lie the problem.
• Carry out pulse tests (which see), to determine possible causes, and eliminate offending
foods.
• Taking hydrochloric acid (betaine HCl) and digestive enzymes may be necessary for a
time.
(a disturbance in the ability to read)
SYMPTOMS—A physical problem. The child's eyes actually see the letters backward, as compared to
the normal child's eyes.
CAUSES—Dyslexia is sometimes called hyperactivity (which see), but there is a partial difference.
Dyslexia is a complex syndrome rather than a specific disease.
In some instances, a true organic or biochemical brain injury has occurred. But most of the time, the
problem is more easily treatable.
Food allergies are often a key problem.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mzio wa chakula unapaswa kupatikana na kuondolewa. Usikivu wa chakula unaweza kutoa kujifunza
Ulemavu, ambao unaweza kuonekana kuwa na asili ya kikaboni.
• Jihadharini na sukari, ngano, bidhaa za maziwa, labda nafaka zingine, na nyama. Katika moja au
Zaidi (mara nyingi kadhaa) kati ya hizi zinaweza kusema uwongo.
• Fanya vipimo vya mapigo (ambayo huona), kuamua sababu zinazowezekana, na kuondoa kukosea
vyakula.
• Kuchukua asidi ya hydrochloric (betaine HCl) na enzymes za utumbo zinaweza kuwa muhimu kwa a
wakati.
(usumbufu katika uwezo wa kusoma)
Dalili -shida ya mwili. Macho ya mtoto huona herufi nyuma, ikilinganishwa na
macho ya mtoto wa kawaida.
Sababu -dyslexia wakati mwingine huitwa hyperactivity (ambayo huona), lakini kuna tofauti ya sehemu.
Dyslexia ni dalili ngumu badala ya ugonjwa fulani.
Katika visa vingine, jeraha la kweli la kikaboni au la biochemical limetokea. Lakini wakati mwingi,
Shida inaweza kutibiwa kwa urahisi.
Mzio wa chakula mara nyingi ni shida muhimu.

title: Nightmares
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Do not eat 4 hours before bedtime.
• Eat a light supper of fruit and toast. Too much food in the stomach is a major cause of
nightmares.
• Food allergies are another prime cause. Search them out and eliminate them (see
"Allergies" and "Pulse Test)."
• Hypoglycemia is another significant cause. The low point of low blood sugar level
occurs at 4 to 4½ hours after food is eaten, especially sugar foods and drinks (cookies and
milk, etc.).
• Include chromium in the diet.
• Avoid caffeine.
• Liquor drinking and hard drugs induce nightmares.
• Sometimes the problem is emotional; a parent that is mean to the child, a terrifying
incident that a person has had, etc. Go to God with these problems; only He can bring
peace of heart.
• Before bedtime, go outdoors and walk in the cool night air, breathe deep, and relax.
• Some take a whole, warm, bath before bedtime, to relax.
• Avoid enervation of any kind. Do not overwork.
SYMPTOMS—Unpleasant dreams while sleeping.
CAUSES—In most cases, nightmares can be solved.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Usila masaa 4 kabla ya kulala.
• Kula chakula cha jioni cha matunda na toast. Chakula kingi ndani ya tumbo ni sababu kubwa ya
ndoto za usiku.
• Mzio wa chakula ni sababu nyingine kuu. Watafute na uwaondoe (tazama
"Mzio" na "mtihani wa kunde)."
• Hypoglycemia ni sababu nyingine muhimu. Kiwango cha chini cha kiwango cha chini cha sukari ya damu
hufanyika saa 4 hadi 4½ baada ya chakula kuliwa, haswa vyakula vya sukari na vinywaji (kuki na
maziwa, nk).
• Jumuisha chromium katika lishe.
• Epuka kafeini.
• Kunywa pombe na dawa ngumu husababisha ndoto za usiku.
• Wakati mwingine shida ni ya kihemko; mzazi ambaye ni wa maana kwa mtoto, ya kutisha
tukio ambalo mtu amekuwa nalo, nk Nenda kwa Mungu na shida hizi; Ni yeye tu anayeweza kuleta
amani ya moyo.
• Kabla ya kulala, nenda nje na tembea kwenye hewa ya usiku baridi, pumua kirefu, na kupumzika.
• Wengine huchukua kabisa, joto, bafu kabla ya kulala, kupumzika.
• Epuka uhifadhi wa aina yoyote. Usifanye kazi zaidi.
Dalili -ndoto mbaya wakati wa kulala.
Sababu - katika hali nyingi, ndoto za usiku zinaweza kutatuliwa.

title: Hyperventilation
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• When this happens, people often go to the emergency room of the hospital. And what do
they do? They may hand the sufferer a paper sack and ask him to breathe into it for a short
time. This replenishes the carbon dioxide in the body, and brings him back to normal.
• But there is a danger here: The person might be having, not a hyperventilation problem,
but a real heart attack (which see). In this article, we will assume that heart trouble is not
the problem. But you may want to check our various sections under Cardiovascular:
Heart.
• People who know they might experience hyperventilation attacks, from time to time,
sometimes carry a paper sack with them.
• Exercise also helps. It not only reduces anxiety, but exercise requires more oxygen—so
faster breathing is just fine.
• Do not smoke. This only adds to the problem, for nicotine is a stimulant and can aid in
triggering attacks. Caffeine is another stimulant to avoid.
• Practice calm, relaxed breathing. The average you should strive for is one moderate
breath every 6 seconds or 10 every minute. Ordinary people need never concern
themselves with how often they breath; but, if you have this special problem, you may
want to practice doing it the right way every so often.
• The more tense you are, the faster you will breath; so be calm, and think about breathing
slower.
• Think about someone else beside yourself. We can focus on our fears so much, they
come out of proportion.
• Avoid situations which tend to make you overly nervous. For example, for some people
this occurs when they are required to stand in crowds.
—Also see "Phobias and Panic Attacks."
SYMPTOMS—Pounding heart, fingers are tingling, and palms are sweaty.
CAUSES—Hyperventilation is overbreathing. It can be induced by stress. When some people are
frightened, they start breathing very fast—both rapidly and deeply, even though they do not need the
extra oxygen. This causes them to exhale a lot of carbon dioxide, which in turn causes the blood to
become somewhat alkaline. That results in the symptoms of a panic attack (which see).
Episodes of hyperventilation can last for hours, but generally for only 20-30 minutes. But, for the one
going through it, the experience can be quite difficult.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Wakati hii inafanyika, mara nyingi watu huenda kwenye chumba cha dharura cha hospitali. Na nini hufanya
wanafanya? Wanaweza kumpa mgonjwa gunia la karatasi na kumuuliza apumue ndani yake kwa kifupi
wakati. Hii inajaza dioksidi kaboni mwilini, na kumrudisha kwa kawaida.
• Lakini kuna hatari hapa: mtu anaweza kuwa na, sio shida ya hyperventilation,
Lakini mshtuko wa moyo halisi (ambao unaona). Katika nakala hii, tutadhani kuwa shida ya moyo sio
shida. Lakini unaweza kutaka kuangalia sehemu zetu tofauti chini ya moyo na mishipa:
Moyo.
• Watu ambao wanajua wanaweza kupata shambulio la hyperventilation, mara kwa mara,
Wakati mwingine hubeba gunia la karatasi nao.
• Mazoezi pia husaidia. Haipunguzi tu wasiwasi, lakini mazoezi yanahitaji oksijeni zaidi - kwa hivyo
Kupumua haraka ni sawa.
• Usivute moshi. Hii inaongeza tu kwa shida, kwa nikotini ni kichocheo na inaweza kusaidia katika
Inasababisha mashambulio. Caffeine ni kichocheo kingine cha kuzuia.
• Fanya mazoezi ya utulivu, ya kupumzika. Wastani ambao unapaswa kujitahidi ni wastani
Pumua kila sekunde 6 au 10 kila dakika. Watu wa kawaida hawahitaji kujali kamwe
wenyewe na mara ngapi wanapumua; Lakini, ikiwa una shida hii maalum, unaweza
Unataka kufanya mazoezi ya kuifanya kwa njia sahihi kila mara.
• Unapokuwa na wakati zaidi, utapumua haraka; Kwa hivyo uwe na utulivu, na fikiria juu ya kupumua
polepole.
• Fikiria juu ya mtu mwingine kando na wewe mwenyewe. Tunaweza kuzingatia hofu zetu sana, wao
Toka kwa sehemu.
Epuka hali ambazo huwa zinakufanya uwe na wasiwasi kupita kiasi. Kwa mfano, kwa watu wengine
Hii inatokea wakati inahitajika kusimama katika umati wa watu.
-Unaona "Phobias na mashambulio ya hofu."
Dalili -Moyo unaovutia, vidole vinatetemeka, na mitende ni sweaty.
Sababu -hyperventilation ni kupita kiasi. Inaweza kusababishwa na mafadhaiko. Wakati watu wengine wako
Kuogopa, wanaanza kupumua haraka sana - kwa haraka na kwa undani, ingawa hawahitaji
oksijeni ya ziada. Hii inawafanya kuzidisha dioksidi nyingi za kaboni, ambayo husababisha damu
kuwa alkali. Hiyo husababisha dalili za shambulio la hofu (ambalo huona).
Vipindi vya hyperventilation vinaweza kudumu kwa masaa, lakini kwa jumla kwa dakika 20-30 tu. Lakini, kwa moja
Kupitia hiyo, uzoefu unaweza kuwa ngumu sana.
