title: Fibromyalgia Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Maintain a well-balanced diet.
• Do not drink coffee, tea, cola drinks, chocolate, or take pain relievers. Avoid all types of
drugs; they only add to your problems. If any of these have been part of your diet, the
symptoms may worsen for a time when you drop them, but persevere and you will feel
better for having done so.
• Do not eat meat, dairy products, white-flour products, processed food, or any food high
in saturated fats.
• Avoid wheat and brewer's yeast until your symptoms fade.
• Poor absorption of food is involved with this problem; so eat slowly of good nourishing
food, and chew it well. Be sure to take vitamin/mineral supplementation. Magnesium is
important.
• Drink plenty of liquids, including quality water.
• Food and chemical allergies can be involved. Try to search out yours and avoid them.
• Learn to rest and be relaxed. Be able to relax after the work. Go out and walk in the fresh
air, and thank God for your blessings. Indeed, count them all, one by one, and thank Him
for them all.
• Determine what your problems are and solve them, know you are working toward
solving them, or learn to live with them and no longer be bothered by them.
• A fair amount of muscular activity helps relax a person mentally and emotionally. Enjoy
out-of-door activities, such as gardening or raising flowers. You need a regular amount of
regular daily exercise, not a hard workout every so many days. Building up such a regular
exercise program will do much to alleviate the problem.
• Take a hot and cold shower each morning, to stimulate circulation and help reduce
morning stiffness. Cold showers are actually better than hot ones for reducing
fibromyalgia pains.
• Helpful herbs include comfrey, alfalfa, hop, skullcap, white willow bark, and valerian.
• Physicians prescribe antidepressants for fibromyalgia. These can cause side effects
which are not helpful.
—Also see "Chronic Fatigue Syndrome" and "Depression."
(Chronic Muscle Pain Syndrome,
Fibromyositis, Fibrositis, Tension Myalgia)
SYMPTOMS—Anxiety, depression, tension, fatigue, chronic muscle aches and pain, joint swelling,
headaches (sometimes migraine), irritable bowels, sleep disturbances, and stiffness.
The pain is described as burning, throbbing, shooting, and stabbing. Pain and stiffness are greatest in the
morning.
Depression appears to be a key factor. Other symptoms include menstrual problems, palpitations,
memory impairment, dizziness, dry eyes and mouth, frequent changes in eyeglasses, and impaired
coordination.
Lifting or climbing stairs seems hard to do.
The existence of "tender points" is a distinctive symptom (see below).
CAUSES—Fibromyalgia is more of a set of symptoms than a disease, and it is primarily caused by
stress. Women have it more often than men.
Often mistaken for arthritis, rheumatism, or Epstein-Barr syndrome, fibromyalgia causes the muscles
and joints to tighten up when under stress. The emotions have a powerful effect on the body.
Those experiencing this problem frequently have shallow sleep. Muscle spasms and pain in various
places may occur at night (or during the day).
Then there are the so-called "tender points." These symptoms are unique to this disease, unlike any other
disease. There are 9 pairs of specific points where muscles are especially sensitive to the touch. Here are
those 9 locations:
In muscles at base of skull, neck, upper back, or mid-back. On the side of the elbow, around the lower
vertebra of the neck, at the insertion of the second rib, in the upper and outer muscles of the buttocks,
around the upper part of the thigh bone, at the middle of the knee joint.
Those with fibromyalgia experience so many sleep problems (apnea, bruxism, restless leg syndrome,
etc.), that they often have chronic fatigue.
The symptoms often begin in young adulthood, develop gradually, and slowly increase in intensity until
many become incapacitated by the problem.
Sometimes the syndrome disappears; other times it is chronic; and, in some cases, it is comes back in
recurring flare-ups.
The cause is not really known, but chronic depression of spirits seems to be involved.
Chronic fatigue syndrome (which see) is similar to fibromyalgia, but the former is keyed to chronic
fatigue and the latter to chronic pain.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kudumisha lishe bora.
• Usinywe kahawa, chai, vinywaji vya cola, chokoleti, au uchukue maumivu. Epuka kila aina ya
madawa ya kulevya; Wanaongeza tu shida zako. Ikiwa yoyote ya haya yamekuwa sehemu ya lishe yako,
Dalili zinaweza kuwa mbaya kwa wakati unaziacha, lakini uvumilivu na utahisi
Bora kwa kufanya hivyo.
• Usila nyama, bidhaa za maziwa, bidhaa za unga mweupe, chakula kilichosindika, au chakula chochote cha juu
katika mafuta yaliyojaa.
• Epuka chachu ya ngano na pombe hadi dalili zako zifike.
• Unyonyaji duni wa chakula unahusika na shida hii; Kwa hivyo kula polepole lishe nzuri
chakula, na kutafuna vizuri. Hakikisha kuchukua nyongeza ya vitamini/madini. Magnesiamu ni
muhimu.
• Kunywa vinywaji vingi, pamoja na maji bora.
• Chakula na mzio wa kemikali unaweza kuhusika. Jaribu kutafuta yako na uwaepuke.
• Jifunze kupumzika na kupumzika. Kuwa na uwezo wa kupumzika baada ya kazi. Nenda nje na utembee kwenye safi
Hewa, na umshukuru Mungu kwa baraka zako. Hakika, hesabu zote, moja kwa moja, na umshukuru
kwa wote.
• Amua shida zako ni nini na utatue, ujue unafanya kazi kuelekea
Kuwatatua, au kujifunza kuishi nao na usisumbue tena nao.
• Kiasi sawa cha shughuli za misuli husaidia kupumzika mtu kiakili na kihemko. Furahiya
Shughuli za nje ya mlango, kama vile bustani au kuinua maua. Unahitaji kiwango cha kawaida cha
Mazoezi ya kila siku ya kila siku, sio mazoezi magumu kila siku nyingi. Kuunda mara kwa mara
Programu ya mazoezi itafanya mengi kupunguza shida.
• Chukua bafu moto na baridi kila asubuhi, ili kuchochea mzunguko na kusaidia kupunguza
ugumu wa asubuhi. Maonyesho ya baridi ni bora kuliko zile za moto kwa kupunguza
maumivu ya fibromyalgia.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na Comfrey, Alfalfa, Hop, Fuvu, White Willow Bark, na Valerian.
• Waganga huagiza antidepressants ya fibromyalgia. Hizi zinaweza kusababisha athari mbaya
ambazo hazina msaada.
-Unaona "ugonjwa wa uchovu sugu" na "unyogovu."
(Dalili ya maumivu ya misuli sugu,
Fibromyositis, fibrositis, mvutano myalgia)
Dalili -wasiwasi, unyogovu, mvutano, uchovu, maumivu ya misuli sugu na maumivu, uvimbe wa pamoja,
Maumivu ya kichwa (wakati mwingine migraine), matumbo yasiyokuwa na hasira, usumbufu wa kulala, na ugumu.
Maumivu yanaelezewa kama kuchoma, kushinikiza, kupiga risasi, na kupigwa. Ma maumivu na ugumu ni kubwa zaidi katika
Asubuhi.
Unyogovu unaonekana kuwa sababu kuu. Dalili zingine ni pamoja na shida za hedhi, palpitations,
Uharibifu wa kumbukumbu, kizunguzungu, macho kavu na mdomo, mabadiliko ya mara kwa mara kwenye miwani ya macho, na kuharibika
uratibu.
Kuinua au kupanda ngazi inaonekana kuwa ngumu kufanya.
Uwepo wa "vidokezo vya zabuni" ni dalili tofauti (tazama hapa chini).
Sababu -fibromyalgia ni zaidi ya dalili kuliko ugonjwa, na husababishwa na
Dhiki. Wanawake wanayo mara nyingi zaidi kuliko wanaume.
Mara nyingi kukosea kwa ugonjwa wa arthritis, rheumatism, au ugonjwa wa epstein-barr, fibromyalgia husababisha misuli
na viungo vya kukaza wakati chini ya mafadhaiko. Hisia zina athari kubwa kwa mwili.
Wale wanaopata shida hii mara nyingi huwa na usingizi wa kina. Misuli spasms na maumivu katika anuwai
Maeneo yanaweza kutokea usiku (au wakati wa mchana).
Halafu kuna kinachojulikana kama "vidokezo vya zabuni." Dalili hizi ni za kipekee kwa ugonjwa huu, tofauti na nyingine yoyote
ugonjwa. Kuna jozi 9 za vidokezo maalum ambapo misuli ni nyeti haswa kwa kugusa. Hapa kuna
Maeneo hayo 9:
Katika misuli chini ya fuvu, shingo, nyuma ya juu, au katikati. Kwenye upande wa kiwiko, karibu chini
vertebra ya shingo, kwa kuingizwa kwa mbavu ya pili, kwenye misuli ya juu na ya nje ya matako,
Karibu na sehemu ya juu ya mfupa wa paja, katikati ya goti la pamoja.
Wale walio na fibromyalgia wanapata shida nyingi za kulala (apnea, bruxism, ugonjwa wa mguu usio na utulivu,
nk), kwamba mara nyingi huwa na uchovu sugu.
Dalili mara nyingi huanza katika watu wazima, huendeleza polepole, na kuongezeka polepole kwa kiwango hadi
Wengi huwa hawawezi na shida.
Wakati mwingine ugonjwa hupotea; Wakati mwingine ni sugu; Na, katika hali nyingine, inarudi ndani
mara kwa mara flare-ups.
Sababu haijulikani kabisa, lakini unyogovu sugu wa roho unaonekana kuhusika.
Dalili ya uchovu sugu (ambayo huona) ni sawa na fibromyalgia, lakini ya zamani imewekwa kwa muda mrefu
Uchovu na mwisho kwa maumivu sugu.

title: Myelitis
contentEn:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., Formulas)
MYELITIS (ACUTE) —
COMBAT INFLAMMATORY PROCESS IN SPINAL CORD—Ice Bag, continuously changing
Fomentations for 5 minutes, every half hour. Revulsive Compress to the spine; Fomentation for 20
minutes every 3 hours, during intervals between. Heating Compress to spine at 600 F., renewed every 15
minutes.
AFTER ACUTE STAGE HAS SUBSIDED—Alternate Compress or Alternate Douche to spine 3
times a day.
PAIN AND PARESTHESIA IN LEGS—Hot Leg Pack; Hot Footbath; Hot Half Bath; Revulsive
Compress to spine several times daily, duration 15-60 minutes.
GIRDLE SENSATION—Hot Trunk Pack, followed by Cold Mitten Friction; Hot Abdominal Pack,
well-protected; Fomentation to spine followed by Heating Compress to spine.
NEURALGIC SPINAL PAIN—Fomentation or Hot Sponging of spine, followed by Heating
Compress.
PARAPLEGIA—Alternate Compress or Fan Douche to spine and legs, massage.
SENSORY PARALYSIS—Alternate Spray Douche; Alternate Sponging; Alternate Compress;
Percussion Douche, twice daily.
MUSCULAR SPASM—Revulsive Compress to spine. Fomentation over irritated muscular groups,
followed by continuous Heating Compress, repeated twice daily or as often as necessary; Heating
Compress to spine.
GASTRIC CRISES—Hot and Cold Trunk Pack, Revulsive Gastric Compress, Fomentation to spine,
Hot Footbath, Hot Leg Pack, Hot Full Bath or Hot Sitz Bath.
CONTRAINDICATIONS—Avoid Cold Full Baths and other general cold applications. Carefully
avoid burning or blistering him with hot applications.
MYELITIS (CHRONIC) —
GENERAL—Short sweating procedures, followed by graduated cold applications twice a day.
Revulsive Compress or Fan Douche to Spine, temperature 1200-700 F.; Prolonged Neutral Full Baths for
1-6 hours; Heating Compress to spine. Later stage: Alternate Douche or Heating Compresses to spine.
PRICKLING SENSATION IN LEGS—Revulsive Douche, Hot Fomentations or Pail Pour at 960 F. to
spine and legs.
DURING EARLY STAGE AND EXACERBATIONS—Pail Pour to spine (960 F.), 2-10 minutes, 2-3
times daily; absolute rest in bed; spinal Fomentation every 4 hours; Heating Compress during the
intervals between.
CONTRAINDICATIONS—Avoid Cold Full Bath, very Cold Douche, Cold Pail Pour, and all
prolonged cold applications.
contentSw:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., formula)
Myelitis (papo hapo) -
Kupambana na mchakato wa uchochezi katika kamba ya mgongo -begi la barafu, linabadilika kuendelea
Fomentations kwa dakika 5, kila nusu saa. Compress repusive kwa mgongo; Fomentation kwa 20
Dakika kila masaa 3, wakati wa vipindi kati. Inapokanzwa compress kwa mgongo saa 600 F., iliyosasishwa kila 15
dakika.
Baada ya hatua ya papo hapo kupungua - compress mpya au douche mbadala kwa mgongo 3
mara kwa siku.
Maumivu na paresthesia katika miguu - pakiti ya mguu; Moto wa miguu; Bafu ya nusu moto; Revolusive
Shinikiza mgongo mara kadhaa kila siku, muda wa dakika 15-60.
Hisia za mshipi -pakiti ya shina, ikifuatiwa na msuguano wa baridi ya Mitten; Pakiti ya tumbo moto,
kulindwa vizuri; Fomentation kwa mgongo ikifuatiwa na inapokanzwa compress kwa mgongo.
Maumivu ya mgongo ya neuralgic -formentation au sponging moto wa mgongo, ikifuatiwa na inapokanzwa

title: Hernia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• First, a truss can be purchased and worn. This is not a very practical solution, but may be
necessary for a time if funds are not available for an operation.
• Second, a surgical operation can be performed. This is often the best solution, if done by
a properly trained physician.
• Third, simple remedies may be applied which may, or may not, succeed. If they do not,
then an operation can be performed.
Here are some suggestions:
• If you are overweight, you need to go on a cleansing program, to lose some of it and
cleanse the system.
• Go on a nourishing diet, supplemented by vitamins and minerals and avoiding all grease,
meat, and junk foods.
• Begin a program of exercises each day, to strengthen your muscles (abdominal or leg,
according to where the hernia is). For example, push-ups from the knees will strengthen
the abdominal muscles.
• You may wish to try an astringent tea: Make a very strong tea of white oak bark,
consisting of one cup of finely broken bark to one quart of water. Boil it 2 minutes and let
stand 2 hours. Strain, and add 1 tsp. of alum powder. Wet a folded piece of cloth in the tea
and place it over the hernia. Cover with plastic and hold in place with a truss, elastic
bandage, or adhesive tape. Using clean cloth, repeat this about 4 times a day for a month.
The tannin of the bark and alum will tend to pull together and thicken the area. This may,
or may not, close the area.
• You may also try a poultice made of comfrey leaves, bistort root, and giant Solomon's
seal root. Renew every 12 hours, and keep it on continually for a month.
• You may instead alternate with the application of poultice at night and the compress
during the day, for a month.
• Shave grass tea compress may also be used.
—Also see "Hiatal Hernia" and "Umbilical Hernia."
(Rupture; Abdominal Hernia; Femoral Hernia)
SYMPTOMS—Visual awareness of the problem. In the case of a strangulated hernia, there is pain,
vomiting, and abdominal distention.
CAUSES—A weak spot exists or develops in a muscular wall. An abdominal hernia occurs in the
abdomen, often in the lower left or lower right. A femoral hernia occurs in the femoral muscle of the
upper front leg. The weak spot slowly enlarges and becomes an opening.
If in the abdomen, a loop of intestine can protrude from it at times. Unless corrected, such a condition
will grow progressively worse. A strangulated hernia occurs when a loop of intestine is caught in it and
becomes pinched, blocking the intestinal passage. Gangrene of the bowel, peritonitis, and death may
result if a strangulated hernia is not given prompt surgical attention.
A hernia in a child is less serious, and the opening may repair itself if the protruding bowel loop is
pushed back and held in place by a firm band or adhesive strap for a few months.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kwanza, truss inaweza kununuliwa na kuvaliwa. Hii sio suluhisho la vitendo sana, lakini inaweza kuwa
muhimu kwa wakati ikiwa fedha hazipatikani kwa operesheni.
• Pili, operesheni ya upasuaji inaweza kufanywa. Hii mara nyingi ndio suluhisho bora, ikiwa inafanywa na
daktari aliyefundishwa vizuri.
• Tatu, tiba rahisi zinaweza kutumika ambazo zinaweza, au haziwezi, kufanikiwa. Ikiwa hawafanyi,
basi operesheni inaweza kufanywa.
Hapa kuna maoni kadhaa:
• Ikiwa wewe ni mzito, unahitaji kwenda kwenye programu ya utakaso, ili kupoteza baadhi yake na
Safisha mfumo.
• Nenda kwenye lishe yenye lishe, iliyoongezewa na vitamini na madini na epuka grisi yote,
Nyama, na vyakula visivyofaa.
• Anza mpango wa mazoezi kila siku, ili kuimarisha misuli yako (tumbo au mguu,
kulingana na mahali hernia iko). Kwa mfano, kushinikiza kutoka kwa magoti kutaimarisha
misuli ya tumbo.
• Unaweza kutamani kujaribu chai ya kutuliza: Tengeneza chai yenye nguvu sana ya gome nyeupe ya mwaloni,
Inajumuisha kikombe kimoja cha gome lililovunjika kwa lita moja ya maji. Chemsha dakika 2 na wacha
simama masaa 2. Shina, na ongeza 1 tsp. ya poda ya alum. Weka kipande cha kitambaa kilichowekwa kwenye chai
na uweke juu ya hernia. Funika na plastiki na ushikilie mahali na truss, elastic
Bandage, au mkanda wa wambiso. Kutumia kitambaa safi, rudia hii mara 4 kwa siku kwa mwezi.
Tannin ya gome na alum itaelekea kuvuta pamoja na kuinua eneo hilo. Mei hii,
Au labda, funga eneo hilo.
• Unaweza pia kujaribu kuku iliyotengenezwa na majani ya comfrey, mizizi ya bistort, na Giant Solomon's
mizizi ya muhuri. Sasisha kila masaa 12, na uiweke kila wakati kwa mwezi.
• badala yake unaweza kubadilisha na matumizi ya kuku usiku na compress
Wakati wa mchana, kwa mwezi.
• Shave ya chai ya nyasi inaweza pia kutumika.
-Unaona "hiatal hernia" na "hernia ya umbilical."
(Kupasuka; hernia ya tumbo; hernia ya kike)
Dalili -Uhamasishaji wa shida ya shida. Katika kesi ya hernia iliyopigwa, kuna maumivu,
kutapika, na kuvinjari kwa tumbo.
Sababu - eneo dhaifu lipo au linakua kwenye ukuta wa misuli. Mimea ya tumbo hufanyika katika
Tumbo, mara nyingi katika kushoto chini au chini kulia. Hernia ya kike hufanyika katika misuli ya kike ya
mguu wa mbele wa juu. Mahali dhaifu huongezeka polepole na kuwa ufunguzi.
Ikiwa ndani ya tumbo, kitanzi cha utumbo kinaweza kutoka kwake wakati mwingine. Isipokuwa kusahihishwa, hali kama hiyo
itakua mbaya zaidi. Mimea iliyopigwa hufanyika wakati kitanzi cha utumbo kinakamatwa ndani yake na
inakuwa imewekwa, kuzuia kifungu cha matumbo. Gangrene ya matumbo, peritonitis, na kifo inaweza
Matokeo ikiwa hernia iliyokatwa haipewi umakini wa upasuaji wa haraka.
Mimea katika mtoto ni mbaya sana, na ufunguzi unaweza kujirekebisha ikiwa kitanzi cha matumbo kinachojitokeza ni
Kusukuma nyuma na kushikiliwa na bendi thabiti au kamba ya wambiso kwa miezi michache.

title: Umbilical Hernia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• If the hernial ring is larger than your finger tip, surgery is needed, to correct it.
• If the defect is about the size of the diameter of your finger tip, the following method has
been used with good success, to heal it at home without surgery:
• Place a golf-ball sized ball of virgin wool on the hernia and tape it firmly down to the
level of the skin's surface.
• Three times a day, remove the wool ball. Make sure the fat is pushed back into the belly
cavity; carefully use your finger to do this.
• At the same time, rub the hernial ring in a rotary fashion for several minutes, to irritate it.
• Over a period of several weeks or months, the defect will fill in and entirely heal; so no
surgery will be needed.
—Also see "Hernia" and "Hiatal Hernia."
(Omphalocele)
SYMPTOMS—A grape to basketball sized skin sac in the belly button.
CAUSES—"Omphalos" means navel, and "kele" means hernia. This sac in the navel, which is a birth
defect, is lined with the membrane lining of the abdominal cavity (the peritoneum). It may contain fat
and/or intestinal loops that can be pushed back into the abdominal cavity.
This flaw, called a "hernial ring," occurs more frequently than might be expected. The mother did not
receive enough vitamin A and/or zinc during pregnancy.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ikiwa pete ya hernial ni kubwa kuliko ncha yako ya kidole, upasuaji unahitajika, ili kuirekebisha.
• Ikiwa kasoro ni juu ya saizi ya kipenyo cha ncha yako ya kidole, njia ifuatayo ina
imetumika na mafanikio mazuri, kuiponya nyumbani bila upasuaji:
• Weka mpira wa ukubwa wa gofu ya pamba ya bikira kwenye hernia na kuikanda kwa nguvu chini ya
Kiwango cha uso wa ngozi.
• Mara tatu kwa siku, ondoa mpira wa pamba. Hakikisha mafuta yanasukuma nyuma ndani ya tumbo
cavity; Tumia kidole chako kwa uangalifu kufanya hivi.
• Wakati huo huo, kusugua pete ya hernial kwa mtindo wa mzunguko kwa dakika kadhaa, ili kuikasirisha.
• Kwa kipindi cha wiki kadhaa au miezi, kasoro itajaza na kupona kabisa; Kwa hivyo hapana
upasuaji utahitajika.
-Unaona "hernia" na "hiatal hernia."
(Omphalocele)
Dalili -Zabibu kwa ngozi ya ukubwa wa ngozi kwenye kitufe cha tumbo.
Sababu - "Omphalos" inamaanisha navel, na "Kele" inamaanisha hernia. Sac hii katika kitovu, ambayo ni kuzaliwa
Kasoro, imefungwa na utando wa membrane ya tumbo la tumbo (peritoneum). Inaweza kuwa na mafuta
na/au vitanzi vya matumbo ambavyo vinaweza kusukuma nyuma ndani ya cavity ya tumbo.
Kosa hili, linaloitwa "pete ya hernial," hufanyika mara nyingi zaidi kuliko inavyotarajiwa. Mama hakufanya
Pokea vitamini A na/au zinki wakati wa ujauzito.

title: Pelvic Congestion
contentEn:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., Formulas)
BASIC APPLICATIONS—Graduated cold applications; hot vaginal irrigation, 10-15 minutes, twice
daily; Hot Blanket Pack to legs with cold pelvic pack (Wet Sheet Pack over pelvic area), continued to
sweating stage, followed by cold friction or Wet Sheet Rub.
PAIN—Prolonged Neutral Sitz Bath at 950-970 F., for 15-20 minutes.
LEUKORRHEA—In addition to the above measures, antiseptic vaginal irrigation. In certain cases,
cool irrigation, at 750-650 F., produces better results than hot irrigation. Constipation and portal
congestion must be relieved. Cervical catarrh and erosions often require the use of the curette [a spoon-
shaped scraping instrument for scraping foreign matter from a cavity].
ACUTE INFLAMMATION—If attacks of inflammation occur, rest in bed; Hot Hip or Leg Pack; hot
and cold pelvic compress or hot and cold pelvic pack.

Hatua ya jasho, ikifuatiwa na msuguano wa baridi au kusugua kwa karatasi ya mvua.

Umwagiliaji wa baridi, kwa 750-650 F., hutoa matokeo bora kuliko umwagiliaji moto. Kuvimbiwa na portal
Msongamano lazima uondolewe. Catarrh ya kizazi na mmomomyoko mara nyingi huhitaji matumizi ya tiba [kijiko-
Chombo cha kuchaka kilichochorwa kwa kung'oa jambo la kigeni kutoka kwa cavity].
Kuvimba kwa papo hapo -ikiwa mashambulio ya uchochezi yanatokea, pumzika kitandani; Hip moto au pakiti ya mguu; moto
na compress baridi ya pelvic au pakiti ya moto na baridi ya pelvic.

title: Pelvic Pain
contentEn:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., Formulas)
BASIC FACTORS—Remove all known causes: tight bands around the waist, tight shoes, cold
extremities, sexual excess.
GENERAL APPLICATIONS—Rest in a horizontal position, with proper general treatment for any
existing general or local morbid condition, as anemia, neurasthenia, hysteria, enteroptosis, constipation,
or any discoverable pelvic disease. If caused by neuralgia: Give hot Hip and Leg Pack or very hot
Revulsive Sitz, 3 times a day; hot water bottle over seat of pain and heat to feet and legs. Very hot
vaginal irrigation.
If due to chronic congestion in a pelvic organ: Hot Hip and Leg Pack every 2-4 hours, with abdominal
Heating Compress and heating leg packs during the interval between.
If due to inflammation or acute congestion: Hot Hip and Leg Pack or Hot and Cold Pelvic Pack every 2-
4 hours, followed by continuous heat to legs with cooling compress to lower abdomen, external genitals
and inner surfaces of thighs. Vaginal irrigation at 1050 F. for 15 minutes, every 3 hours. Apply Ice Bag
over seat of pain during the hot vaginal irrigation and Hot Hip and Leg Pack.

title: Hypoglycemia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Refined starches, sugars, and a high-meat diet wear out the adrenals. Too much sugar
shocks the adrenal cortex, and the resulting physical reaction is to crave still more sugar.
• Stop eating or using meat, nicotine, alcohol, chocolate, soft drinks, black tea, and
sugared and fat foods. Caffeine, alcohol, and tobacco produce wide swings in blood sugar
levels.
• Read the labels at the grocery store, and avoid dextrose, dextrin, lactose, maltose,
sucrose, fructose, modified food starch, corn syrup, corn sweetener, cornstarch, and
natural sweetener. Only use honey and molasses in small amounts. Also stay away from
sorbitol, hexanol, mannitol, and glycol.
• Too much salt also exhausts the adrenals and causes a loss of potassium, leading to
lower blood sugar.
• Eat natural foods, the ones you should have been eating to begin with. Whole grains, raw
and simply cooked vegetables, some fresh fruit. But eat in moderation starchy foods, such
as corn, noodles, pasta, white rice, hominy, and yams.
• Eat a high-fiber diet and vegetables that are raw or steamed. These are good for you:
beans, lentils, brown rice, white potatoes, soy products, and fruits.
• Useful fruits include apricots, apples, bananas, grapefruit, lemons, cantaloupes, and
persimmons. For example, eat a raw apple instead of applesauce, for the apple has more
fiber which will help keep blood sugar stabilized.
• Licorice acts like cortin and helps the blood sugar. Bilberry and wild yam help control
insulin levels. Cedar berries help the pancreas. Spirulina tablets, taken between meals,
help stabilize blood sugar.
• During a blood sugar reaction, eat something that has both fiber and protein, such as rice
or bran crackers with almond butter. Fiber alone (popcorn, rice, oat bran, crackers, ground
flaxseed, and psyllium husks) has the ability to slow down a hypoglycemic reaction. A
half hour before each meal, eat some of this high fiber, to stabilize blood sugar.
• Once a month, go on a fresh vegetable juice fast for a day. Take enemas with some
added lemon juice at that time. If a reaction starts to occur, reach for the fiber, protein
powder, or spirulina.
• Avoid stressful situations. You may have a milk allergy, which often accompanies this
disease.
(Low Blood Sugar)
SYMPTOMS—Confusion, depression, nervousness, anxiety, antisocial behavior, emotional instability,
exhaustion, headaches, impatience, inability to cope, fears, craving for sugar, faintness, dizziness.
Symptoms especially occur a few hours after eating sweets or fats. The more that is eaten and the longer
the span before the symptoms occur, the worse they are.
CAUSES—The problem is adrenal exhaustion. The cause is too much stress, worry, and an excess of
undigested sugars, starches, proteins, and dairy products. The cortin hormone is depleted, so food cannot
be digested properly.
People consume large quantities of sugars, caffeine, soft drinks, and alcohol. These all contain simple
sugars, and insufficient amounts of complex carbohydrates. Add to this: high stress levels, and the two
adrenal glands become exhausted.
Hypoglycemia can be inherited, but more often it is brought on by an inadequate diet (and is then called
functional hypoglycemia). However, there are several other physical problems which can weaken
adrenal function and help bring on hypoglycemia. These include weaknesses in the thyroid, liver,
kidneys, pituitary, and pancreas. Immune deficiency and candidiasis can also lead to it. Other causes
include smoking and large amounts of caffeine.
Hypoglycemia is sometimes mistakenly diagnosed as asthma, allergies, fatigue syndrome, stomach,
intestinal, weight problems, or mental or nervous disorders.
Half the people, over 50, who have hypoglycemia, are hypothyroid.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Nyasi zilizosafishwa, sukari, na lishe ya nyama ya juu huvaa adrenals. Sukari nyingi
Mshtuko wa cortex ya adrenal, na athari inayosababishwa ya mwili ni kutamani sukari zaidi.
Acha kula au kutumia nyama, nikotini, pombe, chokoleti, vinywaji laini, chai nyeusi, na
Vyakula vyenye sukari na mafuta. Caffeine, pombe, na tumbaku hutoa swings pana katika sukari ya damu
Viwango.
• Soma lebo kwenye duka la mboga, na epuka dextrose, dextrin, lactose, maltose,
sucrose, fructose, wanga wa chakula uliobadilishwa, syrup ya mahindi, tamu ya mahindi, mahindi, na
Utamu wa asili. Tumia tu asali na molasses kwa kiwango kidogo. Pia kaa mbali na
Sorbitol, Hexanol, Mannitol, na Glycol.
• Chumvi nyingi pia huondoa adrenals na husababisha upotezaji wa potasiamu, na kusababisha
sukari ya chini ya damu.
• Kula vyakula asili, ambavyo unapaswa kuwa umekula ili kuanza. Nafaka nzima, mbichi
Na mboga zilizopikwa tu, matunda mengine safi. Lakini kula kwa vyakula vya kawaida vya wanga, kama vile
Kama mahindi, noodles, pasta, mchele mweupe, hominy, na yam.
• Kula lishe yenye nyuzi nyingi na mboga ambazo ni mbichi au zilizokaushwa. Hizi ni nzuri kwako:
Maharagwe, lenti, mchele wa kahawia, viazi nyeupe, bidhaa za soya, na matunda.
• Matunda muhimu ni pamoja na apricots, maapulo, ndizi, zabibu, mandimu, cantaloupes, na
Persimmons. Kwa mfano, kula apple mbichi badala ya applesauce, kwa apple ina zaidi
Fiber ambayo itasaidia kuweka sukari ya damu imetulia.
• Licorice hufanya kama cortin na husaidia sukari ya damu. Bilberry na pori la msaada wa yam
Viwango vya insulini. Berries za mwerezi husaidia kongosho. Vidonge vya spirulina, vilivyochukuliwa kati ya milo,
Saidia kuleta utulivu wa sukari ya damu.
• Wakati wa mmenyuko wa sukari ya damu, kula kitu ambacho kina nyuzi na protini, kama vile mchele
au matawi ya matawi na siagi ya mlozi. Fiber peke yake (popcorn, mchele, matawi ya oat, crackers, ardhi
Flaxseed, na manyoya ya psyllium) ina uwezo wa kupunguza athari ya hypoglycemic. A
Nusu saa kabla ya kila mlo, kula baadhi ya nyuzi hii ya juu, kuleta utulivu wa sukari ya damu.
• Mara moja kwa mwezi, nenda kwenye juisi safi ya mboga haraka kwa siku. Chukua enemas na zingine
Aliongeza maji ya limao wakati huo. Ikiwa majibu yanaanza kutokea, fikia nyuzi, protini
poda, au spirulina.
• Epuka hali zenye mkazo. Unaweza kuwa na mzio wa maziwa, ambayo mara nyingi huambatana na hii
ugonjwa.
(Sukari ya chini ya damu)
Dalili -Ushirikiano, Unyogovu, Uwezo, Wasiwasi, Tabia ya Kukomesha, Kukosekana kwa kihemko,
Kuchoka, maumivu ya kichwa, uvumilivu, kutokuwa na uwezo wa kukabiliana, hofu, kutamani sukari, kukata tamaa, kizunguzungu.
Dalili hufanyika haswa masaa machache baada ya kula pipi au mafuta. Zaidi ambayo huliwa na ndefu
Span kabla ya dalili kutokea, ni mbaya zaidi.
Sababu - Shida ni uchovu wa adrenal. Sababu ni mafadhaiko mengi, wasiwasi, na ziada ya
Sukari zisizo na sukari, nyota, protini, na bidhaa za maziwa. Homoni ya cortin imekamilika, kwa hivyo chakula hakiwezi
kuchimbwa vizuri.
Watu hutumia sukari nyingi, kafeini, vinywaji laini, na pombe. Hizi zote zina rahisi
sukari, na kiasi cha kutosha cha wanga ngumu. Ongeza kwa hii: viwango vya juu vya dhiki, na hizo mbili
Tezi za adrenal huwa zimechoka.
Hypoglycemia inaweza kurithiwa, lakini mara nyingi zaidi huletwa na lishe duni (na kisha huitwa
kazi hypoglycemia). Walakini, kuna shida zingine kadhaa za mwili ambazo zinaweza kudhoofisha
kazi ya adrenal na kusaidia kuleta hypoglycemia. Hii ni pamoja na udhaifu katika tezi, ini,
Figo, pituitary, na kongosho. Upungufu wa kinga na candidiasis pia inaweza kusababisha hiyo. Sababu zingine
Jumuisha sigara na idadi kubwa ya kafeini.
Hypoglycemia wakati mwingine hugunduliwa vibaya kama pumu, mzio, dalili za uchovu, tumbo,
Matatizo ya ndani, uzito, au shida ya akili au ya neva.
Nusu ya watu, zaidi ya 50, ambao wana hypoglycemia, ni hypothyroid.

title: Addison'S Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Maintain a good nourishing diet. Include Nova Scotia dulse or Norwegian kelp for trace
minerals. Fresh, raw, and cooked greens and garlic should be part of your regime.
• Avoid tobacco, alcohol, caffeine, and soft drinks. Do not use sugar foods, fried foods,
processed or junk foods. Do not eat meat.
• Avoid stress! This is very important, for stress is hard on weak adrenals. Take time for
prayer and the study of God's Word, the Bible. He can help you solve the problems about
you.
• Stress released ACTH through the pituitary, which can raise blood pressure, stores
sodium and excretes potassium. Water retention in the tissues is another result.
—Compare the opposite of Addison's Disease, which is "Cushing's Disease" (which see).
(Adrenal Underactivity)
SYMPTOMS—Dizziness, fainting, nausea, loss of appetite, moodiness, decrease in body hair, inability
to cope with stress. Slight darkening and discoloration of the skin is more noticeable when body parts
are exposed to the sun. This would include forehead, knees, elbows, scars, skin folds and creases (on the
palms, etc.). The mouth and freckles may appear darker. The hair becomes darker.
Bands of pigment run the length of the nails.
Reduced adrenal function (resulting either from Addison's or Cushing's Disease) can result in weakness,
headaches, memory problems, dizziness, allergies, food cravings, and blood sugar disorders.
CAUSES—Both the adrenal underactivity of Addison's Disease and the overactivity of Cushing's
Disease are caused by problems in the function of the adrenal glands.
Continued use of cortisone drugs for arthritis and asthma, etc., damage the adrenals. Those drugs cause
them to shrink in size and not work properly. Yet, surprisingly enough, the shrunken glands can still
overproduce and cause Cushing's Disease or underproduce and cause Addison's.
There is a way you can pinpoint whether or not your adrenals are functioning normally:
The systolic is the first number in a blood pressure reading, and the diastolic is the second. For example,
120/80. The systolic should be 10 points higher when you are standing than when you are lying down.
Lie down and rest for 5 minutes, and then have someone take your blood pressure. Then stand up and
have it immediately taken again. The blood pressure will probably be somewhat higher.
But if it is lower when standing than when laying flat, the adrenals are not working properly. The lower
it is, the worse the condition of the adrenals.
You will want to contact a medical professional. Addison's is a chronic condition which needs to be
continually worked with. You may moderate the problem, but it is never fully eliminated.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kudumisha lishe bora ya lishe. Jumuisha Nova Scotia Dulse au Kelp ya Norway kwa kuwaeleza
madini. Kijani safi, mbichi, na kilichopikwa na vitunguu vinapaswa kuwa sehemu ya serikali yako.
Epuka tumbaku, pombe, kafeini, na vinywaji laini. Usitumie vyakula vya sukari, vyakula vya kukaanga,
vyakula vya kusindika au visivyo. Usile nyama.
• Epuka mafadhaiko! Hii ni muhimu sana, kwa mafadhaiko ni ngumu kwa adrenals dhaifu. Chukua muda wa
Maombi na kusoma kwa Neno la Mungu, Bibilia. Anaweza kukusaidia kutatua shida kuhusu
wewe.
• Dhiki iliyotolewa ACTH kupitia pituitary, ambayo inaweza kuongeza shinikizo la damu, maduka
Sodiamu na excretes potasiamu. Uhifadhi wa maji kwenye tishu ni matokeo mengine.
-Matoshe kinyume cha ugonjwa wa Addison, ambao ni "ugonjwa wa Cushing" (ambao unaona).
(Adrenal Underactivity)
Dalili -unene, kukata tamaa, kichefuchefu, kupoteza hamu ya kula, kupungua kwa nywele, kupungua kwa nywele za mwili, kutokuwa na uwezo
kukabiliana na mafadhaiko. Kuweka giza kidogo na kubadilika kwa ngozi inaonekana zaidi wakati sehemu za mwili
hufunuliwa na jua. Hii ni pamoja na paji la uso, magoti, viwiko, makovu, folda za ngozi na vifuniko (kwenye
mitende, nk). Mdomo na freckles zinaweza kuonekana kuwa nyeusi. Nywele huwa nyeusi.
Bendi za rangi huendesha urefu wa kucha.
Kupunguza kazi ya adrenal (inayotokana na ugonjwa wa Addison au Cushing) inaweza kusababisha udhaifu,
Ma maumivu ya kichwa, shida za kumbukumbu, kizunguzungu, mzio, tamaa za chakula, na shida ya sukari ya damu.
Sababu -zote mbili za ugonjwa wa adrenal wa ugonjwa wa Addison na kuzidi kwa Cushing's
Ugonjwa husababishwa na shida katika kazi ya tezi za adrenal.
Kuendelea matumizi ya dawa za cortisone kwa ugonjwa wa arthritis na pumu, nk, kuharibu adrenals. Dawa hizo husababisha
wao kupungua kwa ukubwa na sio kufanya kazi vizuri. Walakini, kwa kushangaza inatosha, tezi za shrunken zinaweza bado
Kuzidisha na kusababisha ugonjwa wa Cushing au kuzalisha na kusababisha Addison.
Kuna njia ambayo unaweza kubaini ikiwa adrenals zako zinafanya kazi kawaida:
Systolic ndio nambari ya kwanza katika usomaji wa shinikizo la damu, na diastoli ni ya pili. Kwa mfano,
120/80. Systolic inapaswa kuwa alama 10 juu wakati umesimama kuliko wakati umelala chini.
Lala chini na kupumzika kwa dakika 5, halafu mtu achukue shinikizo la damu. Kisha simama na
Je! Ichukue mara moja tena. Shinikizo la damu labda litakuwa juu zaidi.
Lakini ikiwa ni ya chini wakati imesimama kuliko wakati wa kuwekewa gorofa, adrenals hazifanyi kazi vizuri. Chini
Ni mbaya zaidi hali ya adrenals.
Utataka kuwasiliana na mtaalamu wa matibabu. Addison ni hali sugu ambayo inahitaji kuwa
Kuendelea kufanya kazi na. Unaweza kudhibiti shida, lakini haijaondolewa kabisa.

title: Cushing'S Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• See "Addison's Disease" for more information. The objective is to live better so the
adrenals, whether working too fast or too slow, can be helped to normalize.
(Adrenal overactivity)
SYMPTOMS—Rounded "moon" faces, heavy abdomen and buttocks, thin limbs, The muscles seem
weak and wasting away. The eyelids may appear swollen and round; red spots may appear on the face.
The skin seems to get thinner, and produces stretch marks and bruising.
Body hair grows faster, and women may grow mustaches and beards. Healing is more difficult and
illnesses more frequent.
Reduced adrenal function (resulting either from Addison's or Cushing's Disease) can result in weakness,
headaches, memory problems, dizziness, allergies, food cravings, and blood sugar disorders.
CAUSES—See "Addison's Disease" for more information.
There are two adrenal glands in your body. One is on top of each kidney. Each one is remarkably small,
and weighs only about one-fifth of an ounce.
The outer thick "rind" of each adrenal is the cortex. It produces cortisone. The inner portion is called the
medulla; it secretes adrenaline (epinephrine) when stress occurs.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Tazama "Ugonjwa wa Addison" kwa habari zaidi. Kusudi ni kuishi bora kwa hivyo
Adrenals, iwe inafanya kazi haraka sana au polepole sana, inaweza kusaidiwa kurekebisha.
(Adrenal Overaction)
Dalili -zenye nyuso za "mwezi", tumbo nzito na matako, miguu nyembamba, misuli inaonekana
dhaifu na kupoteza mbali. Eyelids zinaweza kuonekana kuvimba na pande zote; Matangazo nyekundu yanaweza kuonekana kwenye uso.
Ngozi inaonekana kuwa nyembamba, na hutoa alama za kunyoosha na michubuko.
Nywele za mwili hukua haraka, na wanawake wanaweza kukua masharubu na ndevu. Uponyaji ni ngumu zaidi na
magonjwa mara kwa mara.
Kupunguza kazi ya adrenal (inayotokana na ugonjwa wa Addison au Cushing) inaweza kusababisha udhaifu,
Ma maumivu ya kichwa, shida za kumbukumbu, kizunguzungu, mzio, tamaa za chakula, na shida ya sukari ya damu.
Sababu -Tazama "Ugonjwa wa Addison" kwa habari zaidi.
Kuna tezi mbili za adrenal mwilini mwako. Moja iko juu ya kila figo. Kila mmoja ni mdogo sana,
na uzani wa theluthi moja tu ya aunzi.
"Rind" ya nje ya kila adrenal ni cortex. Inazalisha cortisone. Sehemu ya ndani inaitwa
Medulla; Inaweka siri ya adrenaline (epinephrine) wakati mafadhaiko yanatokea.

title: Cystic Fibrosis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• In addition to the above instructions, the CF patient should consider the following:
• Eat a nourishing diet, high in raw fruits and vegetables and with adequate amounts of
carbohydrates, protein, and vitamin/mineral supplements. A problem is that those with CF
do not absorb food properly. They need to eat more than other people, in order to absorb
the needed nutrients.
• Include germanium (found in garlic and onions), selenium, and vitamin E.
• Drink plenty of liquids and an adequate amount of salt in hot weather.
• Do not eat processed or junk food of any type. Avoid tobacco, alcohol, etc.
—Also see "Birth Defects" for more information on cystic fibrosis.
SYMPTOMS—The symptoms are first seen in very small children. Large amounts of thick mucous
develops in the lungs, blocking lung passages and causing difficult breathing, chronic coughing and
wheezing, and lung infections.
There are digestive problems, inadequate absorption of fats, after-meal stomach pain, and thinness. Body
sweat will have very large amounts of sodium, potassium, and chloride salts. Any, or all, of these
symptoms may occur.
CAUSES—In 1938, this physical problem was named "cystic fibrosis" because it was mistakenly
thought that abnormal changes in the pancreas were true cysts (tiny pockets of fluid lined with normal
tissue). But it was later discovered that those spots were just part of the shrinking process of the
pancreas, as the disease worsened.
There are three views of the cause of cystic fibrosis (CF):
1 - CF is an inherited disease, which the sufferer must learn to live with.
2 - CF is caused by inadequate absorption of selenium, zinc, essential fatty acids, and other minerals
(including trace minerals) as a result of subclinical celiac disease. (Celiac disease is the inability to
digest wheat and some other foods.)
3 - Dr. Joel Wallach, a veterinarian, who in 1978 was the first to diagnose CF in a laboratory animal, by
noting characteristic CF changes in the pancreas and liver of baby monkeys, says he was fired when it
was discovered that he could reproduce those CF changes in the body by giving or withholding the
element, selenium. He had shown that CF was a nutritional problem which could be solved if caught
early enough. (See Let's Play Doctor, J.D. Wallach, D.V.M., N.D., pp. 109-110. See order sheet.)
"The prevention of CF has been accomplished in pet, farm and laboratory animals by the veterinary
profession by assuring adequate levels of selenium and essential fatty acid nutrition to the pregnant and
nursing mother. This is not as easy as it sounds because of malabsorption problems (i.e., celiac disease
and Crohn's disease) in a percentage of women. All things being normal, a supplementation of 200 mcg
selenium per day and 5 gm of flaxseed oil, three times a day [to the pregnant and nursing mother], would
be adequate to prevent CF.
"Treatment of CF is very basic: treat the infant as early as possible with selenium IM [given
intramuscularly] at 10-25 mcg per day."—Op cit., p. 109.
He adds that it is vital that it be determined if the infant is allergic to wheat, cow's milk or soy milk, so
as to avoid what he is allergic to.
We might conclude that all three theories are correct; in that, if you give the mother and infant proper
supplementation, the disease can be eliminated at the beginning of the child's life.
But if this is not done, he will thereafter not be able to absorb nutrients properly, will exhibit the
symptoms of CF, and will have to cope with the problem the rest of his life.
However, Wallach says that, even later, the person can lead a more normal life if he regularly receives
essential fatty acids, intravenously, and selenium, intramuscularly.
"The lungs of CF patients are normal at birth and only develop bronchiectasis after chronic essential
fatty acid and copper deficiencies have taken their toll."—Ibid.
"CF . . is preventable, 100% curable in the early stages, and can be far better managed in chronic cases
than it is currently managed by `orthodox' medicine."—Op. cit., p. 108.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mbali na maagizo hapo juu, mgonjwa wa CF anapaswa kuzingatia yafuatayo:
• Kula lishe yenye lishe, juu ya matunda na mboga mbichi na kwa kiasi cha kutosha cha
wanga, protini, na virutubisho vya vitamini/madini. Shida ni kwamba wale walio na CF
Usichukue chakula vizuri. Wanahitaji kula zaidi ya watu wengine, ili kunyonya
virutubishi vinavyohitajika.
• Jumuisha germanium (inayopatikana katika vitunguu na vitunguu), seleniamu, na vitamini E.
• Kunywa vinywaji vingi na kiasi cha kutosha cha chumvi katika hali ya hewa ya joto.
• Usila chakula cha kusindika au chakula cha aina yoyote. Epuka tumbaku, pombe, nk.
-Unaona "kasoro za kuzaliwa" kwa habari zaidi juu ya cystic fibrosis.
Dalili -Dalili zinaonekana kwanza kwa watoto wadogo sana. Idadi kubwa ya mucous nene
Inakua kwenye mapafu, kuzuia vifungu vya mapafu na kusababisha kupumua ngumu, kukohoa sugu na
Magurudumu, na maambukizo ya mapafu.
Kuna shida za kumengenya, kunyonya kwa kutosha kwa mafuta, maumivu ya tumbo baada ya chakula, na nyembamba. Mwili
Jasho litakuwa na kiasi kikubwa cha sodiamu, potasiamu, na chumvi ya kloridi. Yoyote, au yote, ya haya
Dalili zinaweza kutokea.
Sababu - Mnamo 1938, shida hii ya mwili iliitwa "cystic fibrosis" kwa sababu ilikuwa vibaya
walidhani kwamba mabadiliko yasiyokuwa ya kawaida kwenye kongosho yalikuwa cysts ya kweli (mifuko midogo ya maji iliyowekwa na kawaida
tishu). Lakini baadaye iligundulika kuwa matangazo hayo yalikuwa sehemu tu ya mchakato wa kupungua wa
kongosho, kama ugonjwa ulizidi kuwa mbaya.
Kuna maoni matatu ya sababu ya cystic fibrosis (CF):
1 - CF ni ugonjwa uliorithiwa, ambao mgonjwa lazima ajifunze kuishi naye.
2 - CF husababishwa na kunyonya kwa kutosha kwa seleniamu, zinki, asidi muhimu ya mafuta, na madini mengine
(pamoja na madini ya kuwaeleza) kama matokeo ya ugonjwa wa celiac. (Ugonjwa wa celiac ni kutokuwa na uwezo wa
Digest ngano na vyakula vingine.)
3 - Dk Joel Wallach, daktari wa mifugo, ambaye mnamo 1978 alikuwa wa kwanza kugundua CF katika mnyama wa maabara, na
akigundua tabia ya mabadiliko ya CF kwenye kongosho na ini ya nyani wa watoto, anasema alifukuzwa wakati
iligundulika kuwa angeweza kuzalisha mabadiliko hayo ya CF mwilini kwa kutoa au kuzuia
kipengele, seleniamu. Alikuwa ameonyesha kuwa CF ilikuwa shida ya lishe ambayo inaweza kutatuliwa ikiwa itakamatwa
Mapema vya kutosha. .
"Uzuiaji wa CF umekamilika katika wanyama wa PET, shamba na maabara na mifugo
taaluma kwa kuhakikisha viwango vya kutosha vya seleniamu na lishe muhimu ya asidi ya mafuta kwa mjamzito na
mama wauguzi. Hii sio rahisi kama inavyosikika kwa sababu ya shida za malabsorption (i.e. ugonjwa wa celiac
na ugonjwa wa Crohn) kwa asilimia ya wanawake. Vitu vyote kuwa vya kawaida, nyongeza ya 200 mcg
Selenium kwa siku na 5 gm ya mafuta ya kitani, mara tatu kwa siku [kwa mama mjamzito na uuguzi], ingekuwa
Kuwa wa kutosha kuzuia Cf.
"Matibabu ya CF ni ya msingi sana: Tibu mtoto mchanga mapema iwezekanavyo na seleniamu im [alipewa
intramuscularly] saa 10-25 mcg kwa siku. "-op cit., p. 109.
Anaongeza kuwa ni muhimu kwamba imedhamiriwa ikiwa mtoto mchanga ni mzio wa ngano, maziwa ya ng'ombe au maziwa ya soya, kwa hivyo
kama kuzuia kile yeye ni mzio.
Tunaweza kuhitimisha kuwa nadharia zote tatu ni sawa; Kwa hiyo, ikiwa unampa mama na mtoto mchanga
Kuongezewa, ugonjwa unaweza kuondolewa mwanzoni mwa maisha ya mtoto.
Lakini ikiwa hii haijafanywa, baadaye hataweza kuchukua virutubishi vizuri, ataonyesha
Dalili za CF, na italazimika kukabiliana na shida maisha yake yote.
Walakini, Wallach anasema kuwa, hata baadaye, mtu huyo anaweza kuishi maisha ya kawaida ikiwa atapokea mara kwa mara
Asidi muhimu za mafuta, intravenously, na seleniamu, intramuscularly.
"Mapafu ya wagonjwa wa CF ni ya kawaida wakati wa kuzaa na huendeleza tu bronchiectasis baada ya muhimu sugu
Asidi ya mafuta na upungufu wa shaba imechukua ushuru wao. " - Ibid.
"Cf. Inaweza kuzuilika, 100% inayoweza kupunguzwa katika hatua za mwanzo, na inaweza kusimamiwa vizuri zaidi katika kesi sugu
kuliko sasa inasimamiwa na dawa ya `orthodox '." - op. Cit., P. 108.

title: Hypothyroidism
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• You need iodine every day, at every meal. But how do you obtain it? Long use of
thyroid medication can weaken the bones or result in breast cancer.
• Among the seaweeds, Nova Scotia dulse or Norwegian kelp are the best balanced
sources of trace minerals. Most other seaweed products also contain iodine, but they are
not always as balanced in providing a wide spectrum of other trace minerals. California
kelp is not as good.
• Here is an address for Nova Scotia dulse: Harry Greene, North Head, Grand Manan, N.
B. [New Brunswick], Canada. My last boxful was $12 for 12 ounces. I let it dry, then
whiz the leaves, put them in jars, and sprinkle it on my food.
• Some nature therapists recommend coating the bottom of your feet with iodine, in order
to increase iodine absorption by your body. Others do not recommend it. You really have
no certainty as to what substances and quantities you are taking into your body.
• Another source of iodine is Lugol's solution. This, of course, should be taken in
extremely small doses. Unfortunately, it is difficult to obtain. Pharmacies have it, but will
not dispense it without a prescription.
• Of course, there is also iodized salt. The problem here is that aluminum is in store-
bought salt (so it will not cake), and that can lead to Alzheimer's disease (which see).
• Some turn to "sea salt," but generally this is nothing more than regular salt, extracted
from the ocean rather than from salt mines. It is just regular salt!
• Some use rock salt (from salt mines), and grind it up. But this lacks the iodine.
• There is a firm in France which produces salt from the ocean which does have all the
natural trace minerals, including iodine: The U.S. address is Grain & Salt Society, P.O.
Box DD, Magalia, CA 95954 / 916-872-5800. Of the three products (Light Grey, Fine
Ground, and Flower of the Ocean), the Fine Ground seems to strike a balance between
fine grain and low price. The salt is slightly moist, but this is natural. Dry, free-flowing,
salt has always been treated with chemicals.
• I recommend that you use both Nova Scotia dulse and this French sea salt at every meal.
• For some, thyroid problems can be corrected, but for others it is something to live with,
for a lifetime, while doing that which may lessen the problem. In addition to taking added
iodine, eat a nutritious diet. The experts say to only eat in moderation the cabbage family
(broccoli, cabbage, kale, Brussels sprouts, mustard greens), for they tend to suppress the
thyroid function. The same is said to hold true for peaches and pears.
• Chlorine, fluoride, and iodine are chemically related, and block entrance of iodine into
the thyroid. So avoid chlorinated water, fluoridated water, and toothpaste.
• A thyroid deficiency can result from lack of sunshine and free fats (margarine, butter,
mayonnaise, fried foods, cooking fats, salad oils, and peanut butter).
• Functions of the thyroid will be increased by more exercise, for it stimulates TSH
production by the pituitary. T3 increases slowly in the blood during, and after, vigorous
exercise.
• Mother's milk is a good treatment for hypothyroid babies, and it helps protect normal
babies from developing the problem until weaning.
• Vitamin A is necessary for iodine to be properly absorbed; the B vitamins work together,
to nourish the thyroid; B helps the thyroid use its iodine effectively in hormone
6
production; B helps the thyroid work properly.
12
• To stimulate the thyroid: Eat one serving each of oats and bananas daily, take a cool
shower each morning and night, and work 3-5 hours out-of-doors every day.
• Avoid electric blankets if you can.
• Use a salt-free, oil-free, sugar-free diet until the thyroid is under control. But, on the long
term, you need a little salt and oil.
• In cretins, who are born hypothyroid, try taking them off the thyroid medication after
three years of supplementation. Maybe their thyroid will start functioning on its own.
• A nature healer in Central America recommends the following procedures:
• To go off thyroid supplementation: Go on a fasting, cleansing program of fruit and
vegetable juices, followed by a building program of eating simple nourishing foods
(especially raw food). Do this for 2-4 weeks. Get back and neck spinal adjustments, and
take one kelp tablet daily. He says this always works.
GOITER—He also recommends this:
To eliminate goiter (an enlarged thyroid gland): Follow the above program; and then, after the 2-4
weeks, do one or more of the following four neck applications: (1) Put an Epsom salt compress on the
neck every night, and leave it on all night for 10 nights. (2) Use a compress of white oak bark tea over
the goiter for better results. (3) Put two hot fomentations around the neck, for 4 minutes each and one
cold compress for 4 minutes. Continue alternating this for an hour. Then spend 5-10 minutes doing
exercises with the neck in various positions. (4) Put a poultice of ground-up almonds completely around
the neck and leave it on all night, for 3-10 nights. This is especially good for harder, more fibrous,
goiters.
Nitrates are goitrogenic; that is, they stimulate goiter formation. Nitrates can be found in hot dogs,
sausages, luncheon meats, and variously prepared meat products. Nitrates are also found in well water,
from fertilizer runoff.
Interestingly enough, many people with Parkinson's disease (which see) tend to have hypothyroidism.
(Underactive Thyroid; Goiter)
SYMPTOMS—Fatigue and inability to tolerate cold are the most common symptoms.
Others include: loss of appetite, a slow heart rate, muscle weakness and possible cramps, dry and scaly
skin, recurrent infections, water retention (edema) and overweight, brittle nails, constipation, depression,
difficulty in concentrating, a yellow-orange coloration of the skin (especially on the palms of the hands).
In women, there might be painful menstruation, a milky breast discharge, and fertility problems.
CAUSES—The thyroid gland is the body's thermostat. It tells the rest of the body when to produce more
heat or less. Thyroxine is secreted by the thyroid (a butterfly-shaped gland in the front of your neck),
and affects several body functions, including the general rate of metabolism. The pituitary, located in the
center of the skull, sends out TSH (thyroid-stimulating hormone), to tell the thyroid to speed up or slow
down. When a weak thyroid does not respond, TSH levels remain high—and you have hypothyroidism.
The hormone, thyroxine, is almost pure iodine.
First thing in the morning, place a thermometer under your arm for 15 minutes while keeping still. A
temperature of 97.6o F. or lower may indicate an underactive thyroid. Write down the result for five
days. (Others say that if the test is consistently below 98, you are low thyroid.)
A low thyroid condition generally does not produce goiter (which see). If you had goiter, your thyroid
gland would enlarge.
It is thought that Hashimoto's disease is the most common cause of an underactive thyroid. This occurs
when the body becomes allergic to its own thyroxine! It is not clear why this happens.
In addition, the immune system can produce antibodies that invade and attack the thyroid, disrupting
hormone production. This destruction of the thyroid, resulting in hypothyroidism, is called myxedema. It
is actually a disease of the immune system. It is believed that an excess of chemicals, poisonous fumes,
medicinal drugs, tobacco smoke, impure living, etc., disrupts the immune system and starts it on such
rampages.
Get away from the chemicals by moving to the country, live a clean life, eat right, use a distiller to make
your own water, work out-of-doors part of the time, have peace with God, and you will feel better every
day.
Medical treatment includes the taking of thyroxine from animals, or synthroid. This is generally 3-9
grains each morning. An excess will cause increase in heart rate and shaking of the extended arm.
The active ingredient in synthroid and other synthetic thyroid medications, is levothyroxine. It can cause
a loss of as much as 13 percent of bone mass. An estimated 19 million people in the U.S. take this drug
for thyroid problems or thyroid cancer.
Thyroid supplementation can cause cardiac arrest in those whose hearts are not strong enough for the
increased activity the thyroid dosage places upon it.
Thyroid medication can have a similar effect on the adrenals. They may be working poorly, as a result of
years of low thyroxine. The medication can cause adrenal insufficiency. Diabetes can be made worse by
the thyroid pill. Anticoagulants can be upset.
In newborn infants, synostosis can occur if they are given thyroid. The skull bones close prematurely
and the brain does not develop properly.
Thyroid supplementation also increases the need for insulin and, in some, for antidepressants as they
become extremely agitated.
Thyroid medication can produce arrhythmia, angina, and tachycardia, or hair loss.
After menopause, a smaller dose of thyroid medication is often needed by women.
The human body needs less thyroid as it gets older, so older folk should try reducing their dose of
synthroid. To do this, try reducing the amount you take by one dose a week (example: 5 doses a week,
then 4 doses the next week, etc.). When you encounter problems, stay with that amount for 4 weeks to
see if the thyroid will adjust itself to this new amount. After a month, try reducing the dosage again, but
staying one month at each reduced level.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Unahitaji iodini kila siku, katika kila mlo. Lakini unapataje? Matumizi marefu ya
Dawa ya tezi inaweza kudhoofisha mifupa au kusababisha saratani ya matiti.
• Kati ya mwani, Nova Scotia Dulse au Kelp ya Norway ndio bora zaidi
Vyanzo vya madini ya kuwafuata. Bidhaa zingine nyingi za mwani pia zina iodini, lakini ziko
Sio kila wakati kama usawa katika kutoa wigo mpana wa madini mengine ya kuwaeleza. California
Kelp sio nzuri.
• Hapa kuna anwani ya Nova Scotia Dulse: Harry Greene, Mkuu wa Kaskazini, Grand Manan, N.
B. [New Brunswick], Canada. Sanduku langu la mwisho lilikuwa $ 12 kwa ounces 12. Niliiacha ikauke, basi
Whiz majani, uweke kwenye mitungi, na kuinyunyiza kwenye chakula changu.
• Wataalam wengine wa asili wanapendekeza kufunika chini ya miguu yako na iodini, ili
Kuongeza kunyonya kwa iodini na mwili wako. Wengine hawapendekezi. Una kweli
Hakuna hakika juu ya vitu na idadi gani unayochukua ndani ya mwili wako.
• Chanzo kingine cha iodini ni suluhisho la Lugol. Hii, kwa kweli, inapaswa kuchukuliwa
Dozi ndogo sana. Kwa bahati mbaya, ni ngumu kupata. Maduka ya dawa yanayo, lakini mapenzi
sio kuisambaza bila dawa.
• Kwa kweli, pia kuna chumvi iliyokatwa. Shida hapa ni kwamba alumini iko kwenye duka-
Kununuliwa chumvi (kwa hivyo haitafanya keki), na hiyo inaweza kusababisha ugonjwa wa Alzheimer's (ambayo huona).
• Wengine hubadilika kuwa "chumvi ya bahari," lakini kwa ujumla hii sio kitu zaidi ya chumvi ya kawaida, iliyotolewa
kutoka bahari badala ya kutoka migodi ya chumvi. Ni chumvi ya kawaida tu!
• Wengine hutumia chumvi ya mwamba (kutoka kwa migodi ya chumvi), na kuisaga. Lakini hii inakosa iodini.
• Kuna kampuni huko Ufaransa ambayo hutoa chumvi kutoka baharini ambayo ina yote
Madini ya Asili ya Kufuatilia, pamoja na iodini: Anwani ya U.S. ni Nafaka na Salt Society, P.O.
Box DD, Magalia, CA 95954 / 916-872-5800. Kati ya bidhaa tatu (kijivu nyepesi, faini
Ardhi, na maua ya bahari), ardhi nzuri inaonekana kugonga usawa kati ya
Nafaka nzuri na bei ya chini. Chumvi ni unyevu kidogo, lakini hii ni ya asili. Kavu, inapita bure,
Chumvi imekuwa ikitibiwa kila wakati na kemikali.
• Ninapendekeza utumie Dulse ya Nova Scotia na chumvi hii ya bahari ya Ufaransa katika kila mlo.
• Kwa wengine, shida za tezi zinaweza kusahihishwa, lakini kwa wengine ni jambo la kuishi na,
kwa maisha yote, wakati wa kufanya kile ambacho kinaweza kupunguza shida. Mbali na kuchukua
Iodini, kula lishe yenye lishe. Wataalam wanasema kula tu kwa wastani familia ya kabichi
(broccoli, kabichi, kale, mimea ya brussels, mboga za haradali), kwa kuwa huwa wanakandamiza
kazi ya tezi. Vile vile inasemekana kushikilia kweli kwa pears na pears.
• Chlorine, fluoride, na iodini zinahusiana na kemikali, na kuzuia kuingia kwa iodini ndani
tezi. Kwa hivyo epuka maji ya klorini, maji ya fluoridated, na dawa ya meno.
• Upungufu wa tezi unaweza kusababisha ukosefu wa jua na mafuta ya bure (majarini, siagi,
Mayonnaise, vyakula vya kukaanga, mafuta ya kupikia, mafuta ya saladi, na siagi ya karanga).
• Kazi za tezi zitaongezeka kwa mazoezi zaidi, kwa maana inachochea TSH
uzalishaji na pituitary. T3 huongezeka polepole katika damu wakati, na baada, nguvu
Zoezi.
• Maziwa ya mama ni matibabu mazuri kwa watoto wa hypothyroid, na inasaidia kulinda kawaida
Watoto kutokana na kukuza shida hadi kuachishwa.
• Vitamini A ni muhimu kwa iodini kufyonzwa vizuri; Vitamini vya B hufanya kazi pamoja,
kulisha tezi; B husaidia tezi kutumia iodini yake vizuri katika homoni
6
uzalishaji; B husaidia tezi ya tezi kufanya kazi vizuri.
12
• Kuchochea tezi: kula moja ukitumikia kila shayiri na ndizi kila siku, chukua baridi
Oga kila asubuhi na usiku, na fanya masaa 3-5 nje ya milango kila siku.
• Epuka blanketi za umeme ikiwa unaweza.
• Tumia lishe isiyo na chumvi, isiyo na mafuta, isiyo na sukari hadi tezi itakapodhibitiwa. Lakini, kwa muda mrefu
Muda, unahitaji chumvi kidogo na mafuta.
• Katika cretins, ambao huzaliwa hypothyroid, jaribu kuwaondoa dawa ya tezi baada ya
Miaka mitatu ya kuongeza. Labda tezi yao itaanza kufanya kazi peke yake.
• Mponyaji wa asili katika Amerika ya Kati anapendekeza taratibu zifuatazo:
• Kuenda mbali na nyongeza ya tezi: Nenda kwenye mpango wa kufunga, wa utakaso wa matunda na
Juisi za mboga, ikifuatiwa na mpango wa ujenzi wa kula vyakula rahisi vya lishe
(haswa chakula mbichi). Fanya hivi kwa wiki 2-4. Rudisha marekebisho ya mgongo na shingo, na
Chukua kibao kimoja cha Kelp kila siku. Anasema hii inafanya kazi kila wakati.
Goiter -Anapendekeza hii pia:
Kuondoa goiter (tezi ya tezi iliyokuzwa): fuata mpango hapo juu; Na kisha, baada ya 2-4
wiki, fanya moja au zaidi ya programu zifuatazo za shingo nne: (1) Weka compress ya chumvi ya Epsom kwenye
shingo kila usiku, na uiache usiku kucha kwa usiku 10. (2) Tumia compress ya chai nyeupe ya mwaloni wa mwaloni
Goiter ya matokeo bora. (3) Weka fomentations mbili moto karibu na shingo, kwa dakika 4 kila moja na moja
Compress baridi kwa dakika 4. Endelea kubadilisha hii kwa saa. Kisha tumia dakika 5 hadi 10 kufanya
Mazoezi na shingo katika nafasi mbali mbali. (4) Weka poultice ya mlozi wa chini kabisa
shingo na kuiacha usiku kucha, kwa usiku 3-10. Hii ni nzuri sana kwa ngumu zaidi, yenye nyuzi zaidi,
goiters.
Nitrati ni goitrogenic; Hiyo ni, wao huchochea malezi ya goiter. Nitrati zinaweza kupatikana katika mbwa moto,
Sausage, nyama ya chakula cha mchana, na bidhaa za nyama zilizoandaliwa tofauti. Nitrati pia hupatikana katika maji vizuri,
Kutoka kwa kukimbia kwa mbolea.
Inafurahisha vya kutosha, watu wengi walio na ugonjwa wa Parkinson (ambao huona) huwa na hypothyroidism.
(Tezi isiyofanya kazi; goiter)
Dalili -uchungu na kutokuwa na uwezo wa kuvumilia baridi ni dalili za kawaida.
Wengine ni pamoja na: Kupoteza hamu ya kula, kiwango cha moyo polepole, udhaifu wa misuli na tumbo linalowezekana, kavu na scaly
Ngozi, maambukizo ya kawaida, uhifadhi wa maji (edema) na uzito kupita kiasi, misumari ya brittle, kuvimbiwa, unyogovu,
Ugumu wa kuzingatia, rangi ya machungwa-machungwa ya ngozi (haswa kwenye mikono ya mikono).
Katika wanawake, kunaweza kuwa na hedhi chungu, kutokwa kwa matiti ya milky, na shida za uzazi.
Sababu - tezi ya tezi ni thermostat ya mwili. Inaambia mwili wote wakati wa kutoa zaidi
joto au chini. Thyroxine imetengwa na tezi (tezi iliyo na kipepeo mbele ya shingo yako),
na huathiri kazi kadhaa za mwili, pamoja na kiwango cha jumla cha kimetaboliki. Pituitary, iko katika
kituo cha fuvu, hutuma TSH (homoni ya kuchochea tezi), kumwambia tezi ya tezi ili kuharakisha au polepole
chini. Wakati tezi dhaifu haijibu, viwango vya TSH vinabaki juu -na una hypothyroidism.
Homoni, thyroxine, ni karibu iodini safi.
Jambo la kwanza asubuhi, weka thermometer chini ya mkono wako kwa dakika 15 wakati ukiwa kimya. A
Joto la 97.6o F. au chini linaweza kuonyesha tezi isiyofanya kazi. Andika matokeo kwa tano
siku. (Wengine wanasema kwamba ikiwa mtihani uko chini ya 98, wewe ni tezi ya chini.)
Hali ya chini ya tezi kwa ujumla haitoi goiter (ambayo huona). Ikiwa ulikuwa na goiter, tezi yako
Gland ingeongeza.
Inafikiriwa kuwa ugonjwa wa Hashimoto ndio sababu ya kawaida ya tezi isiyofanya kazi. Hii inatokea
Wakati mwili unakuwa mzio kwa thyroxine yake mwenyewe! Haijulikani kwa nini hii hufanyika.
Kwa kuongezea, mfumo wa kinga unaweza kutoa antibodies ambazo huvamia na kushambulia tezi, na kuvuruga
Uzalishaji wa homoni. Uharibifu huu wa tezi, na kusababisha hypothyroidism, unaitwa myxedema. IT
ni kweli ugonjwa wa mfumo wa kinga. Inaaminika kuwa ziada ya kemikali, mafusho yenye sumu,
Dawa za dawa, moshi wa tumbaku, kuishi vibaya, nk, huvuruga mfumo wa kinga na kuianzisha juu ya vile
rampages.
Ondoka na kemikali kwa kuhamia nchi, kuishi maisha safi, kula sawa, tumia distiller kutengeneza
Maji yako mwenyewe, fanya kazi nje ya milango ya wakati huo, uwe na amani na Mungu, na utahisi vizuri kila
siku.
Matibabu ni pamoja na kuchukua ya thyroxine kutoka kwa wanyama, au synthroid. Hii kwa ujumla ni 3-9
nafaka kila asubuhi. Ziada itasababisha kuongezeka kwa kiwango cha moyo na kutetemeka kwa mkono uliopanuliwa.
Kiunga kinachotumika katika dawa za tezi na dawa zingine za synthetic, ni levothyroxine. Inaweza kusababisha
upotezaji wa asilimia 13 ya misa ya mfupa. Inakadiriwa watu milioni 19 huko Merika huchukua dawa hii
kwa shida za tezi au saratani ya tezi.
Kuongezewa kwa tezi kunaweza kusababisha kukamatwa kwa moyo kwa wale ambao mioyo yao haina nguvu ya kutosha kwa
Kuongeza shughuli kipimo cha tezi huweka juu yake.
Dawa ya tezi inaweza kuwa na athari sawa kwa adrenals. Wanaweza kuwa wanafanya kazi vibaya, kama matokeo ya
Miaka ya thyroxine ya chini. Dawa inaweza kusababisha ukosefu wa adrenal. Ugonjwa wa kisukari unaweza kufanywa kuwa mbaya zaidi
kidonge cha tezi. Anticoagulants inaweza kukasirika.
Katika watoto wachanga wachanga, synostosis inaweza kutokea ikiwa wamepewa tezi. Mifupa ya fuvu hufunga mapema
Na ubongo haukua vizuri.
Nyongeza ya tezi pia huongeza hitaji la insulini na, kwa wengine, kwa dawa za kukandamiza kama wao
kuwa na hasira sana.
Dawa ya tezi inaweza kutoa arrhythmia, angina, na tachycardia, au upotezaji wa nywele.
Baada ya kukomesha, kipimo kidogo cha dawa ya tezi mara nyingi inahitajika na wanawake.
Mwili wa mwanadamu unahitaji chini ya tezi kadri inavyozeeka, kwa hivyo watu wakubwa wanapaswa kujaribu kupunguza kipimo chao
Synthroid. Ili kufanya hivyo, jaribu kupunguza kiasi unachochukua kwa kipimo kimoja kwa wiki (mfano: kipimo 5 kwa wiki,
Kisha kipimo 4 wiki ijayo, nk). Unapokutana na shida, kaa na kiasi hicho kwa wiki 4 hadi
Angalia ikiwa tezi itajirekebisha kwa kiasi hiki kipya. Baada ya mwezi, jaribu kupunguza kipimo tena, lakini
Kukaa mwezi mmoja katika kila kiwango kilichopunguzwa.

title: Hyperthyroidism
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The eating of kelp helps every type of thyroid problem, including hyperthyroidism. Kelp
is a rich source of iodine and thyroxine. The hormone produced by the thyroid is almost
pure iodine.
• Genuine sea salt is another worthwhile source of iodine (see Hypothyroidism).
• Deficiencies of vitamins C and E can result in overproduction of the thyroid hormone.
• Eat lots of the cabbage family of foods (broccoli, cabbage, kale, Brussels sprouts,
mustard greens), for they tend to suppress the thyroid function. The same is said to hold
true for peaches and pears.
• Cut down on dairy products and avoid nicotine, alcohol, caffeine, soft drinks, and
processed and junk food.
• The pituitary, parathyroids, and sexual functions work closely together, and they are
affected by the thyroid. Problems in one area can affect them all.
• Radioactive sodium iodine (iodine 131, also called I-131) may be recommended, but
know that it can cause severe side effects.
• Do not be quick to try surgery on your thyroid. You have enough problems without
doing that.
—For much more, see "Hypothyroidism."
(Overactive Thyroid)
SYMPTOMS—Fatigue; insomnia; intolerance; irritability; increased perspiration; constantly feeling
hot; frequent bowel movements; hair and weight loss; nails separate from nail bed; change in skin
thickness; hand tremors; intolerance of heat; rapid heartbeat; goiter; and, sometimes, protruding
eyeballs. In women, there may also be less frequent menstruation and decreased flow.
CAUSES—Hypothyroidism is caused by an underactive thyroid, and results in a slow metabolism and
all it brings with it. Hyperthyroidism is the opposite: The thyroid is overactive; metabolism is too fast,
and that brings its own problems. The thyroid gland is producing too much thyroxine.
Sometimes called thyrotoxicosis, hyperthyroidism is not a simple problem to deal with. Graves' disease
is the most common form of it, which 2.5 million Americans have.
A detailed discussion of the thyroid is found in our article on Hypothyroidism (which see), which is far
more common. Both affect women more often than men. When the thyroid does not work properly, a
variety of different physical problems can develop.
In fact, the word, "hypochondriac," was coined many years ago, to describe these strange people who
have all kinds of things wrong with them, when they do not seem to have anything wrong with them.
Surely, it must all be in their heads! Well, it was in their throats. We now know those people had under
or overactive thyroids.
Infection of the thyroid or certain prescription drugs can temporarily produce hyperthyroidism.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kula kwa kelp husaidia kila aina ya shida ya tezi, pamoja na hyperthyroidism. Kelp
ni chanzo tajiri cha iodini na thyroxine. Homoni inayozalishwa na tezi ni karibu
Iodini safi.
• Chumvi halisi ya bahari ni chanzo kingine cha maana cha iodini (angalia hypothyroidism).
Upungufu wa vitamini C na E unaweza kusababisha uzalishaji wa homoni ya tezi.
• Kula familia nyingi za kabichi za vyakula (broccoli, kabichi, kale, mimea ya Brussels,
Greens ya haradali), kwa kuwa huwa hukandamiza kazi ya tezi. Vivyo hivyo inasemekana kushikilia
kweli kwa pears na pears.
• Kata bidhaa za maziwa na epuka nikotini, pombe, kafeini, vinywaji laini, na
Chakula cha kusindika na cha taka.
• Pituitary, parathyroids, na kazi za ngono hufanya kazi kwa karibu, na ziko
kuathiriwa na tezi. Shida katika eneo moja zinaweza kuwaathiri wote.
• Iodini ya sodiamu ya mionzi (iodini 131, pia inaitwa I-131) inaweza kupendekezwa, lakini
Jua kuwa inaweza kusababisha athari mbaya.
• Usiwe haraka kujaribu upasuaji kwenye tezi yako. Una shida za kutosha bila
kufanya hivyo.
- Kwa mengi zaidi, angalia "Hypothyroidism."
(Tezi inayozidi)
Dalili -Uchovu; kukosa usingizi; uvumilivu; kuwashwa; kuongezeka kwa jasho; Kuhisi kila wakati
moto; harakati za mara kwa mara za matumbo; nywele na kupoteza uzito; Misumari iliyotengwa na kitanda cha msumari; mabadiliko katika ngozi
unene; kutetemeka kwa mkono; uvumilivu wa joto; mapigo ya moyo wa haraka; goiter; na, wakati mwingine, inajitokeza
macho. Katika wanawake, kunaweza pia kuwa na hedhi mara kwa mara na mtiririko uliopungua.
Sababu -hypothyroidism husababishwa na tezi isiyo na kazi, na husababisha kimetaboliki polepole na
Yote huleta nayo. Hyperthyroidism ni kinyume: tezi ya tezi ni nyingi; kimetaboliki ni haraka sana,
Na hiyo inaleta shida zake. Tezi ya tezi inazalisha thyroxine nyingi.
Wakati mwingine huitwa thyrotoxicosis, hyperthyroidism sio shida rahisi kushughulikia. Ugonjwa wa Graves
ni aina ya kawaida yake, ambayo Wamarekani milioni 2.5 wanayo.
Majadiliano ya kina ya tezi hupatikana katika nakala yetu juu ya hypothyroidism (ambayo tazama), ambayo ni mbali
kawaida zaidi. Wote huathiri wanawake mara nyingi kuliko wanaume. Wakati tezi haifanyi kazi vizuri, a
Aina tofauti za shida za mwili zinaweza kukuza.
Kwa kweli, neno, "hypochondriac," liliundwa miaka mingi iliyopita, kuelezea watu hawa wa ajabu ambao
Kuwa na kila aina ya vitu vibaya kwao, wakati hazionekani kuwa na kitu chochote kibaya kwao.
Hakika, lazima yote iwe katika vichwa vyao! Kweli, ilikuwa kwenye koo zao. Sasa tunajua watu hao walikuwa chini
au tezi inayozidi.
Kuambukizwa kwa tezi au dawa fulani za kuagiza kunaweza kutoa hyperthyroidism kwa muda.

title: Swollen Glands
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The specific infection needs to be overcome through fasting, bed rest, careful diet,
keeping the bowels open, and not consuming improper foods or drink.
• Vitamins A, B complex, and C are important.
—See "Fevers." Also see other topics in this section on the Lymphatics.
SYMPTOMS—This generally refers to the swelling of lymph nodes (commonly referred to as
"glands") on the sides of the neck, by the throat.
But it can also refer to enlargement of any other lymph glands, such as are under the armpits or in the
groin.
There may also be heat, tenderness, and reddening of the overlying skin, as well as fever.
CAUSES—The lymph system filters out infections of various types, in order to rid them from the
system. But an infection in the lymph nodes can occur. This can be a localized infection or an infection
symptomatic of a more serious condition, such as measles, chicken pox, mononucleosis, tuberculosis,
syphilis, leukemia, or cancer.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Maambukizi maalum yanahitaji kuondokana kupitia kufunga, kupumzika kitanda, lishe makini,
Kuweka matumbo wazi, na sio kula vyakula visivyofaa au kinywaji.
• Vitamini A, B tata, na C ni muhimu.
-Tazama "fevers." Pia angalia mada zingine katika sehemu hii kwenye limfu.
Dalili -hii kwa ujumla inahusu uvimbe wa nodi za lymph (kawaida hujulikana kama
"tezi") kwenye pande za shingo, na koo.
Lakini pia inaweza kurejelea upanuzi wa tezi zingine zozote za lymph, kama vile ziko chini ya mikondo au kwenye
Groin.
Kunaweza pia kuwa na joto, huruma, na kupunguka kwa ngozi inayozidi, na homa.
Sababu -Mfumo wa lymph huchuja maambukizo ya aina tofauti, ili kuwaondoa kutoka kwa
mfumo. Lakini maambukizi katika node za lymph yanaweza kutokea. Hii inaweza kuwa maambukizo ya ndani au maambukizi
Dalili ya hali mbaya zaidi, kama vile surua, pox ya kuku, mononucleosis, kifua kikuu,
Syphilis, leukemia, au saratani.

title: Lymphangitis
contentEn:
(Spleenic Inflammation)
SYMPTOMS—Begins with a chill and high fever, with moderate swelling and pain of the lymphatic
tissues. A severe pain develops in the left side, and extends up to the shoulder. When the infection is in
the deep layers of skin, there is a deep general flush with raised borders in the affected areas. The skin
becomes hot and dry, and the person becomes very thirsty.
CAUSE AND TREATMENT—This is a streptococcus infection of one or more lymphatic glands,
usually of the spleen. Applications of heat should be made, in the form of baths or hot fomentations.
Give plenty of fluids, to help flush out the lymphatics.
Rest and a light diet are important. Give a fruit diet for a few days. Give the kind of care for one with a
fever. Keep the bowels open, using laxative herbs. Do not strain at the stool, for this could injure a
temporarily enlarged spleen.
Apply hot fomentations, followed by short cold. This will greatly help to reduce pain and inflammation.
Do this 2-3 times a day until the pain is relieved, then once a day.
—See "Fevers."
contentSw:
(Kuvimba kwa Spleenic)
Dalili -zinaumwa na baridi na homa kubwa, na uvimbe wa wastani na maumivu ya limfu
tishu. Ma maumivu makali hukua katika upande wa kushoto, na huenea hadi begani. Wakati maambukizi yameingia
Tabaka za kina za ngozi, kuna kirefu cha jumla na mipaka iliyoinuliwa katika maeneo yaliyoathirika. Ngozi
Inakuwa moto na kavu, na mtu huwa na kiu sana.
Sababu na matibabu -hii ni maambukizi ya streptococcus ya tezi moja au zaidi ya limfu,
kawaida ya wengu. Maombi ya joto yanapaswa kufanywa, kwa njia ya bafu au fomentations moto.
Toa maji mengi, kusaidia kutoa nje ya limfu.
Kupumzika na lishe nyepesi ni muhimu. Toa lishe ya matunda kwa siku chache. Toa aina ya utunzaji kwa moja na
homa. Weka matumbo wazi, ukitumia mimea ya laxative. Usivute kinyesi, kwa maana hii inaweza kuumiza a
wengu uliokuzwa kwa muda.
Omba fomentations moto, ikifuatiwa na baridi fupi. Hii itasaidia sana kupunguza maumivu na kuvimba.
Fanya hii mara 2-3 kwa siku hadi maumivu yatakapoondolewa, kisha mara moja kwa siku.
-Tazama "fevers."

title: Hodgkin'S Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Contact your physician.
• Go on a vegetable juice fast for 2-3 days, then eat nourishing food, and fast again every
few days. It is vital that you clean out the system, so it can restore itself.
• Stop eating all refined, and junk, food. Stop smoking and drinking liquor. You must live
right if you are to recover.
• Steam baths, salt glows, and hot and cold water treatments will invigorate the body.
• Keep the bowels open. Do not strain at the stool, for this could injure a temporarily
enlarged spleen.
• Helpful herbs include echinacea, burdock, pau d'arco, and red clover. Other herbs
include white oak bark, plantain, vervain, and yarrow.
—For further information, see "Cancer."
(Hodgkin's Lymphoma)
SYMPTOMS—Fatigue, itching, fever, general sickish feeling, night sweats, weakness, weight loss,
enlargement of lymph nodes and spleen which is generally not painful.
CAUSES—Hodgkin's disease is cancer of the lymph glands, which includes the lymph nodes and the
spleen. It most frequently occurs in young adults. There are hundreds of lymph nodes in your body and,
together with their connecting network of tubes, are really immense in size and scope.
The lymphatic system helps protect the body against toxins of various types. Carried off through the
lymphatic vessels, those foreign substances are then temporarily stored in lymphatic organs (the spleen,
nodes, tonsils, and appendix). If these are removed, or become clogged because too much waste matter
is being channeled through them, then trouble occurs.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Wasiliana na daktari wako.
• Nenda kwenye juisi ya mboga haraka kwa siku 2-3, kisha kula chakula chenye lishe, na haraka tena kila moja
siku chache. Ni muhimu kwamba uondoe mfumo, kwa hivyo inaweza kujirekebisha.
• Acha kula yote yaliyosafishwa, na chakula, chakula. Acha kuvuta sigara na kunywa pombe. Lazima uishi
Haki ikiwa utapona.
• Bafu za mvuke, taa za chumvi, na matibabu ya maji moto na baridi yataongeza mwili.
• Weka matumbo wazi. Usishike kinyesi, kwa sababu hii inaweza kuumiza kwa muda
wengu iliyokuzwa.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na Echinacea, Burdock, Pau d'Arco, na Red Clover. Mimea mingine
Jumuisha gome nyeupe ya mwaloni, mmea, vervain, na yarrow.
- Kwa habari zaidi, angalia "Saratani."
(Hodgkin's lymphoma)
Dalili -uchungu, kuwasha, homa, hisia za jumla za mgonjwa, jasho la usiku, udhaifu, kupunguza uzito,
Upanuzi wa nodi za lymph na wengu ambayo kwa ujumla sio chungu.
Sababu -ugonjwa wa Hodgkin ni saratani ya tezi za lymph, ambayo inajumuisha nodi za lymph na
wengu. Mara nyingi hufanyika kwa watu wazima. Kuna mamia ya nodi za lymph kwenye mwili wako na,
Pamoja na mtandao wao wa kuunganisha wa zilizopo, ni kubwa kwa ukubwa na upeo.
Mfumo wa limfu husaidia kulinda mwili dhidi ya sumu ya aina anuwai. Kuchukuliwa kupitia
Vyombo vya lymphatic, vitu hivyo vya kigeni basi huhifadhiwa kwa muda katika viungo vya limfu (wengu,
node, tonsils, na kiambatisho). Ikiwa haya yameondolewa, au yamefungwa kwa sababu taka nyingi za taka
inaelekezwa kupitia kwao, kisha shida hufanyika.
