title: Mononucleosis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Go on a light fast of fruit and vegetable juices for a day or two.
• Eat a nourishing diet, emphasizing vegetable soups, potato peeling broth, and brown
rice. Eat small meals.
• Drink plenty of distilled water.
• Do not eat processed, or junk, food. Do not eat meat, sugar, fried foods, or drink soft
drinks.
• Stay in bed until the worst part is over. You need lots of rest.
• Do not strain at the stool, for this could injure a temporarily enlarged spleen.
• Be alert to signs that a more serious spleenic infection may be about to begin: a fever
over 102o F, severe pain in the middle of your left side that last 5 minutes or more,
breathing becomes difficult, or swallowing becomes difficult. If this happens, contact your
physician. See "Lymphangitis."
(Mono)
SYMPTOMS—Depression, fatigue, fever, generalized aching, sore throat, swollen glands, headache,
jaundice, with possible red rash in the form of raised bumps.
CAUSES—Mono is a contagious disease, primarily affecting the spleen and lymphatic system.
It can be transmitted by kissing, sexual contact, or sharing food or utensils. But it can also be spread
through the air, breathing contaminated air exhaled by another. So it is not necessarily the "kissing
disease" it is described to be.
Most frequently contracted by children and teenagers, the incubation period is 10 days among children
and 30-50 days among adults.
The symptoms are very similar to those of the flu, but those of mononucleosis continue for 2-4 weeks!
Even after the other symptoms are gone, a general fatigue can continue for 3-8 weeks more. Some
people continue to feel fatigued for months or years.
Individuals frequently say they felt sick but continued working, thinking they would shake it off—and
then came down with mono. So if you feel like going to bed and getting well, do it before something
worse happens to you.
The Epstein-Barr virus (EBV) or, more rarely, the cytomegalovirus (CMV), is the cause of this
infection. Therefore it cannot be treated with antibiotics. Both EBV and CMV remain in the body
throughout the rest of one's life; but the infection, carefully treated, generally seems to go away.
Therefore, rest and care for yourself, so the outward symptoms will successfully go away!
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Nenda kwenye taa nyepesi ya matunda na mboga kwa siku moja au mbili.
• Kula lishe yenye lishe, kusisitiza supu za mboga, mchuzi wa viazi, na kahawia
mpunga. Kula chakula kidogo.
• Kunywa maji mengi yaliyotiwa maji.
• Usila kusindika, au chakula, chakula. Usile nyama, sukari, vyakula vya kukaanga, au kunywa laini
vinywaji.
• Kaa kitandani hadi sehemu mbaya kabisa itakapomalizika. Unahitaji mapumziko mengi.
• Usishike kwenye kinyesi, kwa sababu hii inaweza kuumiza wengu iliyokuzwa kwa muda.
• Kuwa macho kwa ishara kwamba maambukizi mazito zaidi ya wengu yanaweza kuwa karibu kuanza: homa
Zaidi ya 102o f, maumivu makali katikati ya upande wako wa kushoto ambao hudumu dakika 5 au zaidi,
Kupumua inakuwa ngumu, au kumeza inakuwa ngumu. Ikiwa hii itatokea, wasiliana na yako
daktari. Tazama "Lymphangitis."
(Mono)
Dalili -Kukandamiza, uchovu, homa, kuuma kwa jumla, koo, tezi za kuvimba, maumivu ya kichwa,
Jaundice, na upele nyekundu katika mfumo wa matuta yaliyoinuliwa.
Sababu -MONO ni ugonjwa unaoambukiza, unaoathiri wengu na mfumo wa limfu.
Inaweza kupitishwa kwa kumbusu, mawasiliano ya ngono, au kushiriki chakula au vyombo. Lakini pia inaweza kuenea
Kupitia hewa, kupumua hewa iliyochafuliwa na nyingine. Kwa hivyo sio lazima "kumbusu
ugonjwa "Imeelezewa kuwa.
Mara nyingi huambukizwa na watoto na vijana, kipindi cha incubation ni siku 10 kati ya watoto
na siku 30-50 kati ya watu wazima.
Dalili ni sawa na zile za homa, lakini zile za mononucleosis zinaendelea kwa wiki 2-4!
Hata baada ya dalili zingine kumalizika, uchovu wa jumla unaweza kuendelea kwa wiki 3-8 zaidi. Baadhi
Watu wanaendelea kuhisi uchovu kwa miezi au miaka.
Watu mara nyingi wanasema walihisi wagonjwa lakini waliendelea kufanya kazi, wakidhani wataitikisa -na
Kisha akashuka na Mono. Kwa hivyo ikiwa unahisi kwenda kulala na kupona, fanya kabla ya kitu
Mbaya zaidi hufanyika kwako.
Virusi vya Epstein-Barr (EBV) au, mara chache zaidi, cytomegalovirus (CMV), ndio sababu ya hii
maambukizi. Kwa hivyo haiwezi kutibiwa na viuatilifu. Wote EBV na CMV hubaki kwenye mwili
Katika maisha yote ya mtu; Lakini maambukizi, yaliyotibiwa kwa uangalifu, kwa ujumla yanaonekana kwenda mbali.
Kwa hivyo, pumzika na ujitunze, kwa hivyo dalili za nje zitaenda mbali!

title: Menopause
contentEn:
(Climacteric, Change of Life)
SYMPTOMS—Hot flashes, insomnia, disturbances in calcium metabolism, irritability, mental
instability, dizziness, backaches, headaches, bladder problems, dryness and aging of the skin, shortness
of breath, and heart palpitations. Some have almost no symptoms at all.
CAUSES—Menopause is the cessation of ovarian function, the stopping of the menstrual cycle, and the
end of reproductive years. This is caused by glandular changes, and is a natural event in a woman's life;
this usually occurs between 42 and 55. The average age is about 50, and the transition is generally up to
5 years.
There tends to be a hormone starvation at that time, since menopause usually results from a decreased
production of the female sex hormones.
The lessened supply of estrogen increases the possibility of cardiovascular disease, vaginal atrophy, and
osteoporosis.
It is popular to take estrogen supplements, to prevent or postpone menopausal symptoms. But keep in
mind that there is an increased risk of cancer when this is done.
If estrogen (hormone replacement) therapy is begun, take vitamin E several hours earlier or later, not at
the same time.
In addition, generous amounts of vitamins B , C, folic acid, pantothenic acid, PABA, and B will make
6 12
the estrogen therapy more effective.
Oral estrogens should not be accompanied by progesterone because they increase the cancer induction
risk.
Keep in mind that synthetic, not natural, estrogens are given in hormone replacement therapy. These
tend to accumulate in the body, and also can cause metabolic changes in the liver. This can lead to high
blood pressure, fluid retention, and blood clots. But natural estrogens are available; one is equine
estrogen, and is extracted from the urine of pregnant mares. But it is very powerful, and may also cause
changes in the liver. Do not use it if you are obese, smoke, or have high blood pressure, high cholesterol,
or varicose veins.
The safest natural estrogens are estropipate (Ogen) and estradiol (Estrace, Emcyt, and Estraderm); these
are all metabolized more easily by your body. Be sure and use the smallest possible dose, and take it
only every other day.
It is coming to be recognized that it is often more important to replace the lessened progesterone than the
lessened estrogen. Natural progesterone creams (from the herb, wild yam) provide a simplified way to
do this. Many, many, have been helped by doing this!
When the menopause proceeds normally, the adrenals and liver increase their output of female hormones
and make up the difference from the lost ovarian function.
Proper diet, nutritional supplements, exercise, and adequate rest can minimize the effects of menopause.
TREATMENT—Vitamin E (up to 1,200 IU daily) is especially important at this time.
• Vitamin C, working with bioflavonoids, maintains capillary strength.
• The B complex vitamins, especially pantothenic acid and PABA, relieve nervous
irritability.
• It is very important that sufficient calcium be taken, to maintain a proper calcium-
phosphorous balance. Not doing so can also result in a broken hip later.
• An increase in protein and reduction in carbohydrates is recommended at this time.
• Maintain an adequate intake of vitamin D, iron, and magnesium.
• Eliminate all processed, refined, and junk foods. This includes white sugar and white-
flour products.
• Raw fruit and vegetable juices, brewer's yeast, lecithin, kelp, and cold-pressed vegetable
oils are needed. The diet should be at least 50% raw food.
• Avoid animal products and dairy products.
• Do not use alcohol, caffeine, spicy foods, sugar, and hot soups and drinks. They make
the emotional swings worse and the blood more acidic. This causes the bones to release
extra calcium, to balance blood pH and weaken the bones if extra calcium is not taken.
• Substitute garlic and onion powder for salt. Consuming salt increases urinary excretion
of calcium.
• Drink 2 quarts of water each day, to help prevent drying of skin and mucous membranes.
• After menopause begins, you will not have as much calcium in your body, due to the
lessened estrogen; it is important that you henceforth supplement with calcium. Of the
250,000 hip fractures that occur in the U.S. every year, 80% are due to osteoporosis.
• Avoid mental and emotional stress and worry. Be happy with the blessings you have,
and thank God for them.
• Get plenty of outdoor exercise and sufficient rest. Lay down and rest a little before lunch
and supper. A lack of exercise weakens bone density.
• Especially important are vitamins E, C, A, and B complex, including PABA and
pantothenic acid.
• Hypothyroidism is common during menopause, and is responsible for a number of the
symptoms. Be sure and take additional amounts of Nova Scotia dulse or Norwegian kelp.
• Helpful herbs include lady's mangle, motherwort, and St. John's wort.
—Also see "Menstrual Disorders" for related information.

(Hali ya hewa, mabadiliko ya maisha)
Dalili -HOT huangaza, kukosa usingizi, usumbufu katika kimetaboliki ya kalsiamu, kuwashwa, akili
kutokuwa na utulivu, kizunguzungu, maumivu ya kichwa, maumivu ya kichwa, shida za kibofu cha mkojo, kavu na kuzeeka kwa ngozi, ufupi
ya pumzi, na palpitations ya moyo. Wengine hawana dalili kabisa.
Sababu -Wanaume ni kukomesha kazi ya ovari, kusimamishwa kwa mzunguko wa hedhi, na
mwisho wa miaka ya uzazi. Hii inasababishwa na mabadiliko ya glandular, na ni tukio la asili katika maisha ya mwanamke;
Hii kawaida hufanyika kati ya 42 na 55. Umri wa wastani ni karibu 50, na mpito kwa ujumla ni hadi
Miaka 5.
Kuna huwa na njaa ya homoni wakati huo, kwani kumalizika kwa kumalizika kawaida hutokana na kupungua
Uzalishaji wa homoni za ngono za kike.
Usambazaji mdogo wa estrogeni huongeza uwezekano wa ugonjwa wa moyo na mishipa, atrophy ya uke, na
Osteoporosis.
Ni maarufu kuchukua virutubisho vya estrogeni, kuzuia au kuahirisha dalili za menopausal. Lakini endelea
Akili kwamba kuna hatari kubwa ya saratani wakati hii inafanywa.
Ikiwa tiba ya estrogeni (uingizwaji wa homoni) imeanza, chukua vitamini E masaa kadhaa mapema au baadaye, sio kwa
wakati huo huo.
Kwa kuongezea, kiasi cha vitamini B, C, asidi ya folic, asidi ya pantothenic, PABA, na B itafanya
6 12
Tiba ya estrojeni yenye ufanisi zaidi.
Estrojeni za mdomo hazipaswi kuambatana na progesterone kwa sababu zinaongeza induction ya saratani
hatari.
Kumbuka kwamba syntetisk, sio asili, estrojeni hupewa katika tiba ya uingizwaji wa homoni. Hizi
huwa na kujilimbikiza katika mwili, na pia inaweza kusababisha mabadiliko ya kimetaboliki kwenye ini. Hii inaweza kusababisha juu
shinikizo la damu, uhifadhi wa maji, na damu. Lakini estrojeni za asili zinapatikana; Moja ni sawa
estrogeni, na hutolewa kutoka mkojo wa bidhaa za wajawazito. Lakini ni nguvu sana, na inaweza pia kusababisha
Mabadiliko kwenye ini. Usitumie ikiwa wewe ni feta, moshi, au una shinikizo la damu, cholesterol ya juu,
au mishipa ya varicose.
Estrojeni salama kabisa ni estropipate (Ogen) na estradiol (estrace, emcyt, na estraderm); hizi
zote zimetengenezwa kwa urahisi na mwili wako. Hakikisha na utumie kipimo kidogo kinachowezekana, na uchukue
Kila siku nyingine tu.
Inakuja kutambuliwa kuwa mara nyingi ni muhimu zaidi kuchukua nafasi ya progesterone iliyopunguzwa kuliko
estrogeni iliyopunguzwa. Mafuta ya asili ya progesterone (kutoka mimea, yam mwitu) hutoa njia rahisi ya kwenda
Fanya hivi. Wengi, wengi, wamesaidiwa kwa kufanya hivi!
Wakati wanakuwa wamemaliza kuzaa kawaida, adrenals na ini huongeza pato lao la homoni za kike
na fanya tofauti kutoka kwa kazi ya ovari iliyopotea.
Lishe sahihi, virutubisho vya lishe, mazoezi, na kupumzika kwa kutosha kunaweza kupunguza athari za kukomesha.
Matibabu -vitamin E (hadi 1,200 IU kila siku) ni muhimu sana kwa wakati huu.
• Vitamini C, kufanya kazi na bioflavonoids, ina nguvu ya capillary.
• Vitamini tata vya B, haswa asidi ya pantothenic na PABA, hupunguza neva
kuwashwa.
• Ni muhimu sana kwamba kalsiamu ya kutosha ichukuliwe, kudumisha kalsiamu sahihi-
usawa wa fosforasi. Kutofanya hivyo pia kunaweza kusababisha kiboko kilichovunjika baadaye.
• Kuongezeka kwa protini na kupunguzwa kwa wanga hupendekezwa kwa wakati huu.
• Kudumisha ulaji wa kutosha wa vitamini D, chuma, na magnesiamu.
• Ondoa vyakula vyote vya kusindika, vilivyosafishwa, na visivyo. Hii ni pamoja na sukari nyeupe na nyeupe-
bidhaa za unga.
• Matunda mabichi na juisi za mboga, chachu ya Brewer, lecithin, kelp, na mboga iliyoshinikizwa baridi
Mafuta yanahitajika. Lishe inapaswa kuwa angalau 50% chakula mbichi.
• Epuka bidhaa za wanyama na bidhaa za maziwa.
• Usitumie pombe, kafeini, vyakula vyenye viungo, sukari, na supu za moto na vinywaji. Wanafanya
Swings za kihemko ni mbaya zaidi na damu yenye asidi zaidi. Hii husababisha mifupa kutolewa
Kalsiamu ya ziada, kusawazisha pH ya damu na kudhoofisha mifupa ikiwa kalsiamu ya ziada haijachukuliwa.
• Badilisha vitunguu na poda ya vitunguu kwa chumvi. Kutumia chumvi huongeza excretion ya mkojo
ya kalsiamu.
• Kunywa maji 2 ya kila siku, kusaidia kuzuia kukausha kwa ngozi na utando wa mucous.
• Baada ya kumalizika kwa hedhi, hautakuwa na kalsiamu nyingi katika mwili wako, kwa sababu ya
estrogeni iliyopunguzwa; Ni muhimu kwamba hadi sasa kuongeza na kalsiamu. Ya
Fractures 250,000 za hip zinazotokea Amerika kila mwaka, 80% ni kwa sababu ya ugonjwa wa mifupa.
• Epuka mkazo wa kiakili na kihemko na wasiwasi. Furahiya na baraka ulizo nazo,
Na asante Mungu kwa ajili yao.
• Pata mazoezi mengi ya nje na kupumzika kwa kutosha. Weka chini na pumzika kidogo kabla ya chakula cha mchana
na chakula cha jioni. Ukosefu wa mazoezi hupunguza wiani wa mfupa.
• Muhimu zaidi ni vitamini E, C, A, na B tata, pamoja na PABA na
asidi ya pantothenic.
• Hypothyroidism ni ya kawaida wakati wa kumalizika, na inawajibika kwa idadi ya
Dalili. Hakikisha na uchukue kiasi cha ziada cha Nova Scotia Dulse au Kelp ya Norway.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na Mangle ya Lady, Mama, na Wort ya St John.
-Unaona "shida za hedhi" kwa habari inayohusiana.

title: Pelvic Inflammatory Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Go on a fruit and vegetable juice fast for a time.
• When solid food is started, eat nourishing food, free of sugar and oil. Avoid junk food.
Do not use tobacco, caffeine, or alcohol.
• For pain relief, apply heat to the lower back or abdomen. Sitz baths are also helpful.
• A hot half bath is useful in fighting the infection.
• Every 4 hours, take a hot footbath while ice bags are on the lower abdomen for 30
minutes, followed by 30 minutes rest in bed. This will speed the healing process.
SYMPTOMS—Lack of appetite, nausea, fever, chills, generalized aching, fast heartbeat, and
occasionally vaginal bleeding. There is acute aching of both sides of the abdomen. Bowel movements
may intensify the pain.
CAUSES—Pelvic inflammatory disease is an infection of the female pelvic organs, and occurs most
often among sexually active women between the ages of 15 and 25.
Although abortions can result in sterility, pelvic inflammatory disease causes them even more
frequently. A single attack of this disease produces sterility about 15% of the time.
It is believed that this disorder owes its origin to unsanitary conditions, especially during intercourse.
The use of intrauterine devices is another cause. The disorder was over four times higher in IUD users.
They may not have been sterile or may have been inserted by hands that had not been carefully washed.
Douching is yet a third cause of this problem. It appears that they may not have been done carefully
enough, and bacteria was flushed up into the uterus. In one study, 90% of the infected women regularly
douched, and frequently had done so since the ages of 16 or 17.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Nenda kwenye juisi ya matunda na mboga haraka kwa muda.
• Wakati chakula kigumu kinapoanza, kula chakula chenye lishe, bila sukari na mafuta. Epuka chakula kisicho na chakula.
Usitumie tumbaku, kafeini, au pombe.
• Kwa misaada ya maumivu, weka joto kwa mgongo wa chini au tumbo. Bafu za Sitz pia zinasaidia.
• Umwagaji wa nusu moto ni muhimu katika kupigania maambukizi.
• Kila masaa 4, chukua mguu wa moto wakati mifuko ya barafu iko kwenye tumbo la chini kwa 30
Dakika, ikifuatiwa na kupumzika kwa dakika 30 kitandani. Hii itaharakisha mchakato wa uponyaji.
Dalili -Kudumu kwa hamu ya kula, kichefuchefu, homa, baridi, kuuma kwa jumla, mapigo ya moyo haraka, na
Wakati mwingine kutokwa damu kwa uke. Kuna maumivu makali ya pande zote za tumbo. Harakati za matumbo
inaweza kuongeza maumivu.
Sababu -ugonjwa wa uchochezi wa pelvic ni maambukizi ya viungo vya pelvic ya kike, na hufanyika zaidi
mara nyingi kati ya wanawake wanaofanya ngono kati ya miaka 15 na 25.
Ingawa utoaji wa mimba unaweza kusababisha kuzaa, ugonjwa wa uchochezi wa pelvic huwasababisha zaidi
mara kwa mara. Shambulio moja la ugonjwa huu linazalisha kuzaa karibu 15% ya wakati.
Inaaminika kuwa shida hii inadaiwa asili yake kwa hali zisizo za kawaida, haswa wakati wa kujuana.
Matumizi ya vifaa vya intrauterine ni sababu nyingine. Machafuko yalikuwa zaidi ya mara nne kwa watumiaji wa IUD.
Labda hawakuwa na kuzaa au wanaweza kuwa wameingizwa na mikono ambayo haikuoshwa kwa uangalifu.
Douching bado ni sababu ya tatu ya shida hii. Inaonekana kwamba wanaweza kuwa hawajafanywa kwa uangalifu
Kutosha, na bakteria ilirushwa ndani ya uterasi. Katika utafiti mmoja, 90% ya wanawake walioambukizwa mara kwa mara
Imechangiwa, na mara nyingi ilikuwa imefanya hivyo tangu miaka ya 16 au 17.

title: Vaginitis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• All of the above factors should be carefully noted.
• For yeast vaginitis, use a hot soda-water douche (1-3 teaspoons of soda to 1 quart water)
twice a day for 7 days, then once a day for 30 days.
• If there is not clear and rapid improvement, a trichomonas may be the cause. If so, apply
a vinegar douche (1-4 tablespoon of vinegar to 1 quart water) twice a day for 7 days, then
once a day for 30 days.
• Garlic-water douche (1 clove into part of a quart of boiling water; add the remainder of
the quart, let cool to 110o F. twice a day for 7 days, then once a day for 30 days).
• For organisms other than yeast and trichomonas, a warm normal saline douche (1
teaspoon of salt per quart water) is useful.
• Hot sitz baths, 2-3 times a day will soothe local irritation; but it is important that the tub
be sterilized first, lest bacteria be introduced into the vagina.
• An alternate method is to apply garlic suppositories. Peel a clove of garlic and wrap it in
a piece of sterile gauze. Lubricate the suppository with pure organic vegetable oil and
insert it in the vagina, yet keep a piece protruding outside. Continue doing this for 3 days,
changing suppositories every 3 hours.
• Adequate rest, a healthful diet, and meticulous personal hygiene with frequent bathing
are important.
• Take vitamins A and B complex.
• Avoid panty hose, girdles, or synthetic pants or panties. Tight-fitting clothing increases
moisture retention. Wear cotton clothing.
• Avoid chemical deodorant sprays, tampons, and colored toilet paper. Do not use
commercial sexual lubricants.
• Beware of tub baths! Take showers instead.
• Do not wash socks and stockings with underwear, lest foot infections be transferred to
the pelvic organs.
• Cotton underwear can be microwaved to destroy yeast. Wet it, wring it out well, and
microwave on high for 30 seconds.
• Do not have marital relations during menstruation or infections or, if you can avoid it, a
few days immediately afterward.
• Require that your husband wash his hands and genitals before intercourse. If he really
loves you, he will gladly do this.
• Tea tree oil is good for vaginitis. Use creams, suppositories, etc.
• Aloe vera is helpful for infections, including yeast infections. It can be taken internally
or used as a douche.
• Also helpful are bayberry, goldenseal, yarrow, marshmallow root, calendula, chamomile,
pau d'arco, and dandelion.
• To normalize vaginal flora, eat plain yogurt and/or apply it to the vagina.
• Include adequate fiber in the diet.
• Do not take iron supplements until the infection is reduced. Infectious bacteria require
iron for growth.
• Apply an opened vitamin E capsule to the area, to reduce itching.
• For atrophic vaginitis, use natural progesterone cream and apply to the vagina.
Prescription ointments for this condition contain estrogen. But they increase the need for
vitamin B . Vaginal absorption of estrogen may be dangerous.
6
• Do not use sweet-smelling douches. A plain yogurt douche is much better. (Also see
"Douches.")
• If you have chronic or persistent vaginitis, you may have diabetes.
• If you have recurring vaginitis, you may be getting it from your husband.
• For more information on dealing with a yeast infection, see "Candida" and "Athlete's
Foot."
—Related articles include "Candida," "Chlamydia," "Toxic Shock," "Leukorrhea," and "Douches."
(Candidiasis, Yeast Vaginitis; Trichomoniasis; Atrophic
Vaginitis)
SYMPTOMS—Vaginal pain or tenderness, itching, increased vaginal discharge, burning sensation,
painful intercourse, and urination.
CAUSES—Vaginitis is an inflammation of the vagina. There are four types:
1 - Yeast vaginitis, also called monilial, or thrush. The yeast infection causing it is candida albicans. It is
more common in pregnant women, diabetics, and those on antibiotics, oral contraceptives, or long-term
steroid therapy. Changes in the vaginal pH (caused by tap water, tub baths, certain additives to bath
water, and some commercial douches) permit the yeast to grow in the vagina. The discharge is moderate
in amount, but thick yellowish or white and curd-like. It may cause severe itching of the external
genitalia (see "Candida").
2 - Trichomonas, caused by trichomonas vaginalis. This is a protozoan which likes an alkaline
environment. It may be sexually transmitted (so both should be treated at the same time). In the man,
there are no symptoms; in the woman, there is a greenish white or heavy yellow, frothy, discharge which
may have a slight odor. The discharge causes itching, burning, and reddening of the skin. If it spreads to
the urethra, there may be frequent burning urination. Flagyl, which is a medication for this, is known to
cause cancer in animals.
3 - Non-specific vaginitis is caused by organisms other than yeast or trichomonas, and occurs when
resistance is low and the normal vaginal flora changes.
4 - Atrophic vaginitis occurs in post-menopausal women and those whose ovaries have been surgically
removed. Adhesions form and there is a high susceptibility to infection. Symptoms include itching or
burning, painful intercourse, and a thin watery discharge, sometimes tinged with blood.
Vaginitis may have one or more of the following causes: bacterial or fungal infection, intestinal worms,
vitamin B deficiency, congestion of the pelvic organs, gonococci, chemical irritation (strong douches),
mechanical irritation (tampons), drug medications, and deodorant sprays.
Other contributing factors include tight and nonporous clothing, diabetes, and the use of antibiotics.
The birth control pill causes a B deficiency and changes the vaginal pH.
6
Pregnancy increases the vaginal pH, and also its glycogen content. This is favorable to yeast infection.
But it generally leaves
Tight-fitting synthetic underwear provides poor ventilation and a warm, moist, environment for yeast
infection to occur.
Excess sugar and refined carbohydrates help feed yeast infection.
Normally, the pH of the vagina is acid; anything that alkalinizes it contributes to vaginitis. Causes
include diabetes, menstrual period, pregnancy, and the time just after a miscarriage or abortion.
The most common aftereffect of antibiotic therapy in women is a vaginal yeast infection.
Frequent douching upsets vaginal pH and flora.
Excessive sex or intercourse, without proper lubrication, irritates vaginal walls.
About 5% of women given tetracycline for acne develop vaginitis.
Intrauterine devices (IUDs) produce a favorable environment for yeast infection, since they reduce
normal vaginal secretions.
Four primary factors are antibiotics, oral contraceptives, diabetes, and pregnancy.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Sababu zote hapo juu zinapaswa kuzingatiwa kwa uangalifu.
• Kwa vaginitis ya chachu, tumia douche ya maji ya soda-maji (vijiko 1-3 vya soda hadi maji 1 ya robo)
Mara mbili kwa siku kwa siku 7, kisha mara moja kwa siku kwa siku 30.
• Ikiwa hakuna uboreshaji wazi na wa haraka, trichomonas inaweza kuwa sababu. Ikiwa ni hivyo, tumia
Douche ya siki (kijiko 1-4 cha siki kwa maji 1 ya maji) mara mbili kwa siku kwa siku 7, basi
Mara moja kwa siku kwa siku 30.
• Douche ya maji ya vitunguu (1 karafuu katika sehemu ya lita moja ya maji ya kuchemsha; ongeza mabaki ya
Quart, acha baridi hadi 110o F. mara mbili kwa siku kwa siku 7, kisha mara moja kwa siku kwa siku 30).
• Kwa viumbe vingine isipokuwa chachu na trichomonas, douche ya kawaida ya joto ya chumvi (1
Kijiko cha chumvi kwa maji ya quart) ni muhimu.
• Bafu za moto za Sitz, mara 2-3 kwa siku zitatuliza kuwasha; Lakini ni muhimu kwamba tub
Kuwa na sterilized kwanza, isije bakteria kuletwa ndani ya uke.
Njia mbadala ni kutumia vitunguu vya vitunguu. Chambua karafuu ya vitunguu na uifunge ndani
kipande cha chachi isiyo na kuzaa. Mafuta suppository na mafuta safi ya mboga mboga na
Ingiza ndani ya uke, lakini weka kipande kinachojitokeza nje. Endelea kufanya hivi kwa siku 3,
Kubadilisha suppositories kila masaa 3.
• Kupumzika vya kutosha, lishe yenye afya, na usafi wa kibinafsi na kuoga mara kwa mara
ni muhimu.
• Chukua vitamini A na B tata.
• Epuka hose ya panty, vifungo, au suruali ya syntetisk au suruali. Mavazi yanayofaa huongezeka
Uhifadhi wa unyevu. Vaa mavazi ya pamba.
• Epuka kunyunyizia kemikali, tamponi, na karatasi ya choo cha rangi. Usitumie
Mafuta ya kibiashara ya kibiashara.
• Jihadharini na bafu za tub! Chukua maonyesho badala yake.
• Usioshe soksi na soksi na chupi, maambukizo ya miguu yasije
viungo vya pelvic.
• Chupi ya pamba inaweza kupakwa microwaved kuharibu chachu. Kuiweka, kuifuta vizuri, na
Microwave juu kwa sekunde 30.
• Usiwe na uhusiano wa ndoa wakati wa hedhi au maambukizo au, ikiwa unaweza kuizuia, a
Siku chache mara moja baadaye.
• Inahitaji mumeo aoshe mikono yake na sehemu za siri kabla ya kujuana. Ikiwa kweli
Anakupenda, atafanya hivi kwa furaha.
• Mafuta ya mti wa chai ni nzuri kwa uke. Tumia mafuta, suppositories, nk.
• Aloe Vera ni muhimu kwa maambukizo, pamoja na maambukizo ya chachu. Inaweza kuchukuliwa ndani
au kutumika kama douche.
• Inasaidia pia ni Bayberry, Goldenseal, Yarrow, Marshmallow Mizizi, Calendula, Chamomile,
Pau d'Arco, na Dandelion.
• Ili kurekebisha mimea ya uke, kula mtindi wazi na/au uitumie kwa uke.
• Jumuisha nyuzi za kutosha katika lishe.
• Usichukue virutubisho vya chuma hadi maambukizi yapunguzwe. Bakteria za kuambukiza zinahitaji
chuma kwa ukuaji.
• Omba kifurushi cha vitamini E kilichofunguliwa kwa eneo hilo, ili kupunguza kuwasha.
• Kwa vaginitis ya atrophic, tumia cream ya asili ya progesterone na utumie kwa uke.
Marashi ya kuagiza kwa hali hii ina estrogeni. Lakini wanaongeza hitaji la
Vitamini B. Kunyonya kwa estrojeni inaweza kuwa hatari.
6
• Usitumie douches zenye harufu nzuri. Douche ya wazi ya mtindi ni bora zaidi. (Pia tazama
"Douches.")
• Ikiwa una uke sugu au unaoendelea, unaweza kuwa na ugonjwa wa sukari.
• Ikiwa una uke wa mara kwa mara, unaweza kuwa unapata kutoka kwa mumeo.
• Kwa habari zaidi juu ya kushughulika na maambukizi ya chachu, ona "Candida" na "Wanariadha
Mguu. "
- Nakala zinazohusiana ni pamoja na "Candida," "Chlamydia," "Mshtuko wa sumu," "Leukorrhea," na "Douches."
(Candidiasis, chachu vaginitis; trichomoniasis; atrophic
Vaginitis)
Dalili -maumivu ya uke au huruma, kuwasha, kuongezeka kwa uke, hisia za kuchoma,
Kuingiliana kwa uchungu, na mkojo.
Sababu -vaginitis ni uchochezi wa uke. Kuna aina nne:
1 - chachu vaginitis, pia huitwa monilial, au thrush. Maambukizi ya chachu yanayosababisha ni albino za Candida. Ni
Kawaida zaidi katika wanawake wajawazito, wagonjwa wa kisukari, na wale walio kwenye dawa za kukinga, uzazi wa mpango wa mdomo, au wa muda mrefu
Tiba ya Steroid. Mabadiliko katika pH ya uke (inayosababishwa na maji ya bomba, bafu za tub, nyongeza fulani za kuoga
Maji, na daftari zingine za kibiashara) huruhusu chachu kukua ndani ya uke. Kutokwa ni wastani
kwa kiasi, lakini nene ya manjano au nyeupe na curd-kama. Inaweza kusababisha kuwasha kali ya nje
Genitalia (tazama "Candida").
2 - Trichomonas, iliyosababishwa na Trichomonas vaginalis. Hii ni protozoan ambayo inapenda alkali
mazingira. Inaweza kupitishwa kijinsia (kwa hivyo zote zinapaswa kutibiwa kwa wakati mmoja). Katika mtu,
Hakuna dalili; Katika mwanamke, kuna rangi nyeupe ya manjano au njano nzito, frothy, kutokwa ambayo ambayo
inaweza kuwa na harufu kidogo. Kutokwa husababisha kuwasha, kuchoma, na kupunguka kwa ngozi. Ikiwa inaenea
Urethra, kunaweza kuwa na mkojo wa kuchoma mara kwa mara. Flagyl, ambayo ni dawa ya hii, inajulikana
kusababisha saratani katika wanyama.
3 - Vaginitis isiyo maalum husababishwa na viumbe vingine isipokuwa chachu au trichomonas, na hufanyika wakati
Upinzani ni chini na mabadiliko ya kawaida ya mimea ya uke.
4 - Atrophic vaginitis hufanyika kwa wanawake wa baada ya menopausal na wale ambao ovari zao zimekuwa zikipasuliwa
kuondolewa. Fomu ya Adhesions na kuna uwezekano mkubwa wa kuambukizwa. Dalili ni pamoja na kuwasha au
Kuungua, kuumia chungu, na kutokwa nyembamba kwa maji, wakati mwingine hutiwa damu.
Vaginitis inaweza kuwa na sababu moja au zaidi zifuatazo: maambukizi ya bakteria au kuvu, minyoo ya matumbo,
Upungufu wa Vitamini B, msongamano wa viungo vya pelvic, gonococci, kuwasha kemikali (douches kali),
kuwasha mitambo (tampons), dawa za dawa, na dawa za deodorant.
Sababu zingine zinazochangia ni pamoja na mavazi magumu na yasiyokuwa na ugonjwa, ugonjwa wa sukari, na utumiaji wa viuatilifu.
Kidonge cha kudhibiti uzazi husababisha upungufu wa B na hubadilisha pH ya uke.
6
Mimba huongeza pH ya uke, na pia yaliyomo ya glycogen. Hii ni nzuri kwa maambukizi ya chachu.
Lakini kwa ujumla huacha
Mazingira ya synthetic yenye kufaa hutoa uingizaji hewa duni na mazingira ya joto, yenye unyevu, ya chachu
maambukizi kutokea.
Sukari iliyozidi na wanga iliyosafishwa husaidia kulisha maambukizi ya chachu.
Kawaida, pH ya uke ni asidi; Chochote ambacho alkalinites inachangia vaginitis. Sababu
Jumuisha ugonjwa wa sukari, kipindi cha hedhi, ujauzito, na wakati tu baada ya kuharibika kwa mimba au utoaji mimba.
Matokeo ya kawaida ya tiba ya antibiotic kwa wanawake ni maambukizi ya chachu ya uke.
Douching mara kwa mara inazidi pH ya uke na mimea.
Jinsia nyingi au kujuana, bila lubrication sahihi, inakera kuta za uke.
Karibu 5% ya wanawake waliopewa tetracycline kwa chunusi huendeleza vaginitis.
Vifaa vya intrauterine (IUDS) hutoa mazingira mazuri ya maambukizi ya chachu, kwani hupunguza
Siri za kawaida za uke.
Sababu nne za msingi ni dawa za kuzuia dawa, uzazi wa mpango wa mdomo, ugonjwa wa sukari, na ujauzito.

title: Leukorrhea
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The infective cause should be determined, and then treated. See articles noted at the
bottom of this article.
• Wear white cotton underwear, so air can circulate freely. Keep the area clean and dry.
• To restore natural vaginal flora, douche with 6-8 acidophilus capsules or plain yogurt.
Also douche with fresh garlic juice and water.
• Helpful herbs include pau d'arco tea as a natural antibiotic. Drink 3 cups daily.
—See "Candida," "Chlamydia," Vaginitis," "Toxic Shock," and "Douches" for much more information.
SYMPTOMS—A thick whitish vaginal discharge. Related symptoms may include burning and itching
of the vulva.
CAUSES—Leukorrhea is nonspecific vaginal discharge that contains mucous and white blood cells;
sometimes it is tinged with blood. The amount of discharge increases when estrogen levels are
heightened. If blood is present, a more serious disorder may be indicated.
It is often a symptom of vaginal infection. Infective causes include candida (candida albicans, also called
yeast infection or monilia), trichomonas vaginalis, chlamydia, hemophilus vaginitis, streptococcus, or
neisseria gonorrhea. It can also be caused by staphylococcus; this is the bacteria which will cause toxic
shock syndrome when vaginal tampons are used incorrectly. Culture growth of bacteria and examination
of discharge under microscope is needed for specific diagnosis.
Other causes include a vitamin B complex deficiency, excessive douching, the use of antibiotics or oral
contraceptives, or intestinal worms.
Leukorrhea frequently occurs where there is diabetes or pregnancy.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Sababu ya kuambukiza inapaswa kuamua, na kisha kutibiwa. Tazama nakala zilizotajwa kwenye
Chini ya nakala hii.
• Vaa chupi nyeupe ya pamba, ili hewa iweze kuzunguka kwa uhuru. Weka eneo safi na kavu.
• Kurejesha mimea ya asili ya uke, douche na vidonge 6-8 acidophilus au mtindi wazi.
Pia douche na juisi safi ya vitunguu na maji.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na chai ya Pau d'Arco kama dawa ya asili. Kunywa vikombe 3 kila siku.
-Tazama "Candida," "Chlamydia," Vaginitis, "" Mshtuko wa sumu, "na" Douches "kwa habari zaidi.
Dalili -Kutokwa kwa weupe wa uke. Dalili zinazohusiana zinaweza kujumuisha kuchoma na kuwasha
ya Vulva.
Sababu -Leukorrhea ni kutokwa kwa uke ambayo ina seli za damu na nyeupe;
Wakati mwingine hutiwa damu. Kiasi cha kutokwa huongezeka wakati viwango vya estrogeni ni
imeinuliwa. Ikiwa damu iko, shida kubwa zaidi inaweza kuonyeshwa.
Mara nyingi ni ishara ya maambukizi ya uke. Sababu za kuambukiza ni pamoja na Candida (Candida albicans, pia huitwa
maambukizi ya chachu au monilia), trichomonas vaginalis, chlamydia, hemophilus vaginitis, streptococcus, au
Neisseria gonorrhea. Inaweza pia kusababishwa na Staphylococcus; Hii ndio bakteria ambayo itasababisha sumu
Dalili ya mshtuko wakati tamponi za uke hutumiwa vibaya. Ukuaji wa utamaduni wa bakteria na uchunguzi
ya kutokwa chini ya darubini inahitajika kwa utambuzi maalum.
Sababu zingine ni pamoja na upungufu tata wa vitamini B, douching nyingi, matumizi ya dawa za kukinga au mdomo
uzazi wa mpango, au minyoo ya matumbo.
Leukorrhea mara nyingi hufanyika ambapo kuna ugonjwa wa sukari au ujauzito.

title: Toxic Shock Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Take this person immediately to the emergency room at the hospital. Do not let them
make you wait awhile! The person needs fluids and electrolytes by IV, along with
penicillin.
—Also see "Leukorrhea"
SYMPTOMS—Sudden onset of the condition: diarrhea, vomiting, headache, confusion, skin rash, and
sore throat. There can be rapid deterioration and even death, within 48 hours.
CAUSES—Prevention is far better than treatment. Aside from the name, this is an actual disease.
Circumstances has permitted staphylococcus in the system, to produce exotoxins faster than the body
defenses can eliminate them.
Young women between 13-32 years of age contract 85% of this disease. In their case, the cause is
usually the improper use of vaginal tampons. A single one is kept in place more than 4 hours. This
produces an ideal environment for rapid staphylococcus growth with terrible consequences.
A less frequent cause is food poisoning (which see), caused by poor food handling.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Chukua mtu huyu mara moja kwenye chumba cha dharura hospitalini. Usiwaache
kukufanya usubiri muda mfupi! Mtu anahitaji maji na elektroni na IV, pamoja na
penicillin.
-Unaona "leukorrhea"
Dalili -mwanzo wa hali: kuhara, kutapika, maumivu ya kichwa, machafuko, upele wa ngozi, na
koo. Kunaweza kuwa na kuzorota kwa haraka na hata kifo, ndani ya masaa 48.
Sababu -kuzuia ni bora zaidi kuliko matibabu. Mbali na jina, hii ni ugonjwa halisi.
Hali zimeruhusu Staphylococcus katika mfumo, kutoa exotoxins haraka kuliko mwili
Ulinzi unaweza kuwaondoa.
Wanawake vijana kati ya miaka 13-32 wa miaka 85% ya ugonjwa huu. Kwa upande wao, sababu ni
Kawaida matumizi yasiyofaa ya tamponi za uke. Moja huhifadhiwa mahali zaidi ya masaa 4. Hii
Inazalisha mazingira bora kwa ukuaji wa haraka wa Staphylococcus na athari mbaya.
Sababu isiyo ya kawaida ni sumu ya chakula (ambayo huona), inayosababishwa na utunzaji duni wa chakula.

title: Hysterectomy
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• If you have had a hysterectomy, eat a nutritious diet, with vitamin/mineral
supplementation. This will reduce the amount of estrogen deprivation, especially if you
still have your ovaries.
• If you do use hormonal replacement, take the lowest dosage possible. Ask for a
combined hormone containing both estrogen and progesterone. That will help reduce the
risk of cancer. Progesterone, not estrogen, is the hormone most needed in replacement
therapy.
SYMPTOMS—Depression, urinary tract problems, joint pain, headaches, dizziness, insomnia, fatigue,
loss of bone mass, and increased likelihood of heart disease.
CAUSES—A hysterectomy is the surgical removal of the uterus, and is done to remove fibroids (30%
of the time), endometriosis (20%), or uterine prolapse (18%).
There are three types of hysterectomies, each more complete than the preceding one:
1 - Partial hysterectomy: The uterus is removed, but the cervix and other female reproductive organs
remain.
2 - Total hysterectomy: Both the uterus and cervix are removed.
3 - Panhysterectomy: The uterus, fallopian tubes, and ovaries are removed.
There are problems which led to the decision to have a hysterectomy. These may include urinary tract
problems, lengthy and heavy periods, a heavy and bloated feeling, abdominal swelling due to fibroids,
infertility resulting from fibroids or endometriosis, or reactions to drugs given for endometriosis.
But the problems resulting from a hysterectomy are, if anything, more significant:
The hormones are suddenly stopped. This sends shock waves throughout the entire system.
Lack of those hormones can result in immense bone mass loss, osteoporosis, and greater likelihood of
heart disease, depression, urinary tract problems, dizziness, insomnia, headaches, and general fatigue.
Even those women who do not have their ovaries cut out still experience a drastic lessening of estrogen
output. In addition, menopause begins years earlier for half the women who are spared their ovaries.
Depression may also occur, and reduced sexual desire frequently does. There is a 50% chance of a minor
post-operative complication, such as fever, bleeding, or wound healing. One in a 1,000 die and 10%
require a blood transfusion.
It has been estimated that many of the 600,000 hysterectomies performed in America each year are
totally unnecessary. No foreign country has even half that per capita amount.
Once the operation has been performed, you are permanently sterile, and it cannot be reversed.
It is often recommended that the ovaries be taken out also, because they might later become cancerous.
Yet statistics reveal that ovarian cancer is rare.
It is frequently recommended that a hysterectomy be performed, to eliminate fibroids, since they might
be malignant. But modern technology permits them to be examined, by ultrasound, for abnormalities. A
myomectomy should be performed to remove problematic fibroids, not a hysterectomy. (Also see
"Fibroids.")
Women who have hysterectomies have a higher incidence of cardiovascular disease.
If you decide to have a hysterectomy, ask that a horizontal incision be made, not a vertical one. The scar
will thus be less noticeable afterward.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ikiwa umekuwa na hysterectomy, kula lishe yenye lishe, na vitamini/madini
nyongeza. Hii itapunguza kiwango cha kunyimwa kwa estrogeni, haswa ikiwa wewe
Bado uwe na ovari yako.
• Ikiwa unatumia uingizwaji wa homoni, chukua kipimo cha chini iwezekanavyo. Uliza a
Homoni iliyochanganywa iliyo na estrogeni na progesterone. Hiyo itasaidia kupunguza
hatari ya saratani. Progesterone, sio estrogeni, ni homoni inayohitajika zaidi badala yake
tiba.
Dalili -Kukandamiza, shida za njia ya mkojo, maumivu ya pamoja, maumivu ya kichwa, kizunguzungu, kukosa usingizi, uchovu,
Kupoteza kwa misa ya mfupa, na kuongezeka kwa uwezekano wa ugonjwa wa moyo.
Sababu -hysterectomy ni kuondolewa kwa uterasi, na inafanywa kuondoa nyuzi (30%
ya wakati), endometriosis (20%), au prolapse ya uterine (18%).
Kuna aina tatu za hysterectomies, kila kamili zaidi kuliko ile iliyotangulia:
1 - sehemu ya hysterectomy: uterasi huondolewa, lakini kizazi na viungo vingine vya uzazi vya kike
kubaki.
2 - Jumla ya hysterectomy: Uterasi na kizazi huondolewa.
3 - Panhysterectomy: uterasi, mirija ya fallopian, na ovari huondolewa.
Kuna shida ambazo zilisababisha uamuzi wa kuwa na hysterectomy. Hii inaweza kujumuisha njia ya mkojo
Shida, vipindi virefu na nzito, hisia nzito na zenye damu, uvimbe wa tumbo kwa sababu ya nyuzi,
Utasa unaotokana na fibroids au endometriosis, au athari kwa dawa zilizopewa endometriosis.
Lakini shida zinazotokana na hysterectomy ni, ikiwa kuna chochote, ni muhimu zaidi:
Homoni zimesimamishwa ghafla. Hii hutuma mawimbi ya mshtuko katika mfumo wote.
Ukosefu wa homoni hizo zinaweza kusababisha upotezaji mkubwa wa mfupa, osteoporosis, na uwezekano mkubwa wa
Ugonjwa wa moyo, unyogovu, shida za njia ya mkojo, kizunguzungu, kukosa usingizi, maumivu ya kichwa, na uchovu wa jumla.
Hata wanawake hao ambao hawana ovari zao zilizokatwa bado wanapata uzoefu wa kupungua kwa estrogeni
Pato. Kwa kuongezea, wanakuwa wamemaliza kuzaa miaka mapema kwa nusu ya wanawake ambao wameokolewa ovari zao.
Unyogovu unaweza pia kutokea, na kupunguza hamu ya ngono mara kwa mara. Kuna nafasi 50% ya mchanga
Shida ya baada ya kazi, kama homa, kutokwa na damu, au uponyaji wa jeraha. Moja katika 1,000 kufa na 10%
zinahitaji kuongezewa damu.
Imekadiriwa kuwa wengi wa hysterectomies 600,000 zilizofanywa huko Amerika kila mwaka ni
Sio lazima kabisa. Hakuna nchi ya kigeni inayo hata nusu ya kiasi hicho.
Mara tu operesheni hiyo itakapofanywa, wewe ni laini kabisa, na haiwezi kubadilishwa.
Inapendekezwa mara nyingi kwamba ovari ichukuliwe pia, kwa sababu baadaye inaweza kuwa na saratani.
Bado takwimu zinaonyesha kuwa saratani ya ovari ni nadra.
Inapendekezwa mara kwa mara kwamba hysterectomy ifanyike, kuondoa fibroids, kwani wanaweza
kuwa mbaya. Lakini teknolojia ya kisasa inaruhusu kuchunguzwa, na ultrasound, kwa shida. A
Myomectomy inapaswa kufanywa ili kuondoa nyuzi za shida, sio hysterectomy. (Pia tazama
"Fibroids.")
Wanawake ambao wana hysterectomies wana tukio kubwa la ugonjwa wa moyo na mishipa.
Ikiwa unaamua kuwa na hysterectomy, uliza kwamba tukio la usawa lifanyike, sio wima. Kovu
Kwa hivyo itaonekana kidogo baadaye.

title: Frigidity
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Eat eggs fresh from the hen (not those in the stores which have been stored cold), alfalfa,
olive oil, pumpkin seeds and other seeds, nuts, soy oil, avocados, and wheat.
• Avoid meat products.
• Vitamin deficiencies can result in lowered estrogen levels and thus poor lubrication.
Obtain vitamins B complex and E.
• Helpful herbs include wild yam. This contains a natural steroid which may help. Take it
for 2 weeks, stop for 2 weeks, and then back on again.
• Damiana contains alkaloids which, like testosterone, directly stimulates nerves. Place a
eyedropperful under your tongue an hour or two before coming together. It may require
several days before a desired effect will be noted.
• Extra lubrication may help reduce possible pain.
• Also helpful are gotu kola, Siberian ginseng, saw palmetto, and sarsaparilla.
SYMPTOMS—Absence of sexual desire, or an inability to find pleasure, in sexual intercourse.
CAUSES—Frigidity is generally of psychic, not organic, cause. There is guilt, fear, depression, a sense
of inferiority or conflict with one's mate. Unfortunate experience and misinformation, received earlier in
life, often lays the groundwork for the problem.
However, in some cases the woman may find intercourse painful because of inadequate stimulation,
insufficient lubrication, or underlying infection or disease.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kula mayai safi kutoka kwa kuku (sio yale kwenye duka ambazo zimehifadhiwa baridi), alfalfa,
Mafuta ya mizeituni, mbegu za malenge na mbegu zingine, karanga, mafuta ya soya, avocados, na ngano.
• Epuka bidhaa za nyama.
Upungufu wa vitamini unaweza kusababisha viwango vya estrogeni na hivyo lubrication duni.
Pata vitamini B tata na E.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na yam ya mwitu. Hii ina steroid ya asili ambayo inaweza kusaidia. Chukua
Kwa wiki 2, simama kwa wiki 2, na kisha urudi tena.
• Damiana ina alkaloids ambayo, kama testosterone, huchochea moja kwa moja mishipa. Weka a
Eyedropperful chini ya ulimi wako saa moja au mbili kabla ya kukusanyika. Inaweza kuhitaji
Siku kadhaa kabla ya athari inayotaka itazingatiwa.
• Mafuta ya ziada yanaweza kusaidia kupunguza maumivu yanayowezekana.
• Inasaidia pia ni Gotu Kola, Siberian Ginseng, aliona Palmetto, na Sarsaparilla.
Dalili -Kutokuwepo kwa hamu ya ngono, au kutoweza kupata raha, katika ngono.
Sababu -Ujinga kwa ujumla ni ya kisaikolojia, sio ya kikaboni, sababu. Kuna hatia, hofu, unyogovu, akili
ya udhalili au migogoro na mwenzi wake. Uzoefu wa bahati mbaya na habari potofu, zilizopokelewa mapema
Maisha, mara nyingi huweka msingi wa shida.
Walakini, katika hali nyingine mwanamke anaweza kupata uchungu kwa sababu ya kuchochea kutosheleza,
lubrication haitoshi, au maambukizi ya msingi au ugonjwa.

title: Female Stress Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Fresh fruit and vegetable juice, lots of fresh fruits and vegetables, and whole grains.
Flaxseed oil and lecithin are also important.
• Adequate vitamin and mineral supplementation, especially vitamins B complex, A, C, E,
selenium, zinc, calcium, magnesium, potassium, and iron.
SYMPTOMS—Allergies, frigidity, infertility, amenorrhea, anorexia, anxiety neurosis, menopausal
melancholia, postpartum depression, premenstrual tension.
CAUSES—Women experience many stresses, because they have so many tasks: bearing children and
raising them, caring for the husband, working in and around the house, perhaps working outside the
home.
Increasing nutritional intake can help meet these stresses.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Matunda safi na juisi ya mboga, matunda mengi na mboga safi, na nafaka nzima.
Mafuta ya flaxseed na lecithin pia ni muhimu.
• Viongezeo vya kutosha vya vitamini na madini, haswa vitamini B tata, A, C, E,
Selenium, zinki, kalsiamu, magnesiamu, potasiamu, na chuma.
Dalili -Ushirikiano, Frigidity, Utasa, Amenorrhea, Anorexia, Neurosis ya wasiwasi, Menopausal
Melancholia, unyogovu wa baada ya kujifungua, mvutano wa mapema.
Sababu -Wanawake hupata mafadhaiko mengi, kwa sababu wana kazi nyingi: kuzaa watoto na
kuwalea, kumtunza mume, kufanya kazi ndani na karibu na nyumba, labda kufanya kazi nje ya
nyumbani.
Kuongeza ulaji wa lishe kunaweza kusaidia kukidhi mafadhaiko haya.

title: Morning Sickness
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Because morning sickness is caused by rising progesterone levels, you need a complex
carbohydrate (or possibly protein) snack upon awakening in the morning. This will relieve
much of the nausea.
• Keep crackers or whole-wheat toast near your bed and eat some as soon as you arise in
the morning. Pop them in your mouth, chew well, and swallow; then place your feet on
the floor.
• It helps to keep some food in the stomach all day long. Eat small and frequent meals, but
do not overeat. When needed, snack on whole-grain crackers, possibly with a little nut
butter (but not peanut butter).
• Another method is to carry some raw almonds with you, wherever you go. Make sure
they are not old and stale.
• Do not go without food or drink even though you feel nauseated and may vomit. You
must continue to have both!
• Vitamin B and the entire B complex is important. Essential fatty acids and a complete
6
line of nutritional supplements should be taken.
• Drink lots of fluids: water, fruit or vegetable juice, broth, or certain herbal teas.
• Avoid fried and fatty foods.
• Helpful herbs include dogwood, catnip, dandelion, mint, peppermint, and red raspberry
leaf. Ginger is helpful in relieving nausea.
SYMPTOMS—Nausea and vomiting by the mother between the sixth and twelfth weeks of pregnancy.
CAUSES—Although called morning sickness, it can occur at any time of the day. Morning sickness is
caused by rising progesterone levels, and is quite normal.
Morning sickness is said to be a cleansing of the body, to prepare a clean environment in which the fetus
can properly develop.
But about 1 woman in 200 experiences an abnormal amount of vomiting and severe nausea. This can
result in acidosis, malnutrition, dehydration, and significant weight loss.
Possible causes of this abnormal condition include drug toxicity, vitamin deficiency (especially of B ),
6
pancreatitis, bile duct disease, inflammatory bowel disorders.
It can also be caused by the production of high levels of human chorionic gonadotropin, which is a
hormone. Cysts in the uterus or multiple pregnancy can be the cause.
Morning sickness generally does not continue beyond the first 13 weeks of pregnancy. If there is
persistent vomiting or nausea later, consult with your health-care provider.
At its worst, morning sickness can degenerate into hyperemesis gravidarum. In this situation, the mother-
to-be has far too much vomiting and nausea; is overly dehydrated; not urinating properly; and cannot
keep food, water, and juice down for over a period of 4-6 hours.
This condition can lead to pulse irregularities, electrolyte imbalance, and even kidney and liver damage.
Ketones produced, when stored fat is broken down, can damage neurological development in the fetus.
How to avoid this danger? Do not stop eating and drinking fluids, even though you feel nauseated and
vomit.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kwa sababu ugonjwa wa asubuhi husababishwa na kuongezeka kwa viwango vya progesterone, unahitaji tata
wanga (au uwezekano wa protini) vitafunio baada ya kuamka asubuhi. Hii itapunguza
Mengi ya kichefuchefu.
• Weka viboreshaji au toast ya ngano nzima karibu na kitanda chako na kula mara tu unapoibuka
Asubuhi. Wape kwenye kinywa chako, chew vizuri, na kumeza; Kisha weka miguu yako
sakafu.
• Inasaidia kuweka chakula kwenye tumbo siku nzima. Kula milo ndogo na ya mara kwa mara, lakini
Usilae. Wakati inahitajika, vitafunio kwenye viboreshaji vya nafaka nzima, ikiwezekana na nati kidogo
siagi (lakini sio siagi ya karanga).
Njia nyingine ni kubeba mlozi mbichi na wewe, popote uendako. Hakikisha
Sio mzee na mbaya.
• Usiende bila chakula au kunywa hata ingawa unahisi kuwa na kichefuchefu na inaweza kutapika. Wewe
Lazima uendelee kuwa na zote mbili!
• Vitamini B na tata ya B ni muhimu. Asidi muhimu ya mafuta na kamili
6
Mstari wa virutubisho vya lishe unapaswa kuchukuliwa.
• Kunywa maji mengi: maji, matunda au juisi ya mboga, mchuzi, au chai fulani ya mitishamba.
• Epuka vyakula vya kukaanga na vyenye mafuta.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na mbwa wa mbwa, catnip, dandelion, mint, peppermint, na rasipiberi nyekundu
jani. Tangawizi ni muhimu katika kupunguza kichefuchefu.
Dalili -Nausea na kutapika na mama kati ya wiki ya sita na ya kumi na mbili ya ujauzito.
Sababu - ingawa inaitwa ugonjwa wa asubuhi, inaweza kutokea wakati wowote wa siku. Ugonjwa wa asubuhi ni
Inasababishwa na kuongezeka kwa viwango vya progesterone, na ni kawaida kabisa.
Ugonjwa wa asubuhi unasemekana kuwa utakaso wa mwili, kuandaa mazingira safi ambayo mtoto mchanga
inaweza kukuza vizuri.
Lakini karibu mwanamke 1 katika 200 hupata kiwango kisicho kawaida cha kutapika na kichefuchefu kali. Hii inaweza
husababisha acidosis, utapiamlo, upungufu wa maji mwilini, na kupoteza uzito mkubwa.
Sababu zinazowezekana za hali hii isiyo ya kawaida ni pamoja na sumu ya dawa, upungufu wa vitamini (haswa ya B),
6
Pancreatitis, ugonjwa wa duct ya bile, shida ya matumbo ya uchochezi.
Inaweza pia kusababishwa na utengenezaji wa viwango vya juu vya gonadotropin ya binadamu ya chorionic, ambayo ni
homoni. Cysts kwenye uterasi au ujauzito kadhaa inaweza kuwa sababu.
Ugonjwa wa asubuhi kwa ujumla hauendelei zaidi ya wiki 13 za kwanza za ujauzito. Ikiwa kuna
Kutapika kwa kuendelea au kichefuchefu baadaye, wasiliana na mtoaji wako wa huduma ya afya.
Wakati mbaya zaidi, ugonjwa wa asubuhi unaweza kuharibika kuwa hyperemesis gravidarum. Katika hali hii, mama-
kuwa na kutapika sana na kichefuchefu; imejaa maji mengi; sio kukojoa vizuri; na haiwezi
Weka chakula, maji, na juisi chini kwa muda wa masaa 4-6.
Hali hii inaweza kusababisha kukosekana kwa usawa, usawa wa elektroni, na hata uharibifu wa figo na ini.
Ketoni zinazozalishwa, wakati mafuta yaliyohifadhiwa yamevunjwa, yanaweza kuharibu maendeleo ya neva katika fetusi.
Jinsi ya kuzuia hatari hii? Usiache kula na kunywa maji, hata ingawa unahisi kuwa na kichefuchefu na
kutapika.

title: Miscarriage
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• There can be deficiencies of vitamins, trace minerals, and/or protein. Vitamin A, folic
acid, zinc, and complete amino acids are especially important. Vitamin E is the
"antiabortion vitamin."
• Taking iron supplements can block the absorption of vitamin E, resulting in a
miscarriage.
• It is vital that the mother-to-be take full vitamin/mineral supplementation, eat sufficient
amounts of good nourishing food, and avoid junk food of all types.
• Ignore the advice that you should eat what ever you want. If it is junk food, do not eat it!
If it is real food and you crave it, then eat it.
• Getting enough minerals in your diet will help you avoid a craving for sweets, chocolate,
etc. The cravings come because not enough vitamins, minerals, and complete proteins are
being consumed.
• There can also be malabsorption syndromes, such as celiac disease. Do pulse tests
(which see) to identify offending foods.
• If you have had an earlier miscarriage, in order prevent another one, start on a fully
nourishing diet six months before planned conception.
• Helpful herbs include cramp bark and alfalfa.
(Spontaneous Abortion)
SYMPTOMS—The fetus is ejected by the body prior to when normal delivery should occur.
CAUSES AND TREATMENT—There can be cervical incompetence, ectopic pregnancy (implantation
of the fertilized egg into a fallopian tube), abruptio placentae (placenta separates from the uterine wall),
placenta previa (implantation of the placenta over the cervical opening).
Other causes include emotional stress, general malaise, glandular disorders, and pregnancy-induced
hypertension.
But a frequent, and often underlying, cause is malnutrition.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kunaweza kuwa na upungufu wa vitamini, madini ya kufuatilia, na/au protini. Vitamini A, Folic
Asidi, zinki, na asidi kamili ya amino ni muhimu sana. Vitamini E ni
"Vitamini vya Antiabortion."
• Kuchukua virutubisho vya chuma kunaweza kuzuia kunyonya kwa vitamini E, na kusababisha a
Kupona.
• Ni muhimu kwamba mama-wa-kuchukua vitamini kamili/nyongeza ya madini, kula kutosha
Kiasi cha chakula kizuri cha lishe, na epuka chakula kisicho na chakula cha kila aina.
• Puuza ushauri kwamba unapaswa kula kile unachotaka. Ikiwa ni chakula kisicho na chakula, usile!
Ikiwa ni chakula halisi na unatamani, basi kula.
• Kupata madini ya kutosha katika lishe yako itakusaidia kuzuia kutamani pipi, chokoleti,
nk Tamaa huja kwa sababu vitamini vya kutosha, madini, na protini kamili ni
kutumiwa.
• Kunaweza pia kuwa na syndromes za Malabsorption, kama ugonjwa wa celiac. Fanya vipimo vya mapigo
(ambayo huona) kutambua vyakula vya kukosea.
• Ikiwa umepata upotovu wa mapema, ili kuzuia mwingine, anza kikamilifu
lishe ya lishe miezi sita kabla ya mimba iliyopangwa.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na gome na alfalfa.
(Utoaji mimba wa hiari)
Dalili -Fetus hutolewa na mwili kabla wakati uwasilishaji wa kawaida unapaswa kutokea.
Sababu na matibabu -kunaweza kuwa na uwezo wa kizazi, ujauzito wa ectopic (kuingiza
ya yai iliyo na mbolea ndani ya bomba la fallopian), abluctirio placentae (placenta hutengana na ukuta wa uterine),
previa ya placenta (kuingizwa kwa placenta juu ya ufunguzi wa kizazi).
Sababu zingine ni pamoja na mafadhaiko ya kihemko, malaise ya jumla, shida za glandular, na ujauzito unaosababishwa na ujauzito
shinikizo la damu.
Lakini mara kwa mara, na mara nyingi msingi, sababu ni utapiamlo.

title: Mastitis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Do not stop nursing the baby because you have mastitis! The milk is not infected, the
baby needs it, and you must keep giving it for months to come. The milk gives the baby
valuable antibodies. If you stop nursing, the mastitis could more easily lead to an abscess
in the breast.
• Go to bed, drink lots of clear fluids, and nurse more frequently.
• Alternate hot and cold compresses are often all the treatment required. Apply a hot
compress for 3 minutes, then cold for 30 seconds. Do this 3 times, and repeat the series 2-
3 times each day.
• Sometimes a continuous cold application is preferred. If so, give a hot footbath at the
same time.
• Nurse the affected breast twice as often, but for shorter periods of time. Try to keep it
emptied. Let no one tell you that you should stop nursing if you have mastitis! Keep
nursing; you will recover more quickly and the baby will not be injured.
• Obtain plenty of rest, including frequent rest periods throughout the day.
PREVENTION—The article, "Breast-feeding," contains many important points.
Prevention of mastitis begins prior to childbirth. For 2-3 months, the mother-to-be must get her nipples
ready for lactation. She should massage the nipples daily with chickweed ointment. Vitamin E may also
be used. Perform the "nipple pull" several times each day during a shower.
During breast-feeding, position the baby right. Place the baby on breast correctly, emptying the breast
fully, and break suction properly. This should be followed by emptying the breast with a hand pump, if
necessary. Nipple cleanliness is also important. Proper clothing should be worn. All this and more is
explained in "Breast-feeding."
— Also see "Fibrocystic Breast Disease."
SYMPTOMS—Breast inflammation: redness, pain, fever, inflammation, chills, hard swelling, malaise,
headache, and possibly swollen cervical and/or axillary lymph nodes.
CAUSES—Mastitis generally occurs between the fifth day after childbirth to the second or third
week—and especially occurs to mothers nursing their first baby. Usually limited to one breast, it must
be treated promptly or an abscess may develop. But treatment must be started within 12-18 hours after
the first symptoms are noted.
The breast and milk duct system has been invaded by staphylococci invading a fissured or cracked
nipple.
Causes include shallow grip on the nipple by the infant (see "Breast-feeding"), incomplete emptying
during each feeding, blocked duct, poor nipple care and hygiene, irritating clothing, engorged breast
because of trying to wean the child off milk, irritating clothing, or lack of proper nipple preparation prior
to lactation. See "Breast Feeding" for proper routines.
Breast engorgement results from incomplete emptying each time. There can be excessive sucking by the
infant—if he is not properly positioned on the nipple (see "Breast-feeding").
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Usiache kumnyonyesha mtoto kwa sababu una mastitis! Maziwa hayajaambukizwa,
Mtoto anahitaji, na lazima uendelee kuipatia kwa miezi ijayo. Maziwa humpa mtoto
antibodies muhimu. Ukiacha uuguzi, mastitis inaweza kusababisha kwa urahisi kwenye jipu
kwenye matiti.
• Nenda kulala, kunywa maji mengi wazi, na muuguzi mara nyingi zaidi.
• Njia mbadala za moto na baridi mara nyingi ni matibabu yote yanayohitajika. Omba moto
Shinikiza kwa dakika 3, kisha baridi kwa sekunde 30. Fanya hii mara 3, na kurudia mfululizo 2-
Mara 3 kila siku.
• Wakati mwingine matumizi ya baridi yanayoendelea hupendelea. Ikiwa ni hivyo, toa mguu wa moto kwenye
wakati huo huo.
• Muuguzi matiti yaliyoathiriwa mara mbili, lakini kwa vipindi vifupi vya wakati. Jaribu kuitunza
Imetengwa. Acha mtu yeyote akuambie kwamba unapaswa kuacha uuguzi ikiwa una mastitis! Weka
uuguzi; Utapona haraka na mtoto hatajeruhiwa.
• Pata mapumziko mengi, pamoja na vipindi vya kupumzika mara kwa mara siku nzima.
Kuzuia-Kifungu, "Kunyonyesha," kina vidokezo vingi muhimu.
Uzuiaji wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa huanza kabla ya kuzaa. Kwa miezi 2-3, mama-wa-lazima apate chuchu zake
tayari kwa lactation. Anapaswa kunyoa chuchu kila siku na marashi ya vifaranga. Vitamini E inaweza pia
kutumika. Fanya "nipple kuvuta" mara kadhaa kila siku wakati wa kuoga.
Wakati wa kunyonyesha, weka mtoto kulia. Weka mtoto kwenye matiti kwa usahihi, ukitoa matiti
kikamilifu, na kuvunja suction vizuri. Hii inapaswa kufuatwa kwa kuondoa matiti na pampu ya mkono, ikiwa
lazima. Usafi wa chuchu pia ni muhimu. Mavazi sahihi inapaswa kuvikwa. Hii yote na zaidi ni
alielezea katika "kunyonyesha."
- Pia angalia "Ugonjwa wa Matiti ya Fibrocystic."
Dalili - Kuvimba kwa matiti: uwekundu, maumivu, homa, uchochezi, baridi, uvimbe mgumu, malaise,
maumivu ya kichwa, na uwezekano wa kuvimba kwa kizazi na/au axillary nodes.
Sababu -Mastitis kwa ujumla hufanyika kati ya siku ya tano baada ya kuzaa hadi ya pili au ya tatu
Wiki -na hufanyika kwa akina mama kumlea mtoto wao wa kwanza. Kawaida mdogo kwa matiti moja, lazima
kutibiwa mara moja au jipu linaweza kukuza. Lakini matibabu lazima uanzishwe ndani ya masaa 12-18 baada
Dalili za kwanza zinajulikana.
Mfumo wa duct ya matiti na maziwa umevamiwa na staphylococci kuvamia fissured au kupasuka
chuchu.
Sababu ni pamoja na mtego wa kina juu ya chuchu na mtoto (ona "kunyonyesha"), kumaliza kamili
Wakati wa kila kulisha, duct iliyofungwa, utunzaji duni wa chuchu na usafi, mavazi ya kukasirisha, matiti yaliyoingizwa
Kwa sababu ya kujaribu kumchoma mtoto maziwa, mavazi ya kukasirisha, au ukosefu wa maandalizi sahihi ya chuchu kabla
kwa lactation. Tazama "Kunyonyesha" kwa mfumo mzuri.
Uingizaji wa matiti hutokana na kutoweka kamili kila wakati. Kunaweza kuwa na kunyonya kupita kiasi na
watoto wachanga-ikiwa hajawekwa vizuri kwenye chuchu (ona "kunyonyesha").

title: Birth Defects
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS—A variety of partially, or wholly, incapacitating physical or mental defects which are
present at birth.
CAUSES—More than 90% of birth defects are the result of preconception and early pregnancy
malnutrition of the mother. Such defects include cleft palates, cleft lips, heart defects, limb defects, spina
bifida, cystic fibrosis, muscular dystrophy, heart defects, brain defect, fetal hernia.
All of the above diseases have been eliminated from valuable livestock by the veterinary profession.
They have done this by giving the animals excellent nutrition.
It is well-known that bearing a child after the age of 40 can cause problems. But teenagers have a greater
percentage of children with birth defects than do women over 40, because of their general poor eating
habits and lack of vitamin/mineral supplementation. Many young people today live on junk food and
have damaged offspring as a result.
As an example, let us consider cystic fibrosis; it is a type of adrenal damage). It is classified as the "most
common genetic defect"; yet, in reality, cystic fibrosis is a selenium and fatty acid deficiency in the fetus
and/or newborn breast-fed infant. If the mother has celiac disease, this can impede her absorption of
essential nutrients, especially selenium, even more.
In 1958, Dr. Kaus Schwartz reported in the NIH publication, Federal Proceedings, that selenium was an
essential nutrient. The deficiency symptoms he reported all fit cystic fibrosis. But no one paid attention.
In 1972, Cornell University found that chicks hatched from selenium deficient hens developed all the
classical symptoms of cystic fibrosis of the pancreas. But they too did not connect the finding to
selenium.
But they also discovered that, if selenium was given to the chicks within 30 days after hatching, they
were totally cured within 21 days.
In 1978, J.D. Wallach, a veterinarian researcher, identified this problem in animals and birds as being
"cystic fibrosis." But, when other researchers agreed with his findings, Wallach was fired within 24
hours from his government research laboratory.
Since that date, Wallach has treated over 450 CF patients with excellent results. He has cured three-
month-old infants of the disorder. Wallach later did joint research with the Chinese Government in their
hospitals, and helped thousands of their people.
Yet, in America, the people are told CF is a "genetic defect" and nothing can be done, except expensive
and time-consuming rehabilitation programs.
Dr. Arthur F. Coco, inventor of the pulse test, made this statement:
"I am a realist. As long as the profit is in the treatment of symptoms rather than a search for causes,
that's where the medical profession will go for its harvest."
It is true that radiation is another cause of birth defects, yet only .1% of birth defects result from X rays,
etc. Most pregnant women realize that they should avoid them.
What is the solution to the problem? It is to give women a good nourishing diet. But it must begin a
couple years before conception!
Prevention of birth defects requires more than "prenatal" vitamins after the second month of pregnancy,
when the physician gives his pronouncement, "You are pregnant." By that time, the embryo has formed
all organs and tissues—for better or worse! Proper supplementation of vitamins and minerals, nourishing
food, and avoidance of tobacco, alcohol, caffeine, drugs, and junk food must have had its effect on the
mother's body—before conception took place!
Do a home pregnancy test as soon as you suspicion the possibility, and immediately begin eating
nourishing food and taking supplements.
—A sample of such a birth defect is "Cerebral Palsy." Also see "Cystic Fibrosis."
contentSw:
Dalili -anuwai ya sehemu, au kabisa, isiyoweza kupunguka kasoro za mwili au akili ambazo ni
sasa wakati wa kuzaliwa.
Sababu - zaidi ya 90% ya kasoro za kuzaliwa ni matokeo ya utambuzi na ujauzito wa mapema
utapiamlo wa mama. Kasoro kama hizo ni pamoja na palates za cleft, midomo ya laini, kasoro za moyo, kasoro za miguu, spina
Bifida, cystic fibrosis, dystrophy ya misuli, kasoro za moyo, kasoro ya ubongo, hernia ya fetasi.
Magonjwa yote hapo juu yameondolewa kutoka kwa mifugo muhimu na taaluma ya mifugo.
Wamefanya hivyo kwa kuwapa wanyama lishe bora.
Inajulikana kuwa kuzaa mtoto baada ya umri wa miaka 40 kunaweza kusababisha shida. Lakini vijana wana kubwa zaidi
Asilimia ya watoto walio na kasoro za kuzaliwa kuliko wanawake zaidi ya miaka 40, kwa sababu ya kula kwa jumla duni
tabia na ukosefu wa vitamini/kuongeza madini. Vijana wengi leo wanaishi kwenye chakula kisicho na chakula na
wameharibu watoto kama matokeo.
Kama mfano, wacha tufikirie cystic fibrosis; ni aina ya uharibifu wa adrenal). Imeainishwa kama "zaidi
kasoro ya maumbile ya kawaida "; bado, kwa ukweli, cystic fibrosis ni upungufu wa asidi ya seleniamu na mafuta kwenye fetusi
na/au mtoto mchanga anayenyonyesha. Ikiwa mama ana ugonjwa wa celiac, hii inaweza kuzuia kunyonya kwake
Virutubishi muhimu, haswa seleniamu, hata zaidi.
Mnamo 1958, Dk Kaus Schwartz aliripoti katika uchapishaji wa NIH, kesi za shirikisho, kwamba Selenium ilikuwa
virutubishi muhimu. Dalili za upungufu aliripoti zote zinazofaa cystic fibrosis. Lakini hakuna mtu aliyezingatia.
Mnamo 1972, Chuo Kikuu cha Cornell kiligundua kuwa vifaranga vilipigwa kutoka kwa seleniamu upungufu wa seleniamu waliendeleza yote
Dalili za classical za cystic fibrosis ya kongosho. Lakini wao pia hawakuunganisha kupatikana kwa
seleniamu.
Lakini pia waligundua kuwa, ikiwa seleniamu ilipewa vifaranga ndani ya siku 30 baada ya kuwaka, wao
waliponywa kabisa ndani ya siku 21.
Mnamo 1978, J.D. Wallach, mtafiti wa mifugo, aligundua shida hii kwa wanyama na ndege kama
"Cystic Fibrosis." Lakini, wakati watafiti wengine walikubaliana na matokeo yake, Wallach alifukuzwa kati ya 24
Masaa kutoka kwa maabara ya utafiti wa serikali.
Tangu tarehe hiyo, Wallach amewatibu wagonjwa zaidi ya 450 cf na matokeo bora. Ameponya tatu-
watoto wachanga wa shida. Baadaye Wallach alifanya utafiti wa pamoja na serikali ya China katika zao
Hospitali, na kusaidia maelfu ya watu wao.
Walakini, huko Amerika, watu wanaambiwa CF ni "kasoro ya maumbile" na hakuna kinachoweza kufanywa, isipokuwa ghali
na mipango ya ukarabati inayotumia wakati.
Dk. Arthur F. Coco, mvumbuzi wa mtihani wa kunde, alitoa taarifa hii:
"Mimi ni mtu wa kweli. Maadamu faida iko katika matibabu ya dalili badala ya kutafuta sababu,
Hapo ndipo taaluma ya matibabu itaenda kwa mavuno yake. "
Ni kweli kwamba mionzi ni sababu nyingine ya kasoro za kuzaliwa, lakini tu .1% ya kasoro za kuzaliwa hutokana na mionzi ya x,
nk Wanawake wengi wajawazito hugundua kuwa wanapaswa kuziepuka.
Je! Suluhisho la shida ni nini? Ni kuwapa wanawake lishe bora yenye lishe. Lakini lazima ianze a
Miaka michache kabla ya mimba!
Kuzuia kasoro za kuzaliwa kunahitaji zaidi ya vitamini "vya ujauzito" baada ya mwezi wa pili wa ujauzito,
Wakati daktari anatoa matamshi yake, "Wewe ni mjamzito." Kufikia wakati huo, kiinitete kimeunda
Viungo vyote na tishu -kwa bora au mbaya! Uongezaji sahihi wa vitamini na madini, lishe
Chakula, na kuepusha tumbaku, pombe, kafeini, dawa za kulevya, na chakula kisichokuwa na athari lazima iwe na athari yake kwa
Mwili wa mama -kabla ya mawazo yalifanyika!
Fanya mtihani wa ujauzito wa nyumbani mara tu unaposhutumu uwezekano, na mara moja anza kula
Kulisha chakula na kuchukua virutubisho.
- Mfano wa kasoro kama hiyo ya kuzaliwa ni "kupooza kwa ubongo." Pia angalia "cystic fibrosis."

title: Cerebral Palsy
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS—A form of paralysis caused by a prenatal brain defect, characterized by involuntary
motions and difficulty in control of the voluntary muscles.
CAUSES—The cause of this disorder, which affects the fine motor coordination of the body, is a
deficiency of zinc and B in the mother's diet prior to, and during, the formation of the brain of the fetus.
6
It is possible that celiac disease (which see) was a factor in inducing this deficiency.
There is, at this time, no known treatment.
—Also see "Birth Defects."
contentSw:
Dalili -aina ya kupooza inayosababishwa na kasoro ya ubongo wa ujauzito, inayoonyeshwa na hiari
Hoja na ugumu wa kudhibiti misuli ya hiari.
Sababu - sababu ya shida hii, ambayo inaathiri uratibu mzuri wa gari, ni
Upungufu wa zinki na B katika lishe ya mama kabla, na wakati, malezi ya ubongo wa fetusi.
6
Inawezekana kwamba ugonjwa wa celiac (ambao unaona) ulikuwa sababu ya kushawishi upungufu huu.
Kuna, kwa wakati huu, hakuna matibabu inayojulikana.
-Unaona "kasoro za kuzaliwa."

title: Down Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• There are several new methods that have been developed for helping children with this
problem. The result can be a lengthening of life and an increase of mental ability.
• Details are extensive, but here are the places to contact to learn more about this. You can
obtain real help from them:
• Nutri-Chem Labs, 1303 Richmond Road, Ottawa, Ontario K2B 764, Canada / 613-820-
9065 or 613-829-2226. Ask about MSBPlus formula and anything else they have for
Down syndrome.
• Warner House, 1023 East Chapman Avenue, Fullerton CA 92631 / 714-441-2600.
• The Registrar, Institutes for the Achievement of Human Potential, 8801 Stenton Avenue,
Philadelphia, PA 19118 / 800-736-4663.
(Mongolism)
SYMPTOMS—Slow physical development, moderate to severe mental retardation, and facial features
which are somewhat flattened. Ears are set low, tongue is large and furrowed, hands are broad and
short—and have a single (simian) crease across the palm.
CAUSES—Also called trisomy 21, Down syndrome occurs during fetal development, but is not
inherited. The problem is an extra 21st chromosome. It occurs in 1 out of 700 live births. People with
Down syndrome can, with care, live to old age, but they are prone to pneumonia and other lung diseases.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kuna njia kadhaa mpya ambazo zimetengenezwa kwa kusaidia watoto na hii
Tatizo. Matokeo yanaweza kuwa ya kupanua maisha na kuongezeka kwa uwezo wa akili.
Maelezo ni mengi, lakini hapa kuna maeneo ya kuwasiliana ili kujifunza zaidi juu ya hii. Unaweza
Pata msaada halisi kutoka kwao:
• Maabara ya Nutri-Chem, 1303 Richmond Road, Ottawa, Ontario K2B 764, Canada / 613-820-
9065 au 613-829-2226. Uliza juu ya formula ya MSBPlus na kitu kingine chochote walichonacho
Down Syndrome.
• Nyumba ya Warner, 1023 Mashariki ya Chapman Avenue, Fullerton CA 92631 / 714-441-2600.
• Msajili, Taasisi za Kufanikiwa kwa Uwezo wa Binadamu, 8801 Stenton Avenue,
Philadelphia, PA 19118 / 800-736-4663.
(Mongolism)
Dalili -Ukuaji wa mwili, wastani na upungufu mkubwa wa akili, na sifa za usoni
ambazo zimepigwa laini. Masikio yamewekwa chini, ulimi ni mkubwa na umejaa, mikono ni pana na
Mfupi -na uwe na kishindo kimoja (simian) kwenye kiganja.
Sababu -pia zinazoitwa trisomy 21, Down Syndrome hufanyika wakati wa maendeleo ya fetasi, lakini sio
warithi. Shida ni chromosome ya ziada ya 21. Inatokea katika 1 kati ya 700 ya kuzaliwa. Watu walio na
Dalili ya Down inaweza, kwa uangalifu, kuishi kwa uzee, lakini wanakabiliwa na pneumonia na magonjwa mengine ya mapafu.

title: Cradle Cap
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Gently remove the crusts. Shampoo 2-4 times a week with a mild soap. Massage the
scalp gently, but firmly enough to remove the flakes. Do not break the inflamed skin
underneath.
• Massage vegetable oil into still-adhering flake areas; let set for a few minutes, then
shampoo it off.
• Repeat 1-3 times a week until the condition is gone.
• Include vitamin B (10-25 mg daily) and zinc (15-25 mg daily) in the infant's diet.
6
Check for food allergies (see "Pulse Test").
(Infantile Seborrheic Dermatitis)
SYMPTOMS—Thin, whitish, flaky scales. Or thick, yellow, greasy crusts. Sometimes it spreads to the
eyelids, external ear canal, and nose.
CAUSES—Cradle cap is the most common scalp disorder of infants. About 50% have it at some time.
There is an overproduction of sebum, a waxy oil substance that may plug the sebaceous glands, leading
to inflammation and acne formation. The entire scalp can become covered with a thick mat of sebum
and dead skin cells.
Possible causes include food allergies. Of 187 infants which had it, in later years 67% later had an
allergy (whereas 20% have allergies in the general population).
The problem most frequently develops within the first 3 months and usually 3-4 weeks after introduction
of a new food. When that food was withdrawn, cradle cap cleared up. Most likely to cause problems:
milk, wheat, eggs, oranges, beans, peas, and sometimes oatmeal.
A deficiency of vitamin B and zinc may be involved.
6
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ondoa kwa upole kutu. Shampoo mara 2-4 kwa wiki na sabuni kali. Massage the
Scalp kwa upole, lakini kwa nguvu ya kutosha kuondoa flakes. Usivunje ngozi iliyochomwa
chini.
• Mafuta ya mafuta ya mboga ndani ya maeneo ya kunyakua bado; Acha kuweka kwa dakika chache, basi
Shampoo it off.
• Rudia mara 1-3 kwa wiki hadi hali itakapokwenda.
• Jumuisha vitamini B (10-25 mg kila siku) na zinki (15-25 mg kila siku) katika lishe ya watoto wachanga.
6
Angalia mzio wa chakula (angalia "Mtihani wa Pulse").
(Dermatitis ya seborrheic)
Dalili -nyembamba, nyeupe, mizani dhaifu. Au nene, manjano, makombo ya grisi. Wakati mwingine huenea kwa
Eyelids, mfereji wa sikio la nje, na pua.
Sababu -Cradle cap ndio shida ya kawaida ya ngozi ya watoto wachanga. Karibu 50% wanayo wakati fulani.
Kuna uzalishaji wa sebum, dutu ya mafuta ya waxy ambayo inaweza kuziba tezi za sebaceous, zinazoongoza
kwa uchochezi na malezi ya chunusi. Nguruwe nzima inaweza kufunikwa na mkeka mnene wa sebum
na seli za ngozi zilizokufa.
Sababu zinazowezekana ni pamoja na mzio wa chakula. Ya watoto wachanga 187 ambao walikuwa nayo, katika miaka ya baadaye 67% baadaye walikuwa na
mzio (wakati 20% ina mzio katika idadi ya watu).
Shida mara nyingi huibuka ndani ya miezi 3 ya kwanza na kawaida wiki 3-4 baada ya kuanzishwa
ya chakula kipya. Wakati chakula hicho kiliondolewa, kofia ya utoto iliondolewa. Uwezekano mkubwa wa kusababisha shida:
Maziwa, ngano, mayai, machungwa, maharagwe, mbaazi, na wakati mwingine oatmeal.
Upungufu wa vitamini B na zinki unaweza kuhusika.
6
