title: Colic In Infants
contentEn:
(Infant Colic)
SYMPTOMS—Stomach or intestinal pain in an infant. There is abdominal pain, distension, insomnia,
extreme fretfulness, or hysteria. The child cries out, pulls the knees up to the stomach, and has a
distended stomach.
CAUSES AND TREATMENT—
• Abnormal amounts of gas are passing upward or downward, and this is causing pain.
• You can immediately give the infant warm catnip tea in a bottle. A catnip tea enema will
also help. Crying spells occur at regular intervals; so, if a very warm bath is given an hour
before an expected attack, it may be prevented. Have catnip tea on hand to use in an
emergency.
• In addition, a hot footbath or hot fomentation over the abdomen will relieve the baby.
• If the baby is totally breast-fed, the cause is in the mother's diet. Any food the mother
may eat may, through her milk, causes the baby to suffer infant colic; onions, cabbage,
garlic, wheat, yeast, broccoli, and Brussels sprouts are common offenders. Another major
cause is fried food, junk food, refined food, and all types of confused food combinations.
Both the mother and the child need a good diet.
• Colic in a formula-fed infant points to the food given to the child. It may be the milk,
wheat, soy, or sugar in the formula. If possible, substitute vitamin-enriched goat's milk.
Also try to have the mother begin breast-feeding the baby. Even if she did not begin doing
it after delivery, she can, with some effort, get the flow started later. This is done by
frequent attempts to feed the baby over several months.
• If the infant is bottle-fed, for added nourishment at this time you might pour boiling
water over wheat flakes, to dissolve them; put them through a sieve; and add soybean
milk, to bring it to a desired consistency. Potassium broth and oatmeal gruel are also
helpful.
• If colic develops after weaning has begun, the new food is the problem. The infant must
be given proper foods and only one new food should be added at a time, so the infant can
be carefully monitored for colic, rashes, or other reactions.
• Wheat and dairy products are especially suspect. When in doubt, eliminate them first.
Wheat and other grains are often introduced far too early. But this can cause the child to
later develop celiac disease, which will affect him throughout life (see "Celiac Disease").
The infant does not have the digestive enzymes to handle grains until 5-6 months. Let
grains be one of the last foods introduced, and do not give yeast bread until after a year
old.
• Give fresh, boiled, goat's milk; it is far less of a problem.
• Keep diet diaries and do pulse testing, to ascertain offending foods (see "Pulse Test").
• It may help to give pancreatic enzymes (75-200 mg three times a day) before meals
(enzymes may be constipating), flaxseed oil (1-2 drops) after each meal, and vitamin B
6
(10 mg twice a day).
—Also see "Colic in Children."
contentSw:
(Colic ya watoto wachanga)
Dalili -tumbo au maumivu ya matumbo katika mtoto mchanga. Kuna maumivu ya tumbo, shida, kukosa usingizi,
Ujanja uliokithiri, au hysteria. Mtoto analia, huvuta magoti juu ya tumbo, na ana
tumbo lililovunjika.
Sababu na matibabu--
• Kiasi kisicho kawaida cha gesi kinapita juu au chini, na hii husababisha maumivu.
• Unaweza kumpa mara moja chai ya joto ya watoto wachanga kwenye chupa. Enema ya chai ya catnip
pia usaidie. Spell za kulia hufanyika mara kwa mara; Kwa hivyo, ikiwa umwagaji wa joto sana unapewa saa
Kabla ya shambulio linalotarajiwa, inaweza kuzuiwa. Kuwa na chai ya catnip mkononi kutumia
Dharura.
• Kwa kuongezea, mguu wa moto au moto wa moto juu ya tumbo utapunguza mtoto.
• Ikiwa mtoto amenyonyesha kabisa, sababu iko kwenye lishe ya mama. Chakula chochote mama
Inaweza kula inaweza, kupitia maziwa yake, husababisha mtoto kuteseka colic ya watoto wachanga; Vitunguu, kabichi,
Vitunguu, ngano, chachu, broccoli, na brussels ni wahalifu wa kawaida. Mwingine mkubwa
Sababu ni chakula cha kukaanga, chakula kisicho na chakula, chakula kilichosafishwa, na aina zote za mchanganyiko wa chakula uliochanganyikiwa.
Wote mama na mtoto wanahitaji lishe nzuri.
• Colic katika formula-kulishwa watoto kwa chakula aliyopewa mtoto. Inaweza kuwa maziwa,
Ngano, soya, au sukari kwenye formula. Ikiwezekana, badala ya maziwa ya mbuzi yenye utajiri wa vitamini.
Pia jaribu kumfanya mama aanze kunyonyesha mtoto. Hata kama hakuanza kufanya
Ni baada ya kujifungua, anaweza, kwa bidii, kuanza mtiririko baadaye. Hii inafanywa na
Jaribio la mara kwa mara la kumlisha mtoto zaidi ya miezi kadhaa.
• Ikiwa mtoto mchanga amelishwa chupa, kwa lishe iliyoongezwa kwa wakati huu unaweza kumwaga kuchemsha
maji juu ya flakes za ngano, kuyafuta; Waweke kupitia ungo; na ongeza soya
Maziwa, ili kuileta kwa msimamo uliohitajika. Mchuzi wa potasiamu na gruel ya oatmeal pia ni
inasaidia.
• Ikiwa colic inakua baada ya kuchoka imeanza, chakula kipya ndio shida. Mtoto lazima
kupewa vyakula sahihi na chakula kipya kipya kinapaswa kuongezwa kwa wakati mmoja, ili mtoto mchanga aweze
kufuatiliwa kwa uangalifu kwa colic, upele, au athari zingine.
• Bidhaa za ngano na maziwa ni mtuhumiwa haswa. Unapokuwa na shaka, uwaondoe kwanza.
Ngano na nafaka zingine mara nyingi huletwa mapema sana. Lakini hii inaweza kusababisha mtoto
Baadaye kuendeleza ugonjwa wa celiac, ambao utamuathiri katika maisha yote (ona "ugonjwa wa celiac").
Mtoto hana Enzymes ya kumengenya kushughulikia nafaka hadi miezi 5-6. Acha
Nafaka kuwa moja ya vyakula vya mwisho vilivyoletwa, na usipe mkate wa chachu hadi baada ya mwaka
mzee.
• Toa maziwa safi, ya kuchemshwa, ya mbuzi; Ni chini ya shida.
• Weka diaries za lishe na upime upimaji, ili kujua vyakula vya kukosea (angalia "mtihani wa kunde").
• Inaweza kusaidia kutoa enzymes za kongosho (75-200 mg mara tatu kwa siku) kabla ya milo
(Enzymes inaweza kuwa ya kuvimbiwa), mafuta ya kitani (matone 1-2) baada ya kila mlo, na vitamini B
6
(10 mg mara mbili kwa siku).
-Unaona "Colic kwa watoto."

title: Teething
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Massage the baby's gums, beginning before the teeth appear. Wrap a piece of clean
gauze around your finger, and rub the gums gently. This removes bacteria and gets him
used to having your finger in his mouth.
• Place teething rings in the refrigerator and then, when cold, give them to him to mouth.
This feels good on the gums. If the baby is 6 months or more old, a clean, cold, washcloth
does well.
• Wrap a piece of cold apple in a wet child-size washcloth, and let the infant mash on it to
help his gums.
SYMPTOMS—The baby's gums become swollen and tender, and he becomes irritable and restless.
Teething has begun!
CAUSES—An infant's teeth begin developing months before birth. In fact, the buds begin appearing in
the fetus by the fifth or sixth week of pregnancy!
All 20 teeth will begin coming through over two and a half years following birth, beginning about 4-8
months of age.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mafuta ufizi wa mtoto, kuanza kabla ya meno kuonekana. Funga kipande cha safi
Gauze karibu na kidole chako, na kusugua ufizi kwa upole. Hii huondoa bakteria na kumpata
Kutumika kuwa na kidole chako kinywani mwake.
• Weka pete kwenye jokofu na kisha, wakati baridi, wape kinywani.
Hii inahisi vizuri kwenye ufizi. Ikiwa mtoto ni miezi 6 au zaidi, safi, baridi, nguo ya kunawa
inafanya vizuri.
• Funga kipande cha apple baridi kwenye kitambaa cha mvua cha ukubwa wa watoto, na acha watoto wachanga juu yake
Saidia ufizi wake.
Dalili -Ufizi wa mtoto huwa kuvimba na zabuni, na yeye huwa hachukii na hana utulivu.
Tething imeanza!
Sababu - meno ya mtoto mchanga huanza kukuza miezi kabla ya kuzaliwa. Kwa kweli, buds zinaanza kuonekana ndani
Fetus na wiki ya tano au ya sita ya ujauzito!
Meno yote 20 yataanza kupitia zaidi ya miaka miwili na nusu kufuatia kuzaliwa, kuanza kama 4-8
miezi ya umri.

title: Neonatal Jaundice
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• If the baby is breast-fed more frequently, the bowel movements will carry bilirubin out
of the body faster. One research team found that the 3-4 hour feedings, recommended by
many hospitals, is incorrect; the feedings should be every 2 hours, in order to reduce
bilirubin levels.
• Activated charcoal is very helpful in lowering bilirubin levels. Stir 2-3 teaspoons
powdered charcoal into a little water, and give with a nipple. Beginning at 4 hours of age,
give it every two hours, for 120 hours in normal newborns, 168 hours in premature infants
or until bilirubin levels fall.
• Exposure to sunlight helps reduce bilirubin levels. It can fall on the infant a little through
the window or he can be taken outside. Do not let direct sunlight enter his eyes, but let it
fall on as much bare skin as possible. Of course, be careful and do not sunburn him.
SYMPTOMS—A yellowing of the skin is seen in the infant, appearing first in the upper body and
progressing downward toward the toes. In the full-term normal baby, it is first seen about the third day;
and, by the fifth day, it is disappearing. In a pre-term infant, jaundice may appear later, but last longer.
CAUSES—Jaundice is probably the most common disorder in newborn babies. Old blood is broken
down, by the liver, into bilirubin, a yellowish pigment. But when too much is made, the excess is
dumped into the bloodstream and is deposited in tissues for temporary storage. About a fifth of infants
have this, to one extent or another.
"Breast milk jaundice" occurs in about 3% of infants. Peak levels of bilirubin do not occur until the tenth
or fifteenth day, and may not return to normal for 12 weeks. But do not stop breast-feeding during this
time.
If the baby has prolonged jaundice, have a thyroid check done; he might have a tendency toward
hypothyroidism (which see).
Certain drugs given to the mother during pregnancy, labor, delivery, and breast-feeding can lead to
neonatal jaundice. This includes sulfonamides, hydrocortisone, Valium, Orinase, Gentamicin, thiazide
diuretics, and oral contraceptives.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ikiwa mtoto ananyonyesha mara nyingi, harakati za matumbo zitabeba bilirubin nje
ya mwili haraka. Timu moja ya utafiti iligundua kuwa malisho ya masaa 3-4, yaliyopendekezwa na
Hospitali nyingi, sio sahihi; malisho yanapaswa kuwa kila masaa 2, ili kupunguza
Viwango vya bilirubin.
• Mkaa ulioamilishwa unasaidia sana katika kupunguza viwango vya bilirubini. Koroga vijiko 2-3
Mkaa uliowekwa ndani ya maji kidogo, na toa na chuchu. Kuanzia saa 4 za umri,
Toa kila masaa mawili, kwa masaa 120 katika watoto wachanga wa kawaida, masaa 168 kwa watoto wachanga mapema
au mpaka viwango vya bilirubin vianguke.
• Mfiduo wa jua husaidia kupunguza viwango vya bilirubini. Inaweza kuanguka juu ya mtoto mchanga kupitia
Dirisha au anaweza kuchukuliwa nje. Usiruhusu jua moja kwa moja liingie macho yake, lakini wacha
Kuanguka juu ya ngozi wazi iwezekanavyo. Kwa kweli, kuwa mwangalifu na usimchoma moto.
Dalili -njano ya ngozi huonekana katika mtoto mchanga, ikionekana kwanza kwenye mwili wa juu na
Kuendelea kushuka kuelekea vidole. Katika mtoto wa kawaida wa kawaida, inaonekana kwanza juu ya siku ya tatu;
Na, kwa siku ya tano, inapotea. Katika mtoto mchanga wa kabla, Jaundice anaweza kuonekana baadaye, lakini hudumu kwa muda mrefu.
Sababu -Jalada labda ni shida ya kawaida katika watoto wachanga. Damu ya zamani imevunjwa
Chini, na ini, ndani ya bilirubin, rangi ya manjano. Lakini wakati mengi yanafanywa, ziada ni
Kutupwa ndani ya damu na huwekwa kwenye tishu kwa uhifadhi wa muda. Karibu ya tano ya watoto wachanga
kuwa na hii, kwa kiwango kimoja au kingine.
"Maziwa ya maziwa" hufanyika katika karibu 3% ya watoto wachanga. Viwango vya kilele vya bilirubin havifanyi hadi ya kumi
au siku ya kumi na tano, na inaweza kurudi kawaida kwa wiki 12. Lakini usiache kunyonyesha wakati huu
wakati.
Ikiwa mtoto ameongeza manjano ya muda mrefu, fanya ukaguzi wa tezi umefanywa; Anaweza kuwa na tabia ya kuelekea
hypothyroidism (ambayo huona).
Dawa fulani zilizopewa mama wakati wa ujauzito, kazi, kujifungua, na kunyonyesha kunaweza kusababisha
Neonatal Jaundice. Hii ni pamoja na sulfonamides, hydrocortisone, valium, orinase, gentamicin, thiazide
Diuretics, na uzazi wa mpango mdomo.

title: Infantile Convulsions
contentEn:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., Formulas)
BASIC ASPECTS—Regulate diet, withholding meats and all indigestibles. Avoid cow's milk if curds
are present in the stools. Daily Cold Bath, Wet Hand Rub, or Cold Towel Rub.
GENERAL CARE—When due to autointoxication from intestinal irritation, give a large Hot Enema.
For immediate relief, Hot Blanket Pack; Warm Bath, at 950-980 F., for 1-2 minutes. If not quickly
relieved, remove from bath and employ Cold Pail Pour to head and spine. Alternate Hot and Cold Pail
Pour, if necessary. Apply Hot Abdominal Pack, changing every 4 hours.
contentSw:
(J.H. Kellogg, M.D., formula)
Vipengee vya msingi -kudhibiti lishe, kuzuia nyama na vitu vyote. Epuka maziwa ya ng'ombe ikiwa curds
wapo kwenye viti. Umwagaji baridi wa kila siku, kusugua kwa mkono wa mvua, au kitambaa baridi.
Utunzaji wa jumla -wakati kwa sababu ya autointOxication kutoka kwa kuwasha matumbo, toa enema kubwa ya moto.
Kwa misaada ya haraka, pakiti ya blanketi moto; Bafu ya joto, saa 950-980 F., kwa dakika 1-2. Ikiwa sio haraka
Kuondolewa, ondoa kutoka kwa kuoga na kuajiri baridi ya kumwaga kwa kichwa na mgongo. Njia mbadala ya moto na baridi
Mimina, ikiwa ni lazima. Omba pakiti ya tumbo moto, ukibadilisha kila masaa 4.

BASIC FACTORS—Withdraw all food; Hot Blanket Pack till skin is reddened, follow by Cold Mitten

water drinking; large Warm Enema.
—Also see "Cholera,"

Sababu za msingi -bila chakula cha chakula; Pakiti ya blanketi moto mpaka ngozi iwe nyekundu, kufuata na mitten baridi

title: Sudden Infant Death Syndrome
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Give careful attention to each of the above factors.
• Both the mother and child should receive nourishing food. If the infant is breast-fed, the
mother's diet should be excellent; if the baby is bottle-fed, then, if possible, fresh boiled
goat's milk should be used. Mothers should nurse their babies, if at all possible.
• Locate allergenic foods and eliminate them.
• The mother should avoid chemicals, drugs, and junk food during and after pregnancy.
Even aspirin is not good (it interferes with blood clotting, and could damage the fetus).
• Do not use caffeine, alcohol, or tobacco; they harm the unborn child, so it does not
develop properly.
(SIDS)
SYMPTOMS—The infant suddenly dies.
CAUSES—There is no advance warning or symptom. That is what it is called "sudden infant death
syndrome." The central nervous system is affected, which in turn suppresses the involuntary act of
breathing.
Each year, in the United States, there are 10,000 deaths from this problem. SIDS primarily occurs in the
winter, primarily to underweight babies from poor families, and the mothers are generally under 20.
Several possible causes have been traced:
There may be high blood levels of the toxic mineral, lead. It has been reported that there are high levels
of lead in infants who die of SIDS.
Suffocation may be the cause. It has been found that infants who were laid on their stomachs, to go to
sleep, are much more likely to suddenly die than infants who are laid on their backs.
Breast-fed babies are less susceptible to SIDS. In addition, they have less allergies, respiratory diseases,
hypoglycemia, obesity, and gastroenteritis.
It is now known that SIDS can be caused by the pertussis vaccine, which is given to infants at 2, 4, and 6
months of age.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Toa uangalifu kwa kila moja ya mambo hapo juu.
• Mama na mtoto wanapaswa kupokea chakula chenye lishe. Ikiwa mtoto mchanga ananyonyesha,
Lishe ya mama inapaswa kuwa bora; Ikiwa mtoto amelishwa chupa, basi, ikiwezekana, safi ya kuchemshwa
Maziwa ya mbuzi yanapaswa kutumiwa. Akina mama wanapaswa kuwanyonyesha watoto wao, ikiwa inawezekana.
• Tafuta vyakula vya mzio na uwaondoe.
• Mama anapaswa kuzuia kemikali, dawa za kulevya, na chakula kisicho na chakula wakati wa ujauzito wakati na baada ya ujauzito.
Hata aspirini sio nzuri (inaingilia damu, na inaweza kuharibu fetusi).
• Usitumie kafeini, pombe, au tumbaku; Wanamdhuru mtoto ambaye hajazaliwa, kwa hivyo haifanyi
kuendeleza vizuri.
(Sids)
Dalili -Mtoto hufa ghafla.
Sababu -Hakuna onyo la mapema au dalili. Hiyo ndivyo inaitwa "kifo cha watoto wachanga ghafla
Dalili. "Mfumo mkuu wa neva umeathirika, ambao kwa upande wake unakandamiza kitendo cha hiari cha
kupumua.
Kila mwaka, huko Merika, kuna vifo 10,000 kutoka kwa shida hii. SIDS kimsingi hufanyika katika
Baridi, haswa kwa watoto wazima kutoka kwa familia masikini, na mama kwa ujumla ni chini ya miaka 20.
Sababu kadhaa zinazowezekana zimepatikana:
Kunaweza kuwa na viwango vya juu vya damu ya madini yenye sumu, risasi. Imeripotiwa kuwa kuna viwango vya juu
ya risasi kwa watoto wachanga ambao hufa na Sids.
Kutosheleza kunaweza kuwa sababu. Imegundulika kuwa watoto wachanga ambao walikuwa wamewekwa juu ya tumbo lao, kwenda
Kulala, wana uwezekano mkubwa wa kufa ghafla kuliko watoto wachanga ambao wamewekwa migongoni mwao.
Watoto walio na matiti hawapatikani na SIDS. Kwa kuongezea, wana mzio mdogo, magonjwa ya kupumua,
Hypoglycemia, fetma, na gastroenteritis.
Inajulikana sasa kuwa SIDS inaweza kusababishwa na chanjo ya pertussis, ambayo hupewa watoto wachanga saa 2, 4, na 6
miezi ya umri.

title: Colic In Children
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Put into bed, and give warm catnip tea in a bottle.

SYMPTOMS—The child cries out, pulls the knees up to the stomach, and has a distended stomach. His
stomach and/or intestines hurt.

food or constipation. Indigestion is the most frequent cause.

title: Ringworm
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Vitamins A, E, and zinc are important.
• Put plantain and castor oil on the affected area.
• Place ultraviolet light on the area for at least 6 minutes a day. This can be sunlight, or a
sunlamp. Never place a sunlamp closer than 18 inches from the skin.
• Apply apple cider vinegar to the area several times a day.
• Equally useful is castor oil, goldenseal tea, and borax. Rub the area with borax and with
castor oil.
• A 3-day citrus fast is very helpful, cleansing the bowels daily. Follow this with a
nutritious diet.
• Eat plenty of garlic. Put raw garlic over the ringworm and cover. You can also use black
walnut extract. Wash the area with garlic juice or wormwood.
• Place freshly cut garlic 3 times a day on the area. This is a very good remedy. Blend the
garlic with a little water and apply as a soak, compress, or poultice. But this remedy is too
powerful to apply to raw flesh between the toes; it can burn lower layers of skin.
• Take 2 chaparral or wormwood capsules daily.
• The scalp can be shampooed with tar soap and borax. Moisten the area every morning
and evening with goldenseal (1 teaspoon) and myrrh (½ teaspoon), which has been
steeped in a pint of boiling water.
• An herb tea can also be taken internally: goldenseal or plantain, twice a day.
• Make a salve from equal parts of burdock root, chaparral, wormwood, and chickweed;
apply to the area. Some of it can also be made into a tea to drink in order to fight the
fungus internally.
• Keep the skin clean and dry. Ringworm likes damp skin. Take frequent baths, but dry
thoroughly each time. Rub briskly with a towel, to remove the outer dead layers of skin
that the ringworm initially attacks.
• Do not scratch. Keep fingernails cut short, to lessen accidental scratching and spreading
of the infection.
• To remove crusts, soak the area in a saline solution. An alternate method is to apply
moist cloths for 10-15 minutes, 3 times a day.
• To treat nails: Pare and scrape the infected area, and try to remove as much of the loose
material beneath the nails. Apply vinegar with a Q-tip twice a day. Keep at it, even though
it may require months to eliminate. Fungus of the nails is the slowest to conquer.
—Also see "Athlete's Foot," which is a type of ringworm fungus.
SYMPTOMS—Small, flat, red, slightly elevated ring or oval-shaped sores, which may be crusted, dry,
scaly, or moist. The centers of the sores heal as the sores spread outward. The result is an infected ring.
Itching, burning, or pain may be present. The lesions appear to be circular. The area is often covered
with small blisters.
When the scalp is affected, the hair falls out in circular patches. The fingers can also be affected.
CAUSES—Ringworm is a very contagious disease, caused by a parasitic fungus. It can infect children
or adults, and is caused by unsanitary conditions. Keep the hands clean! Pet the dog and then rub your
face, and you may regret it.
Ringworm of the beard (face) is more persistent than ringworm of the scalp. Ringworm of the body is
the easiest to eliminate.
Dogs, cats, rabbits, children, and contaminated clothing are generally the carriers of the disease.
There are several different types of ringworm, all of which are of fungal origin:
Ringworm of the scalp - This can be on the scalp, face, and on the nails, is the most noticeable kind. It is
highly contagious, and often found on school-children. It frequently induces baldness, which may
become permanent if hair shafts are destroyed by the fungus.
Ringworm of the trunk - This includes “jockey itch,” and is spread by contact with people or their
clothing. Dogs and cats can also spread it.
Ringworm of the nails - This consists of a fungus growing under the nails. It produces thickened,
misshapen, brittle, discolored, chalky, pitted, or grooved nails. The nails can either be on the hands or
the feet. This type of ringworm is quite difficult to eliminate.
Ringworm of the feet - This is also known as athlete's foot (see "Athlete's Foot").
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Vitamini A, E, na zinki ni muhimu.
• Weka mafuta ya mmea na mafuta kwenye eneo lililoathiriwa.
• Weka taa ya ultraviolet kwenye eneo hilo kwa angalau dakika 6 kwa siku. Hii inaweza kuwa jua, au a
jua. Kamwe usiweke jua karibu na inchi 18 kutoka kwa ngozi.
• Omba siki ya apple cider kwenye eneo hilo mara kadhaa kwa siku.
• Vivyo muhimu ni mafuta ya castor, chai ya dhahabu, na borax. Kusugua eneo hilo na Borax na na
Mafuta ya Castor.
• Maji ya siku 3 ya kufunga ni ya kusaidia sana, kusafisha matumbo kila siku. Fuata hii na a
lishe yenye lishe.
• Kula vitunguu vingi. Weka vitunguu mbichi juu ya pete na kifuniko. Unaweza pia kutumia nyeusi
dondoo ya walnut. Osha eneo hilo na juisi ya vitunguu au minyoo.
• Weka vitunguu vipya mara 3 kwa siku kwenye eneo hilo. Hii ni suluhisho nzuri sana. Mchanganyiko wa
Vitunguu na maji kidogo na kutumika kama loweka, compress, au poultice. Lakini tiba hii ni pia
nguvu ya kuomba kwa mwili mbichi kati ya vidole; Inaweza kuchoma tabaka za chini za ngozi.
• Chukua vidonge 2 vya chaparral au minyoo kila siku.
• Scalp inaweza kufunikwa na sabuni ya tar na borax. Dawa ya eneo kila asubuhi
na jioni na Goldenseal (kijiko 1) na manemane (kijiko cha ½), ambayo imekuwa
Imejaa kwenye pint ya maji ya kuchemsha.
• Chai ya mimea pia inaweza kuchukuliwa ndani: Goldenseal au Plantain, mara mbili kwa siku.
• Tengeneza salve kutoka sehemu sawa za mizizi ya burdock, chaparral, mnyoo, na kuku;
Omba kwa eneo hilo. Baadhi yake inaweza pia kufanywa kuwa chai ya kunywa ili kupigana na
Kuvu ndani.
• Weka ngozi safi na kavu. Ringworm inapenda ngozi ya unyevu. Chukua bafu za mara kwa mara, lakini kavu
kabisa kila wakati. Kusugua kwa kitambaa na kitambaa, kuondoa tabaka za nje za ngozi
kwamba minyoo ya kwanza inashambulia.
• Usiwe na mwanzo. Weka vidole vilivyokatwa fupi, ili kupunguza mwanzo wa bahati mbaya na kueneza
ya maambukizi.
• Kuondoa miamba, loweka eneo hilo katika suluhisho la saline. Njia mbadala ni kutumika
Vitambaa vyenye unyevu kwa dakika 10-15, mara 3 kwa siku.
• Kutibu misumari: pare na chaka eneo lililoambukizwa, na jaribu kuondoa mengi ya huru
nyenzo chini ya kucha. Omba siki na ncha ya Q mara mbili kwa siku. Endelea, ingawa
Inaweza kuhitaji miezi kuondoa. Kuvu ya kucha ni polepole kushinda.
-Unaona "Mguu wa Mwanariadha," ambayo ni aina ya kuvu.
Dalili-ndogo, gorofa, nyekundu, pete iliyoinuliwa kidogo au vidonda vyenye umbo la mviringo, ambayo inaweza kuwa kavu, kavu,
Scaly, au unyevu. Vituo vya vidonda huponya wakati vidonda vinaenea nje. Matokeo yake ni pete iliyoambukizwa.
Kuwasha, kuchoma, au maumivu kunaweza kuwapo. Vidonda vinaonekana kuwa mviringo. Sehemu hiyo mara nyingi hufunikwa
na malengelenge madogo.
Wakati ngozi imeathiriwa, nywele huanguka nje kwenye viraka vya mviringo. Vidole pia vinaweza kuathiriwa.
Sababu -Ringworm ni ugonjwa unaoambukiza sana, unaosababishwa na kuvu wa vimelea. Inaweza kuambukiza watoto
au watu wazima, na husababishwa na hali zisizo za kawaida. Weka mikono safi! Pet mbwa na kisha kusugua yako
uso, na unaweza kujuta.
Mbegu ya ndevu (uso) inaendelea zaidi kuliko minyoo ya ngozi. Minyoo ya mwili ni
rahisi kuondoa.
Mbwa, paka, sungura, watoto, na mavazi yaliyochafuliwa kwa ujumla ni wabebaji wa ugonjwa.
Kuna aina kadhaa tofauti za pete, ambazo zote ni za asili ya kuvu:
Mchoro wa ngozi - hii inaweza kuwa kwenye ngozi, uso, na kwenye misumari, ndio aina inayoonekana zaidi. Ni
inaambukiza sana, na mara nyingi hupatikana kwa watoto wa shule. Mara nyingi huchochea upara, ambayo inaweza
Kuwa wa kudumu ikiwa shafts za nywele zinaharibiwa na kuvu.
Minyoo ya shina - hii ni pamoja na "jockey itch," na inaenea kwa kuwasiliana na watu au wao
nguo. Mbwa na paka pia zinaweza kuieneza.
Minyoo ya kucha - hii ina kuvu inayokua chini ya kucha. Inazalisha unene,
Misshapen, brittle, discolored, chalky, pitted, au misumari iliyotiwa. Misumari inaweza kuwa mikononi au
miguu. Aina hii ya pete ni ngumu kabisa kuondoa.
Mchoro wa miguu - hii pia inajulikana kama mguu wa mwanariadha (ona "Mguu wa Mwanariadha").

title: Childhood Diseases
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Give a liquid diet in the acute stages, followed by fruits and vegetables later. Do not
suppress the fever with drugs. Use water therapy treatments, to help the body fight the
infection. The bowels must be kept open by means of herbal enemas and, if needed, herbal
laxatives.
• Treat the kidneys and bowels, so they can keep discharging toxins. Sweating therapy can
be used, to bring waste products out through the skin.
• Garlic is helpful, along with the fruit and vegetable juices, and herb teas.
• Vitamins A and C, with bioflavonoids, in abundant amounts is needed.
• Never, never, give aspirin to a child or youth who has a fever! It can lead to Reye's
disease (which see) which can cause irreversible coma or death.
• This is what happens: The child has a fever, and aspirin is given. There is improvement
for a day or two,—then a sudden turn for the worst, and coma or death follows.
—Also see "Reye's Syndrome."
SYMPTOMS—Fevers, rashes, coughs, sore throat, weakness, etc.
CAUSES—The childhood diseases include chicken pox, measles, mumps, German measles (rubella),
rheumatic fever, whooping cough, and scarlet fever (all of which see).
Most of these common childhood diseases are contracted by nearly all children. Some experience only
mild cough or cold while others have serious cases. A few receive permanent damage.
If the child is receiving excellent nutrition— exercise, rest, sunshine, fresh air, etc.—he is unlikely to
experience serious difficulty with these diseases. Louis Pasteur, developer of the germ theory of disease,
said, "The germ is nothing; it is the soil that matters." If the person is living a good life, the germ has a
hard time obtaining a foothold.
Avoid excess milk and carbohydrates, especially refined ones. Avoid sugar, fried food, and junk food.
Include vitamin and mineral supplements in a diet of fresh fruits and vegetables, whole grains, and
similar natural foods.
A well-fed child will usually be strong enough to resist the onslaught of childhood diseases. He may
contract them; but the case will not be serious, usually brief, and often mild.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Toa lishe ya kioevu katika hatua za papo hapo, ikifuatiwa na matunda na mboga baadaye. Usifanye
Kukandamiza homa na dawa. Tumia matibabu ya matibabu ya maji, kusaidia mwili kupigana na
maambukizi. Matumbo lazima yawe wazi kwa njia ya enemas ya mitishamba na, ikiwa inahitajika, mitishamba
Laxatives.
• Tibu figo na matumbo, ili waweze kuendelea kutoa sumu. Tiba ya jasho inaweza
kutumika, kuleta bidhaa taka nje kupitia ngozi.
• Vitunguu ni muhimu, pamoja na matunda na juisi za mboga, na chai ya mimea.
• Vitamini A na C, na bioflavonoids, kwa kiwango kikubwa inahitajika.
• Kamwe, kamwe, toa aspirini kwa mtoto au kijana ambaye ana homa! Inaweza kusababisha Reye
Ugonjwa (ambao unaona) ambao unaweza kusababisha kuharibika kwa kifo au kifo.
• Hii ndio hufanyika: Mtoto ana homa, na aspirini hupewa. Kuna uboreshaji
Kwa siku moja au mbili, - zamu ya ghafla kwa mbaya zaidi, na fahamu au kifo hufuata.
-Unaona "Dalili ya Reye."
Dalili -pevers, upele, kikohozi, koo, udhaifu, nk.
Sababu - Magonjwa ya utoto ni pamoja na pox ya kuku, surua, matundu, surua za Ujerumani (rubella),
Homa ya rheumatic, kikohozi cha kulia, na homa nyekundu (yote ambayo yanaona).
Magonjwa mengi ya kawaida ya utotoni yanaambukizwa na karibu watoto wote. Baadhi ya uzoefu tu
Kikohozi laini au baridi wakati wengine wana kesi kubwa. Wachache hupokea uharibifu wa kudumu.
Ikiwa mtoto anapokea lishe bora- mazoezi, kupumzika, jua, hewa safi, nk. Haiwezekani
Pata ugumu mkubwa na magonjwa haya. Louis Pasteur, msanidi programu wa nadharia ya magonjwa,
Alisema, "Kijidudu sio kitu; ni udongo ambao ni muhimu." Ikiwa mtu huyo anaishi maisha mazuri, kijidudu kina
Wakati mgumu kupata mshikamano.
Epuka maziwa ya ziada na wanga, haswa iliyosafishwa. Epuka sukari, chakula cha kukaanga, na chakula kisicho na chakula.
Jumuisha vitamini na virutubisho vya madini katika lishe ya matunda na mboga safi, nafaka nzima, na
vyakula vya asili sawa.
Mtoto aliye na chakula vizuri kawaida atakuwa na nguvu ya kutosha kupinga ugonjwa wa magonjwa ya utoto. Anaweza
mkataba wao; Lakini kesi hiyo haitakuwa kubwa, kawaida kwa kifupi, na mara nyingi ni laini.

title: Adenoids
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Do a 3-5 day fast on diluted citrus juices. Follow this with a careful diet.
• Three times a day, give herb teas such as red clover, sassafras, and burdock root.
• Gargle several times a day with goldenseal tea. Echinacea and myrrh are very good for
all glandular swellings.
— Also see "Tonsillitis" and "Childhood Diseases."
(Adenoid Hypertrophy)
SYMPTOMS—It hurts at the back of the child's throat. When he opens his mouth, the area of the
tonsils appears red and swollen.
CAUSES—What is commonly called adenoids is enlargement of the pharyngeal tonsil, which is a tissue
close to the tonsils. This infection frequently occurs in children.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Fanya siku 3-5 haraka kwenye juisi za machungwa zilizopunguzwa. Fuata hii na lishe makini.
• Mara tatu kwa siku, toa chai ya mimea kama vile Red Clover, Sassafras, na Mizizi ya Burdock.
• Piga mara kadhaa kwa siku na chai ya dhahabu. Echinacea na manemane ni nzuri sana kwa
Uvimbe wote wa glandular.
- Pia angalia "tonsillitis" na "magonjwa ya utoto."
(Hypertrophy ya adenoid)
Dalili -inaumiza nyuma ya koo la mtoto. Wakati anafungua mdomo wake, eneo la
Tonsils inaonekana nyekundu na kuvimba.
Sababu - Kile kinachoitwa adenoids kawaida ni upanuzi wa tonsil ya pharyngeal, ambayo ni tishu
karibu na tonsils. Maambukizi haya mara nyingi hufanyika kwa watoto.

title: Chickenpox
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Drink freshly made juices, with added protein powder and brewer's yeast. Drink
vegetable broth.
• When the fever drops and appetite returns, give mashed bananas and fresh raw
applesauce. Use a light fat-free, sugar-free, diet. You can give vitamin C to bowel
tolerance.
• Catnip tea, with a little molasses, is good during the fever. If the child is over two, catnip
tea enemas will help reduce the fever.
• The only real concern with childhood chickenpox is pock scarring. This may be
minimized by several simple baths and applications. And, of course, do not scratch.
• To avoid scratching the pocks, keep the child's nails short, to minimize spreading of the
infection. Have the child wear mittens or gloves, to avoid scratching—especially at night.
Instead of scratching, apply pressure to the area. Bathe him often.
• Relieve itching with calamine lotion, moist baking soda, or starch baths. Vitamin E oil
can be applied directly to each papule.
• A deep, warm, 15-minute bath at the onset of the disease will help the pox develop more
rapidly. Keep the head cool. Do not let him become chilled.
• Each day, give a tepid bath, followed by a change of clothes and linens. Protect against
chilling while bathing and other times. Chickenpox pneumonia can develop!
• Oatmeal baths are soothing, because they are alkaline. Put 1 pound of uncooked oatmeal
(or 1 heaping cup of uncooked rolled oats, ground fine, in a blender) in a bag made of 2
thicknesses of old sheeting. Soften it with hot water and then float it in the bathtub or hang
it, so the faucet will flow through it. You can use the bag to gently sponge the body. Pat
dry when finished; do not rub.
• If needed, mix 1 level teaspoon of salt with 1 pint (2 cups) of water, and gargle with it.
• Avoid constipation.
• If you contract chickenpox as an adult, go on a fasting program of fruit and vegetable
juices, interspersed with light meals.
• Keep the infected child away from newborn infants, elderly people, and pregnant
women. They may not have had chickenpox before.
• Do not send the child back to school until all lesions have finished being crusted.
• Antibiotics and corticosteroids do not help in any way, and should not be given.
• Do not give aspirin! About 10% of Reye's syndrome (which see) cases occur after
chickenpox, as a result of aspirin dosages. Reye's can cause irreversible coma or death.
(Varicella Zoster, Pox)
SYMPTOMS—Small, round pimples on the face and body, filled with fluid and appearing like water
blisters. As the fluid leaks, it forms a crust.
CAUSES—Chickenpox is a viral disease, which first manifests itself as a fever and headache, 7-21 days
after exposure. The eruptions continue in cycles from 3-7 days, and the disease generally runs its course
in 14 days. It is communicable 1-2 days before the rash develops, until all the blister-like lesions have
crusted (averaging 5-6 days).
Chickenpox mainly occurs between 2 and 8 years of age, and is much more severe if not contracted until
one is an adult. If a pregnant mother has it in the first four months of pregnancy, birth defects are
possible in the infant. Once you have had it, you generally have lifetime immunity. This is why
chickenpox vaccines are dangerous. It is better to get the disease as a child when it is relatively harmless
than to wait till adulthood to contract it.
Oddly enough, the same virus that causes chickenpox in children (varicella zoster) is the one which
causes shingles (which see) in adults.
Chickenpox is transmitted by contact and by airborne droplets. Epidemics tend to occur in the winter
and spring.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kunywa juisi mpya, na poda ya protini iliyoongezwa na chachu ya Brewer. Kunywa
mchuzi wa mboga.
• Wakati homa inashuka na hamu ya kurudi, toa ndizi zilizosokotwa na mbichi safi
applesauce. Tumia lishe isiyo na mafuta, isiyo na sukari, lishe. Unaweza kutoa vitamini C kwa matumbo
uvumilivu.
• Chai ya Catnip, iliyo na molasses kidogo, ni nzuri wakati wa homa. Ikiwa mtoto ni zaidi ya mbili, catnip
Enemas ya chai itasaidia kupunguza homa.
• Wasiwasi wa kweli na utoto wa kuku ni alama ya pock. Hii inaweza kuwa
kupunguzwa na bafu kadhaa rahisi na matumizi. Na, kwa kweli, usiwe na mwanzo.
• Ili kuzuia kung'oa vifurushi, kuweka kucha za mtoto mfupi, ili kupunguza kuenea kwa
maambukizi. Acha mtoto avae mittens au glavu, ili kuzuia kukwaruza -haswa usiku.
Badala ya kukwaruza, tumia shinikizo kwa eneo hilo. Oga mara nyingi.
• Punguza kuwasha na lotion ya jalada, soda ya kuoka yenye unyevu, au bafu za wanga. Mafuta ya Vitamini E.
inaweza kutumika moja kwa moja kwa kila papule.
• Bafu ya kina, ya joto, ya dakika 15 mwanzoni mwa ugonjwa itasaidia POX kukuza zaidi
haraka. Weka kichwa baridi. Usimruhusu apate baridi.
• Kila siku, toa bafu ya tepid, ikifuatiwa na mabadiliko ya nguo na taa. Kulinda dhidi ya
Chill wakati wa kuoga na nyakati zingine. Pneumonia ya kuku inaweza kukuza!
• Bafu za oatmeal ni za kupendeza, kwa sababu ni alkali. Weka paundi 1 ya oatmeal isiyopikwa
(au kikombe 1 cha kurusha cha oats isiyopikwa, faini ya ardhi, katika blender) kwenye begi iliyotengenezwa na 2
Unene wa karatasi ya zamani. Ila laini na maji ya moto na kisha uielekeze kwenye bafu au hutegemea
Ni, kwa hivyo bomba litapita kupitia hiyo. Unaweza kutumia begi kuiga kwa upole mwili. Pat
kavu ukimaliza; Usisugue.
• Ikiwa inahitajika, changanya kijiko 1 cha chumvi na pint 1 (vikombe 2) vya maji, na unganishe nayo.
• Epuka kuvimbiwa.
• Ikiwa unaandika kuku kama mtu mzima, nenda kwenye mpango wa kufunga wa matunda na mboga
Juisi, iliyoingizwa na milo nyepesi.
• Weka mtoto aliyeambukizwa mbali na watoto wachanga, wazee, na mjamzito
wanawake. Labda hawakuwa na kuku wa kuku hapo awali.
• Usimtumie mtoto kurudi shuleni hadi vidonda vyote vimemaliza kung'olewa.
• Dawa za kukinga na corticosteroids hazisaidii kwa njia yoyote, na haipaswi kupewa.
• Usitoe aspirini! Karibu 10% ya kesi za ugonjwa wa Reye (ambazo huona) hufanyika baada ya
Kuku, kama matokeo ya kipimo cha aspirini. Reye inaweza kusababisha fahamu isiyoweza kubadilika au kifo.
(Varicella Zoster, Pox)
Dalili -ndogo, pimples pande zote kwenye uso na mwili, zimejaa maji na kuonekana kama maji
malengelenge. Wakati maji yanavuja, hutengeneza kutu.
Sababu-Chickenpox ni ugonjwa wa virusi, ambao kwanza hujidhihirisha kama homa na maumivu ya kichwa, siku 7-21
baada kuwepo hatarini. Mlipuko huo unaendelea katika mizunguko kutoka siku 3-7, na ugonjwa kwa ujumla huendesha kozi yake
katika siku 14. Inaweza kuambukizwa siku 1-2 kabla ya upele kuanza, hadi vidonda vyote kama vya blister
kutu (wastani wa siku 5-6).
Kuku hufanyika kati ya miaka 2 hadi 8, na ni kali zaidi ikiwa haijashughulikiwa hadi
Mmoja ni mtu mzima. Ikiwa mama mjamzito anayo katika miezi nne ya kwanza ya ujauzito, kasoro za kuzaliwa ni
inawezekana katika mtoto mchanga. Mara tu umekuwa nayo, kwa ujumla una kinga ya maisha. Hii ndio sababu
Chanjo za kuku ni hatari. Ni bora kupata ugonjwa kama mtoto wakati haina madhara
kuliko kungojea hadi watu wazima ili kuiweka.
Kwa kawaida ya kutosha, virusi sawa ambavyo husababisha kuku kwa watoto (varicella zoster) ndio ndio
husababisha shingles (ambazo huona) kwa watu wazima.
KukuPox hupitishwa kwa mawasiliano na matone ya hewa. Epidemics huwa hufanyika wakati wa msimu wa baridi
na chemchemi.

title: Growing Pains
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Prevention of growing pains includes a solid nutritional program—rich in calcium,
magnesium, selenium, vitamins A, B-complex, E, and C.
SYMPTOMS—Pains in the joints, twitches in the legs, etc.
CAUSES—No, it is not a disease. Growing pains are a part of life in many homes, as the children grow
toward adulthood.
But growing pains are not necessary. If good food and proper vitamin/mineral supplementation are
provided, along with proper rest and an active exercise program, there is no need for "growing pains" to
occur.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kuzuia maumivu yanayokua ni pamoja na mpango thabiti wa lishe -utajiri katika kalsiamu,
Magnesiamu, Selenium, Vitamini A, B-Complex, E, na C.
Dalili -Mifupa kwenye viungo, twichi kwenye miguu, nk.
Sababu -Hapana, sio ugonjwa. Maumivu yanayokua ni sehemu ya maisha katika nyumba nyingi, watoto wanapokua
kuelekea watu wazima.
Lakini maumivu yanayokua sio lazima. Ikiwa chakula kizuri na nyongeza sahihi ya vitamini/madini ni
zinazotolewa, pamoja na kupumzika sahihi na programu ya mazoezi ya kazi, hakuna haja ya "maumivu yanayokua" kwa
kutokea.

title: Growth Problems
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Be sure and eat a well-balanced nourishing diet. Omit junk foods.
• Adequate amounts of protein are important, especially the amino acid, arginine. Arginine
is used to synthesize ornithine, an amino acid which prompts the pituitary to release its
growth hormone.
• Sources of arginine include coconut, oats, soybeans, walnuts, wheat, wheat germ, carob,
and dairy products.
• Growth hormone therapy can be prescribed by a physician, but it is marvelously
expensive.
• If a child's protein intake is reduced severely, he develops Kwashiorkor (which see), a
protein-deficiency disease. This condition can occur in any nation, not just India.
• Malabsorption disorders, such as celiac disease (which see), can also reduce growth
somewhat.
• Excess amounts of lead, a toxic metal, can produce growth problems.
SYMPTOMS—The child fails to grow properly in height.
CAUSES—The key to growth is the pituitary, the master gland, which is located in the center of the
skull. When it does not function properly, normal growth does not occur.
The pituitary gland produces the growth hormone, somatotropin, and sends it throughout the body, to
stimulate normal enlargement of bones and muscles in children.
Too little production of this hormone will produce dwarfism; too much results in abnormally enlarged
hands, feet, jaw, and possible gigantism.
The pituitary may not be functioning properly because of a tumor growing in, or near, it. But the thymus
gland may not be working properly, and that will affect a child's growth and increase the likelihood of
infection.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Hakikisha na kula lishe bora ya lishe. Omit vyakula vya junk.
• Kiasi cha kutosha cha protini ni muhimu, haswa asidi ya amino, arginine. Arginine
hutumiwa kutengenezea ornithine, asidi ya amino ambayo huchochea pituitary kutolewa yake
homoni ya ukuaji.
• Vyanzo vya arginine ni pamoja na nazi, oats, soya, walnuts, ngano, ngano ya ngano, carob,
na bidhaa za maziwa.
• Tiba ya ukuaji wa homoni inaweza kuamriwa na daktari, lakini ni ya kushangaza
ghali.
• Ikiwa ulaji wa protini ya mtoto umepunguzwa sana, yeye huendeleza Kwashiorkor (ambayo huona), a
Ugonjwa wa upungufu wa protini. Hali hii inaweza kutokea katika taifa lolote, sio India tu.
• Shida za Malabsorption, kama ugonjwa wa celiac (ambayo huona), pia inaweza kupunguza ukuaji
kiasi fulani.
• Kiwango cha ziada cha risasi, chuma chenye sumu, kinaweza kutoa shida za ukuaji.
Dalili -Mtoto hushindwa kukua vizuri kwa urefu.
Sababu - Ufunguo wa ukuaji ni eneo la tezi, tezi ya bwana, ambayo iko katikati ya
Fuvu. Wakati haifanyi kazi vizuri, ukuaji wa kawaida haufanyi.
Gland ya pituitary hutoa homoni ya ukuaji, somatotropin, na hutuma kwa mwili wote, kwa
Kuchochea upanuzi wa kawaida wa mifupa na misuli kwa watoto.
Uzalishaji mdogo sana wa homoni hii utazalisha ubaya; Matokeo mengi sana katika kupanuliwa kawaida
Mikono, miguu, taya, na gigantism inayowezekana.
Pituitary inaweza kuwa haifanyi kazi vizuri kwa sababu ya tumor inayokua ndani, au karibu,. Lakini thymus
tezi inaweza kuwa haifanyi kazi vizuri, na hiyo itaathiri ukuaji wa mtoto na kuongeza uwezekano wa
maambukizi.

title: Vaccination Problems
contentEn:
SYMPTOMS—Physical problems resulting from a vaccination.
DISCUSSION—This is a wide-ranging subject, too large to discuss in detail here. See the author's
book, The Vaccination Crisis, (see order sheet) for detailed discussions of the various vaccines, their
dangers, and how to avoid vaccination requirements.
The underlying problem is simple enough: We normally take substances into our body through our
stomach, where harmful bacteria are generally destroyed.
But a vaccine is injected into a muscle or directly into the bloodstream, thus bypassing the normal
protections. This is highly dangerous!
The problem is that it is impossible to purify the vaccines properly. It would require too much time and
expense to try to examine every microscopic portion, identify every toxin, poison, and microbe, and
eliminate the bad ones. It simply cannot be done.
So monkey pus and horse urine is "purified" somewhat, and then injected into your child.
The solution is to live right, eat right, and avoid vaccinations. See the author's book (or a similar
publication) for further information on vaccinations.
contentSw:
Dalili -Shida za kisaikolojia zinazotokana na chanjo.
Majadiliano-Hii ni somo pana, kubwa sana kujadili kwa undani hapa. Tazama mwandishi
Kitabu, Mgogoro wa Chanjo, (tazama Karatasi ya Agizo) kwa majadiliano ya kina ya chanjo mbali mbali, zao
hatari, na jinsi ya kuzuia mahitaji ya chanjo.
Shida ya msingi ni rahisi vya kutosha: kawaida tunachukua vitu ndani ya miili yetu kupitia yetu
tumbo, ambapo bakteria hatari kwa ujumla huharibiwa.
Lakini chanjo huingizwa ndani ya misuli au moja kwa moja kwenye damu, na hivyo kupitisha kawaida
ulinzi. Hii ni hatari sana!
Shida ni kwamba haiwezekani kusafisha chanjo vizuri. Itahitaji muda mwingi na
Gharama ya kujaribu kuchunguza kila sehemu ya microscopic, kutambua kila sumu, sumu, na microbe, na
Ondoa mbaya. Haiwezi kufanywa.
Kwa hivyo pus ya tumbili na mkojo wa farasi "umetakaswa" kwa kiasi fulani, na kisha kuingizwa ndani ya mtoto wako.
Suluhisho ni kuishi sawa, kula sawa, na epuka chanjo. Tazama kitabu cha mwandishi (au sawa
uchapishaji) kwa habari zaidi juu ya chanjo.

title: Venereal Diseases
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The only genuine protection is abstinence. Marry a person who never has, and never will
have, sex with another during your lifetime. Then both of you remain faithful to each
other to the end.
• As for condoms, a University of Texas research study proved that 30% of the time they
do not protect against AIDS.
• If you have one of these diseases, see your physician and/or follow the directions for
"Cancer" in this book.
(STD)
SYMPTOMS—Blisters around the vagina, burning when urinating, anal pain, itching, pelvic
inflammation, penile discharge, sore throat, flu-like symptoms, and more.
Chlamydia does not always have warning symptoms.
Here is a brief comparative analysis of the symptoms of nine of these STDs:
Chlamydia: In women—a burning sensation when urinating. A white vaginal discharge
resembling cottage cheese. Itching, painful intercourse. In men—a clear, watery, urethral
discharge. But often no symptoms at all.
Genital Herpes: Itching and burning in the genital area. Discomfort when urinating. A
watery vaginal or urethral discharge. Fluid-filled, weeping, eruptions in the vagina or on
the penis.
Genital Warts: Single or clustered, soft, cauliflower-like growths in and around the
vagina, anus, penis, groin, and/or scrotal area.
Pelvic Inflammatory Disease (PID): Fever and lower abdominal pain. A pus-filled vaginal
discharge.
Trichomoniasis: In women—a foamy, greenish or yellow, foul-smelling vaginal
discharge, vaginal itching, and pain. In men—a clear urethral discharge.
Syphilis: a sore on the genitals; accompanied by rash, fever, patches of flaking tissue; sore
throat; and sores in the mouth or anus.
Gonorrhea: In women—a cloudy vaginal discharge, frequent and painful urination,
vaginal itching. Inflammation of the pelvic area, rectal discharge, and abnormal uterine
bleeding. In men—a pus-filled, yellowish, discharge. Often there are no symptoms for
months. In women there may never be symptoms, yet all the while they are infecting men.
AIDS (Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome): Aids has many symptoms; see "AIDS."
CAUSES—Venereal diseases are transmitted by intimate contact, when at least one has had more than
one partner. STDs can cause urinary tract problems, sterility in women, and prostatic inflammation in
men.
At the present time, one teenage girl in four has a STD. Some of these diseases can kill newborn babies.
Chlamydia, which often shows little or no symptoms, can cause urinary tract infections and adhesions
which can result in sterility.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• The only genuine protection is abstinence. Marry a person who never has, and never will
Fanya, ngono na mwingine wakati wa maisha yako. Halafu nyinyi wawili mnabaki waaminifu kwa kila mmoja
Nyingine hadi mwisho.
• Kama kwa kondomu, Chuo Kikuu cha Utafiti wa Texas kilithibitisha kuwa 30% ya wakati wao
Usilinde dhidi ya UKIMWI.
• Ikiwa unayo moja ya magonjwa haya, angalia daktari wako na/au fuata maelekezo ya
"Saratani" katika kitabu hiki.
(Std)
Dalili -Wanahabari karibu na uke, kuchoma wakati wa kukojoa, maumivu ya anal, kuwasha, pelvic
Kuvimba, kutokwa kwa penile, koo, dalili za mafua, na zaidi.
Chlamydia huwa haina dalili za onyo kila wakati.
Hapa kuna uchambuzi mfupi wa kulinganisha wa dalili za magonjwa haya tisa:
Chlamydia: Katika wanawake - hisia za kuchoma wakati wa kukojoa. Kutokwa nyeupe kwa uke
Kufanana na jibini la Cottage. Kuwasha, kujuana kwa uchungu. Katika wanaume - wazi, maji, urethral
UCHAMBUZI. Lakini mara nyingi hakuna dalili kabisa.
Herpes ya sehemu ya siri: kuwasha na kuchoma katika eneo la sehemu ya siri. Usumbufu wakati wa mkojo. A
Maji ya uke au urethral. Kujazwa na maji, kulia, milipuko katika uke au kuendelea
uume.
Warts ya sehemu ya siri: moja au iliyounganishwa, laini, ukuaji wa kolifulawa-kama ndani na karibu na
Vagina, anus, uume, groin, na/au eneo kubwa.
Ugonjwa wa uchochezi wa pelvic (PID): homa na maumivu ya chini ya tumbo. Uke uliojazwa na pus
UCHAMBUZI.
Trichomoniasis: Katika wanawake-povu, kijani kibichi au manjano, yenye harufu mbaya
kutokwa, kuwasha uke, na maumivu. Kwa wanaume - kutokwa wazi kwa urethral.
Syphilis: kidonda juu ya sehemu za siri; ikifuatana na upele, homa, viraka vya tishu zinazowaka; kidonda
koo; na vidonda kinywani au anus.
Gonorrhea: Katika wanawake - kutokwa kwa mawingu ya uke, mkojo wa mara kwa mara na chungu,
kuwasha uke. Kuvimba kwa eneo la pelvic, kutokwa kwa rectal, na uterine usio wa kawaida
Kutokwa na damu. Katika wanaume-kujaza pus, manjano, kutokwa. Mara nyingi hakuna dalili za
miezi. Kwa wanawake kunaweza kuwa na dalili kamwe, lakini wakati wote wanaambukiza wanaume.
UKIMWI (ugonjwa wa upungufu wa kinga): UKIMWI una dalili nyingi; Tazama "UKIMWI."
Sababu -Magonjwa ya Venereal hupitishwa na mawasiliano ya karibu, wakati angalau mtu amekuwa na zaidi ya
mwenzi mmoja. STDS inaweza kusababisha shida ya njia ya mkojo, kuzaa kwa wanawake, na uchochezi wa kibofu katika
Wanaume.
Kwa wakati huu, msichana mmoja katika nne ana STD. Baadhi ya magonjwa haya yanaweza kuua watoto wachanga.
Chlamydia, ambayo mara nyingi inaonyesha dalili kidogo au hakuna, inaweza kusababisha maambukizo ya njia ya mkojo na wambiso
ambayo inaweza kusababisha kuzaa.

title: Gonorrhea
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• See your physician. Go on a cleansing program. Drink lots of lemon juice. A entire
changeover to a good diet and way of life is required. Follow the program outlined under
"Cancer."
• Go to bed as soon as you know you have this disease. Go on a cleansing program of fruit
juices. Take 2 high enemas a day,
• Here is a tea with which you can wash the sores: myrrh, goldenseal root, witch hazel,
chickweed, and sorrel.
• Drink 3 cups of this tea daily: skullcap, hops, white oak bark, uva ursi, sage, poplar, red
root, and juniper; take 2 high enemas each day.
• A tea of red raspberry leaves and witch hazel leaves can be used as a douche for women,
including after each urination.
• A tea of aloes, goldenseal, and myrrh can be washed on sores and ulcers.
• But keep in mind that all this work will be a waste of time if certain other lifestyle
changes are not made.
SYMPTOMS—In women, no symptoms may ever appear. When they do, it may include vaginal
discharge, frequent and painful urination, abnormal menstrual bleeding, acute inflammation in the pelvic
area, and rectal itching. Symptoms generally appear 7-14 days after sexual contact. In men, symptoms
are generally present, including difficult and painful urination, a yellow discharge of pus, and mucous
from the penis. Symptoms appear 2-14 days after contact. The discharge continues 6-8 weeks.
CAUSES—As with syphilis (which see), the effects of gonorrhea keep getting worse. The secondary
stage is difficult to detect and so is often misdiagnosed as arthritis. The gonorrhea is entering the bones,
joints, tendons, and other tissues, causing mild fever, aches, inflamed joints, and sometimes skin lesions.
In men, the outcome can be sterility.
As long as 10 years later, the urethra may narrow or stricture, making urination difficult and at times
impossible. This produces serious inflammation of the bladder. This occurs more often in men than in
women.
Women, who unknowingly contract gonorrhea from their husbands, generally do not know they have the
disease until it is far advanced. The infection can travel up the uterus, into the Fallopian tubes, and out
into the abdominal cavity, causing peritonitis and possibly death. If that does not occur, then the tubes
may eventually seal off due to the infection, causing sterility and pus pockets which cause pain and
infection.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Tazama daktari wako. Nenda kwenye mpango wa utakaso. Kunywa maji mengi ya limao. Nzima
Mabadiliko ya lishe nzuri na njia ya maisha inahitajika. Fuata mpango ulioainishwa chini
"Saratani."
• Nenda kulala mara tu unapojua una ugonjwa huu. Nenda kwenye mpango wa utakaso wa matunda
juisi. Chukua enemas 2 za juu kwa siku,
• Hapa kuna chai ambayo unaweza kuosha vidonda: manemane, mizizi ya dhahabu, hazel ya mchawi,
Chini, na Sorrel.
• Kunywa vikombe 3 vya chai hii kila siku: fuvu, hops, gome nyeupe ya mwaloni, uva ursi, sage, poplar, nyekundu
mzizi, na juniper; Chukua enemas 2 za juu kila siku.
• Chai ya majani nyekundu ya raspberry na majani ya wachawi yanaweza kutumika kama douche kwa wanawake,
pamoja na baada ya kila mkojo.
• Chai ya aloi, dhahabu, na manemane inaweza kuoshwa kwenye vidonda na vidonda.
• Lakini kumbuka kuwa kazi hii yote itakuwa kupoteza muda ikiwa mtindo mwingine wa maisha
mabadiliko hayafanywa.
Dalili -kwa wanawake, hakuna dalili zinazoweza kuonekana. Wakati zinafanya, inaweza kujumuisha uke
kutokwa, mkojo wa mara kwa mara na chungu, kutokwa damu kwa hedhi isiyo ya kawaida, kuvimba kwa papo hapo kwenye pelvic
eneo, na kuwasha rectal. Dalili kwa ujumla huonekana siku 7-14 baada ya mawasiliano ya kijinsia. Katika wanaume, dalili
kwa ujumla zipo, pamoja na mkojo ngumu na wenye uchungu, kutokwa kwa manjano kwa pus, na mucous
kutoka kwa uume. Dalili zinaonekana siku 2-14 baada ya mawasiliano. Kutokwa kunaendelea wiki 6-8.
Sababu -Kama ilivyo kwa syphilis (ambayo huona), athari za kisonono zinaendelea kuwa mbaya. Sekondari
Hatua ni ngumu kugundua na kwa hivyo mara nyingi hutambuliwa vibaya kama ugonjwa wa arthritis. Gonorrhea inaingia kwenye mifupa,
Viungo, tendons, na tishu zingine, na kusababisha homa kali, maumivu, viungo vilivyochomwa, na wakati mwingine vidonda vya ngozi.
Katika wanaume, matokeo yanaweza kuwa ya kuzaa.
Kwa muda mrefu kama miaka 10 baadaye, urethra inaweza kuwa nyembamba au madhubuti, na kufanya mkojo kuwa mgumu na wakati mwingine
haiwezekani. Hii hutoa uchochezi mkubwa wa kibofu cha mkojo. Hii hufanyika mara nyingi zaidi kwa wanaume kuliko
wanawake.
Wanawake, ambao bila kujua huandika kisonono kutoka kwa waume zao, kwa ujumla hawajui wanayo
Ugonjwa mpaka uwe wa juu zaidi. Maambukizi yanaweza kusafiri kwa uterasi, ndani ya mirija ya fallopian, na nje
ndani ya tumbo la tumbo, na kusababisha peritonitis na labda kifo. Ikiwa hiyo haifanyi, basi zilizopo
inaweza hatimaye kuziba kwa sababu ya maambukizi, na kusababisha kuzaa na mifuko ya pus ambayo husababisha maumivu na
maambukizi.

title: Syphilis
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• See your physician. Go on the treatment outlined under "Cancer" in this book.
• Helpful herbs include goldenseal, pau d'arco, echinacea, and suma. But a thorough
cleansing and building program, such as is explained under "Cancer," is needed.
SYMPTOMS—A chancre appears on the skin, either on the mouth, in the mouth, or on the genitals. It
is also called a hard chancre or Hunterian sore. This is a red, painless, raised ulcer with hard, well-
defined edges, and appears 10 days to 3 weeks after exposure, and lasts from a few days to several
weeks. In women, it sometimes develops on the cervix and so is not recognized.
Later, a rash and patches of flaking tissue appear in the mouth or genital area. This skin eruption consists
of either a few red, pimply, blemishes or a profuse crop of various types of blotches. By this time, the
disease is well-established throughout the system.
Later stages occur, as the disease worsens. Paralysis, insanity, and death are the final outcome.
CAUSES—Syphilis is caused by the germ, treponema pallidum, which is corkscrew in shape and much
larger than most bacteria. Drying quickly kills the germs, so they must remain wet; they generally enter
the body through a living source—another person (acquired syphilis) or through the placenta to the
unborn child (congenital syphilis). But, in some instances, it has been transmitted to the dentist during
dental work.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Tazama daktari wako. Endelea matibabu yaliyoainishwa chini ya "saratani" kwenye kitabu hiki.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na Goldenseal, Pau d'Arco, Echinacea, na Suma. Lakini kamili
Programu ya utakaso na ujenzi, kama inavyofafanuliwa chini ya "Saratani," inahitajika.
Dalili -Chancre huonekana kwenye ngozi, iwe juu ya mdomo, kinywani, au kwenye sehemu za siri. IT
pia huitwa chancre ngumu au kidonda cha Hunterian. Hii ni kidonda nyekundu, kisicho na uchungu, kilichoinuliwa na ngumu, vizuri-
kingo zilizofafanuliwa, na zinaonekana siku 10 hadi wiki 3 baada ya kufichuliwa, na hudumu kutoka siku chache hadi kadhaa
wiki. Katika wanawake, wakati mwingine hukua kwenye kizazi na kwa hivyo haitambuliwi.
Baadaye, upele na viraka vya tishu zinazoonekana huonekana kinywani au eneo la sehemu ya siri. Mlipuko huu wa ngozi una
ya nyekundu nyekundu, pimply, alama au mazao mengi ya aina anuwai ya blotches. Kufikia wakati huu,
Ugonjwa umeundwa vizuri katika mfumo wote.
Hatua za baadaye hufanyika, wakati ugonjwa unazidi. Kupooza, ujinga, na kifo ndio matokeo ya mwisho.
Sababu -Syphilis husababishwa na germ, Treponema Pallidum, ambayo ni corkscrew katika sura na mengi
kubwa kuliko bakteria wengi. Kukausha huua haraka vijidudu, kwa hivyo lazima zibaki mvua; Kwa ujumla huingia
mwili kupitia chanzo hai - mtu mwingine (aliyepatikana syphilis) au kupitia placenta hadi
mtoto ambaye hajazaliwa (syphilis ya kuzaliwa). Lakini, katika visa vingine, imepitishwa kwa daktari wa meno wakati wa
kazi ya meno.

title: Chlamydia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• This is a complicated disease; see your physician.
• If you wish to supplement such care with natural remedies, you will need to undergo a
thorough natural healing program, such as is detailed in the article on "Cancer."
SYMPTOMS—Vaginal or urethral discharge, genital inflammation, difficulty in urinating, itching
around the inflamed area, and painful intercourse.
CAUSES—According to the CDC, more people in America contract Chlamydia than any other sexually
transmitted disease. Over 4 million new cases are diagnosed yearly. Nearly 20% of teenagers in the
United States are known to have contracted it. But these figures do not include the large number that are
not reported. Nearly 10% of men and 70% of women who have chlamydia—have no symptoms. So one
can expect that the total number having, and sharing, this highly contagious disease is vast indeed.
But, whether recognized or not, the effects of chlamydia are serious. About 30% of the women become
sterile and pelvic inflammatory disease and other reproductive problems can, and do, result. In young
women, the disease can also produce a form of arthritis.
In men, prostate infection and seminal vesicle inflammation may occur later. (Symptoms of prostatitis
include pain when urinating and a watery mucous urethral discharge.)
The disease is transmitted through the discharge produced by both men and women. If one spouse is
treated for this, the other one must be also.
To delay treatment is to intensify the effects of the disease.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Hii ni ugonjwa ngumu; Tazama daktari wako.
• Ikiwa unataka kuongeza utunzaji kama huo na tiba asili, utahitaji kupitia
Programu kamili ya uponyaji wa asili, kama vile inavyofafanuliwa katika nakala ya "Saratani."
Dalili - kutokwa kwa uke au urethral, ​​uchochezi wa sehemu ya siri, ugumu wa kukojoa, kuwasha
Karibu na eneo lililochomwa, na uhusiano wa uchungu.
Sababu -kulingana na CDC, watu zaidi huko Amerika mkataba chlamydia kuliko nyingine yoyote ya kijinsia
ugonjwa uliopitishwa. Zaidi ya kesi mpya milioni 4 hugunduliwa kila mwaka. Karibu 20% ya vijana katika
Merika inajulikana kuwa imeambukizwa. Lakini takwimu hizi hazijumuishi idadi kubwa ambayo ni
haijaripotiwa. Karibu 10% ya wanaume na 70% ya wanawake ambao wana chlamydia - hawana dalili. Kwa hivyo moja
Inaweza kutarajia kwamba idadi kamili inayo, na kushiriki, ugonjwa huu unaoambukiza ni mkubwa sana.
Lakini, ikiwa inatambuliwa au la, athari za chlamydia ni kubwa. Karibu 30% ya wanawake wanakuwa
Ugonjwa wa uchochezi na wa pelvic na shida zingine za uzazi zinaweza, na kufanya, matokeo. Katika Vijana
Wanawake, ugonjwa pia unaweza kutoa aina ya ugonjwa wa arthritis.
Katika wanaume, maambukizi ya kibofu na uchochezi wa semina ya semina inaweza kutokea baadaye. (Dalili za prostatitis
Jumuisha maumivu wakati mkojo na kutokwa kwa maji ya mucous.)
Ugonjwa huo hupitishwa kupitia kutokwa huzalishwa na wanaume na wanawake. Ikiwa mwenzi mmoja ni
kutibiwa kwa hili, mwingine lazima pia.
Kuchelewesha matibabu ni kuongeza athari za ugonjwa.

title: Genital Herpes
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The diet should be alkaline in reaction. Foods to avoid are sweets; refined and processed
foods; alcohol; and, for some people, citrus. Eat only nutritious food.
• The virus lives in red meat and fat, and you do well to stop eating meat products. There
are substances in meat which encourage the growth of Type II.
• DMSO (Dimethyl sulfoxide), a by-product of wood processing, is a liquid which can be
placed on the affected area to relieve pain and promote healing. Only use the type sold in
health food stores.
• Some physicians prescribe BHT (butylated hydroxytoluene) for this disease, but it is
known to cause perforated stomachs.
• Apply black walnut or goldenseal extract to the area. Also useful is cayenne and red
clover, both externally and internally.
• Other helpful herbs include goldenseal, echinacea, myrrh, aloe vera, and burdock.
• Lightly dab tea tree oil on the affected area several times a day, either full strength or
slightly diluted. It is a powerful antiseptic. Do not get it near your eyes.
• Drink only distilled water and get plenty of rest.
(Herpes Type II)
SYMPTOMS—Recurrent fluid-filled blisters on the genitals that rupture, leaving red, inflamed, painful
lesions. These are preceded by a slightly irritating tingling. When the lesion appears, it is accompanied
by a sharp pain.
CAUSES—Of the 90 varieties of animal herpes, only four affect humans. Herpes is a virus that causes
recurrent blisters and ulcers (cold sores, also called fever blisters on the lips [Type I] and on the genitals
[Type II]). (See "Cold Sores" for information on Type I.) A third type is herpes zoster, which causes
chicken pox and, as a secondary infection, shingles. (See "Chicken pox" and "Shingles.") Type II can
produce blisters either on the genitals or on, or around, the mouth.
We will here deal only with Type II, which is also called herpes genitalis, venereal herpes, and genital
herpes. It is the most prevalent sexually transmitted disease in the United States. One-sixth of all
Americans (about 30 million) have the disease, although about half never develop serious symptoms. A
half million new cases are reported yearly, and 80% are 20 to 39 years of age. The first attack generally
occurs about 4-8 days after initial exposure to a sexual partner. Each occurrence is quite painful and lasts
up to three weeks; but, once a person is infected, the disease can be transmitted at any time. Symptoms
reoccur from every few weeks to once a year or less. Scarring does not usually occur, but can. Outbreaks
rarely occur after the age of 50.
Herpes is a virus which enters the body thorough the skin and travels into nerve groups at the base of the
spine. It remains with you the rest of your lifetime. But it can be dormant for years and then appear
again when the immune system is lowered by poor diet, stress, illness, too much sunlight, or harmful
chemicals.
Type II reoccurs when sexual intercourse takes place, as a result of irritation to the skin. It is not a newly
invaded infection, but one which was received from a sexual partner at an earlier time.
This viral infection can range from a symptomless infection in the nerves to a major inflammation of the
liver, accompanied by fever. In women, it can lead to cervical cancer.
There seems to be a link between having Type II and later developing atherosclerosis.
As a baby passes through an infected birth canal, it can get Type II and possibly have brain damage,
blindness, or death as a result. If an attack occurs late in the pregnancy, the baby should be delivered by
cesarean section. If no lesions are present, the baby is far less likely to become infected as it passes
through the birth canal.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Lishe inapaswa kuwa alkali katika athari. Vyakula vya kuzuia ni pipi; iliyosafishwa na kusindika
vyakula; pombe; na, kwa watu wengine, machungwa. Kula chakula chenye lishe tu.
• Virusi huishi katika nyama nyekundu na mafuta, na unafanya vizuri kuacha kula bidhaa za nyama. Huko
ni vitu katika nyama ambayo inahimiza ukuaji wa aina II.
• DMSO (dimethyl sulfoxide), bidhaa ya usindikaji wa kuni, ni kioevu ambacho kinaweza kuwa
kuwekwa kwenye eneo lililoathiriwa ili kupunguza maumivu na kukuza uponyaji. Tumia tu aina iliyouzwa
maduka ya chakula cha afya.
• Waganga wengine huagiza BHT (hydroxytoluene ya butylated) kwa ugonjwa huu, lakini ni
inayojulikana kusababisha tumbo lililotiwa mafuta.
• Omba walnut nyeusi au dondoo ya dhahabu kwenye eneo hilo. Muhimu pia ni Cayenne na Nyekundu
Clover, nje na ndani.
• Mimea mingine inayosaidia ni pamoja na Goldenseal, Echinacea, Myrrh, Aloe Vera, na Burdock.
• Mafuta ya chai ya chai kidogo kwenye eneo lililoathiriwa mara kadhaa kwa siku, ama nguvu kamili au
kupunguzwa kidogo. Ni antiseptic yenye nguvu. Usipate karibu na macho yako.
• Kunywa maji tu yaliyosafishwa na upate kupumzika.
(Aina ya herpes II)
Dalili-malengelenge yaliyojaa maji yaliyojaa juu ya sehemu za siri ambazo hupasuka, na kuacha nyekundu, zilizochomwa, zenye uchungu
vidonda. Hizi hutanguliwa na kutetemeka kidogo. Wakati lesion itaonekana, inaambatana
na maumivu makali.
Sababu -za aina 90 za herpes za wanyama, ni nne tu zinazoathiri wanadamu. Herpes ni virusi ambavyo husababisha
malengelenge ya kawaida na vidonda (vidonda baridi, pia huitwa malengelenge ya homa kwenye midomo [aina I] na kwenye sehemu za siri
[Aina II]). (Tazama "vidonda baridi" kwa habari juu ya aina ya I.) Aina ya tatu ni herpes zoster, ambayo husababisha
Kuku pox na, kama maambukizi ya sekondari, shingles. (Tazama "Pox ya Kuku" na "Shingles.") Aina ya II inaweza
Tengeneza malengelenge ama kwenye sehemu za siri au juu, au karibu, mdomo.
Hapa tutashughulika tu na Aina ya II, ambayo pia inaitwa Herpes Genitalis, herpes ya venereal, na sehemu ya siri
herpes. Ni ugonjwa unaosababishwa zaidi na ngono huko Merika. Moja ya sita ya yote
Wamarekani (karibu milioni 30) wana ugonjwa huo, ingawa karibu nusu huwa na dalili mbaya. A
Kesi mpya za nusu milioni zinaripotiwa kila mwaka, na 80% ni umri wa miaka 20 hadi 39. Shambulio la kwanza kwa ujumla
Hutokea kama siku 4-8 baada ya mfiduo wa awali kwa mwenzi wa ngono. Kila tukio ni chungu kabisa na hudumu
hadi wiki tatu; Lakini, mara tu mtu ameambukizwa, ugonjwa unaweza kupitishwa wakati wowote. Dalili
reoccur kutoka kila wiki chache hadi mara moja kwa mwaka au chini. Kukosoa kawaida haifanyiki, lakini inaweza. Milipuko
mara chache hufanyika baada ya umri wa miaka 50.
Herpes ni virusi ambavyo huingia mwilini kabisa ngozi na kusafiri katika vikundi vya ujasiri kwenye msingi wa
mgongo. Inabaki na wewe maisha yako yote. Lakini inaweza kuwa dormant kwa miaka na kisha kuonekana
Tena wakati mfumo wa kinga unapunguzwa na lishe duni, mafadhaiko, magonjwa, jua nyingi, au hatari
kemikali.
Aina ya II inarudia wakati ngono hufanyika, kama matokeo ya kuwasha kwa ngozi. Sio mpya
Kuambukizwa kwa kuvamiwa, lakini moja ambayo ilipokelewa kutoka kwa mwenzi wa ngono wakati wa mapema.
Maambukizi haya ya virusi yanaweza kutoka kwa maambukizi yasiyokuwa na dalili kwenye mishipa hadi uchochezi mkubwa wa
ini, ikifuatana na homa. Katika wanawake, inaweza kusababisha saratani ya kizazi.
Inaonekana kuna uhusiano kati ya kuwa na aina ya II na baadaye kukuza atherosclerosis.
Mtoto anapopita kwenye mfereji wa kuzaliwa ulioambukizwa, inaweza kupata aina ya II na labda kuwa na uharibifu wa ubongo,
upofu, au kifo kama matokeo. Ikiwa shambulio linatokea marehemu katika ujauzito, mtoto anapaswa kutolewa na
Sehemu ya Cesarean. Ikiwa hakuna vidonda vilivyopo, mtoto ana uwezekano mdogo wa kuambukizwa kadiri inavyopita
kupitia mfereji wa kuzaliwa.

title: Aids
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• There are definite indications that those who test positive for HIV, yet who take good
care of their immune systems, are less likely to develop full-blown AIDS. Those most
often in this category are individuals who contracted HIV by accident (such as
hemophiliacs) and normally lived healthful, clean, lives. Many of them never develop
AIDS.
• Conduct yourself properly, so you are not likely to contract HIV in the first place.
Maintain an excellent immune system through proper diet, rest, exercise, etc.
• But if you contract HIV, then you need to think through what you need to change in your
life. And then set to work to rebuild your immune system.
• Raw foods, such as fruits and vegetables, especially those high in vitamins A, B
complex, C, and E are very important. Take vitamin C to bowel tolerance. Selenium and
zinc, along with potassium, calcium, and magnesium are also important.
• Garlic, cabbage, kelp, and lots of fresh and cooked greens are important. Eat whole-grain
products.
• Limit your intake of soy products, without fully dropping them.
• Stop eating meat, processed food, and junk food. Banish tobacco, alcohol, and coffee.
Avoid those who smoke.
• Here are herbs which will help rebuild the immune system: echinacea, burdock, garlic,
goldenseal, pau d'arco, psyllium, suma, and ginkgo.
• Also important is black radish, dandelion root, and silymarin (milk thistle extract), to
strengthen the liver. Aloe vera inhibits the growth and spread of HIV. St. John's wort
tends to inhibit retroviral infections.
Certain activities tend to tear down the immune system faster than anything else. Everyone should be
aware of what those activities are:
• Using any form of nicotine.
• Drinking alcohol.
• Using street drugs.
• Taking medicinal drugs.
• Eating primarily junk food.
• Sexual excess, especially non-monogamous sex.
• Overeating and getting little exercise.
• Eating lots of pork, shellfish, and animal fat.
• See your physician and/or follow the instructions for "Cancer" in this book.
(HIV)
SYMPTOMS—Loss of appetite, weight loss, candida, fatigue, various infections, intestinal problems,
skin diseases, immune system disorders, fevers, brain and neurological disorders, and many other
symptoms.
CAUSES—AIDS (Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome) is a disease that does not need to happen.
If people controlled themselves, it would never have gotten started, and would eventually die out. But,
instead, it is an exploding epidemic.
HIV (human immunodeficiency virus) invades special immune cells in the body, which are called T
lymphocytes, and then slowly multiplies over a long period of time. As it does so, the body's immune
system gradually crumbles. All this time, the disease appears to lay dormant (and only an HIV test will
reveal that a person even has the disease). But, after three to ten years, enough of the body's defenses are
broken down that full-blown AIDS develops. Suddenly, very pronounced symptoms appear, which are
called "AIDS-related diseases." These include pneumo-cystis carinii pneumonia (PCP, found in 60% of
those with AIDS), Karposi's sarcoma (a rare type of skin cancer), Epstein-Barr virus (EBV; which see),
cytomegalovirus (CMV), toxoplasmosis, and tuberculosis.
The less deadly AIDS-related diseases are often the first to appear. The first sign is often the tongue
coated with white bumps. This is oral thrush, a type of candida (candidiasis; which see). Intestinal
parasites (which see) and herpes simplex virus (herpes type I) are two other relatively simple infections
which can occur. All indicate that the body's immune system is damaged, although candida, parasites,
herpes simplex, Epstein-Barr virus, and tuberculosis can occur in those who do not have AIDS.
Most of those who are HIV-positive eventually develop full-blown AIDS. Once that occurs, they
generally live only a few years. The median survival time, after full-blown AIDS appears, is 26 months.
Researchers are searching for an "AIDS cure"; but the HIV virus changes form so fast, it is unlikely a
cure will ever be found.
Some say the origin of AIDS is unknown, and that the earliest documented case of it appeared in 1981 in
San Francisco. But there may be undocumented cases of it in the 1970s.
Others say that there is a different origin of AIDS. Dr. Eva Snead feels that the virus was created in the
laboratories. She insists that, if you have been vaccinated, you have the virus.
Then there is Dr. William Campbell Douglass, M.D., who, in his book, AIDS the End of Civilization,
maintains that the vaccines were made from the kidney of the green African monkeys, and that the
disease was purposely invented to eliminate certain people.
The disease is transmitted by oral, vaginal, and anal sex; common needles for IV drugs; contaminated
hospital and dental equipment; commercially prepared blood products; and immunotoxic lubricants. In
other words, HIV is transmitted by sex, street drug IVs, blood transfusions, and getting someone else's
blood into your eyes or into cuts on your skin. It is not possible to contract HIV by giving blood.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kuna dalili dhahiri kwamba wale ambao wanajaribu kuwa na VVU, lakini ambao huchukua vizuri
Utunzaji wa kinga zao, zina uwezekano mdogo wa kukuza misaada kamili. Wale wengi
Mara nyingi katika jamii hii ni watu ambao walipata VVU kwa bahati mbaya (kama vile
Hemophiliacs) na kawaida aliishi afya, safi, maisha. Wengi wao hawakua kamwe
Misaada.
• Jiendelee vizuri, kwa hivyo hauwezi kuambukizwa VVU hapo kwanza.
Kudumisha mfumo bora wa kinga kupitia lishe sahihi, kupumzika, mazoezi, nk.
• Lakini ikiwa unaandika VVU, basi unahitaji kufikiria kupitia kile unahitaji kubadilisha katika yako
maisha. Na kisha weka kufanya kazi ili kuunda mfumo wako wa kinga.
• Vyakula mbichi, kama matunda na mboga, haswa zile zenye vitamini A, B
ngumu, C, na E ni muhimu sana. Chukua vitamini C kwa uvumilivu wa matumbo. Seleniamu na
Zinc, pamoja na potasiamu, kalsiamu, na magnesiamu pia ni muhimu.
• Vitunguu, kabichi, kelp, na mboga nyingi safi na zilizopikwa ni muhimu. Kula nafaka nzima
Bidhaa.
• Punguza ulaji wako wa bidhaa za soya, bila kuziacha kabisa.
Acha kula nyama, chakula cha kusindika, na chakula kisicho na chakula. Marufuku tumbaku, pombe, na kahawa.
Epuka wale wanaovuta moshi.
• Hapa kuna mimea ambayo itasaidia kujenga mfumo wa kinga: echinacea, burdock, vitunguu,
Goldenseal, Pau d'Arco, Psyllium, Suma, na Ginkgo.
• Muhimu pia ni radish nyeusi, mizizi ya dandelion, na silymarin (dondoo ya maziwa ya maziwa), kwa
kuimarisha ini. Aloe vera inazuia ukuaji na kuenea kwa VVU. St John's Wort
huelekea kuzuia maambukizo ya retroviral.
Shughuli zingine huwa zinavunja mfumo wa kinga haraka kuliko kitu kingine chochote. Kila mtu anapaswa kuwa
Kujua nini shughuli hizo ni:
• Kutumia aina yoyote ya nikotini.
• Kunywa pombe.
• Kutumia dawa za barabarani.
• Kuchukua dawa za dawa.
• Kula chakula kisicho na chakula.
• Kuzidi kwa ngono, haswa ngono isiyo ya monogamous.
• Kuongeza nguvu na kupata mazoezi kidogo.
• Kula nyama ya nguruwe nyingi, ganda, na mafuta ya wanyama.
• Tazama daktari wako na/au fuata maagizo ya "saratani" kwenye kitabu hiki.
(VVU)
Dalili -upungufu wa hamu ya kula, kupunguza uzito, candida, uchovu, maambukizo anuwai, shida za matumbo,
Magonjwa ya ngozi, shida za mfumo wa kinga, fevers, shida za ubongo na neva, na zingine nyingi
Dalili.
Sababu -Msaada (ugonjwa wa upungufu wa kinga) ni ugonjwa ambao hauitaji kutokea.
Ikiwa watu wangejidhibiti, isingewahi kuanza, na hatimaye wangekufa. Lakini,
Badala yake, ni janga la kulipuka.
VVU (virusi vya kinga ya mwili wa binadamu) huvamia seli maalum za kinga mwilini, ambazo huitwa t
lymphocyte, na kisha polepole kuongezeka kwa muda mrefu. Kama inavyofanya hivyo, kinga ya mwili
Mfumo polepole hubomoka. Wakati huu wote, ugonjwa unaonekana kuweka dormant (na mtihani wa VVU tu ndio utafanya
Onyesha kuwa mtu hata ana ugonjwa). Lakini, baada ya miaka mitatu hadi kumi, ya kutosha ya ulinzi wa mwili ni
Imevunjika misaada hiyo iliyojaa kabisa. Ghafla, dalili zilizotamkwa sana zinaonekana, ambazo ni
inayoitwa "magonjwa yanayohusiana na UKIMWI." Hii ni pamoja na pneumo-cystis carinii pneumonia (PCP, inayopatikana katika 60% ya
Wale walio na UKIMWI), Sarcoma ya Karposi (aina ya saratani ya ngozi), virusi vya Epstein-Barr (EBV; ambayo huona),
Cytomegalovirus (CMV), toxoplasmosis, na kifua kikuu.
Magonjwa yanayohusiana sana na UKIMWI mara nyingi huwa ya kwanza kuonekana. Ishara ya kwanza mara nyingi ni ulimi
iliyofunikwa na matuta meupe. Hii ni thrush ya mdomo, aina ya candida (candidiasis; ambayo huona). Matumbo
Vimelea (ambavyo vinaona) na virusi vya herpes rahisix (aina ya herpes I) ni maambukizo mengine mawili rahisi
ambayo inaweza kutokea. Zote zinaonyesha kuwa mfumo wa kinga ya mwili umeharibiwa, ingawa candida, vimelea,
Virusi vya Herpes, virusi vya Epstein-Barr, na kifua kikuu vinaweza kutokea kwa wale ambao hawana UKIMWI.
Wengi wa wale ambao ni VVU-chanya hatimaye huendeleza misaada kamili. Mara hiyo ikitokea, wao
Kwa ujumla kuishi miaka michache tu. Wakati wa kuishi wa wastani, baada ya UKIMWI kamili wa baruti, ni miezi 26.
Watafiti wanatafuta "tiba ya UKIMWI"; Lakini virusi vya VVU hubadilika haraka sana, hakuna uwezekano
Tiba itapatikana.
Wengine wanasema asili ya UKIMWI haijulikani, na kwamba kesi ya mapema kabisa ilionekana mnamo 1981 katika
San Francisco. Lakini kunaweza kuwa na kesi zisizo na kumbukumbu yake katika miaka ya 1970.
Wengine wanasema kwamba kuna asili tofauti ya UKIMWI. Dk Eva Snead anahisi kuwa virusi viliundwa katika
maabara. Anasisitiza kwamba, ikiwa umechanjwa, unayo virusi.
Halafu kuna Dk. William Campbell Douglass, M.D., ambaye, katika kitabu chake, Misaada ya Ustaarabu,
inasisitiza kwamba chanjo hizo zilifanywa kutoka kwa figo ya nyani wa kijani kibichi, na kwamba
Ugonjwa uligunduliwa kwa makusudi ili kuondoa watu fulani.
Ugonjwa hupitishwa na ngono ya mdomo, uke, na anal; sindano za kawaida za dawa za IV; iliyochafuliwa
hospitali na vifaa vya meno; bidhaa za damu zilizoandaliwa kibiashara; na mafuta ya immunotoxic. Katika
Maneno mengine, VVU hupitishwa na ngono, dawa za kulevya za barabarani, damu, na kupata mtu mwingine
Damu ndani ya macho yako au kupunguzwa kwenye ngozi yako. Haiwezekani kuambukizwa VVU kwa kutoa damu.
