title: Urticaria
contentEn:
(Nettle Rash)
SYMPTOMS—Small, pale swellings on the skin, with severe itching and burning which come and go,
to be replaced by others. Each lesion lasts a few hours, and is succeeded by new ones in other places.
CAUSES—One cause is contact with the nettle plant, which pricks a poison into the skin. Other causes
include wheat, milk, eggs, chocolate, and other food allergens.
HYDRO—The following formula is from the author's book, Water Therapy Manual (see order sheet):
Sponging with very hot water, Hot salt or alkaline Sponge, Prolonged Neutral Bath (p. 239).
contentSw:
(Upele wa nettle)
Dalili -ndogo, uvimbe wa rangi kwenye ngozi, na kuwasha kali na kuchoma ambayo huja na kwenda,
kubadilishwa na wengine. Kila lesion huchukua masaa machache, na inafanikiwa na mpya katika maeneo mengine.
Sababu - sababu moja ni kuwasiliana na mmea wa nettle, ambao huchota sumu ndani ya ngozi. Sababu zingine
Jumuisha ngano, maziwa, mayai, chokoleti, na mzio mwingine wa chakula.
Hydro - Njia ifuatayo ni kutoka kwa kitabu cha mwandishi, Mwongozo wa Tiba ya Maji (tazama Karatasi ya Agizo):
Sping na maji moto sana, chumvi moto au sifongo ya alkali, umwagaji wa muda mrefu wa upande wowote (uk. 239).

title: Chiggers
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Remove the chigger by scratching off with a fingernail, or apply castor oil or Vaseline.
Another method is to apply clear nail polish to the spot; this smothers the creature.
• A charcoal poultice can be a help.
• Banana is reported to soothe chigger bites.
• Hot baths help control the itching.
SYMPTOMS—A red spot that itches intensely for about 3 days.
CAUSES—Chiggers, also called red bugs, are extremely tiny insects in the class (arthropoda, eight-
legged creatures) which includes scorpions, spiders, and mites. They prefer grassy, weedy, fields, but are
also found in wooded areas. They are active from May to September, and especially during June and
July.
Moving slowly, a chigger crawls along until he finds a tight spot in a body crease or where the clothing
is tight. Then, about 2 hours after hitching a ride, he digs in by injecting fluid which dissolves tissue and
produces a welt. About 3-6 hours later the itching begins and continues for about 3 days.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ondoa chigger kwa kukwaruza na kidole, au weka mafuta ya castor au vaseline.
Njia nyingine ni kutumia kipolishi wazi cha msumari mahali; Huyu huvuta kiumbe.
• Kuku ya mkaa inaweza kuwa msaada.
• Banana inaripotiwa kutuliza kuumwa.
• Bafu za moto husaidia kudhibiti kuwasha.
Dalili -doa nyekundu ambayo inawaka sana kwa siku 3.
Sababu-Chigger, pia huitwa mende nyekundu, ni wadudu wadogo sana darasani (arthropoda, nane-
Viumbe wenye miguu) ambayo ni pamoja na ungo, buibui, na sarafu. Wanapendelea nyasi, dhaifu, shamba, lakini ni
pia hupatikana katika maeneo yenye miti. Zinafanya kazi kutoka Mei hadi Septemba, na haswa wakati wa Juni na
Julai.
Kuhamia polepole, chigger hutambaa pamoja hadi atakapopata sehemu ngumu kwenye mwili au mahali mavazi
ni ngumu. Halafu, karibu masaa 2 baada ya kugonga safari, yeye huchimba kwa kuingiza maji ambayo hufuta tishu na
hutoa welt. Karibu masaa 3-6 baadaye kuwasha huanza na inaendelea kwa siku 3.

title: Itch Mite
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Wash the affected part with tar soap. Wash clothing in boiling water or press them with a
hot iron.
• Steep a tablespoon each of burdock root, yarrow, and yellow dock root in a pint of
boiling water for half an hour. Strain, add a pound of cocoa fat, and keep boiling and
stirring until it is a salve. Use this for an itch of any kind.
SYMPTOMS—Itching occurs, but seems to travel from place to place on the skin.
CAUSES—Beware of bird nests close to your house! Many birds are infested with mites, and these can
enter your home and get on you.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Osha sehemu iliyoathiriwa na sabuni ya tar. Osha mavazi katika maji yanayochemka au bonyeza na a
chuma moto.
• Piga kijiko kila mizizi ya burdock, yarrow, na mzizi wa kizimbani cha manjano kwenye pint ya
Maji ya kuchemsha kwa nusu saa. Shika, ongeza pauni ya mafuta ya kakao, na endelea kuchemsha na
kuchochea mpaka ni salve. Tumia hii kwa kuwasha ya aina yoyote.
Dalili -Kuweka hufanyika, lakini inaonekana kusafiri kutoka mahali hadi mahali kwenye ngozi.
Sababu - Utunzaji wa viota vya ndege karibu na nyumba yako! Ndege wengi huambukizwa na sarafu, na hizi zinaweza
Ingiza nyumba yako na upate juu yako.

title: Lice
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• No drugs are needed to eradicate lice. Instead use one or more of the following methods:
• Heat combs and brushes to 151o F. for 5-10 minutes; soak for an hour in 2% Lysol
solution or freeze for 30 minutes.
• Launder clothing and bedding in hot water. Non-washable items should be sealed in a
plastic sack for 10 days.
• Soak the place on the body for 30 minutes in very warm, soapy, water.
• The hair can be doused in kerosene and then wrapped in a towel. Garlic compresses can
be placed on the scalp for 2 hours. Hot vinegar (or a 50-50 vinegar/water mixture) applied
to the scalp will loosen eggs, so they can be vigorously combed out of the hair with a fine-
toothed comb. A 50-50 mixture of kerosene and olive oil can be put on the scalp to get rid
of the nits.
• Be careful what you place on the eyebrows; you do not want to damage the eyes.
Petroleum jelly has been recommended to suffocate the lice.
• Use, as a hair wash, either labrador tea or field larkspur.
• Vacuuming carpets is as effective as spraying them. Do it frequently.
• Scrub toilet seats regularly.
• Whatever method you use, keep in mind that there is a 14-day cycle; you must work
intensely for a little over 2 weeks on your body, clothing, and home if you are to have
success.
(Pediculosis)
SYMPTOMS—Itching of the skin, often on the head, trunk, or pubic area. Lice eggs can be seen on
one's hair. The person will feel like he is overheated or has a slight fever.
CAUSES—There are three types of lice which infect people: the head louse (pediculosis capitis), the
body louse (p. corporis), and the crab louse (p. pubis). Crab lice (also called crabs) are spread by sexual
contact.
Lice can be spread by hanging coats, scarves, and caps together or using someone else's comb, brush,
etc. They live on the clothing (especially in the seams), travel to the skin once a day for a meal, then
back onto the clothing.
Lice live about 30 days, and the female lays about ten eggs a day. The tiny eggs (nits) are laid at the base
of a hair shaft. As the hair grows, the nits are carried upward and can be seen. They look like tiny black
or rust-colored spots at, or near, the base of the hair. They can even be found on the chest, beard, and
eyelashes.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Hakuna dawa zinazohitajika kumaliza chawa. Badala yake tumia njia moja au zaidi zifuatazo:
• Joto za joto na brashi hadi 151o F. kwa dakika 5-10; Loweka kwa saa moja katika 2% lysol
suluhisho au kufungia kwa dakika 30.
• Kuvaa nguo na kitanda katika maji ya moto. Vitu visivyoweza kuosha vinapaswa kufungwa katika a
gunia la plastiki kwa siku 10.
• Loweka mahali kwenye mwili kwa dakika 30 kwa joto sana, sabuni, maji.
• Nywele zinaweza kushonwa kwenye mafuta ya taa na kisha kuvikwa kitambaa. Vipindi vya vitunguu vinaweza
kuwekwa kwenye ngozi kwa masaa 2. Siki ya moto (au mchanganyiko wa siki 50-50/maji) inatumika
kwa ngozi itafungua mayai, ili iweze kutolewa kwa nguvu kutoka kwa nywele na faini-
kuchana. Mchanganyiko wa 50-50 wa mafuta na mafuta ya mizeituni yanaweza kuwekwa kwenye ngozi ili kuondoa
ya nits.
• Kuwa mwangalifu kile unachoweka kwenye nyusi; Hautaki kuharibu macho.
Petroli jelly imependekezwa kutoshea chawa.
• Tumia, kama safisha ya nywele, chai ya Labrador au Larkpur ya shamba.
• Mazulia ya utupu ni sawa na kunyunyizia dawa. Fanya mara kwa mara.
• Viti vya choo mara kwa mara.
• Njia yoyote unayotumia, kumbuka kuwa kuna mzunguko wa siku 14; Lazima ufanye kazi
kwa nguvu zaidi ya wiki 2 juu ya mwili wako, mavazi, na nyumba ikiwa utakuwa na
mafanikio.
(Pediculosis)
Dalili -Kuweka ngozi, mara nyingi kichwani, shina, au eneo la pubic. Mayai ya chawa yanaweza kuonekana kwenye
Nywele za mtu. Mtu huyo atahisi kama amejaa joto au ana homa kidogo.
Sababu -Kuna aina tatu za chawa ambazo zinaambukiza watu: kichwa cha kichwa (ugonjwa wa pediculosis),
Louse ya Mwili (uk. Corposis), na Crab Louse (p. Pubis). Chawa za kaa (pia huitwa kaa) husambazwa na ngono
wasiliana.
Chawa zinaweza kusambazwa kwa kanzu za kunyongwa, mitandio, na kofia pamoja au kutumia mchanganyiko wa mtu mwingine, brashi,
nk Wanaishi kwenye mavazi (haswa kwenye seams), husafiri kwa ngozi mara moja kwa siku kwa chakula, basi
Rudi kwenye mavazi.
Chawa huishi karibu siku 30, na kike huweka mayai kama kumi kwa siku. Mayai madogo (nits) yamewekwa kwenye msingi
ya shimoni ya nywele. Wakati nywele zinakua, nits huchukuliwa juu na inaweza kuonekana. Wanaonekana kama nyeusi ndogo
au matangazo ya rangi ya kutu, au karibu, msingi wa nywele. Wanaweza kupatikana hata kwenye kifua, ndevu, na
kope.

title: Typhus
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Typhus is a tropical disease, and occurs rarely in the northern climates. Call a physician.
If none is available, give the treatment for "fevers" and "Bubonic plague" (which see).
SYMPTOMS—Sudden onset of chills, high fever, prostration, and general pains. The patient is excited,
mentally alert, and has a flushed face and bloodshot eyes.
Delirium frequently occurs early. Small pink spots on neck, chest, abdomen, and limbs appear about the
fifth day. They change from pink to red, then to purple, and finally turn brownish.
Heavy bronchitis, with cough and sputum. Pulse is rapid, but blood pressure is low.
In its early stages, typhus is like Rocky Mountain spotted fever, but the home treatment for both is
essentially the same.
CAUSES—There are three main types of typhus fevers (louse fever, flea and tick fever, and mite fever),
but they are all treated about the same and are caused by similar bacteria carried by lice, fleas, ticks, or
mites.
Typhus occurs where people are crowded together under unsanitary conditions.
But Rocky Mountain spotted fever and Lyme disease are more easily acquired by anyone who goes out
into the woods.
—See "Rocky Mountain Spotted Fever" and "Lyme Disease" for related information.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Typhus ni ugonjwa wa kitropiki, na hufanyika mara chache katika hali ya hewa ya kaskazini. Piga daktari.
Ikiwa hakuna inayopatikana, toa matibabu ya "fevers" na "pigo la bubonic" (ambalo tazama).
Dalili - mwanzo wa baridi, homa kubwa, kusujudu, na maumivu ya jumla. Mgonjwa anafurahi,
macho ya kiakili, na ina uso uliojaa na macho ya damu.
Delirium mara nyingi hufanyika mapema. Matangazo madogo ya rangi ya waridi kwenye shingo, kifua, tumbo, na miguu huonekana juu ya
siku ya tano. Wao hubadilika kutoka pink hadi nyekundu, kisha zambarau, na hatimaye kugeuka hudhurungi.
Bronchitis nzito, na kikohozi na sputum. Pulse ni haraka, lakini shinikizo la damu ni chini.
Katika hatua zake za mwanzo, typhus ni kama Rocky Mountain Spotted Homa, lakini matibabu ya nyumbani kwa wote ni IS
kimsingi sawa.
Sababu - Kuna aina kuu tatu za fevers typhus (homa ya louse, flea na homa ya tick, na homa ya mite),
lakini zote zinatibiwa sawa na husababishwa na bakteria sawa na chawa, fleas, tick, au
sarafu.
Typhus hufanyika ambapo watu wamejaa pamoja chini ya hali isiyo ya kawaida.
Lakini Rocky Mountain Spotted Homa na Ugonjwa wa Lyme hupatikana kwa urahisi na mtu yeyote ambaye hutoka
ndani ya Woods.
-Tazama "Rocky Mountain Spotted Homa" na "Ugonjwa wa Lyme" kwa habari inayohusiana.

title: Rocky Mountain Spotted Fever
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Call a physician; auxiliary home treatment would be for "fevers" and "Bubonic Plague."
For preventative measures, see "Lyme Disease."
• If a tick is biting you, pull it off slowly so as not to leave part behind; then rub on a little
alcohol, vinegar, or lemon.
PREVENTION—Before going on a walk in the woods or fields, mix 50-50 powdered sulphur and
talcum powder, and dust it on your legs and around your waist. An old-timer suggests putting a little
turpentine around your ankles and one drop on your tongue, to discourage them.
Avoid sleeping where cattle graze or near your dog.
—Also see "Lyme Disease."
(Tick fever)
SYMPTOMS—Symptoms begin 7-12 days after being bitten: headaches, chills, weakness, fever,
muscle pain, and dry cough. There is a skin rash on the wrists, ankles, palms, soles of the foot and
forearms; this then spreads to the neck, face, axilla, buttocks, and trunk.
Next comes liver enlargement and pneumonitis. If untreated, circulatory failure brings death.
CAUSES—When symptoms first appear, do not wait for a positive blood test identification before
instituting treatment. Death may occur as soon as 4-10 days after appearance of symptoms. Contact a
physician.
Spotted fever is caused by a similar bacteria (rickettsia) that causes typhus (which see), but spotted fever
is transmitted by a tick. Of the reported cases, 90% occur along the eastern seaboard and 10% in the
Rocky Mountains. But it can be contracted anywhere in between those regions.
May through October is when people, who are out in the woods, are especially bitten. You can also get it
from your dog, which has been roaming the woods and picking up ticks as though he were a vacuum
cleaner.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Piga simu daktari; Matibabu ya nyumbani ya msaidizi itakuwa ya "fevers" na "pigo la bubonic."
Kwa hatua za kuzuia, angalia "Ugonjwa wa Lyme."
• Ikiwa Jibu linakuuma, vuta polepole ili usiache sehemu nyuma; Kisha kusugua kidogo
Pombe, siki, au limao.
Kuzuia-kabla ya kwenda kutembea msituni au shamba, changanya kiberiti 50-50 na kiberiti na
poda ya talcum, na kuifuta kwa miguu yako na kiunoni mwako. Wakati wa zamani unaonyesha kuweka kidogo
Turpentine karibu na vijiti vyako na kushuka moja kwenye ulimi wako, ili kuyakatisha tamaa.
Epuka kulala ambapo ng'ombe hula au karibu na mbwa wako.
-Unaona "Ugonjwa wa Lyme."
(Jibu homa)
Dalili-Symptoms huanza siku 7-12 baada ya kuumwa: maumivu ya kichwa, baridi, udhaifu, homa,
Ma maumivu ya misuli, na kikohozi kavu. Kuna upele wa ngozi kwenye mikono, vijiti, mitende, nyayo za mguu na
mikono ya mikono; Hii basi huenea kwa shingo, uso, axilla, matako, na shina.
Ifuatayo inakuja upanuzi wa ini na pneumonitis. Ikiwa haijatibiwa, kushindwa kwa mzunguko huleta kifo.
Sababu -Wakati dalili zinaonekana kwanza, usingoje kitambulisho chanya cha damu hapo awali
kuanzisha matibabu. Kifo kinaweza kutokea mara tu baada ya siku 4-10 baada ya kuonekana kwa dalili. Wasiliana a
daktari.
Homa iliyotiwa husababishwa na bakteria sawa (Rickettsia) ambayo husababisha typhus (ambayo huona), lakini homa iliyoonekana
hupitishwa na tick. Kati ya kesi zilizoripotiwa, 90% hufanyika kando ya bahari ya mashariki na 10% katika
Milima ya Rocky. Lakini inaweza kuambukizwa mahali popote kati ya mikoa hiyo.
Mei hadi Oktoba ni wakati watu, ambao wako nje msituni, wanaumwa sana. Unaweza pia kuipata
kutoka kwa mbwa wako, ambayo imekuwa ikizunguka kuni na kuokota mijusi kana kwamba alikuwa utupu
Safi.

title: Lyme Disease
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The longer the tick is attached, the greater the risk of Lyme disease.
• Remove the tick with tweezers. Put the tweezers close to the skin and slowly pull
straight out. Do not twist. You want the entire tick out, without leaving part of it in the
skin or injecting bacteria from its broken body into the skin. You may pour rubbing
alcohol on the tick before pulling him out. Do not touch the tick with your hands. Do not
apply kerosene, turpentine, or petroleum jelly.
• Wash your hands and the bite area. Apply rubbing alcohol to the bite area. Do not use a
match to get the tick out.
• Save the tick in a jar. Call a physician if you want it tested immediately. Watch for
symptoms over the next 3 weeks.
• Put suspicious clothing in the dryer for 30 minutes, to kill ticks by dehydration. Washing
clothes, even in hot water and bleach, does not necessarily kill ticks.
• Heat relieves pain. Hot baths are helpful. See "Fevers."
PREVENTION—The best solution to this problem is prevention. Avoid going out in the woods in the
summer months, when ticks are the most active (especially June to August). Stay on the center of the
trails. Check yourself and your children carefully afterward.
Wear long pants and tuck them into your socks. Wear a long-sleeved shirt with a high neck or scarf, plus
hat or gloves. If the clothing is light-colored, you can see the ticks better.
You may choose to use an insect repellent containing deet (diethyl toluamide). It lasts longer than
others, and is said to be safe on the outside. But it is deadly if taken into your body, and dissolves
plastics and synthetics.
Not everyone bitten acquires the disease. A high sugar and fat diet attracts insects! The skin eliminates
toxins, which attract bugs when the diet is unnatural.
When the blood is pure and the body clean, there is far less likelihood of tick bites and lice infestation.
A diet high in fiber and natural food will help keep the body clean and protect against infections. Sugar
attracts insects.
Herbs useful in preventing infections include: echinacea, goldenseal, garlic, and burdock. Rubbing with
lemon juice will disinfect the area. Aloe vera on the area will aid in healing.
Vitamins A and C protect against infections. B complex vitamins help keep the blood clean. Eat lots of
greens.
A test is now available, but false positives occur sometimes. So, if you are being treated for Lyme
disease and are not getting better, consider having a second test made. One study of nearly 800 people,
diagnosed with Lyme disease, revealed that half of them did not have it! Physicians blame false-positive
tests for this.
—Also see "Rocky Mountain Spotted Fever."
SYMPTOMS—Between 2 and 32 days after the bite, symptoms appear: fatigue, flu-like symptoms,
stiff neck, backache, headache, nausea, and vomiting.
Ultimately, enlargement of the lymph nodes and spleen may occur, along with irregular heart rhythm,
arthritis, and brain damage.
Some of these symptoms slowly pass away over 2-3 years. But sometimes symptoms recur later without
having been bitten again.
Because this disease is now so prominent, and because it can occur so mysteriously, here are more
detailed symptoms on its usual 3 stages (which not everyone goes through):
1 - Small raised bumps (and/or a rash) appear on the entire body for 1-2 days or several
weeks and then fades. Fever, chills, nausea, and vomiting may also occur.
2 - Weeks or months later, facial paralysis may occur. Frequently, enlargement of the
spleen and lymph glands occurs and/or severe headaches, enlargement of the heart
muscle, and abnormal heart rhythm.
3 - This can develop into backache, stiff neck, joint pains in the knees, swelling and pain
in other joints, and even degenerative muscle and joint disease.
Physicians especially look for these symptoms, before treating with antibiotics: a small red bump at the
site of the tick bite; a bull's-eye rash surrounding it; and flu-like symptoms such as fatigue, chills, and
joint pain. If treatment is postponed until more advanced symptoms develop (heart, brain, or joint
problems), drug medications do not work as well.
CAUSES—The bite of a tiny tick (Ixodes dammini) is primarily carried by deer; but it is also carried, in
the eastern states, by white-footed field mice and, in the west, by lizards and jackrabbits. In California it
is also transmitted by the black-legged tick, carried by wood rats.
Both deer ticks and black-legged ticks are very tiny: An adult is less than 1/10th of an inch, and the
nymph is a pinhead in size. They are much smaller than a dog tick.
Lyme disease most frequently occurs where the white-tailed deer is most abundant, which is the
northeastern states. Eight states report 90% of the cases: Connecticut, Massachusetts, California,
Minnesota, New York, Rhode Island, Wisconsin, and New Jersey. But it has occurred in every state
except Alaska, Arizona, Hawaii, Montana, and Nebraska. The disease was first identified in the mid-
1970s in Lyme, Connecticut.
Dogs and cats can collect these special ticks out in the woods and bring them into your home.
Tick bites are generally painless and unnoticed; so the symptoms may not at first, or later, be correctly
diagnosed. But in advanced stages, when correct diagnosis finally occurs, the situation may have
become critical.
The symptoms are similar to those of multiple sclerosis, gout, and Epstein-Barr virus (chronic fatigue
syndrome), all three of which see.
A test now exists which can detect the bacteria (Borrelia burgdorferi) which causes Lyme disease.
Antibodies are present from 3 days to 3 weeks after infection.
The majority of cases occur in the summer and fall. After a tick bites, it waits several hours before it
begins to feed on the host's blood; and, once it does, it feasts for 3-4 days. The longer the tick remains
attached, the greater the risk of Lyme disease.
Lyme disease is treatable and almost always curable if correctly diagnosed in the early stages. But,
because the bites are usually painless, the incubation period so long, and the symptoms so varied, the
problem may go unrecognized for weeks or months.
If you develop a bull's-eye type of rash anywhere on your body, see your health-care provider right
away.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Jalada likishikamana tena, hatari kubwa ya ugonjwa wa Lyme.
• Ondoa tick na tweezers. Weka vifurushi karibu na ngozi na polepole kuvuta
Moja kwa moja. Usipotoshe. Unataka tick nzima, bila kuacha sehemu yake katika
ngozi au kuingiza bakteria kutoka kwa mwili wake uliovunjika ndani ya ngozi. Unaweza kumwaga kusugua
Pombe kwenye tick kabla ya kumtoa nje. Usiguse tick na mikono yako. Usifanye
Omba mafuta ya taa, turpentine, au jelly ya mafuta.
• Osha mikono yako na eneo la kuuma. Omba kusugua pombe kwenye eneo la kuuma. Usitumie
Mechi ya kupata tick.
• Hifadhi tick kwenye jar. Piga simu daktari ikiwa unataka kupimwa mara moja. Tazama
Dalili katika wiki 3 zijazo.
• Weka mavazi ya tuhuma kwenye kavu kwa dakika 30, kuua tick kwa upungufu wa maji mwilini. Kuosha
Nguo, hata katika maji ya moto na bleach, sio lazima kuua tick.
• Joto huondoa maumivu. Bafu moto husaidia. Tazama "Fevers."
Kuzuia - Suluhisho bora kwa shida hii ni kuzuia. Epuka kwenda nje msituni
Miezi ya majira ya joto, wakati tick ndio inayofanya kazi zaidi (haswa Juni hadi Agosti). Kaa katikati ya
Njia. Angalia mwenyewe na watoto wako kwa uangalifu baadaye.
Vaa suruali ndefu na uziingie kwenye soksi zako. Vaa shati lenye mikono mirefu na shingo ya juu au kitambaa, pamoja na
kofia au glavu. Ikiwa mavazi ni rangi nyepesi, unaweza kuona tick bora.
Unaweza kuchagua kutumia repellent ya wadudu iliyo na DEET (diethyl toluamide). Inadumu zaidi kuliko
wengine, na inasemekana kuwa salama nje. Lakini ni mbaya ikiwa imechukuliwa ndani ya mwili wako, na kuyeyuka
Plastiki na synthetics.
Sio kila mtu aliyeumwa anayepata ugonjwa. Sukari kubwa na lishe ya mafuta huvutia wadudu! Ngozi huondoa
Sumu, ambayo huvutia mende wakati lishe sio ya asili.
Wakati damu ni safi na mwili ni safi, kuna uwezekano mdogo wa kuumwa kwa tick na udhalilishaji wa chawa.
Lishe kubwa katika nyuzi na chakula asili itasaidia kuweka mwili safi na kulinda dhidi ya maambukizo. Sukari
Inavutia wadudu.
Mimea muhimu katika kuzuia maambukizo ni pamoja na: echinacea, dhahabu, vitunguu, na burdock. Kusugua na
Juisi ya limao itatenganisha eneo hilo. Aloe Vera kwenye eneo hilo atasaidia katika uponyaji.
Vitamini A na C hulinda dhidi ya maambukizo. B Vitamini tata husaidia kuweka damu safi. Kula mengi
Greens.
Mtihani unapatikana sasa, lakini chanya za uwongo hufanyika wakati mwingine. Kwa hivyo, ikiwa unatibiwa kwa Lyme
Ugonjwa na sio kuwa bora, fikiria kuwa na mtihani wa pili uliofanywa. Utafiti mmoja wa karibu watu 800,
Kugunduliwa na ugonjwa wa Lyme, ilifunua kuwa nusu yao hawakuwa nayo! Waganga wanalaumu uwongo
vipimo kwa hii.
-Unaona "Rocky Mountain Spotted Homa."
Dalili-kati ya siku 2 na 32 baada ya kuumwa, dalili zinaonekana: uchovu, dalili kama mafua,
Shingo ngumu, maumivu ya nyuma, maumivu ya kichwa, kichefuchefu, na kutapika.
Mwishowe, upanuzi wa nodi za lymph na wengu zinaweza kutokea, pamoja na wimbo wa moyo usio wa kawaida,
Arthritis, na uharibifu wa ubongo.
Baadhi ya dalili hizi hupita polepole zaidi ya miaka 2-3. Lakini wakati mwingine dalili hurudi baadaye bila
baada ya kuumwa tena.
Kwa sababu ugonjwa huu sasa ni maarufu sana, na kwa sababu inaweza kutokea kwa kushangaza, hapa kuna zaidi
Dalili za kina juu ya hatua zake 3 za kawaida (ambazo sio kila mtu hupitia):
1 - Matuta madogo yaliyoinuliwa (na/au upele) yanaonekana kwenye mwili mzima kwa siku 1-2 au kadhaa
wiki na kisha huisha. Homa, baridi, kichefuchefu, na kutapika pia zinaweza kutokea.
2 - Wiki au miezi baadaye, kupooza usoni kunaweza kutokea. Mara kwa mara, upanuzi wa
wengu na tezi za lymph hufanyika na/au maumivu ya kichwa kali, upanuzi wa moyo
misuli, na densi isiyo ya kawaida ya moyo.
3 - Hii inaweza kuibuka kuwa maumivu ya mgongo, shingo ngumu, maumivu ya pamoja katika magoti, uvimbe na maumivu
katika viungo vingine, na hata misuli inayoharibika na ugonjwa wa pamoja.
Waganga hutafuta dalili hizi, kabla ya kutibu na viuatilifu: bonge ndogo nyekundu kwenye
tovuti ya bite ya tick; upele wa jicho la ng'ombe unaozunguka; na dalili kama mafua kama vile uchovu, baridi, na
maumivu ya pamoja. Ikiwa matibabu yameahirishwa hadi dalili za hali ya juu zaidi zinakua (moyo, ubongo, au pamoja
Shida), dawa za dawa hazifanyi kazi pia.
Sababu -kuuma kwa tick ndogo (ixode dammini) kimsingi hubebwa na kulungu; Lakini pia hubeba, ndani
Mataifa ya Mashariki, na panya wa uwanja mweupe na, magharibi, na mijusi na jackrabbits. Huko California
pia hupitishwa na tick iliyo na miguu-nyeusi, iliyobebwa na panya za kuni.
Tick ​​zote mbili za kulungu na tick zenye miguu nyeusi ni ndogo sana: mtu mzima ni chini ya 1/10 ya inchi, na
Nymph ni kichwa kwa ukubwa. Ni ndogo sana kuliko tick ya mbwa.
Ugonjwa wa Lyme mara nyingi hufanyika ambapo kulungu-tailed nyeupe ni nyingi, ambayo ni
Nchi za Kaskazini mashariki. Majimbo nane yanaripoti 90% ya kesi hizo: Connecticut, Massachusetts, California,
Minnesota, New York, Kisiwa cha Rhode, Wisconsin, na New Jersey. Lakini imetokea katika kila jimbo
Isipokuwa Alaska, Arizona, Hawaii, Montana, na Nebraska. Ugonjwa huo uligunduliwa kwanza katikati-
1970 katika Lyme, Connecticut.
Mbwa na paka zinaweza kukusanya tick hizi maalum kwenye Woods na kuzileta ndani ya nyumba yako.
Kuumwa kwa tick kwa ujumla haina uchungu na haijulikani; Kwa hivyo dalili zinaweza kuwa sio mwanzoni, au baadaye, kuwa kwa usahihi
hugunduliwa. Lakini katika hatua za hali ya juu, wakati utambuzi sahihi unatokea, hali inaweza kuwa na
kuwa muhimu.
Dalili ni sawa na zile za ugonjwa wa mzio, gout, na virusi vya Epstein-Barr (uchovu sugu
Dalili), zote tatu ambazo zinaona.
Mtihani sasa upo ambao unaweza kugundua bakteria (Borrelia burgdorferi) ambayo husababisha ugonjwa wa Lyme.
Antibodies zipo kutoka siku 3 hadi wiki 3 baada ya kuambukizwa.
Kesi nyingi hufanyika katika msimu wa joto na kuanguka. Baada ya kuumwa na tick, inasubiri masaa kadhaa kabla yake
huanza kulisha damu ya mwenyeji; Na, mara itakapofanya hivyo, hushe kwa siku 3-4. Jibu linabaki tena
Imewekwa, hatari kubwa ya ugonjwa wa Lyme.
Ugonjwa wa Lyme unaweza kutibiwa na karibu kila wakati unapatikana ikiwa hugunduliwa kwa usahihi katika hatua za mwanzo. Lakini,
Kwa sababu kuumwa kawaida huwa haina maumivu, kipindi cha incubation muda mrefu sana, na dalili zilitofautiana,
Shida inaweza kwenda kutambuliwa kwa wiki au miezi.
Ikiwa utaendeleza aina ya upele wa ng'ombe mahali popote kwenye mwili wako, angalia mtoaji wako wa huduma ya afya Haki
mbali.

title: Bubonic Plague
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Call a physician. Living cleanly and eating right is the best prevention. Healthy, rested,
people can resist infection better than others.
(The Plague)
SYMPTOMS—Following an incubation period of 2-10 days, the disease begins suddenly with a high
fever, severe headache, great weakness, and pains in the back and limbs. There may be vomiting and
diarrhea.
The fever may go up to 104o F. the first day, accompanied by intense thirst.
Buboes (swollen places) begin to appear the second day in the groin, under the arms, and in the neck.
The disease causes great weakness, and death often occurs sometime between the third and sixth day.
CAUSES—In the bubonic form of the plague, the lymph glands swell; when swollen, they are called
"buboes."
This is a disease carried by the Norway rat. The bacteria are in its droppings, which it leaves in the food
stuffs it has broken into and partly eaten.
In earlier centuries, several outbreaks of the plague occurred; during one of which one-sixth of the
people of Europe died.
There is also a pneumonic form of the plague, which is far less common. The symptoms are about the
same as pneumonia, but it is transmitted through the air and is extremely contagious.
The plague essentially never occurs in the Western world today. We mention it here so you will be
aware of the symptoms.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Piga simu daktari. Kuishi safi na kula kulia ndio kuzuia bora. Afya, kupumzika,
Watu wanaweza kupinga maambukizi bora kuliko wengine.
(Pigo)
Dalili-Kufuatia kipindi cha incubation cha siku 2-10, ugonjwa huanza ghafla na juu
Homa, maumivu ya kichwa kali, udhaifu mkubwa, na maumivu nyuma na miguu. Kunaweza kuwa na kutapika na
kuhara.
Homa inaweza kwenda hadi 104O F. Siku ya kwanza, ikifuatana na kiu kali.
Buboes (maeneo ya kuvimba) huanza kuonekana siku ya pili kwenye gongo, chini ya mikono, na shingoni.
Ugonjwa huo husababisha udhaifu mkubwa, na kifo mara nyingi hufanyika wakati fulani kati ya siku ya tatu na ya sita.
Sababu - katika fomu ya bubonic ya pigo, tezi za lymph zimevimba; Wakati kuvimba, huitwa
"Buboes."
Hii ni ugonjwa uliochukuliwa na panya wa Norway. Bakteria ziko kwenye matone yake, ambayo huacha kwenye chakula
Vitu vimevunjika na kwa sehemu huliwa.
Katika karne za mapema, milipuko kadhaa ya pigo ilitokea; Wakati wa moja ya moja ya sita ya
Watu wa Ulaya walikufa.
Kuna pia aina ya pneumonic ya pigo, ambayo ni ya kawaida sana. Dalili ni juu ya
Sawa na pneumonia, lakini hupitishwa kupitia hewa na inaambukiza sana.
Pigo kimsingi kamwe hufanyika katika ulimwengu wa magharibi leo. Tunataja hapa ili uwe
kufahamu dalili.

title: Rabies
contentEn:
(Hydrophobia)
SYMPTOMS—Symptoms begin appearing within 1-4 months after the bite, but sometimes longer.
They include numbness, soreness, and tingling where the bite occurred.
These sensations spread, and it becomes difficult to swallow, breathe, and talk.
Then more extensive muscle spasms begin, and the victim gradually becomes maniacal. The final stages
are depression, exhaustion and sometimes paralysis, coma, and death.
If the symptoms of rabies have already begun to appear, the person will probably die.
See end of this article for symptoms in a rabid dog. Rabies can also be transmitted by the bite of infected
bats, foxes, skunks, and other animals.
CAUSES AND TREATMENT—
• A backwoodsy nature doctor, who has treated all kinds of things with remarkable
success, says to do this: Wash the wound with water right away and then mix with half
and half vinegar and warm water, and wash the wounds with it. When dry, apply 1-2
drops of muriatic acid (hydrochloric acid) to each wound. Do this even if, what appears to
be, a rabid dog only licks a previous wound on you.
• For extra precaution, you may apply a tourniquet and a rubber vacuum cup as for a snake
bite (which see for further details). If acid is not available, you may burn the wound with a
magnifying glass in the sunlight. Or use a red-hot iron. Then treat as for a regular burn
until it is healed. This treatment usually prevents further worry. So says this
backwoodsman.
• Jethro Kloss has a lengthy article on this in his book, Back to Eden (pp. 490-495) (see
order sheet). He also says to put hydrochloric acid on the wound, to neutralize the rabies
poison in the saliva. Then, after discussing a number of herbal remedies to also use, he
quotes a scientific paper by an M. Buisson, read to the French Academy of Arts and
Sciences. M. Buisson had accidentally contracted rabies from a women suffering with it.
By the time he discovered he had it, the disease was advanced and he knew he was soon to
die. Kloss quotes a London newspaper which reported on the scientific paper:
"Concluding from these various symptoms that he was suffering with
hydrophobia, he [Buisson] resolved to make an end of himself by
suffocating himself in a vapor [steam] bath. With this view, he raised the
heat very, very, hot, but was delighted, no less than surprised, to find that all
his pains disappeared. He went out of the bath completely cured, ate a
hearty dinner, and drank more freely than was usual with him. He adds that
he has treated more than fourscore persons who have been bitten by mad
dogs in a similar manner, and they all recovered, with the exception of a
child seven years old, who died in a vapour bath he was
administering."—Kloss, Back to Eden, p. 493.
• Water therapists normally work with a steam bath temperature of 115o-120o F. (See our
Water Therapy Manual (see order sheet) for detailed information on steam baths, pp. 131-
138.) Those with diabetes, valvular heart disease, extreme arteriosclerosis, or emaciation
should not use a steam bath.
Kloss also quotes a German newspaper which discussed an incident which happened in Saxony:
• "A Saxon forester named Gastell, at the age of 82, unwilling to take to the grave with
him a secret of so much importance, has made public in the Leipsic Journal the method
which he used for fifty years, and he affirms he has rescued many human beings and cattle
from the fearful death of hydrophobia. Wash the wound immediately with warm water
and vinegar; let it dry, and then pour upon the wound a few drops of hydrochloric acid,
and that will neutralize and destroy the poison of the saliva."—Op. cit., p. 494.
We included the above as a matter of historical interest. Now we return to modern physiologic and
medical theory on rabies:
• Nearly all human rabies cases result from dog bites. The animal can transmit disease
before it shows symptoms of rabies; but, except in rare instances, the symptoms will
appear within 10 days if it is rabid. The disease is always fatal, unless it is halted by a
series of Pasteur treatments, which are started before symptoms first appear.
• If at all possible, it is crucial to confine the animal which inflicted the bite so it can be
observed. The course of the disease runs so fast that the animal should show symptoms of
rabies before they begin to appear in the person. If the animal is rabid, it will show clear
signs within 2 weeks, then the person bitten should begin the Pasteur series of rabies shots
(unless circumstances are clear that the animal was not rabid).
• If the animal got away and cannot be found, then the person should immediately take the
rabies vaccine series.
• If the series has already been started, and the animal is then found not to have rabies, the
Pasteur treatments can be stopped.
• About 10%-12% of persons bitten by a known rabid animal, and not treated, will
contract rabies and die. If the Pasteur series is started within 2 weeks or less after the bite,
about one-third of 1% of those bitten will die.
• It is not widely known that rabies is sometimes transmitted accidentally in hospitals.
Rabies in humans is sometimes misdiagnosed as a stroke. After death, some of that rabid
tissue may be transplanted to another person.
• If your child's pet hamster bites him, do not think the child needs to start rabies shots.
Know that, if you have had that hamster for 3 weeks or more and it shows no symptoms of
rabies, the hamster does not have rabies.
• Rabies shots last 10 days and are so difficult to take that the person often goes to the
hospital for respiratory support while they are in progress.
SYMPTOMS IN THE DOG—Initially, there is a marked change in its disposition. He will become
very friendly or very snappy; the bark becomes hoarse.
Paralysis may soon develop—first the lower jaw, then the hind legs, and gradually the rest of the body.
But, instead, the dog wants to run away. It may run for miles, snapping at any creature which comes near
it.
Finally, it becomes exhausted and paralysis sets in.
If a dog shows signs of rabies, it must be chained (not roped), and observed for 2 weeks.
—Also see "Dog or Animal Bite" and "Antispasmodic Tincture."
contentSw:
(Hydrophobia)
Dalili-Symptoms huanza kuonekana ndani ya miezi 1-4 baada ya kuuma, lakini wakati mwingine ni ndefu.
Ni pamoja na ganzi, uchungu, na kuuma ambapo bite ilitokea.
Hizi hisia zinaenea, na inakuwa ngumu kumeza, kupumua, na kuongea.
Halafu spasms kubwa zaidi ya misuli huanza, na mwathiriwa polepole huwa maniacal. Hatua za mwisho
ni unyogovu, uchovu na wakati mwingine kupooza, kufariki, na kifo.
Ikiwa dalili za ugonjwa wa kichaa tayari zimeanza kuonekana, mtu huyo atakufa.
Tazama mwisho wa nakala hii kwa dalili katika mbwa mkali. Uchawi pia unaweza kupitishwa na kuumwa kwa walioambukizwa
popo, mbweha, skunks, na wanyama wengine.
Sababu na matibabu--
• Daktari wa asili wa nyuma, ambaye ametibu vitu vya kila aina na ya kushangaza
mafanikio, anasema kufanya hivi: osha jeraha na maji mara moja kisha uchanganye na nusu
na siki nusu na maji ya joto, na osha majeraha nayo. Wakati kavu, tumia 1-2
Matone ya asidi ya muriatic (asidi ya hydrochloric) kwa kila jeraha. Fanya hivi hata ikiwa, ni nini kinaonekana
Kuwa, mbwa mchafu anakunja tu jeraha la hapo awali juu yako.
• Kwa tahadhari ya ziada, unaweza kutumia mashindano na kikombe cha utupu wa mpira kama kwa nyoka
kuuma (ambayo huona kwa maelezo zaidi). Ikiwa asidi haipatikani, unaweza kuchoma jeraha na
Kukuza glasi kwenye jua. Au tumia chuma nyekundu-moto. Kisha kutibu kama kuchoma mara kwa mara
mpaka itakapopona. Tiba hii kawaida huzuia wasiwasi zaidi. Ndivyo inavyosema hii
Backwoodsman.
• Jethro Kloss ana nakala ndefu juu ya hii katika kitabu chake, Rudi Edeni (mash. 490-495) (tazama
karatasi ya kuagiza). Anasema pia kuweka asidi ya hydrochloric kwenye jeraha, ili kugeuza kichaa cha mbwa
sumu kwenye mshono. Halafu, baada ya kujadili idadi ya tiba za mitishamba pia kutumia, yeye
ananukuu karatasi ya kisayansi na M. Buisson, soma kwa Chuo cha Sanaa cha Ufaransa na
Sayansi. M. Buisson kwa bahati mbaya alipata ugonjwa wa kichaa cha mbwa kutoka kwa wanawake wanaosumbuliwa nayo.
Wakati alipogundua alikuwa nayo, ugonjwa huo ulikuwa wa juu na alijua alikuwa hivi karibuni
kufa. Kloss ananukuu gazeti la London ambalo liliripoti kwenye karatasi ya kisayansi:
"Kuhitimisha kutoka kwa dalili hizi tofauti ambazo alikuwa akiteseka nazo
hydrophobia, yeye [Buisson] aliamua kujimaliza
Kujiondoa katika umwagaji wa mvuke [mvuke]. Kwa maoni haya, aliinua
joto sana, moto sana, lakini ilifurahi, sio chini ya kushangaa, kupata hiyo yote
Ma maumivu yake yalipotea. Akatoka kwenye bafu alipona kabisa, alikula a
Chakula cha jioni cha moyo, na kunywa kwa uhuru zaidi kuliko kawaida naye. Anaongeza hiyo
Amewatendea zaidi ya watu wanne ambao wameumwa na wazimu
mbwa kwa njia ile ile, na wote walipona, isipokuwa
Mtoto wa miaka saba, ambaye alikufa katika umwagaji wa mvuke alikuwa
Kusimamia. " - Kloss, kurudi Edeni, p. 493.
• Wataalam wa maji kawaida hufanya kazi na joto la kuoga la mvuke la 115O-20O F. (tazama yetu
Mwongozo wa Tiba ya Maji (tazama Karatasi ya Agizo) Kwa habari ya kina juu ya bafu za mvuke, uk. 131-
138.) Wale walio na ugonjwa wa sukari, ugonjwa wa moyo wa valvular, ugonjwa wa arteriosclerosis uliokithiri, au emaciation
Haipaswi kutumia umwagaji wa mvuke.
Kloss pia ananukuu gazeti la Ujerumani ambalo lilijadili tukio lililotokea huko Saxony:
• "Forester wa Saxon anayeitwa Gastell, akiwa na umri wa miaka 82, hakutaka kuchukua kaburi na
yeye siri ya umuhimu sana, ametoa umma katika jarida la Leipsic Njia hiyo
ambayo alitumia kwa miaka hamsini, na anathibitisha kuwa ameokoa wanadamu wengi na ng'ombe
Kutoka kwa kifo cha kutisha cha hydrophobia. Osha jeraha mara moja na maji ya joto
na siki; Wacha iwe kavu, na kisha kumwaga juu ya jeraha matone machache ya asidi ya hydrochloric,
na hiyo itabadilisha na kuharibu sumu ya mshono. " - op. Cit., P. 494.
Tulijumuisha hapo juu kama suala la maslahi ya kihistoria. Sasa tunarudi kwa kisaikolojia ya kisasa na
nadharia ya matibabu juu ya ugonjwa wa kichaa cha mbwa:
• Karibu kesi zote za ugonjwa wa kibinadamu hutokana na kuumwa na mbwa. Mnyama anaweza kusambaza magonjwa
Kabla inaonyesha dalili za ugonjwa wa kichaa cha mbwa; Lakini, isipokuwa katika hali adimu, dalili zitafanya
kuonekana ndani ya siku 10 ikiwa ni mkali. Ugonjwa huwa mbaya kila wakati, isipokuwa ikiwa imesimamishwa na
Mfululizo wa matibabu ya Pasteur, ambayo yameanza kabla ya dalili kuonekana mara ya kwanza.
• Ikiwezekana, ni muhimu kumfunga mnyama ambaye alisababisha kuuma ili iweze kuwa
kuzingatiwa. Kozi ya ugonjwa inaendesha haraka sana kwamba mnyama anapaswa kuonyesha dalili za
Rabi kabla ya kuanza kuonekana ndani ya mtu. Ikiwa mnyama ni mkali, itaonyesha wazi
Ishara ndani ya wiki 2, basi mtu aliyeumwa anapaswa kuanza safu ya Pasteur ya risasi za kichaa
(Isipokuwa hali ziko wazi kuwa mnyama hakuwa mchafu).
• Ikiwa mnyama aliondoka na haweza kupatikana, basi mtu anapaswa kuchukua mara moja
Mfululizo wa chanjo ya kichaa cha mbwa.
• Ikiwa mfululizo tayari umeanza, na mnyama hupatikana hana ugonjwa wa kichaa cha mbwa, the
Matibabu ya Pasteur yanaweza kusimamishwa.
• Karibu 10% -12% ya watu walioumwa na mnyama anayejulikana, na sio kutibiwa, watafanya
Mkataba wa kichaa cha mbwa na kufa. Ikiwa safu ya Pasteur imeanza ndani ya wiki 2 au chini baada ya kuumwa,
Karibu theluthi moja ya 1% ya wale walioumwa watakufa.
• Haijulikani sana kuwa ugonjwa wa kichaa cha mbwa wakati mwingine hupitishwa kwa bahati mbaya katika hospitali.
Rabi kwa wanadamu wakati mwingine hutambuliwa vibaya kama kiharusi. Baada ya kifo, baadhi ya rabid hiyo
Tishu zinaweza kupandikizwa kwa mtu mwingine.
• Ikiwa mtoto wako hamster ya mtoto wako anamuuma, usifikirie mtoto anahitaji kuanza shots za ugonjwa wa kichaa cha mbwa.
Ujue kuwa, ikiwa umekuwa na hamster hiyo kwa wiki 3 au zaidi na inaonyesha hakuna dalili za
Rabi, hamster haina kichaa cha mbwa.
• Risasi za kichaa cha mbwa hudumu siku 10 na ni ngumu sana kuchukua kwamba mtu huyo mara nyingi huenda kwa
Hospitali ya msaada wa kupumua wakati wanaendelea.
Dalili katika mbwa - bila shaka, kuna mabadiliko ya alama katika mtazamo wake. Atakuwa
Kirafiki sana au snappy sana; Gome huwa hoarse.
Kupooza kunaweza kukuza hivi karibuni - kwanza taya ya chini, kisha miguu ya nyuma, na polepole mwili wote.
Lakini, badala yake, mbwa anataka kukimbia. Inaweza kukimbia kwa maili, ikipiga kiumbe chochote ambacho kinakaribia
IT.
Mwishowe, inakuwa imechoka na kupooza huingia.
Ikiwa mbwa anaonyesha dalili za ugonjwa wa kichaa cha mbwa, lazima iwe minyororo (sio ya kung'olewa), na kuzingatiwa kwa wiki 2.
-Unaona "Kuuma Mbwa au Wanyama" na "Tincture ya Antispasmodic."

title: Tularemia
contentEn:
(Rabbit fever)
SYMPTOMS—The first indication is a local ulceration at the infection site. About 1-7 days after
infection occurs, chills, headache, prostration, and general pains suddenly begin. The disease is
characterized by high fever and recurring chills with drenching sweat. A shallow but ongoing ulcer
develops at the site of the original wound or bite. Lymph glands draining that area become swollen and
painful (but they should not be lanced!).
If not treated, the fever generally lasts 3-4 weeks, and generally is not fatal. But convalescence is slow.
Physical and mental depression can last for months.
CAUSES—One cause is the bite of an animal, generally a rabbit. A more frequent cause today (87%) is
cutting oneself while skinning and dressing infected rabbits or ground squirrels. Often these are wild
rabbits.
If you notice the appearance of symptoms—and you have been working with rabbits, especially wild
ones—then have the condition immediately diagnosed. Sputum samples are highly contagious, so the lab
should be warned about your suspicions.
TREATMENT—Go to a physician.
contentSw:
(Homa ya sungura)
Dalili -Dalili ya kwanza ni vidonda vya ndani kwenye tovuti ya maambukizi. Karibu siku 1-7 baada
Maambukizi hufanyika, baridi, maumivu ya kichwa, kusujudu, na maumivu ya jumla huanza ghafla. Ugonjwa ni
Inajulikana na homa ya juu na baridi mara kwa mara na jasho la kumwagika. Kidonda kisicho na kina
Inakua kwenye tovuti ya jeraha la asili au kuuma. Tezi za lymph zinazoondoa eneo hilo huwa kuvimba na
chungu (lakini haipaswi kupunguzwa!).
Ikiwa haijatibiwa, homa kwa ujumla huchukua wiki 3-4, na kwa ujumla sio mbaya. Lakini convalescence ni polepole.
Unyogovu wa mwili na kiakili unaweza kudumu kwa miezi.
Sababu - sababu moja ni kuumwa kwa mnyama, kwa ujumla sungura. Sababu ya mara kwa mara zaidi leo (87%) ni
Kujikata mwenyewe wakati wa ngozi na kuvaa sungura zilizoambukizwa au squirrels za ardhini. Mara nyingi hizi ni mwitu
sungura.
Ikiwa utagundua kuonekana kwa dalili -na umekuwa ukifanya kazi na sungura, haswa mwitu
Wale - basi hali hiyo hugunduliwa mara moja. Sampuli za Sputum zinaambukiza sana, kwa hivyo maabara
inapaswa kuonywa juu ya tuhuma zako.
Matibabu -nenda kwa daktari.

title: Cat Coccidia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• See a physician. Diagnosis is made from a positive blood test or skin test.
PREVENTION—Women should avoid cats just prior to, and during, pregnancy. They should only eat
well-cooked meat. Better yet, stop eating it entirely, since many diseases are transmitted through eating
meat, poultry, fish, and shellfish.
(Toxoplasmosis)
SYMPTOMS—Symptoms can mimic the flu, cause headache, high fever, rash, swollen lymph nodes,
meningitis, hepatitis, pneumonitis, myocarditis, blindness, and diarrhea.
If a pregnant woman contracts this disease, it will cause birth defects in the fetus (brain defects,
blindness, and/or mental retardation).
CAUSES—Those who keep cats should be aware of this danger. Cat coccidia is caused by a tiny
protozoa (Isospora bigemina) which lives in the intestines of cats. Apparently, it is in many cats!
This disease is acquired by inhaling or swallowing dust from contaminated kitty litter boxes or outdoor
sand or dirt piles. But it can also come from eating rare beef. While that protozoa is in an intermediate
stage, it is outside the cat's intestines—and can enter the human body.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Tazama daktari. Utambuzi hufanywa kutoka kwa mtihani mzuri wa damu au mtihani wa ngozi.
Kuzuia - Wanawake wanapaswa kuzuia paka kabla tu, na wakati wa ujauzito. Wanapaswa kula tu
nyama iliyopikwa vizuri. Bora zaidi, acha kula kabisa, kwani magonjwa mengi hupitishwa kupitia kula
Nyama, kuku, samaki, na samaki.
(Toxoplasmosis)
Dalili -Symptoms zinaweza kuiga homa, kusababisha maumivu ya kichwa, homa kubwa, upele, nodi za lymph zilizojaa,
Meningitis, hepatitis, pneumonitis, myocarditis, upofu, na kuhara.
Ikiwa mwanamke mjamzito ataka mikataba ya ugonjwa huu, itasababisha kasoro za kuzaliwa kwenye fetusi (kasoro za ubongo,
upofu, na/au kurudi nyuma kwa akili).
Sababu - wale ambao huweka paka wanapaswa kufahamu hatari hii. CAT Coccidia husababishwa na ndogo
Protozoa (Isospora bigemina) ambayo huishi ndani ya matumbo ya paka. Inavyoonekana, ni katika paka nyingi!
Ugonjwa huu unapatikana kwa kuvuta pumzi au kumeza vumbi kutoka kwa sanduku za takataka zilizochafuliwa au nje
mchanga au milundo ya uchafu. Lakini pia inaweza kutoka kwa kula nyama ya kawaida. Wakati protozoa hiyo iko katika kati
Hatua, ni nje ya matumbo ya paka -na inaweza kuingia ndani ya mwili wa mwanadamu.

title: Allergies
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Take vitamin C to bowel tolerance (the amount you can take before diarrhea results from
the acidity in the C).
• Take vitamin A and zinc, and be sure and get enough essential fatty acids and vitamin B
complex.
• Eat a balanced, moderate, nutritious diet and drink enough water—and you will find that
many things in your life will improve.
• Try a fruit and vegetable juice fast for 1-3 days. If you are not thin, repeat it every
month.
• Here is a good liver flush to take during the fast: 1 teaspoon of olive oil, one-half
teaspoon of fresh ginger, 1 teaspoon of fenugreek, 1 teaspoon of ground dandelion, the
juice of 1 fresh lemon, and a pinch of cayenne. Mix it in juice and drink every morning
during the fast.
• Building up the body and avoiding the offensive substances is what you want. Regarding
the second, what should you avoid? The simplest solution is to do a pulse test. Include one
test item in each meal; take your pulse after each meal, and see if that item raised your
pulse a little. Some people are disturbed each time they ride in a car. Keep searching for
causes.
Here are other ways to have avoidance:
• Vacuum the house and car more often. Air-condition the house and car. Install an air
cleaner in your bedroom or get one which connects to your central air conditioner. Buy a
dehumidifier.
• Wrap your bedding in plastic. Use a synthetic pillow or none at all. Wash mattress pads
more often.
• Get rid of the old carpets, clean the floors, and either install new carpets or stop using
them. Use throw rugs instead.
• Clean damp areas in your home, such as under the sink and around the bathtub.
• If you have animals in the house, keep them clean, well groomed and healthy.
Frequently change cages or wash their bedding. Animals are not involved in allergy as
frequently as people think. They seem to be the 'allergy scapegoats'.
If you have absolute unmistakable evidence that a pet is the source of an allergy, try
bathing it and keeping it well groomed. If this fails, be sure to find a good home for the
pet. It is a living thing also and its needs should be respected. As a child with asthma I
several times suffered having my pets taken from me when I would go to certain 'allergy
specialists'- it never helped my asthma- and it sure didn't help my emotional
development! (temcat edit)
• Set aside one room which you keep air-filtered.
—Also see "Hay Fever." Important, also see "How to Do the Pulse Test," immediately below. It explains
how to identify food allergies.
SYMPTOMS—Digestive (after eating) symptoms: Dry mouth, food intolerance, stomach ulcers, canker
sores, excessive tiredness, palpitations, swelled stomach, sweating, mental fuzziness, stinging tongue,
metallic taste, heartburn, indigestion, vomiting, nausea, diarrhea, constipation, food cravings, pains,
intestinal gas, gall bladder trouble.
Muscular and skeletal symptoms: Arthritis; aches in neck, back, or shoulders; fatigue; spasms; joint
pain.
Respiratory and throat symptoms: Cough, asthma, frequent colds, postnasal drip, wheezing, hay fever,
nosebleeds, chest tightness, hoarseness, shortness of breath, dry or sore throat.
Nervous symptoms: Tachycardia (fast heart rate), palpitations, depression, anger, anxiety, confusion,
irritability, hyperactivity, restlessness, learning and memory problems.
Skin symptoms: Blotches, acne, flushing, hives, dark circles under eyes, itching, eczema, psoriasis.
CAUSES—An allergy is a sensitivity to some particular substance, known as an allergen. It may be
harmless to some while causing problems for others. The allergen may be a food, inhalant, or chemical.
It may be smoke, molds, pollen, perfume, formalin, etc.
Causes vary widely: There can be urticaria (skin rash with itching) from fish or strawberries; paranoia
from sugar; headaches from perfume; or asthma-like symptoms from sulfite (a preservative in sulphured
raisins and apricots). The list goes on and on.
Mold is a special problem. It can be in the house, in the food, in the drugs (that is what the penicillin-
type drugs are: mold!). Avoid dampness in, or around, your home.
It is estimated that 35 million Americans, alone, have some type of allergy.
Unfortunately, we live in the chemical age. The body cannot handle all the problem substances entering
it, and it rebels.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Chukua vitamini C kwa uvumilivu wa matumbo (kiasi unachoweza kuchukua kabla ya kuhara matokeo kutoka
asidi katika C).
• Chukua vitamini A na zinki, na uhakikishe na upate asidi muhimu ya mafuta na vitamini B
tata.
• Kula lishe bora, wastani, lishe na kunywa maji ya kutosha -na utapata hiyo
Vitu vingi katika maisha yako vitaboresha.
• Jaribu juisi ya matunda na mboga haraka kwa siku 1-3. Ikiwa wewe sio nyembamba, rudia kila
mwezi.
• Hapa kuna ini nzuri ya kuchukua wakati wa kufunga: kijiko 1 cha mafuta, nusu moja
kijiko cha tangawizi safi, kijiko 1 cha fenugreek, kijiko 1 cha dandelion ya ardhini, The
Juisi ya limau 1 safi, na uzani wa cayenne. Changanya katika juisi na kunywa kila asubuhi
Wakati wa kufunga.
• Kuunda mwili na kuzuia vitu vya kukera ndio unataka. Kuhusu
Ya pili, unapaswa kuepusha nini? Suluhisho rahisi ni kufanya mtihani wa kunde. Ni pamoja na moja
Bidhaa ya jaribio katika kila mlo; Chukua mapigo yako baada ya kila mlo, na uone ikiwa kitu hicho kiliinua yako
Piga kidogo. Watu wengine husumbuliwa kila wakati wanapanda gari. Endelea kutafuta
sababu.
Hapa kuna njia zingine za kujiepusha:
• Vuta nyumba na gari mara nyingi zaidi. Hali ya hewa nyumba na gari. Weka hewa
Safi katika chumba chako cha kulala au pata moja ambayo inaunganisha kwa kiyoyozi chako cha kati. Nunua a
dehumidifier.
• Funga kitanda chako katika plastiki. Tumia mto wa syntetisk au hakuna kabisa. Osha pedi za godoro
mara nyingi zaidi.
• Ondoa mazulia ya zamani, safisha sakafu, na usakinishe mazulia mpya au acha kutumia
Them. Tumia rugs za kutupa badala yake.
• Safi maeneo yenye unyevunyevu ndani ya nyumba yako, kama vile chini ya kuzama na kuzunguka bafu.
• Ikiwa una wanyama ndani ya nyumba, waweke safi, wamefungwa vizuri na wenye afya.
Badilisha mara kwa mara mabwawa au osha kitanda chao. Wanyama hawashiriki katika mzio kama
mara kwa mara kama watu wanavyofikiria. Wanaonekana kuwa 'mzio wa mzio'.
Ikiwa una ushahidi kamili usioelezeka kwamba mnyama ndiye chanzo cha mzio, jaribu
Kuoga na kuiweka vizuri. Ikiwa hii itashindwa, hakikisha kupata nyumba nzuri kwa
pet. Ni kitu hai pia na mahitaji yake yanapaswa kuheshimiwa. Kama mtoto na pumu i
mara kadhaa aliteseka na kipenzi changu kilichukuliwa kutoka kwangu wakati ningeenda kwa mzio fulani
Wataalam'- Haijawahi kusaidia pumu yangu- na hakika haikusaidia kihemko changu
Maendeleo! (Temcat hariri)
• Weka kando chumba kimoja ambacho unaweka hewa-iliyochujwa.
-Unaona "Homa ya Hay." Muhimu, pia angalia "Jinsi ya kufanya mtihani wa mapigo," mara moja hapa chini. Inaelezea
Jinsi ya kutambua mzio wa chakula.
Dalili - Vijiti (baada ya kula) Dalili: kinywa kavu, uvumilivu wa chakula, vidonda vya tumbo, canker
Vidonda, uchovu mwingi, palpitations, tumbo lililojaa, jasho, uchungu wa akili, ulimi wa kuuma,
Ladha ya metali, mapigo ya moyo, kumeza, kutapika, kichefuchefu, kuhara, kuvimbiwa, matamanio ya chakula, maumivu,
Gesi ya ndani, shida ya kibofu cha nduru.
Dalili za misuli na mifupa: arthritis; maumivu katika shingo, nyuma, au mabega; uchovu; spasms; pamoja
maumivu.
Dalili za kupumua na za koo: kikohozi, pumu, homa za mara kwa mara, matone ya baada ya kuzaa, kunyoa, homa ya nyasi,
Nosebleeds, kifua kifua, hoarseness, upungufu wa pumzi, kavu au koo.
Dalili za neva: tachycardia (kiwango cha moyo haraka), palpitations, unyogovu, hasira, wasiwasi, machafuko,
Uwezo, hyperacaction, kutokuwa na utulivu, shida za kujifunza na kumbukumbu.
Dalili za ngozi: blotches, chunusi, kujaa, mikoko, miduara ya giza chini ya macho, kuwasha, eczema, psoriasis.
Sababu -mzio ni unyeti wa dutu fulani, inayojulikana kama mzio. Inaweza kuwa
haina madhara kwa wengine wakati husababisha shida kwa wengine. Allergen inaweza kuwa chakula, kuvuta pumzi, au kemikali.
Inaweza kuwa moshi, ukungu, poleni, manukato, formalin, nk.
Sababu hutofautiana sana: kunaweza kuwa na urticaria (upele wa ngozi na kuwasha) kutoka kwa samaki au jordgubbar; paranoia
kutoka sukari; maumivu ya kichwa kutoka manukato; au dalili kama za pumu kutoka kwa sulfite (kihifadhi katika sulphured
zabibu na apricots). Orodha inaendelea na kuendelea.
Mold ni shida maalum. Inaweza kuwa ndani ya nyumba, katika chakula, katika dawa (ndivyo penicillin-
Dawa za aina ni: ukungu!). Epuka unyevu ndani, au karibu, nyumba yako.
Inakadiriwa kuwa Wamarekani milioni 35, peke yao, wana aina fulani ya mzio.
Kwa bahati mbaya, tunaishi katika wakati wa kemikali. Mwili hauwezi kushughulikia vitu vyote vya shida kuingia
Ni, na inaasi.

title: Hay Fever
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The most effective treatment is to avoid the irritant.
• Vitamin C in large doses of 200 mg or more daily greatly helps many with this problem.
• Vitamin A is essential for proper functioning of the respiratory system. The B complex
(especially B and B ) help the body produce interferon, to protect the body against
6 12
allergens.
• Calcium, magnesium, potassium, selenium, and zinc are also important.
• Be sure and eat green leafy vegetables. Stay on a high-fiber diet.
• Try eating unprocessed, raw, honey. It is rich in pollen.
• Water helps flush out the system. Be sure you are drinking enough.
• Because it firms up blood vessels throughout the body, exercise decreases nasal
stuffiness.
• A hot footbath helps relieve nasal congestion.
• Consider these possibilities: Cold cloths wrung from ice water applied to the forehead
greatly help. Change as soon as they warm up. Relief comes in about 45 minutes, but
continue it for 3 hours. Then intermittently for 6 hours. In some, this treatment has
stopped attacks for the season.
• Build up the immune system, and clean the blood and colon. Healthy sinuses have moist
mucous membranes similar to the skin in the mouth. They are able to wash pollen and
other irritants out of the nasal cavities and down the throat into the stomach, where they
are neutralized.
• Guard against chilling. It constricts blood vessels in the skin, driving blood
elsewhere—including the nasal cavities. This causes a swelling in the sinuses, which
makes the symptoms worse.
• Fenugreek helps eliminate hard mucous from the body. Garlic kills bacteria. Goldenseal
helps clear out toxins from the digestive tract.
• Cover mattress and pillows with plastic. Avoid wool bedding or furniture stuffed with
horsehair.
• If you have animals in the house, keep them clean, well groomed and healthy.
Frequently change cages or wash their bedding. (temcat edit)
—Also see "Allergies" and "Asthma."
(Allergic Rhinitis)
SYMPTOMS—Itching in the nose, throat, and eyes. Runny or stuffy nose, headaches, pain in the head
and sinuses, blurred vision, red and itchy eyes, postnasal drip. A clear, watery, discharge from the nose
and eyes occurs. There is sneezing and nervous irritability.
CAUSES—Hay fever is most frequently caused by breathing in plant pollens. (Ragweed and grass
pollen are the worst offenders.) The problem tends to be seasonal (spring or fall), according to plant
cycles. But some may have to suffer with it all year long if they are sensitive to dust, feathers, or animal
danders. Such people are said to have perennial allergic rhinitis.
Hay fever is a reaction of the mucous membranes of the eyes, nose, and air passages to such seasonal
pollens, as well as to dust, feathers, animal hair, and other irritants.
Dry, windy, days; riding in an open car; and working in the garden sometimes increase symptoms.
Morning and evening hours are the most uncomfortable. Midday may be better.
Stressful situations and alcoholic beverages can trigger an attack.
Anger, resentment, or negative thoughts can increase the symptoms.
Hay fever sufferers frequently also have asthma and dermatitis.
The body is trying to clean out toxins and dust. If the diet is not nutritious; if the person is eating too
much or eating foods, such as milk, ice cream, sugar, and white-flour products, the overloaded system
cannot deal properly with the additional task of resisting the effects of airborne pollens.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Tiba inayofaa zaidi ni kuzuia kukasirisha.
• Vitamini C katika kipimo kikubwa cha 200 mg au zaidi kila siku husaidia sana wengi na shida hii.
• Vitamini A ni muhimu kwa utendaji mzuri wa mfumo wa kupumua. Tata ya B.
(haswa b na b) husaidia mwili kutoa interferon, kulinda mwili dhidi ya
6 12
mzio.
• Kalsiamu, magnesiamu, potasiamu, seleniamu, na zinki pia ni muhimu.
• Hakikisha na kula mboga za majani zenye majani. Kaa kwenye lishe yenye nyuzi nyingi.
• Jaribu kula bila kufanikiwa, mbichi, asali. Ni tajiri katika poleni.
• Maji husaidia kutoa mfumo. Hakikisha unakunywa vya kutosha.
• Kwa sababu inakusanya mishipa ya damu kwa mwili wote, mazoezi hupungua pua
Uwezo.
• Njia ya moto husaidia kupunguza msongamano wa pua.
• Fikiria uwezekano huu: vitambaa baridi vilivyochomwa kutoka kwa maji ya barafu yaliyotumika kwenye paji la uso
Msaada sana. Badilisha mara tu watakapo joto. Msaada huja kama dakika 45, lakini
Endelea kwa masaa 3. Kisha mara kwa mara kwa masaa 6. Katika wengine, matibabu haya yana
Kusimamisha mashambulio kwa msimu.
• Jenga mfumo wa kinga, na usafishe damu na koloni. Sinuses zenye afya zina unyevu
Utando wa mucous sawa na ngozi kinywani. Wanaweza kuosha poleni na
Washawishi wengine nje ya vifaru vya pua na chini ya koo ndani ya tumbo, ambapo wao
hazijatengwa.
• Jinda dhidi ya kutuliza. Inasababisha mishipa ya damu kwenye ngozi, kuendesha damu
Mahali pengine - pamoja na vifijo vya pua. Hii husababisha uvimbe katika sinuses, ambayo
hufanya dalili kuwa mbaya zaidi.
• Fenugreek husaidia kuondoa mucous ngumu kutoka kwa mwili. Vitunguu huua bakteria. Goldenseal
Husaidia kusafisha sumu kutoka kwa njia ya utumbo.
• Funika godoro na mito na plastiki. Epuka kitanda cha pamba au fanicha iliyotiwa
farasi.
• Ikiwa una wanyama ndani ya nyumba, waweke safi, wamefungwa vizuri na wenye afya.
Badilisha mara kwa mara mabwawa au osha kitanda chao. (Temcat hariri)
-Unaona "mzio" na "pumu."
(Mzio rhinitis)
Dalili -Kuweka kwenye pua, koo, na macho. Pua ya kukimbia au ya kupendeza, maumivu ya kichwa, maumivu kichwani
na sinuses, maono ya wazi, macho nyekundu na ya kuwasha, matone ya baada ya kuzaa. Kutoa wazi, maji, kutokwa kutoka pua
na macho hufanyika. Kuna uchungu na kuwashwa kwa neva.
Sababu - homa ya kumesababishwa husababishwa mara nyingi na kupumua katika poleni za mmea. (Ragweed na nyasi
Poleni ndio wakosaji mbaya zaidi.) Shida huelekea kuwa ya msimu (chemchemi au kuanguka), kulingana na mmea
mizunguko. Lakini wengine wanaweza kulazimika kuteseka nayo mwaka mzima ikiwa ni nyeti kwa vumbi, manyoya, au mnyama
danders. Watu kama hao wanasemekana kuwa na rhinitis ya mzio wa kudumu.
Homa ya hay ni majibu ya utando wa macho, pua, na vifungu vya hewa kwa msimu kama huo
poleni, pamoja na vumbi, manyoya, nywele za wanyama, na vitu vingine vya kukasirisha.
Kavu, upepo, siku; Kuendesha gari wazi; Na kufanya kazi katika bustani wakati mwingine huongeza dalili.
Saa za asubuhi na jioni ndio zisizofurahi zaidi. Mchana inaweza kuwa bora.
Hali zenye mkazo na vileo vinaweza kusababisha shambulio.
Hasira, chuki, au mawazo hasi yanaweza kuongeza dalili.
Wagonjwa wa homa ya hay mara nyingi pia huwa na pumu na dermatitis.
Mwili unajaribu kusafisha sumu na vumbi. Ikiwa lishe sio lishe; Ikiwa mtu anakula pia
vyakula vingi au vya kula, kama vile maziwa, ice cream, sukari, na bidhaa za unga mweupe, mfumo uliojaa zaidi
Haiwezi kushughulika vizuri na kazi ya ziada ya kupinga athari za poleni za hewa.

title: Food Poisoning
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• As soon as you believe you have food poisoning, take a eyedropperful of alcohol-free
goldenseal extract every 4 hours for 24 hours. This natural antibiotic will destroy bacteria
in the intestinal tract. (But never take goldenseal for more than a week at a time, during
pregnancy, or if you are allergic to ragweed.)
• Take 6 charcoal tablets immediately, and again in 6 hours. They will help neutralize
poisons in your bloodstream. Drink lots of good water (distilled is best).
• Telephone your regional Poison Control Center. There is a different phone number for
each state. Dial the operator (0) or emergency (911) and ask for that number in your state.
• Use enemas to clean out the colon.
• Someone should help the one vomiting, so he does not choke. If he does not stop
vomiting within 24 hours, collect samples for analysis, to identify the poison.
• Sometimes it is best to induce vomiting. Lobelia will help or drinking water and putting
a finger down the throat.
• If food poisoning may have occurred in a restaurant or roadhouse, contact the health
department.
• If the condition continues, contact a physician.
• Research at the University of Wolverhamptom, in Britain, disclosed that all types of
disease-producing intestinal bacteria died when garlic was present.
• A severe headache and vomiting soon after a meal may be caused by food allergies,
which see. Charcoal tablets will help solve that problem.
PREVENTION—It is best to stop eating meat and dairy products or, if you do, be sure they are most
thoroughly cooked. Check home-canned jars carefully before opening them. Beware of restaurants,
roadhouses, and salad bars. When eating out, you eat at your own risk. To help protect you, eat 2 garlic
tablets before you eat anything else. Better yet, pack bag lunches and learn to buy what you need at a
grocery store.
Refrigerate food you buy as soon as you can. Keep perishables refrigerated. Keep food hot or cold; food
left at room temperature encourages bacterial growth. Keep the refrigerator set at 40o F. or below, and
the freezer set at 0o F. or below.
Meat, poultry, eggs, and seafood are especially dangerous. They must be cooked thoroughly and hands
washed; all utensils touching the raw materials must be sterilized. Do not use recipes calling for raw
eggs which will remain raw or be inadequately cooked. Do not leave mayonnaises, salad dressings, and
milk products sitting out at room temperature. Be especially careful at picnics.
Wash kitchen towels and sponges daily with a 1-20 bleach and water solution.
Do not use bulging cans or products with loose lids or cracked jars! Rusted, sticky, or bent cans should
be discarded. Wash lunch boxes and Thermos bottles after each use.
Thaw all frozen foods in the refrigerator.
When reheating food, bring it to a quick boil, and cook it for a minimum of 4 minutes.
Do not give honey to a young baby below the age of one. Fed by the honey, botulism spores will grow in
the infant's intestine, producing botulism toxin.
SYMPTOMS—Pain, vomiting, cramping, weakness, diarrhea, dizziness.
Symptoms occur quickly, 1-4 hours after eating the contaminated substance. They can last for a few
hours or a few days.
Salmonella symptoms: pain, vomiting, and diarrhea can require several days to appear.
Staphylococcus aureus symptoms: diarrhea, nausea, and vomiting 2-6 hours after the meal. It is good to
induce vomiting, to help rid the system of toxins.
Botulism symptoms: 12-48 hours after ingestion, symptoms appear. Extreme weakness, double vision,
swallowing difficulty. Paralysis and death can follow.
Giardia symptoms: Constipation, diarrhea, abdominal pain, loss of appetite, nausea, flatulence, and
vomiting.
CAUSES—Eating food containing harmful bacteria causes food poisoning. Each year more than 2
million Americans report food poisoning. Of course, the actual number is far higher. Unfortunately, we
live in a poisoned age. About 2 million Americans report food poisoning each year; of that number,
9,000 people die each year. A far greater number have food poisoning, who think it is the flu.
A full 90% of botulism cases in the United States are caused by improper home canning. The safest
method is to cook the jarred food in a pressure cooker rather than in a tub on top of the stove.
Two-thirds of all food poisoning cases were related to the use of poorly cooked eggs.
The types of bacteria in food which cause disease (pathogenic) or produce toxins (toxigenic) cannot be
seen, tasted, or smelled in the food.
Here are the most common of these food poisoning organisms:
Salmonella (Salmonellosis): This is the most common cause of food poisoning. It has especially
increased since antibiotics began being placed in animal feeds, to prevent disease in crowded,
unsanitary, conditions and help them grow faster. (More than 50% of cattle, poultry, and swine are now
given antibiotics.) But, doing this, promoted the growth of antibiotic-resistant bacteria in animal
intestines. A third of all chickens in America have salmonella.
Salmonella is easily transmitted on hands, food supplies, knives, table tops, cracked eggs, partly raw
food, etc. Mechanical methods of evisceration in slaughterhouses also spread salmonella to all the other
birds being slaughtered. Cooks that handle raw meat or eggs, and then handle other food—especially
raw food, such as salads—endanger many people. Vegetarians should wash their hands with soap,
immediately after handling raw egg shells. Cook eggs well. (Beware of mayonnaise; it contains raw
eggs.) Milk and ice cream can also be contaminated with salmonella. In 1985, 17,000 people in the
northeast became ill from contaminated milk.
Outbreaks of salmonella poisoning primarily occur in the warmer months. Symptoms range from mild
abdominal pain to severe diarrhea, and even typhoid-like fever. This disease can so weaken the immune
system that the kidneys, heart, and blood vessels are damaged. Arthritis can result.
Eating raw or poorly cooked chicken, eggs, beef, and pork products is the main way salmonella is eaten.
But it can also be found in clams and oysters.
Of 35 food poisoning outbreaks reported between 1985 to 1987, 24 were caused by contaminated eggs,
or foods containing them. Boil eggs for at least 25 minutes.
We will briefly note some other sources of food-borne illness:
Staphylococcus aureus: This is said to be the second-largest source of food poisoning (25%). This can
be transmitted by coughing and sneezing on food.
Clostridium botulinum: This is old-fashioned botulism. Many restaurants and roadhouses leave food
setting out at room temperature for hours. This can also be found in old mustard and other sauce jars.
Although easily destroyed by cold or heat, botulism is the most deadly of all the food-borne diseases. It
produces toxins which block nerve impulses to the muscles.
Heating food to 176o F. for 20 minutes or 194o F. for 10 minutes destroys the spores. Home-canned
food, not properly cooked, can be dangerous. Never use contents of a bulging can or a rusty can! It is
found in canned vegetables, meats, fish, mushrooms, and soups.
Giardia (giardiasis): This is found in drinking water from lakes and streams. It is not destroyed by water
treatment, including chlorination. It can also be found in raw food which has grown in contaminated
water. Giardia grows best where it is cool and damp.
Four other sources of food poisoning should be mentioned: Staphylococcus, complobacter jejuini,
campylobacteriosis, and clostridium perfringens.
Each of these comes primarily from eating meat, and sometimes dairy products.
Before concluding, keep in mind trichinae (trichinella), which is found in pork. Also beware of mold
found on food; it can produce poisonous toxins. Do not eat potato sprouts; they have concentrated
solanine which can cause hallucinations even after recovery.

Matibabu
• Mara tu unapoamini una sumu ya chakula, chukua macho ya bure ya pombe
Dondoo ya Goldenseal kila masaa 4 kwa masaa 24. Dawa hii ya asili itaharibu bakteria
katika njia ya matumbo. (Lakini kamwe usichukue Goldenseal kwa zaidi ya wiki kwa wakati mmoja, wakati wa
ujauzito, au ikiwa una mzio wa ragweed.)
• Chukua vidonge 6 vya mkaa mara moja, na tena katika masaa 6. Watasaidia kugeuza
Poisons katika damu yako. Kunywa maji mengi mazuri (yaliyosafishwa ni bora).
• Piga simu kituo chako cha kudhibiti sumu ya mkoa. Kuna nambari tofauti ya simu kwa
kila jimbo. Piga mwendeshaji (0) au dharura (911) na uombe nambari hiyo katika jimbo lako.
• Tumia enemas kusafisha koloni.
• Mtu anapaswa kusaidia kutapika moja, kwa hivyo yeye haingii. Ikiwa haachi
Kutapika ndani ya masaa 24, kukusanya sampuli za uchambuzi, kutambua sumu.
• Wakati mwingine ni bora kushawishi kutapika. Lobelia itasaidia au kunywa maji na kuweka
Kidole chini ya koo.
• Ikiwa sumu ya chakula inaweza kutokea katika mgahawa au nyumba ya barabara, wasiliana na afya
Idara.
• Ikiwa hali itaendelea, wasiliana na daktari.
• Utafiti katika Chuo Kikuu cha Wolverhamptom, huko Uingereza, ulifunua kuwa kila aina ya
Bakteria wa matumbo wa ugonjwa wa ugonjwa wa tumbo walikufa wakati vitunguu vilikuwepo.
• maumivu makali ya kichwa na kutapika mara tu baada ya chakula kunaweza kusababishwa na mzio wa chakula,
Ambayo huona. Vidonge vya mkaa vitasaidia kutatua shida hiyo.
Kuzuia -Ni bora kuacha kula nyama na bidhaa za maziwa au, ikiwa unafanya, hakikisha wao ni wengi
kupikwa kabisa. Angalia mitungi iliyokatwa nyumbani kwa uangalifu kabla ya kuzifungua. Jihadharini na mikahawa,
Nyumba za barabarani, na baa za saladi. Wakati wa kula, unakula kwa hatari yako mwenyewe. Ili kusaidia kukulinda, kula vitunguu 2
vidonge kabla ya kula kitu kingine chochote. Bora zaidi, pakiti chakula cha mchana na ujifunze kununua kile unachohitaji katika
duka la mboga.
Chakula cha jokofu unanunua haraka iwezekanavyo. Endelea kuharibika kwa jokofu. Weka chakula moto au baridi; chakula
Kushoto kwa joto la kawaida huhimiza ukuaji wa bakteria. Weka jokofu iliyowekwa kwa 40o F. au chini, na
freezer iliyowekwa saa 0o F. au chini.
Nyama, kuku, mayai, na dagaa ni hatari sana. Lazima kupikwa vizuri na mikono
kuoshwa; Vyombo vyote vinavyogusa malighafi lazima ziwe na sterilized. Usitumie mapishi wito kwa RAW
Mayai ambayo yatabaki mbichi au kupikwa vizuri. Usiache mayonnaises, mavazi ya saladi, na
Bidhaa za maziwa zilizokaa nje kwenye joto la kawaida. Kuwa mwangalifu haswa kwenye picha.
Osha taulo za jikoni na sifongo kila siku na bleach 1-20 na suluhisho la maji.
Usitumie makopo ya bulging au bidhaa zilizo na vifuniko huru au mitungi iliyovunjika! Kutu, nata, au makopo ya kuinama inapaswa
kutupwa. Osha masanduku ya chakula cha mchana na chupa za thermos baada ya kila matumizi.
Thaw vyakula vyote waliohifadhiwa kwenye jokofu.
Wakati wa kufanya tena chakula, kuleta kwa chemsha haraka, na upike kwa kiwango cha chini cha dakika 4.
Usipe Asali kwa mtoto mchanga chini ya umri wa mmoja. Kulishwa na asali, spores za botulism zitakua ndani
Tumbo la mtoto mchanga, hutengeneza sumu ya botulism.
Dalili -maumivu, kutapika, kupunguka, udhaifu, kuhara, kizunguzungu.
Dalili hufanyika haraka, masaa 1-4 baada ya kula dutu iliyochafuliwa. Wanaweza kudumu kwa wachache
masaa au siku chache.
Dalili za Salmonella: maumivu, kutapika, na kuhara inaweza kuhitaji siku kadhaa kuonekana.
Dalili za Staphylococcus aureus: kuhara, kichefuchefu, na kutapika masaa 2-6 baada ya chakula. Ni vizuri
kushawishi kutapika, kusaidia kuondoa mfumo wa sumu.
Dalili za Botulism: masaa 12-48 baada ya kumeza, dalili zinaonekana. Udhaifu uliokithiri, maono mara mbili,
kumeza ugumu. Kupooza na kifo kunaweza kufuata.
Dalili za Giardia: Kuvimbiwa, kuhara, maumivu ya tumbo, kupoteza hamu ya kula, kichefuchefu, na kufifia, na
kutapika.
Sababu -Kutumia chakula kilicho na bakteria hatari husababisha sumu ya chakula. Kila mwaka zaidi ya 2
Wamarekani milioni wanaripoti sumu ya chakula. Kwa kweli, idadi halisi ni kubwa zaidi. Kwa bahati mbaya, sisi
kuishi katika umri wenye sumu. Karibu Wamarekani milioni 2 wanaripoti sumu ya chakula kila mwaka; ya idadi hiyo,
Watu 9,000 hufa kila mwaka. Idadi kubwa zaidi ina sumu ya chakula, ambao wanafikiria ni homa.
90% kamili ya kesi za botulism huko Merika husababishwa na canning mbaya ya nyumbani. Salama zaidi
Njia ni kupika chakula kilichopigwa kwenye mpishi wa shinikizo badala ya kwenye tub juu ya jiko.
Theluthi mbili ya kesi zote za sumu ya chakula zilihusiana na utumiaji wa mayai yaliyopikwa vibaya.
Aina za bakteria kwenye chakula ambazo husababisha magonjwa (pathogenic) au hutoa sumu (toxigenic) haiwezi kuwa
Kuonekana, kuonja, au kuvuta katika chakula.
Hapa kuna kawaida zaidi ya viumbe hivi vya sumu ya chakula:
Salmonella (Salmonellosis): Hii ndio sababu ya kawaida ya sumu ya chakula. Ina haswa
Kuongezeka kwa kuwa dawa za kukinga zilianza kuwekwa kwenye malisho ya wanyama, kuzuia magonjwa katika watu wengi,
Unnanitary, hali na uwasaidie kukua haraka. (Zaidi ya 50% ya ng'ombe, kuku, na nguruwe sasa
Kwa kuzingatia dawa za kukinga.) Lakini, kwa kufanya hivi, ilikuza ukuaji wa bakteria sugu ya dawa katika wanyama
matumbo. Theluthi ya kuku wote huko Amerika wana Salmonella.
Salmonella hupitishwa kwa urahisi kwa mikono, vifaa vya chakula, visu, vijiti vya meza, mayai yaliyopasuka, sehemu mbichi
Chakula, nk Njia za mitambo za uhamishaji katika nyumba za kuchinjia pia zinaeneza salmonella kwa zingine zote
ndege wakichinjwa. Wapishi ambao hushughulikia nyama mbichi au mayai, na kisha kushughulikia chakula kingine - haswa
Chakula mbichi, kama vile saladi -zinafanya watu wengi. Mboga mboga inapaswa kuosha mikono yao na sabuni,
Mara baada ya kushughulikia makombora ya yai mbichi. Pika mayai vizuri. (Jihadharini na mayonnaise; ina mbichi
Mayai.) Maziwa na ice cream pia zinaweza kuchafuliwa na salmonella. Mnamo 1985, watu 17,000 katika
Kaskazini mashariki ikaugua maziwa yaliyochafuliwa.
Milipuko ya sumu ya Salmonella hufanyika katika miezi ya joto. Dalili zinaanzia laini
Ma maumivu ya tumbo kwa kuhara kali, na hata homa ya typhoid. Ugonjwa huu unaweza kudhoofisha kinga
Mfumo ambao figo, moyo, na mishipa ya damu huharibiwa. Arthritis inaweza kusababisha.
Kula kuku mbichi au iliyopikwa vibaya, mayai, nyama ya nyama ya nguruwe, na bidhaa za nguruwe ndio njia kuu Salmonella inaliwa.
Lakini pia inaweza kupatikana katika clams na oysters.
Kati ya milipuko 35 ya sumu ya chakula iliyoripotiwa kati ya 1985 hadi 1987, 24 zilisababishwa na mayai yaliyochafuliwa,
au vyakula vyenye. Chemsha mayai kwa angalau dakika 25.
Tutagundua kwa kifupi vyanzo vingine vya ugonjwa unaosababishwa na chakula:
Staphylococcus aureus: Hii inasemekana kuwa chanzo cha pili cha sumu ya chakula (25%). Hii inaweza
kupitishwa kwa kukohoa na kupiga chafya kwenye chakula.
Clostridium botulinum: Hii ni botulism ya zamani. Mikahawa mingi na nyumba za barabarani huacha chakula
Kuweka nje kwa joto la kawaida kwa masaa. Hii inaweza pia kupatikana katika haradali ya zamani na mitungi mingine ya mchuzi.
Ingawa huharibiwa kwa urahisi na baridi au joto, botulism ndio mbaya zaidi ya magonjwa yote yanayotokana na chakula. IT
hutoa sumu ambayo huzuia msukumo wa ujasiri kwa misuli.
Inapokanzwa chakula hadi 176o F. kwa dakika 20 au 194o F. kwa dakika 10 huharibu spores. -Nyumbani
Chakula, kisichopikwa vizuri, kinaweza kuwa hatari. Kamwe usitumie yaliyomo ya bulging inaweza au kutu! Ni
Kupatikana katika mboga za makopo, nyama, samaki, uyoga, na supu.
Giardia (Giardiasis): Hii hupatikana katika maji ya kunywa kutoka kwa maziwa na mito. Haiharibiki na maji
Matibabu, pamoja na klorini. Inaweza pia kupatikana katika chakula mbichi ambacho kimekua kimechafuliwa
maji. Giardia inakua bora ambapo iko baridi na unyevu.
Vyanzo vingine vinne vya sumu ya chakula vinapaswa kutajwa: Staphylococcus, complicacter Jejuini,
Campylobacteriosis, na Clostridium perfringens.
Kila moja ya hizi huja kutoka kwa kula nyama, na wakati mwingine bidhaa za maziwa.
Kabla ya kuhitimisha, kumbuka Trichinae (Trichinella), ambayo hupatikana katika nyama ya nguruwe. Pia jihadharini na ukungu
kupatikana kwenye chakula; Inaweza kutoa sumu ya sumu. Usila maji ya viazi; Wamejikita
Solanine ambayo inaweza kusababisha kupunguka hata baada ya kupona.
