Sio madawa ya kahawa yako, jaribu kumaliza matumizi yake mara moja.
Hydro - Mapendekezo yafuatayo ya kujiondoa kutoka kwa kahawa na madawa ya kulevya nyeusi yanatoka
Kitabu cha mwandishi, Mwongozo wa Tiba ya Maji (tazama Karatasi ya Agizo):
Acha matumizi ya dawa mara moja. Ikiwa ni lazima, kuajiri mbadala wa nafaka zisizo na madhara. Upande wowote
Umwagaji wakati wa kulala; Fomentation juu ya tumbo; Njia mbadala ya mgongo; Msuguano baridi wa mitten au
Taulo baridi kusugua kabla ya kupanda asubuhi; Ufungashaji wa tumbo la moto usiku na mchana, kubadilisha asubuhi,

Maombi (uk. 192).
Kuna dosari moja katika formula hapo juu (ambayo hapo awali ilitoka kwa John Harvey Kellogg mwanzoni mwa
karne). Inajulikana sasa kuwa, wakati inatumiwa mara kwa mara, mwili huingia kwenye kemikali maalum sana
utegemezi wa kahawa. Kujiondoa mara moja kunaweza kusababisha shida za moyo. Kwa hivyo, hatua kwa hatua kwenda mbali
Kofi, ikichukua kidogo na chini yake, kwa kipindi cha siku saba.

title: Drug Withdrawal
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Withdrawal must be done. When a person is highly dependent on a drug, it is best that the dose
gradually be reduced slowly, over a four-week period. Regarding the hard drugs, it is best that
withdrawal be done under professional guidance.
• Nutritious food should be eaten along with heavy vitamin/mineral supplementation. Vitamin C and the
B complex are especially important. Drink lots of water and get extra rest. Take sweat baths, to help
excrete poisons.
HYDRO—The following hydrotherapy methods used for opium, cocaine, and related habits are from the
author's book, Water Therapy Manual (see order sheet):
General: Rest in bed. Sweating baths (such as Radiant Heat Bath, Steam Bath) twice a day for 3 days
before withdrawing the drug. Follow bath by vigorous cold applications. While withdrawing the drug,
the symptoms may be successfully combated as follows:
Nervousness, restlessness, "indescribable sensations": Prolonged Neutral Bath at 92o-94o F., for 10
minutes; Neutral Douche at 92o F. for 2-4 minutes.
Cardiac weakness: Cold Compress or Ice Bag over heart; alternate (hot and then cold) applications to
the spine; Cold Mitten Friction; Cold Towel Rub, repeating treatment hourly if necessary.
Vomiting: Hot and Cold Truck Pack, Ice Bag over stomach and spine, Hot Leg Pack.
Diarrhea: Hot Enema after each movement; Cold Compress over abdomen, changed every 30 minutes.
Local pain: Revulsive Compresses, alternate or hot and cold Compress.
Insomnia after withdrawal: Wet Sheet pack; Prolonged Neutral Bath, 20-60 minutes; Heating Leg Pack;
Hot Abdominal Pack; cold Ice Cap.
General Method: Same as for alcoholism. Withdraw gradually within 2-3 days (pp. 191-192).
—Also see "Alcohol Withdrawal" and "Tobacco Withdrawal."
SYMPTOMS—Decreased desire to work, inattentiveness, extreme drowsiness, frequent mood swings,
loss of appetite, and restlessness.
Prolonged use may result in damage to cells and chromosomes; male sterility; respiratory organs, liver,
kidney damage; and cancer.
Withdrawal symptoms include insomnia, headache, diarrhea, sensitivity to light and noise, hot and cold
flashes, sweating, deep depression, irritability, disorientation, and irrational thinking.
CAUSES—There are legal drugs, called medicinal drugs. You can obtain these at a pharmacy, either
with or without a prescription. There are also illegal ones, called hard drugs or street drugs. These
include narcotics, stimulants, barbiturates, and hallucinogens. In nearly every instance, drugs are toxic
and dangerous. There are exceptions; these are natural products which the FDA erroneously classifies as
"drugs." (See "Drug Rash.") Included here are such things as charcoal tablets and peppermint tea.
People often start taking street drugs such as nicotine, alcohol, and coffee, thinking them to be harmless,
enjoyable, or beneficial. But they are neither. Frequently the dose is increased, to obtain the same
pleasant effect; but an overdose may eventually occur, and death results.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Kuondoa lazima kufanywa. Wakati mtu anategemea sana dawa, ni bora kwamba kipimo
Hatua kwa hatua kupunguzwa polepole, kwa kipindi cha wiki nne. Kuhusu dawa ngumu, ni bora
Uondoaji ufanyike chini ya mwongozo wa kitaalam.
• Chakula chenye lishe kinapaswa kuliwa pamoja na nyongeza ya vitamini/madini. Vitamini C na
B Complex ni muhimu sana. Kunywa maji mengi na pumzika zaidi. Chukua bafu za jasho, kusaidia
Poisons za nje.
Hydro - Njia zifuatazo za hydrotherapy zinazotumiwa kwa opiamu, cocaine, na tabia zinazohusiana zinatoka kwa
Kitabu cha Mwandishi, Mwongozo wa Tiba ya Maji (tazama Karatasi ya Agizo):
Jumla: Pumzika kitandani. Bafu za jasho (kama umwagaji wa joto la kung'aa, umwagaji wa mvuke) mara mbili kwa siku kwa siku 3
Kabla ya kuondoa dawa hiyo. Fuata Bath na matumizi ya baridi kali. Wakati wa kuondoa dawa hiyo,
Dalili zinaweza kuchanganywa kwa mafanikio kama ifuatavyo:
Nyimbo, kutokuwa na utulivu, "hisia zisizoweza kuelezewa": umwagaji wa muda mrefu kwa 92O-94O F., kwa 10
dakika; Douche ya upande wowote saa 92o F. kwa dakika 2-4.
Udhaifu wa moyo: compress baridi au begi la barafu juu ya moyo; Matumizi mbadala (moto na kisha baridi) kwa
mgongo; Msuguano wa baridi ya Mitten; Taulo baridi kusugua, kurudia matibabu kila saa ikiwa ni lazima.
Kutapika: pakiti ya lori moto na baridi, begi la barafu juu ya tumbo na mgongo, pakiti ya mguu moto.
Kuhara: moto moto baada ya kila harakati; Compress baridi juu ya tumbo, ilibadilika kila dakika 30.
Ma maumivu ya ndani: compresses rendusive, mbadala au moto na baridi compress.
Kukosa usingizi baada ya kujiondoa: pakiti ya karatasi ya mvua; Umwagaji wa muda mrefu wa upande, dakika 20-60; Pakiti ya mguu inapokanzwa;
Pakiti ya tumbo moto; Barabara baridi ya barafu.
Njia ya Jumla: Sawa na ulevi. Kujiondoa polepole ndani ya siku 2-3 (mash. 191-192).
-Unaona "Uondoaji wa Pombe" na "Uondoaji wa Tumbaku."
Dalili -Kutokwa na hamu ya kufanya kazi, kutokujali, usingizi uliokithiri, mabadiliko ya mhemko wa mara kwa mara,
Kupoteza hamu ya kula, na kutokuwa na utulivu.
Matumizi ya muda mrefu yanaweza kusababisha uharibifu wa seli na chromosomes; Uwezo wa kiume; viungo vya kupumua, ini,
uharibifu wa figo; na saratani.
Dalili za kujiondoa ni pamoja na kukosa usingizi, maumivu ya kichwa, kuhara, unyeti wa mwanga na kelele, moto na baridi
Kuangaza, jasho, unyogovu wa kina, kuwashwa, kutatanisha, na mawazo yasiyofaa.
Sababu - kuna dawa za kisheria, zinazoitwa dawa za dawa. Unaweza kupata hizi kwenye maduka ya dawa, ama
na au bila dawa. Kuna pia zile haramu, zinazoitwa dawa ngumu au dawa za barabarani. Hizi
Jumuisha narcotic, vichocheo, barbiturates, na hallucinogens. Karibu katika kila mfano, dawa za kulevya ni sumu
na hatari. Kuna tofauti; Hizi ni bidhaa asili ambazo FDA huainisha vibaya kama
"Dawa za kulevya." .
Watu mara nyingi huanza kuchukua dawa za barabarani kama vile nikotini, pombe, na kahawa, wakifikiria kuwa hawana madhara,
ya kufurahisha, au yenye faida. Lakini wao sio. Mara kwa mara kipimo huongezeka, kupata sawa
athari ya kupendeza; Lakini overdose inaweza hatimaye kutokea, na matokeo ya kifo.

title: Cysts And Polyps
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• A Wisconsin research team discovered that the polyps in most of their patients either
lessened or disappeared entirely, when they were placed on a high vitamin C diet. The
body is attempting to get rid of various waste products; it needs help doing the job.
Vitamin C; more water drinking; nutritious food; a high-fiber diet; and the elimination of
processed, fried, and junk foods greatly helps. Take some type of supplemental fiber daily.
Be sure to increase your water intake at the same time you increase your fiber intake.
• Stop eating meat products. They load the body with impurities which must be
eliminated. Only eat wholesome food. Stop using caffeine, tobacco, and alcohol.
• Those who eat the most saturated fat are twice as likely to develop polyps.
• Use those natural substances which tends to cleanse the body of toxins: garlic, burdock,
goldenseal, red clover, etc.
• Surgical removal of the polyp is often relatively safe, a minor procedure, and done on an
outpatient basis.
—Read the sections on "Cancer" and "Cancer Prevention" for detailed information.
SYMPTOMS—In the nose: chronic difficulty in breathing through the nose.
In the colon: Bleeding or a mucous drainage from the rectum are common symptoms.
In the bladder: Blood in the urine.
In the cervix: A heavy watery, bloody, discharge from the vagina. Bleeding may occur after intercourse,
between periods, and after menopause.
CAUSES—Polyps (polyposis) are growths of various sizes, and are especially found in certain portions
of the mucous membranes: the nose, large intestine (colon), bladder, and cervix. They are especially
common in the rectum and the portion of the colon just above that (the sigmoid).
These growths are benign (that is, not cancerous) and, growing on stalk-like structures, look something
like narrow mushrooms. They tend to be hereditary.
Nasal polyps: Generally when the nose is clogged, the cause is a heavy cold or possibly chronic catarrh.
But it can be nasal polyps. These are a special kind of tumor, which usually form as a result of a chronic
infection in a sinus or in persons having allergies. Surgical removal is done to remove them.
Colon and rectal polyps: These growths in the outlet end of the colon can become cancerous. A
colectomy is the surgical removal of these polyps, but is generally done, not by cutting out the polyps,
but by removing part of the colon! Sometimes the rectum is left in place and the small intestine is
connected to it. But, whether this drastic operation is performed or not, the polyps generally return.
Bleeding from the colon can be a sign of polyps or of cancer.
Bladder polyps: The medical route is removal of the bladder. Unless they are removed, by natural
methods or unnatural, bladder cancer may result.
Cervical polyps: These polyps line the inside of the cervix of the uterus and are more common in
women who have not had children. They rarely return after being removed.
contentSw:
Matibabu
Timu ya utafiti ya Wisconsin iligundua kuwa polyps katika wagonjwa wengi wao pia
kupungua au kutoweka kabisa, wakati waliwekwa kwenye lishe kubwa ya vitamini C.
Mwili unajaribu kuondoa bidhaa anuwai za taka; Inahitaji msaada kufanya kazi hiyo.
Vitamini C; kunywa maji zaidi; chakula chenye lishe; lishe yenye nyuzi nyingi; na kuondoa
Kusindika, kukaanga, na vyakula vya kupendeza husaidia sana. Chukua aina fulani ya nyuzi za ziada kila siku.
Hakikisha kuongeza ulaji wako wa maji wakati huo huo unaongeza ulaji wako wa nyuzi.
• Acha kula bidhaa za nyama. Wanapakia mwili na uchafu ambao lazima uwe
kuondolewa. Kula chakula kizuri tu. Acha kutumia kafeini, tumbaku, na pombe.
• Wale ambao hula mafuta yaliyojaa zaidi wana uwezekano wa kuendeleza polyps.
• Tumia vitu hivyo vya asili ambavyo huelekea kusafisha mwili wa sumu: vitunguu, burdock,
Goldenseal, clover nyekundu, nk.
• Kuondolewa kwa upasuaji wa polyp mara nyingi ni salama, utaratibu mdogo, na hufanywa kwenye
Msingi wa nje.
-Shema sehemu kwenye "Saratani" na "Kuzuia Saratani" kwa habari ya kina.
Dalili -katika pua: ugumu sugu wa kupumua kupitia pua.
Katika koloni: kutokwa na damu au mifereji ya maji kutoka kwa rectum ni dalili za kawaida.
Katika kibofu cha mkojo: damu kwenye mkojo.
Katika kizazi: maji mazito, damu, kutokwa kutoka kwa uke. Kutokwa na damu kunaweza kutokea baada ya kujuana,
kati ya vipindi, na baada ya kumalizika.
Sababu -polyps (polyposis) ni ukuaji wa ukubwa tofauti, na hupatikana haswa katika sehemu fulani
ya utando wa mucous: pua, utumbo mkubwa (koloni), kibofu cha mkojo, na kizazi. Wao ni haswa
Kawaida katika rectum na sehemu ya koloni hapo juu tu (sigmoid).
Ukuaji huu ni mzuri (ambayo sio ya saratani) na, inakua kwenye miundo kama ya bua, angalia kitu
Kama uyoga nyembamba. Wao huwa na urithi.
Polyps ya pua: Kwa ujumla wakati pua imefungwa, sababu ni homa nzito au labda sugu.
Lakini inaweza kuwa polyps za pua. Hizi ni aina maalum ya tumor, ambayo kawaida huunda kama matokeo ya sugu
maambukizi katika sinus au kwa watu wenye mzio. Kuondolewa kwa upasuaji kunafanywa kuwaondoa.
Colon na polyps za rectal: Ukuaji huu katika mwisho wa koloni unaweza kuwa na saratani. A
Colectomy ni kuondolewa kwa upasuaji wa polyps hizi, lakini kwa ujumla hufanywa, sio kwa kukata polyps,
Lakini kwa kuondoa sehemu ya koloni! Wakati mwingine rectum huachwa mahali na utumbo mdogo ni
kushikamana nayo. Lakini, ikiwa operesheni hii kali inafanywa au la, polyps kwa ujumla hurudi.
Kutokwa na damu kutoka kwa koloni inaweza kuwa ishara ya polyps au saratani.
Polyps ya kibofu cha mkojo: Njia ya matibabu ni kuondolewa kwa kibofu cha mkojo. Isipokuwa imeondolewa, na asili
Mbinu au isiyo ya asili, saratani ya kibofu cha mkojo inaweza kusababisha.
Polyps za kizazi: polyps hizi huweka ndani ya kizazi cha uterasi na ni kawaida zaidi katika
Wanawake ambao hawajapata watoto. Mara chache hurudi baada ya kuondolewa.

title: Tumors
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The body uses tumors as containers to store toxic waste collected throughout the body,
when the system's natural ways of elimination are overloaded: the lungs, bowels, kidneys,
liver, and skin. But when these channels of elimination become clogged or inadequate to
care for the excess refuse, then the body starts manufacturing garbage cans (tumor cases)
and placing the waste products in them.
• A physician can cut, burn, chemical, or radiate away the garbage can and its contents;
but soon the body will manufacture more of them!
• The solution is to change your way of life. A complete change of diet is needed, along
with improved ways of eliminating waste from the body.
—Read the sections on "Cancer" and "Cancer Prevention" for detailed information.
(including Fibroids)
SYMPTOMS—Tumors, swellings, or growths on the body. They seem to contain solid or semifluid
material and be abnormal in their growth.
CAUSES—When something has no apparent reason to be growing, it is growing abnormally. These
structures are called tumors. They can be either benign or malignant (cancerous). Malignant tumors
spread to other parts of the body; whereas benign ones generally do not spread.
Fibroids are tumors which most often occur in the uterus. Hysterectomies are done to remove them. But
the effect of a hysterectomy on a woman's hormonal system can be devastating. Avoid them, if at all
possible.
Diet and environment are special causes of tumors. Changing both can reverse the process, and even
eliminate these strange growths.
It is best to eliminate them, whenever possible. Even the benign ones, although small, may later become
cancerous.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mwili hutumia tumors kama vyombo kuhifadhi taka zenye sumu zilizokusanywa kwa mwili wote,
Wakati njia za asili za kuondoa zimejaa: mapafu, matumbo, figo,
ini, na ngozi. Lakini wakati njia hizi za kuondoa zinafungwa au hazitoshi kwa
Utunzaji wa kukataa kupita kiasi, basi mwili huanza kutengeneza makopo ya takataka (kesi za tumor)
na kuweka bidhaa taka ndani yao.
• Mganga anaweza kukata, kuchoma, kemikali, au kuangaza taka ya taka na yaliyomo;
Lakini hivi karibuni mwili utatengeneza zaidi yao!
• Suluhisho ni kubadilisha njia yako ya maisha. Mabadiliko kamili ya lishe inahitajika, pamoja
na njia bora za kuondoa taka kutoka kwa mwili.
-Shema sehemu kwenye "Saratani" na "Kuzuia Saratani" kwa habari ya kina.
(pamoja na fibroids)
Dalili -tumors, uvimbe, au ukuaji kwenye mwili. Wanaonekana kuwa na nguvu au semifluid
nyenzo na kuwa kawaida katika ukuaji wao.
Sababu - wakati kitu hakina sababu dhahiri ya kuongezeka, inakua kawaida. Hizi
Miundo huitwa tumors. Wanaweza kuwa mbaya au mbaya (saratani). Tumors mbaya
kuenea kwa sehemu zingine za mwili; wakati zile za kawaida kwa ujumla hazienezi.
Fibroids ni tumors ambazo mara nyingi hufanyika kwenye uterasi. Hysterectomies hufanywa ili kuziondoa. Lakini
Athari za hysterectomy kwenye mfumo wa homoni ya mwanamke inaweza kuwa mbaya. Waepuke, ikiwa kabisa
inawezekana.
Lishe na mazingira ni sababu maalum za tumors. Kubadilisha zote kunaweza kubadili mchakato, na hata
Ondoa ukuaji huu wa kushangaza.
Ni bora kuwaondoa, wakati wowote inapowezekana. Hata zile zisizo za kawaida, ingawa ni ndogo, baadaye zinaweza kuwa
Saratani.

title: Skin Cancer
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Exposure to the sun is vital to good health. Unfortunately, the ultraviolet rays also cause
wrinkles and 90% of all types of skin cancer. (It can cause cataracts too.) Yes, continue to
get out in the sunlight, but try not to overdo it. Keep in mind that, in the early stages, it is
not difficult to remove skin cancers; but you have to have a certain amount of sunlight for
general physical health. Be especially careful between 10 a.m. and 2 p.m., when sunlight
is strongest.
• Those with a family history of skin cancer should obtain their sunlight more sparingly.
• In the summer, wear light-colored clothing which has a tight weave. Consider using a
sunscreen of at least 15.
• Tanning salons are more dangerous than sunlight, because people tend to overdo them.
• As the ozone layer is gradually destroyed over the north and south poles, those living in
the temperate zones throughout the world become more susceptible to skin
cancer—without even being in the sun.
• Every month or so check over your body carefully and look for signs of skin cancer.
Then do something about it.
Suggestions for eliminating the skin cancer:
• You can go to your physician, and he will excise it with a knife or an ointment which
will burn it off. If you delay, surgery will cut more deeply and, as with all cancer surgery,
there is the very real danger that not all the cancer will be removed.
• Or you can use natural remedies. Fortunately, with skin cancer, as long as it is treated in
the early stages, you can tell if it is gone!
• Garlic is a faithful standby. Cut a thin slice of garlic and carefully tape it over, what you
consider might be, a skin cancer. Try to avoid contact of the garlic on good skin. (If you
can't avoid it, the skin will redden and burn somewhat.) Russian research, from back in the
1950s, revealed that garlic is more powerful than antibiotics in destroying bacteria. It also
causes moles and skin cancers to fall off.
• Put the garlic on in the morning; take it off and carefully wash the area in the evening
before bedtime. Put on a new application. Remove it in the morning, and repeat the
process. Do this for about 3 days. The mole or ulcer will dissolve and slough off. Let the
area heal. If part of it remains, repeat the process at a later time.
• If you keep applying the garlic for more than 4 days, it will begin burning deeper into the
skin (you will know, because the area will become very painful.) Such deep burning is not
necessary to slough off the cancer, and could be harmful.
• The herb, chaparral, works well for skin cancer. Take it as a tea or in tablet form.
• According to a 1988 medical article (British Journal of Surgery), eating an adequate
amount of essential fatty acids helps protect the body against skin cancers. It even helps
eliminate them, once they form.
• Eat a nourishing diet; go off meat and processed, fried, and junk food. Get enough rest.
Right living helps your body resist and throw off cancerous lesions.
• Take vitamin C to bowel tolerance; also take vitamin A and selenium.
• Carcelim is a cream which you can purchase, which requires 30 days to remove the
melanoma.
—Read the sections on "Cancer" and "Cancer Prevention" for detailed information.
(Melanoma)
SYMPTOMS—Identification is especially important in dealing with skin cancer. Here are official
warning signs of skin cancer:
1. An open sore that bleeds, crusts over, and will not heal properly.
2. A reddish, irritated, spot that is usually on the chest, shoulder, arm, or leg. It may itch,
hurt, or cause no discomfort at all.
3. A smooth growth with an elevated border and a center indentation. As it becomes
bigger, tiny blood vessels develop on the surface.
4. A shiny scar-like area that may be white, yellow, or waxy with a shiny, taut,
appearance.
5. An enlarging, irregular, "angry" appearing lesion on the face, lips, or ears.
Here is a description of one of the more common types of skin cancer: large flat, tan, or brown spots,
with darker black or brown areas dotted on its surface. The edges may, or may not, be clearly defined.
The spot may appear mottled.
Moles should also be watched—especially those that change in size or color, are irregularly shaped,
have ridges around the edges, widen, bleed, itch, or seem to be continually irritated by clothing.
Here are still more identifiers of skin cancer—the so-called "A-B-C-D checklist":
Asymmetry: Both sides of the mole should be shaped similarly. If the overall shape is
irregular, then it might be skin cancer.
Border: The edges of moles should be smooth, not blurred or ragged.
Color: It should be tan, brown, and dark brown if it is normal. If it is red, white, blue, or
black, it is not.
Diameter: Any mole that is larger than ¼ inch in diameter, or whose diameter seems to be
increasing, should be treated with suspicion.
Spots which are dry, red, and scaly (most frequently found on the face, neck, or backs of hands) may be
actinic (solar) keratoses. These are lesions which result from years of overexposure to the sun. They can
be precancerous. Later they may become hard to the touch and grayish or brown in color.
CAUSES—Skin cancer is also called melanoma, or lentigo-maligna melanoma, and appears on body
surfaces which are most frequently exposed to the sunlight: the face, neck, arms, and trunk. It can also
occur on the lips and even eyelids.
The best thing about skin cancer is that it is often slow in spreading and invading the deeper layers of the
skin. As long as the cancer is only on the surface, it can easily be removed.
There are three types of skin cancer; the first two are the most common, and the third is the most
dangerous. Yet all three types can be eliminated if treated early. The medical route or natural methods
can be used to eliminate each of these. But, either way, be sure it is gone. As long as it is treated early,
you can easily see if it is gone.
Basal cell carcinoma: This is the most common type, and the slowest growing. It does not spread until it
has been present for a number of years. It is an ulcer-like growth which spreads very slowly. The first
sign is a large pearly lump, generally on the face, nose, or area around the eyes. About six weeks later it
becomes an ulcer with a moist center and a hard border which may bleed. Scabs continually form, then
drop off, but with no healing of the ulcer. Another form is flat sores which slowly widen. Treatment is
the same as for squamous cell cancer.
Squamous cell carcinoma: Due to damage to lower-skin surface, a lump forms on the skin. Looking like
a wart or a nonhealing ulcer, physicians cut it off, freeze it off, chemical it off, or irradiate it off. A skin
graft may be applied afterward.
Melanoma: This is the most dangerous of the three, and can run in families. It often begins as what
appears to be a mole. Most people have moles, but be especially beware of those which appear after the
age of 40. Any mole that is unusual or that changes in size or color should be eliminated. If in doubt, see
a physician!
A melanoma mole arises out of the deeper pigment layer of the skin. For this reason, it spreads more
quickly. Melanomas most frequently occur on the upper back and legs. But they may also occur on
mucous membranes or under the nails.
A fourth type of skin cancer might be noted here. It is the rare mycosis fungoides. For years there will be
itching skin lesions. Eventually they become firm and begin ulcerating. Later they involve the lymph
nodes and produce cancer of the lymph (lymphoma).
Over 600,000 Americans develop skin cancer each year, and 10,000 die of it. More than 90% of skin
cancers can easily be eliminated, if done so early.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Mfiduo wa jua ni muhimu kwa afya njema. Kwa bahati mbaya, mionzi ya ultraviolet pia husababisha
Wrinkles na 90% ya kila aina ya saratani ya ngozi. (Inaweza kusababisha gati pia.) Ndio, endelea
Ondoka kwenye jua, lakini jaribu kutoipindua. Kumbuka kwamba, katika hatua za mwanzo, ni
Sio ngumu kuondoa saratani za ngozi; Lakini lazima uwe na kiwango fulani cha jua kwa
afya ya jumla ya mwili. Kuwa mwangalifu sana kati ya 10 a.m. na 2 p.m., wakati jua
ni nguvu.
Wale walio na historia ya familia ya saratani ya ngozi wanapaswa kupata mwangaza wao wa jua zaidi.
• Katika msimu wa joto, vaa mavazi ya rangi nyepesi ambayo ina weave laini. Fikiria kutumia a
jua ya angalau 15.
• Salons za kuoka ni hatari zaidi kuliko mwangaza wa jua, kwa sababu watu huwa wanawapindua.
• Kama safu ya ozoni inavyoharibiwa polepole juu ya miti ya kaskazini na kusini, wale wanaoishi ndani
Sehemu zenye joto ulimwenguni kote zinahusika zaidi na ngozi
Saratani -bila hata kuwa kwenye jua.
• Kila mwezi au hivyo angalia mwili wako kwa uangalifu na utafute ishara za saratani ya ngozi.
Kisha fanya kitu juu yake.
Mapendekezo ya kuondoa saratani ya ngozi:
• Unaweza kwenda kwa daktari wako, naye ataifanya kwa kisu au marashi ambayo
itaichoma. Ukichelewesha, upasuaji utakata kwa undani zaidi na, kama ilivyo kwa upasuaji wote wa saratani,
Kuna hatari ya kweli kwamba sio saratani yote itaondolewa.
• Au unaweza kutumia tiba asili. Kwa bahati nzuri, na saratani ya ngozi, mradi tu inatibiwa
Hatua za mwanzo, unaweza kusema ikiwa imeenda!
• Vitunguu ni msimamo waaminifu. Kata kipande nyembamba cha vitunguu na kuikanda kwa uangalifu, nini wewe
Fikiria inaweza kuwa, saratani ya ngozi. Jaribu kuzuia kuwasiliana na vitunguu kwenye ngozi nzuri. (Ikiwa wewe
Haiwezi kuizuia, ngozi itaondolewa na kuchoma kwa kiasi fulani.) Utafiti wa Kirusi, kutoka nyuma katika
1950s, ilifunua kuwa vitunguu ni nguvu zaidi kuliko viuatilifu katika kuharibu bakteria. Pia
husababisha moles na saratani za ngozi kuanguka.
• Weka vitunguu asubuhi; Ondoa na safisha eneo hilo jioni
Kabla ya kulala. Vaa programu mpya. Ondoa asubuhi, na kurudia
mchakato. Fanya hivi kwa karibu siku 3. Mole au kidonda kitafuta na kuzima. Acha
eneo la uponyaji. Ikiwa sehemu yake inabaki, rudia mchakato baadaye.
• Ikiwa utaendelea kutumia vitunguu kwa zaidi ya siku 4, itaanza kuchoma zaidi ndani ya
ngozi (utajua, kwa sababu eneo hilo litakuwa chungu sana.) Kuungua kwa kina sio hivyo
muhimu kupunguza saratani, na inaweza kuwa na madhara.
• Mimea, chaparral, inafanya kazi vizuri kwa saratani ya ngozi. Chukua kama chai au fomu ya kibao.
• Kulingana na nakala ya matibabu ya 1988 (Jarida la Briteni la upasuaji), kula chakula cha kutosha
Kiasi cha asidi muhimu ya mafuta husaidia kulinda mwili dhidi ya saratani za ngozi. Inasaidia hata
Waondoe, mara watakapounda.
• Kula lishe yenye lishe; Nenda kwenye nyama na kusindika, kukaanga, na chakula kisicho na chakula. Pumzika vya kutosha.
Kuishi sawa husaidia mwili wako kupinga na kutupa vidonda vya saratani.
• Chukua vitamini C kwa uvumilivu wa matumbo; Pia chukua vitamini A na seleniamu.
• Carcelim ni cream ambayo unaweza kununua, ambayo inahitaji siku 30 kuondoa
melanoma.
-Shema sehemu kwenye "Saratani" na "Kuzuia Saratani" kwa habari ya kina.
(Melanoma)
Dalili -Utambulisho ni muhimu sana katika kukabiliana na saratani ya ngozi. Hapa kuna rasmi
Ishara za onyo za saratani ya ngozi:
1. Kidonda wazi ambacho hutokwa na damu, kutu, na haitapona vizuri.
2. Reddish, iliyokasirika, mahali ambayo kawaida iko kwenye kifua, bega, mkono, au mguu. Inaweza kuwasha,
kuumiza, au kusababisha usumbufu wowote.
3. Ukuaji laini na mpaka ulioinuliwa na induction ya kituo. Kama inavyokuwa
Mishipa mikubwa, ya damu hua juu ya uso.
4. Sehemu ya kung'aa-kama ambayo inaweza kuwa nyeupe, manjano, au waxy na shiny, taut,
kuonekana.
5. Kuongeza, isiyo ya kawaida, "hasira" inayoonekana vidonda kwenye uso, midomo, au masikio.
Hapa kuna maelezo ya moja ya aina ya kawaida ya saratani ya ngozi: gorofa kubwa, tan, au matangazo ya kahawia,
Na maeneo nyeusi au hudhurungi yenye rangi ya hudhurungi kwenye uso wake. Edges zinaweza, au haziwezi, kuelezewa wazi.
Doa inaweza kuonekana kuwa mottled.
Moles inapaswa pia kutazamwa - haswa zile ambazo hubadilika kwa ukubwa au rangi, zimetengenezwa kwa kawaida,
Kuwa na matuta karibu na kingo, kupanuka, kutokwa na damu, kuwasha, au kuonekana kukasirika kila wakati na mavazi.
Hapa bado kuna vitambulisho zaidi vya saratani ya ngozi-kinachojulikana kama "orodha ya ukaguzi wa A-B-C-D":
Asymmetry: Pande zote mbili za mole zinapaswa kuumbwa vivyo hivyo. Ikiwa sura ya jumla ni
isiyo ya kawaida, basi inaweza kuwa saratani ya ngozi.
Mpaka: kingo za moles zinapaswa kuwa laini, sio blurred au ragged.
Rangi: Inapaswa kuwa tan, kahawia, na hudhurungi ikiwa ni kawaida. Ikiwa ni nyekundu, nyeupe, bluu, au
Nyeusi, sivyo.
Kipenyo: mole yoyote ambayo ni kubwa kuliko inchi ¼ kwa kipenyo, au kipenyo chake kinaonekana kuwa
Kuongezeka, inapaswa kutibiwa kwa tuhuma.
Matangazo ambayo ni kavu, nyekundu, na scaly (hupatikana mara nyingi kwenye uso, shingo, au migongo ya mikono) inaweza kuwa
Actinic (jua) keratoses. Hizi ni vidonda ambavyo vinatokana na miaka ya kufichua jua. Wanaweza
kuwa sahihi. Baadaye wanaweza kuwa ngumu kugusa na kijivu au hudhurungi kwa rangi.
Sababu-Saratani ya ngozi pia huitwa melanoma, au lentigo-maligna melanoma, na huonekana kwenye mwili
Nyuso ambazo hufunuliwa mara nyingi na jua: uso, shingo, mikono, na shina. Inaweza pia
kutokea kwenye midomo na hata kope.
Jambo bora juu ya saratani ya ngozi ni kwamba mara nyingi ni polepole katika kueneza na kuvamia tabaka za kina za
ngozi. Kadiri saratani iko tu juu ya uso, inaweza kuondolewa kwa urahisi.
Kuna aina tatu za saratani ya ngozi; mbili za kwanza ni za kawaida, na ya tatu ndio zaidi
hatari. Bado aina zote tatu zinaweza kuondolewa ikiwa zinatibiwa mapema. Njia ya matibabu au njia za asili
inaweza kutumika kuondoa kila moja ya hizi. Lakini, kwa njia yoyote ile, hakikisha imeenda. Kadiri inavyotibiwa mapema,
Unaweza kuona kwa urahisi ikiwa imeenda.
Carcinoma ya seli ya basal: Hii ndio aina ya kawaida, na inakua polepole zaidi. Haienezi mpaka
imekuwepo kwa miaka kadhaa. Ni ukuaji kama wa vidonda ambao huenea polepole sana. Ya kwanza
Ishara ni donge kubwa la lulu, kwa ujumla kwenye uso, pua, au eneo karibu na macho. Karibu wiki sita baadaye
Inakuwa kidonda na kituo chenye unyevu na mpaka mgumu ambao unaweza kutokwa na damu. Scabs daima huunda, basi
Teremsha, lakini bila uponyaji wa kidonda. Njia nyingine ni vidonda vya gorofa ambavyo hupanua polepole. Matibabu ni
Sawa na saratani ya seli ya squamous.
Carcinoma ya seli ya squamous: Kwa sababu ya uharibifu wa uso wa ngozi ya chini, fomu ya donge kwenye ngozi. Inaonekana kama
Wart au kidonda kisicho na nguvu, waganga walikata, kuifungia, kuiondoa, au kuwasha. Ngozi
Ujanja unaweza kutumika baadaye.
Melanoma: Hii ndio hatari zaidi ya hizo tatu, na inaweza kukimbia katika familia. Mara nyingi huanza kama nini
Inaonekana kuwa mole. Watu wengi wana moles, lakini kuwa mwangalifu sana wa wale ambao wanaonekana baada ya
Umri wa miaka 40. Mole yoyote ambayo sio ya kawaida au ambayo inabadilika kwa ukubwa au rangi inapaswa kuondolewa. Ikiwa una shaka, tazama
daktari!
Mole ya melanoma inatoka kwenye safu ya ngozi ya ndani zaidi ya ngozi. Kwa sababu hii, inaenea zaidi
haraka. Melanomas mara nyingi hufanyika nyuma ya nyuma na miguu. Lakini zinaweza pia kutokea
utando wa mucous au chini ya kucha.
Aina ya nne ya saratani ya ngozi inaweza kuzingatiwa hapa. Ni nadra ya Mycosis Fungoides. Kwa miaka itakuwa
kuwasha vidonda vya ngozi. Mwishowe wanakuwa thabiti na kuanza vidonda. Baadaye wanahusisha lymph
node na hutoa saratani ya lymph (lymphoma).
Zaidi ya Wamarekani 600,000 huendeleza saratani ya ngozi kila mwaka, na 10,000 hufa. Zaidi ya 90% ya ngozi
Saratani zinaweza kuondolewa kwa urahisi, ikiwa imefanywa mapema.

title: Cancer
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Cancer is a systemic disease, affecting the entire body and caused by conditions in the
entire person. So it cannot be treated by specifics. An entire change in one's way of life is
required.
For an in depth look at cancer prevention see "Tumors, Cancer - Part 2".
For much, much more information on Cancer, see the author's book, Alternate Cancer Therapies
(see order sheet).

SYMPTOMS—The most common symptoms of cancer: any sore that does not heal on the skin, mouth,
tongue, or lips. Any irregular or unusual bleeding or discharge from any body opening. A persistent
change from normal in the action of the bowels or bladder. Any persistent lump or thickening in breast
or anywhere on the body. Hoarseness or nagging cough. Difficulty in swallowing. Persistent indigestion
or loss of appetite, especially if accompanied by loss of weight. Sudden or rapid changes in the form,
appearance, or rate of growth of a mole or wart or if it bleeds. Fatigue.
To the basic eight cancer signs, listed above, we are adding three others which are important: any
condition which does not respond to treatment, inflammation from blood clotting (thrombophlebitis),
and putrid intestinal gas.
Skin cancer: A lump under the skin, moles which change color or size and have raised edges, an ulcer
which does not heal, flat sores, lesions which look like moles.
Mouth or throat: Chronic ulcer of the mouth, tongue, or throat which does not heal.
Larynx: Persistent cough and hoarse throat.
Lung: Persistent cough, bloody sputum, and chest pain.
Breast: Lump which is hard, does not go away, and does not move; inflammation or thickening of the
skin. (See "Breast Cancer" for more signs.)
Leukemia: Whiteness of skin, weight loss, fatigue, repeated infections, easy bruising, nosebleeds.
Stomach: Indigestion and pain after eating.
Bladder and Kidney: Blood in urine and increased urination frequency. Bloody urine is generally not a
cancer symptom, but it can be.
Ovaries: Usually there are no obvious symptoms until later stages.
Endometrium: Bleeding between menstrual periods, unusual discharge, painful periods, heavy periods.
Cervical and Uterine: Bleeding between periods, unusual discharge, painful periods, heavy periods.
Prostate: Weak or interrupted urine flow; continuous pain in lower back, pelvis, and/or upper thighs.
Testicles: Enlargement of a testicle, lumps, thickening of scrotum, sudden excess of fluid in scrotum,
mild ache in lower abdomen or groin.
Colon: Blood in stools, rectal bleeding, changes in bowel habits (diarrhea and/or constipation).
Lymphoid Tissue: Enlarged, rubbery, lymph nodes; itching; night sweats; unexplained fever and/or
weight loss.
CAUSES—In this article, you will find an overview of many research studies and data.
Cancer is now the second most common killer in the United States and is increasing. One in every three
people will die from some form of it. Over 1,400 Americans die each day with it.
Cancer cells are wild, irregular, and different from other body cells. They grow rapidly and gradually
invade and fill surrounding areas. They rob neighboring cells of nutrition, resulting in a gradual wasting
away of the patient. They can migrate to new locations and multiply. Wherever they go, there are
abnormal growths and tumors.
Cancer cells are classified by the organs they initially invade (liver, breast, colon, lung, lip, etc.). There
are more than 100 different varieties of cancer. Each varies in its symptoms and how fast it spreads.
There are four main types of cancer: Carcinomas affect the skin, mucous membranes, glands, and other
organs. Leukemias are blood cancers. Sarcomas affect muscles, connective tissue, and bones.
Lymphomas affect the lymphatic system.
Early detection and treatment is vital. One person dies every 3 minutes from cancer.
Dr. Otto Warburg, Nobel Prize winner, stated: "More is known about the cause and prevention of cancer
than most any other disease."
Dr. Ronald Raven, Chairman of the Royal College of Surgeons in London, said: "Seventy-five percent
of all cancer can be prevented if we utilize the facts we now possess."
At the Eighth International Cancer Congress, Dr. Kavetsky said: "It is essential in the treatment of
tumorous disease, not only to act on the tumor, but to endeavor to strengthen the compensatory and
defensive reaction . . of the entire system."
When a cancer becomes noticed, it is already far advanced. At this stage, it is important that the one with
it place himself under the care of a competent physician who understands and uses nutritional therapy.
However, the patient needs to understand, for himself, what is required and what he must do. There are
situations in which a cancer victim has no one to help him, and he must carry out such a program
entirely on His own.
But, whether helped by others or going it alone, unless the individual fully cooperates with right
principles, he cannot be successfully helped. He must cease his violations of the natural laws, given by
God to mankind, and live fully in accordance with them.
The type of food we eat, the way we live, and environmental factors gradually build up or weaken the
body. If the organs of elimination cannot keep up with the amount of toxic waste we are producing, in
desperation the body eventually turns to the formation of tumors and cancers. Soft cancers are cells gone
wild because of the excess waste in the system. Hard tumors are garbage cans prepared to hold the toxic
waste.
Cancer generally has a lengthy incubation period of years. Nourishing the body, building up the immune
system, and avoiding excess and debilitating substances enables the body to resist cancer.
Because of intemperate living, eating, sleeping, combined with stress, the body is weakened over the
years. This produces a chronic autointoxication—poisons have accumulated in the body. Vital organs,
whose job it is to purify and eliminate wastes (such as the skin, lungs, liver, kidneys, and bowels),
become less active and efficient. The system becomes poisoned. These poisons accumulate around the
weakest organs or where the body has been injured by a bruise, fall, or blow. The accumulated poisons
from years of tea, coffee, tobacco, cola, meat, liquor, fried food, etc., especially accumulate in such an
area. Then the body either tries to build garbage cans (tumors), to hold the waste products or the cells in
that area go wild from the irritation; so cancer cells form and spread. It is well-known that irritation,
such as always picking at a certain spot, can cause cancer.
Unfortunately, there are also toxic substances in the air, water, and soil. This makes it the more crucial
that we live as carefully as we can.
Prevention of cancer requires effort; yet many people give more attention to caring for their prize dogs
or their new cars. The human body requires careful attention also.
Drs. Hans Nieper and Dean Burk stated that, by the time the tumor is present, a patient's malignancy is
already far advanced. As noted earlier, a tumor is something of a strange parasite, which has as little as
2% of normal blood circulation. Its cells are living on sugar fermentation instead of oxygen as normal
cells do. It is more like a plant or fungus.
—Additional causal factors will be noted in Cancer Prevention.
Here are two interesting facts: (1) The U.S. Government declares that the five-year survival rate from
taking the officially authorized cancer remedies (chemotherapy, surgery, or radiation) has not changed
over the past 20 years. (2) Statistics reveal that patients who do not take officially authorized therapy
will, as a group, survive longer than those who do.
A problem with the cut, burn, and poison routes is their deadly nature. Chemotherapy, for example,
produces hair loss, extreme nausea, vomiting, fatigue, weakness, sterility, and damage to the liver,
kidneys, and heart. What should you do? That is your decision. On one hand, you can take the officially
recommended remedies at your local hospital. Or you can try natural remedies. Your choice.
Some of the natural folk remedies are listed here. There are many others.
However, you should know that the government and the medical association advises that you should
never treat yourself for cancer. Their counsel is that you consult a medical doctor (M.D.), and follow his
advice explicitly. Not to do so, they say, could result in your death.

Matibabu
• Saratani ni ugonjwa wa kimfumo, unaoathiri mwili mzima na unasababishwa na hali katika
mtu mzima. Kwa hivyo haiwezi kutibiwa na maelezo. Mabadiliko kamili katika njia ya maisha ni
inahitajika.
Kwa kuangalia kwa kina kuzuia saratani angalia "Tumors, Saratani - Sehemu ya 2".
Kwa mengi, habari zaidi juu ya saratani, angalia kitabu cha mwandishi, Njia Mbadala za Saratani
(Tazama karatasi ya kuagiza).

Dalili - Dalili za kawaida za saratani: kidonda chochote ambacho hakiponya kwenye ngozi, mdomo,
ulimi, au midomo. Kutokwa na damu yoyote isiyo ya kawaida au isiyo ya kawaida au kutokwa kutoka kwa ufunguzi wowote wa mwili. Anayeendelea
Badilisha kutoka kwa kawaida katika hatua ya matumbo au kibofu cha mkojo. Donge yoyote inayoendelea au unene katika matiti
au mahali popote kwenye mwili. Hoarseness au kikohozi cha kusumbua. Ugumu wa kumeza. Kuendelea kumeza
au upotezaji wa hamu ya kula, haswa ikiwa unaambatana na kupoteza uzito. Mabadiliko ya ghafla au ya haraka katika fomu,
muonekano, au kiwango cha ukuaji wa mole au wart au ikiwa inatokwa na damu. Uchovu.
Kwa ishara nane za saratani, zilizoorodheshwa hapo juu, tunaongeza zingine tatu ambazo ni muhimu: yoyote
Hali ambayo haijibu matibabu, uchochezi kutoka kwa damu iliyofungwa (thrombophlebitis),
na gesi ya matumbo.
Saratani ya ngozi: donge chini ya ngozi, moles ambayo hubadilisha rangi au saizi na imeinua kingo, kidonda
Ambayo haiponya, vidonda vya gorofa, vidonda ambavyo vinaonekana kama moles.
Kinywa au koo: kidonda sugu cha mdomo, ulimi, au koo ambayo haipo.
Larynx: kikohozi kinachoendelea na koo.
Lung: kikohozi kinachoendelea, sputum ya umwagaji damu, na maumivu ya kifua.
Matiti: donge ambalo ni ngumu, haliendi mbali, na halitembei; kuvimba au unene wa
ngozi. (Tazama "Saratani ya Matiti" kwa ishara zaidi.)
Leukemia: Nyeupe ya ngozi, kupunguza uzito, uchovu, maambukizo yanayorudiwa, michubuko rahisi, pua.
Tumbo: Kumeza na maumivu baada ya kula.
Kibofu na figo: Damu katika mkojo na kuongezeka kwa mzunguko wa mkojo. Mkojo wa umwagaji damu kwa ujumla sio
Dalili ya saratani, lakini inaweza kuwa.
Ovari: Kawaida hakuna dalili dhahiri hadi hatua za baadaye.
Endometriamu: Kutokwa na damu kati ya vipindi vya hedhi, kutokwa kwa kawaida, vipindi vyenye chungu, vipindi vizito.
Cervical na uterine: Kutokwa na damu kati ya vipindi, kutokwa kwa kawaida, vipindi vyenye uchungu, vipindi vizito.
Prostate: mtiririko dhaifu au ulioingiliwa wa mkojo; Ma maumivu yanayoendelea katika mgongo wa chini, pelvis, na/au mapaja ya juu.
Testicles: Upanuzi wa testicle, uvimbe, unene wa scrotum, ziada ya maji katika scrotum,
maumivu makali katika tumbo la chini au groin.
Colon: Damu katika viti, damu ya rectal, mabadiliko katika tabia ya matumbo (kuhara na/au kuvimbiwa).
Tishu za lymphoid: zilizopanuliwa, rubbery, node za lymph; kuwasha; jasho la usiku; homa isiyoelezewa na/au
Kupunguza uzito.
Sababu - Katika nakala hii, utapata muhtasari wa masomo mengi ya utafiti na data.
Saratani sasa ni muuaji wa pili wa kawaida nchini Merika na anaongezeka. Moja katika kila tatu
Watu watakufa kutokana na aina yake. Zaidi ya Wamarekani 1,400 hufa kila siku nayo.
Seli za saratani ni za porini, zisizo za kawaida, na tofauti na seli zingine za mwili. Wanakua haraka na polepole
Kuvamia na kujaza maeneo ya karibu. Wao huiba seli za jirani za lishe, na kusababisha kupoteza polepole
mbali na mgonjwa. Wanaweza kuhamia kwenye maeneo mapya na kuzidisha. Popote wanapoenda, kuna
ukuaji usio wa kawaida na tumors.
Seli za saratani zinaainishwa na viungo ambavyo huvamia hapo awali (ini, matiti, koloni, mapafu, mdomo, nk). Huko
ni zaidi ya aina 100 tofauti za saratani. Kila hutofautiana katika dalili zake na jinsi inaenea haraka.
Kuna aina kuu nne za saratani: carcinomas huathiri ngozi, utando wa mucous, tezi, na zingine
viungo. Leukemias ni saratani za damu. Sarcomas huathiri misuli, tishu zinazojumuisha, na mifupa.
Lymphomas huathiri mfumo wa limfu.
Ugunduzi wa mapema na matibabu ni muhimu. Mtu mmoja hufa kila dakika 3 kutokana na saratani.
Dk Otto Warburg, mshindi wa Tuzo la Nobel, alisema: "Zaidi inajulikana kuhusu sababu na kuzuia saratani
kuliko ugonjwa mwingine wowote. "
Dk. Ronald Raven, mwenyekiti wa Chuo cha Royal of Surgeons huko London, alisema: "Asilimia sabini na tano
ya saratani yote inaweza kuzuiwa ikiwa tutatumia ukweli ambao tunayo sasa. "
Katika Mkutano wa Nane wa Saratani ya Kimataifa, Dk Kavetsky alisema: "Ni muhimu katika matibabu ya
Ugonjwa wa tumorous, sio tu kuchukua hatua kwenye tumor, lakini kujaribu kuimarisha fidia na
majibu ya kujihami. . ya mfumo mzima. "
Wakati saratani inapogunduliwa, tayari iko juu sana. Katika hatua hii, ni muhimu kwamba yule aliye na
Inajiweka chini ya uangalizi wa daktari anayeweza kuelewa na kutumia tiba ya lishe.
Walakini, mgonjwa anahitaji kuelewa, kwa ajili yake mwenyewe, kile kinachohitajika na kile lazima afanye. Kuna
Hali ambazo mwathirika wa saratani hana mtu wa kumsaidia, na lazima atekeleze mpango kama huo
peke yake.
Lakini, ikiwa imesaidiwa na wengine au kwenda peke yako, isipokuwa mtu huyo atashirikiana kikamilifu na haki
kanuni, hawezi kusaidiwa kwa mafanikio. Lazima aache ukiukaji wake wa sheria za asili, zilizopewa na
Mungu kwa wanadamu, na kuishi kikamilifu kulingana na wao.
Aina ya chakula tunachokula, njia tunayoishi, na mambo ya mazingira polepole huunda au kudhoofisha
mwili. Ikiwa viungo vya kuondoa haviwezi kuendelea na kiasi cha taka zenye sumu tunazozalisha, katika
Kukata tamaa mwili hatimaye hugeuka kwa malezi ya tumors na saratani. Saratani laini ni seli zimepita
porini kwa sababu ya taka nyingi kwenye mfumo. Tumors ngumu ni makopo ya takataka yaliyotayarishwa kushikilia sumu
taka.
Saratani kwa ujumla ina kipindi kirefu cha incubation cha miaka. Kulisha mwili, kujenga kinga
mfumo, na kuzuia vitu vya ziada na kudhoofisha huwezesha mwili kupinga saratani.
Kwa sababu ya kuishi, kula, kulala, pamoja na mafadhaiko, mwili umedhoofishwa juu ya
miaka. Hii inazalisha ugonjwa sugu wa sugu -poisons zimekusanyika kwenye mwili. Viungo muhimu,
Ambayo kazi yake ni kusafisha na kuondoa taka (kama ngozi, mapafu, ini, figo, na matumbo),
kuwa chini ya kazi na bora. Mfumo unakuwa na sumu. Poisons hizi hujilimbikiza karibu na
Viungo dhaifu au ambapo mwili umejeruhiwa na jeraha, kuanguka, au pigo. Sumu zilizokusanywa
kutoka miaka ya chai, kahawa, tumbaku, cola, nyama, pombe, chakula cha kukaanga, nk, haswa hujilimbikiza katika
eneo. Basi mwili hujaribu kujenga makopo ya takataka (tumors), kushikilia bidhaa taka au seli katika
Sehemu hiyo huenda porini kutoka kwa kuwasha; Kwa hivyo seli za saratani huunda na kuenea. Inajulikana kuwa kuwasha,
Kama vile kuokota kila mahali mahali fulani, inaweza kusababisha saratani.
Kwa bahati mbaya, pia kuna vitu vyenye sumu hewani, maji, na mchanga. Hii inafanya kuwa muhimu zaidi
Kwamba tunaishi kwa uangalifu kama tuwezavyo.
Kuzuia saratani kunahitaji juhudi; Walakini watu wengi wanatoa kipaumbele zaidi kwa kutunza mbwa wao wa tuzo
au magari yao mapya. Mwili wa mwanadamu unahitaji uangalifu wa uangalifu pia.
Drs. Hans Nieper na Dean Burk walisema kwamba, wakati tumor iko, ugonjwa mbaya wa mgonjwa ni
tayari mbali. Kama ilivyoonyeshwa hapo awali, tumor ni kitu cha vimelea vya kushangaza, ambavyo havina kidogo kama
2% ya mzunguko wa kawaida wa damu. Seli zake zinaishi kwenye Fermentation ya sukari badala ya oksijeni kama kawaida
seli hufanya. Ni kama mmea au kuvu.
- Sababu za sababu za sababu zitazingatiwa katika kuzuia saratani.
Hapa kuna ukweli mbili za kupendeza: (1) Serikali ya Merika inatangaza kwamba kiwango cha kuishi kwa miaka mitano kutoka
Kuchukua tiba za saratani zilizoidhinishwa rasmi (chemotherapy, upasuaji, au mionzi) haijabadilika
zaidi ya miaka 20 iliyopita. (2) Takwimu zinaonyesha kuwa wagonjwa ambao hawachukui tiba iliyoidhinishwa rasmi
kama kikundi, kitaishi muda mrefu kuliko wale wanaofanya.
Shida na njia za kukatwa, kuchoma, na sumu ni asili yao mbaya. Chemotherapy, kwa mfano,
hutoa upotezaji wa nywele, kichefuchefu uliokithiri, kutapika, uchovu, udhaifu, kuzaa, na uharibifu wa ini,
figo, na moyo. Unapaswa kufanya nini? Huo ndio uamuzi wako. Kwa upande mmoja, unaweza kuchukua rasmi
Marekebisho yaliyopendekezwa katika hospitali yako ya karibu. Au unaweza kujaribu tiba za asili. Chaguo lako.
Baadhi ya tiba za asili za watu zimeorodheshwa hapa. Kuna wengine wengi.
Walakini, unapaswa kujua kuwa serikali na chama cha matibabu kinashauri kwamba unapaswa
Kamwe usijichukue saratani. Ushauri wao ni kwamba unashauriana na daktari wa matibabu (M.D.), na ufuate yake
ushauri wazi. Sio kufanya hivyo, wanasema, inaweza kusababisha kifo chako.

title: Leukemia
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• Treatment may include DMSO IV (which matures the immature cells in circulation),
laetrile, germanium, selenium, vitamin A, and vitamin C to bowel tolerance.
—For information on some of the natural remedies which you may wish to consider, read the sections
on "Cancer" and "Cancer Prevention".
SYMPTOMS—Weakness, easy fatigue, a remarkable whiteness of the skin, difficulty in breathing,
spells of fever, sweats, palpitation, rapid heart, loss of weight, soreness or ulceration of the throat and
gums, and a tendency to hemorrhage.
In one type, the spleen is enlarged; in another, the lymph glands are also enlarged.
CAUSES—This is called cancer of the blood, but it is actually cancer of the bone marrow, where the
blood is made.
Leukemia (which means "white blood") produces a defect in the production of white blood cells,
resulting in large numbers of immature WBCs in the blood stream. WBCs are vital to physical health;
and, without them, the body deteriorates. The bone marrow continues to produce an excess of them; yet
many of those produced and dumped into the blood stream are essentially useless.
A blood test reveals anemia (not enough red blood cells), low platelet count, increased lymphoblasts (an
excess of immature WBCs), and an elevated total WBC count.
Chronic cases run an up and down course for several years. Acute cases generally end fatally in a few
weeks.
As a rule, leukemia ends in death. A person can choose to go the medical route or try natural remedies.
There will, of course, be a risk and the very real possibility of death, whatever his decision may be.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Matibabu inaweza kujumuisha DMSO IV (ambayo inakua seli za mchanga katika mzunguko),
Laetrile, Germanium, Selenium, Vitamini A, na Vitamini C kwa uvumilivu wa matumbo.
- Kwa habari juu ya baadhi ya tiba za asili ambazo unaweza kutamani kuzingatia, soma sehemu hizo
juu ya "Saratani" na "Kuzuia Saratani".
Dalili -uchungu, uchovu rahisi, weupe wa ngozi, ugumu wa kupumua,
inaelezea homa, jasho, palpitation, moyo wa haraka, kupoteza uzito, uchungu au vidonda vya koo na
ufizi, na tabia ya kutokwa na damu.
Katika aina moja, wengu imekuzwa; Katika mwingine, tezi za lymph pia zimekuzwa.
Sababu - hii inaitwa saratani ya damu, lakini kwa kweli ni saratani ya uboho, ambapo
Damu imetengenezwa.
Leukemia (ambayo inamaanisha "damu nyeupe") hutoa kasoro katika utengenezaji wa seli nyeupe za damu,
kusababisha idadi kubwa ya WBCs za mchanga kwenye mkondo wa damu. WBC ni muhimu kwa afya ya mwili;
Na, bila wao, mwili huzidi. Marongo ya mfupa yanaendelea kutoa ziada yao; bado
Wengi wa wale wanaozalishwa na kutupwa kwenye mkondo wa damu kimsingi hawana maana.
Mtihani wa damu unaonyesha anemia (seli nyekundu za damu nyekundu), hesabu ya chini ya chembe, kuongezeka kwa lymphoblasts (an
Ziada ya WBCs za mchanga), na jumla ya hesabu ya WBC iliyoinuliwa.
Kesi sugu zinaendesha kozi ya juu na chini kwa miaka kadhaa. Kesi za papo hapo kwa ujumla huisha kwa kufa kwa wachache
wiki.
Kama sheria, leukemia inaisha katika kifo. Mtu anaweza kuchagua kwenda njia ya matibabu au kujaribu tiba asili.
Kwa kweli, kutakuwa na hatari na uwezekano halisi wa kifo, chochote uamuzi wake unaweza kuwa.

title: Leprosy
contentEn:
TREATMENT
• The disease is almost unknown among vegetarians, but is prevalent among meat eaters,
especially in hot tropical climates.
• The worst things to take into your body are pork, crocodile meat, lard, blood, greasy
meats, coffee, alcohol, or tobacco.
• Cleanly living is important.
• In tropical countries, chaulmoogra oil is taken. Begin by swallowing 10 drops a day,
gradually increasing to 30 if the person can tolerate it.
• Sunbathing helps.
• Helpful herbs include red clover blossoms, burdock seeds, yellow dock root, lobelia, red
root, poke root, goldenseal, myrrh, bittersweet, sassafras, poplar bark, black cherry bark,
and comfrey.
—Leprosy closely resembles syphilis and tuberculosis, so you may wish to read those articles also.
SYMPTOMS—Any unnatural patch on the surface of the skin. If void of sensibility to temperature,
pain, or touch, it should be a warning of the possible onset of this disease. Other early symptoms include
headache, nosebleed, and fevers. Certain areas may become insensitive, because the disease follows
along nerve trunks and especially affects areas on, or close to, the skin.
CAUSES—Leprosy is a strange infectious disease, caused by a bacteria which, under a microscope,
looks like tuberculosis. It is mildly contagious.
There may be 2-3 years, and sometimes much longer, after exposure before symptoms appear. Once it
appears, it develops very slowly.
contentSw:
Matibabu
• Ugonjwa huo haujulikani karibu kati ya mboga mboga, lakini ni kawaida kati ya wale wanaokula nyama,
Hasa katika hali ya hewa ya kitropiki moto.
• Vitu vibaya zaidi kuchukua mwili wako ni nyama ya nguruwe, nyama ya mamba, mafuta ya nguruwe, damu, grisi
Nyama, kahawa, pombe, au tumbaku.
• Kuishi safi ni muhimu.
• Katika nchi za kitropiki, mafuta ya Chaulmoogra huchukuliwa. Anza kwa kumeza matone 10 kwa siku,
hatua kwa hatua kuongezeka hadi 30 ikiwa mtu anaweza kuvumilia.
• Kuchomwa jua husaidia.
• Mimea inayosaidia ni pamoja na maua nyekundu ya clover, mbegu za burdock, mzizi wa kizimbani cha manjano, lobelia, nyekundu
mizizi, mizizi ya poke, dhahabu, manemane, bittersweet, sassafras, gome la poplar, gome la cherry nyeusi,
na Comfrey.
-Maandishi ya karibu inafanana na syphilis na kifua kikuu, kwa hivyo unaweza kutamani kusoma nakala hizo pia.
Dalili -Kiraka chochote kisicho cha asili kwenye uso wa ngozi. Ikiwa utupu wa usikivu kwa joto,
Ma maumivu, au kugusa, inapaswa kuwa onyo la mwanzo wa ugonjwa huu. Dalili zingine za mapema ni pamoja na
maumivu ya kichwa, pua, na fevers. Maeneo mengine yanaweza kuwa ya kukosa hisia, kwa sababu ugonjwa unafuata
Pamoja na mishipa ya ujasiri na huathiri sana maeneo, au karibu na, ngozi.
Sababu -Leprosy ni ugonjwa wa kuambukiza wa kushangaza, unaosababishwa na bakteria ambao, chini ya darubini,
Inaonekana kama kifua kikuu. Inaambukiza kwa upole.
Kunaweza kuwa na miaka 2-3, na wakati mwingine muda mrefu zaidi, baada ya kufichuliwa kabla ya dalili kuonekana. Mara moja
Inaonekana, inakua polepole sana.

title: Special Risk Factors
contentEn:
Here are the special risk factors for each of the fifteen main types of cancer:
Skin—Exposure to the sun, especially for those who have fair skin; history of moles (malignant or
otherwise); moles on the feet or in areas irritated by clothing; scars from severe burns and scars or sores
that won't heal; family history of skin cancer.
Lung—Smoking; exposure to asbestos, chromates, nickel, or radioactive materials; history of
tuberculosis, chronic bronchitis; exposure to certain chemicals, such as pesticides and herbicides.
Breast—First childbirth after age 35; having no children; family history of cancer; high alcohol and/or
caffeine intake; high-fat diet; diabetes. Estrogens and oral contraceptives have been linked to breast and
uterine cancer. There appears to be a link between sugar intake in older women and breast cancer.
Stomach—Pernicious anemia; lack of hydrochloric acid and dietary fiber; high-fat diet; chronic
gastritis; stomach polyps.
Colon—Lack of dietary fiber and calcium; polyps; family history of colon cancer; continued
constipation and/or diarrhea; a buildup of toxins in the colon; a high-fat diet.
Leukemia—Hereditary factors; radiation exposure; chronic viral infections.
Cervical and uterine—More than 5 complete pregnancies; first intercourse before age 18; a history of
gonorrhea or genital warts; multiple sex partners; infertility.
Ovarian—Not having had children; high-fat diet.
Laryngeal—Heavy smoking; alcohol consumption.
Lymphoma—Hereditary factors; immune system dysfunction. Some cases are linked to a viral cause.
Mouth and throat—Use of chewing tobacco; smoking; irritants inside the mouth, such as a broken or
sharp tooth, or ill-fitting or broken dentures; excessive alcohol intake.
Endometrial—Never having been pregnant; being past menopause; family history of cancer; diabetes;
obesity; hypertension.
Bladder and kidney—Exposure to certain chemicals, such as benzidines, aniline dyes, napthalenes;
smoking; excessive consumption of caffeine and/or artificial sweeteners; history of schistosomiasis (a
tropical disease); frequent urinary tract infections.
Testicular—Undescended testicle.
Prostate—Recurring prostate infection; history of venereal disease; diet high in animal fat; high intake
of milk, meat, and/or coffee; use of male hormone (testosterone) in treatment of impotence; vasectomy;
being over age 50.
contentSw:
Hapa kuna sababu maalum za hatari kwa kila moja ya aina kuu ya saratani:
Ngozi -yatokanayo na jua, haswa kwa wale ambao wana ngozi nzuri; Historia ya moles (mbaya au
vinginevyo); moles kwa miguu au katika maeneo yaliyokasirishwa na mavazi; makovu kutoka kwa kuchoma kali na makovu au vidonda
Hiyo haitapona; Historia ya familia ya saratani ya ngozi.
Mapafu -moshi; Mfiduo wa asbesto, chromates, nickel, au vifaa vya mionzi; Historia ya
kifua kikuu, bronchitis sugu; Mfiduo wa kemikali fulani, kama vile dawa za wadudu na mimea ya mimea.
Matiti -kuzaa kwanza baada ya umri wa miaka 35; kutokuwa na watoto; Historia ya Familia ya Saratani; Pombe ya juu na/au
ulaji wa kafeini; lishe yenye mafuta mengi; ugonjwa wa sukari. Estrojeni na uzazi wa mpango wa mdomo zimeunganishwa na matiti na
saratani ya uterine. Inaonekana kuna uhusiano kati ya ulaji wa sukari kwa wanawake wazee na saratani ya matiti.
Tumbo -anemia mbaya; ukosefu wa asidi ya hydrochloric na nyuzi za lishe; lishe yenye mafuta mengi; sugu
gastritis; polyps za tumbo.
Koloni -banda la nyuzi za lishe na kalsiamu; polyps; Historia ya familia ya saratani ya koloni; inaendelea
kuvimbiwa na/au kuhara; Kujengwa kwa sumu kwenye koloni; lishe yenye mafuta mengi.
Leukemia - sababu za urithi; mfiduo wa mionzi; Maambukizi sugu ya virusi.
Cervical na uterine -zaidi ya ujauzito 5 kamili; uhusiano wa kwanza kabla ya umri wa miaka 18; historia ya
gonorrhea au warts ya sehemu ya siri; Washirika wengi wa ngono; utasa.
Ovari -sio kuwa na watoto; Lishe yenye mafuta mengi.
Laryngeal -kuvuta sigara; unywaji pombe.
Lymphoma -sababu za urithi; dysfunction ya mfumo wa kinga. Kesi zingine zinaunganishwa na sababu ya virusi.
Mdomo na koo -matumizi ya tumbaku ya kutafuna; kuvuta sigara; irritants ndani ya mdomo, kama vile kuvunjika au
jino kali, au meno yanayofaa au yaliyovunjika; ulaji mwingi wa pombe.
Endometrial -kamwe kuwa mjamzito; kuwa wa zamani wa kumalizika; Historia ya Familia ya Saratani; ugonjwa wa sukari;
fetma; shinikizo la damu.
Kibofu cha mkojo na figo -mfiduo wa kemikali fulani, kama vile benzidines, dyes za aniline, napthalenes;
kuvuta sigara; matumizi mengi ya kafeini na/au tamu bandia; Historia ya schistosomiasis (a
ugonjwa wa kitropiki); maambukizo ya njia ya mkojo ya mara kwa mara.

ya maziwa, nyama, na/au kahawa; matumizi ya homoni ya kiume (testosterone) katika matibabu ya kutokuwa na uwezo; Vasectomy;
kuwa zaidi ya umri wa miaka 50.

title: Miscellaneous Preventative Factors
contentEn:
• Venereal disease can lead to breast, cervical, uterine, and prostate cancer.
• The following can also lead to cancer: too much sunlight (skin cancer); mechanical, physical, or
chemical irritation; prolonged irritation of warts, pimples, or sores (skin cancer); and radiation
(leukemia).
• The clothes should have no constricting bands and should keep the neck, head, arms, legs, and feet
warm. As many layers of clothing should be worn on the extremities as are worn on the trunk. This is
especially important in cancer of the breast or skin.
• A biopsy is a thin slice of tissue, taken to examine it for possible carcinoma (cancer). But, when the
slice is made, the cancer (if any) stored in that area, can immediately begin spreading throughout the
body.
• X-ray, radium, and other forms of radiation therapy, along with chemotherapy, weaken the body
and intensifies the toxicity and weakened conditions initially producing the cancer. The cancer generally
returns with 6 to 12 months in greatly strengthened form.
• Here is a brief list of some of the significant factors leading to cancer: Chemical additives in food,
refined and fragmented food, use of nicotine and/or alcohol, a heavy protein diet, excessive use of
dairy products, commercial oils and fats (especially when heated and reheated), all grease,
hydrogenated oil (added to many foods), diethylstilbestrol, hormones, contraceptives, nitrates
(often added to food), medicinal drugs, hard drugs, monosodium glutamate (in food and tobacco),
refined sugars, saccharin and other artificial sweeteners, biopsies and other forms of surgery,
pollutants (occupational and environmental), X-rays and radium exposure, cosmetics, detergents
and soaps, water (chlorinated, fluoridated, or contaminated), and aluminum.
contentSw:
• Ugonjwa wa Venereal unaweza kusababisha saratani ya matiti, kizazi, uterine, na saratani ya Prostate.
• Ifuatayo pia inaweza kusababisha saratani: jua sana (saratani ya ngozi); mitambo, ya mwili, au
kuwasha kemikali; kuwasha kwa muda mrefu kwa vitunguu, pimples, au vidonda (saratani ya ngozi); na mionzi
(leukemia).
• Nguo hazipaswi kuwa na bendi zinazounda na zinapaswa kuweka shingo, kichwa, mikono, miguu, na miguu
joto. Kama tabaka nyingi za mavazi zinapaswa kuvikwa kwenye miisho kama huvaliwa kwenye shina. Hii ni
muhimu sana katika saratani ya matiti au ngozi.
• Biopsy ni kipande nyembamba cha tishu, iliyochukuliwa ili kuichunguza kwa carcinoma inayowezekana (saratani). Lakini, wakati
kipande hufanywa, saratani (ikiwa ipo) iliyohifadhiwa katika eneo hilo, inaweza kuanza kuenea mara moja katika
mwili.
• X-ray, radium, na aina zingine za tiba ya mionzi, pamoja na chemotherapy, kudhoofisha mwili
na inazidisha sumu na hali dhaifu hapo awali hutengeneza saratani. Saratani kwa ujumla
Hurudi na miezi 6 hadi 12 katika fomu iliyoimarishwa sana.
• Hapa kuna orodha fupi ya baadhi ya sababu muhimu zinazoongoza kwa saratani: viongezeo vya kemikali katika chakula,
Chakula kilichosafishwa na kugawanyika, matumizi ya nikotini na/au pombe, lishe nzito ya protini, matumizi mengi ya
Bidhaa za maziwa, mafuta ya kibiashara na mafuta (haswa wakati moto na reheated), grisi yote,
Mafuta ya haidrojeni (yameongezwa kwa vyakula vingi), diethylstilbestrol, homoni, uzazi wa mpango, nitrati
(Mara nyingi huongezwa kwa chakula), dawa za dawa, dawa ngumu, glutamate ya monosodium (katika chakula na tumbaku),
Sukari iliyosafishwa, saccharin na tamu zingine bandia, biopsies na aina zingine za upasuaji,
Uchafuzi (kazi na mazingira), mionzi ya X na mfiduo wa radium, vipodozi, sabuni
na sabuni, maji (klorini, fluoridated, au iliyochafuliwa), na alumini.

title: General Preventative Factors
contentEn:
• Jethro Kloss said that his cancer cure was correct food, herbs, water, fresh air, massage, sunshine,
exercise, and rest. Yet some famous medical dictionaries say nothing about diet in cancer treatment,
except to keep the diet under 2,000 calories. The truth is there is a close relationship between the food
we eat and what happens in our bodies.
• Meals, bedtime, periods of study, etc. should be according to a regular schedule. Avoid noise, smog,
television, worry, stress, and confusion. Do some reading every day. Reading in God's Word,
accompanied by simple trustful prayer brings healing to heart, soul, and body.
• Dr. Josef Issels' cancer clinic, in Germany, is an example of a well-rounded program. In addition to
other things mentioned in this book, he prescribes plenty of rest, complete freedom from worries and
mental stress, and plenty of fresh, pure air day and night. To the degree the patient is strong enough
for it, and as he improves, there is lots of exercise and walking.
• Some, in a position to do so, may wish to move to a warm, unpolluted climate (any left?) where fresh
air and sunshine is continually available. Build up the system with good food, exercise, and rest.
• Continual overwork and exhaustion can lay the groundwork for the development of cancer.
• City living, with its hurry, noise, confusion, and air and water pollution, can also provide the
inferior living conditions which lead to malignant conditions.
WORRY, DEPRESSION, AND STRESS
• Stress is also considered a significant factor. More and more research indicates that, as Dr. H.F.
Dunbar says, "only certain types of people succumb to cancer."
• Two Soviet researchers (Serov and Troskin) demonstrated that negative emotions reduce the white
blood count in an alarming manner, hindering a major body defense against disease.
• Researchers at the Rochester Medical Center in New York have found that people are more likely to
contract cancer if, more than others, they have a harder time dealing with severe emotional conflicts
and stresses, have uncontrolled anxieties and worries, experience traumatic emotional experiences
or losses, have strong feelings of loneliness, inadequacy, hopelessness, and desperation. It may not
be that such negative attitudes cause the cancer, but they keep the person from resisting and conquering
it.
• Maintain a strong sense of purpose. Find something to do with yourself. In one church which the
author once pastored, a woman bedridden for years before her death would phone people at random and
encourage and pray with them. Between calls, she would pray for them. She was a radiant sunbeam.
• A strong trust in God and peace in Him is the solution. Man innately knows that he cannot solve his
own problems; he needs God! Only in Him can we find the strength and courage to press forward. Only
then can we be genuinely happy amid life's problems.
• Read God's Inspired Word—the Bible—every day, and be happy, contented, thankful, and
helpful to others. This is a powerful inducer to healthful conditions in the body.
contentSw:
• Jethro Kloss alisema kuwa tiba yake ya saratani ilikuwa chakula sahihi, mimea, maji, hewa safi, massage, jua,
mazoezi, na kupumzika. Bado kamusi zingine maarufu za matibabu hazisemi chochote juu ya lishe katika matibabu ya saratani,
isipokuwa kuweka lishe chini ya kalori 2000. Ukweli ni kwamba kuna uhusiano wa karibu kati ya chakula
Tunakula na kile kinachotokea katika miili yetu.
• Chakula, wakati wa kulala, vipindi vya masomo, nk vinapaswa kuwa kulingana na ratiba ya kawaida. Epuka kelele, smog,
Televisheni, wasiwasi, mafadhaiko, na machafuko. Fanya kusoma kila siku. Kusoma katika Neno la Mungu,
Pamoja na sala rahisi ya kuaminika huleta uponyaji kwa moyo, roho, na mwili.
• Kliniki ya Saratani ya Dk. Josef Issels, huko Ujerumani, ni mfano wa mpango mzuri. Mbali na
Vitu vingine vilivyotajwa katika kitabu hiki, anaamuru kupumzika, uhuru kamili kutoka kwa wasiwasi na
Dhiki ya akili, na mengi safi, safi ya mchana na usiku. Kwa kiwango mgonjwa ana nguvu ya kutosha
Kwa hiyo, na kadiri anavyoboresha, kuna mazoezi mengi na kutembea.
• Wengine, katika nafasi ya kufanya hivyo, wanaweza kutamani kuhamia hali ya hewa ya joto, isiyo na joto (kushoto yoyote?) Ambapo safi
Hewa na jua hupatikana kila wakati. Jenga mfumo na chakula bora, mazoezi, na kupumzika.
• Kufanya kazi kupita kiasi na uchovu kunaweza kuweka msingi wa maendeleo ya saratani.
• Kuishi kwa jiji, kwa haraka, kelele, machafuko, na uchafuzi wa hewa na maji, pia inaweza kutoa
Hali duni ya maisha ambayo husababisha hali mbaya.
Wasiwasi, unyogovu, na mafadhaiko
• Dhiki pia inachukuliwa kuwa jambo muhimu. Utafiti zaidi na zaidi unaonyesha kuwa, kama Dk H.F.
Dunbar anasema, "Ni aina fulani tu za watu wanaoshindwa na saratani."
• Watafiti wawili wa Soviet (Serov na Troskin) walionyesha kuwa hisia hasi hupunguza nyeupe
Kuhesabu damu kwa njia ya kutisha, kuzuia ulinzi mkubwa wa mwili dhidi ya magonjwa.
• Watafiti katika Kituo cha Matibabu cha Rochester huko New York wamegundua kuwa watu wana uwezekano mkubwa wa
Saratani ya mkataba ikiwa, zaidi ya wengine, wana wakati mgumu kushughulika na mizozo kali ya kihemko
na mafadhaiko, kuwa na wasiwasi na wasiwasi usiodhibitiwa, uzoefu wa uzoefu wa kiwewe wa kiwewe
au hasara, kuwa na hisia kali za upweke, kutokuwa na uwezo, kutokuwa na tumaini, na kukata tamaa. Inaweza sio
Kuwa kwamba mitazamo hasi kama hiyo husababisha saratani, lakini humzuia mtu huyo asipinge na kushinda
IT.
• Kudumisha hisia kali za kusudi. Pata kitu cha kufanya na wewe mwenyewe. Katika kanisa moja ambalo
Mwandishi aliwahi kuchunga, mwanamke aliyelala kitandani kwa miaka kabla ya kifo chake angepiga simu watu bila mpangilio na
Kuhimiza na kuomba nao. Kati ya simu, angewaombea. Alikuwa jua kali.
• Kumtegemea Mungu na amani ndani yake ndio suluhisho. Mtu wa ndani anajua kuwa hawezi kutatua yake
shida mwenyewe; Anahitaji Mungu! Ni ndani yake tu tunaweza kupata nguvu na ujasiri wa kusonga mbele. Tu
Basi tunaweza kuwa na furaha ya kweli huku kukiwa na shida za maisha.
• Soma neno lililoongozwa na Mungu - Bibilia - siku, na uwe na furaha, kuridhika, kushukuru, na
inasaidia wengine. Hii ni inducer yenye nguvu kwa hali ya afya katika mwili.

title: Deep Breathing And Exercise
contentEn:
• Cancer is less prevalent in physically active people, so exercise is important.
• Obtain plenty of exercise. Fresh air has remarkable healing, strengthening properties. God gave it to
us for a purpose. Let it cleanse the lungs, purify your blood, and tone up your organs.
• Do deep breathing exercises. Take 20 deep breaths, hold each one for several seconds, and then
slowly exhale. Exhale to full compression, and then inhale again. Do this several times a day—always
outdoors. This, along with outdoor walking, will help clean the lungs.
• Soviet scientists demonstrated that a complex link exists between cancer and not breathing deeply
enough or breathing stale air too much. One researcher in the Western world said that forced deep
breathing, out of doors, at least 3 times a day to the point of dizziness, will help furnish an ample supply
of oxygen.
• It is well-known that cancer cannot live in an oxygen-rich environment.
• (Many researchers seem not to be aware of the negative ion factor. Breathing deeply out of doors
supplies both oxygen and negative ions to the body. Negative ions provide a much-needed electric
charge needed by the nerves.)
• If at all possible, sleep in a room that receives sunlight during the day. It has been scientifically
proven that patients' rooms on the north side of a building have more disease germs on the floor and
furnishings.
• The bedroom should be properly ventilated at all times.
contentSw:
• Saratani haipo kwa watu wanaofanya kazi kwa mwili, kwa hivyo mazoezi ni muhimu.
• Pata mazoezi mengi. Hewa safi ina uponyaji wa kushangaza, mali ya kuimarisha. Mungu alitoa
sisi kwa kusudi. Acha isafishe mapafu, utakasa damu yako, na toa viungo vyako.
• Fanya mazoezi ya kupumua kwa kina. Chukua pumzi 20 za kina, shikilia kila moja kwa sekunde kadhaa, halafu
polepole exhale. Exhale kwa compression kamili, na kisha kuvuta tena. Fanya hivi mara kadhaa kwa siku - kila wakati
nje. Hii, pamoja na kutembea nje, itasaidia kusafisha mapafu.
• Wanasayansi wa Soviet walionyesha kuwa kiunga ngumu kipo kati ya saratani na sio kupumua kwa undani
hewa ya kutosha au ya kupumua sana. Mtafiti mmoja katika ulimwengu wa Magharibi alisema kwamba kulazimishwa kwa kina
kupumua, nje ya milango, angalau mara 3 kwa siku hadi kizunguzungu, itasaidia kutoa usambazaji wa kutosha
ya oksijeni.
• Inajulikana kuwa saratani haiwezi kuishi katika mazingira yenye utajiri wa oksijeni.
• (Watafiti wengi wanaonekana hawajui sababu hasi ya ion. Kupumua sana nje ya milango
Inasambaza oksijeni na ions hasi kwa mwili. Ions hasi hutoa umeme unaohitajika sana
malipo yanahitajika na mishipa.)
• Ikiwa inawezekana kabisa, kulala katika chumba ambacho hupokea jua wakati wa mchana. Imekuwa kisayansi
imethibitishwa kuwa vyumba vya wagonjwa upande wa kaskazini wa jengo vina vijidudu zaidi vya magonjwa kwenye sakafu na
vifaa.
• Chumba cha kulala kinapaswa kuingizwa vizuri wakati wote.

title: Organs Of Elimination
contentEn:
• Keep the eliminative organs active. The five primary ones are the lungs, the skin, the liver, the
kidneys, and the bowels. Add to this a sixth: the lymphatic system. Add to that a seventh: the immune
system, working together with the white blood cells, the T-cells, and vitamin C. (Vitamin E also purifies
and detoxifies, but it carries on this function in the liver.)
• The first step is to cleanse the blood by relieving constipation, making all the organs of elimination
active, and keeping them active. Take herbal laxatives or enemas.
• A daily bowel movement is essential, even if an enema or colonic is required. All foods which
ferment in the bowel should be avoided. Absolutely no meat or fish!
• Bowel movements need to be complete evacuations, even if enemas are necessary. The cleansing
program is releasing so many toxins, it is important that they be flushed out. Enough water must be
drunk every day.
• If necessary, keep the bowels clean with herbal laxatives or enemas. When the body is toxic, the
bowels become sluggish; waste matter is reabsorbed by the blood and lymphatic system, which is
circulated throughout the body and stored in tumors or other trash sites. It is best that you not use these
over a long period of time.
• Many aspects of cancer therapy, including chemo and radiation therapy, pain killers and sedatives,
reduce muscular contractions in the intestines, resulting in constipation. Sometimes physical assistance
is needed. Using the flat side of your fist, gently massage with rocking motions, pushing about 1-2
inches. Be gentle and slow! This not only helps reduce constipation, but increases muscle tone.
contentSw:
• Weka viungo vya kuondoa kazi. Zile tano za msingi ni mapafu, ngozi, ini,
figo, na matumbo. Ongeza kwa hii ya sita: mfumo wa limfu. Ongeza kwa hiyo ya saba: kinga
mfumo, kufanya kazi pamoja na seli nyeupe za damu, seli za T, na vitamini C. (Vitamini E pia hutakasa
na detoxisties, lakini hubeba kazi hii kwenye ini.)
• Hatua ya kwanza ni kusafisha damu kwa kupunguza kuvimbiwa, na kufanya viungo vyote vya kuondoa
hai, na kuwaweka hai. Chukua laxatives ya mitishamba au enemas.
• Harakati ya kila siku ya matumbo ni muhimu, hata kama enema au koloni inahitajika. Vyakula vyote ambavyo
Ferment kwenye matumbo inapaswa kuepukwa. Kabisa hakuna nyama au samaki!
• Harakati za matumbo zinahitaji uhamishaji kamili, hata ikiwa enemas ni muhimu. Utakaso
Programu inaachilia sumu nyingi, ni muhimu kwamba wapewe nje. Maji ya kutosha lazima iwe
kulewa kila siku.
• Ikiwa ni lazima, weka matumbo safi na laxatives ya mitishamba au enemas. Wakati mwili ni sumu,
matumbo huwa ya uvivu; Jambo la taka hutolewa tena na mfumo wa damu na limfu, ambayo ni
kusambazwa kwa mwili wote na kuhifadhiwa kwenye tumors au tovuti zingine za takataka. Ni bora usitumie hizi
kwa muda mrefu.
• Vipengele vingi vya tiba ya saratani, pamoja na tiba ya chemo na mionzi, wauaji wa maumivu na sedatives,
Punguza mikataba ya misuli kwenye matumbo, na kusababisha kuvimbiwa. Wakati mwingine msaada wa mwili
inahitajika. Kutumia upande wa gorofa wa ngumi yako, kwa upole massage na mwendo wa kutikisa, kusukuma karibu 1-2
inchi. Kuwa mpole na mwepesi! Hii sio tu husaidia kupunguza kuvimbiwa, lakini huongeza sauti ya misuli.
