Muhimu: Katika utafiti huu wote, wakati kipimo cha kipimo kinachotumiwa katika utafiti kinapewa, kiasi ni
Daima kwa "kwa siku" (mg kwa siku, nk) g inamaanisha gramu, sio nafaka.
MUHIMU: Kulingana na fasihi iliyochunguzwa, wakati overdosage inawezekana, hii ilionyeshwa.
.
Sumu, lakini haijaorodheshwa hapa kama sababu ya kupambana na saratani. Kwa sababu tofauti, jihadharini na kuchukua mengi, ikiwa
yoyote, virutubisho vya chuma.
MUHIMU: Mafuta ya samaki pia yamependekezwa katika fasihi kama mawakala wa kupambana na saratani. Lakini
Hatuwaorodhesha hapa kwa sababu tatu: kiasi kikubwa lazima kiwe na faida. Mafuta ya samaki
ina historia inayojulikana ya kuharibu misuli ya moyo. Aina zingine huzuia kufurika kwa damu
Chukua virutubisho, ambavyo vinaonekana kuwa hafifu na ngumu kumeza, na uwaweke kwenye matunda au kinywaji kingine
na kumeza wote pamoja. Ikiwa ni lazima, kwa kifupi mchanganyiko katika blender.
Inapowezekana, tafuna vidonge. Kuvunja fungua vidonge na kumwaga poda kwenye chakula chako au ndani ya
Kijiko. Paka vidonge kioevu kinywani mwako, na uteketeze kofia. Usivue vitamini C katika yako
Mdomo -Asidi inaweza kuumiza meno yako. Kumeza tu.
• Inajulikana sana, na biochemists, kwamba waathirika wengi wa saratani wana upungufu wa vitamini sio tu,
lakini pia asidi ya hydrochloric, potasiamu, magnesiamu, iodini, na vitu vingi vya kuwafuata.
• Vitamini ni muhimu sana. Usijiamini kwa viwango rasmi vilivyohitajika
Vitamini na madini. Mahitaji halisi ya lishe ni ya juu zaidi. Kwa kuongezea, kuishi katika yetu
Umri wa kemikali, uliochafuliwa huharibu vitamini na madini kadhaa.
• Kwa mfano, vitamini C imeharibiwa katika juhudi zake za kupambana na mafusho ya kutolea nje na zebaki katika
chakula. Vitamini E inajiharibu katika mchakato wa detoxifying cadmium (ambayo nonsmokers kupumua katika
Wakati wako kwenye chumba kimoja na wavutaji sigara). Orodha inaendelea na kuendelea. Ulimwengu sio salama sasa kama ilivyo
kutumika kuwa. Tunaweza kushukuru kwamba tunajua vitamini na madini na jinsi ya kuzipata
idadi ya kutosha.
[Ujumbe Maalum: Takwimu zifuatazo kwenye Vitamini A ziliundwa kutoka kwa habari iliyoangaziwa kutoka kwa vyanzo
ambayo ilikuwa bado haijagundua kuwa beta-carotene (pro-vitamin A) ilikuwa wakala anayefanya kazi zaidi katika saratani
Kuzuia, na nguvu zaidi kuliko Vitamini A.]
• Vitamini A ni muhimu katika tiba ya saratani, lakini je! Unaweza kupata vitamini hii mumunyifu wa mafuta? Juu
Vipimo vya vitamini A (500,000 IU) vinaweza kuwa na athari mbaya. Ukali unaweza kuanza chini kama 25,000
IU kwa wale walio na kazi ya ini iliyoharibika (inayosababishwa na dawa, hepatitis, au utapiamlo wa protini) vinginevyo,
Huanza kwa mia kadhaa elfu IU.
• Ukali wa vitamini A unaweza kupunguzwa kwa kuchukua vitamini E wakati huo huo. Hii hupunguza lipid
Athari za peroksidi.
• Ukali wa beta-carotene (pre-vitamin A, kama inavyopatikana katika mboga na juisi ya karoti) haijawahi kupatikana.
Utafiti mmoja wa miaka 15 ulihusisha ulaji mkubwa wa beta-carotene.
• Jaribio baada ya majaribio limefunua kuwa wakati vitamini A haipo, saratani inaweza kuanza
wanyama; Lakini, inapokuwepo kwa wingi, hata saratani zinazokua kwa haraka hazitaishi
katika wanyama wa mtihani. Vitamini A inazuia induction na inarudisha ukuaji wa mbaya na sio
tumors mbaya. Kuchukuliwa kwa kipindi kifupi, vitamini A inaweza kusaidia sana kupona saratani. Chukua kubwa
dozi (hadi vitengo 150,000 kwa siku au unaweza kutamani kubaki na kipimo kidogo: vitengo 50,000, mara mbili a
siku). Baadaye unaweza kupunguza hii kwa kiwango kidogo.
• Chukua vitamini A katika fomu iliyotiwa nguvu ili kupunguza ushiriki wa ini. Njia mbadala, ikichukua wiki 2 na
Wiki 1 mbali. Maono ya Blurred na hisia ya soapy kinywani ni ishara kwamba mwili una sana A.
(Vitamini A na D, ambayo ni mumunyifu wa mafuta, inaweza kuchukuliwa kwa kiwango kikubwa, kwa hivyo mtu lazima awe kila wakati
Makini. Kamwe usichukue idadi kubwa ya kwa muda mrefu sana.)
• Katika visa vingine, mtu anahitaji kuchukua kama 300,000 IU ya vitamini A. wakati hii lazima iwe
Imefanywa, kuchukua 3200 IU ya vitamini E itasaidia kupunguza hatari ya sumu ya vitamini A.
• Vitamini A derivatives (retinoids) reverse metaplasia ya bronchial.
• Vitamini A, C, E na beta-carotene hupunguza hatari ya saratani na mionzi na mzoga wa kemikali
kuwemo hatarini. Vitamini A, d. na E inazuia shughuli za oncogene.
• Viwango tofauti vya vitamini A vilipewa wagonjwa tofauti na saratani ya kibofu cha mkojo. Wale wanaopokea
Vipimo vidogo vilikuwa vina uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa na saratani inayorudiwa (kwa mfano, saratani inarudi baadaye).
• Vitamini vya B-tata husaidia kuzuia ugonjwa wa ini. Hii ni muhimu kwa sababu ini iliyoharibiwa
ina nafasi kubwa ya 60% ya kuwa mbaya. Dk. Max Gerson aligundua kuwa ni kweli kila wakati.
Chukua nyongeza ya B-tata. Pia chukua vijiko 3-4 vya chachu ya Brewer kila siku. Usile
Chachu ya Baker; Inayo chachu ya moja kwa moja na sio nzuri kwako.
• Dk Otto Warburg, mshindi wa Tuzo la Nobel na Mkurugenzi wa Taasisi ya Max Plank huko Berlin, alitangaza kwamba
Kuna ukosefu wa vitamini moja au zaidi ya B (riboflavin, niacin, na asidi ya pantothenic) kwenye tishu
ambayo inakuwa saratani.
• Katika nchi mbali mbali, karibu wanasayansi 200 wameripoti juu ya umuhimu wa niacin (vitamini B3) katika
kuzuia na kutibu saratani.
• gramu 2 za niacin (B3) kila siku inapendekezwa kama sababu ya kupambana na saratani.
• Niacin imependekezwa na NIH kwa kiasi hadi 3000-6000 mg, kwa kupunguza cholesterol.
Lakini kutolewa kwa wakati Niacin ni mtuhumiwa zaidi wa kusababisha uharibifu wa ini; Viwango ambavyo vinaweza kufanya hivyo havikuwa
kutolewa.
• Vitamini B6 (pyridoxine; pyridoxal na pyridoxal-5-pyrophosphate (P5P) inasaidia katika kupunguza
Uharibifu kutoka kwa tiba ya mionzi na kupunguza kasi ya saratani kutoka kwa muundo wa polyamine wa tumor.
Hasa nzuri wakati mafuta ya B6 yanatumika kwa tumors za melanoma ya uso. Inasaidia kuzuia kupumua
na saratani ya kizazi (Lishe na Saratani, Juni 1984).
• Panya zenye upungufu wa B6 zilionyesha uboreshaji wa tumor ulioboreshwa na kuongezeka kwa ukubwa wa tumor. Katika mwingine
majaribio, wanyama walio na B6 na kisha kuingizwa na seli za saratani ya melanoma (ngozi), walionyesha
upinzani mkubwa kwa aina hii mbaya ya saratani. Uchunguzi juu ya wanadamu ulifunua matokeo kama hayo.
• Chini ya 500 mg ya vitamini B-6 kwa wanadamu inaonekana kuwa salama.
• Vitamini B12 inazidisha sana tumor kuua kwa vitamini C.
• Mchanganyiko wa folate (folic acid, vitamini B) na B12 imepatikana ili kubadili bronchial
metaplasia (vidonda vya mapema). Asidi ya Folic inalinda dhidi ya saratani ya kizazi (Jarida la Amerika la
Lishe ya Kliniki, Januari 1982).
• Asidi ya pangamic ni vitamini B15. Wanasayansi wengi (Warburg, Goldblatt, nk) wanaamini kuwa sugu
Upungufu wa oksijeni katika seli husababisha malezi ya seli ya saratani. Asidi ya Pangamic huongeza upinzani wa mwili
kwa upungufu wa oksijeni. Kumbuka kwamba seli za saratani hazitumii oksijeni na kwamba seli zisizo na oksijeni
wana uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa mbaya.
• Laetrile (pia huitwa amygdalin, nitrilosides, au vitamini B17) ni dutu nyingine inayotumika kuondoa
Saratani. Imetokana na mashimo ya apricot (mbegu). Chukua vidonge viwili vya 500 mg ya laetrile mara 3 kwa siku. Pia ni
Kupatikana katika Kernels zote za Matunda, isipokuwa zile za machungwa. Vyanzo vingine vya chakula, ambavyo vina kiwango kidogo,
Jumuisha maharagwe ya lima, lenti, maharagwe ya mung, apples za kaa, pears, plums, apricots, cherries, cranberries,
Mbegu zilizomwagika, na maapulo (tafuna mbegu na vile vile apple).
• Kernels kadhaa za apricot (i.e., mbegu za apricots au mashimo) zinapaswa kuliwa katika kila chakula cha protini. Sita kwa siku
inaweza kuwa ya kutosha. Wanapaswa kuliwa na chakula au, bora zaidi, na apricots safi, waliohifadhiwa, au kavu.
Wale wenye uchungu kidogo wana laetrile zaidi (pia huitwa nitriloside au amygdalin), na ni bora kwa
Wewe kuliko wale watamu. Usichanganye aina tamu na zenye uchungu; Kunaweza kuwa na mwingiliano. Ikiwa
Inapatikana, 100 mg ya amygdalin ya mdomo inaweza kubadilishwa.
• Ikiwa watu wangekula mbegu mara kwa mara wanapokula maapulo, pears, apricots, wangepata vya kutosha
Laetrile. Kuanza kufanya hivyo mapema, itasaidia kuzuia saratani kuunda baadaye.
• Lakini wakati saratani tayari inaendelea, 500-590 mg ya amygdalin, katika fomu ya kibao thabiti, inapaswa kuwa
kumeza kwenye milo miwili mikubwa. Haipaswi kuchukuliwa kwenye tumbo tupu.
• Vitamini C ni msaada mkubwa katika kupinga saratani na magonjwa mengine. Masomo ya Uswidi, huko Karolinska na
Hospitali zamea, zilifunua kuwa vitamini C katika kipimo kikubwa inaweza kuwa wakala mzuri katika kupambana na saratani.
• Vitamini C inazuia athari za mzoga wa sumu nyingi, pamoja na nitrati. Vitamini C inaweza kuchukuliwa
kwa uvumilivu wa matumbo. Hii inamaanisha kuwa unaweza kuchukua kadri uwezavyo, hadi uanze kuwa na kuhara. Wakati
Vipande vya mwili hufikia kueneza kwenye C, mabaki ya vitamini hii ya maji hutumwa ndani ya matumbo,
Ambayo humenyuka kwa asidi kwa matumbo ya kawaida hadi C itakapopita. Chukua kipimo kikubwa cha 5,000 mg au
zaidi kwa siku. Ni antitoxin yenye nguvu zaidi inayojulikana, na inaweza kugeuza au kupunguza athari inayoharibu
ya kansa nyingi za kemikali zinazoingia ndani ya mwili wako kutoka hewani, maji, au chakula.
• Saratani ya kibofu cha mkojo inaweza kutokea wakati amino asidi tryptophan haijatengenezwa vizuri, na kusababisha
katika oxidation ya metabolites yake. Vitamini C inazuia mchakato huo wa oxidation, na kwa hivyo huzuia saratani
Maendeleo. Ni wakala wa kuzuia dhidi ya saratani anuwai (Jarida la Saratani ya Kitaifa
Taasisi, 73, 1984).
• Vitamini C ni mpiganaji wa saratani mwenye nguvu, kwamba ni vizuri hapa kutoa habari zaidi:
Dalili za upungufu ni pamoja na uponyaji wa jeraha polepole, maumivu katika viungo, kukandamiza kinga, ufizi wa kutokwa na damu,
kuwashwa, na hatari kubwa ya saratani. Ikiwa unachukua sana kwa wakati, itasababisha kuhara kali ndani
Dakika 30. Ulaji: RDA: 60 mg. Kawaida U.S.: 114 mg. Prophylactic: 500-2000 mg. Matibabu: 500-
100,000 mg.
• Imechukuliwa kwa kipimo kikubwa, vitamini A na C inazuia hyaluronidase, enzyme inayopatikana katika saratani
tishu.
• Vitamini A, C, na E ni antioxidants. Wakati wa kuandamana na madini, seleniamu na zinki, wao
Saidia kulinda dhidi ya malignancies.
• Viwango vya chini vya serum ya vitamini A na E vilikuwa vya kawaida kwa wagonjwa wanaopokea, na kujibu vibaya,
chemotherapy. Hatari kubwa katika kutumia chemotherapy na mionzi ni uharibifu, utangulizi wa a
hali ya sumu, na uharibifu wa vitamini vya kupambana na saratani.
• Vitamini C na beta-carotene (pre-vitamin A) zimepatikana kuwa nzuri katika kurudisha nyuma kizazi
Dysplasia na leukoplakia ya mdomo kwa wanadamu.
• Vitamini C na K ilionyesha shughuli za kupambana na tumor dhidi ya seli za saratani ya binadamu katika vitro, lakini
ikawa na ufanisi kwa 2% kipimo cha kawaida wakati unatumiwa pamoja.
• Dutu katika vitamini D, inayojulikana kama 1,25 dihydroxycholecalciferol imegunduliwa kuwa anti-
sababu ya saratani. Lakini, kwa sababu ya sumu ya overdose ya vitamini D, lazima itumike tu chini ya uangalizi wa a
Mtaalam. Kwa wengi wetu, ni bora kuzuia kutumia vitamini D sana, ingawa zingine zinahitajika.
Jua ndio chanzo bora. (Mafuta ya samaki yanaweza kusababisha shida ya moyo.)
• Vitamini E, kufanya kazi na C, inazuia shughuli ya dutu ya ukuaji (kichocheo) inayopatikana katika saratani
tishu. Chukua hadi vitengo 1,000 kwa siku. Vitamini C na E husaidia mwili kuzuia shughuli za enzyme
Hyaluronidase, inayopatikana katika tishu za saratani.
• Ukosefu wa beta-carotene (pro-vitamin A), vitamini E, na B tata katika tishu za mapafu zinaweza kuhusishwa na
Saratani ya mapafu.
• Sindano za vitamini E, beta-carotene, canthaxanthin (carotenoid) na dondoo ya mwani
Viwango vilivyoimarishwa sana vya tumor necrosis factor alpha, na kugeuza tumors ya buccal ya buccal.
• Seli za saratani ya kibofu ya binadamu katika vitro zilipunguzwa sana wakati vitamini E iliongezwa. Inasaidia
Kulinda dhidi ya Saratani ya Bowel (Jarida la Taasisi ya Saratani ya Kitaifa, 73, 1984).
• Vitamini F ni asidi muhimu ya mafuta. Ongeza kijiko 1 cha mafuta ya mboga-baridi kwa kila chakula
Chakula (sio chakula cha juisi pekee). Mafuta ya vijidudu vya ngano na mafuta ya kitani ndio bora zaidi. Mafuta ya mahindi na mafuta ya soya ni
pili bora. Mafuta ya safflower sio nzuri sana. Hakikisha mafuta ni safi na yanahifadhiwa jokofu wakati sio ndani
Tumia. Kamwe usitumie mafuta ya pamba (inaweza kusababisha upofu), mafuta ya hidrojeni, mafuta ya mafuta, grisi, au mnyama
Bidhaa. Mafuta kwenye karanga ni nzuri, ikiwa karanga ni safi.
• Vitamini K husaidia kulinda mwili dhidi ya vitu fulani vinavyosababisha saratani. Chukua na vitamini C kwa
Ongeza nguvu yake ya kupunguza saratani.
• Quercetin (moja ya bioflavonoids ambayo, kwa pamoja, huitwa vitamini P) iliongeza kiwango cha kuua kiini
katika seli za saratani, ambazo zilifunuliwa na hyperthermia (tiba ya joto) bila athari mbaya kwa kawaida
Seli zenye afya.
• Quercetin ilipunguza saratani katika wanyama walio wazi kwa kansa mbili.

title: Minerals
contentEn:
• A Cancer Control Convention, meeting in Japan, reported that the trace mineral, germanium, in the
diet is a significant factor in preventing and eliminating cancer.
• One cancer researcher, who studied in-depth into cancer remedies over the past 150 years, declared
that every effective anticancer formula (Glyoxylide, which is the Koch treatment; the Hoxsey herbs;
Hypotonic therapy; laetrile; the Gerson method; Krebiozen; and Carcalon) involves extra amounts of
potassium. This is very important.
• Be sure to include a significantly higher intake of potassium. Potassium deficiency is considered by
Gerson, Scott, and others as a primary contributing cause of cancer.
• Potassium foods include almonds, apples, dried apricots, bananas, beans, beets, broccoli, carrots,
dulse, grapes, kale, olives, pecans, rice bran, sunflower seeds, wheat bran, and germ. These foods help
the body resist and overcome tumors, cysts, and malignancies.
• Center your diet around potassium foods. Here are more of them:
• Dried apricots, asparagus, pearled barley, dried navy beans, fresh lima beans, raw beets, sprouted bread
with no salt, Brussels sprouts, cabbage, cantaloupe, caraway seed, cauliflower, celery seed, small leaves
of chard, dark raw cherries, dandelion greens, dill seed, endive, unsulphured figs (dried or raw), garlic,
concord or emperor grapes, grapefruit, fresh horseradish, fresh lemons, lentils, fresh limes, nectarines,
okra, onions, oranges, fresh parsley, dried or raw peaches, Bartlett pears, dry or fresh peas, persimmons,
raw pineapple (never canned), raw plums, dried or raw prunes, raw quinces, raisins, wild or brown rice,
sage, rolled oats, spinach, squash (acorn, Hubbard, yellow summer), tangerines, raw tapioca, raw turnip
leaves, and watermelon.
• Drink potassium broths daily. Prepare them from half-inch thick potato peelings, which are then
cooked. Draw off the water and drink it.
• You want foods which are high in iodine and potassium, low in sodium, protein, and fat.
• Potassium ascorbate (12-20 g) can be taken as a partial potassium supplement. This product includes
vitamin C.
• Potassium and magnesium are among the more crucial minerals for cancer recovery. Magnesium
helps to stabilize cell membranes and elevate immune activity while potassium plays a critical role in
membrane permeability. (Magnesium, 400-800 mg daily from aspartate, citrate, or orotate.)
• Magnesium protects against cancer in general (Medical Hypotheses, August 1980).
• Calcium and magnesium have a beneficial effect in helping the body resist colon cancer. Natural
iron supplements help prevent thyroid cancer. (But many iron supplements are dangerous! Take
blackstrap molasses instead of iron pills.)
• The New England Journal of Medicine reported that calcium may prevent precancerous cells from
becoming cancerous. Calcium protects against colon cancer (American Journal of Epidemiology,
September 1988).
• Calcium supplements (2000 mg) provide a marked suppression of rectal cancer proliferation. It
inhibits early stages of colon cancer in genetically vulnerable individuals.
• Iodine and trace minerals are crucial. You can obtain them by each day eating some Nova Scotia
dulse or Norwegian kelp. Both are special seaweeds which have a wide spectrum of trace minerals. Food
grown on the continents does not have all those trace minerals; rainwater has gradually depleted the
soils.
• Iodine protects against breast cancer (Lancet, April 1976).
• It is very important to keep the iodine level of the blood normal, so both the thyroid and body tissues
will have proper cell oxidation. Eat a sufficient amount of dulse, or kelp, each day. (Do not use
California kelp.)
• People with myxedema, or underactive thyroids, are more prone to developing cancer. So keep your
thyroid in good condition with seaweed.
• Japan and Iceland both have low goiter and breast cancer rates. This may be because their diets are rich
in iodine and selenium. Breast cancer has been linked to an iodine deficiency. Japanese women have
almost no breast cancer. Colon cancer rates in Japan are also low.
• Studies at the University of Zurich and in London Polytechnic revealed that brewer's or food yeast
gives improved resistance against cancer development. Brewer's yeast is one of the best sources of
selenium, an important anticancer mineral.
• Selenium made the headlines, at the end of 1996, as a special trace mineral which could dramatically
reduce cancer in the human body. It completely inhibited tumor growth in mice inoculated with tumor
cells.
• Selenium helps eliminate cancer in five ways: It improves detoxification, bolsters immune function,
directly toxic to tumor cells, and may is a valuable anti-proliferative factor (Lancet, July 1983).
Selenium intake should not exceed 2500 mcg (2.5 mg) per day.
• Using selenium as a sole therapy, there was a 38.8% favorable response rate in patients with oral
cancer.
• High doses of selenium (equivalent to 54 mg in humans) resulted in 83-90% reduction in rate of tumor
growth in mice.
• Long-term usage of 5000 mcg of selenium may result in fingernail changes and hair loss. Selenite is
more toxic than selenium bound to amino acids (i.e., selenomethionine). Ingestion of 1-5 mg/kg body
weight of selenite will produce toxic side effects. This is equivalent to 65,000 mcg in a 65 kg adult.
• Chromium as picolinate is very helpful in working with carcinoma. (400-800 mcg.)
• Zinc as zinc picolinate (30-100 mg) is also a significant help. It protects against prostrate cancer
(British Journal of Urology, October 1983).
• Cesium is neither essential nor toxic in cancer reduction. But it slightly alters the pH of cancer cells,
rendering them more vulnerable to immune attack.
contentSw:
• Mkutano wa kudhibiti saratani, mkutano huko Japan, uliripoti kwamba madini ya kuwaeleza, germanium, katika
Lishe ni jambo muhimu katika kuzuia na kuondoa saratani.
• Mtafiti mmoja wa saratani, ambaye alisoma kwa undani ndani ya tiba ya saratani kwa miaka 150 iliyopita, alitangaza
kwamba kila formula bora ya anticancer (glyoxylide, ambayo ni matibabu ya Koch; mimea ya Hoxsey;
Tiba ya hypotonic; Laetrile; Njia ya Gerson; Krebiozen; na carcalon) inajumuisha idadi ya ziada ya
potasiamu. Hii ni muhimu sana.
• Hakikisha kuwa ni pamoja na ulaji wa juu zaidi wa potasiamu. Upungufu wa potasiamu unazingatiwa na
Gerson, Scott, na wengine kama sababu ya msingi ya kuchangia saratani.
• Vyakula vya potasiamu ni pamoja na mlozi, apples, apricots kavu, ndizi, maharagwe, beets, broccoli, karoti,
Dulse, zabibu, kale, mizeituni, pecani, matawi ya mchele, mbegu za alizeti, matawi ya ngano, na germ. Chakula hiki husaidia
Mwili hupinga na kushinda tumors, cysts, na malignancies.
• Kituo cha lishe yako karibu na vyakula vya potasiamu. Hapa kuna zaidi yao:
• Apricots kavu, avokado, shayiri yenye pearled, maharagwe kavu ya navy, maharagwe safi ya lima, beets mbichi, mkate uliokatwa
Na hakuna chumvi, Brussels hutoka, kabichi, cantaloupe, mbegu ya caraway, kolifulawa, mbegu za celery, majani madogo
ya chard, cherries mbichi giza, mboga za dandelion, mbegu ya bizari, endive, tini ambazo hazijakatwa (kavu au mbichi), vitunguu,
Concord au zabibu za Mfalme, zabibu, farasi safi, lemoni safi, lenti, chokaa safi, nectarines,
okra, vitunguu, machungwa, parsley safi, kavu au peaches mbichi, pears za bartlett, mbaazi kavu au safi, persimmons,
Mananasi mbichi (kamwe makopo), plums mbichi, kavu au mabichi mbichi, quinces mbichi, zabibu, mchele wa porini au kahawia,
sage, oats iliyovingirishwa, mchicha, boga (acorn, hubbard, majira ya joto), tangerines, tapioca mbichi, turnip mbichi
majani, na tikiti.
• Kunywa broths potasiamu kila siku. Waandae kutoka kwa peelings nene za viazi zenye inchi nusu, ambazo ni wakati huo
kupikwa. Chora maji na unywe.
• Unataka vyakula ambavyo ni vya juu katika iodini na potasiamu, chini katika sodiamu, protini, na mafuta.
• Potasiamu ascorbate (12-20 g) inaweza kuchukuliwa kama nyongeza ya potasiamu. Bidhaa hii ni pamoja na
Vitamini C.
• Potasiamu na magnesiamu ni kati ya madini muhimu zaidi ya kupona saratani. Magnesiamu
Husaidia kuleta utulivu wa membrane ya seli na kuinua shughuli za kinga wakati potasiamu inachukua jukumu muhimu katika
upenyezaji wa membrane. (Magnesiamu, 400-800 mg kila siku kutoka aspartate, citrate, au orotate.)
• Magnesiamu inalinda dhidi ya saratani kwa jumla (Hypotheses ya Matibabu, Agosti 1980).
• Kalsiamu na magnesiamu zina athari nzuri katika kusaidia mwili kupinga saratani ya koloni. Asili
Virutubisho vya chuma husaidia kuzuia saratani ya tezi. (Lakini virutubisho vingi vya chuma ni hatari! Chukua
Molasses nyeusi badala ya vidonge vya chuma.)
• Jarida la New England la Tiba liliripoti kwamba kalsiamu inaweza kuzuia seli za asili kutoka
kuwa saratani. Kalsiamu inalinda dhidi ya saratani ya koloni (Jarida la Amerika la Epidemiology,
Septemba 1988).
• Virutubisho vya kalsiamu (2000 mg) hutoa kukandamiza alama ya kuongezeka kwa saratani ya rectal. IT
Inazuia hatua za mapema za saratani ya koloni kwa watu walio hatarini.
• Madini ya iodini na kuwaeleza ni muhimu. Unaweza kuzipata kwa kila siku kula baadhi ya Scotia ya Nova
Dulse au Kelp ya Norway. Zote ni mwani maalum ambao una wigo mpana wa madini ya kuwafuata. Chakula
Kukua kwenye mabara haina madini yote ya kuwafuata; Maji ya mvua yamepunguza hatua kwa hatua
mchanga.
• Iodini inalinda dhidi ya saratani ya matiti (Lancet, Aprili 1976).
• Ni muhimu sana kuweka kiwango cha iodini cha damu kawaida, kwa hivyo tishu za tezi na mwili
itakuwa na oxidation sahihi ya seli. Kula kiasi cha kutosha cha dulse, au kelp, kila siku. (Usitumie
California kelp.)
• Watu walio na myxedema, au tezi isiyo na kazi, wanakabiliwa na saratani. Kwa hivyo weka yako
Tezi katika hali nzuri na mwani.
• Japan na Iceland zote zina viwango vya chini na viwango vya saratani ya matiti. Hii inaweza kuwa kwa sababu lishe yao ni tajiri
katika iodini na seleniamu. Saratani ya matiti imeunganishwa na upungufu wa iodini. Wanawake wa Japani wana
Karibu hakuna saratani ya matiti. Viwango vya saratani ya koloni huko Japan pia ni chini.
• Masomo katika Chuo Kikuu cha Zurich na London Polytechnic yalionyesha kuwa Brewer's au Chachu ya Chakula
Hutoa upinzani ulioboreshwa dhidi ya maendeleo ya saratani. Chachu ya Brewer ni moja ya vyanzo bora vya
Selenium, madini muhimu ya anticancer.
• Selenium ilifanya vichwa vya habari, mwishoni mwa 1996, kama madini maalum ambayo inaweza sana
Punguza saratani katika mwili wa mwanadamu. Ilizuia kabisa ukuaji wa tumor katika panya zilizoingizwa na tumor
seli.
• Selenium husaidia kuondoa saratani kwa njia tano: inaboresha detoxization, kazi ya kinga ya bolsters,
Moja kwa moja sumu kwa seli za tumor, na Mei ni sababu muhimu ya kupambana na proliferative (Lancet, Julai 1983).
Ulaji wa Selenium haupaswi kuzidi 2500 mcg (2.5 mg) kwa siku.
• Kutumia seleniamu kama tiba ya pekee, kulikuwa na kiwango cha majibu kizuri cha 38.8% kwa wagonjwa walio na mdomo
Saratani.
• Kiwango cha juu cha seleniamu (sawa na 54 mg kwa wanadamu) ilisababisha kupunguzwa kwa kiwango cha 83-90% kwa kiwango cha tumor
ukuaji katika panya.
• Matumizi ya muda mrefu ya 5000 mcg ya seleniamu inaweza kusababisha mabadiliko ya kidole na upotezaji wa nywele. Selenite ni
sumu zaidi kuliko seleniamu iliyofungwa na asidi ya amino (i.e., selenomethionine). Kumeza kwa mwili wa 1-5 mg/kg
Uzito wa selenite utatoa athari zenye sumu. Hii ni sawa na 65,000 mcg katika mtu mzima wa kilo 65.
• Chromium kama picolinate inasaidia sana katika kufanya kazi na carcinoma. (400-800 mcg.)
• Zinc kama zinc picolinate (30-100 mg) pia ni msaada mkubwa. Inalinda dhidi ya saratani ya kusujudu
(Jarida la Uingereza la Urolojia, Oktoba 1983).
• Cesium sio muhimu au sumu katika kupunguza saratani. Lakini hubadilisha pH ya seli za saratani,
kuwapa hatari zaidi kwa shambulio la kinga.

title: Other Nutrients
contentEn:
• Chlorophyll is an anticancer agent which slows the growth of cancerous tumors. It creates an
environment unfavorable to bacterial growth.
• A diet rich in chlorophyll is therapeutically effective for both external and internal infections, including
malignancies.
• Blue-green algae and chlorophyll clean and protect the blood
• CoQ10 (co-enzyme Q10) and germanium provide oxygen to the cells. So does vitamin E, working
in the liver. (Cancer does not use oxygen in the cells.)
• CoQ10 increases aerobic (oxygen) metabolism and immune function. Cancer cells thrive where there
is a lack of oxygen.
• CoQ10 sometimes reduces hair loss in those who choose to take chemotherapy.
• Scientists, at UCLA, have found that sodium linoleate, which contains linoleic acid (an essential
fatty acid) has the ability to fight cancer cells. Lecithin is a good source.
• Gamma linolenic acid (GLA) can be taken as oil of borage, evening primrose, or black current seed.
In purified form, up to 1.5 grams per day can be taken.
• Alpha linolenic acid (ALA) from flaxseed oil (1-2 tsp. daily). Make sure that it was stored in the
refrigerator at the health food store you purchase it from. Flaxseed oil becomes rancid very quickly, so
purchase small bottles.
contentSw:
• Chlorophyll ni wakala wa anticancer ambayo hupunguza ukuaji wa tumors za saratani. Inaunda
Mazingira yasiyofaa kwa ukuaji wa bakteria.
• Lishe iliyo na chlorophyll inafaa kwa matibabu kwa maambukizo ya nje na ya ndani, pamoja na
malignancies.
• Mwani wa kijani-kijani na chlorophyll safi na kulinda damu
• CoQ10 (Co-enzyme Q10) na germanium hutoa oksijeni kwa seli. Vivyo hivyo vitamini E, inafanya kazi
kwenye ini. (Saratani haitumii oksijeni kwenye seli.)
• CoQ10 huongeza kimetaboliki ya aerobic (oksijeni) na kazi ya kinga. Seli za saratani hustawi mahali hapo
ni ukosefu wa oksijeni.
• CoQ10 wakati mwingine hupunguza upotezaji wa nywele kwa wale ambao huchagua kuchukua chemotherapy.
• Wanasayansi, huko UCLA, wamegundua kuwa sodiamu linoleate, ambayo ina asidi ya linoleic (muhimu
Asidi ya mafuta) ina uwezo wa kupambana na seli za saratani. Lecithin ni chanzo kizuri.
• Asidi ya gamma linolenic (GLA) inaweza kuchukuliwa kama mafuta ya borage, primrose ya jioni, au mbegu nyeusi ya sasa.
Katika fomu iliyotakaswa, hadi gramu 1.5 kwa siku zinaweza kuchukuliwa.
• Alpha linolenic acid (ALA) kutoka mafuta ya flaxseed (1-2 tsp. Kila siku). Hakikisha kuwa imehifadhiwa katika
Jokofu kwenye duka la chakula cha afya unanunua kutoka. Mafuta ya flaxseed huwa rancid haraka sana, kwa hivyo
Nunua chupa ndogo.

title: Amino Acids
contentEn:
• Glutathione (200 grams), functions in the body as an antioxidant and helps destroy free radicals and
the toxicity remaining if you already have received radiation treatments and chemotherapy. Cruciferous
vegetables (broccoli, especially) increases the body's own production of glutathione peroxidase (GSH).
• Cysteine (N-acetylcysteine) (1-2 grams) is an amino acid which enters into various detoxification
systems in the body, helps bolster glutathione peroxidase activity, and can be converted in the body to
glutathione, which may become GSH, a potent broad spectrum anti-oxidant enzyme system. Cysteine
supplementation promote glutathione synthesis.
• Although safe up to 10 g, the nauseating taste and smell of cysteine can cause vomiting.
• Several studies confirm that arginine reduces tumors and tumor formation. It increases T-cell function,
stimulates the thymus and thyroid, and enhances activity of killer cells, as well as interleukin-2 receptors
and general immune improvements.
• At therapeutic levels (above 5 g) of arginine, growth of certain viruses may be activated.
• Methionine reduces the uptake of mercury, which is a cancer-causing agent.
• Malnourished cancer patients improve when branched chain amino acids (leucine, isoleucine, and
valine) are given. Protein and albumin synthesis are heightened.
contentSw:
• Glutathione (gramu 200), hufanya kazi mwilini kama antioxidant na husaidia kuharibu radicals bure na
sumu iliyobaki ikiwa tayari umepokea matibabu ya mionzi na chemotherapy. Kusulubiwa
Mboga (broccoli, haswa) huongeza uzalishaji wa mwili wa glutathione peroxidase (GSH).
• Cysteine ​​(N-acetylcysteine) (gramu 1-2) ni asidi ya amino ambayo inaingia kwenye detoxification anuwai
mifumo katika mwili, husaidia kukuza shughuli za glutathione peroxidase, na inaweza kubadilishwa katika mwili kuwa
Glutathione, ambayo inaweza kuwa GSH, mfumo mzuri wa enzyme ya anti-oxidant. Cysteine
Uongezaji wa kukuza muundo wa glutathione.
• Ingawa salama hadi 10 g, ladha ya kichefuchefu na harufu ya cysteine ​​inaweza kusababisha kutapika.
• Tafiti kadhaa zinathibitisha kuwa arginine hupunguza tumors na malezi ya tumor. Inaongeza kazi ya T-seli,
Inachochea thymus na tezi, na huongeza shughuli za seli za muuaji, na pia receptors za interleukin-2
na maboresho ya kinga ya jumla.
• Katika viwango vya matibabu (juu ya 5 g) ya arginine, ukuaji wa virusi fulani unaweza kuamilishwa.
• Methionine inapunguza matumizi ya zebaki, ambayo ni wakala anayesababisha saratani.
• Wagonjwa wa saratani ya utapiamlo huboresha wakati asidi ya amino asidi (leucine, isoleucine, na
Valine) wamepewa. Mchanganyiko wa protini na albin umeinuliwa.

title: Preventing Cancer

Because of modern nutritional, environmental, and living conditions, cancer rates are rapidly increasing.
In this chapter, the thoughtful reader will have learned a number of things which can help prevent the
